GSP27moksop_u:3360: prāṇāt priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭim eti na tāṃ janaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3361: yām āyāti janaṃ śāntam avalokya samāśayam //MU_2,13.67//
GSP27moksop_u:3362: samayā śamaśālinyā vṛttyā yas sādhu vartate /
GSP27moksop_u:3364: anuddhatamanāś śāntas sādhu karma karoti yat /
GSP27moksop_u:3366: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā śubhāśubham /
GSP27moksop_u:3367: na hṛṣyati glāyati yas sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.70//
GSP27moksop_u:3369: jitvendriyāṇi yatnena sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.71//
GSP27moksop_u:3372: sthito 'pi na sthita iva na hṛṣyati na kupyati /
GSP27moksop_u:3373: yas suṣuptamanās svasthas sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.73//
GSP27moksop_u:3375: dṛṣṭiḥ prasarati prītā sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.74//
GSP27moksop_u:3377: dṛśyante yasya kāryāṇi sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.75//
GSP27moksop_u:3378: apy āpatsu durantāsu kalpānteṣu dahatsv api /
GSP27moksop_u:3379: tucchehaṃ na mano yasya sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.76//
GSP27moksop_u:3380: antaśśītalatāṃ yāto yo bhāveṣu na majjati /
GSP27moksop_u:3381: vyavahārī na sammūḍhas sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.77//
GSP27moksop_u:3383: kalaṅkam eti na matis sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.78//
GSP27moksop_u:3390: śamam amṛtam ahāryam āryajuṣṭaṃ param avalambya padaṃ paraṃ prayātāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3391: raghutanaya yathā mahānubhāvāḥ kramam anupālaya siddhaye tam eva //MU_2,13.82//
GSP27moksop_u:3397: vicārāt tīkṣṇatām etya dhīḥ paśyati paraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:3402: sarveṣv eva mahāprājña vicāro hi satāṃ gatiḥ //MU_2,14.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3403: na vicāraṃ vinā kaścid upāyo 'sti vipacchame /
GSP27moksop_u:3404: vicārād aśubhaṃ tyaktvā śubham āyāti dhīs satām //MU_2,14.5//
GSP27moksop_u:3405: balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca pratipattiḥ kriyāphalam /
GSP27moksop_u:3411: mūḍhāḥ kālavaśeneha yad gatāḥ paramaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:3413: rājyāni sampadas sphāro bhogo mokṣaś ca śāśvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3416: na tā vipadi majjanti tumbakānīva vāriṇi //MU_2,14.11//
GSP27moksop_u:3418: phalānām atyudārāṇāṃ bhājanaṃ hi bhavanti te //MU_2,14.12//
GSP27moksop_u:3422: avicāramayī nidrā yātu te rāghava kṣayam //MU_2,14.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3424: na nimajjati moheṣu tejorāśis tamassv iva //MU_2,14.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3426: nūnaṃ vikasito yasya himavān iva bhāti saḥ //MU_2,14.16//
GSP27moksop_u:3428: tasyodety aśaniś candrān mudhā yakṣaś śiśor iva //MU_2,14.17//
GSP27moksop_u:3432: avicāreṇa te bhānti vetālās tamasā yathā //MU_2,14.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3436: parāṃ nirvṛtim abhyeti pūrṇaś candra ivātmani //MU_2,14.21//
GSP27moksop_u:3440: vicāro rājate janto rajanyām iva candramāḥ //MU_2,14.23//
GSP27moksop_u:3455: tat sadālambanaṃ cetas sphāram ābhāsam āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:3456: nāstam eti na codeti kham ivātitatāntaram //MU_2,14.31//
GSP27moksop_u:3457: na jahāti na cādatte na tāmyati na śāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:3458: kevalaṃ sākṣivat paśyañ jagad ātmani tiṣṭhati //MU_2,14.32//
GSP27moksop_u:3459: na ca śāmyati nāpy antar nāpi bāhye 'vatiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:3460: na ca naiṣkarmyam ādatte na ca karmaṇi majjati //MU_2,14.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3462: na kṣubdho nāti cākṣubdho bhāti pūrṇa ivārṇavaḥ //MU_2,14.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3464: jīvanmuktā jagaty asmin viharanti hi yoginaḥ //MU_2,14.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3465: uṣitvā suciraṃ kālaṃ dhīrās te yāvadīpsitam /
GSP27moksop_u:3466: tanum ante parityajya yānti kevalatāṃ tatām //MU_2,14.36//
GSP27moksop_u:3467: ko 'haṃ kasya ca saṃsāra ity āpady api dhīmatā /
GSP27moksop_u:3475: vivekāndho hi jātyandhaś śocyaś sarvasya durmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3493: ko 'haṃ katham ayaṃ doṣas saṃsārākhya upāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3498: na vicārād ṛte tattvaṃ jñāyate sādhu kiñcana //MU_2,14.52//
GSP27moksop_u:3499: vicārāj jñāyate tattvaṃ tattvād viśrāntir ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:3501: saphalatā phalate bhuvi karmaṇāṃ prakaṭatāṃ kila gacchata uttamāt /
GSP27moksop_u:3506: santoṣo hi paraṃ śreyas santoṣas sukham ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:3511: viṣamāsv apy anudvignā na kadācana dūyate //MU_2,15.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3518: ātmanātmani santoṣaṃ yāvad yāti na mānasam /
GSP27moksop_u:3519: udbhavanty āpadas tāval latā iva manovanāt //MU_2,15.7//
GSP27moksop_u:3523: mlāne vaktram ivādarśe na jñānaṃ pratibimbati //MU_2,15.9//
GSP27moksop_u:3525: yāty asāv udito yasya nityaṃ santoṣabhāskaraḥ //MU_2,15.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3529: yas sa somyas sadācāras santuṣṭa iti kathyate //MU_2,15.12//
GSP27moksop_u:3531: kṣīrābdher iva śuddhasya mukhe lakṣmīr virājate //MU_2,15.13//
GSP27moksop_u:3532: pūrṇatām alam āśritya svātmany evātmanā svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:3535: sthairyam āyāty ariktasya śītāṃśor iva śāśvatam //MU_2,15.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3543: toṣam eti yathā loko na tathā dhanasaṅgamaiḥ //MU_2,15.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3544: samatayā matayā guṇaśālināṃ puruṣarāḍ iha yas samalaṅkṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3545: tam amalaṃ praṇamanti nabhaścarā api mahāmunayo raghunandana //MU_2,15.20//
GSP27moksop_u:3552: rakṣanti ye mahātmāno bhājanaṃ te phalaśriyaḥ //MU_2,16.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3553: śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti mṛtir apy utsavāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:3556: jayaty eko jagaty asmin sādhus sādhusamāgamaḥ //MU_2,16.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3563: api kaṣṭatarāṃ prāptair daśāṃ vivaśatāṃ gataiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3564: manāg api na santyājyā mānavais sādhusaṅgatiḥ //MU_2,16.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3568: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kiṃ tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ //MU_2,16.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3576: prathitā yena bhavyena na tyaktā sādhusaṅgatiḥ //MU_2,16.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3578: sarvopāyena saṃsevyās te hy upāyā bhavāmbudhau //MU_2,16.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3583: santoṣas sādhusaṅgaś ca vicāro 'tha śamas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:3584: eta eva bhavāmbhodhāv upāyās taraṇe nṛṇām //MU_2,16.18//
GSP27moksop_u:3585: santoṣaḥ paramo lābhas satsaṅgaḥ paramā gatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3586: vicāraḥ paramaṃ jñānaṃ śamo hi paramaṃ sukhaṃ //MU_2,16.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3588: yair abhyastās ta uttīrṇā mohavārer bhavārṇavāt //MU_2,16.20//
GSP27moksop_u:3591: eko 'py eko 'pi sarveṣāṃ eṣāṃ prasavabhūr iva /
GSP27moksop_u:3604: yāvad eko guṇo nāptas tāvan nāsty uttamā gatiḥ //MU_2,16.28//
GSP27moksop_u:3606: yāvan nābhiniviṣṭaṃ te mano rāma guṇārjane //MU_2,16.29//
GSP27moksop_u:3607: devo bhavātha yakṣo vā puruṣaḥ pādapo 'tha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:3609: ekasminn eva phalite guṇe balam upāgate /
GSP27moksop_u:3615: sā hi svena prayatnena yasminn eva nipātyate /
GSP27moksop_u:3616: kūle tenaiva vahati yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_2,16.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3618: varamate nijabhāvamahānadīm iha hi tena manāg api nohyase //MU_2,16.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3622: evam āttaviveko yas sa bhavān iva rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:3629: muktaye jāyate jantos tasyedaṃ śrotum udyamaḥ //MU_2,17.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3631: vacasāṃ bhājanaṃ bhūtyai bhavyo bhavati nādhamaḥ //MU_2,17.5//
GSP27moksop_u:3633: triṃśad dve ca sahasrāṇi jñātā nirvāṇadāyinī //MU_2,17.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3636: svayaṃ jñātā śrutā vāpi bhrāntiśāntyaiva saukhyadā /
GSP27moksop_u:3643: vairāgyaṃ vardhate yena sekeneva marau taruḥ //MU_2,17.11//
GSP27moksop_u:3644: sārdhaṃ sahasraṃ granthasya yasmin hṛdi vicārite /
GSP27moksop_u:3648: svabhāvo hi mumukṣūṇāṃ narāṇāṃ yatra varṇyate /
GSP27moksop_u:3654: yasmiñ śrute jagad idaṃ śrotrāntar budhyate 'khilam /
GSP27moksop_u:3665: yathā nabhasi nīlatvam asad evotthitaṃ tathā //MU_2,17.22//
GSP27moksop_u:3667: svapne vā vyomni vā citram akarma cirabhāsuram //MU_2,17.23//
GSP27moksop_u:3668: avahnir eva vahnitvaṃ dhatte citrānalo yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:3683: ittham abhyāgato vṛddhim iti tatrocyate ciram //MU_2,17.31//
GSP27moksop_u:3686: idaṃ jagad ahaṃ tvaṃ ca sa iti bhrāntir utthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:3687: ity asau śāmyatīty asmin kathyate ślokasaṅgrahe //MU_2,17.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3703: śiṣṭo granthaḥ parīmāṇaṃ tasya jñeyaṃ mahārthadam //MU_2,17.41//
GSP27moksop_u:3704: buddhe tasmin bhavec chrotā nirvāṇaś śāntakalpanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3723: tulanam eti na muktimato bata pravitatāsti na nūnam avastunaḥ //MU_2,17.51//
GSP27moksop_u:3727: asyāṃ vā citimātrāyāṃ paro bodhaḥ pravartate /
GSP27moksop_u:3728: bījād iva yato vyuptād avaśyambhāvi satphalam //MU_2,18.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3729: api pauruṣam ādeyaṃ śāstraṃ ced yuktibodhakam /
GSP27moksop_u:3732: anyat tṛṇam iva tyājyam apy uktaṃ padmajanmanā //MU_2,18.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3733: yo 'mbhas tātasya kūpo 'yam iti kaupaṃ pibet kaṭu /
GSP27moksop_u:3734: tyaktvā gāṅgaṃ purassthaṃ taṃ ko 'nuśāsati rāgiṇam //MU_2,18.4//
GSP27moksop_u:3737: śrutāyāṃ prājñavadanād buddhāyāṃ svayam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:3738: śanaiś śanair vicāreṇa buddhau saṃskāra āgate //MU_2,18.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3739: pūrvaṃ tāvad udety antar bhṛśaṃ saṃskṛtavākyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:3742: sā yayā sneham āyānti rājāno 'jagarā api //MU_2,18.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3745: lobhamohādayo doṣās tānavaṃ yānty alaṃ śanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3748: na kācana phalaṃ dhatte svabhyāsena vinā kriyā //MU_2,18.11//
GSP27moksop_u:3749: manaḥ prasādam āyāti śaradīva mahat saraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3761: samudrasyeva gāmbhīryaṃ sthairyaṃ meror iva sthiram /
GSP27moksop_u:3763: sā jīvanmuktatā tasya śanaiḥ pariṇatiṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:3769: śāmyanti śuddhim āyānti saumyās tiṣṭhanti sūnnate /
GSP27moksop_u:3773: dharmabhittau bhṛśaṃ lagnāṃ dhiyaṃ dhairyadhuraṃ gatām /
GSP27moksop_u:3774: ādhayo na vilumpanti vātāś citralatām iva //MU_2,18.24//
GSP27moksop_u:3782: na khedayati bhogaugho na cānandayati kvacit //MU_2,18.28//
GSP27moksop_u:3784: ye patanty utpatanty ambuvīcivat tān sa paśyati //MU_2,18.29//
GSP27moksop_u:3785: na dveṣṭi sampravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati /
GSP27moksop_u:3786: kāryāṇy eṣa prabuddho 'pi niṣprabuddha iva drumaḥ //MU_2,18.30//
GSP27moksop_u:3789: buddhvedam akhilaṃ śāstraṃ vācayitvā vivecya vā /
GSP27moksop_u:3794: svayaṃ yas tu na vettīdaṃ śrotavyaṃ tena paṇḍitāt //MU_2,18.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3796: mokṣaprāptau tu tasyeha na kiñcid upayujyate //MU_2,18.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3801: bhramo jagad ahaṃ ceti sthita evopaśāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:3802: svapnamohaḥ parijñāta iva no ramayaty alam //MU_2,18.38//
GSP27moksop_u:3819: etāvaty eva ye bhūtā bhogān prāpya rase sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3821: śṛṇu tāvad idānīṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam imaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:3823: yayedaṃ śrūyate śāstraṃ tāṃ tu vistarataś śṛṇu /
GSP27moksop_u:3828: yathā dīpaṃ vinā rātrau bhāṇḍopaskaraṇaṃ gṛhe //MU_2,18.51//
GSP27moksop_u:3829: yair yaiḥ kākutstha dṛṣṭāntais tvaṃ mayehāvabodhyase /
GSP27moksop_u:3830: sarve sakāraṇās te hi prāpyaṃ tu sad akāraṇam //MU_2,18.52//
GSP27moksop_u:3832: varjayitvā paraṃ brahma sarveṣām eva vidyate //MU_2,18.53//
GSP27moksop_u:3837: evaṃ sati nirākāre brahmaṇy ākāravān katham /
GSP27moksop_u:3842: yathā jāgrat tathā svapnas siddha ābālam akṣatam //MU_2,18.58//
GSP27moksop_u:3844: ye 'rthās ta iha dṛṣṭāntās tadrūpatvāj jagatsthiteḥ //MU_2,18.59//
GSP27moksop_u:3846: granthās teṣv iyam evaikā vyavasthā bodhyabodhane //MU_2,18.60//
GSP27moksop_u:3848: śīghraṃ na pāryate vaktuṃ vāk kila kramavartinī //MU_2,18.61//
GSP27moksop_u:3850: yatas ta eva dṛṣṭāntās tasmād bhāntīha netare //MU_2,18.62//
GSP27moksop_u:3858: upamānaṃ karoty aṅga dīpo 'rthaṃ prabhayā yathā //MU_2,18.66//
GSP27moksop_u:3864: striyoktam apy aparam athāpi vaidikaṃ vaco vacaḥpralapanam eva nāgamaḥ //MU_2,18.69//
GSP27moksop_u:3865: asmākam asti matir aṅga tayeti sarvaśāstraikavākyakaraṇaṃ phalitaṃ yato 'taḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3866: prātītikārthamayaśāstranijāṅgapuṣṭāt saṃvedanād itarad asti na naḥ pramāṇam //MU_2,18.70//
GSP27moksop_u:3876: śāntiś śreyaḥ paraṃ viddhi tatprāptau yatnavān bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:3886: tāvad vicārayet prājño yāvad viśrāntim ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:3894: yayā kayācid yuktyāśu boddhavyaṃ bodhyam eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:3895: muktaye tan na paśyanti vyākulāś codyacañcavaḥ //MU_2,19.13//
GSP27moksop_u:3897: vastuny anarthaṃ yaḥ praṣṭā codyacañcus sa ucyate //MU_2,19.14//
GSP27moksop_u:3899: bodhaṃ malinayaty antar mukhaṃ sarpa ivāmalam //MU_2,19.15//
GSP27moksop_u:3901: pramāṇam ekam eveha pratyakṣaṃ rāma tac chṛṇu //MU_2,19.16//
GSP27moksop_u:3903: nūnaṃ tat prati yat siddhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tad udāhṛtam //MU_2,19.17//
GSP27moksop_u:3905: pratyakṣam iti nāmeha kṛtaṃ jīvas sa eva ca //MU_2,19.18//
GSP27moksop_u:3906: sa eva saṃvit sa punar ahantāpratyayātmakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3907: sa yayodeti saṃvittyā sā padārtha iti smṛtā //MU_2,19.19//
GSP27moksop_u:3914: svayam eva vicāras tu sanañarthaṃ svakaṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3915: nāśayitvā karoty āśu pratyakṣaṃ paramaṃ padam //MU_2,19.23//
GSP27moksop_u:3919: neha kaiścit kṛtair artho nākṛtair apy abhāvanāt //MU_2,19.25//
GSP27moksop_u:3920: manasy anīhite śānte na pravartanta eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:3928: draṣṭaiva dṛśyatābhāsaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ dhārayan sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3929: svaṃ yathā tatra yad rūpaṃ pravibhāti tathaiva tat //MU_2,19.30//
GSP27moksop_u:3930: sarvam ātmā yathā tatra saṅkalpatvam ivāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3931: tiṣṭhaty āśu tathā tatra tadrūpa iva rājate //MU_2,19.31//
GSP27moksop_u:3933: draṣṭṛtvaṃ draṣṭrasadbhāve dṛśyasya tv asti nāsataḥ //MU_2,19.32//
GSP27moksop_u:3935: pratyakṣam eva nirmātṛ tasyāṃśās tv anupādhayaḥ //MU_2,19.33//
GSP27moksop_u:3937: śūreṇa sādho padam uttamaṃ tat svapauruṣeṇaiva hi labhyate 'ntaḥ //MU_2,19.34//
GSP27moksop_u:3939: yāvad viśuddhāṃ svayam eva buddhām anantarūpāṃ paratām upaiṣi //MU_2,19.35//
GSP27moksop_u:3945: yo yo yena guṇeneha puruṣaḥ pravirājate /
GSP27moksop_u:3946: śikṣeta taṃ tam evāśu tasmād buddhivivṛddhaye //MU_2,20.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3948: samyagjñānaṃ vinā rāma siddhim eti na kasyacit //MU_2,20.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3951: śamādibhyo guṇebhyaś ca vardhate jñānam uttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:3953: guṇāś śamādayo jñānāc chamādibhyas tathā jñatā /
GSP27moksop_u:3961: tathā puṃsā niricchena samam āsādyate padam //MU_2,20.9//
GSP27moksop_u:3966: śrutvā tu buddhinairmalyād balād yāsyasi satpadam /
GSP27moksop_u:3968: viditavedyam idaṃ hi mano mune vivaśam eva hi yāti paraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:3969: yad avabuddham akhaṇḍitam uttamaṃ tadavabodhadaśāṃ na jahāti hi //MU_2,20.13//
GSP27moksop_u:3974: vāgbhābhir brahmavid brahma bhāti svapna ivātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:3975: yad idaṃ tat svaśabdārthair yo yad vetti sa vettu tat //MU_3,1.1//
GSP27moksop_u:3977: kim idaṃ kasya vakṣīti codyacañcur nirākṛtaḥ //MU_3,1.2//
GSP27moksop_u:3979: yathāsvabhāvaṃ vacmīdaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrūyatāṃ budhāḥ //MU_3,1.3//
GSP27moksop_u:3985: na sambhavati dṛśyaṃ tu yathedaṃ tac chṛṇu kramāt //MU_3,1.6//
GSP27moksop_u:3986: utpadyate yo jagati sa eva kila vardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:3987: sa eva mokṣam āpnoti svargaṃ vā narakaṃ ca vā //MU_3,1.7//
GSP27moksop_u:3988: atas te svavabodhārthaṃ tat tāvat kathayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:3989: utpattiṃ saṃsṛtāv eti pūrvam eva hi yo yathā //MU_3,1.8//
GSP27moksop_u:3990: idaṃ prakaraṇārthaṃ tvaṃ saṅkṣepāc chṛṇu rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:3992: yad idaṃ dṛśyate sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:3993: tat suṣupta iva svapnaḥ kalpānte pravinaśyati //MU_3,1.10//
GSP27moksop_u:3994: tatas stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:3996: ṛtam ātmā paraṃ brahma satyam ityādikā budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:3998: sa tathābhūta evātmā svayam anya ivollasan /
GSP27moksop_u:4004: tat svayaṃ svairam evāśu saṅkalpayati nityaśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4007: na nāma kaṭake tadvaj jagacchabdārthatā pare //MU_3,1.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4008: brahmaṇy evāsty ananyātma yathāsthitam idaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:4012: avidyā saṃsṛtir bandho māyā moho mahat tamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4014: bandhasya tāvad rūpaṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ śṛṇu /
GSP27moksop_u:4018: jagat tvam aham ityādisargātmā dṛśyam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4019: yāvad etat sambhavati tāvan mokṣo na vidyate //MU_3,1.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4020: nedaṃ nedam iti vyarthaiḥ pralāpair nopaśāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4023: sato dṛśyasya jagato yasmād ete vicārakāḥ //MU_3,1.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4024: jagad dṛśyaṃ tu yady asti na śāmyaty eva tat kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:4025: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ //MU_3,1.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4027: tatra tatrāsya dṛśyaśrīs samudety apy aṇūdare //MU_3,1.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4028: tasmād asti jagad dṛśyaṃ tat pramṛṣṭam idaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:4030: yadi nāma jagad dṛśyam asti tat pratibimbati /
GSP27moksop_u:4032: yatra tatra sthitaṃ rāma yathādarśe prabimbati /
GSP27moksop_u:4034: tatas tatra punar duḥkhaṃ jarā maraṇajanmanī /
GSP27moksop_u:4036: idaṃ pramārjitaṃ dṛśyaṃ mayā nātrāham āsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4042: prāptaṃ bhavati he rāma tat kiṃ nāma samādhibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4044: yadi vāpi samādhāne nirvikalpe sthitiṃ vrajet /
GSP27moksop_u:4045: tad akṣayasuṣuptābhaṃ tan manye nāmalaṃ padam //MU_3,1.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4046: prāpyate sati dṛśye 'smin na ca tan nāma kenacit /
GSP27moksop_u:4051: keṣāñcit sthitim āyānti sarvair ity anubhūyate //MU_3,1.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4052: na ca pāṣāṇatātulyā rūḍhiṃ yātās samādhayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4053: bhavanty agryaṃ padaṃ śāntaṃ cidrūpam ajam avyayam //MU_3,1.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4054: tasmād yadīdaṃ sad dṛśyaṃ tan na śāmyet kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:4058: yathā rasaḥ padārtheṣu yathā tailaṃ tilādiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:4061: yathodeti tathā dṛśyaṃ ciddhātor udare jagat //MU_3,1.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4063: svānubhūtyaiva dṛṣṭāntas tasmād dhṛdy asti dṛśyabhūḥ //MU_3,1.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4067: karoti bhāsuraṃ dehaṃ tanoty evaṃ hi dṛśyadhīḥ //MU_3,1.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4068: dravyasya hṛdy eva camatkṛtir yathā sadoditāsty astamayojjhitodare /
GSP27moksop_u:4069: dravyasya cinmātraśarīriṇas tathā svabhāvabhūtāsty udare jagatsthitiḥ //MU_3,1.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4076: dhyānaikaniṣṭhas satataṃ prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ //MU_3,2.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4077: sa ciraṃ jīvati yadā tadā mṛtyur acintayat /
GSP27moksop_u:4078: sarvāṇy eva krameṇāhaṃ bhūtāny admi kilākṣayaḥ //MU_3,2.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4079: evam ākāśajaṃ vipraṃ na kasmād bhakṣayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:4080: atra me kuṇṭhitā śaktiḥ khaḍgadhārā yathopale //MU_3,2.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4081: iti sañcintya taṃ hantum agacchat tatpuraṃ tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:4082: tyajanty udyamam udyuktā na kadācana kecana //MU_3,2.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4083: tatas tatsadanaṃ yāvan mṛtyuḥ praviśati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:4087: na cāśakat puro dṛṣṭam api hastaśatair dvijam /
GSP27moksop_u:4090: kim ity ahaṃ na śaknomi bhoktum ākāśajaṃ prabho //MU_3,2.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4092: mṛtyo na kiñcic chaktas tvam eko mārayituṃ balāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4095: karmāṇy anviccha teṣāṃ tvaṃ sāhāyyenainam atsyasi //MU_3,2.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4097: maṇḍalāni digantāṃś ca sarāṃsi sarito diśaḥ //MU_3,2.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4101: evaṃ bhūmaṇḍalaṃ bhrāntvā sa kutaścin na kānicit //MU_3,2.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4107: ākāśajasya karmāṇi kva sthitāni vada prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:4110: ākāśajasya karmāṇi mṛtyo santi na kānicit /
GSP27moksop_u:4111: eṣa hy ākāśajo vipro jātaḥ khād eva kevalāt //MU_3,2.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4112: ākāśād eva yo jātas sa vyomaivāmalaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:4113: sahakārīṇi no santi kāraṇāṇy asya kānicit //MU_3,2.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4114: sambandhaḥ prāktanenāsya na manāg api karmaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:4116: tasmād ajāta evaiṣa svayambhūr aja eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4119: adya tāvad anenānyan na kiñcit karma sañcitam //MU_3,2.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4121: samādhau saṃsthito nityaṃ karmāṇy asya na kānicit //MU_3,2.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4122: prāktanāni na santy asya karmāṇy adya karoti no /
GSP27moksop_u:4125: dṛśyate 'smābhir evaitan na tv asyāsty atra karmadhīḥ //MU_3,2.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4126: deho 'sya dṛśyate 'smābhir naiṣa vetti parāt padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4130: yathā dravatvaṃ payasi śūnyatvaṃ ca yathāmbare /
GSP27moksop_u:4131: mārute ca yathā spandas tathaiṣa parame pade //MU_3,2.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4132: karmāṇy adyatanāny asya sañcitāni na santi hi /
GSP27moksop_u:4133: na pūrvāṇy eva teneha na saṃsāravaśaṃ gataḥ //MU_3,2.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4137: kartā na pūrvaṃ nāpy adya katham ākramyate vada //MU_3,2.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4139: tadaiva rahito buddhyā svayam eva mariṣyati //MU_3,2.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4140: pṛthvyādimān aham ayam iti yasya svaniścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4141: sa pārthivo bhavaty āśu grahītuṃ sa ca śakyate //MU_3,2.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4145: bhagavañ jāyate śūnyaḥ kathaṃ nāma vadeti me /
GSP27moksop_u:4146: pṛthvyādayaḥ kathaṃ santi na santi vada vā katham //MU_3,2.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4148: na kadācana jāto 'sau na ca nāsti kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:4153: tathā tad aṇu yenāsya nikaṭe 'drinibhaṃ nabhaḥ //MU_3,2.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4156: sa eṣa brāhmaṇas tasmin sargādāv ambarodare /
GSP27moksop_u:4157: svayaṃ bhātas svayambhūtvaṃ gato bhāty ajarāmaraḥ //MU_3,2.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4158: nāsya deho na karmāṇi na kartṛtvaṃ na vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:4160: prāktanaṃ vāsanājālaṃ kiñcid asya na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4165: kutaḥ kilātra pṛthvyādeḥ kīdṛśas sambhavaḥ katham //MU_3,2.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4166: etadākramaṇe mṛtyo tasmān mā yatnavān bhava /
GSP27moksop_u:4167: grahītuṃ yujyate vyoma na kadācana kenacit //MU_3,2.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4169: brahmaiva kathito brahmaṃs tvayā me prapitāmahaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4170: svayambhūr aja ekātmā vijñānātmeti me matiḥ //MU_3,2.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4172: evam etan mayā rāma brahmaiṣa kathitas tava /
GSP27moksop_u:4174: manvantare sarvabhakṣo yadā mṛtyur haran prajāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4175: balam ety abjajākrāntāv ārambham akarot svayam //MU_3,2.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4177: yad eva kriyate nityaṃ ratis tatraiva jāyate //MU_3,2.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4181: sa cidvyomaiva no tasya kāraṇatvaṃ na kāryatā //MU_3,2.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4184: na dṛśyam asti no draṣṭā paramātmani kevale /
GSP27moksop_u:4185: svayaṃ cittvāt tathāpy eṣa svayambhūr iti bhāsate //MU_3,2.53//
GSP27moksop_u:4190: cidvyoma kevalam anantam anādimadhyaṃ brahmeti bhāti nijacittavaśāt svayambhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4191: ākāravān iva rasād iha vastutas tu vandhyātanūja iva nāsti tu tasya dehaḥ //MU_3,2.56//
GSP27moksop_u:4195: evam etan manaś śuddhaṃ pṛthvyādirahitaṃ nabhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4197: tad atra prāktanī nāma smṛtiḥ kasmān na kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:4198: yathā mama tathānyasya bhūtānāṃ ceti me vada //MU_3,3.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4202: brahmaṇaḥ prāktanaṃ karma yadā kiñcin na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4203: prāktanī saṃsmṛtis tasya tadodeti kutaḥ katham //MU_3,3.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4210: sarvāsāṃ bhūtajātīnāṃ brahmaṇo 'sty eka eva kim //MU_3,3.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4212: sarveṣām eva dehau dvau bhūtānāṃ kāraṇātmanām /
GSP27moksop_u:4216: nāsty eva bhautiko dehaḥ prathamasya prajāpateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4221: yad yatas tat tad eveti sarvair evānubhūyate //MU_3,3.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4222: nirvāṇamātraṃ prathamaṃ paraṃ bodhas tad eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4223: cittamātraṃ tad evāste na yāti vasudhāditām //MU_3,3.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4229: vibhāty evam ayaṃ sargas satyānubhavavat sthitaḥ //MU_3,3.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4234: sa citsaṅkalparūpatvād udety apy atha śāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4235: svāyattatvāt svabhāvasya nodeti na ca śāmyati //MU_3,3.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4238: saṅkalpa eṣa kacati yathā nāma svasambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4247: manomātram ato viśvaṃ yad yatas tat tad eva hi //MU_3,3.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4248: ajasya sahakārīṇi kāraṇāni na santi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:4249: tajjasyāpi na santy eva tāni tasmāt tu kānicit //MU_3,3.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4251: yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ śuddhaṃ kāryaṃ tādṛg iha sthitam //MU_3,3.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4252: kāryakāraṇatā tv atra na kiñcid upapadyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4253: yādṛg eva paraṃ brahma tādṛg eva jagattrayam //MU_3,3.28//
GSP27moksop_u:4254: manastām iva yātena brahmaṇā tanyate jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:4255: ananyad ātmanaś śuddhād dravatvam iva vāriṇā //MU_3,3.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4256: manasā tanyate sarvam asad evedam ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:4259: brahmādayaḥ prabuddhās tu kathaṃ tiṣṭhantu tatra te //MU_3,3.31//
GSP27moksop_u:4263: manorājyaṃ jagad iti satyarūpam iva sthitam //MU_3,3.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4266: viriñco manaso rūpaṃ viriñcasya mano vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4267: pṛthvyādi vidyate nātra tena pṛthvyādi kalpitam //MU_3,3.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4271: svānubhūtyaiva dṛṣṭāntas tasmād dhṛdy asti dṛśyabhūḥ //MU_3,3.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4275: karoti bhāsuraṃ dehaṃ tanoty evaṃ hi dṛśyadhīḥ //MU_3,3.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4276: sac cen na śāmyati kadācana dṛśyaduḥkhaṃ dṛśye tv aśāmyati na boddhari kevalatvam /
GSP27moksop_u:4277: dṛśye tv asambhavati boddhari boddhṛbhāvaḥ śāmyet sthite 'pi hi tad asya vimokṣam āhuḥ //MU_3,3.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4282: śrotum ekarase jāte jane maunavati sthite //MU_3,4.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4295: babhūvur alpasañcārā janā daśasu dikṣv api /
GSP27moksop_u:4300: deva snānadvijārcāsu kālo hy atigato bhṛśam //MU_3,4.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4301: tato vasiṣṭho bhagavān saṃhṛtya madhurāṃ giram /
GSP27moksop_u:4302: adya tāvan mahārāja śrutam etāvad astu vaḥ //MU_3,4.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4303: prātar anyad vadiṣyāma ity uktvā maunavān abhūt /
GSP27moksop_u:4316: cakrur dinasamācāraṃ svaṃ sarve sveṣu veśmasu //MU_3,4.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4324: nililyire khagāś citte tadā tā vṛttayo yathā //MU_3,4.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4325: bhānor bhāsā bhūṣitair meghaleśaiḥ kiñcit kiñcit kuṅkumacchāyayeva /
GSP27moksop_u:4326: pāścātyo 'driḥ pītavāsās tamo'bdhes tārāhāraśrīyutaḥ khaṃ sametaḥ //MU_3,4.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4337: ṛṣayo bhūmipālāś ca munayo brāhmaṇās tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:4340: āyayau mihikākārā tatra teṣām uṣā śanaiḥ //MU_3,4.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4349: atha prasaṅgam āsādya rāmo madhurayā girā /
GSP27moksop_u:4352: bhagavan manaso rūpaṃ kīdṛśaṃ vada me sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:4355: rāmāsya manaso rūpaṃ na kiñcid api dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4357: na bāhye nāpi hṛdaye sadrūpaṃ vidyate manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4358: sarvatraiva sthitaṃ caitad viddhi rāma yathā nabhaḥ //MU_3,4.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4361: sādho yad etad arthasya pratibhānaṃ prathāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:4362: sato vāpy asato vāpi tan mano viddhi netarat //MU_3,4.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4363: yad arthapratibhānaṃ tan mana ity abhidhīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4364: anyan na kiñcid apy asti mano nāma kadācana //MU_3,4.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4365: saṅkalpanaṃ mano viddhi saṅkalpāt tan na bhidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4366: yathā dravatvāt salilaṃ tathā spando yathānilāt //MU_3,4.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4367: yatra saṅkalpanaṃ tatra tan mano 'ṅga tathā sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:4369: satyam astv atha vāsatyaṃ yad arthapratibhāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:4370: tāvanmātraṃ mano viddhi tad brahmaiṣa pitāmahaḥ //MU_3,4.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4373: avidyā saṃsṛtiś cittaṃ mano bandho malaṃ tamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4375: na hi dṛśyād ṛte kiñcin manaso rūpam asti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:4376: dṛśyaṃ cotpannam evaitan neti vakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ //MU_3,4.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4380: yathā dravatvaṃ payaso dṛśyatvaṃ draṣṭur īdṛśam //MU_3,4.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4381: aṅgadatvaṃ yathā hemni mṛganadyāṃ yathā jalam /
GSP27moksop_u:4382: bhittir yathā svapnapure tathā draṣṭari dṛśyadhīḥ //MU_3,4.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4383: evaṃ draṣṭari dṛśyatvam ananyad iva yat sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:4384: tad apy unmārjayāmy āśu tvaccittādarśato malam //MU_3,4.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4385: yad draṣṭur asyādraṣṭṛtvaṃ dṛśyābhāve bhaved balāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4386: tad viddhi kevalībhāvam ata evāsatas sataḥ //MU_3,4.52//
GSP27moksop_u:4391: trijagat tvam ahaṃ ceti dṛśye 'sattām upāgate /
GSP27moksop_u:4395: ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad ityādau praśānte dṛśyasambhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:4396: syāt tādṛśī kevalatā sthite draṣṭary avīkṣake //MU_3,4.57//
GSP27moksop_u:4398: sac cen na śāmyatīdaṃ vā nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4399: asattāṃ ca na vidmo 'smin dṛśye doṣapradāyini //MU_3,4.58//
GSP27moksop_u:4400: tasmāt katham iyaṃ śāmyed brahman dṛśyaviṣūcikā /
GSP27moksop_u:4403: asya dṛśyapiśācasya śāntyai mantram imaṃ śṛṇu /
GSP27moksop_u:4404: rāmātyantam ayaṃ yena mṛtim eṣyati naṅkṣyati //MU_3,4.60//
GSP27moksop_u:4405: yad asti tasya nāśo 'sti na kadācana rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:4406: tasmāt tan naṣṭam apy antar bījabhūtaṃ bhaved dhṛdi //MU_3,4.61//
GSP27moksop_u:4409: itthaṃ nirmokṣadoṣas syān na ca tasyāṃśasambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4411: yadi syāj jagadādīdaṃ tat syān mokṣo na kasyacit /
GSP27moksop_u:4412: bāhyastham astu hṛtsthaṃ vā dṛśyaṃ nāśāya kevalam //MU_3,4.64//
GSP27moksop_u:4413: tasmād imāṃ pratijñāṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu rāmātibhīṣaṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:4414: yām uttareṇa granthena nūnaṃ tvam avabudhyase //MU_3,4.65//
GSP27moksop_u:4416: jagacchabdasya nāmārtho nanu nāsty eva kaścana //MU_3,4.66//
GSP27moksop_u:4417: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcid dṛśyajālaṃ purogatam /
GSP27moksop_u:4418: ekaṃ brahmaiva tat sarvam ajarāmaram avyayam //MU_3,4.67//
GSP27moksop_u:4419: pūrṇe pūrṇaṃ prasarati śānte śāntaṃ paraṃ sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:4420: vyomany evoditaṃ vyoma brahma brahmaṇi tiṣṭhati //MU_3,4.68//
GSP27moksop_u:4421: na dṛśyam asti no dṛk ca na draṣṭā na ca darśanam /
GSP27moksop_u:4422: na śūnyaṃ no jaḍaṃ no cic chāntam evedam ātatam //MU_3,4.69//
GSP27moksop_u:4429: nāstīti kim idaṃ nāma bhavatāpi mamocyate //MU_3,4.72//
GSP27moksop_u:4430: yathedaṃ na sthitaṃ viśvaṃ notpannaṃ na ca vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4431: tathā kathaya me brahman yenaitan niścitaṃ bhavet //MU_3,4.73//
GSP27moksop_u:4435: idam ādāv anutpannaṃ sargādau tena nāsty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:4436: idaṃ hi manasā bhāti svapnādau pattanaṃ yathā //MU_3,4.75//
GSP27moksop_u:4437: mana eva ca sargādāv anutpannam asadvapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4441: tat svayaṃ svairam evāśu saṅkalpayati dehakam /
GSP27moksop_u:4443: sphurati gacchati valgati yācate bhavati majjati saṃharati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:4444: amaratām upayāty api kevalaṃ calati cañcalaśaktitayā manaḥ //MU_3,4.79//
GSP27moksop_u:4448: bhagavan muniśārdūla kim iveha mano bhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:4449: vidyate katham utpannaṃ mano māyāmayaṃ kutaḥ //MU_3,5.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4450: utpattim ādāv iti me samāsena vada prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:4451: pravakṣyasi tataś śiṣṭaṃ vaktavyaṃ vadatāṃ vara //MU_3,5.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4457: yato vāco nivartante yo muktair avagamyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4458: yasya cātmādikās sañjñāḥ kalpitā na svabhāvajāḥ //MU_3,5.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4462: vaktā smartā ṛtaṃ bhoktā draṣṭā kartā sadaiva yaḥ //MU_3,5.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4463: sad apy asad yo jagati yo dehastho 'pi dūragaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4464: citprakāśo hy ayaṃ yasmād āloka iva bhāsvataḥ //MU_3,5.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4465: yasmād viṣṇvādayo devās sūryād iva marīcayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4466: yasmāj jaganty anantāni budbudā jaladher iva //MU_3,5.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4468: ya ātmānaṃ padārthaṃ ca prakāśayati dīpavat //MU_3,5.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4469: ākāśe yaś śarīre ca dṛṣatsv apsu latāsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4470: pāṃsuṣv adriṣu vāteṣu pātāleṣu ca saṃsthitaḥ //MU_3,5.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4471: yaḥ plāvayati saṃrabdhaṃ puryaṣṭakam itas tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4472: yena mūkīkṛtā mūḍhāś śilā dhyānam ivāsthitāḥ //MU_3,5.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4473: vyoma yena kṛtaṃ śūnyaṃ śailā yena ghanīkṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4474: āpo drutāḥ kṛtā yena dīpto yasya vaśād raviḥ //MU_3,5.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4478: sphuranty avirataṃ yasmin ghṛṇāv iva marīcayaḥ //MU_3,5.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4488: asaj jātam asad yena yena sat sattvam āgatam //MU_3,5.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4491: niyatir deśakālau ca calanaṃ spandanaṃ kriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4495: kurvann apīva jagatāṃ mahatām anantaspandaṃ na kiñcana karoti kadācanāpi /
GSP27moksop_u:4496: svātmany anastamayasaṃvidi nirvikāre tyaktodayasthitimatis sthita eka eva //MU_3,5.24//
GSP27moksop_u:4501: jñānād eva parā siddhir na tv anuṣṭhānakhedadā //MU_3,6.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4502: atra jñānam anuṣṭhānaṃ na tv anyad upayujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4504: na caiṣa dūre nākāśe nālabhyo viṣamo na ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4510: ayaṃ sa deva ity eva samparijñānamātrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4511: jantor na jāyate duḥkhaṃ jīvanmuktatvam eti ca //MU_3,6.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4514: punar doṣā na bādhante maraṇādyāḥ kadācana //MU_3,6.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4515: devadevo mahān eṣa kuto dūrād avāpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4519: sa devo jñāyate rāma na tapassnānakarmabhiḥ //MU_3,6.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4521: vinā rāma tapodānaṃ kleśa eva na vāstavam //MU_3,6.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4523: yad arjyate tato dānād yasyārthas tasya tatphalam //MU_3,6.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4524: rāgādyupahate citte vratādi kriyate ca yat /
GSP27moksop_u:4525: sa dambhaḥ procyate tasya phalam asti manāṅ na vā //MU_3,6.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4530: śṛṇu tat pauruṣaṃ kīdṛg ātmajñānasya labdhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:4540: bhṛśaṃ yaṃ sujanaprāyaṃ lokās sādhuṃ pracakṣate /
GSP27moksop_u:4541: sa viśiṣṭas sa sādhus syāt taṃ prayatnena saṃśrayet //MU_3,6.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4543: śāstraṃ sacchāstram ity āhur mucyate tadvicāravān //MU_3,6.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4544: sacchāstrasatsaṅgamajair vivekais tathā vinaśyanti balān malāni /
GSP27moksop_u:4545: yathā jalānāṃ katakānuṣaṅgād yathā jaḍānām abhayopayogāt //MU_3,6.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4549: ya eṣa devaḥ kathito yasmiñ jñāte vimucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4550: vada kvāsau sthito devaḥ katham enam ahaṃ labhe //MU_3,7.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4552: ya eṣa devaḥ kathito naiṣa dūre 'vatiṣṭhate /
GSP27moksop_u:4553: śarīre saṃsthito nityaṃ cinmātram iti viśrutaḥ //MU_3,7.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4554: eṣa sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ na viśvaṃ tv eṣa sarvagaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4555: vidyate hy eṣa evaiko na tu viśvābhidhāsti dṛk //MU_3,7.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4559: bālā api vadanty etad yadi cetanamātrakam /
GSP27moksop_u:4560: jagad ity eva kaivātra nāma syād upadeśatā //MU_3,7.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4562: cinmātraṃ cetanaṃ viśvam iti yaj jñātavān asi /
GSP27moksop_u:4563: na kiñcid etad vijñātaṃ bhavatā bhavatāraṇam //MU_3,7.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4564: cetanaṃ nāma saṃsāro jīva eṣa paśus smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4566: paśur ajño hy amūrto 'pi duḥkhasyaivaiṣa bhājanam /
GSP27moksop_u:4569: asya sā bharitāvasthā tāṃ jñātvā nānuśocati //MU_3,7.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4571: ksīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāpare //MU_3,7.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4573: roddhuṃ na śakyaṃ dṛśyaṃ tu cetyaṃ śāmyatu vai katham //MU_3,7.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4576: dṛśyate paramātmā yas sa brahman vada kīdṛśaḥ //MU_3,7.12//
GSP27moksop_u:4578: yad etac cetanaṃ jīvo viśīrṇo janmajaṅgale /
GSP27moksop_u:4579: etam ātmānam icchanti ye te 'jñāḥ paṇḍitā api //MU_3,7.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4581: asmiñ jñāte nāvijñātaṃ kiñcid bhavati kutracit //MU_3,7.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4582: jñāyate paramātmā ced rāma tad duḥkhasantatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4585: rūpaṃ kathaya me brahman yathāvat paramātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4586: yasmin dṛṣṭe naro mohāt samagrāt santariṣyati //MU_3,7.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4588: deśād deśāntaraṃ dūraṃ prāptāyās saṃvido vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4589: nimeṣeṇaiva yan madhye tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4592: draṣṭṛdṛśyakramo yatra sthito 'py astam alaṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4593: yad anākāśam ākāśas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4594: aśūnyam iva yac chūnyaṃ yasmiñ śūnyaṃ jagat sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:4595: sargaughe sati yac chūnyaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4597: jaḍaṃ tv ajaḍam evāntas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4601: tathedaṃ saṃsthitaṃ yatra tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.23//
GSP27moksop_u:4608: taj jñātaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ bhaven nānyena karmaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:4609: dṛśyātyantābhāvatas tu ṛte nānyā śubhā gatiḥ //MU_3,7.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4612: na cid apratibimbāsti dṛśyābhāvād ṛte kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:4615: budhyate paramaṃ tattvaṃ na kadācana kenacit //MU_3,7.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4618: mune katham asattāsti kva merus sarṣapodare //MU_3,7.30//
GSP27moksop_u:4620: dināni katicid rāma yadi tiṣṭhasy akhinnadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4622: pramārjayāmi te dṛśyaṃ bodhe mṛgajalaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:4624: draṣṭṛtvaṃ sati dṛśye 'smin dṛśyatvaṃ saty avekṣake /
GSP27moksop_u:4625: ekatvaṃ sati hi dvitve dvitvaṃ caikatvavedane //MU_3,7.33//
GSP27moksop_u:4626: ekābhāve dvayor eva siddhir bhavati nātra hi /
GSP27moksop_u:4628: ahantādi jagaddṛśyaṃ sarvaṃ te mārjayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:4630: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4631: yat tu nāsti svabhāvena kaḥ kleśas tatpramārjane //MU_3,7.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4632: jagad ādāv anutpannaṃ yac cedaṃ dṛśyate tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:4633: tat svātmany eva vimale brahma cittvāt svabṛṃhitam //MU_3,7.37//
GSP27moksop_u:4634: jagan nāma na cotpannaṃ na cāsti na ca dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4638: ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ yat tasyehāstitā kutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4639: kuto marau jalasarid dvitīyendau kuto grahaḥ //MU_3,7.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4640: yathā vandhyāsuto nāsti yathā nāsti marau jalam /
GSP27moksop_u:4641: yathā nāsti nabhovṛkṣas tathā nāsti jagadbhramaḥ //MU_3,7.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4642: yad idaṃ dṛśyate rāma tad brahmaiva nirāmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:4643: etat purastād vakṣyāmo yuktito na giraiva vaḥ //MU_3,7.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4644: yan nāma yuktibhir iha pravadanti tajjñās tatrāvahelanam ayuktam udārabuddheḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4645: yo yuktiyuktam avamatya vimūḍhabuddhyā kaṣṭāvaho bhavati taṃ vidur ajñam eva //MU_3,7.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4649: kayaitaj jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4653: jagannāmnī vicārākhyād ṛte mantrān na śāmyati //MU_3,8.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4654: vadāmy ākhyāyikā rāma yā imā bodhasiddhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:4655: tāś cec chṛṇoṣi tat sādho mukta evāsi buddhimān //MU_3,8.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4656: no ced udvegaśīlatvād ardhād utthāya gacchasi /
GSP27moksop_u:4657: tat tiryagdharmiṇas te 'dya kiñcin nāpi tu setsyati //MU_3,8.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4658: yo 'yam arthaṃ prārthayate tadarthaṃ yatate tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:4659: so 'vaśyaṃ tad avāpnoti na cec chrānto nivartate //MU_3,8.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4661: tad dinair eva no māsaiḥ prāpnoṣi paramaṃ padam //MU_3,8.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4664: kiṃnāma tat pradhānaṃ syād yasmiñ jñāte na śocyate //MU_3,8.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4672: sthitam evāstam āyāti jagad dṛśyaṃ vicāraṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4673: yathā svapne parijñāte svapnārthād eva bhāvanā //MU_3,8.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4674: yad ihāsti tad anyatra yan nehāsti na tat kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:4677: bālasyāpi paraṃ bodhaṃ buddhir eti na saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,8.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4678: yasmai nedaṃ tv abhavyāya rocate duṣkṛtodayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4679: vicārayatu yat kiñcit sa śāstraṃ jñānavāṅmayam //MU_3,8.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4681: svayam eva yathā pīte nīrogatvaṃ varauṣadhe //MU_3,8.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4682: śrūyamāṇe hi śāstre 'smiñ śrotā vetty etad ātmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:4683: yathāvad idam asmābhir na tūktaṃ varaśāpavat //MU_3,8.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4690: kathayantaś ca tan nityaṃ tuṣyanti ramayanti ye //MU_3,9.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4695: brūhi yena tathaivāhaṃ yate śāstradṛśā dhiyā //MU_3,9.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4698: astaṅgataṃ sthitaṃ vyoma sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4700: ya āste vyavahartaiva sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4701: nodeti nāstam āyāti sukhe duḥkhe mukhaprabhā /
GSP27moksop_u:4703: yo jāgarti suṣuptastho yasya jāgran na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4704: yasya nirvāsano bodhas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4706: yo 'ntar vyomavad atyacchas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4707: yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4710: paśyet trilokyāḥ khasamas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4711: bhoktaiva yo na bhoktaiva śuddhabodhaikatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4712: buddhas supta ivāste 'ntas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4713: nityaṃ draṣṭaiva cādraṣṭā jīvann eva mṛtopamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4715: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4718: yas sacitto 'pi niścittas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.14//
GSP27moksop_u:4720: parārtheṣv iva pūrṇātmā sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_3,9.15//
GSP27moksop_u:4723: videhamukto nodeti nāstam eti na śāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4724: na san nāsan na dūrasthaṃ na cāhaṃ na ca vetarat //MU_3,9.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4725: sūryo bhūtvā pratapati viṣṇuḥ pāti jagattrayam /
GSP27moksop_u:4726: rudras sarvān saṃharati sarvān sṛjati padmabhūḥ //MU_3,9.18//
GSP27moksop_u:4733: tejaḥ prakaṭayaty āśās tanoty āndhyaṃ tamo bhavan /
GSP27moksop_u:4734: śūnyaṃ san vyomatām eti giris san rodhayaty alam //MU_3,9.22//
GSP27moksop_u:4739: yat kiñcid idam ābhāti bhātaṃ vā bhām upaiṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4740: kālatrayagataṃ dṛśyaṃ tad asau sarvam eva vā //MU_3,9.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4742: katham evaṃ vada brahman bhūyate viṣamā hi me /
GSP27moksop_u:4743: dṛṣṭir eṣā tu duṣprāpā durākramyeti niścayaḥ //MU_3,9.26//
GSP27moksop_u:4746: nirvāṇam etat kathitaṃ śṛṇu samprāpyate katham //MU_3,9.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4751: manye te sargatām eva gatā vedyavidāṃ vara //MU_3,9.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4753: vidyate cet tribhuvanaṃ tat tattāṃ samprayāntu te /
GSP27moksop_u:4755: tatra trilokatāṃ yātaṃ brahmety uktyarthadhīḥ kutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4758: brahmaiva jagad ity eva satyaṃ satyāvabodhinaḥ //MU_3,9.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4759: yathā hi hemakaṭake vicāryāpi na dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4761: jalād ṛte payovīcau nāhaṃ paśyāmi kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:4762: vīcitvaṃ tvādṛśair dṛṣṭaṃ yat tu nāsty eva tatra hi //MU_3,9.34//
GSP27moksop_u:4763: spandatvaṃ pavanād anyan na kadācana kutracit /
GSP27moksop_u:4764: spanda eva sadā vāyur jagat tasmān na vidyate //MU_3,9.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4765: yathā śūnyatvam ākāśas tāpa eva marau jalam /
GSP27moksop_u:4766: teja eva yathāloko brahmaiva trijagat tathā //MU_3,9.36//
GSP27moksop_u:4775: brahma cetthaṃ svabhāvasthaṃ budhyate vada me tathā //MU_3,9.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4776: kayaitaj jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4777: etasmiṃs tu mune siddhe na sādhyam avaśiṣyate //MU_3,9.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4781: na śakyate jhagity eva samucchedayituṃ kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4784: jagadbhrāntir yathā śāmyet tathedaṃ kathyate śṛṇu //MU_3,9.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4785: vadāmy ākhyāyikāṃ rāma yām imāṃ bodhasiddhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:4786: tāṃ cec chṛṇoṣi tat sādho mukta evāsi buddhimān //MU_3,9.44//
GSP27moksop_u:4788: yaḥ kilotpadyate rāma tena muktena bhūyate //MU_3,9.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4789: iyam itthaṃ jagadbhrāntir bhāty ajātaiva khātmikā /
GSP27moksop_u:4791: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:4794: bhavaty asad adṛśyaṃ ca kvāpi yāti vinaśyati //MU_3,9.48//
GSP27moksop_u:4795: tatas stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:4797: na śūnyaṃ nāpi cākāśaṃ na dṛśyaṃ na ca darśanam /
GSP27moksop_u:4798: na ca bhūtapadārthaugho yad anantatayā sthitam //MU_3,9.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4800: na san nāsan na sadasan nābhāvo bhavanaṃ na ca //MU_3,9.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4804: yaś cedaṃ yaś ca naivedaṃ devas sadasadātmakaḥ //MU_3,9.53//
GSP27moksop_u:4806: yaś śṛṇoty āsvādayati jighran spṛśati paśyati //MU_3,9.54//
GSP27moksop_u:4811: yasyānyad asti na vibhoḥ kāraṇaṃ śaśaśṛṅgavat /
GSP27moksop_u:4812: yasyedaṃ ca jagat kāryaṃ taraṅgaugha ivāmbhasaḥ //MU_3,9.57//
GSP27moksop_u:4818: iyaṃ yasmiñ jagallakṣmīr alāta iva cakratā //MU_3,9.60//
GSP27moksop_u:4822: sattā nāmnaiva bhinneva vyavahārān na vastutaḥ //MU_3,9.62//
GSP27moksop_u:4823: sarvadaiva prabuddho yas supto yas sarvadaiva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4824: na supto na prabuddhaś ca yas sarvatraiva sarvadā //MU_3,9.63//
GSP27moksop_u:4827: āmoda iva puṣpeṣu na naśyati vināśiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:4829: mūkopamo 'pi yo vaktā mantā yo 'py upalopamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4830: yo bhoktā nityatṛpto 'pi kartā yaś cāpy akiñcana //MU_3,9.66//
GSP27moksop_u:4832: nakiñcit saṃsthitenāpi yena vyāptam idaṃ jagat //MU_3,9.67//
GSP27moksop_u:4837: sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpa iva kriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4843: yas tvam ekāvabhāsātmā yo 'ham ete janāś ca ye /
GSP27moksop_u:4844: yaś ca na tvam abuddhātman nāhaṃ naite janāś ca ye //MU_3,9.73//
GSP27moksop_u:4847: yataḥ kālasya kalanā yato dṛśyasya dṛśyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:4848: mānasī kalanā yena yena bhāsāṃ vibhāsanam //MU_3,9.75//
GSP27moksop_u:4849: kriyāṃ rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ ca cetanam /
GSP27moksop_u:4850: yad vetsi tad asau devo yena vetsi tad apy asau //MU_3,9.76//
GSP27moksop_u:4853: ajam ajaram ajāḍyaṃ śāśvataṃ brahma nityaṃ śivam amalam anādyaṃ vandhyavedyair anindyam /
GSP27moksop_u:4854: sakalakalanaśūnyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānām anubhavanam avedyaṃ vedanaṃ vittvam antaḥ //MU_3,9.78//
GSP27moksop_u:4859: bhavatv etad anākāraṃ nāma nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,10.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4860: na śūnyaṃ katham etat syān na prakāśaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:4861: kathaṃ vā na tamorūpaṃ kathaṃ vā naiva khātmakam //MU_3,10.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4862: kathaṃ vā naiva cidrūpaṃ jīvo vā na kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:4863: kathaṃ na buddhitattvaṃ syāt kathaṃ vā na mano bhavet //MU_3,10.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4864: kathaṃ vā na nakiñcit syāt kathaṃ vā sarvam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:4865: anayā ca vacobhaṅgyā mama moha ivoditaḥ //MU_3,10.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4868: bhinadmy enaṃ tv ayatnena naiśaṃ tama ivāṃśumān //MU_3,10.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4870: tan nāma na yathā śūnyaṃ tad idaṃ kathyate śṛṇu //MU_3,10.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4872: tathā viśvaṃ sthitaṃ tatra tena śūnyaṃ na tat padam //MU_3,10.7//
GSP27moksop_u:4874: satyo bhavatv asatyo vā yatra tatra kva śūnyatā //MU_3,10.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4876: tathā tāta jagad brahma tena śūnyaṃ na tat padam //MU_3,10.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4877: saumyāmbhasi yathā vīcir na cāsti na ca nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4880: sambhavaty ajadhātau tu kena nāntar vimuhyate //MU_3,10.11//
GSP27moksop_u:4883: na kadācid udetīdaṃ parasmān na ca śāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:4884: itthaṃrūpaṃ kevalaṃ sad brahma svātmani saṃsthitam //MU_3,10.13//
GSP27moksop_u:4887: brahmaṇy ayaṃ prakāśo hi na sambhavati bhūtajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4890: mahābhūtābhāvajaṃ tu tenātra na tamaḥ kvacit //MU_3,10.16//
GSP27moksop_u:4892: yo 'ntar asti sa tenaiva na tv anyenānubhūyate //MU_3,10.17//
GSP27moksop_u:4893: muktaṃ tamaḥprakāśābhyām ity etad ajaraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:4895: bilvasya bilvasañjñasya yathā bhedo na kaścana /
GSP27moksop_u:4896: tatheha brahmajagator na manāg api bhinnatā //MU_3,10.19//
GSP27moksop_u:4897: salile 'ntar yathā vīcir mṛdo 'ntar ghaṭako yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:4898: tathā yatra jagatsattā tat kathaṃ khātmakaṃ bhavet //MU_3,10.20//
GSP27moksop_u:4900: brahma tv ākāśaviśadaṃ tasyāntassthaṃ tathaiva tat //MU_3,10.21//
GSP27moksop_u:4901: tasmād yādṛk cidākāśam ākāśād api nirmalam /
GSP27moksop_u:4903: marice 'ntar yathā taikṣṇyam ṛte bhoktur na lakṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4908: yathāsthitam ato viśvaṃ suṣuptaṃ turyam eva vā //MU_3,10.25//
GSP27moksop_u:4909: tena yogī suṣuptātmā vyavahāry api śāntadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4911: ākāriṇi yathā saumye sthitas toye dravakramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4912: anākṛtau tathā viśvaṃ sthitaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ pare //MU_3,10.27//
GSP27moksop_u:4915: pūrṇāt pūrṇaṃ prasarati saṃsthitaṃ pūrṇam eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:4916: ato viśvam anutpannaṃ yac cotpannaṃ tad eva tat //MU_3,10.29//
GSP27moksop_u:4921: paramāṇor api paraṃ tad aṇīyo 'py aṇīyasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4922: śuddhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ tad ākāśodarād api //MU_3,10.32//
GSP27moksop_u:4925: cidrūpam eva no yatra labhyate tatra jīvatā /
GSP27moksop_u:4927: cidrūpānudayād eva tatra nāsty eva jīvatā /
GSP27moksop_u:4928: na buddhitā na cittatvaṃ nendriyatvaṃ na vāsanāḥ //MU_3,10.35//
GSP27moksop_u:4929: evaṃ sthitaṃ layārambhapūrṇam apy ajaraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:4936: śiṣyate yat paraṃ brahma tad idaṃ varṇyate śṛṇu //MU_3,10.38//
GSP27moksop_u:4938: yad rūpaṃ yad anākhyeyaṃ tad rūpaṃ tasya vastunaḥ //MU_3,10.39//
GSP27moksop_u:4939: nāsti dṛśyaṃ jagad draṣṭā dṛśyābhāvād vilīnavat /
GSP27moksop_u:4940: bhātīti bhāsanaṃ yat syāt tad rūpaṃ tasya vastunaḥ //MU_3,10.40//
GSP27moksop_u:4941: citer jīvasvabhāvo yo yadi cetyonmukho vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:4942: cinmātraṃ vimalaṃ śāntaṃ yat tat kāraṇakāraṇam //MU_3,10.41//
GSP27moksop_u:4944: jīvataś cetaso rūpaṃ yat tad paramam ātmanaḥ //MU_3,10.42//
GSP27moksop_u:4946: yad rūpaṃ ciracintāyās tat tadānagha śiṣyate //MU_3,10.43//
GSP27moksop_u:4947: yad vyomno hṛdayaṃ yad vā śilāyāḥ pavanasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:4950: syāt sthitis sā parā śāntā sattā tasyādyavastunaḥ //MU_3,10.45//
GSP27moksop_u:4951: citprakāśasya yan madhyaṃ prakāśasya ghanasya vā /
GSP27moksop_u:4952: darśanasya ca yan madhyaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,10.46//
GSP27moksop_u:4954: vedanaṃ yad anādyantaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,10.47//
GSP27moksop_u:4958: avyomna eva vyomatvaṃ tad rūpaṃ pāramātmikam //MU_3,10.49//
GSP27moksop_u:4960: yatrodety astam āyāti tat tat paramam uttamam //MU_3,10.50//
GSP27moksop_u:4962: abuddhyādau mahādarśe tad rūpaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam //MU_3,10.51//
GSP27moksop_u:4965: sthāvarāṇāṃ hi yad rūpaṃ tac ced bodhamayaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:4967: brahmārkaviṣṇuharaśakrasadāśivādiśāntau śivaṃ paramam etad ihaikam āste /
GSP27moksop_u:4968: śiṣṭaṃ pradiṣṭam avinaṣṭam akaṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ na miśram aṇunāśritam āśritena //MU_3,10.54//
GSP27moksop_u:4972: itthaṃrūpam idaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagan nāmāsti bhāsuram /
GSP27moksop_u:4973: mahāpralayasampattau bho brahman kva nu gacchati //MU_3,11.1//
GSP27moksop_u:4975: kuta āyāti kīdṛg vā vandhyāputraḥ kva gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:4976: kva yāti kuta āyāti vada vā vyomakānanam //MU_3,11.2//
GSP27moksop_u:4979: kīdṛśī dṛśyatā tasya kīdṛśī tasya nāstitā //MU_3,11.3//
GSP27moksop_u:4982: jagadādy akhilaṃ dṛśyaṃ tathā nāsti kadācana //MU_3,11.4//
GSP27moksop_u:4983: na cotpannaṃ na ca dhvaṃsi yat kilādau na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4984: utpattiḥ kīdṛśī tasya nāśaśabdasya kā kathā //MU_3,11.5//
GSP27moksop_u:4987: sā yathā nāśajanmādyā tathaivedaṃ na kiṃ bhavet //MU_3,11.6//
GSP27moksop_u:4992: kaṭakatvaṃ tu nāsty eva jagattvaṃ tu tathā pare //MU_3,11.8//
GSP27moksop_u:4993: ākāśe ca yathā nāsti śūnyatvaṃ vyatirekavat /
GSP27moksop_u:4994: jagattvaṃ brahmaṇi tathā nāsty evāpy upalabdhimat //MU_3,11.9//
GSP27moksop_u:4995: kajjalān na yathā kārṣṇyaṃ śaityaṃ ca na yathā himāt /
GSP27moksop_u:4996: pṛthag eva bhaved buddhaṃ jagan nāsti pare pade //MU_3,11.10//
GSP27moksop_u:4997: yathā ca śaityaṃ śaśino na himād vyatiricyate /
GSP27moksop_u:4998: brahmaṇo na tathā sargo vidyate vyatirekavān //MU_3,11.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5000: nāsty evaivaṃ jagan nāsti dṛṣṭam apy amalātmani //MU_3,11.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5003: cidākāśe cidākāśaś cittvād yaḥ kacati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:5004: tad eva tena rūpaṃ svaṃ jagad ity avabudhyate //MU_3,11.14//
GSP27moksop_u:5005: ādāv eva hi yan nāsti kāraṇāsambhavāt svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:5006: vartamāne 'pi tan nāsti nāśas syāt tatra kīdṛśaḥ //MU_3,11.15//
GSP27moksop_u:5008: kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ śaktaṃ chāyāyā ātapo yathā //MU_3,11.16//
GSP27moksop_u:5010: yat tatkāraṇam evāsti tad evettham avasthitam //MU_3,11.17//
GSP27moksop_u:5011: ajātam eva yad bhāti saṃvido bhānam eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:5012: yaj jagad dṛśyate svapne saṃvitkacanam eva tat //MU_3,11.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5015: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcit tat sad evātmani sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5016: nāstam eti na codeti jagat kiñcit kadācana //MU_3,11.20//
GSP27moksop_u:5017: yathā dravatvaṃ salilaṃ spandatvaṃ pavano yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:5018: yathā prakāśa ābhāso brahmaiva trijagat tathā //MU_3,11.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5019: yathā puram ivāste 'ntar vid eva svapnasaṃvidi /
GSP27moksop_u:5022: evaṃ cet tat kathaṃ brahman sughanapratyayaṃ vada /
GSP27moksop_u:5025: sati dṛśye kila draṣṭā sati draṣṭari dṛśyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:5026: ekasattve dvayor bandho muktir ekakṣaye dvayoḥ //MU_3,11.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5028: tāvad draṣṭur adraṣṭṛtvaṃ na sambhavati mokṣadam //MU_3,11.25//
GSP27moksop_u:5029: dṛśyaṃ cet sambhavaty ādau paścāt kṣayam upāgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:5032: pratibimbo lagaty eva sargasmṛtimayo hy ayam //MU_3,11.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5033: ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva cet svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:5039: asad eva yathā bhāti jagatsargātmakaṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:5040: śṛṇv ahaṃ kathayā rāma dīrghayā kathayāmi te //MU_3,11.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5042: na viśrāmyati te tāvad dhṛdi pāṃsur yathā hrade //MU_3,11.31//
GSP27moksop_u:5046: dṛśas tvā vedhayiṣyanti na mahādrim iveṣavaḥ //MU_3,11.33//
GSP27moksop_u:5047: sa eṣo 'sty eka evātmā na dvitīyāsti kalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:5048: jagad atra yathotpannaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi rāghava //MU_3,11.34//
GSP27moksop_u:5049: tasmād imāni sakalāni vijṛmbhitāni yo hīdam aṅga sakale sakalaṃ mahātmā /
GSP27moksop_u:5050: rūpāvalokanamanomananaprakāśakośāspadaṃ svayam udeti ca līyate ca //MU_3,11.35//
GSP27moksop_u:5055: yathedam utthitaṃ viśvaṃ tac chṛṇūttamayā dhiyā //MU_3,12.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5056: suṣuptaṃ svapnavad bhāti bhāti brahmaiva sargavat /
GSP27moksop_u:5057: sarvam ekaṃ ca tac chāntaṃ tatra tāvat kramaṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,12.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5060: tad ātmani svayaṃ kiñcic cetyatām iva gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:5063: ākāśād aṇu śuddhaṃ ca sarvasmin bhāvibodhanam //MU_3,12.5//
GSP27moksop_u:5064: tatas sā paramā sattā satītaś cetanonmukhī /
GSP27moksop_u:5067: sā bhavaty ātmakalanā yadā yāntī parāt padāt //MU_3,12.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5069: tadā vastusvabhāvena tanvas tiṣṭhanti tām imāḥ //MU_3,12.8//
GSP27moksop_u:5075: etaj jālam asadrūpaṃ sad ivodeti visphurat //MU_3,12.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5079: svato ghanībhūya śanaiḥ khatanmātraṃ bhavaty alam //MU_3,12.13//
GSP27moksop_u:5089: yā saiva sparśatanmātraṃ bhāvanād bhavati kṣaṇāt //MU_3,12.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5096: bhavac caturṇām avatas tatas sata ivāsataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5107: na śuddhāny upalabhyante sarvanāśāntam eva hi //MU_3,12.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5112: vivartam eva dhāvanti nirvivartāni santi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5116: bījaṃ jagatsu nanu pañcakamātram asya bījaṃ parā vyavahitā citiśaktir ādyā /
GSP27moksop_u:5117: tajjaṃ tad eva bhavatīti sadānubhūtaṃ cinmātram ekam ajam ādyam ato jagacchrīḥ //MU_3,12.32//
GSP27moksop_u:5131: jhagity eva krameṇeti svapne puram ivākṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:5138: jagataḥ pañcakaṃ bījaṃ pañcakasya cid avyayā //MU_3,13.9//
GSP27moksop_u:5139: yad bījaṃ tat phalaṃ viddhi tasmād brahmamayaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:5140: evam eṣa mahākāśe sargādau pañcako gaṇaḥ //MU_3,13.10//
GSP27moksop_u:5143: tad apy ākāśarūpātma kalanātma na sanmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:5144: na kvacin nāma tat siddhaṃ yad asiddhena sādhyate //MU_3,13.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5145: kharūpaṃ yad vikalpātma kathaṃ tat satyatām iyāt /
GSP27moksop_u:5146: atha cet pañcakaṃ brahma brahmātmakatayā tayā //MU_3,13.13//
GSP27moksop_u:5150: evaṃ na jāyate kiñcij jagaj jātaṃ ca lakṣyate //MU_3,13.15//
GSP27moksop_u:5154: ity eṣa jīvaḥ kathito vyomni khātmā yathoditaḥ //MU_3,13.17//
GSP27moksop_u:5155: jīvākāśas tv imaṃ dehaṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu /
GSP27moksop_u:5156: jīvākāśaḥ kham evāsau tasmiṃs tu paramāmbare //MU_3,13.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5158: tam evocchūnam iva sad bhāvayaty ātmanāmbare //MU_3,13.19//
GSP27moksop_u:5159: asad eva sadākāraṃ saṅkalpendur yathā śaśam /
GSP27moksop_u:5161: eka eva dvitām eti svapne svamṛtiboddhṛvat //MU_3,13.20//
GSP27moksop_u:5162: kiñcit sthaulyam ivādatte tatas tārakatāṃ vidan /
GSP27moksop_u:5164: kha eva khātmā satato 'py ayaṃ so 'ham iti svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:5165: cittvāt pratyayam ādatte svapne tvam iva pānthatām //MU_3,13.22//
GSP27moksop_u:5167: bhāvayan yāti tadbhāvaṃ cittaṃ cetyārthatām iva //MU_3,13.23//
GSP27moksop_u:5169: antar bhāti bahisstho 'pi parvato makure yathā //MU_3,13.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5170: kūpasaṃsthaṃ yathā dehaṃ samudgakagataṃ ca vā /
GSP27moksop_u:5175: prekṣe 'ham iti bhāvena draṣṭuṃ prasaratīva khe //MU_3,13.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5177: yena paśyati tan netrayugmaṃ nāmnā bhaviṣyati //MU_3,13.28//
GSP27moksop_u:5178: yena spṛśati sāsya tvag yac chṛṇoti śrutis tu sā /
GSP27moksop_u:5179: yena jighrati tad ghrāṇaṃ sa svam ātmani paśyati //MU_3,13.29//
GSP27moksop_u:5181: yat spandati sa tad vāyuceṣṭāḥ karmendriyavrajam //MU_3,13.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5184: evam ucchūnatāṃ tasmin bhāvayaṃs tejasaḥ kaṇe /
GSP27moksop_u:5196: ity anudbhūta evāsau svayambhūs svayam utthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5199: na kiñcid api sampannaṃ na ca jātaṃ na dṛśyate //MU_3,13.39//
GSP27moksop_u:5200: tad brahmākāśam ākāśam eva sthitam aśaṅkitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5201: saṅkalpanagarākāram etat sad api naiva sat //MU_3,13.40//
GSP27moksop_u:5202: anirmitam anaṅgaṃ ca etad khe citram utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5203: akṛtaṃ cānubhūtaṃ ca na satyaṃ satyavat sthitam //MU_3,13.41//
GSP27moksop_u:5205: smṛtir na prāktanī kācit kāraṇaṃ sā svayambhuvaḥ //MU_3,13.42//
GSP27moksop_u:5206: tena yādṛk svayambhūs syāt tādṛk tajjam idaṃ smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:5210: yatra yatra yathā toye dravatvaṃ nāma vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:5211: tatra tatra tathā nānyas sargo 'sti paramātmani //MU_3,13.45//
GSP27moksop_u:5212: sṛṣṭir evam iyaṃ prauḍhā sarga evam ayaṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5214: dṛśyam evam idaṃ śāntaṃ khātma nirbhitti nirbhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:5216: jagatsaṃvidi jātāyām api jātaṃ na kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:5218: sarvasaṃhārakhe tv āsīd yad eva tad avasthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5219: nādheyaṃ tatra nādhāro na ca dṛśyaṃ na draṣṭṛtā //MU_3,13.49//
GSP27moksop_u:5220: brahmāṇḍaṃ nāsti na brahmā na ca brahmāṇḍikā kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:5221: na jagan nāsti jagatī śāntam evākhilaṃ sthitam //MU_3,13.50//
GSP27moksop_u:5225: vinaśyaty asad evānte svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā //MU_3,13.52//
GSP27moksop_u:5228: ākāśa eva parame prathamaḥ prajeśo nityaṃ svayaṃ kacati śūnyatayā samānaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5229: sa hy ātivāhikavapur na tu bhūtarūpī pṛthvyādi tena na sad asti yadā na jātam //MU_3,13.54//
GSP27moksop_u:5234: ajātatvāc ca nāsty eva yac cāsti param eva tat //MU_3,14.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5245: ādyaḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvaṃ svayambhūr iti viśrutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5248: mucyante sarva evātaḥ prāktanaṃ karma teṣu kim //MU_3,14.8//
GSP27moksop_u:5249: moktavya eva kuḍyātmā dṛśyo 'dṛśyaś ca saṃsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5250: na ca dṛśyaṃ na ca draṣṭā na sraṣṭā sarvam eva ca //MU_3,14.9//
GSP27moksop_u:5251: praticchandaḥ padārthānāṃ sarveṣām eṣa eva saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5252: asmād udeti jīvālī dīpālī dīpakād iva //MU_3,14.10//
GSP27moksop_u:5254: kṣmādimān iva niṣkuḍyas svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ yathā //MU_3,14.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5255: asmād eva praticchandāj jīvās samprasaranty amī /
GSP27moksop_u:5256: sahakārikāraṇānām abhāvāc ca sa eva te //MU_3,14.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5258: ekam etad ato nānyaḥ parasmāt sargavibhramaḥ //MU_3,14.13//
GSP27moksop_u:5260: jīvākāśas sa evetthaṃ sthitaḥ pṛthvyādy asad yataḥ //MU_3,14.14//
GSP27moksop_u:5262: kiṃ syāt parimito jīvarāśir āho anantakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5264: dhārāḥ payomuca iva śīkarā iva vāridheḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5265: kaṇās taptāyasa iva kasmān niryānti jīvakāḥ //MU_3,14.16//
GSP27moksop_u:5267: jñātam etan mayā prāyas tad eva prakaṭīkuru //MU_3,14.17//
GSP27moksop_u:5269: eka eva na jīvo 'sti rāśīnāṃ sambhavaḥ kutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5271: na jīvo 'sti na jīvānāṃ rāśayas santi rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:5274: na ca kāścana santīti niścayo 'stu tavācalaḥ //MU_3,14.20//
GSP27moksop_u:5275: śuddhaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ brahmāstīha hi sarvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5276: tad yathā sarvaśaktitvād vindate yāṃ svayaṃ kalām //MU_3,14.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5278: nanu mūrtām amūrtāṃ vā tām evāśu prapaśyati //MU_3,14.22//
GSP27moksop_u:5279: jīvo buddhiḥ kriyāspando mano dvitvaikyam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:5281: sābuddhaivaṃ bhavaty eva bhaved brahmaiva bodhataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5282: abodhaḥ prekṣayā yāti nāśaṃ na tu sa budhyate //MU_3,14.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5284: na cāsya jñāyate tattvam abodhasyaivam eva hi //MU_3,14.25//
GSP27moksop_u:5287: sarvānantatayā tv asya na kācid bhedakalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:5288: vidyate yā hi kalanā sā tad evānubhūtitaḥ //MU_3,14.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5295: yad evecchati tat tasya bhavaty āśu mahātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5296: pūrvaṃ tu naśyatīcchā ced ato dvitvam udeti tat //MU_3,14.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5298: anenetthaṃ hi bhavatīty evaṃ tena kriyākramaḥ //MU_3,14.31//
GSP27moksop_u:5299: śaktyādyayā tayā brāhmyā niyamo yaḥ prakalpitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5301: yasyā jīvābhidhānāyāś śaktyā yecchā phalaty asau /
GSP27moksop_u:5304: tat phalaṃ śaktyaśaktitvān nehitānāṃ kvacid bhavet //MU_3,14.34//
GSP27moksop_u:5311: atrānante parākāśe ittham eṣa gaṇo 'py asan /
GSP27moksop_u:5313: svayam eva camatkāro yas samāgamyate citā /
GSP27moksop_u:5315: cito yas syāc cidālokas tanmayatvād anantakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5316: sa eṣa bhuvanābhoga iti tasyāḥ prabimbati //MU_3,14.40//
GSP27moksop_u:5320: acetyasya prakāśasya jagad ity eva tat sthitam //MU_3,14.42//
GSP27moksop_u:5321: ākāśād api sūkṣmaiṣā yā śaktir vitatā citaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5326: iyaṃ svātmani tasyaiva jagannāma tataṃ kṛtam //MU_3,14.45//
GSP27moksop_u:5327: citaś cittvam ahaṅkāras saiva rāghava kalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:5328: tanmātrādi cid evāto dvitvaikatve kva saṃsthite //MU_3,14.46//
GSP27moksop_u:5329: jīvahetāv asantyāge tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti santyaja /
GSP27moksop_u:5330: śeṣaṃ sadasator madhye bhavety arthātmako bhavet //MU_3,14.47//
GSP27moksop_u:5331: citā yathādau kalitā svasattā sā tathoditā /
GSP27moksop_u:5332: abhinnā dṛśyate vyomnas sattāsatte 'tha vedmy aham //MU_3,14.48//
GSP27moksop_u:5333: citkhaṃ khaṃ jagadīhāḥ khaṃ kham abdhivibudhācalāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5335: yo yadvilāsas tasmāt sa na kadācana bhidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:5337: citer nityam acetyāyāś cin nāsty avitatākṛteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5338: yad rūpaṃ jagato rūpaṃ tat tatsphuraṇarūpiṇaḥ //MU_3,14.51//
GSP27moksop_u:5339: mano buddhir ahaṅkāro bhūtāni girayo diśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5341: citaś cittvaṃ jagad viddhi nājagac cittvam asti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:5342: ajagattvād acic cit syād bhāvābhedāj jagat kutaḥ //MU_3,14.53//
GSP27moksop_u:5350: spandamātraṃ bhavet karma sa eva puruṣas smṛtaḥ //MU_3,14.57//
GSP27moksop_u:5351: jīvaś cittve parispandaḥ puṃsāṃ cittaṃ sa eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5352: manas tv indriyarūpaṃ san nānānānaiva gacchati //MU_3,14.58//
GSP27moksop_u:5356: nityas satatagas sthāṇur acalo 'ham iti sthitam //MU_3,14.60//
GSP27moksop_u:5357: vivadante yathā hy atra vivadantu tathā bhramaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5358: bhramanto na vayaṃ tv ete jātā vigatavibhramāḥ //MU_3,14.61//
GSP27moksop_u:5370: svayam astaṅgatevājñe jñe jñānād uditā citiḥ //MU_3,14.67//
GSP27moksop_u:5371: svayaṃ jaḍeṣu jāḍyena padaṃ sauṣuptam āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:5373: citprakāśaprakāśo hi jagad asti ca nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5374: cidākāśaikaśūnyatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca //MU_3,14.69//
GSP27moksop_u:5375: cidālokamahārūpaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5376: cinmārutaghanaspando jagad asti na cāsti ca //MU_3,14.70//
GSP27moksop_u:5377: cidghanadhvāntakṛṣṇatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5378: cidarkālokadivaso jagad asti na cāsti ca //MU_3,14.71//
GSP27moksop_u:5384: jagac citsarpiṣi sneho vīciś citsarito jagat //MU_3,14.74//
GSP27moksop_u:5388: atra bhedavikārādi na khe malam iva sthitam //MU_3,14.76//
GSP27moksop_u:5392: anubhūtyapalāpāya kalpitau yair dhig astu tān //MU_3,14.78//
GSP27moksop_u:5396: dhatte 'ntar akhilaṃ śāntaṃ sanniveśaṃ yathā śilā //MU_3,14.80//
GSP27moksop_u:5403: na cāsattvam acetyāyāś cito vācāpi sidhyati /
GSP27moksop_u:5404: yad asti tad udetīti dṛṣṭaṃ bījād ivāṅkuram //MU_3,14.84//
GSP27moksop_u:5405: gaganam iva suśūnyabhedam asti tribhuvanam aṅga mahācito 'ntar asyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5406: paramapadamayaṃ samastadṛśyaṃ tv idam iti niścayavān bhavānubhūteḥ //MU_3,14.85//
GSP27moksop_u:5408: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:5409: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_3,14.86//
GSP27moksop_u:5413: jagad ākāśam evedaṃ yathā hi vyomni mauktikam /
GSP27moksop_u:5414: vimale bhāti khātmaiva jagac cidgagane tathā //MU_3,15.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5416: citstambhe na ca sotkīrṇā na cotkartātra vidyate //MU_3,15.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5418: vidi vedyā bhavantīva pare dṛśyavidas tathā //MU_3,15.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5420: jagadbhānaṃ prati sthūlāny aṇuṃ prati yathācalāḥ //MU_3,15.4//
GSP27moksop_u:5424: pṛthvyādīni na santy eva svapnasaṅkalpayor iva //MU_3,15.6//
GSP27moksop_u:5426: marunadyāṃ jalam iva na sambhavati kutracit //MU_3,15.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5433: idaṃ tv acetyacinmātrabhānor bhānaṃ nabhaḥ prati /
GSP27moksop_u:5434: tathā sūkṣmaṃ yathā meghaṃ prati saṅkalpavāridaḥ //MU_3,15.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5436: tathā jagad idaṃ svacchaṃ saṅkalpitajagat prati //MU_3,15.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5439: tasmān na kiñcid utpannaṃ jagadādīha dṛśyakam /
GSP27moksop_u:5446: nissandeho yathaiṣo 'rthaś citte viśrāntim eti te //MU_3,15.17//
GSP27moksop_u:5463: tasyāsīt subhagā bhāryā līlā nāma vilāsinī /
GSP27moksop_u:5474: paricaryāṃ ciraṃ kartum anyā ratir ivoditā //MU_3,15.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5477: jagaty ākāśapratipādanāya maṇḍapopākhyāne rājavarṇanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
GSP27moksop_u:5515: antaḥpureṣu harmyeṣu teṣu teṣu tathā tathā //MU_3,16.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5516: sā bālā sukhasaṃvṛddhā tasya praṇayinī priyā /
GSP27moksop_u:5521: kathaṃ svairaṃ ciraṃ kāntā rameyābdaśatāny aham //MU_3,16.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5525: pṛcchāmi tāvan maraṇaṃ kathaṃ na syān nṛṇām iti //MU_3,16.23//
GSP27moksop_u:5527: amaratvaṃ kathaṃ viprā bhaved iti punaḥ punaḥ //MU_3,16.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5531: ity ākarṇya dvijamukhāc cintayām āsa sā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5533: maraṇaṃ bhartur agre me yadi daivād bhaviṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:5536: tat kariṣye tathā yena jīvo gehān na yāsyati //MU_3,16.28//
GSP27moksop_u:5541: iti niścitya sā nātham anuktvaiva varāṅganā /
GSP27moksop_u:5552: tuṣṭā bhagavatī gaurī vāgīśīdam uvāca tām //MU_3,16.36//
GSP27moksop_u:5555: parituṣṭāsmi te vatse gṛhāṇa varam īpsitam //MU_3,16.37//
GSP27moksop_u:5559: amba māṃ trijaganmātas trāyasva kṛpaṇām imām /
GSP27moksop_u:5560: idaṃ varadvayaṃ dehi yad iha prārthaye śubham //MU_3,16.39//
GSP27moksop_u:5561: ekaṃ tāvad videhasya bhartur jīvo mamāmbike /
GSP27moksop_u:5562: asmād eva hi mā yāsīn nijāntaḥpuramaṇḍapāt //MU_3,16.40//
GSP27moksop_u:5563: dvitīyaṃ tvāṃ mahādevi prārthaye 'haṃ yadā yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:5564: darśanāya varārthena tadā me dehi darśanam //MU_3,16.41//
GSP27moksop_u:5565: ity ākarṇya jaganmātā tathāstv evam iti kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:5571: antardhim ājagāmāsyāḥ patyus tac cetanaṃ tanau /
GSP27moksop_u:5577: prāpa sā tamasāndhatvaṃ tasmin maraṇam āgate /
GSP27moksop_u:5579: kārśyam āpa kṣaṇenāsau bālā virasatāṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:5583: atha tām atimātravihvalāṃ sakṛd ākāśabhavā sarasvatī /
GSP27moksop_u:5589: ācchādya sthāpayeha tvaṃ punar enam avāpsyasi //MU_3,17.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5590: puṣpāṇi mlānim eṣyanti no na caiṣa vinaṅkṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:5591: bhūyaś ca tava bhartāyam acireṇa bhaviṣyati //MU_3,17.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5599: tasminn eva dine saikā tasmiñ śuddhāntamaṇḍape /
GSP27moksop_u:5602: duḥkhād āhvāyayām āsa sovaca samupetya tām //MU_3,17.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5604: kiṃ smṛtāsmi tvayā vatse dhatse kim iti śokitām /
GSP27moksop_u:5607: kva mamāmba sthito bhartā kiṃ karoty atha kīdṛśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5608: samīpaṃ naya māṃ tasya naikā śaknomi jīvitum //MU_3,17.9//
GSP27moksop_u:5612: śūnyam evedam akhilaṃ jagat tatra vyavasthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5613: ahaṃ tvam iti dṛśyātma nānānānaiva nirvapuḥ //MU_3,17.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5618: deśād deśāntaraprāptau saṃvido madhyam eva yat /
GSP27moksop_u:5621: sarvātmakapadaṃ tat tad dṛṣṭvā prāpnoṣy asaṃśayam //MU_3,17.15//
GSP27moksop_u:5623: nānyathā madvareṇāśu tvaṃ tu prāpsyasi sundari //MU_3,17.16//
GSP27moksop_u:5625: ity uktvā sā yayau devī divyam ātmīyam āspadam /
GSP27moksop_u:5657: papātātha mahārambhāṃ sā tāṃ narapates sabhām /
GSP27moksop_u:5659: bhramantīṃ tatra tām agre dadṛśus te na kecana /
GSP27moksop_u:5661: tathā te tāṃ na dadṛśus sañcarantīṃ purogatām /
GSP27moksop_u:5663: prāktanān eva tān sarvān sā dadarśa purogatān /
GSP27moksop_u:5665: tadveśāṃs tanmayācārāṃs tathā tān eva bālakān /
GSP27moksop_u:5666: tā eva bālavanitās tāṃs tān eva ca mantriṇaḥ //MU_3,17.37//
GSP27moksop_u:5667: tān eva bhuvi bhūpālāṃs tāṃs tān eva ca paṇḍitān /
GSP27moksop_u:5668: tān eva narmasacivān bhṛtyāṃs tān eva tādṛśān //MU_3,17.38//
GSP27moksop_u:5669: athānyān anyapūrvāṃś ca paṇḍitān suhṛdas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:5670: vyavahārāṃs tathā cānyān paurān anyāṃs tathaiva ca //MU_3,17.39//
GSP27moksop_u:5678: te 'smin nagaravāstavyāḥ kaṣṭaṃ sarve mṛtā iti //MU_3,17.43//
GSP27moksop_u:5684: āha cātīva me duḥkham āsthānaṃ dīyatām iti //MU_3,17.46//
GSP27moksop_u:5685: bhartus siṃhāsanasyāsya pārśve tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:5691: āsthānabhūmiṃ bhṛtyāś ca mārjayām āsur ādṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5697: ājagmur mantrisāmantās svaṃ svaṃ sthānam aninditāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5698: trailokye punar utpanne lokapālā yathā diśaḥ //MU_3,17.53//
GSP27moksop_u:5709: dadarśa tān nṛpān bhṛtyān sarvān eva yathāsthitān /
GSP27moksop_u:5711: sakalam eva hi pūrvavad eva sā samavalokya mudaṃ paramāṃ yayau /
GSP27moksop_u:5712: nṛpatirāṣṭrajanaḥ khalu jīvatīty uditayā ca babhau śaśivac chriyā //MU_3,17.60//
GSP27moksop_u:5716: itthaṃ vinodayāmīdaṃ duḥkhitaṃ cittam ity alam /
GSP27moksop_u:5719: viveśa puṣpaguptasya cintayām āsa ceti sā //MU_3,18.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5721: bahir antaś cidādarśe tatra ceha ca saṃsthitāḥ //MU_3,18.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5723: yathā tatra tathehāpi bata māyeyam ātatā //MU_3,18.4//
GSP27moksop_u:5724: ādarśe bahir antaś ca yathā śailo 'nubhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:5726: atra bhrāntimayas sargaḥ kas syāt kaḥ pāramārthikaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5728: iti niścitya tāṃ devīṃ pūjayām āsa sā tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:5733: anukampyasya no devi bhajanty udvegam uttamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5735: tad iyaṃ yat purā prahvā pṛcchāmi parameśvari /
GSP27moksop_u:5736: tvaṃ brūhi tvatkṛto nūnaṃ saphalo me 'sty anugrahaḥ //MU_3,18.10//
GSP27moksop_u:5738: asty ādarśo jagannāmnaḥ khād apy adhikanirmalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5741: acetyacid iti khyāto nāmnā nirbhittir agrahaḥ //MU_3,18.12//
GSP27moksop_u:5746: tatrāmba kṛtrimā kā syāt kāsau vā syād akṛtrimā //MU_3,18.14//
GSP27moksop_u:5749: kīdṛśaṃ kṛtrimatvaṃ syād yathāvat kathayeti me //MU_3,18.15//
GSP27moksop_u:5751: yathāham iha tiṣṭhāmi tvaṃ ca devi sthitāmbike /
GSP27moksop_u:5752: asāv akṛtrimas sarga iti deveśi vedmy aham //MU_3,18.16//
GSP27moksop_u:5753: yatrādhunā sa bhartā me sthitas sargas sa kṛtrimaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5757: na hi kāraṇataḥ kāryam udety asadṛśaṃ kvacit //MU_3,18.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5760: ambv ādātum aśaktā mṛd ghaṭas tajjas tadāspadam //MU_3,18.19//
GSP27moksop_u:5762: sampadyate hi yat kāryaṃ kāraṇais sahakāribhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5764: na ca tvadbhartṛsargasya kiñcit pṛthvyādi kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:5765: na bhūmaṇḍalato bhūmir jātā tatra varānane //MU_3,18.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5766: gatā cid ita uḍḍīya kutas syād ihabhūtalam /
GSP27moksop_u:5767: sahakārīṇi kāny eva kāraṇāny atra kāraṇam //MU_3,18.22//
GSP27moksop_u:5771: smṛtis sā devi madbhartus tathā sphāratvam āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:5772: smṛteś ca kāraṇaṃ vedmi sargo 'yam iti niścayaḥ //MU_3,18.24//
GSP27moksop_u:5774: smṛtir ākāśarūpaiva yathā tajjas tathaiva te /
GSP27moksop_u:5775: bhartṛsargo 'nubhūto hi sa kham eva tathābale //MU_3,18.25//
GSP27moksop_u:5778: tathaivemam ahaṃ manye sa sargo 'tra nidarśanam //MU_3,18.26//
GSP27moksop_u:5780: evam etad asatsargo bhartus te bhāti bhāsuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5781: tathaivāyam ihābhāti paśyāmy etad ahaṃ sute //MU_3,18.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5783: yathā patyur amūrto 'smāt sargāt sargo bhramātmakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5804: asmin nadīśailavanopagūḍhe sāgnis sadāras sutavān arogaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5805: gokṣīravān rājabhayād vimuktaḥ sarvātithir dharmaparo dvijo 'bhūt //MU_3,18.38//
GSP27moksop_u:5812: nāmnā tv arundhatī bhāryā bhūmivyomany arundhatī //MU_3,19.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5814: sameva sāpy arundhatyā na tu cetanasattayā //MU_3,19.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5817: sa vipras tasya śailasya sānau sarasaśādvale /
GSP27moksop_u:5827: tam ālokya mahīpālam idaṃ cintitavān asau /
GSP27moksop_u:5835: itthaṃ tataḥprabhṛty eva vipras saṅkalpavān abhūt /
GSP27moksop_u:5841: mām athārādhitavatī sā tatas tvam ivāṅganā /
GSP27moksop_u:5843: devi svamaṇḍapād eva jīvo bhartur mṛtasya me /
GSP27moksop_u:5844: mā yāsīd ity atas tasyās sa evāṅgīkṛto mayā //MU_3,19.18//
GSP27moksop_u:5845: atha kālavaśād vipras sa pañcatvam upāyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:5859: bhartrā saha śavībhūtā deham utsṛjya dūrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5861: nadī nikhātam iva taṃ bhartāram anusṛtya sā /
GSP27moksop_u:5863: tatrāsya viprasya sutā gṛhāṇi bhūsthāvarādīni ghanāni santi /
GSP27moksop_u:5868: sa te bhartādya sampanno dvijo bhūpatvam āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5869: yāsāv arundhatī nāma brāhmaṇī sā tvam aṅgane //MU_3,20.1//
GSP27moksop_u:5870: ihemau kuruto rājyaṃ tau bhavantau sudampatī /
GSP27moksop_u:5871: cakravākāv iva navau bhuvi jātau śivāv iva //MU_3,20.2//
GSP27moksop_u:5872: eṣa te kathitas sarvaḥ prāktanas saṃsṛtibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5876: tasmād bhrāntimayaḥ kas syāt ko vā bhrāntyujjhito bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:5881: devi tvadvacanaṃ mithyā kathaṃ sampannam īdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:5882: kva viprajīvas svagṛhe kveme vayam iha sthitāḥ //MU_3,20.7//
GSP27moksop_u:5883: tādṛg lokāntaraṃ sā bhūs te śailās tā diśo daśa /
GSP27moksop_u:5884: kathaṃ mānti gṛhasyāntar madbhartā yeṣv avasthitaḥ //MU_3,20.8//
GSP27moksop_u:5890: tathā gṛhāntaḥ pṛthivī śailāś cety asamañjasam //MU_3,20.11//
GSP27moksop_u:5894: nāhaṃ mithyā vadāmīdaṃ yathāvac chṛṇu sundari /
GSP27moksop_u:5896: vibhidyamānām anyena sthāpayāmy aham eva yām /
GSP27moksop_u:5897: maryādāṃ tāṃ mayā bhinnāṃ ko 'paraḥ pālayiṣyati //MU_3,20.14//
GSP27moksop_u:5900: prāktanī sā smṛtir luptā yuvayor uditānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:5902: yathā svapne tribhuvanaṃ saṅkalpāt trijagad yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:5908: asatyād yat samutpannaṃ smṛtyā nāma tad apy asat /
GSP27moksop_u:5911: viddhi māṃ tvāṃ ca sarvaṃ vā tac ca vyomaiva kevalam //MU_3,20.21//
GSP27moksop_u:5918: tasminn asmin pure tanvi tavedaṃ sadanaṃ sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:5919: tasmāt kim aṇumātre 'ntar gajavṛndam iva sthitam //MU_3,20.25//
GSP27moksop_u:5921: antar antar jagantīti kenaitan nāma saṅkhyate //MU_3,20.26//
GSP27moksop_u:5923: aṣṭamaṃ divasaṃ vipras sa mṛtaḥ parameśvari /
GSP27moksop_u:5924: gato varṣagaṇo 'smākam ataḥ katham idaṃ bhavet //MU_3,20.27//
GSP27moksop_u:5926: deśadairghyaṃ yathā nāsti kāladairghyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5927: nāsty eveti yathānyāyaṃ kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu //MU_3,20.28//
GSP27moksop_u:5931: yathāvat pratibhāsasya vatse kramam imaṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,20.30//
GSP27moksop_u:5936: yadaiva cetati vapus tadaivedaṃ sa cetati /
GSP27moksop_u:5937: etasyāhaṃ pituḥ putro varṣāṇīmāni santi me //MU_3,20.33//
GSP27moksop_u:5938: ime me bāndhavā ramyā mamedaṃ ramyam āspadam /
GSP27moksop_u:5939: jāto 'ham abhavaṃ bālo vṛddhiṃ yāto 'ham īdṛśaḥ //MU_3,20.34//
GSP27moksop_u:5940: bāndhavāś cāsya te sarve tathaiva viharanty api /
GSP27moksop_u:5943: na kiñcid apy abhyuditaṃ sthitaṃ vyomaiva nirmalam //MU_3,20.36//
GSP27moksop_u:5944: svapne draṣṭari yadvac cit tadvad dṛśye cid eva sā /
GSP27moksop_u:5949: na manāg api bhedo 'sti vīcīnām iva vāriṇi //MU_3,20.39//
GSP27moksop_u:5950: ato 'jātam idaṃ viśvam ajātatvād anāśi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:5951: kharūpatvāc ca nāsty eva yac ca bhāti cid eva sā //MU_3,20.40//
GSP27moksop_u:5954: yasmāc cetyam ato nānyad vīcitvād iva vāritā /
GSP27moksop_u:5955: vīcitvaṃ ca na caivāsti śaśaśṛṅgavad eva hi //MU_3,20.42//
GSP27moksop_u:5956: saiva cetyam ivāpannā svabhāvād acyutāpy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:5957: tasmān nāsty eva dṛśyo 'rthaḥ kuto 'to draṣṭṛdṛśyadhīḥ //MU_3,20.43//
GSP27moksop_u:5964: ajātam eva jāto 'ham iti paśyati cidvapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5966: jhagity eva mṛter ante vapuḥ paśyati yauvanam /
GSP27moksop_u:5967: eṣā mātā pitā tv eṣa bālo 'bhūvam ahaṃ tv iti //MU_3,20.48//
GSP27moksop_u:5968: nānubhūto 'nubhūto vā yas syāt smṛtimayaḥ kramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5969: paścād udety asau tasya puṣpasyeva phalodayaḥ //MU_3,20.49//
GSP27moksop_u:5973: mṛto jāto 'ham anyo me piteti svapnadhāmni ca //MU_3,20.51//
GSP27moksop_u:5975: bhukte cābhuktadhīr dṛṣṭam ity alaṃ kitavādiṣu //MU_3,20.52//
GSP27moksop_u:5976: śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti tulyaṃ vyasanam utsavaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5978: taikṣṇyaṃ yathā maricabījakaṇe sthitaṃ svaṃ stambhe 'thavā racitaputrakajālam antaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:5979: dṛśyaṃ tv ananyad idam evam aje 'sti śāntaṃ kasyāsti bandhanavimokṣadṛśaḥ kutaḥ kāḥ //MU_3,20.54//
GSP27moksop_u:5988: nānubhūtaṃ na yad dṛṣṭaṃ tan mayā kṛtam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:5989: tat kṣaṇāt smṛtitām eti svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā //MU_3,21.3//
GSP27moksop_u:5992: ahaṃ jagad iyaṃ sargasmṛtir eveti jṛmbhati /
GSP27moksop_u:5998: kadācit smṛtitām tyaktvā pratibhāmātram eva sat /
GSP27moksop_u:6005: īpsitānīpsite tatra na staḥ kecana kasyacit //MU_3,21.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6009: anutpādamayo nityaṃ śānto 'pi na hi śāmyati //MU_3,21.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6010: ardhaśānto na śānto 'sau samety anyatayā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6012: saṃsāraś cāyam ābhogī param eveti niścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6013: kāraṇābhāvato bhāti yad ihābhāvam eti tat //MU_3,21.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6016: katham abhyuditā sā syāt smaraṇīyam idaṃ vinā //MU_3,21.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6018: pitāmahasmṛtis tatra kāraṇaṃ tasya ca smṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6019: pūrvaṃ na sambhavaty eva muktatvāt pūrvajanmanaḥ //MU_3,21.17//
GSP27moksop_u:6020: pūrvaṃ na sambhavaty eva smaraṇīyā citis svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:6022: abhūvam aham ity anyaḥ prajānāthaḥ prajāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:6024: evam abhyudite loke na kiñcin na kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:6025: kvacid abhyuditaṃ nāma kevalaṃ cinnabhas sthitam //MU_3,21.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6026: dvividhāyās smṛter asyāḥ kāraṇaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:6032: evaṃ na kiñcid utpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ trijagadādy api /
GSP27moksop_u:6035: aho nu paramā dṛṣṭir darśitā devi me tvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:6037: idānīm aham etasyāṃ yāvat pariṇatā dṛśi /
GSP27moksop_u:6038: nābhyāsena vinā tāvad bhinddhīmaṃ devi kautukam //MU_3,21.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6040: taṃ sargaṃ taṃ girigrāmaṃ naya māṃ samavekṣitum //MU_3,21.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6046: evaṃsthitaṃ taṃ paśyāvas saha sargam anantaram /
GSP27moksop_u:6049: amunā devi dehena jagad anyad avāpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:6050: na vā kasmād atra yuktiṃ kathayānugrahagrahāt //MU_3,21.31//
GSP27moksop_u:6055: yathā tathā jagadrūpe jagattvaṃ nāsti citpade //MU_3,21.33//
GSP27moksop_u:6056: jagad ākāśam evedaṃ brahmaiva na tu dṛśyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:6057: dṛśyate kācid apy atra dhūlir ambunidhāv iva //MU_3,21.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6058: brahmaiva paśyati brahma nābrahma brahma paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:6062: yāvad abhyāsayogena na śāntā bhedadhīs tava /
GSP27moksop_u:6063: nūnaṃ tāvad atadrūpā na brahma paripaśyasi //MU_3,21.37//
GSP27moksop_u:6064: tatra rūḍhim upāyātā ime ye tv asmadādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6065: abhyāsād brahmasaṃvitteḥ paśyāmas te hi tat padam //MU_3,21.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6067: brahmaiva vātaḥ paśyāmi dehenānena tat padam //MU_3,21.39//
GSP27moksop_u:6070: tavābhyāsaṃ vinā bālo nākāro brahmatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6075: tat paśyasy etad evāśu kuru kāryavidāṃ vare //MU_3,21.43//
GSP27moksop_u:6077: sadehaṃ vā videhaṃ vā netaraṃ prati kiñcana //MU_3,21.44//
GSP27moksop_u:6079: tathā tadāprabhṛty eva niyatiḥ prauḍhim āgatā //MU_3,21.45//
GSP27moksop_u:6082: sahetīdam ahaṃ vacmi kathaṃ gantavyam amba he //MU_3,21.46//
GSP27moksop_u:6084: cetasā tat paraṃ yāmi lokaṃ tvaṃ kathayeti tu //MU_3,21.47//
GSP27moksop_u:6086: saṅkalpavyomavṛkṣas te yathā sann api khātmakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6087: na kuḍyātmā na kuḍyena rodhyate nāpi kuḍyahā //MU_3,21.48//
GSP27moksop_u:6089: pratibhānam atas tasmād paramād bhidyate manāk //MU_3,21.49//
GSP27moksop_u:6090: so 'yam etādṛśo deho nainaṃ santyajya yāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:6091: anenaiva tam āpnomi deśaṃ gandham ivānilaḥ //MU_3,21.50//
GSP27moksop_u:6092: yathā jalaṃ jalair vāgnir agninā vāyunānilaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6093: milaty evaṃ manodeho dehair anyair manomayaiḥ //MU_3,21.51//
GSP27moksop_u:6094: na hi pārthivatāṃ saṃvid ety apārthivasaṃvidā /
GSP27moksop_u:6098: yathā svapne yathā dīrghakāladhyāne yathā bhramaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6100: vāsanātānavaṃ nūnaṃ yadā te sthitim eṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:6104: tam avāpnoty ayaṃ deho daśāmohe vinaśyati //MU_3,21.56//
GSP27moksop_u:6106: yad asti nāma tatraiṣa nāśānāśakramo bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:6107: vastuto nāsti yat tv eva nāśas syāt tatra kīdṛśaḥ //MU_3,21.57//
GSP27moksop_u:6109: sarpo na naṣṭas tan naṣṭo vety evaṃ keva saṅkathā //MU_3,21.58//
GSP27moksop_u:6113: sā śilā samapāstaiva yā nehāsti kadācana //MU_3,21.60//
GSP27moksop_u:6115: iti satyaṃ vayaṃ bhadre paśyāmo nāsi paśyasi //MU_3,21.61//
GSP27moksop_u:6117: tadā tataḥprabhṛty ekaṃ svatvaṃ dṛśyam ivekṣyate //MU_3,21.62//
GSP27moksop_u:6124: nāsty eva satyānubhave tathā nāsty eva citpade /
GSP27moksop_u:6126: yathā nāsty ambare pāṃsuḥ pare nāsti tathā kalā /
GSP27moksop_u:6127: akalākalanaṃ śāntam idam ekam ajaṃ tataḥ //MU_3,21.66//
GSP27moksop_u:6128: yad vedaṃ bhāsate kiñcit tat tasyaiva nirāmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:6131: etāvantaṃ ciraṃ kālam evaṃ devi vayaṃ vada /
GSP27moksop_u:6137: eṣo 'sann eva tenāntar avidyaiṣā na vidyate //MU_3,21.70//
GSP27moksop_u:6139: na mokṣo 'sti nirābādhaṃ śuddhabodhas tv idaṃ jagat //MU_3,21.71//
GSP27moksop_u:6140: etāvantaṃ yadā kālaṃ tvayaitan na vicāritam /
GSP27moksop_u:6141: tadā na samprabuddhā tvaṃ bhrāntaivārṇava ākulā //MU_3,21.72//
GSP27moksop_u:6144: ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ saṃsāranāṭakam /
GSP27moksop_u:6145: yadā tadā kathaṃ kena vāsyate vāsanāpi kā //MU_3,21.74//
GSP27moksop_u:6158: anubhūto 'py ayaṃ tadvaj jāgraddeho na vāstavaḥ //MU_3,22.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6165: yeyaṃ tu jīvanmuktānāṃ vāsanā sā na vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:6167: yā suptavāsanā nidrā sā suṣuptam iti smṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:6168: yat suptavāsanaṃ jāgrat sa ghano moha ucyate //MU_3,22.6//
