GSP27moksop_u:6170: jāgraty api bhavaty etad vidite parame pade //MU_3,22.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6177: yadā te 'yam ahambhāvas svābhyāsāc chāntim eṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:6178: tadodeṣyati te sphārā dṛśyānte bodhatā svayam //MU_3,22.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6179: ātivāhikatā jñātā sthitiṃ te yāti śāśvatīm /
GSP27moksop_u:6183: yāvan na pūritas tv eṣa nirmalo bodhacandramāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6184: tāvad deham iha sthāpya lokāntaram avekṣyatām //MU_3,22.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6193: dehas tv ayaṃ na mriyate na ca jīvati kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:6196: asatyam eva bhāty etad asmin putri śarīrake //MU_3,22.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6198: tad etad upadiṣṭaṃ me jñānaṃ devi tvayāmalam /
GSP27moksop_u:6199: yasmiñ śrutiṃ gate śāntim eti viśvaviṣūcikā //MU_3,22.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6201: sa kathaṃ poṣam āyāti puṣṭe tasmiṃś ca kiṃ bhavet //MU_3,22.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6203: yad eva kriyate kiñcid yena yena yadā yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:6204: vinābhyāsena tan neha siddhim eti kadācana //MU_3,22.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6207: yeṣāṃ tv antaṃ gataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:6212: bhāvayanty abhavāyāntar bhavyā bhuvi jayanti te //MU_3,22.27//
GSP27moksop_u:6216: yuktyā śāstre yatante ye te brahmābhyāsinas sthitāḥ //MU_3,22.29//
GSP27moksop_u:6217: sargādāv eva notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva tat sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:6218: idaṃ jagad ahaṃ ceti bodhābhyāsaṃ viduḥ pare //MU_3,22.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6222: tapa ity ucyate loke dṛśyadoṣas tu duḥkhakṛt //MU_3,22.32//
GSP27moksop_u:6226: pragalati himaśītalair ivoccaiḥ śaradi mahāmihikeva cetasīti //MU_3,22.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6228: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:6229: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_3,22.35//
GSP27moksop_u:6233: iti saṅkathanaṃ kṛtvā tasyāṃ niśi varāṅgane /
GSP27moksop_u:6246: yathā kalpalate kānte pūrṇam ṛtvantare rasam //MU_3,23.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6247: ahaṃ jagad iti bhrānter dṛśyasyādāv anudbhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6251: ādāv eva hi yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:6253: svabhāvaḥ kevalaś śāntas strīdvayaṃ tad babhūva ha /
GSP27moksop_u:6257: gehāntar eva prādeśamātram āruhya vai divaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6268: dūrād dūraṃ samāplutya śanair uccapadaṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:6269: haste hastaṃ samāsajya yāntyau dadṛśatur nabhaḥ //MU_3,24.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6281: dikṣu babhramatur bhūri bhramaryau sarasīṣv iva //MU_3,24.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6288: upary upary upary uccair anyair anyair vṛtaṃ pṛthak /
GSP27moksop_u:6371: kvacid agniśukaiś śyāmaṃ śādvalānām iva sthalam //MU_3,24.52//
GSP27moksop_u:6397: vilaṅghya tad varalalane vimucya khaṃ mahītalaṃ punar api gantum udyate //MU_3,24.65//
GSP27moksop_u:6401: nabhastalād girigrāmaṃ gacchantyau kiñcid eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:6415: jambudvīpa iti khyātāṃ vipulāṃ tatra karṇikām /
GSP27moksop_u:6428: dadhatyā valitāṃ bāhye prakoṣṭham iva kambunā //MU_3,25.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6476: jagadudaram avekṣya mānuṣī prāg bhuvi nijamandirakoṭaraṃ dadarśa //MU_3,25.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6479: tato dadṛśatus sadma svam eva siddhayoṣitau /
GSP27moksop_u:6491: cintayām āsa mām ete devīṃ cemāṃ svabāndhavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6517: prāyaḥ paraparitrāṇam eva karma nijaṃ satām //MU_3,26.19//
GSP27moksop_u:6521: svargaṃ gatau naḥ pitarau tena śūnyaṃ jagattrayam //MU_3,26.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6523: gṛhe śūnye mṛtāv utkāś śocanti madhurasvanaiḥ //MU_3,26.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6539: andhena tamasā pūrṇā gṛhā gahanatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_3,26.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6544: prakṣeptum ambudhau dehaṃ pravṛttā gantum ākulāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6550: tad devyau kriyatāṃ tāvad asmākaṃ śokanāśanam /
GSP27moksop_u:6551: mahatāṃ darśanaṃ nāma na kadācana niṣphalam //MU_3,26.36//
GSP27moksop_u:6552: ity uktavantaṃ sā putraṃ mūrdhni pasparśa pāṇinā /
GSP27moksop_u:6556: sarvo gṛhajanas so 'tha tayor devyor vilokanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:6560: kasmān na darśanaṃ dattaṃ no dattaḥ kathito 'thavā //MU_3,26.40//
GSP27moksop_u:6564: asad evāṅga sad iva bhāti pṛthvyādivedanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:6565: yathā bālasya vetālo na bhāti tadavedanāt //MU_3,26.42//
GSP27moksop_u:6566: yathā pṛthvyāditā bhātā na pṛthvyādi bhavet kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:6567: svapne svapnaparijñānāt tathā jāgraty api sphuṭam //MU_3,26.43//
GSP27moksop_u:6568: pṛthvyādi khatayā buddhaṃ kham ity evānubhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:6569: tathā hi kṣubdhadhātūnāṃ kuḍye 'pi kha ivodyamaḥ //MU_3,26.44//
GSP27moksop_u:6570: svapne nagaram urvī vā śūnyaṃ khātaṃ ca budhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:6571: svapnāṅganā ca kurute śūnyāpy arthakriyā nṛṇām //MU_3,26.45//
GSP27moksop_u:6572: khaṃ pṛthvyāditayā buddhaṃ pṛthvyādi bhavati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:6575: keśoṇḍukaṃ kham anyas tu kham anyo vetti mauktikam //MU_3,26.47//
GSP27moksop_u:6576: trastakṣīvārdhanidrāś ca nauyānāś ca sadaiva khe /
GSP27moksop_u:6577: vetālavac ca vṛkṣādi paśyanty anubhavaty api //MU_3,26.48//
GSP27moksop_u:6580: līlayā tu yathāvastu buddhaṃ pṛthvyādi nāsti tat /
GSP27moksop_u:6584: hastaś śirasi yad datto līlayā jyeṣṭhaśarmaṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6586: bodho hi cetati yathaiva tathā vibhāti sūkṣmas tu khād atitarāṃ ca tathā viśuddhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6587: sarvatra rāghava sa eva padārthajālaṃ svapneṣu kalpitapureṣv anubhūtam eva //MU_3,26.53//
GSP27moksop_u:6592: antardhim āśv āyayatus tatrasthe eva te striyau //MU_3,27.1//
GSP27moksop_u:6593: asmākaṃ vanadevībhyāṃ prasādaḥ kṛta ity atha /
GSP27moksop_u:6598: yathehārthakriyāṃ dhatte tayos sā saṅkathā tathā //MU_3,27.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6603: īdṛśīyaṃ brahmasattā kim anyad vada pṛcchasi //MU_3,27.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6605: mṛtasya bhartur jīvo 'sau yatra rājyaṃ karoti me /
GSP27moksop_u:6606: tatrāhaṃ kiṃ na tair dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭāsmīha sutena kim //MU_3,27.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6608: abhyāsena vinā vatse tadā te dvaitaniścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6609: nūnam astaṅgato nābhūd ṛtusandhāv ṛtur yathā //MU_3,27.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6610: advaitaṃ yo na yāto 'sau katham advaitakarmabhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6613: yadā bhāvas tadā satyasaṅkalpatvam abhūn na te //MU_3,27.10//
GSP27moksop_u:6614: adyāpi satyānubhavās saṅkalpās tena māṃ yayuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6615: sampaśyatv ity abhimataṃ phalitaṃ tava sundari //MU_3,27.11//
GSP27moksop_u:6616: idānīṃ tasya bhartus tvaṃ samīpaṃ yadi gacchasi /
GSP27moksop_u:6617: tat tena vyavahāras te pūrvavat sampravartate //MU_3,27.12//
GSP27moksop_u:6620: ihaiva sa mṛto bhūtvā sampanno vasudhādhipaḥ //MU_3,27.13//
GSP27moksop_u:6623: ihaivāntaḥpure tasmin sa mṛto mama bhūmipaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6629: tad adūram ahaṃ manye tad bhartur mama maṇḍalam /
GSP27moksop_u:6630: kvacit pārśvasthitam iha yathā paśyāmi tat kuru //MU_3,27.18//
GSP27moksop_u:6634: nedīyasāṃ trayāṇāṃ tu dvijas te bhasmasādgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6642: īśvaro 'ham ahaṃ bhogī siddho 'haṃ balavān sukhī /
GSP27moksop_u:6644: tat kasya vada bhartus tvāṃ samīpe varavarṇini /
GSP27moksop_u:6645: vātyā vanāntaraṃ gandhalekhām iva vanān naye //MU_3,27.25//
GSP27moksop_u:6646: anya eva sa saṃsāras sevyo brahmāṇḍamaṇḍapaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6647: anyā eva ca tā vatse vyavahāraparamparāḥ //MU_3,27.26//
GSP27moksop_u:6650: ākāśamātram eteṣām idaṃ paśya vapuḥ puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6655: tulāyāṃ dhānakāmātram api tāni bhavanti no //MU_3,27.30//
GSP27moksop_u:6659: na tu pṛthvyādi sampannaṃ sargādāv eva kiñcana //MU_3,27.32//
GSP27moksop_u:6660: yathā taraṅgas sariti bhūtvā bhūtvā punar bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:6663: evam etaj jaganmātar mayā mṛtam ihādhunā /
GSP27moksop_u:6664: mamedaṃ rājasaṃ janma tāmasaṃ no na sāttvikam //MU_3,27.34//
GSP27moksop_u:6665: brahmaṇas tv avatīrṇāyā aṣṭau janmaśatāni me /
GSP27moksop_u:6678: rājāhaṃ cābhavaṃ śrīmān surāṣṭreṣu samāś śatam //MU_3,27.41//
GSP27moksop_u:6681: varṣāṇy aṣṭau surāṣṭreṣu devi gotvaṃ mayā kṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:6684: kleśena mahatā cchinnā adyemā vāsanā iva //MU_3,27.44//
GSP27moksop_u:6698: kalpadrumavane meror yūnā saha rataṃ kṛtam //MU_3,27.51//
GSP27moksop_u:6719: kva brahmāṇḍaṃ kva tadbhittiḥ kvātrāsau vajrasāratā /
GSP27moksop_u:6726: rājasadmānubhavati sa ca sā cāpy arundhatī //MU_3,28.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6727: līlābhidhānā sañjātā tayā ca jñaptir arcitā /
GSP27moksop_u:6732: svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ prāpya yathā talpagataḥ pumān //MU_3,28.8//
GSP27moksop_u:6734: na brahmāṇḍaṃ na saṃsāro na kuḍyādi na dūratā //MU_3,28.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6735: svacittam eva kacati tayos tādṛṅ manoharam /
GSP27moksop_u:6739: cidākāśam ajaṃ śāntaṃ sarvatraiva hi sarvadā /
GSP27moksop_u:6741: yena buddhaṃ tu tasyaitad ākāśād api śūnyakam /
GSP27moksop_u:6743: gṛha eva yathā svapne nagaraṃ bhāti bhāsvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:6744: tathaitad asad evāntaś ciddhātau bhāti bhāsvaram //MU_3,28.14//
GSP27moksop_u:6746: asat sad iva bhātīdaṃ tathā dṛśyatvam ātmani //MU_3,28.15//
GSP27moksop_u:6761: atha te lalane tatra tadā dadṛśatus svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:6762: taṃ girigrāmakaṃ vyomnas svargakhaṇḍam iva cyutam //MU_3,28.23//
GSP27moksop_u:6850: atha sasmāra sarvās tāḥ prāktanīs saṃsṛter gatīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6853: devi deśam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvatprasādāt smarāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:6854: iha tat prāktanaṃ sarvaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ veṣṭitāntaram //MU_3,29.4//
GSP27moksop_u:6864: vācaṃ ciraṃ ciram iti vadanty aniśam ākulā //MU_3,29.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6865: kāhaṃ ka iva saṃsāra iti svapne 'py asaṅkathā /
GSP27moksop_u:6879: sañcarantyās sarasvatyā darśayām āsa sā svayam //MU_3,29.16//
GSP27moksop_u:6884: iyaṃ sā medasā kṣīṇā varākī jalahārikā /
GSP27moksop_u:6886: iha devi mayā proktam ihoṣitam iha sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:6887: iha suptam ihātītam idaṃ dattam ihāhṛtam //MU_3,29.20//
GSP27moksop_u:6888: eṣa me jyeṣṭhaśarmākhyaḥ putro roditi mandire /
GSP27moksop_u:6889: eṣā me jaṅgale dhenur doghdrī carati śādvalam //MU_3,29.21//
GSP27moksop_u:6891: svaṃ deham iha pañcākhyaṃ paśyemaṃ praghanaṃ mama //MU_3,29.22//
GSP27moksop_u:6914: dinair aṣṭabhir evāsau tena rājyaṃ samṛddhimat /
GSP27moksop_u:6916: atrāsau bhartṛjīvo me gṛhe vyomni sthito nṛpaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6917: adṛśyaḥ khe yathā vāyur āmodo vā yathānile //MU_3,29.35//
GSP27moksop_u:6920: āvāṃ kham eva tat khaṃ ca bhartṛrājyaṃ mameśvari /
GSP27moksop_u:6921: pūrṇaṃ sahasraiś śailānām aho māyeyam ātatā //MU_3,29.37//
GSP27moksop_u:6922: tad devi bhartur nikaṭaṃ punar gantuṃ mamepsitam /
GSP27moksop_u:6923: tad ehi tatra gacchāvaḥ kiṃ dūraṃ vyavasāyinām //MU_3,29.38//
GSP27moksop_u:6925: ity uktvā praṇatā devīṃ sā praviśyāśu maṇḍapam /
GSP27moksop_u:6930: sauraṃ mārgam athākramya cāndraṃ mārgam atītya ca //MU_3,29.41//
GSP27moksop_u:6931: dhruvamārgottaraṃ gatvā sādhyānāṃ mārgam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:6934: golokaṃ śivalokaṃ ca pitṛlokam atītya ca //MU_3,29.43//
GSP27moksop_u:6935: videhānāṃ ca devānāṃ dūram uttīrya dūragam /
GSP27moksop_u:6936: dūrād dūrataraṃ gatvā kiñcid ruddhā babhūva sā //MU_3,29.44//
GSP27moksop_u:6938: yāvan na kiñcic candrārkatārādy ālakṣyate hy adhaḥ //MU_3,29.45//
GSP27moksop_u:6942: tad devi bhāskarādīnāṃ kvādhas tejo gataṃ vada /
GSP27moksop_u:6945: etāvatīm imāṃ vyomnaḥ padavīm āgatāsi bhoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6946: arkādīny api tejāṃsi yato dṛśyanta eva no //MU_3,29.48//
GSP27moksop_u:6950: aho nu padavīm etāṃ dūrām āvām upāgate /
GSP27moksop_u:6951: sūryo 'py adho 'ṇukaṇavan na manāg api lakṣyate //MU_3,29.50//
GSP27moksop_u:6952: ita uttaram anyā syāt padavī kā nu kīdṛśī /
GSP27moksop_u:6953: kathaṃ ca pātanī bhavyā kathyatām iti devi me //MU_3,29.51//
GSP27moksop_u:6960: akleṣenaiva te tasmān nirgate gaganād iva /
GSP27moksop_u:6961: niścayatvaṃ hi yad vastu tad vajragati netarat //MU_3,29.54//
GSP27moksop_u:6967: tato daśaguṇaṃ vyoma tataḥ paramam ambaram //MU_3,29.57//
GSP27moksop_u:6970: kevalaṃ vimalaṃ śāntaṃ tad anādi gatabhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:6972: ākalpam uttamabalena śivāpatiś cet tasmin balād garuḍaketurathotpateś cet /
GSP27moksop_u:6973: taddhyānato 'valabhate vimale 'mbare 'ntam ākalpam ekajavagāmy atha māruto 'pi //MU_3,29.60//
GSP27moksop_u:6980: tathā tataṃ jagad idaṃ yathā tatrāṇumātrakam //MU_3,30.2//
GSP27moksop_u:6986: kāṃścit tiryaggatīn anyān sthitān stabdhān svasaṃvidā //MU_3,30.5//
GSP27moksop_u:6987: yatra yatroditā saṃvid yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ yathā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:6988: tatra tatroditaṃ rūpaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāṃ tathā tathā //MU_3,30.6//
GSP27moksop_u:6989: na caiva tatra nāmordhvaṃ nādho na ca gamāgamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:6990: anyad eva padaṃ kiñcid asmaddehāgamaṃ hi tat //MU_3,30.7//
GSP27moksop_u:6994: kim adhas syāt kim ūrdhvaṃ syāt kiṃ tiryak tatra bhāsure /
GSP27moksop_u:6995: iti brūhi mama brahmann ihaiva yadi na sthitiḥ //MU_3,30.9//
GSP27moksop_u:6999: asvatantrāḥ pradhāvanti padārthās sarva eva yat /
GSP27moksop_u:7000: brahmāṇḍaṃ pārthivaṃ bhāgaṃ tad adhaś śūnyam anyathā //MU_3,30.11//
GSP27moksop_u:7009: tasmin sarvaṃ tatas sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ sarvataś ca tat /
GSP27moksop_u:7010: tac ca sarvamayaṃ nityaṃ tathā tad aṇukaṃ prati //MU_3,30.16//
GSP27moksop_u:7016: na śruto 'nyair na ca jñātas svabhāvarasanākulaiḥ //MU_3,30.19//
GSP27moksop_u:7020: pravṛttā galituṃ kecit tāpe himakaṇā yathā //MU_3,30.21//
GSP27moksop_u:7023: stabdhā eva sthitāḥ kecit keṣoṇḍukam ivāmbare /
GSP27moksop_u:7039: ājīvitaṃ prayacchadbhir viṣṇvādyair yan na dīyate //MU_3,30.30//
GSP27moksop_u:7044: bhīmāndhakāragahane sumahaty araṇye nṛtyanty adarśitaparasparam eva mattāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7045: yakṣā yathā pravitate paramāmbare 'ntar evaṃ sphuranti subahūni mahājaganti //MU_3,30.33//
GSP27moksop_u:7049: evam ākalayantyau te nirgatya jagato nijam /
GSP27moksop_u:7055: tam ālokya punar bhartus saṃsāraṃ gantum ādṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:7059: prāpa sārdhaṃ tayā devyā punar āvaraṇānvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:7060: brahmāṇḍamaṇḍapaṃ sphāraṃ taṃ praviśya tathā javāt //MU_3,31.6//
GSP27moksop_u:7063: devyau viviśatus tat te vyoma vyomātmake jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:7065: tatra lokāntarāṇy adrīn antarikṣam atītya te /
GSP27moksop_u:7073: aśaṅkitāgate te tu devyau dadṛśatur nabhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7095: svarge 'laṅkaraṇaṃ kas syāt ko vā ḍimbāhato bhavet //MU_3,31.23//
GSP27moksop_u:7098: mṛto 'thavā jayī vā syāt sa śūraś śūralokabhāk //MU_3,31.24//
GSP27moksop_u:7099: anyathā tu nikṛttāṅgo raṇe yo mṛtim āpnuyāt /
GSP27moksop_u:7102: yo naras tasya saṅgrāme mṛtasya nirayo 'kṣayaḥ //MU_3,31.26//
GSP27moksop_u:7104: yudhyate tādṛśasyaiva bhaktyā śūras sa ucyate //MU_3,31.27//
GSP27moksop_u:7105: gor arthe brāhmaṇasyārthe mitrasyārthe ca sanmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7108: rājā mṛtas tadarthaṃ yas sa vīro vīralokabhāk //MU_3,31.29//
GSP27moksop_u:7110: arthena ye mṛtā yuddhe te vai nirayagāminaḥ //MU_3,31.30//
GSP27moksop_u:7111: dharmyaṃ yathā tathā yuddhaṃ yadi syāt tad imāṃ sthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:7113: yatra yatra hataś śūras svargya ity adhamoktayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7114: dharmyo yoddhā bhavec chūra ity evaṃ śāstraniścayaḥ //MU_3,31.32//
GSP27moksop_u:7116: te śūrā iti kathyante śeṣā ḍimbāhavāhatāḥ //MU_3,31.33//
GSP27moksop_u:7163: dhamad dham iti śabdaiś ca śvāsotthair vyāptakhāntaram //MU_3,32.20//
GSP27moksop_u:7178: ekārṇavaṃ bhuvanakośam ivācireṇa kartuṃ samudyatam agādham anantapūraiḥ //MU_3,32.27//
GSP27moksop_u:7182: bhagavan yuddham etan me samāsena manāg vada /
GSP27moksop_u:7183: śrutir āhlādyate śrotur yasmād etābhir uktibhiḥ //MU_3,33.1//
GSP27moksop_u:7185: atha khe tatra te devyau saṅgrāmaṃ tad avekṣitum /
GSP27moksop_u:7186: vimāne kalpite kānte ruddhe ruruhatus sthire //MU_3,33.2//
GSP27moksop_u:7188: tāmyan soḍhum aśaktas san duḥkhavyatikaraṃ raṇe //MU_3,33.3//
GSP27moksop_u:7190: jahau sānāv iva śilāṃ bhaṭasyorasi mudgaram //MU_3,33.4//
GSP27moksop_u:7271: atha rājñāṃ yuyutsūnāṃ bhaṭānāṃ mantriṇām api /
GSP27moksop_u:7273: calatpadmaṃ sara iva vahadvihagam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:7277: kim idaṃ bhagini vyoma palālabharitaṃ sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:7289: pratyanīkaṃ bhinatty antaḥ kuṭhāraiḥ kaṭhinair iyam /
GSP27moksop_u:7291: hā pitur mama bhallena śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam /
GSP27moksop_u:7295: yodho yama ivāyāmī yāmyād āyāti diktaṭāt /
GSP27moksop_u:7296: sarvatas saṃharan senām ehi yāmo yathāgatam //MU_3,34.13//
GSP27moksop_u:7300: vada lokāntaraṃ vīrāḥ kathaṃ yāsyanti ke kutaḥ //MU_3,34.15//
GSP27moksop_u:7301: nigiranty āgatās senās sravantīr iva sāgarāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7305: hā kuntena śiro nītaṃ mamety evaṃ vivakṣataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7306: śira ānītam ity eva khe khageneva vāśitam //MU_3,34.18//
GSP27moksop_u:7316: khe carantyo jhaṇatkāraiḥ pramṛtās tārakā iva //MU_3,34.23//
GSP27moksop_u:7339: vahadbhir vyomny asaṅkhyeyaiḥ paśya nītā śaraiḥ kṣayaṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:7346: hā hā dhig bruḍitaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ rathapattanam //MU_3,34.38//
GSP27moksop_u:7364: raṇagirir ayam ugrapakṣadakṣaḥ pravisṛtanṛtta ivāmbare yugānte //MU_3,34.47//
GSP27moksop_u:7367: chinnecchā ccham iti na yāvad aṅgabhaṅgaṃ kurvanti jvaladanalojjvalāḥ pṛṣatkāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7368: tāvad drāg drutam ita ehi mitra yāmo yāmo 'yaṃ pravahati vāsaraś caturthaḥ //MU_3,34.49//
GSP27moksop_u:7427: dīptā dadhur daśadiśaṃ śataśo bhramantaḥ kalpāntavātaparivṛttapadārthalīlām //MU_3,35.28//
GSP27moksop_u:7479: drimayo madrasuhmāś ca tāmraliptās tathaiva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:7483: mālyavān nāma śailo 'tra śibivāñ jñāna eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:7490: kaṇṭhadrāś śoṇikāś caiva tathā carmaṇvatā api //MU_3,36.30//
GSP27moksop_u:7491: kokakā hemakuḍyāś ca tathā śmaśrudharā iti /
GSP27moksop_u:7496: avantir iti vikhyātā tathā sāmbavatīti ca //MU_3,36.33//
GSP27moksop_u:7510: baladevāḥ pattanakāḥ krauñcāṣ ṭīvās tathaiva ca //MU_3,36.40//
GSP27moksop_u:7516: atra hemagiriś śailas tathā raivatako giriḥ //MU_3,36.43//
GSP27moksop_u:7522: paścimāyāṃ diśi prauḍhā ime tāvan mahādrayaḥ //MU_3,36.46//
GSP27moksop_u:7534: tathā veṇumatiś caiva tatas turamatir mahī //MU_3,36.52//
GSP27moksop_u:7538: raṅgāḥ khamūnikāḥ kampā guruhāś cāruhās tathā //MU_3,36.54//
GSP27moksop_u:7541: kailāso vasumān merus tatpatheṣu janā ime /
GSP27moksop_u:7545: ambalāḥ prasthalāś śākāḥ kṣemadhūrtaya eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:7549: tato maṇimatī bhūmiś śyāmākā khacarās tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:7551: dānadāś śūrakāś caiva vāṭādhārās tathaiva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:7553: tato vai taṭakādarśā danturādarśa eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:7556: himavān vasumān kauñjaḥ kailāsaś cetyagās tathā //MU_3,36.63//
GSP27moksop_u:7558: atha prāguttarasyāṃ tvam imāñ janapadāñ śṛṇu //MU_3,36.64//
GSP27moksop_u:7559: kaulūtā brahmaputrāś ca kuvindāś ca dinādanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7560: maḍavā naṣṭarājyāś ca vanarāṣṭrās tathaiva ca //MU_3,36.65//
GSP27moksop_u:7564: kirātāḥ paśupālāś ca cīnās svarṇamahī tataḥ //MU_3,36.67//
GSP27moksop_u:7565: devasthalopavanabhūs tadanūditaśrīr viśvāvasos tadanu mandiram uttamarddhi /
GSP27moksop_u:7566: kailāsabhūs tadanu muñjavanaś ca śailo vidyādharāmaravihāravimānabhūmiḥ //MU_3,36.68//
GSP27moksop_u:7571: ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti vṛndānupātini //MU_3,37.1//
GSP27moksop_u:7572: ete cānye ca bahavas tatra bhasmatvam āgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7575: tān imāñ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi pakṣyāṃl līlāmahībhṛtaḥ //MU_3,37.3//
GSP27moksop_u:7615: ābhīreṣv arayaḥ petur gogaṇā hariteṣv iva //MU_3,37.23//
GSP27moksop_u:7627: tad dṛṣṭaṃ vīcivalayair lolaiḥ plutam ivārṇave //MU_3,37.29//
GSP27moksop_u:7633: aṅgair anaṅgatāṃ nītvā bhairavair iva garjitam //MU_3,37.32//
GSP27moksop_u:7641: śavībhūtā divaṃ nītā dṛṣṭā vidyādharā iva //MU_3,37.36//
GSP27moksop_u:7651: layam ājagmur ābuddham iddhe 'gnāv indhanaṃ yathā //MU_3,37.41//
GSP27moksop_u:7655: nimagnā vandilā mandāḥ paṅke jīrṇagajā iva //MU_3,37.43//
GSP27moksop_u:7677: pātayitvā yayuḥ karṇān daśārṇās tarṇakā iva //MU_3,37.54//
GSP27moksop_u:7683: guṇā iva khalākrāntā gatā vyaktam aśaktatām //MU_3,37.57//
GSP27moksop_u:7687: paṇḍitā iva vādeṣu nodvignā na parājitāḥ //MU_3,37.59//
GSP27moksop_u:7691: vāsukir api varṇayituṃ na samartho raṇavaraṃ nāma //MU_3,37.61//
GSP27moksop_u:7710: dūtāḥ parasparaṃ dattā yuddhaṃ saṃhriyatām iti //MU_3,38.8//
GSP27moksop_u:7714: balayor ārurohaika eko yodho dhruvo yathā //MU_3,38.10//
GSP27moksop_u:7716: dyām eva dīrgham indvaṃśuṃ yuddhaṃ saṃhriyatām iti //MU_3,38.11//
GSP27moksop_u:7720: pravṛttāś śoṣam āgantuṃ śāradyas sarito yathā //MU_3,38.13//
GSP27moksop_u:7810: raṇodyānaṃ mṛtyos tad abhavad aśuṣkāyudhalataṃ saśailaṃ kalpānte jagad iva viparyastam akhilam //MU_3,38.58//
GSP27moksop_u:7823: saṅkocam āyayuḥ padmā mṛtānāṃ hṛdayeṣv iva //MU_3,39.5//
GSP27moksop_u:7825: kulāyeṣu khagā āsan sarvāṅgeṣv iva hetayaḥ //MU_3,39.6//
GSP27moksop_u:7891: atha te lalane vyoma tat parityajya tad gṛham /
GSP27moksop_u:7894: iyanmātram idaṃ sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ vāgvidāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:7899: rodhito 'ham aneneti na māmy atreti yasya dhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7903: vāri naivordhvam āyāti nādho gacchati pāvakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7904: yā yathaiva pravṛttā cit sā tathaivāvatiṣṭhate //MU_3,40.13//
GSP27moksop_u:7907: yā yathā sampravṛttā cit sā tathaiva sthitiṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:7910: nivartate 'nyathā tv eṣa tiṣṭhaty eva yathāsthitam //MU_3,40.16//
GSP27moksop_u:7911: yathā saṃvit tathā cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ tathehitam /
GSP27moksop_u:7912: bālaṃ praty api saṃsiddham etat ko nānubhūyate //MU_3,40.17//
GSP27moksop_u:7916: vidyate vedanātve tat kvacid etīva hṛdgatāt //MU_3,40.19//
GSP27moksop_u:7927: yatheccham ambare yāti jaṭhare 'pi ca bhūbhṛtām /
GSP27moksop_u:7934: ākāśātmā mahān bhūtvā vetti prakṛtitāṃ gataḥ //MU_3,40.28//
GSP27moksop_u:7938: kiṃ cittam etad bhavati kiṃ vā bhavati no katham /
GSP27moksop_u:7939: katham evaṃmayād rūpān nānyad bhavati vā kṣaṇāt //MU_3,40.30//
GSP27moksop_u:7941: pratyekam eva yac cittaṃ tad evaṃrūpaśaktimat /
GSP27moksop_u:7944: nimeṣāt kasyacit kalpāt kasyacit tat kramaṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,40.32//
GSP27moksop_u:7946: kṣaṇāc cirād vodety āśu tatremaṃ tvaṃ kramaṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,40.33//
GSP27moksop_u:7949: tadante tanute sargaṃ sarva eva pṛthak pṛthak /
GSP27moksop_u:7958: videhamuktatāṃ yānti smṛteḥ ka iva sambhavaḥ //MU_3,40.38//
GSP27moksop_u:7961: adyatve te hi ye jīvās teṣāṃ maraṇajanmasu /
GSP27moksop_u:7963: jīvo hi mṛtimūrchānte yad antaḥ pronmiṣann iva /
GSP27moksop_u:7965: tad vyoma prakṛtis soktā tad avyaktaṃ jaḍājaḍam /
GSP27moksop_u:7966: saṃsṛter asmṛteś caiva krama eṣa bhavodaye //MU_3,40.42//
GSP27moksop_u:7967: bodhonmukhatve hi mahat tat prabuddhaṃ yadā bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:7970: tad eva budhyate dehaṃ sa eṣo 'sty ātivāhikaḥ //MU_3,40.44//
GSP27moksop_u:7974: udyanty anuditā eva vāyau spandakriyā iva //MU_3,40.46//
GSP27moksop_u:7975: vṛddhim ittham ayaṃ yāto mudhaiva bhuvanabhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7977: yadaiva mriyate jantuḥ paśyaty āśu tadaiva saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:7979: vyomnaivānubhavaty accham ahaṃ jagad iti bhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:7986: iyaṃ mātā dhanam idaṃ mamety uditavāsanam //MU_3,40.51//
GSP27moksop_u:7988: bālo 'bhūvam ahaṃ tv adya yuveti vilasan hṛdi //MU_3,40.52//
GSP27moksop_u:7995: yatraiṣa mriyate jīvas tatraivaṃ paśyati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:8000: yā brahmaṇy upabṛṃhāḍhye tāḥ ke gaṇayituṃ kṣamāḥ //MU_3,40.58//
GSP27moksop_u:8001: evaṃ kuḍyamayaṃ viśvaṃ nāsty eva mananād ṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:8002: mananaṃ ca kham evātas tad idānīṃ vicāraya //MU_3,40.59//
GSP27moksop_u:8003: yad eva tac cidākāśaṃ tad eva paramaṃ smṛtaṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:8004: mananaṃ ca cidākāśaṃ tad eva paramaṃ padam //MU_3,40.60//
GSP27moksop_u:8005: yad evāmbu sa āvarto na tv asty āvarta vastusat /
GSP27moksop_u:8006: dṛṣṭvaivāste dṛśyam iva dṛśyaṃ na tv asti vastusat //MU_3,40.61//
GSP27moksop_u:8007: cidvyomno bhūtanabhasi kacanaṃ yan maṇer iva /
GSP27moksop_u:8008: taj jagad bhāti nānātmaratnaṃ śvabhram ivāmbare //MU_3,40.62//
GSP27moksop_u:8010: tvadbuddhārthas tu nāsty eva tvamahaṃśabdakāv api //MU_3,40.63//
GSP27moksop_u:8013: yatra tatra tadā vyomni yathākāśaṃ yathepsitam /
GSP27moksop_u:8014: udayaṃ kurutas tena tadgṛhe te sthitiṃ gate //MU_3,40.65//
GSP27moksop_u:8015: sarvatra sambhavati cidgaganaṃ tadantas tadvedanaṃ kalanam āmananaṃ visāri /
GSP27moksop_u:8016: tac cātivāhikam ihāhur akuḍyam eva dehaṃ kathaṃ ka iva taṃ vada kiṃ ruṇaddhi //MU_3,40.66//
GSP27moksop_u:8019: tayoḥ praviṣṭayor devyoḥ padmasadma babhūva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:8024: savasantaṃ vanam iva phullaṃ prātar ivāmbujam //MU_3,41.3//
GSP27moksop_u:8029: nimeṣam iva sañcintya sa vismitamanā nṛpaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8042: tayoḥ pādeṣu santyajya viveśa purato nataḥ //MU_3,41.12//
GSP27moksop_u:8043: uvāca devī he rājan kas tvam kasya sutaḥ kadā /
GSP27moksop_u:8044: iha jāta iti śrutvā sa mantrī vākyam abravīt //MU_3,41.13//
GSP27moksop_u:8045: devyau yuṣmatprasādo 'yaṃ bhavatyor api yat puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8046: vaktuṃ śaknomi tad idaṃ śrūyatāṃ janma matprabhoḥ //MU_3,41.14//
GSP27moksop_u:8050: tasya viśvarathaḥ putras tasya putro bṛhadrathaḥ //MU_3,41.16//
GSP27moksop_u:8051: tasya sindhurathaḥ putras tasya śailarathas sutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8052: tasya kāmarathaḥ putras tasya putro mahārathaḥ //MU_3,41.17//
GSP27moksop_u:8053: tasya viṣṇurathaḥ putras tasya putraḥ kalārathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8054: tasya sūryarathaḥ putras tasya putro nabhorathaḥ //MU_3,41.18//
GSP27moksop_u:8058: jāto mātus sumitrāyā gauryā guha ivāparaḥ //MU_3,41.20//
GSP27moksop_u:8059: pitāsya daśavarṣasya dattvā rājyaṃ vanaṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8063: ity ayaṃ vasudhādhīśo vidūratha iti śrutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8065: ity uktvā saṃsthite tūṣṇīṃ mantriṇy avanipe tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:8067: rājan smara vivekena pūrvajātim imāṃ svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:8068: vadantī mūrdhni pasparśa taṃ kareṇa sarasvatī //MU_3,41.25//
GSP27moksop_u:8077: he devyau kim idaṃ nāma dinam ekaṃ mṛtasya me /
GSP27moksop_u:8078: gatam adyeha yātāni vayo varṣāṇi saptatiḥ //MU_3,41.30//
GSP27moksop_u:8084: tasminn eva gṛhe 'thāsmin naiva vetsy atha vacmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:8085: ayaṃ tasya gṛhasyāntar vyomany eva kila sthitaḥ //MU_3,41.33//
GSP27moksop_u:8087: tasyāntar idam ābhāti pratyekaṃ ca jagadgṛham //MU_3,41.34//
GSP27moksop_u:8088: kila brāhmaṇagehāntar jīvas te madvarāt sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8089: tatraiva tasya bhūpīṭhaṃ tasmiṃś ca nijamaṇḍapaḥ //MU_3,41.35//
GSP27moksop_u:8095: yathedaṃ nāma me janma tathekṣvākukulaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:8097: jāto 'ham abhavaṃ bālo daśavarśasya me pitā /
GSP27moksop_u:8098: parivrāḍ vipinaṃ yāta iha rājye 'bhiṣicya mām //MU_3,41.39//
GSP27moksop_u:8099: tato digvijayaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GSP27moksop_u:8104: yuddhaṃ kṛtvedam āyāto gṛham asmi yathāsthitam //MU_3,41.42//
GSP27moksop_u:8105: ime devyau gṛhaṃ prāpte mamaite pūjayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:8106: pūjitā hi prayacchanti devatās svaṃ samīhitam //MU_3,41.43//
GSP27moksop_u:8110: śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam //MU_3,41.45//
GSP27moksop_u:8114: yasminn eva muhūrte tvaṃ mṛtim abhyāgataḥ purā /
GSP27moksop_u:8115: tadaiva pratibhaiṣā te svayam abhyuditā hṛdi //MU_3,41.47//
GSP27moksop_u:8117: kṣipram eva nadīvāhaś citpravāhas tathaiva vaḥ //MU_3,41.48//
GSP27moksop_u:8119: kadācid evaṃ sargaśrīr miśrāmiśrā ca vardhate //MU_3,41.49//
GSP27moksop_u:8121: etaj jālam asadrūpaṃ cidbhāge sad iva sthitam //MU_3,41.50//
GSP27moksop_u:8129: vastutas tu na jāto 'si na mṛto 'si kadācana //MU_3,41.54//
GSP27moksop_u:8131: paśyasīvaitad akhilaṃ na ca paśyasi kiñcana //MU_3,41.55//
GSP27moksop_u:8134: vastutas tu na bhūpīṭham idam na ca bhavān ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:8135: na ceme girayo grāmā na ceha na ca vai vayam //MU_3,41.57//
GSP27moksop_u:8139: bhāti tasyodare vyomni tavedaṃ vitataṃ jagat //MU_3,41.59//
GSP27moksop_u:8140: yasmiñ jagati gehe 'ntar yasmin vayam iha sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8141: evaṃ teṣāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vyoma vyomaiva nirmalam //MU_3,41.60//
GSP27moksop_u:8142: teṣu maṇḍapakheṣv asti na mahī na ca pattanam /
GSP27moksop_u:8143: na vanāni va śailaughā na meghasaridarṇavāḥ //MU_3,41.61//
GSP27moksop_u:8144: kevalaṃ tatra niśśūnye viharanti gṛhe janāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8145: na paśyanti jagan nāpi pārthivān na ca bhūdharān //MU_3,41.62//
GSP27moksop_u:8147: evaṃ cet tat kathaṃ devi mamehānucarā ime /
GSP27moksop_u:8148: sampannā ātmanā santi te kim ātmani nāthavā //MU_3,41.63//
GSP27moksop_u:8149: jagat svapnārthavad bhāti tatra svapne navādrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8150: katham ātmani satyās syur nāsatyā veti me vada //MU_3,41.64//
GSP27moksop_u:8153: na kiñcid etat sadrūpaṃ cidvyomātmasu jāgatam //MU_3,41.65//
GSP27moksop_u:8155: rajjvāṃ sarpabhrame śānte punas sarpabhramaḥ kutaḥ //MU_3,41.66//
GSP27moksop_u:8161: ahaṃ jagac ceti kuśabdakārthavarjaṃ yad asty aṅganavācikaṃ tat //MU_3,41.69//
GSP27moksop_u:8163: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:8164: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_3,41.70//
GSP27moksop_u:8167: yas tv abuddhamatir mūḍho rūḍho na vitate pade /
GSP27moksop_u:8168: vajrasāram idaṃ tasya jagad asty asad eva sat //MU_3,42.1//
GSP27moksop_u:8170: asad eva sadākāraṃ tathā mūḍhamater jagat //MU_3,42.2//
GSP27moksop_u:8171: tāpa eva yathā vāri mṛgāṇāṃ bhramakāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:8172: asatyam eva satyābhaṃ tathā mūḍhadhiyāṃ jagat //MU_3,42.3//
GSP27moksop_u:8173: yathā svapne mṛtir jantor asatyā satyarūpiṇī /
GSP27moksop_u:8176: kaṭakajñaptir evāsti na manāg api hemadhīḥ //MU_3,42.5//
GSP27moksop_u:8178: iyaṃ dṛśyadṛg evāsti na tv anyā paramārthadṛk //MU_3,42.6//
GSP27moksop_u:8180: asatyās satyatāṃ yātā tathedaṃ durdṛśāṃ jagat //MU_3,42.7//
GSP27moksop_u:8182: atrānye svapnapuruṣā yathā satyās tathā śṛṇu //MU_3,42.8//
GSP27moksop_u:8185: tat sarvagaṃ sarvaśakti sarvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:8186: yatra yatra yathodeti tathāste tatra tatra vai //MU_3,42.10//
GSP27moksop_u:8187: tena svapnapure draṣṭā yān vetti puravāsinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8188: narān iti narā eva kṣaṇāt tasya bhavanti te //MU_3,42.11//
GSP27moksop_u:8192: ātmany ato digdvayena dvayor apy eti satyatā //MU_3,42.13//
GSP27moksop_u:8194: svapne te svapnapuruṣā na satyās syur mune yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:8195: vada tat ko bhaved doṣo māyāmātraśarīriṇi //MU_3,42.14//
GSP27moksop_u:8198: pramāṇam atra śṛṇu me pratyakṣaṃ nāma netarat //MU_3,42.15//
GSP27moksop_u:8200: tatsaṅkalpakalā viśvam evaṃ svapnābham eva tat //MU_3,42.16//
GSP27moksop_u:8201: evaṃ viśvam idaṃ svapnas tatra satyaṃ bhavān mama /
GSP27moksop_u:8202: yathaiva tvaṃ tathaivānye svapne svapnaṃ tathā nṛṇām //MU_3,42.17//
GSP27moksop_u:8203: svapne nagaravāstavyās satyā na syur ime yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:8204: tad ihāpi tadākāre na satyaṃ me bhavān api //MU_3,42.18//
GSP27moksop_u:8205: yathāhaṃ tava satyātmā satyam evaṃ bhavān mama /
GSP27moksop_u:8207: saṃsāravipule svapne yathā satyam ahaṃ tava /
GSP27moksop_u:8208: tathā tvam api me satyaṃ sarvasvapneṣv iti kramaḥ //MU_3,42.20//
GSP27moksop_u:8215: etad āstām idaṃ tāvad yaj jāgrad iti manyase /
GSP27moksop_u:8217: evaṃ sarvam idaṃ bhāti na satyaṃ satyavat sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:8219: sarvatra vartate sarvaṃ dehasyāntar bahis tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:8220: yat tu vetti yathā saṃvit tat tathāśv eva paśyati //MU_3,42.25//
GSP27moksop_u:8221: yat kośe vidyate dravyaṃ tad dṛṣṭvā labhyate yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:8222: tathāsti sarvaṃ cidvyomni labhyate yat pracetyate //MU_3,42.26//
GSP27moksop_u:8227: tad evam eṣa rājaṃs tvaṃ līlārtham upavarṇitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8232: mamāpi darśanaṃ devi moghaṃ bhavati nārthini /
GSP27moksop_u:8234: ahaṃ dehaṃ samutsṛjya lokāntaram itaḥ param /
GSP27moksop_u:8235: nijam āyāmi he devi svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ yathā //MU_3,42.31//
GSP27moksop_u:8238: yaṃ pradeśam aham yāmi tam evāyātv ayaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:8239: mantrī kumārī caiveyaṃ bāleti kuru me dayām //MU_3,42.33//
GSP27moksop_u:8241: āgaccha rājyam ucitāṅgavicāracāru prāgjanmamaṇḍalavare kuru nirviśaṅkam /
GSP27moksop_u:8242: asmābhir arthijanakāmanirākṛtir hi dṛṣṭā na kācana kadācid apīti viddhi //MU_3,42.34//
GSP27moksop_u:8247: prāptavyaṃ prāktanaṃ rājyam etat pratyakṣam eva me //MU_3,43.1//
GSP27moksop_u:8248: kumāryā mantriṇā caiva tvayā ca prāktanaṃ puram /
GSP27moksop_u:8250: āvāṃ yāvo yathāyātaṃ vātarūpeṇa ca tvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:8251: āgantavyaś ca taddeśaḥ kumāryā mantriṇāpi ca //MU_3,43.3//
GSP27moksop_u:8252: anyaiva gatir aśvasya gatir anyā kharoṣṭrayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8255: tāvad praviśya sambhrānta uvācordhvaṃ sthito naraḥ //MU_3,43.5//
GSP27moksop_u:8263: balāt proḍḍayanaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttā garuḍā iva //MU_3,43.9//
GSP27moksop_u:8266: udabhūt pūrayann āśā bahiḥ kolāhalo mahān //MU_3,43.10//
GSP27moksop_u:8273: atha vātāyanād devyau mantrī rājā vidūrathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8301: atha śuśrāva tatrāsau giro rājā vidūrathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8313: asya mātā pitā bhrātā jāmātā tanayas sutā /
GSP27moksop_u:8314: asmin sadmani nirdagdhā dagdhaiṣām antam icchati //MU_3,43.34//
GSP27moksop_u:8315: hā hā hā gaccha bhoś śīghram etad aṅgāramandiram /
GSP27moksop_u:8316: itaḥ pravṛttaṃ patituṃ sumeroś śikharaṃ yathā //MU_3,43.35//
GSP27moksop_u:8319: hetipravāhā jvalanaṃ nabhas sarve viśanty aho /
GSP27moksop_u:8340: kuśāgreṣv iva viśrāntim eti kārṣāṇavī śikhā //MU_3,43.47//
GSP27moksop_u:8341: dahyamāno 'pi niryāti na kalatraṃ vinā naraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8351: aho nu viṣamaṃ vairaṃ vartate vṛttivarjitam /
GSP27moksop_u:8373: tad viveśa gṛhaṃ lakṣmīr iva paṅkajakoṭaram //MU_3,44.1//
GSP27moksop_u:8378: atha tasyā vayasyaikā rājānaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat /
GSP27moksop_u:8381: śaraṇaṃ devam āyātā vātārteva latā drumam //MU_3,44.5//
GSP27moksop_u:8386: pūreṇāśaṅkam āyātaiḥ parair naḥ puram āhṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:8389: vahnibhir naḥ puraṃ vyāptaṃ parayodhaiś ca bhūribhiḥ //MU_3,44.9//
GSP27moksop_u:8391: ākrandantyo balān nītāḥ kurarya iva dhīvaraiḥ //MU_3,44.10//
GSP27moksop_u:8392: iti no yeyam āyātā śākhā prasaraśālinī /
GSP27moksop_u:8393: āpat tām alam uddhartuṃ devasyaivāsti śaktitā //MU_3,44.11//
GSP27moksop_u:8394: ity ākarṇyāvalokyāsau devyau yuddhāya yāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:8401: kim idaṃ devi me brūhi kasmād iyam ahaṃ sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:8402: yā sābhavam ahaṃ pūrvaṃ kathaṃ seyam iha sthitā //MU_3,44.15//
GSP27moksop_u:8404: sarva eva ta eveme sthitās tatra tathaiva ye //MU_3,44.16//
GSP27moksop_u:8405: tatrāpīdam ayaṃ devi sarve katham iha sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8406: bahir antaś ca makura ivaite kiṃ pracetanāḥ //MU_3,44.17//
GSP27moksop_u:8408: yathā jñaptir udety antas tathānubhavati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:8409: citiś cetyārthatām eti cittaṃ cittārthatām iva //MU_3,44.18//
GSP27moksop_u:8413: bāhyam asty antaraṃ bhāti svapnārtho 'tra nidarśanam //MU_3,44.20//
GSP27moksop_u:8415: tad etad bāhyanāmnaiva svābhyāsāt susphuṭaṃ sthitam //MU_3,44.21//
GSP27moksop_u:8416: yādṛgbhāvo mṛto bhartā tava tasmiṃs tadā pure /
GSP27moksop_u:8418: anya eva hy amī bhṛtyās tebhyas tatsadṛśā api /
GSP27moksop_u:8421: tasya tāvad vada kathaṃ kīdṛśī vāpy asatyatā //MU_3,44.24//
GSP27moksop_u:8423: tad īdṛk sarvam evedaṃ tatra kā nāstikādhikā //MU_3,44.25//
GSP27moksop_u:8424: svapno jāgraty asadrūpas svapne jāgrad asadvapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8425: mṛtir janmany asadrūpā mṛtau janmāpy asanmayam //MU_3,44.26//
GSP27moksop_u:8427: evaṃ na san nāsad idaṃ bhrāntimātraṃ vibhāsate //MU_3,44.27//
GSP27moksop_u:8429: na kadācana yan nāśi tad brahmaivāsti taj jagat //MU_3,44.28//
GSP27moksop_u:8431: vyomni keśoṇḍukānīva na kacanti tu vastutaḥ //MU_3,44.29//
GSP27moksop_u:8432: yathā taraṅgā jaladhau tathemās sṛṣṭayaḥ pare /
GSP27moksop_u:8436: bhrāntayaś ca na tatrānyās tās tā eva paraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:8437: ghane tamasi yakṣābhā tama eva na yakṣakāḥ //MU_3,44.32//
GSP27moksop_u:8438: tasmāj janma mṛtir moho vyomāhaṃ tvam idaṃ tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:8439: sarvaṃ tac ca mahākalpaśāntau yad avaśiṣyate //MU_3,44.33//
GSP27moksop_u:8440: nātas satyam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na cāsatyaṃ kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:8441: dvayam evaitad atha vā brahma tatraiva sambhavat //MU_3,44.34//
GSP27moksop_u:8443: jīvāṇur yatra tatredaṃ jagad vetti nijaṃ vapuḥ //MU_3,44.35//
GSP27moksop_u:8448: yathā vāyau sthitas spanda āmodaś śaityam ambare /
GSP27moksop_u:8453: ananyās svātmanas te syus taror avayavā iva //MU_3,44.40//
GSP27moksop_u:8455: riktaṃ tad viśvaśabdārthair ananyad brahmaṇi sthitam //MU_3,44.41//
GSP27moksop_u:8456: na tat satyaṃ na cāsatyaṃ rajjvāṃ sarpabhramopamam /
GSP27moksop_u:8458: paramaṃ kāraṇaṃ vittvāj jīvatvam iva vetty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:8459: atas tad evānubhavañ jīvatvaṃ vindate sphuṭam //MU_3,44.43//
GSP27moksop_u:8460: satyaṃ bhavaty asatyaṃ vā khe 'pi bhātam idaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:8463: apūrvānubhavāḥ kāścit samāś caivāsamāś ca tāḥ //MU_3,44.45//
GSP27moksop_u:8464: kvacit kadācit tā eva kvacid eva samā api /
GSP27moksop_u:8467: ta eva mantriṇaḥ paurāḥ pratibhāne bhavanti vaḥ //MU_3,44.47//
GSP27moksop_u:8468: te caivātmany alaṃ satyā deśakālehitais samāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8475: yādṛśī yatra sā tatra tathodeti nirantarā //MU_3,44.51//
GSP27moksop_u:8477: sā bahiḥ khe cidādarśapratibimbād iyaṃ sthitā //MU_3,44.52//
GSP27moksop_u:8478: eṣā tvam ambaram ahaṃ bhuvanaṃ dharādi rājeti sarvam ajam eva vibhātamātram /
GSP27moksop_u:8479: cidvyoma bilvajaṭharaṃ vidur aṅga viddhi tvaṃ ceti śāntam alam āssva yathāsthiteha //MU_3,44.53//
GSP27moksop_u:8483: vidūrathas te bhartaiṣa tanuṃ tyaktvā raṇāṅgane /
GSP27moksop_u:8486: ity ākarṇya vaco devyā līlā sā tatpurāspadā /
GSP27moksop_u:8489: devī bhagavatī jñaptir nityam eva mayārcitā /
GSP27moksop_u:8490: svapneṣu darśanaṃ devi sā dadāti niśāsu me //MU_3,45.3//
GSP27moksop_u:8491: sā yādṛg eva deveśi tādṛg eva tvam ambike /
GSP27moksop_u:8492: tvaṃ me kṛpaṇakāruṇyād varaṃ dehi varānane //MU_3,45.4//
GSP27moksop_u:8494: ity uktā sā tadā jñaptis smṛtvā tad bhaktibhāvanām /
GSP27moksop_u:8495: idaṃ prasannā provāca tāṃ līlāṃ tatpurāspadām //MU_3,45.5//
GSP27moksop_u:8500: raṇe dehaṃ parityajya yatra tiṣṭhati me patiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8503: evam astu tvayāvighnaṃ pūjitāsmi sute ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:8510: tvādṛśās sarvam evāśu teṣāṃ siddhyaty abhīpsitam //MU_3,45.10//
GSP27moksop_u:8511: tat tenaiva śarīreṇa kim arthaṃ nāham īśvari /
GSP27moksop_u:8512: lokāntaram imaṃ nītā taṃ girigrāmakaṃ ca vā //MU_3,45.11//
GSP27moksop_u:8514: na kiñcit kasyacid ahaṃ karomi varavarṇini /
GSP27moksop_u:8515: sarvaṃ sampādayaty āśu svayaṃ jīvas samīhitam //MU_3,45.12//
GSP27moksop_u:8518: jīvasyodety ahaṃśaktir yasya yasya yathā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:8519: bhāti tatphaladā nityaṃ tasya tasya tathā tathā //MU_3,45.14//
GSP27moksop_u:8521: yathā bhavaty adehāsyāṃ muktāsmīti ciraṃ tadā //MU_3,45.15//
GSP27moksop_u:8522: tena tena prakāreṇa tvaṃ mayā samprabodhitā /
GSP27moksop_u:8527: phalaṃ dadāti kālena tasya tasya tathā tathā //MU_3,45.18//
GSP27moksop_u:8528: tapo vā devatā vāpi bhūtvā saiva cid avyayā /
GSP27moksop_u:8531: phalaṃ bhavati tenāśu yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_3,45.20//
GSP27moksop_u:8532: cidbhāva eva nanu sarvagato 'ntarātmā yaś cetati prayatate ca tad eti tacchrīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8533: ramyaṃ na ramyam athaveti vicārya tasmād yat pāvanaṃ tad avabudhya tad antar āssva //MU_3,45.21//
GSP27moksop_u:8538: vidūrathaḥ kim akaron nirgatya kupito gṛhāt //MU_3,46.1//
GSP27moksop_u:8572: dadṛśus tanmahāyuddhaṃ dve līle sā kumārikā /
GSP27moksop_u:8596: abhavat kevalaṃ yuddhaṃ saśabdam asamaṃ bhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:8599: jhaṇajhaṇaravasaṃmilanmahāstraṃ niśi navaraṇam āsa suptavat tat //MU_3,46.31//
GSP27moksop_u:8606: devi kasmād akasmān no bhartā jayati no raṇe /
GSP27moksop_u:8607: vada tvayy api tuṣṭāyām asmin vidrutavāraṇe //MU_3,47.2//
GSP27moksop_u:8611: tenāsāv eva jayati jīyate na vidūrathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8612: jñaptir antargatā saṃvid eṣāsau yad yathā yadā //MU_3,47.4//
GSP27moksop_u:8613: codayaty āśu tat tasya tadā sampādayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:8614: yo yathā codayati māṃ tasya tiṣṭhāmi tatphalā //MU_3,47.5//
GSP27moksop_u:8615: na svabhāvodyataṃ dhatte vahner auṣṇyam ivaiṣa me /
GSP27moksop_u:8616: jayas syān mama saṃgrāma ity anenāsmi pūjitā //MU_3,47.6//
GSP27moksop_u:8617: pratimārūpiṇī tena phalam āpnoty asau tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:8619: anena caiva muktas syām aham ity asmi bhāvitā /
GSP27moksop_u:8620: tasmād vidūratho dehaṃ taṃ prāpya saha bhāryayā //MU_3,47.8//
GSP27moksop_u:8621: tvayānayā ca kālena bāle mukto bhaviṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:8622: etadīyas tv ayaṃ śatrus sindhunāma mahīpatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8625: evaṃ devyāṃ vadantyāṃ tu balayor yudhyamānayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8628: asṛjīva śavāny āsan sandhyāyāṃ tārakā divi //MU_3,47.12//
GSP27moksop_u:8647: etasminn antare senās sarvās saṅkṣayam āyayuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8667: bhārān dadhadbhiḥ kuntānāṃ śarāṇāṃ dhanuṣām api /
GSP27moksop_u:8669: tatra tau kṣaṇam āvṛtya maṇḍalair bhūrimaṇḍalaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8677: kecic chaktimukhā bāṇāḥ kecit kṣuramukhā api /
GSP27moksop_u:8681: pralayapavanapātitāḥ śilaughā iva vicaranti śilīmukhās tadā sma /
GSP27moksop_u:8686: prāpya rājā puraḥ prāptaṃ sindhum uddhurakandharam /
GSP27moksop_u:8690: visasarjorjito rājā prātar arkaḥ karān iva /
GSP27moksop_u:8692: eka eva viniryāti guṇāt tasya śaro mahān /
GSP27moksop_u:8693: sahasraṃ patati vyomni gacchan patati lakṣaśaḥ //MU_3,48.4//
GSP27moksop_u:8694: sindhor api tathaivāsīc chaktir lāghavam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:8695: raver ānanasāmyaṃ vai viṣṇor dhānuṣkatā tayoḥ //MU_3,48.5//
GSP27moksop_u:8701: abdher iva payaḥpūrās sūryād iva marīcayaḥ //MU_3,48.8//
GSP27moksop_u:8704: dhārāḥ payomuca iva śīkarā iva nirjharāt /
GSP27moksop_u:8716: jaya devi jayaty eṣa nātho 'smākaṃ vilokaya /
GSP27moksop_u:8717: kilānena śaraughena merur apy eti cūrṇatām //MU_3,48.16//
GSP27moksop_u:8724: yathā dīpasya śāntasya na parijñāyate gatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8725: tasya sāyakasaṅghasya na vijñātā tathā gatiḥ //MU_3,48.20//
GSP27moksop_u:8728: vidūrathas tam apy āśu vyadhamat sāyakottamaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8733: prāptaṃ tena yayur lokā vinā mohaṃ vidūratham //MU_3,48.24//
GSP27moksop_u:8738: tataḥ prabodham āpannā prajā prātar ivābjinī /
GSP27moksop_u:8742: sarpair vivalitā bhūmir mṛṇālais sarasī yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:8749: udagur garuḍās tena sauvarṇā iva parvatāḥ //MU_3,48.32//
GSP27moksop_u:8757: viśālam iva nīrandhram iva nirvāri rāśi vā //MU_3,48.36//
GSP27moksop_u:8765: matsyā ivābhavañ śailās tārāś ca maṇayo 'bhavan //MU_3,48.40//
GSP27moksop_u:8769: kalpānta iva saṃśemur vyavahārā diśāṃ prati //MU_3,48.42//
GSP27moksop_u:8806: jitvā ripuṃ punar asau yathā praharate tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:8818: tām agnisantatiṃ pītvā pūrayām āsa bhūtalam /
GSP27moksop_u:8821: mitho māyāmayān agre paśyanty anubhavanti ca //MU_3,48.68//
GSP27moksop_u:8823: tṛṇānīva gatāḥ prohya rathaś cāsyābhavat plutaḥ //MU_3,48.69//
GSP27moksop_u:8824: etasminn antare sindhur astraṃ sasmāra śoṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:8827: ye mṛtās te mṛtā eva babhūvuś śoṣitā bhuvaḥ //MU_3,48.71//
GSP27moksop_u:8869: śamaṃ ca tena śāntena prayayau vāyunā yataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8875: sindhus sindhur ivotpannān mainākādīn itas tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8876: vajrāstram asṛjad dīptaṃ terur vajraghanās tataḥ //MU_3,49.8//
GSP27moksop_u:8884: sandhyāyām iva bhītyeva divasaś śyāmatāṃ yayau //MU_3,49.12//
GSP27moksop_u:8888: ūrdhvakeśāḥ kṛśāṅgāś ca kecic ca śmaśrulā api //MU_3,49.14//
GSP27moksop_u:8889: kṛśāṅgā malināṅgāś ca grāmyā iva nabhaścarāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8891: dīnā bahvāśinaḥ krūrā dīnā grāmyajanā iva /
GSP27moksop_u:8894: jagṛhus te tadā mattā hataśiṣṭam arer balam //MU_3,49.17//
GSP27moksop_u:8899: viṣṭhāṃ mūtraṃ ca kurvantas sthiram ārabdhanartanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8901: samākrāmati tāvat sa māyāṃ tāṃ bubudhe budhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8905: tasyātha rūpikāstraṃ tad dadau cānyad asau ruṣā /
GSP27moksop_u:8916: jagṛhus tāḥ piśācāṃs tān durbalān duśśiśūn iva //MU_3,49.28//
GSP27moksop_u:8926: yathaiva māyāsañcāras tena tasya kṛtaḥ punaḥ //MU_3,49.33//
GSP27moksop_u:8927: tenāpi tasyāśu tathā kṛto buddhvāśu lāghavam /
GSP27moksop_u:8935: deham āśritya niṣkrāntāḥ pātālān narakā iva /
GSP27moksop_u:8982: svayaṃ kiyadbala iti sindhau tiṣṭhati helayā //MU_3,50.17//
GSP27moksop_u:8984: jvālayām āsa sa rathaṃ sindhoḥ kakṣam ivārasam //MU_3,50.18//
GSP27moksop_u:8988: anyo'nyaṃ śamam āyātau savīryau subhaṭāv iva //MU_3,50.20//
GSP27moksop_u:8990: prāpa dagdhvā vanaṃ sindhuṃ mṛgendram iva kandarāt //MU_3,50.21//
GSP27moksop_u:8997: khaḍgau krakacatāṃ yātau mithaḥ praharatos tayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:8999: śaktim ādāya cikṣepa khaḍgaṃ tyaktvā vidūrathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9005: taddeśalīlā taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagnaṃ tama ivendunā /
GSP27moksop_u:9007: devi paśya nṛsiṃhena hato bhartāyam āvayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9011: hā kaṣṭaṃ ratham ānītaṃ sindhur āroḍhum udyataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9015: pravṛtto ratham ānītam āroḍhuṃ patir eṣa me /
GSP27moksop_u:9018: paśya bhartā madīyo 'sau cakāsti nitarāṃ raṇe //MU_3,50.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9019: hā dhik kaṣṭam asau sindhur āryaputrarathaṃ balāt /
GSP27moksop_u:9020: hariś śvabhram ivarūḍhaḥ plavenontar iva drumam //MU_3,50.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9023: hā hā dhik kaṣṭam etena sindhunā khaḍgadhārayā /
GSP27moksop_u:9024: jaṅghayor me patiś chinnaḥ krakaceneva pādapaḥ //MU_3,50.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9025: hā hā hatāsmi dagdhāsmi mṛtāsmy apahatāsmi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:9026: mṛṇāle iva lūne me patyur dve api jānunī //MU_3,50.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9030: papāta syandane 'py āśu chinnamūla iva drumaḥ //MU_3,50.41//
GSP27moksop_u:9032: yadā tadāhatiṃ tasya kaṇṭhe 'dāt sindhur uddhataḥ //MU_3,50.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9038: tatyāja taṃ bhagavatīm abhito gṛhāntas sūtaḥ praviśya mṛtitalpatale gatārim //MU_3,50.45//
GSP27moksop_u:9042: hato rājā hato rājā pratirājena saṃyuge /
GSP27moksop_u:9043: iti śabde samudbhūte rāṣṭram āsīd bhayākulam //MU_3,51.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9071: ity anantaram āremur bheryaḥ pratipuraṃ tadā //MU_3,51.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9073: prajās sraṣṭuṃ yugasyānte manur jagad ivāparaḥ //MU_3,51.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9077: kṣaṇaṃ niveśayām āsur maṇḍalaṃ prati mantriṇaḥ //MU_3,51.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9078: udabhūd acireṇaiva deśe deśe pure pure /
GSP27moksop_u:9079: jīvite maraṇe māne niyamo yamato yathā //MU_3,51.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9085: jalalavavalanākulās samīrā aśivaguṇā iva sarvataḥ kṣaṇena //MU_3,51.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9094: yatrāvābhyāṃ ca tat sthānaṃ kathaṃ gantavyam ambike //MU_3,52.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9098: na kiñcid api saṃpannaṃ rāṣṭraṃ na ca mahītalam /
GSP27moksop_u:9099: na sthitaṃ kvacanāpy evaṃ svapnātmakam idaṃ yataḥ //MU_3,52.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9107: khātmāvakacati vyakto na kacaty eva vā kvacit //MU_3,52.9//
GSP27moksop_u:9109: udare śūnyam ākāśam evāsti na jagadbhramaḥ //MU_3,52.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9110: bhramadraṣṭur abhāve hi kīdṛśī bhramatā bhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:9111: nāsty eva bhramasattā tu yad asti tad ajaṃ padam //MU_3,52.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9112: bhrame dṛśyam asat tasya draṣṭur draṣṭṛdaśā kutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9113: draṣṭṛdṛśyakramābhāvād atra yat sahajaṃ hi tat //MU_3,52.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9115: svakaṃ kacati cābhātaṃ śāntam ādyam anāmayam //MU_3,52.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9118: na jagat tatra no sargaḥ kaścit tair anubhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:9119: tenāhaṃ jagad ākāśam ajam ity eva vacmi te //MU_3,52.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9121: nedaṃ kuḍyamayaṃ kiñcid yathā svapne mahāpuram //MU_3,52.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9125: trijagac cidaṇāv antar asti svapnapuraṃ yathā //MU_3,52.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9126: tasyāpy antar vibhāgena kramād ekaikaśo jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:9127: teṣāṃ yasmiñ jagaty eva padmo rājā śavas sthitaḥ //MU_3,52.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9128: līlā tava sapatnī taṃ prāptā pūrvataraṃ śubhe /
GSP27moksop_u:9129: yadaiva mūrchām āyātā līleyaṃ puratas tava /
GSP27moksop_u:9130: tadaiva bhartuḥ padmasya śavasya nikaṭe sthitā //MU_3,52.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9132: katham eṣā gatā devi sampannā tatra dehinī /
GSP27moksop_u:9133: kathaṃ kathaṃ vā tatpatnībhāvam āptavatī sthitā //MU_3,52.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9134: te vāsyā vada kiṃ rūpaṃ paśyanty atha vadanti kim /
GSP27moksop_u:9137: śṛṇu sarvaṃ samāsena yathādṛṣṭaṃ vadāmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:9139: padma eva sa bhartaiṣa bhrāntiṃ tāvat tatām imām /
GSP27moksop_u:9140: itthaṃ jaganmayīṃ svasminn eva sadmani paśyati //MU_3,52.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9141: bhrāntiyuddham idaṃ yuddham ime bhrāntijanā janāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9144: tvaṃ caiṣā ca varārohe svapnamātrā varāṅgane //MU_3,52.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9145: tathā bhavatyor bhartaiṣa tathaivāham api svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:9148: evam eṣā tvam evaṃ ca sampannaivam asau nṛpaḥ //MU_3,52.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9150: ime vayam ihānyo'nyaṃ sampannās svoditā iva //MU_3,52.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9164: yadādhibhautikaṃ bhāvaṃ vetty etaṃ tu na sanmayam //MU_3,52.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9167: tvaṃ hi saṃviditānena tvayāvagata eṣa saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9168: itthaṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭavān eṣa dṛṣṭaś caiṣa tvayeti ca //MU_3,52.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9170: brahma sarvagataṃ yasmād yathā yatra yadoditam //MU_3,52.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9171: bhavaty āśu tathā tatra tat svaśaktyaiva paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:9172: sarvatra sarvaśaktitvād yatra yāṃ śaktim unnayan //MU_3,52.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9176: āvayoḥ pitarāv etāv ime caivāpi mātarau //MU_3,52.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9177: deha eṣa dhanaṃ cedaṃ karmedaṃ pūrvam īdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:9178: āvāṃ vivāhitāv evam evaṃ nāmaikatāṃ gatau //MU_3,52.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9179: etayoś cāpi janatā yātā tatraiva satyatām /
GSP27moksop_u:9182: māhaṃ syāṃ vidhavety evaṃ varo datto mayāpy asau //MU_3,52.45//
GSP27moksop_u:9183: ity arthīva mṛtā pūrvam eṣeha khalu bālikā /
GSP27moksop_u:9185: kuladevī sadā pūjyāpy ata etat karomy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:9189: buddho bhāvita ākāro dṛṣṭo jīvātmanā tataḥ //MU_3,52.48//
GSP27moksop_u:9190: sampannaiṣā hariṇanayanā pūrṇacandrānanaśrīr mānonnaddhā dayitavalitā kāntam ābhoktukāmā /
GSP27moksop_u:9191: pūrvasmṛtyā sarabhasamukhī saṃyatāntassvabhāvā svapnastheva prakṛtavibhavā padminīvoditeva //MU_3,52.49//
GSP27moksop_u:9196: patiṃ prāptuṃ prayāmy eṣā nabhomārgeṇa viṣṭapam //MU_3,53.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9199: kumārī tatra sā prāpa jñaptyaiva prahitāṃ hitām /
GSP27moksop_u:9202: duhitāsmi sakhi jñapte svāgataṃ te 'stu sundari /
GSP27moksop_u:9206: mahatāṃ darśanaṃ yasmān na kadācana niṣphalam //MU_3,53.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9208: ehi tatraiva gacchāva ity uktvā sā kumārikā /
GSP27moksop_u:9210: tatas tadanuyātā sā prāpa koṭaram ambaram /
GSP27moksop_u:9217: tathā saṅkalpasiddhā sā brahmāṇḍān nirgatā bahiḥ //MU_3,53.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9229: sā mahīmaṇḍalaṃ śrīmat prāpa tārāpathād adhaḥ //MU_3,53.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9230: tatra tan maṇḍalaṃ prāpya tatpuraṃ taṃ ca maṇḍapam /
GSP27moksop_u:9232: etasminn antare sātra na dadarśa kumārikām /
GSP27moksop_u:9233: māyām iva parijñātāṃ kvāpi yātāṃ varānanā //MU_3,53.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9234: mukham ālokya sā tasya svabhartuś śavarūpinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9236: ayaṃ sa bhartā saṃgrāme nihato mama sindhunā /
GSP27moksop_u:9237: vīralokān imān prāpya kṣaṇaṃ śete yathāsukham //MU_3,53.20//
GSP27moksop_u:9239: iha prāptavatī dhanyā madanyā nāsti kācana //MU_3,53.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9240: iti sañcintya sā haste gṛhītvā cārucāmaram /
GSP27moksop_u:9241: vījayām āsa cāndreṇa taṃ dyaur vāvanimaṇḍalam //MU_3,53.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9243: te bhṛtyās tāś ca vā dāsyas sa rājā vā prabuddhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:9244: vakṣyanti vadatāṃ devi kiṃ kayeva kathaṃ dhiyā //MU_3,53.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9246: sa rājā sā ca te bhṛtyās sarva eva parasparam /
GSP27moksop_u:9250: iyaṃ me sahajā bhāryā mameyaṃ sahajā sakhī /
GSP27moksop_u:9251: mameyaṃ sahajā rājñī bhṛtyo 'yaṃ sahajo mama //MU_3,53.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9252: kevalaṃ tvam ahaṃ sā ca yathāvṛttam akhaṇḍitam /
GSP27moksop_u:9253: jñāsyāma mahadāścaryaṃ na tu kaścid apītaraḥ //MU_3,53.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9259: na samarthās svadehena prāptuṃ chāyā ivātapān //MU_3,53.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9261: yathā satyam alīkena na milaty eva kiñcana //MU_3,53.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9263: nirvetāladhiyas tāvad udayas tasya kaḥ katham //MU_3,53.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9267: iti niścayavān yo 'ntaḥ kathaṃ syāt so 'nyaniścayaḥ //MU_3,53.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9269: puṇyadehe na gacchanti paraṃ lokam anena no //MU_3,53.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9271: ayaṃ devamayīṃ dehaḥ prāpta eva viśīryate //MU_3,53.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9273: yathā saṃvit sa evāhaṃ tathā smṛta iti sthitiḥ //MU_3,53.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9274: yas sarpapratyayo rajjvāṃ sa kathaṃ sarpakāryakṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:9275: ātmany eva hi yo nāsti tasya kā kāryakāritā //MU_3,53.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9276: yat tv etan mṛta ity eva mithyā samanubhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:9285: tasmād ye vedyavettāro ye vā dharmaṃ paraṃ śritāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9288: katham anye sthitiṃ yātu cchāyās te katham ātape //MU_3,54.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9289: līlā viditavedyā no paramaṃ dharmam āśritā /
GSP27moksop_u:9290: kevalaṃ tena sā bhartṛkalpitaṃ nagaraṃ gatā //MU_3,54.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9292: evam eṣā prayātā tu bhartā paśya mamāmbike /
GSP27moksop_u:9298: himādiṣu kathaṃ śaityaṃ kā sattā kālakhādiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:9306: svapne saṃvid yathā hi tvam ākāśagamanādi vā //MU_3,54.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9308: asatyam eva satyābhaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ tad idaṃ smṛtam //MU_3,54.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9309: tatrāntar brahma tad vetti brahmāham ayam ity atha /
GSP27moksop_u:9310: manorājyaṃ sa kurute khātmaiva tad idaṃ jagat //MU_3,54.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9311: tasmin prathamatas sarge yā yathā yatra saṃvidaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9312: kathitās tās tathā tatra sthitā adyāpi niścalāḥ //MU_3,54.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9313: yad yathā sphuritaṃ cittvaṃ tat tathānyatma cid bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:9314: svayam evāniyamitas tatas syān neha kiñcana //MU_3,54.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9315: na ca nāma nakiñcittvaṃ yujyate citsvarūpiṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9316: tyaktvā samastasaṃsthānaṃ hi saṃtiṣṭhatu vai katham //MU_3,54.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9317: sargādau svayam evāntaś cid yathā kacitātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:9319: tasmāt svasattāsantyāgas sataḥ kartuṃ na yujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:9320: yadā cidādes teneyaṃ niyatir na vinaśyati //MU_3,54.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9321: yad yathā kacitaṃ yatra vyomarūpy api pārthivam /
GSP27moksop_u:9322: sargādau tasya calitum adya yāvan na yujyate //MU_3,54.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9323: yā yathā cit prakacitā pratipakṣavidaṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:9324: na sā tataḥ pracalati vedanābhyāsatas svayam //MU_3,54.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9327: asatyam eva satyābhaṃ pratibhānam iti sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:9334: svapne tathā hi puruṣaḥ paśyaty ātmani vāritām //MU_3,54.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9337: khatvaṃ maruttvam urvītvam aptvam agnitvam apy asat /
GSP27moksop_u:9338: vetty antas svapnasaṅkalpadhyāneṣv iva citis svayam //MU_3,54.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9342: puṣṭyādiṣv āyuṣaḥ puṃsāṃ tasyātha niyatiṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,54.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9344: ūnatve cādhikatve ca nṛṇāṃ kāraṇam āyuṣaḥ //MU_3,54.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9345: svakarmadharme hrasati hrasaty āyur nṛṇām iha /
GSP27moksop_u:9346: vṛddhe vṛddhim upāyāti samam eva bhavet same //MU_3,54.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9349: yo yathā śāstram ārabdhaṃ svadharmam anutiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:9350: bhājanaṃ bhavati śrīmān sa yathāśāstram āyuṣaḥ //MU_3,54.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9351: evaṃ karmānusāreṇa jantur antyāṃ daśām itaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9355: kiṃ sukhaṃ maraṇaṃ kiṃ vā duḥkhaṃ mṛtvā ca kiṃ bhavet //MU_3,54.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9359: abhyasya dhāraṇāś ceṣṭā dehaṃ tyaktvā yathāsukham /
GSP27moksop_u:9361: dhāraṇā yasya nābhyāsaṃ prāptā naiva sa muktibhāk /
GSP27moksop_u:9366: mṛtāv anubhavaty antar dāham agnāv iva cyutaḥ //MU_3,54.39//
GSP27moksop_u:9368: gacchaty eṣa vināśātmā tadā bhavati dīnadhīḥ //MU_3,54.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9379: jyotkurvann iva saṃsāraṃ vahnimadhyaṃ spṛśann iva /
GSP27moksop_u:9381: bhramito vā bhrama iva kṛṣṭo raśanayeva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:9391: pūrvāparaṃ na jānāti smṛtis tānavam āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:9396: na tv ādatte yathā prāṇān moham āyāty alaṃ tadā //MU_3,54.54//
GSP27moksop_u:9398: jantuḥ pāṣāṇatām eti sthitam ity ādisargataḥ //MU_3,54.55//
GSP27moksop_u:9400: vyathāṃ vimohaṃ mūrchāṃ ca bhramaṃ vyādhim acetanam /
GSP27moksop_u:9401: kim artham ayam āyāti deho khaṇḍāṅgavān api //MU_3,54.56//
GSP27moksop_u:9403: evaṃ saṃviditaṃ karma sargādau spandanaṃ vidaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9405: syāt kacaty eva viṭapagucchavat tat svabhāvajam /
GSP27moksop_u:9408: tyajanti maruto dehāt pariyānti nijāṃ sthitim //MU_3,54.59//
GSP27moksop_u:9409: praviṣṭā na viniryānti niryātāḥ praviśanti no /
GSP27moksop_u:9410: yadā vātā vināḍitvāt tadāspandān mṛtir bhavet //MU_3,54.60//
GSP27moksop_u:9411: na viśaty eva vā naiva niryāti pavano yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:9412: śarīrān nāḍivaidhurye mṛta ity ucyate tadā //MU_3,54.61//
GSP27moksop_u:9414: pūrvaṃ saṃviditā saṃvid yāti taccoditā mṛtim //MU_3,54.62//
GSP27moksop_u:9419: kvacid āvartavad daussthyaṃ kvacin nadyāṃ jalaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:9420: kvacit saumyaṃ kvacij jīvadharmīdaṃ cetanaṃ tathā //MU_3,54.65//
GSP27moksop_u:9423: na jāyate na mriyate cetanaṃ puruṣaḥ kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:9425: puruṣaś cetanāmātraṃ sa kadā kveva naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:9426: cetanavyatiriktaṃ ca vadānyat kiṃ pumān bhavet //MU_3,54.68//
GSP27moksop_u:9427: kvādya yāvan mṛtaṃ brūhi cetanaṃ kasya kiṃ katham /
GSP27moksop_u:9429: amariṣyat tu cec cittvam ekasminn eva tanmṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:9430: abhaviṣyan sarva eva mṛtā ekamṛtāv iha //MU_3,54.70//
GSP27moksop_u:9433: evaṃ na kiñcin mriyate jāyate na ca kaścana /
GSP27moksop_u:9437: anuditam uditaṃ jagatprabandhaṃ bhavabhayato vyasanair vilokya samyak /
GSP27moksop_u:9438: alam anuditavāsano hi jīvo bhavati vimukta itīha satyam astu //MU_3,54.74//
GSP27moksop_u:9442: yathaiṣa jantur mriyate jāyate ca yathā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9443: tan me kathaya deveśi punar bodhavivṛddhaye //MU_3,55.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9446: jantuḥ prāpnoti hi tadā śāmyatīvāsya cetanam //MU_3,55.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9447: śuddhaṃ hi cetanaṃ nityaṃ nodeti na ca śāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:9448: sthāvare jaṅgame vyomni śaile 'gnau pavane sthitam //MU_3,55.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9450: mṛta ity ucyate dehas tadā sa jaḍanāmakaḥ //MU_3,55.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9451: tasmin dehe śavībhūte vāte khānilatāṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:9453: jīva ity ucyate tasya nāmāṇor vāsanāvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9454: tatraivāste sa ca śavāgāre gaganake tathā //MU_3,55.6//
GSP27moksop_u:9458: sa svapna iva saṅkalpa iva nānākṛtis tadā //MU_3,55.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9459: tasminn eva pradeśe 'ntaḥ pūrvavat smṛtibhāg bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:9463: bhavanti yadvidhāḥ pretās teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu /
GSP27moksop_u:9466: eteṣāṃ kasyacid bhedo dvau trayo 'py atha kasyacit //MU_3,55.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9471: bhuktvā yoniśatāny uccair duḥkhād duḥkhāntaraṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9474: kṣaṇād vṛkṣāditām eva hṛtsthām anubhavanti te //MU_3,55.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9478: sa śilājaṭharaṃ jāḍyaṃ kañcit kālaṃ prapaśyati //MU_3,55.18//
GSP27moksop_u:9479: tataḥ prabudhya kālena kenacid vā tathaiva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:9483: saṅkalpa iva saṅkalpa iva vetti sa tādṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:9484: tasminn eva kṣaṇe tasya smṛtir ittham udety api //MU_3,55.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9490: ta ihottāraṃ kurvantas sthitaṃ paśyanti dehakam //MU_3,55.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9493: tatra cāruphalaṃ bhūtvā praviśya hṛdayaṃ nṛṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:9497: ādau mṛtā vayam iti budhyante tadanukramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:9500: nīyamāno vrajāmy ebhiḥ kṣaṇād yamapuraṃ tv iti //MU_3,55.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9507: ayaṃ prāpto yamapuram ayam eṣa sa bhūtapaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9508: ayaṃ karmavicāro me kṛta ity anubhūtimān //MU_3,55.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9514: gacchāmy āśu śubhaṃ svargam ito narakam eva vā //MU_3,55.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9515: ayaṃ svargo mayā bhukto bhukto 'yaṃ narako 'thavā /
GSP27moksop_u:9516: imās tā yonayo tyaktā jāye 'haṃ saṃsṛtau punaḥ //MU_3,55.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9517: ayaṃ śālir ahaṃ jātaḥ kramāt phalam iha sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:9519: saṃsuptavāsanas tv evaṃ bījatāṃ yāty asau nare /
GSP27moksop_u:9522: bhavyo bhavaty abhavyo vā bālako lalitākṛtiḥ //MU_3,55.40//
GSP27moksop_u:9524: tato jarāṃ padmamukhe himāśanim iva cyutām //MU_3,55.41//
GSP27moksop_u:9527: yāmyaṃ yāti punar lokaṃ punar enaṃ bhramakramam /
GSP27moksop_u:9530: ādisarge yathā devi bhrama eva pravartate /
GSP27moksop_u:9531: tathā kathaya me bhūyaḥ prasādād bodhavṛddhaye //MU_3,55.44//
GSP27moksop_u:9540: pratibimbitam etasmād yat tad adyāpi saṃsthitam //MU_3,55.48//
GSP27moksop_u:9541: yan nāma suśiraṃ sthānaṃ dehānāṃ tadgato 'nilaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9543: sargādāv eva me vaiṣā jaṅgame 'dhiṣṭhitā sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9544: cetanā api nisspandās tena te pādapādayaḥ //MU_3,55.50//
GSP27moksop_u:9546: sa eva saṃvid bhavati śeṣaṃ tad api naiva tat //MU_3,55.51//
GSP27moksop_u:9547: naro yadi khuraprāntaṃ cetaty akṣipaṭaṃ na tu /
GSP27moksop_u:9548: tat tasya nākṣiṇirjīvaṃ nājīvaty eva sarvataḥ //MU_3,55.52//
GSP27moksop_u:9549: tathā khaṃ khatayā bhūmir bhūmitvenāptayā jalam /
GSP27moksop_u:9550: yad yathā cetati svairaṃ tad vetty eva tathāvapuḥ //MU_3,55.53//
GSP27moksop_u:9553: tasmād yaj jaṅgamaṃ nāma tat sacopanarūpadhṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:9554: tena buddhaṃ tatas tadvat tad evādyāpi saṃsthitam //MU_3,55.55//
GSP27moksop_u:9555: yaj jaḍābhidham ābuddhaṃ sthāvaraṃ tena vai punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9557: na tu jāḍyaṃ pṛthak kiñcid asti nāpi ca cetanam /
GSP27moksop_u:9560: buddhyādīnīhitāny eva tāni teṣām iha sthitiḥ //MU_3,55.58//
GSP27moksop_u:9561: vido 'ntas sthāvarāder yās tasyā buddhyādayo hi te /
GSP27moksop_u:9562: anyābhidhānās tv anyārthās saṅketair aparais sthitāḥ //MU_3,55.59//
GSP27moksop_u:9564: tāny eva teṣāṃ buddhyādīny anyābhikhyārthakāni tu //MU_3,55.60//
GSP27moksop_u:9566: na kiñcid api jānāti nijasaṃvedanād ṛte //MU_3,55.61//
GSP27moksop_u:9570: asaj jaḍaṃ ca bhekānāṃ mitho'ntas tasthuṣāṃ tathā //MU_3,55.63//
GSP27moksop_u:9571: tatra sarvagataṃ cittvāc cidvyomnā yat pracetitam /
GSP27moksop_u:9572: sargādau copanaṃ vāyus sa ihādyāpi saṃsthitaḥ //MU_3,55.64//
GSP27moksop_u:9573: viditaṃ yat tu sauśiryaṃ tan nabhas tatra mārutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9574: spandātmetyādi sa mahān padārtheṣv iti copanam //MU_3,55.65//
GSP27moksop_u:9575: cittvaṃ tu paramārthena sthāvare jaṅgame sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:9576: copanāny anilair eva bhavanti na bhavanti ca //MU_3,55.66//
GSP27moksop_u:9580: asatyam eva satyābhaṃ tad etat kathitaṃ tava //MU_3,55.68//
GSP27moksop_u:9582: mālāśavasya padmasya patyus te yāti hṛdguhām //MU_3,55.69//
GSP27moksop_u:9584: kena mārgeṇa deveśi yāntyau vai śavamaṇḍapam /
GSP27moksop_u:9585: enam evāśu paśantyāv āvāṃ gacchāva uttame //MU_3,55.70//
GSP27moksop_u:9588: eṣo 'ham aparaṃ lokaṃ dūraṃ yāmīti cinmayam //MU_3,55.71//
GSP27moksop_u:9605: bahunātra kim uktena tāludeśena taṃ jahau /
GSP27moksop_u:9607: taṃ te dadṛśatur bāle divyadṛṣṭī nabhogatam /
GSP27moksop_u:9615: apaśyat puruṣān yāmyān nīyamānaṃ ca tair vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9619: prāptaṃ vaivasvatapuram ādiṣṭaṃ ca tato yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:9620: asya karmāṇy aśubhrāṇi naiva santi kadācana //MU_3,56.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9624: praviśatv eṣa taṃ gatvā tyajyatām ity avekṣya saḥ //MU_3,56.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9625: tatas tyakto nabhomārgaṃ yantropala iva plutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9626: atha jīvakalā līlā jñaptiś ceti trayaṃ nabhaḥ //MU_3,56.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9627: pupluve jīvalekhā tv arūpiṇy ete na paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:9630: dvitīyaṃ jagad āsādya bhūmaṇḍalam upetya ca //MU_3,56.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9636: brahman prāptaḥ katham asau śavasya nikaṭaṃ gṛham /
GSP27moksop_u:9640: tat sarvaṃ hṛdgataṃ tasmān māsau prāpnotu tat katham //MU_3,56.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9642: bīje vaṭatarum iva sthitaṃ ko vai na paśyati //MU_3,56.22//
GSP27moksop_u:9651: kīdṛk saṃpadyate dehaḥ piṇḍo yasmai na dīyate //MU_3,56.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9653: piṇḍo 'tha dīyatāṃ mātre piṇḍo datto mameti cet /
GSP27moksop_u:9654: vāsanā hṛdi saṃrūḍhā tat piṇḍaphalabhāṅ naraḥ //MU_3,56.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9656: sadeheṣu videheṣu na bhavanty anyathā kvacit //MU_3,56.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9660: bhāvanā ca padārthebhyaḥ kāraṇebhya udeti hi //MU_3,56.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9661: yathā vāsanayā jantor viṣam apy amṛtāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:9662: asatyas satyatām eti padārtho bhāvanāt tathā //MU_3,56.31//
GSP27moksop_u:9664: kāryatā kācid api bho iti niścayavān bhava //MU_3,56.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9665: kāraṇena vinā kāryam ā mahāpralayaṃ kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:9666: na dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ kiñcit svayaṃ svaikatayā ṛte //MU_3,56.33//
GSP27moksop_u:9667: vid eva vāsanā saiva dhatte svapna ivārthatām /
GSP27moksop_u:9670: dharmo nāsti mamety eva yaḥ preto vāsanānvitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9671: tasya cet suhṛdā bhūridharmā kṛtvā samarpitaḥ //MU_3,56.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9672: tatra cātra sa kiṃ dharmo naṣṭas syād uta bhāvanam /
GSP27moksop_u:9673: satyārthād vāpy asatyārthād bhāvanāt kiṃ balādhikam //MU_3,56.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9676: yatraivābhyuditā sāmyāt sa dvayor adhiko jayī //MU_3,56.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9677: dharmadātuḥ pravṛddhā ced vāsanā tat tayā kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:9678: āpūryate pretamatir no cet pretadhiyāśu sā //MU_3,56.38//
GSP27moksop_u:9690: neyam asti na cotpannā na ca sphurati kācana //MU_3,56.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9691: dṛśyasyāsambhavād dhetoḥ kiñcid yad dṛśyate tv idam /
GSP27moksop_u:9692: tad brahmaiva kacadrūpaṃ sthitam ittham anāmayam //MU_3,56.44//
GSP27moksop_u:9693: etac cāgre yuktiśataiḥ kathayiṣyāma eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:9695: tat te dadṛśatuḥ prāpte mandiraṃ sundarodaram /
GSP27moksop_u:9704: vairiñcapadmamukulāntaracāruśobhā niśśabdam abdam iva nirmalam indukāntam //MU_3,56.50//
GSP27moksop_u:9723: tābhyāṃ sā lalanā dṛṣṭā tayā te tu na lakṣite /
GSP27moksop_u:9724: yasmāt te satyasaṅkalpe sā na tāvat tathoditā //MU_3,57.8//
GSP27moksop_u:9726: tasmin pradeśe sā pūrvalīlā saṃsthāpya dehakam /
GSP27moksop_u:9728: kim idānīṃ ca līlā yā dehas tatra na varṇitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9729: kiṃ sampannaḥ kva vāyāta iti me kathaya prabho //MU_3,57.10//
GSP27moksop_u:9731: kvāsīl līlāśarīraṃ tat kutas tasya hi satyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:9732: sā kila bhrāntir evābhūj jalabuddhir marāv iva //MU_3,57.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9733: yathaiva bodhe līlāsau pariṇāmam itā kramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:9734: pare tathaiva tasyās tad dhimavadgalitaṃ vapuḥ //MU_3,57.12//
GSP27moksop_u:9738: bhūmyādi nāma tasyaiva kṛtaṃ tat tv ādhibhautikam //MU_3,57.14//
GSP27moksop_u:9740: na śabdena na cārthena śabdārthau śaśaśṛṅgavat //MU_3,57.15//
GSP27moksop_u:9744: bhrāntir hi bhramato rajjvām iva sarpatvasaṅgrahe //MU_3,57.17//
GSP27moksop_u:9750: brahmaṃl lokaiḥ purassthasya gacchato yogino nijām /
GSP27moksop_u:9757: jhagity evāthavā kaścid yogideho na lakṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:9758: sayogibhiḥ puro vegāt proḍḍīna iva khe khagaḥ //MU_3,57.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9760: mṛto 'yam iti paśyanti kaṃcid yoginam agragāḥ //MU_3,57.24//
GSP27moksop_u:9761: bhrāntimātraṃ tu dehātma teṣāṃ tad upaśāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:9763: ko dehaḥ kasya vā sattā kasya nāśaḥ kathaṃ kutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9764: sthiraṃ tad evaṃ yad abhūd abodhaḥ kevalaṃ gataḥ //MU_3,57.26//
GSP27moksop_u:9767: utānya iti me brūhi yenohya iva na prabho //MU_3,57.27//
GSP27moksop_u:9769: bahuśo 'py uktam etan me na gṛhṇāsi kim uttaram /
GSP27moksop_u:9772: yadā śāmyati saivāsya tadā pūrvā pravartate //MU_3,57.29//
GSP27moksop_u:9774: śāmyet svapne narasyeva boddhur bodhān nirāmayāt //MU_3,57.30//
GSP27moksop_u:9777: tathā bodhād ayaṃ dehas sthūlavat plutimān bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:9779: asmin dehe śave dagdhe tatraiva sthitim īyuṣām /
GSP27moksop_u:9782: uditāyāṃ smṛtau tatra saṅkalpātmāham ity alam //MU_3,57.34//
GSP27moksop_u:9783: yādṛśas sa bhaved dehas tādṛśo 'yaṃ prabodhinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9784: bhrāntir evam iyaṃ bhāti rajjvām iva bhujaṅgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:9785: kiṃ naṣṭam asyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ jātāyāṃ kiṃ prajāyate //MU_3,57.35//
GSP27moksop_u:9787: anantaraṃ te vāstavyā līle paśyanti te yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:9788: tat satyasaṅkalpatayā budhyante kiṃ tataḥ prabho //MU_3,57.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9790: evaṃ jñāsyanti te rājñī duḥkhiteyam iha sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:9791: vayasyā kācid anyeyaṃ kuto 'py asyā upāgatā //MU_3,57.37//
GSP27moksop_u:9792: sandehaḥ ka ivātraiṣāṃ paśavo hy avivekinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9794: yathā loṣṭo luṭhan vṛkṣaṃ vañcayitvāśu gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:9796: yathā svapnavapur bodhena jāne kveva gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:9800: iti me saṃśayaṃ chindhi śaradabhram ivānilaḥ //MU_3,57.41//
GSP27moksop_u:9803: saṃvido 'ntar milanty ete spandanāny anilaṃ yathā //MU_3,57.42//
GSP27moksop_u:9804: aspandasya yathā vāyos svaspando 'ntar viśaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:9805: asphurantī tu tenaiva yāty ekatvaṃ tadātmikā //MU_3,57.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9808: yas tv atra syād dvitābodhas tad ajñānam anuttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:9812: yathā svapnas tathā jāgrad idaṃ nātrāsti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9813: svapne puram asad bhāti sargādau bhāti asaj jagat //MU_3,57.47//
GSP27moksop_u:9814: na cārtho bhavituṃ śaktas satyatve svapnacoditaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9817: krameṇa vā tathā bodhe khaṃ bhavaty ādhibhautikaḥ //MU_3,57.49//
GSP27moksop_u:9818: uḍḍīno 'yaṃ mṛto veti paśyanti nikaṭe sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9826: etasminn antare jñaptir jīvaṃ vaidūrathaṃ puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9829: vada devi kiyat kālo gato 'yam iha mandire /
GSP27moksop_u:9832: iha māsas tv atikrānta iha dāsyāv ime ubhe /
GSP27moksop_u:9834: śṛṇu dehasya kiṃ vṛttaṃ taveha varavarṇini /
GSP27moksop_u:9836: nirjīvaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau saṃśuṣkam iva pallavam /
GSP27moksop_u:9838: tato mantribhir āgatya mṛtaiveyam iti svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:9842: tato rājñī mṛte 'tyuccaiḥ kṛtvā rodanam ākulaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9846: tvaṃ tu tenaiva dehena satyasaṅkalpatas sute /
GSP27moksop_u:9848: yadvāsanā tvam abhavo dehaṃ prati tad eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:9849: rūpam abhyuditaṃ bāle tena prāksadṛśaṃ tava //MU_3,58.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9853: vismṛtas tava deho 'sau prāktano nayatas svayam //MU_3,58.13//
GSP27moksop_u:9862: tad ehi yāval līlāyai līle saṅkalpalīlayā /
GSP27moksop_u:9864: āvāṃ tāvad ime līlā paśyatv ity eva cintite /
GSP27moksop_u:9865: jñaptyā devyau tatas tatra dṛśye dīpte babhūvatuḥ //MU_3,58.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9869: jvālāyā iva śītāyās sumadhyam iva bhittimat //MU_3,58.21//
GSP27moksop_u:9873: iha pūrvam ahaṃ prāptā bhavatyor mārgaśodhinī //MU_3,58.23//
GSP27moksop_u:9874: ity uktavatyāṃ tasyāṃ tā māninyo mattayauvanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9877: sute vada kathaṃ prāptā tvam imaṃ deśam āditaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9878: kiṃ vṛttaṃ te tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ kim ivādhvani kutra vā //MU_3,58.25//
GSP27moksop_u:9880: devi tasmin pradeśe sā jātamūrchā tadābhavam /
GSP27moksop_u:9882: na cetitaṃ mayā kiñcit samaṃ viṣamam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:9885: yāvad abhyutthitāsmy āśu plutā ca gaganodaram //MU_3,58.28//
GSP27moksop_u:9893: iti nidrā mayāsyaivaṃ deveśvari na vāritā //MU_3,58.32//
GSP27moksop_u:9894: anantaram imaṃ deśaṃ prāpte devyāv ime tv iti /
GSP27moksop_u:9899: sety uktvā mumuce jīvam āmodam iva padminī /
GSP27moksop_u:9902: svavāsanāśatāny antar dadhad abdhir maṇīn iva //MU_3,58.36//
GSP27moksop_u:9909: sphārayām āsa so 'ṅgāni rasavanti mṛdūni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:9916: sa dadarśa puro namraṃ līlādvayam avasthitam //MU_3,58.43//
GSP27moksop_u:9919: kā tvaṃ keyaṃ kutaś ceyam ity āha sa vilokayan /
GSP27moksop_u:9920: tasmai līlāha he deva śrūyatāṃ yad vadāmy aham //MU_3,58.45//
GSP27moksop_u:9921: mahilā tava līlāhaṃ prāktanī saha vardhitā /
GSP27moksop_u:9923: iyaṃ līlā dvitīyā te mahilā helayā mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:9932: prayaccha varade medhāṃ dīrgham āyur dhanāni ca //MU_3,58.51//
GSP27moksop_u:9936: sarvāpadas sakaladuṣkṛtadṛṣṭayaś ca gacchantu vaś śamam anantasukhāni samyak /
GSP27moksop_u:9937: āyāntu nityamuditā janatā bhavantu rāṣṭre sthirāś ca vilasantu sadaiva lakṣmyaḥ //MU_3,58.53//
GSP27moksop_u:9942: prabhāte paṅkajais sārdhaṃ bubudhe sakalo janaḥ //MU_3,59.1//
GSP27moksop_u:9943: āliliṅga ghanaṃ līlāṃ līlā ca dayitaṃ kramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:9961: paralokād upānīto rājñātmā patir eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:9962: ity evaṃ vṛttagāthābhir jagur deśāntare janāḥ //MU_3,59.11//
GSP27moksop_u:9967: līlā līlā ca rājātha jīvanmuktā mahādhiyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:9972: cakre varṣāyutāny aṣṭau tatra rājyam aninditam //MU_3,59.16//
GSP27moksop_u:9977: jīvanmuktās ta ity evaṃ rājyaṃ varṣāyutāṣṭakam /
GSP27moksop_u:9979: yad udayi viśadaṃ vidagdhamugdhaṃ samuditam ātmahitaṃ ca peśalaṃ ca /
GSP27moksop_u:9980: tad akhilajanatoṣadaṃ svarājyaṃ ciram anupālya sudampatī vimuktau //MU_3,59.19//
GSP27moksop_u:9987: sato hi mārjanaṃ kleśo nāsatas tu kadācana //MU_3,60.2//
GSP27moksop_u:9989: ity ekībhūtam ālokya jñas tiṣṭhaty ambaropamaḥ //MU_3,60.3//
GSP27moksop_u:9991: sādhitaṃ yad asiddhena tan na dvyātma na sādhitam //MU_3,60.4//
GSP27moksop_u:9992: saṃvid yathā yā yatate sā tathā bāhyalekhikā /
GSP27moksop_u:9993: visṛtā sṛṣṭicinnadyāṃ yāvad yatnān na bodhitā //MU_3,60.5//
GSP27moksop_u:9996: evam asyā mudhābhrānteḥ kā sattā keva vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:9998: sarvaṃ caitad yathādṛṣṭaṃ sthitam ittham akhaṇḍitam /
GSP27moksop_u:9999: māyaivaivam ananteyaṃ na ca māyāsti kācana //MU_3,60.8//
GSP27moksop_u:10001: aho nu paramā dṛṣṭir darśitā bhagavaṃs tvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:10003: aho nu sucireṇaitaj jñātaṃ jñātavyam akṣatam /
GSP27moksop_u:10004: mayā yathedaṃ yac cedaṃ yādṛk cedaṃ yato yadā //MU_3,60.10//
GSP27moksop_u:10007: idaṃ me bhagavan brūhi saṃśayaṃ sarvakovida /
GSP27moksop_u:10008: tava pātuṃ na tṛpto 'smi śrotrapātrair vaco'mṛtam //MU_3,60.12//
GSP27moksop_u:10009: sa sargatritaye kālo līlābhartur hi yogataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10010: sa kvacit kim ahorātraḥ kvacit kiṃ māsamātrakaḥ //MU_3,60.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10011: kvacit kiṃ bahuvarṣāṇi kasyacit kiṃ supelavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10012: kasyacit kiṃ mahādīrghaḥ kasyacit kiṃ kṣaṇasthitaḥ //MU_3,60.14//
GSP27moksop_u:10013: iti me bhagavan brūhi tvaṃ yathāvad anugrahāt /
GSP27moksop_u:10014: sakṛc chrutaṃ na viśrāntim eti loṣṭe yathā jalam //MU_3,60.15//
GSP27moksop_u:10016: yena yena yadā yad yad yathā saṃvedyate 'nagha /
GSP27moksop_u:10017: tena tena tadā tat tat tathā samanubhūyate //MU_3,60.16//
GSP27moksop_u:10021: tad eva hi cirābhyāsān niyater vaśam āgatam //MU_3,60.18//
GSP27moksop_u:10025: nimeṣa eva tat kalpībhavaty atra na saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,60.20//
GSP27moksop_u:10026: kalpe yadi nimeṣatvaṃ vetti kalpo 'py asau tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10028: duḥkhitasya niśā kalpas sukhinas saiva ca kṣaṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10029: kṣaṇas svapne bhavet kalpaḥ kalpaś ca bhavati kṣaṇaḥ //MU_3,60.22//
GSP27moksop_u:10030: tathā ca mṛtvā jāto 'haṃ taruṇo 'ham avasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10033: lavaṇo bhuktavān āyur ekarātryāṃ samāś śatam //MU_3,60.24//
GSP27moksop_u:10034: yo nimeṣaḥ prajeśasya sa manor jīvitaṃ muneḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10035: jīvitaṃ yad viriñcasya tad dinaṃ kila cakriṇaḥ //MU_3,60.25//
GSP27moksop_u:10036: dhyāne prakṣīṇacittasya na dināni na rātrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10037: na padārthā na ca jagat satyaṃ nātmāpi yoginaḥ //MU_3,60.26//
GSP27moksop_u:10039: kaṭv apy āyāti mādhuryaṃ madhuratvena cetitam //MU_3,60.27//
GSP27moksop_u:10040: mitrabuddhyā dviṣan mitraṃ ripubuddhyā ripus suhṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:10044: naur yāyināṃ bhramārtānāṃ vedanāt tu vivartate /
GSP27moksop_u:10046: śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti vedanāt svapnadṛkṣv iva /
GSP27moksop_u:10047: vedanāt pītam ānīlaṃ śuklaṃ vāpy anubhūyate //MU_3,60.31//
GSP27moksop_u:10052: yad yathābhyāsam āyātaṃ tat tathā sthiratāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:10053: asad eva nabhasy eva nabha eva cidātmani //MU_3,60.34//
GSP27moksop_u:10055: gagane mānasaṃ spandaṃ jagad viddhi na vastu tat //MU_3,60.35//
GSP27moksop_u:10062: yādṛśo mānavaḥ pārśve svapne kṣubdho mahābhaṭaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10063: tādṛśo brahmaṇas sargo buddha eva suṣuptavat //MU_3,60.39//
GSP27moksop_u:10065: vāsantas saṃsthito bhūmau tathā sargaḥ pare pade //MU_3,60.40//
GSP27moksop_u:10066: yathā dravatvaṃ kanake sthitam antar anunmiṣat /
GSP27moksop_u:10067: tathā sthitaḥ pare sargaḥ khātmā valgann aṇāv aṇau //MU_3,60.41//
GSP27moksop_u:10069: jagad evam anaṅgasya khātmanaḥ khātma brahmaṇaḥ //MU_3,60.42//
GSP27moksop_u:10073: kāraṇatvaṃ mithaḥ paścād asad vetti na vāstavam //MU_3,60.44//
GSP27moksop_u:10074: mukte 'smin brahmaṇi yadi brahmānyas smṛtijo bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:10078: samam eva kathaṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ pratibhāsitaḥ //MU_3,60.46//
GSP27moksop_u:10084: evaṃrūpāt kulāj jāto rājāsmākam ayaṃ tv asau /
GSP27moksop_u:10088: aham eva kulācāro rājāsyā bhuva ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:10090: yāvanto jantavo yasmin ye ye sarge yadā yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:10092: tīvravegavatī yā syāt tatra saṃvid akalpitā /
GSP27moksop_u:10098: ye samās tv atra te tāvad yatante citsvabhāvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10099: yāvad eko jayet tatra dvitīyas sannimajjati //MU_3,60.56//
GSP27moksop_u:10102: na kiñcit kenacid vyāptaṃ na ca kiñcit kvacit sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:10103: cidākāśam ajaṃ śāntam etat sarvam abhittimat //MU_3,60.58//
GSP27moksop_u:10109: buddhaṃ vismṛtim āyāti na kadācana kasyacit //MU_3,60.61//
GSP27moksop_u:10110: śūnyodayāstamayavastu tamaḥprakāśadikkālarūpy api sad ekam anādiśuddham /
GSP27moksop_u:10111: ādyantamadhyarahitaṃ sthitam accham ambusomyatvavīcivalanāḍhyam ivaikam eva //MU_3,60.62//
GSP27moksop_u:10112: ahaṃ tvam ityādi jagatsvarūpā viśuddhabodhaikavibhā vibhāti /
GSP27moksop_u:10117: ahaṃ jagad iti bhrāntiḥ parasmāt kāraṇaṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:10118: yathodeti tathā brahman bhūyaḥ kāthaya sādhu me //MU_3,61.1//
GSP27moksop_u:10120: samastās samam evāntas saṃvido vindate yataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10121: sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvātmaikam ajas tataḥ //MU_3,61.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10124: kaṭakatvaṃ pṛthag ghemnas taraṅgatvaṃ pṛthag jalāt /
GSP27moksop_u:10125: yathā na sambhavaty evaṃ na jagat pṛthag īśvarāt //MU_3,61.4//
GSP27moksop_u:10126: īśa eva jagadrūpaṃ jagadrūpaṃ tu neśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10127: hemaiva kaṭakāditvaṃ kaṭakatvaṃ tu hema no //MU_3,61.5//
GSP27moksop_u:10131: antassthaṃ tad idaṃ bhāti jagad ity aham ity api //MU_3,61.7//
GSP27moksop_u:10133: tathānanyaj jagad ahaṃ cety antaś cidghane ghanam //MU_3,61.8//
GSP27moksop_u:10136: nāsargaṃ tiṣṭhati paraṃ sargas tiṣṭhati nāparaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10139: svam eva rūpaṃ hṛdayaṃ vātena spandanaṃ yathā //MU_3,61.11//
GSP27moksop_u:10154: buddhaṃ sad apasargaṃ tat sasargam api tat samam /
GSP27moksop_u:10155: abuddhaṃ sargarūpātma visargam api tat sadā //MU_3,61.19//
GSP27moksop_u:10156: cidbrahma yad yathā yena vindate svatvam ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:10157: tat tat tathānubhavati sarvaṃ tat sarvaśaktimat //MU_3,61.20//
GSP27moksop_u:10160: yathā tat saraṇaṃ vāyau tathā sargas sthitaḥ pare /
GSP27moksop_u:10161: asatkalpe tv asatkalpas satye 'satya ivāpi ca //MU_3,61.22//
GSP27moksop_u:10164: anutkīrṇā yathā paṅke putrikā vātha dāruṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:10165: varṇā yathā maṣīkalke tathā sargās sthitāḥ pare //MU_3,61.24//
GSP27moksop_u:10169: na bhāvyate cānanyatvād bījenāntar iva drumaḥ //MU_3,61.26//
GSP27moksop_u:10170: yathā kṣīrasya mādhuryaṃ tīkṣṇatvaṃ maricasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:10171: dravatvaṃ payasaś caiva spando 'ntaḥ pavanasya ca //MU_3,61.27//
GSP27moksop_u:10172: sthito 'nanyo 'py athānyas san na sthitaś ca tathātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:10174: kacanaṃ brahmaratnasya jagad ity eva yat sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:10175: tad akāraṇakaṃ tasmāt tena na vyatiricyate //MU_3,61.29//
GSP27moksop_u:10177: nodety avedanād eva yan nānātmaiva pauruṣam //MU_3,61.30//
GSP27moksop_u:10178: nāstam eti na codeti kvacit kiñcit kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:10179: sarvaṃ śāntam ajaṃ brahma cidghanaṃ suśilāghaṇam //MU_3,61.31//
GSP27moksop_u:10180: parāṇuṃ prati sargaughāś cittvād bhānti sahasraśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10181: teṣv anye 'ṇāv aṇāv antaḥ kaivātra gaṇanā katham //MU_3,61.32//
GSP27moksop_u:10184: jātā ced aratir bhogān prati manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:10185: tadāsau tāvataivoccaiḥ padaṃ prāpta iti śrutiḥ //MU_3,61.34//
GSP27moksop_u:10186: yato yato viyujyate tatas tato vimucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:10187: ato 'ham ity asaṃvidaḥ ka eti janmasaṃvidam //MU_3,61.35//
GSP27moksop_u:10190: pare cid asty aprakaṭādvitīyā svāvartalekheva jaladrave 'ntaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10191: sā hanta yena trijaganti dhatte na santi nāsanti parātmakāni //MU_3,61.37//
GSP27moksop_u:10192: ahammayī padmajabhāvanā cit saṅkalpabhedāt pratanoti viśvam /
GSP27moksop_u:10199: teṣv apy antas tathaivāntaḥ paramāṇukaṇaṃ prati /
GSP27moksop_u:10200: bhrāntir evam anantāho iyam ity avabhāsate //MU_3,62.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10210: kimartham iha tiṣṭhanti dehās tattvavidām api /
GSP27moksop_u:10211: daiveneva samākrāntā daivam atra ca kiṃ bhavet //MU_3,62.7//
GSP27moksop_u:10216: anenetthaṃ sadā bhāvyam iti sampadyate param //MU_3,62.9//
GSP27moksop_u:10218: mahāśaktir iti khyātā mahādṛṣṭir iti sthitā //MU_3,62.10//
GSP27moksop_u:10221: tṛṇānīti jagantīti daityā iti surā iti /
GSP27moksop_u:10222: iti nāgā iti nagā ity ākalpam iti sthitiḥ //MU_3,62.12//
GSP27moksop_u:10224: citram ākāśakośe vā nānyathā niyates sthitiḥ //MU_3,62.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10226: bṛṃhaṇāt saiva niyatis sargo 'yam iti kathyate //MU_3,62.14//
GSP27moksop_u:10230: brahmaṇā niyatis sargo buddho bodhayateva kham //MU_3,62.16//
GSP27moksop_u:10233: eṣā daivam iti proktā sarvaṃ sakalakālagam /
GSP27moksop_u:10234: padārtham alam ākramya śuddhā cid iti saṃsthitā //MU_3,62.18//
GSP27moksop_u:10239: anayā pauruṣī sattā sattāsyāḥ pauruṣeṇa ca /
GSP27moksop_u:10240: lakṣyete bhavanaṃ yāte dve ekātmatayeti hi //MU_3,62.21//
GSP27moksop_u:10242: īdṛśy eva hi niyatir evaṃ niyatipauruṣam //MU_3,62.22//
GSP27moksop_u:10244: maduktaṃ pauruṣaṃ pālyaṃ tvayeti niyatis sthitā //MU_3,62.23//
GSP27moksop_u:10246: yat tiṣṭhaty akriyo maunaṃ niyater eṣa niścayaḥ //MU_3,62.24//
GSP27moksop_u:10247: pauruṣeṇa samāhṛtya bhogān bhuṅkte naraś ca yat /
GSP27moksop_u:10249: muktir bhavati saṃsārān na kalpanicayair api /
GSP27moksop_u:10250: bhramatāṃ yac charīraughair niyater eṣa niścayaḥ //MU_3,62.26//
GSP27moksop_u:10251: nāsyā buddhir na karmāṇi na vikārādi nākṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10252: kevalaṃ tv ittham ākalpaṃ sthityā bhāvyam iti sthitam //MU_3,62.27//
