GSP27moksop_u:10253: avaśyaṃ bhavitā hy evam idam ittham iti sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10255: pauruṣam na parityājyam enām āśritya dhīmatā /
GSP27moksop_u:10257: apauruṣaṃ hi niyatiḥ pauruṣaṃ saiva sargagā /
GSP27moksop_u:10260: yas tiṣṭhati prāṇamarutspandas tasya kva gacchati //MU_3,62.31//
GSP27moksop_u:10262: yadi tiṣṭhati tat sādhur mukta eva kim ucyate //MU_3,62.32//
GSP27moksop_u:10264: ābhyāṃ tu śabalaḥ pakṣo duḥkhāyaiva mahātmanām //MU_3,62.33//
GSP27moksop_u:10266: nūnaṃ paramaśuddhāyāṃ tat prāptaiva parā gatiḥ //MU_3,62.34//
GSP27moksop_u:10272: etad brahmatattvaṃ sarvathā sarvadaiva sarvata eva sarvaśakti sarvākāraṃ sarveśvaraṃ sarvagaṃ sarvam eveti /
GSP27moksop_u:10273: eṣa tv ātmā sarvaśaktitvād anantaśaktitvāc ca kvacic cicchaktiṃ prakaṭayati kvacij jaḍaśaktiṃ kvacid ullāsaṃ kvacic chāntiṃ kvacit kiñcit kvacin nakiñcit prakaṭayati /
GSP27moksop_u:10274: yatra yadā yad evāsau yathā bhāvayati tatra tadā tad evāsau tathā paśyati / (MU_3,63.1)
GSP27moksop_u:10275: sarvaśakter hi yā yaiva yathodeti tathaiva sā /
GSP27moksop_u:10277: imāś śaktayo 'yam ātmety evaṃ vikalpajālaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ dhīmadbhiḥ parikalpitaṃ loke na tv ātmani vidyate bhedaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10278: yathormitaraṅgaiḥ payasāṃ kaṭakāṅgadakeyūrair vā hemnaḥ avayavāvayavinos saṃvit kālpanikī dvidhā na vāstavī /
GSP27moksop_u:10279: yathā yac cetyate tathaiva tan na bāhyato nāntarataś cetanaṃ samudeti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:10280: sarvātmatvāt svam ābhāsaṃ kvacit kiñcit prapaśyati sarvākāramayaṃ brahmaivedaṃ tatra
GSP27moksop_u:10281: mithyājñānavadbhiś śaktiśaktimatte avayavāvayavirūpe kalpite na pāramārthike sad
GSP27moksop_u:10282: vā bhavatv asad vā cid yat saṅkalpayaty abhiniviṣṭā tat tatpaśyati sakalaṃ tat tat
GSP27moksop_u:10290: jīvas sañjāyate pūrvaṃ sa cittaṃ tat tato jagat //MU_3,64.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10297: tasya yat samam āpūrṇaṃ śuddhaṃ sattvam acihnitam /
GSP27moksop_u:10298: tadvidām apy anirdeśyaṃ tac chāntaṃ paramaṃ padam //MU_3,64.5//
GSP27moksop_u:10300: svabhāvāt spandanaṃ tat taj jīvaśabdena kathyate //MU_3,64.6//
GSP27moksop_u:10303: brahmaṇas sphuraṇaṃ kiñcid yad avātāmbudher iva /
GSP27moksop_u:10304: dīpasya vāpy avātasya taj jīvaṃ viddhi rāghava //MU_3,64.8//
GSP27moksop_u:10306: svābhāvikaṃ yat sphuraṇaṃ cidvyomnas so 'ṅga jīvakaḥ //MU_3,64.9//
GSP27moksop_u:10307: yathā vātasya calanaṃ kṛśāṇor uṣṇatā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:10308: śītatā vā tuṣārasya tathā jīvatvam ātmanaḥ //MU_3,64.10//
GSP27moksop_u:10310: manāksaṃvedanaṃ pūrvaṃ yat taj jīva iti smṛtaḥ //MU_3,64.11//
GSP27moksop_u:10311: tad eva ghanasaṃvitti yāty ahantām anukramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:10320: cittaṃ jīvo mano māyā prakṛtiś ceti nāmabhiḥ //MU_3,64.16//
GSP27moksop_u:10322: kurvaṃs tattāṃ vrajaty eva saṅkalpād yāti pañcatām //MU_3,64.17//
GSP27moksop_u:10326: śanais svasmāt parispandād bījam aṅkuratām iva //MU_3,64.19//
GSP27moksop_u:10331: kaścit sthāvaratām eti kaścij jaṅgamatām api /
GSP27moksop_u:10334: krameṇa padam āsādya vairiñcaṃ kurute jagat //MU_3,64.23//
GSP27moksop_u:10336: tat svabhāvavaśād eva jātam eva prapaśyati //MU_3,64.24//
GSP27moksop_u:10338: saṃsṛtau kāraṇaṃ paścāt karma nirmāya saṃsthitam //MU_3,64.25//
GSP27moksop_u:10339: cittvaṃ svabhāvāt sphurati citaḥ phena ivāmbhasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10340: karmabhir badhyate paścād diṇḍīram iva rajjubhiḥ //MU_3,64.26//
GSP27moksop_u:10341: saṅkalpaḥ karmaṇo bījaṃ tadātmaiva hi jīvakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10345: anye kha eva ye jīvā evam evākṛtiṃ gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10346: pūrvotpanne jagati te yānti bhūtāśritās sthitim //MU_3,64.29//
GSP27moksop_u:10348: prayānty ūrdhvam adhastād vā karma citspanda ucyate //MU_3,64.30//
GSP27moksop_u:10349: citspandanaṃ bhavati karma tad eva daivaṃ cittaṃ tad eva ca tad eva śubhāśubhādi /
GSP27moksop_u:10350: tasmād bhavanti bhuvanāni jaganti pūrvaṃ bhūtāni cāśu kusumāni taror ivādyāt //MU_3,64.31//
GSP27moksop_u:10354: etasmāt kāraṇād evaṃ manaḥ prathamam utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:10355: mananātmakam ābhogi tatstham eva sthitiṃ gatam //MU_3,65.1//
GSP27moksop_u:10363: yathā svapnas tathā citte jagat sadasadātmakam //MU_3,65.5//
GSP27moksop_u:10364: na san nāsann ayaṃ jātaś cetaso jāgato bhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10366: dīrghas svapnas sthitiṃ yātas saṃsārākhyo manovaśāt /
GSP27moksop_u:10372: jīvatvād apy ahambhāvas tv ahambhāvāc ca cittatā /
GSP27moksop_u:10376: dvaitaṃ yathā nāsti cidātmatattvayos tathaiva bhedo 'sti na jīvacittayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10377: yathaiva bhedo 'sti na jīvacittayos tathaiva bhedo 'sti na dehakarmaṇoḥ //MU_3,65.12//
GSP27moksop_u:10378: karmaiva deho nanu deha eva cittaṃ tad evāham itīva jīvaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10379: sa jīva eveśvaracit sa ātmā sarvaṃ śivāt tv ekapadottham etat //MU_3,65.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10383: evam ekaṃ paraṃ vastu rāmānānātvam apy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:10384: nānātvam iva saṃyātaṃ dīpād dīpaśataṃ yathā //MU_3,66.1//
GSP27moksop_u:10386: vicārya cetas tad ahambhāvahīnaṃ na śocati //MU_3,66.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10387: cittamātraṃ naras tasmin śānte śāntam idaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:10389: pattramātrād ṛte nānyat kadalyā vidyate yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:10390: bhramamātrād ṛte nānyaj jagatāṃ vidyate tathā //MU_3,66.4//
GSP27moksop_u:10391: jāyate bālatām eti yauvanaṃ vārdhakaṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:10392: mṛtiṃ svargaṃ ca narakaṃ bhramāc ceto hi nṛtyati //MU_3,66.5//
GSP27moksop_u:10394: yathā surāyās sāmarthyaṃ tathā cittasya saṃsṛtau //MU_3,66.6//
GSP27moksop_u:10395: yathā dvitvaṃ śaśāṅkādau paśyaty akṣi malābilam /
GSP27moksop_u:10397: yathā madavaśād bhrāntān kṣīvaḥ paśyati pādapān /
GSP27moksop_u:10400: bhrāntaṃ paśyati cittvāt tu cid vai dṛśyaṃ tathaiva hi //MU_3,66.9//
GSP27moksop_u:10401: yadā cic cetati dvitvaṃ tadā dvaitaikyavibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10402: yadā na cetati dvitvaṃ tadā dvaitaikyayoḥ kṣayaḥ //MU_3,66.10//
GSP27moksop_u:10403: yac cetyate tad itarad vyatiriktaṃ cito 'sti no /
GSP27moksop_u:10404: kiñcin nāstīti saṃśāntyā citaś śāmyati cetanam //MU_3,66.11//
GSP27moksop_u:10406: śāmyan vyavaharan vāpi tadā saṃśānta ucyase //MU_3,66.12//
GSP27moksop_u:10407: tanvī cetayate cetyaṃ ghanā cin nāṅga cetati /
GSP27moksop_u:10408: alpakṣīvaḥ kṣobham eti ghanakṣīvo hi śāmyati //MU_3,66.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10411: cic cetanena cetyatvam ity evaṃ paśyati bhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:10413: svabhāvād vyatiriktaṃ tu na citaś cāsti cetanam /
GSP27moksop_u:10414: spandād ṛte yathā vāyāv ataḥ kiṃ kena cetyate //MU_3,66.16//
GSP27moksop_u:10415: cetye tv asambhavaty eva kiñcid yac cetyate citā /
GSP27moksop_u:10420: amunaiva nimeṣeṇa tan mukto 'si na saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,66.19//
GSP27moksop_u:10423: yatrābhilāṣas tan nūnaṃ santyajya sthīyate yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:10424: prāpta evāṅga tan mokṣaḥ kim etāvati duṣkaram //MU_3,66.21//
GSP27moksop_u:10425: api prāṇāṃs tṛṇam iva tyajantīha mahāśayāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10428: prāptaṃ karmendriyair gṛhṇaṃs tyajann iṣṭaṃ ca tiṣṭha bhoḥ //MU_3,66.23//
GSP27moksop_u:10429: yathā karatale bilvaṃ yathā vā parvataḥ puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10431: ātmaiva bhāti jagad ity uditas taraṅgaiḥ kalpānta eka iva vāridhir aprameyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10432: jñātas sa eva hi dadāti vimokṣasiddhim ajñāta eva manasā cirabandhanāya //MU_3,66.25//
GSP27moksop_u:10437: kathaṃ vāsmin samutpannaḥ ko vāyaṃ vada me punaḥ //MU_3,67.1//
GSP27moksop_u:10440: yayaiva śaktyā sphurati prāptāṃ tām eva paśyati //MU_3,67.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10441: svayaṃ yāṃ vetti sarvātmā citiṃ cetanarūpiṇīm /
GSP27moksop_u:10443: svabhāvakāraṇaṃ dvitve pūrvaṃ saṅkalpya cit svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:10446: evaṃ sthite muniśreṣṭha daivaṃ nāma kim ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:10447: kim ucyate tathā karma kāraṇaṃ ca kim ucyate //MU_3,67.5//
GSP27moksop_u:10450: khe vāta iva tatspandāt sollāsaṃ śāntam anyathā //MU_3,67.6//
GSP27moksop_u:10451: citaś cittvaṃ bhāvitaṃ sat spanda ity ucyate budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10453: spandāt sphurantī cit sargo nisspandā brahma śāśvatam /
GSP27moksop_u:10455: ya evānubhavātmāyaṃ citspando 'sti sa eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:10465: ajātam apy asadrūpaṃ paśyatīmaṃ bhramaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10467: ahaṃ mamety asadrūpam eva cetaḥ prapaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:10470: āsīd evaṃ hi cittasya sphuratīyaṃ jagatsthitiḥ //MU_3,67.16//
GSP27moksop_u:10473: śivāt prāk kāraṇāt pūrvaṃ cic cetyakalanonmukhī /
GSP27moksop_u:10474: udeti saumyāj jaladheḥ payasspando manāg iva //MU_3,67.18//
GSP27moksop_u:10478: brahmaṇas sa cidābhāsas tat sacetyam iva svayam //MU_3,67.20//
GSP27moksop_u:10479: cit sacetyocyate jīvas sa saṅkalpān mano bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:10484: yathā svapne bhramaś caiva tathā cittasya saṃsṛtiḥ //MU_3,67.23//
GSP27moksop_u:10485: śuddha ātmā nityatṛpta iva śāntas samasthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10487: saṃsṛtir jāgrad ity uktaṃ svapnaṃ vidur ahaṅkṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:10488: cittaṃ suṣuptabhāvas syāc cinmātraṃ turyam ucyate //MU_3,67.25//
GSP27moksop_u:10490: turyātītaṃ padaṃ yat syāt tatstho bhūyo na śocati //MU_3,67.26//
GSP27moksop_u:10491: tasmin sarvam udetīdaṃ tasminn eva pralīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:10492: tatraiva tanute cedaṃ dṛṣṭau muktāvalī yathā //MU_3,67.27//
GSP27moksop_u:10494: akartry api tathā kartrī cetanāc cij jagatsthiteḥ //MU_3,67.28//
GSP27moksop_u:10499: svato bījaṃ phalādy ujjhad yathā bījaṃ punar bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:10500: tathā cic cetyacittādi tyaktvā svāsthyena tiṣṭhati //MU_3,67.31//
GSP27moksop_u:10501: yady apy abodhe bodhe ca bījāntas tarubījayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10502: iva bhedo 'sti na jagadbrahmaṇor api cittayoḥ //MU_3,67.32//
GSP27moksop_u:10503: tathāpi vyajyate bodhe saty ātmatvam akhaṇḍitam /
GSP27moksop_u:10504: rūpaśrīr iva dīpena cinmātrālokam eti yat //MU_3,67.33//
GSP27moksop_u:10505: yad yan nikhanyate bhūmer yathā tat tan nabho bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:10506: yā yā vicāryate 'vidyā tathā sā sā paraṃ bhavet //MU_3,67.34//
GSP27moksop_u:10508: śuddho 'pi bhāti nāneva tathā brahmodaraṃ jagat //MU_3,67.35//
GSP27moksop_u:10509: brahma sarvaṃ jagad vastu piṇḍa ekam akhaṇḍitam /
GSP27moksop_u:10512: aho citraṃ jagad idam asat sad iva bhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:10513: aho bṛhad aho svaccham aho sphuṭam aho tanu //MU_3,67.37//
GSP27moksop_u:10516: yathāsau yāti vaimukhyaṃ yathā bhavati cātmabhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10517: yathā svabhāvasiddhir vā tathā kathaya me prabho //MU_3,67.39//
GSP27moksop_u:10521: hullas sabhullo ghullāṅgha iti bālahṛdi sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:10524: bhinneva ca na bhinnāsmād brahmaṇo bṛṃhaṇātmikā //MU_3,67.42//
GSP27moksop_u:10525: yathā brahma bhavaty āśu jīvaḥ kalanajīvitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10526: tathā jīvo bhavaty āśu mano mananavedanam //MU_3,67.43//
GSP27moksop_u:10541: sa tasya sanniveśasya tv asato 'pi satas sataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10548: bhaviṣyad indriyākhyaṃ sā randhraṃ paśyati dehake //MU_3,67.54//
GSP27moksop_u:10554: tadātivāhikoktīnāṃ kaḥ prasaṅgas tad eva tat //MU_3,67.57//
GSP27moksop_u:10561: siddhāntakāla evaiṣa praśnas te rāma rājate /
GSP27moksop_u:10564: tathaivākālagīr jantos sarvaṃ kāle hi śobhate //MU_3,67.61//
GSP27moksop_u:10567: evam eṣa sa jīvātmā suptātmā samupasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10570: yaḥ karoti manorājyaṃ bhavaty āśu sa tanmatiḥ //MU_3,67.64//
GSP27moksop_u:10571: idam evam asat sadvad vidan vyomni sutātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:10573: neha prajāyate kiñcin neha kiñcana naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:10579: yathā sampadyate brahmā kīṭas sampadyate tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:10582: tad eva pauruṣaṃ tasmin sāraṃ karma tad eva ca //MU_3,67.70//
GSP27moksop_u:10589: sattayā brahmaṇā yad yad yathā dṛṣṭaṃ vibhāti tat /
GSP27moksop_u:10590: tat tathā dṛśyate tajjñais svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ //MU_3,67.74//
GSP27moksop_u:10591: yathā yad uditaṃ vastu tan na tattāṃ vinā bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:10592: nimeṣam api kalpo vā svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ //MU_3,67.75//
GSP27moksop_u:10593: alīkam idam utpannam alīkaṃ ca vivardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:10595: śuddhaṃ sarvagataṃ brahmānantam advitīyaṃ duravabodhavaśād aśuddham ivāsad ivānekam ivāsarvagam ivāvabudhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:10596: jalam anyat taraṅgo 'nyad iti bālakalpanayā bhedaḥ parikalpyata eva na vāstavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10597: tasmād yo 'yam ābhāti bhedas sa kevalam atattvavidbhiḥ parikalpito rajjvām ahitvam iva / (MU_3,67.77)
GSP27moksop_u:10598: evaṃ bhedābhedaśaktyor abhinnayor eva brahmaṇy eva sambhavāt tenātmanādvitīyenaiva
GSP27moksop_u:10599: dvitvam ivānītaṃ yathā salilena taraṅgakalpanayā suvarṇena kaṭakaparikalpanayaivam
GSP27moksop_u:10600: iti atas tena svayam evātmanātmānya iva cetyate /
GSP27moksop_u:10603: tenāhambhāvaḥ kalpitaḥ nirvikalpapratyakṣarūpaṃ yat prathamaṃ tan manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10607: satsu tanmātreṣu jīvena cittātmanā svayam kākatālīyavad dhastapādādimān sanniveśaḥ kalpito dṛśyata eva yad eva manaḥ kalpayati tad eva paśyati sad vā bhavatv asad vā /
GSP27moksop_u:10608: cittaṃ yat kalpayaty abhiniviṣṭaṃ tat tat paśyati sad iva pratibhāsam upāgataṃ yathā svapne / (MU_3,67.78)
GSP27moksop_u:10610: tattvāt samastasattānāṃ cinmātraṃ sarvam eva vā //MU_3,67.79//
GSP27moksop_u:10611: cinmātram eva bahir antar upary adhastān mānaprameyam iti mātṛpadaṃ ca dhatte /
GSP27moksop_u:10612: nityopaśāntam iti tena samastasattā nityaṃ sthitaṃ susamam ekam apetaturyam //MU_3,67.80//
GSP27moksop_u:10619: himādrer uttare pārśve karkaṭī nāma rākṣasī //MU_3,68.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10634: na kadācana sā tṛptim upāyāti mahodarī /
GSP27moksop_u:10638: meghena mṛgatṛṣṇeva tan me kṣud upaśāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:10639: aviruddhaiva sā yuktir yayāpadi hi jīvyate //MU_3,68.12//
GSP27moksop_u:10641: samam eva janaṃ sarvaṃ nirbādhaṃ kaḥ prabādhate //MU_3,68.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10643: tapasaiva mahogreṇa yad durāpaṃ tad āpyate //MU_3,68.14//
GSP27moksop_u:10650: krameṇa divasāḥ pakṣās tasyā māsartavo yayuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10660: dāruṇaṃ hi tapas siddhyai viṣṭhāgnir api śītahā //MU_3,69.1//
GSP27moksop_u:10661: manasaiva praṇamyainaṃ sā tatheti sthitā satī /
GSP27moksop_u:10663: anāyasī cāyasī ca syām ahaṃ jīvasūcikā /
GSP27moksop_u:10665: prāṇena saha sarveṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ surabhir yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:10674: anāyasī cāyasī ca vikalpaya ca me varam /
GSP27moksop_u:10676: evam astv iti tām uktvā punar eva pitāmahaḥ //MU_3,69.8//
GSP27moksop_u:10677: sūcikām āha sarge tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi viṣūcikā /
GSP27moksop_u:10679: durbhojanā durārambhā mūrkhā dussthitayaś ca ye /
GSP27moksop_u:10686: himādrer uttare pārśve karkaṭī nāma rākṣasī /
GSP27moksop_u:10691: bhagavati viṣṇuśakte enāṃ daha daha paca paca matha matha hana hana utsādaya utsādaya dūrīkuru /
GSP27moksop_u:10693: viṣūcike rkhraḥ rkhraḥ rkhraḥ himavantaṃ gaccha himavantaṃ gaccha jīva /
GSP27moksop_u:10702: sādhako hi śucir bhūtvā svācāntas susamāhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10705: gata ibhagataśakravandyamāno nijapuram akṣayam agryam ujjvalaśri //MU_3,69.19//
GSP27moksop_u:10714: tato māṣaśimītulyā tatas sūcī babhūva ha //MU_3,70.3//
GSP27moksop_u:10719: sūcir dṛśyata evāsau na tv ayo nāma vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:10728: dūrād eva manojñena prodgirantī mukhena kham //MU_3,70.10//
GSP27moksop_u:10737: grāsārthaṃ sūcitāṃ yātā sa cāsyā nopayujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:10739: sāgrā sañcintayām āsa na sūcī tuccharūpatām /
GSP27moksop_u:10740: caittam īhitam evaikaṃ paśyanty āste yathāsukham //MU_3,70.16//
GSP27moksop_u:10746: mahāmaraṇam apy asyā rākṣasyās susukhaṃ sthitam //MU_3,70.19//
GSP27moksop_u:10753: anyā babhūva tallagnā sā tathā jīvasūcikā /
GSP27moksop_u:10759: pāpātmikā manovṛttis sā hi tasyās tathā sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:10761: evam asyās tanur jātā sūcidvayamayī hi sā /
GSP27moksop_u:10764: vedhayantī tataḥ krūrā prababhrāma diśo daśa //MU_3,70.28//
GSP27moksop_u:10765: sarvas svasaṅkalpavaśāl laghur bhavati vā guruḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10772: tatraiva sā tanus sthūlā galitā śāradābhravat //MU_3,70.32//
GSP27moksop_u:10806: na hi tīkṣṇo bahiḥ kārye nīcatvaṃ vijahāti cet //MU_3,70.49//
GSP27moksop_u:10808: dikṣv apsv iva śilāgurvī nāvaṅgavalitā satī //MU_3,70.50//
GSP27moksop_u:10816: dṛṣṭānto 'tra kṣaṇāt sūcyā pūrito jarjaraḥ paṭaḥ //MU_3,70.54//
GSP27moksop_u:10828: katham enaṃ bhinadmīti tīkṣṇānām etad īpsitam //MU_3,70.60//
GSP27moksop_u:10829: samam eva ca kauśeye kṣaume ca vasane śitā /
GSP27moksop_u:10830: jaḍaḥ ka iva vā nāma guṇāguṇam upekṣate //MU_3,70.61//
GSP27moksop_u:10839: śete kiṃ cāru maitryeva buse karaparicyutā /
GSP27moksop_u:10840: svarūpasadṛśaṃ mitraṃ kasmai nāma na rocate //MU_3,70.66//
GSP27moksop_u:10842: tiṣṭhaty ātmasamāṃ ko hi saṅgatiṃ tyaktum icchati //MU_3,70.67//
GSP27moksop_u:10858: utsavād api nīcānāṃ kalaho hi sukhāyate //MU_3,70.75//
GSP27moksop_u:10862: mṛtim ādhāsyate citrā svārthe nodeti mūḍhatā //MU_3,70.77//
GSP27moksop_u:10865: sthāpitā malam ādatte sūcī yad gharṣaṇaṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:10867: sūkṣmadṛśyā vedhadātrī kṣaṇād vismṛtim eti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:10870: durjano yena tenaiva nāśito vetti duṣṭatām //MU_3,70.81//
GSP27moksop_u:10871: paṅke majjati yāti khe viharati vyomānilair diktaṭāñ śete pāṃsuṣu bhūtale pathi gṛhe haṭṭe vane 'ntaḥpure /
GSP27moksop_u:10872: haste śrotrasaroruhe 'tha mṛduni svasthorṇikāgaṇḍake randhre kāṣṭhamṛdāṃ ca nāḍihṛdaye dravyātmasattaiva sā //MU_3,70.82//
GSP27moksop_u:10874: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:10875: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_3,70.83//
GSP27moksop_u:10879: atha sā bahukālena karkaṭī nāma rākṣasī /
GSP27moksop_u:10882: sūcyāṃ kim iva māty antas tṛṣṇāsūcis tu durbharā //MU_3,71.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10883: cintayām āsa hā kaṣṭaṃ kim idaṃ sūcitāṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:10884: sūkṣmāsmi hataśaktiś ca mayi grāso na māti ca //MU_3,71.3//
GSP27moksop_u:10885: kva me tāni viśālāni gatāny aṅgāni durdhiyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10887: mayy asyāṃ mandabhāgyāyāṃ manāg api na māti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:10892: duḥkhād duḥkhe nimajjāmi saṅkaṭāt saṅkaṭe 'pi ca //MU_3,71.7//
GSP27moksop_u:10893: na me sakhī na me dāsī na me mātā na me pitā /
GSP27moksop_u:10894: na me bandhur na me bhṛtyo na me bhrātā na me sutaḥ //MU_3,71.8//
GSP27moksop_u:10895: na me deho na me sthānaṃ na me kaścit samāśrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10898: abhāvam abhivāñchāmi so 'pi sampadyate na me //MU_3,71.10//
GSP27moksop_u:10904: vraṇeṣu preṣitāsmy antar hā me duḥkhaparamparā //MU_3,71.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10906: paraṃ kārpaṇyam āyātā jātā paravaśāsmy aham //MU_3,71.14//
GSP27moksop_u:10909: utthitas sphāravetālaḥ kurvantyāś śāntim eva me /
GSP27moksop_u:10911: kim andhayā mayā tādṛk santyaktaṃ tan mahāvapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10912: yathā nāśena vā bhāvyaṃ tathodety aśubhā matiḥ //MU_3,71.17//
GSP27moksop_u:10918: aṇv apy udeti prākāśyaṃ na khadyotānusevinaḥ //MU_3,71.20//
GSP27moksop_u:10919: ataḥ kiyantaṃ no jāne kālam āvalitāpadam /
GSP27moksop_u:10930: parvatāt parvate śṛṅge nyasya pādaṃ vihāriṇī //MU_3,71.26//
GSP27moksop_u:10931: kadā me syād uruśvabhrabhāsuraṃ tan mahodaram /
GSP27moksop_u:10939: mayaiva kutapovahnau tad dagdhvā bhāsuraṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10943: tyajaty āśu mṛd ity ajñaḥ prāpyāpi kanakāṅgadam /
GSP27moksop_u:10946: adya nāntaṃ karoṣi tvaṃ kathaṃ siṃhaiṇahastinām //MU_3,71.34//
GSP27moksop_u:10948: puroḷāśadhiyā candraṃ katham adya na dhāvathaḥ //MU_3,71.35//
GSP27moksop_u:10950: nādya siṃhādiyaukaṃ tad dhṛtaṃ romavanaṃ tvayā //MU_3,71.36//
GSP27moksop_u:10952: kasmān na me bhūṣayatho dṛgjvālāmālayā diśaḥ //MU_3,71.37//
GSP27moksop_u:10955: hā mukhendo tapasi kiṃ nādya tvaddantaraśmibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10957: hā hā hastau mahākārau tāv adya kva gatau mama /
GSP27moksop_u:10961: kvākāro 'mbarapūrakaḥ kva ca navaṃ tucchātmasūcīvapū rodorandhrasamaḥ kva cāsyakuharaḥ kvedaṃ ca sūcīmukham /
GSP27moksop_u:10962: kva grāso bahumāṃsabhārabahalaḥ kvābbindunā rodhanaṃ sūkṣmāsy etad aho mayaiva racitaṃ svātmakṣaye nāṭakam //MU_3,71.42//
GSP27moksop_u:10969: tad eva himavacchṛṅgaṃ jagāma tapase sthiram //MU_3,72.2//
GSP27moksop_u:10970: apaśyad evaṃ sūcītvaṃ sā tan mānasam ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:10972: athātmany eva sūcītvaṃ paśyanty eva manomayī /
GSP27moksop_u:10977: marāv akasmāt sañjātā śuṣkā tṛṇaśikhā yathā //MU_3,72.6//
GSP27moksop_u:10990: babhūva tasyās svacchā yā dvitīyā tāpasī sakhī /
GSP27moksop_u:10991: enassūcīva malinā tayā paścāt kṛtaiva sā //MU_3,72.13//
GSP27moksop_u:10993: paścāt smayatatā dṛṣṭā sā dhūlyaivātra kevalam //MU_3,72.14//
GSP27moksop_u:10994: dhūlyāpi prekṣyate yā tām api drumalatādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:10999: kausumāni rajāṃsy asyā ity āsyaṃ paryapūpuran //MU_3,72.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11001: tayā tv ahṛttvavyājena na nigīrṇaṃ mukhe 'pi sat //MU_3,72.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11014: babhūva nirmalā sūcī citsūcī pāvanī param //MU_3,72.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11015: jātā viditavedyā sā svayam eva tayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:11020: babhūva tena jvalito jajvāleva tato jagat //MU_3,72.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11021: kasyedaṃ tapasākrāntaṃ jagad ity atha vāsavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11022: nāradaṃ paripapraccha sa tasyākathayac ca tat //MU_3,72.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11025: nāgāś śvasanti vidalanti nagāḥ patanti vaimānikā jaladavāridhayaḥ prayānti /
GSP27moksop_u:11026: śoṣaṃ diśo 'rkasahitā malinībhavanti sūcyendra paśya tapasā kṣayamāyayaiva //MU_3,72.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11034: karkaṭyā himavatkukṣyāṃ ke bhuktā vibhavā mune //MU_3,73.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11037: asīt kārṣṇāyasī sūcis tasyās svam avalambanam //MU_3,73.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11042: yasyāṃ nāḍyāṃ na yo vāyur māti tat tām upetayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11043: tatra śūlaṃ kṛtaṃ mūlaṃ nyagrodhāgra ivotkaṭam //MU_3,73.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11044: tac charīrendriyais tāni tathānyāni bahūni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11057: yathā tathā prasphuritaṃ prati dehagṛhaṃ tayā //MU_3,73.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11062: suptaṃ medassu śubhreṣu śeṣāṅgeṣv iva śauriṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:11066: ahaṃ jīvamayī sūcī syām itīcchāvareṇa sā /
GSP27moksop_u:11067: sampannā mānasī sūciś cetanī pāvanī śitā //MU_3,73.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11070: pītaṃ bhuktaṃ vilasitaṃ hasitaṃ dattam āhṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:11073: kṛtam ākāśarūpiṇyā na tad asti na yat tayā //MU_3,73.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11082: bahir antaś ca vāyūnām ekatvam anuyātayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11087: ayassūcyāṃ mātarīva tatra nivṛtim eti sā //MU_3,73.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11090: sarvo vihṛtyāpi diśas svam evāspadam āpadi /
GSP27moksop_u:11092: evaṃ prayatamānā sā viharantī diśo daśa /
GSP27moksop_u:11093: mānasīṃ tṛptim āyāti na śārīrīṃ kadācana //MU_3,73.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11094: sati dharmiṇi dharmā hi sambhavantīha nāsati /
GSP27moksop_u:11095: śarīraṃ dṛśyate yasya tasya tat kila tṛpyati //MU_3,73.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11096: atha tṛptasya dehasya smaraṇāt prāktanasya sā /
GSP27moksop_u:11099: iti sañcintya tapase deśaṃ nirṇīya cātmanā //MU_3,73.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11102: sa gṛdhras tām ayassūcīṃ kāñcid evaṃsamāśritām /
GSP27moksop_u:11103: citā tayeritaś cañcvā vṛttiṃ mana ivādadhe //MU_3,73.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11104: sūcīm ādāya gṛdhro 'sau yayau taccintitaṃ girim /
GSP27moksop_u:11106: tatrājane mahāraṇye sthāpayām āsa tām asau /
GSP27moksop_u:11116: jagāma gṛdhras svaṃ deśaṃ bhāraṃ tyaktveva bhārikaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11120: na hy amūrtasya sidhyanti vinādhāraṃ kila kriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11125: araṇyānyāṃ sthitā śakra tatra varṣagaṇān bahūn //MU_3,73.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11126: tasyā varārthaṃ yatnaṃ tvaṃ kuru kartavyakovida /
GSP27moksop_u:11127: cireṇa sambhṛtaṃ lokam alaṃ dagdhuṃ hi tattapaḥ //MU_3,73.48//
GSP27moksop_u:11133: sā vātasaṃvit kṣiprā vai naiva sarvagatā satī /
GSP27moksop_u:11134: paramā cid ivāvighnaṃ sahasaiva dadarśa ha //MU_3,73.51//
GSP27moksop_u:11153: vāyur ālokayann itthaṃ jambudvīpaṃ nirīkṣya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11154: tat prāpa himavacchṛṅgaṃ yatra sūcis tapasvinī //MU_3,73.61//
GSP27moksop_u:11155: śṛṅgamūrdhni mahaty ugre so 'raṇyānīm avāpa tām /
GSP27moksop_u:11165: saptadvīpasamudramudraṇasamucchūnaikadeśāśrayaṃ bhūpīṭhaṃ parito vihṛtya pavano dīrghādhvanā jarjaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11166: tāṃ prāpyāgragiristhalīm alivapurvyomāṅgalagnām iva vyāttānantadigantapūrakabṛhaddeho viśaśrāma saḥ //MU_3,73.67//
GSP27moksop_u:11171: dadarśa madhye tāṃ sūcīṃ protthitāṃ saśikhām iva //MU_3,74.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11175: paścāt tyajantīṃ hṛdaye 'py eva māntīm anāratam //MU_3,74.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11186: bhagavatyā mahāsūcyā aho citraṃ mahat tapaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11187: ity eva kevalaṃ dhyāyan māruto gaganaṃ yayau //MU_3,74.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11189: siddhavṛndāny adhaḥ kṛtvā sūryamārgam upetya ca //MU_3,74.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11192: pṛṣṭaś ca kathayām āsa dṛṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ mayety asau /
GSP27moksop_u:11198: sthitā tapasvinī sūcī tapaś carati dāruṇam //MU_3,74.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11205: tad uttiṣṭhāśu gacchāmas sarva eva pitāmaham /
GSP27moksop_u:11207: iti vāteritaś śakras saha devagaṇena saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11208: jagāma brahmaṇo lokaṃ prārthayām āsa taṃ prabhum //MU_3,74.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11209: sūcyā ahaṃ varaṃ dātuṃ gacchāmi himavacchiraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11211: etāvatātha kālena sā babhūva ca pāvanī /
GSP27moksop_u:11219: sā tām avekṣite 'kṣṇārāt tāpād aṅge nimajjati /
GSP27moksop_u:11222: trikoṇaṃ tapasā pūtaṃ vārāṇasyās samaṃ kṛtam //MU_3,74.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11224: vāyavaḥ pāṃsavo ye 'pi te parāṃ muktim āgatāḥ //MU_3,74.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11225: viditaparamakāraṇātha jātā svayam anu cetanasaṃvidaṃ vicārya /
GSP27moksop_u:11226: svamananakalanānusāra ekas tv iha hi guruḥ paramo na rāghavānyaḥ //MU_3,74.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11233: na kiñcid vyājahārāsmai cintayām āsa kevalam //MU_3,75.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11234: pūrṇāsmi gatasandehā kiṃ vareṇa karomy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:11235: śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam //MU_3,75.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11238: yathā sthiteyam asmīha santiṣṭheyaṃ tathaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:11239: satyāsatyakalām eva tyaktvā kim itareṇa me //MU_3,75.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11243: īpsitānīpsitair arthaḥ ko bhavet kalpitair mama //MU_3,75.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11245: tūṣṇīṃ sthitāṃ sa niyates sampaśyan bhagavān sthitim //MU_3,75.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11247: varaṃ putri gṛhāṇa tvaṃ kañcit kālaṃ ca bhūtale //MU_3,75.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11248: bhogān bhuktvā tataḥ paścād gamiṣyasi paraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:11254: yogam eṣyasi bhūyas tvaṃ tanvā tadbījarūpiṇī /
GSP27moksop_u:11256: bādhāṃ viditavedyatvān na ca loke kariṣyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:11266: ity uktvā gaganatalāj jagāma devas sūcī sā bhavatu mameti kiṃ virāgaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11267: rāgo vābjajavacanārthadhāraṇe 'sminn ity antar mananamayī manāg babhūva //MU_3,75.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11268: prādeśaḥ prathamam abhūt tato 'pi hasto vyāsaṃ cāpy atha viṭapas tato 'bhramālā /
GSP27moksop_u:11270: tanmātrāṇy avikalaśaktimanti dehād udbhūtāny atha karaṇendriyāṇi samyak /
GSP27moksop_u:11271: saṅkalpadrumanavapuṣpavat samantād bīje yāny alam abhavaṃs tirohitāni //MU_3,75.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11275: athābhavad asau sūcī karkaṭī rākṣasī punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11277: nijam ākāram āsādya kiñcit pramuditā satī /
GSP27moksop_u:11281: atha sā māsaṣaṭkena dhyānād bodham upāgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:11285: atha sā kiṃ grasa iti cintayām āsa cintayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11286: bhoktavyaṃ parakīyaṃ ca nyāyena na vinā mayā //MU_3,76.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11287: yad āryagarhitaṃ yad vā nyāyena na samarjitam /
GSP27moksop_u:11288: tasmād grāsād varaṃ manye maraṇaṃ dehinām iha //MU_3,76.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11289: yadi dehaṃ tyajāmīmaṃ tan nyāyopārjitaṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:11290: na kiñcid admi nirnyāyaṃ bhukto 'rtho hi garāyate //MU_3,76.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11291: yan na lokakramaprāptaṃ tena bhuktena kiṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:11292: na jīvitena no mṛtyā kiñcit kāraṇam asti me //MU_3,76.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11295: evaṃ sthitā maunavatī śuśrāva gaganād giram /
GSP27moksop_u:11297: gaccha karkaṭi mūḍhāṃs tvaṃ jñānenāśv avabodhaya /
GSP27moksop_u:11299: bodhyamāno bhavatyāpi yo na bodham upaiṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:11300: svanāśāyaiva jāto 'sau nyāyyo grāso bhavet tava //MU_3,76.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11308: tadanu gatavatī niśācarī sā niśi sughanāndhatamisramārgabhūmau //MU_3,76.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11343: mantriṇā saha bhūpālas tasminn avasare tadā //MU_3,77.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11346: aṭavyāṃ karkaṭī sā tau carantau rājamantriṇau /
GSP27moksop_u:11348: atha sā cintayām āsa labdho bhakṣo 'dya ho mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11349: mūḍhāv etāv anātmajñau bhāro dehaḥ kilānayoḥ //MU_3,77.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11350: ihāmutra ca nāśāya mūḍho duḥkhāya jīvati /
GSP27moksop_u:11352: apaśyatas svam ātmānaṃ mṛtir mūḍhasya jīvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:11356: tasmād imau mayaivādya bhoktavyau bhojyatāṃ gatau /
GSP27moksop_u:11357: abhavya eva nirdoṣaṃ prāptam artham upekṣate //MU_3,77.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11358: mā kadācid imau syātāṃ guṇayuktau mahāśayau /
GSP27moksop_u:11359: tādṛṅnaravināśo hi svabhāvān me na rocate //MU_3,77.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11360: tad etau samparīkṣe 'haṃ yadi tāvad guṇānvitau /
GSP27moksop_u:11361: tad bhakṣyaṃ na karomy etau na hiṃsyā guṇinaḥ kvacit //MU_3,77.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11364: yadi naśyāmi dehena tan na bhokṣye guṇānvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:11365: sukhayanti hi cetāṃsi jīvitād api sādhavaḥ //MU_3,77.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11376: ādau vicārya suguṇāguṇaleśayuktim āgas tato 'dhikataraṃ ca guṇād yādi syāt /
GSP27moksop_u:11377: kuryāt tatas samupapattivaśena daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyasya laghv atha dṛḍhaṃ dhanasambhave vā //MU_3,77.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11387: kau bhavantau mahābuddhī durbuddhī vā samāgatau /
GSP27moksop_u:11390: bho bho bhūtaka kiṃ syās tvaṃ kva tiṣṭhasi ca dehakam /
GSP27moksop_u:11391: darśayāsyās tava giraḥ ko bibhety alinīdhvaneḥ //MU_3,78.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11394: na kiñcid dīrghasūtrāṇāṃ sidhyaty ātmakṣayād ṛte //MU_3,78.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11396: rājñety ukte ramyam uktam iti sañcintya sā tayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11397: prakāśāyāpy adhairyāya nanāda ca jahāsa ca //MU_3,78.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11421: na tad asti vimohāya yad viviktasya cetasaḥ //MU_3,78.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11423: mahārākṣasi saṃrambho hāsātmā kim ayaṃ tava /
GSP27moksop_u:11424: laghavo hy atha vā nāryo lāghave 'py atisambhramāḥ //MU_3,78.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11425: tyaja saṃrambham ārambho nāyaṃ tava virājate /
GSP27moksop_u:11430: yuktyā ca vyavahāriṇyā so 'rthaḥ prājñena sādhyate //MU_3,78.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11433: kathayābhimataṃ kiṃ te kim arthayasi vārthinī /
GSP27moksop_u:11436: ity uktā sā tadā tena cintayām āsa rākṣasī /
GSP27moksop_u:11438: na sāmānyāv imau manye citraiveyaṃ camatkṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11442: ābhyāṃ prāyaḥ parijñāto mama bhāvo 'nayor mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11443: na vināśyau mayemau vā svayam evāvināśinau //MU_3,78.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11444: manye bhavata ātmajñau nātmajñānād ṛte matiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11446: tad etau paripṛcchāmi kañcit sandeham utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:11447: prāpyaṃ prāpya na pṛcchanti ye kiñcit te narādhamāḥ //MU_3,78.31//
GSP27moksop_u:11448: iti sañcintya pṛcchāyai tan nānāvasaraṃ tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:11450: kau bhavantau narau vīrau kathyatām iti me 'naghau /
GSP27moksop_u:11453: ayaṃ rājā kirātānām asyāhaṃ mantritāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11458: rājñas tvam asi durmantrī durmantritvād arāḍ ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:11459: sadbhūpasya bhaven mantrī rājā sanmantriṇā bhavet //MU_3,78.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11461: tenāryatām upāyāti yathā rājā tathā prajāḥ //MU_3,78.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11463: tadvad rājā bhaved rājā tadvan mantrī ca mantravit //MU_3,78.38//
GSP27moksop_u:11464: prabhutvaṃ samadṛṣṭitvaṃ tac ca syād rājavidyayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11465: tām eva yo na jānāti nāsau mantrī na so 'dhipaḥ //MU_3,78.39//
GSP27moksop_u:11466: bhavantau tadvidau sādhū yadi tac chreya āpsyathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11467: no ced anarthadau svasyāḥ prakṛter nādmy ahaṃ yuvām //MU_3,78.40//
GSP27moksop_u:11470: praśnāni māṃ kathaya pārthiva nātha mantrinn atrārthinī bhṛśam ahaṃ paripūrayārtham /
GSP27moksop_u:11471: aṅgīkṛtārtham adadat ka ivāsti loke doṣeṇa saṅkṣayakareṇa na yujyate yaḥ //MU_3,78.42//
GSP27moksop_u:11475: ity uktvā rākṣasī praśnān sā vaktum upacakrame /
GSP27moksop_u:11476: ucyatām iti rājñokte tān imāñ śṛṇu rāghava //MU_3,79.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11480: kim ākāśam anākāśaṃ nakiñcit kiñcid eva kim /
GSP27moksop_u:11481: ko 'ham evāpi sampannaḥ ko bhavān apy ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_3,79.3//
GSP27moksop_u:11482: gacchan na gacchati ca kaḥ ko 'tiṣṭhann eva tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:11483: kaś cetano 'pi pāṣāṇaḥ kaś cidvyomani citrakṛt //MU_3,79.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11484: vahnitām ajahac caiva kaś ca vahnir na dāhakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11485: avahner jāyate vahniḥ kasmād rājan nirantaram //MU_3,79.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11487: anetralabhyāt kasmāc ca prakāśaś ca pravartate //MU_3,79.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11489: anyeṣām apy anakṣāṇām ālokaḥ ka ivottamaḥ //MU_3,79.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11491: ko jagadratnakośas syāt kasya kośe maṇer jagat //MU_3,79.8//
GSP27moksop_u:11492: ko 'ṇus tamaḥ prakāśaś ca ko 'ṇur asti ca nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11493: ko 'ṇur dūre 'py adūre ca ko 'ṇur eva mahāgiriḥ //MU_3,79.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11494: nimeṣa eva kaḥ kalpaḥ kaḥ kalpo 'pi nimeṣakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11495: kiṃ pratyakṣam asadrūpaṃ kiṃ cetanam acetanam //MU_3,79.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11496: kaś cāvāyuś ca vāyuś ca kaś śabdo 'śabda eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11497: kas sarvaṃ ca nakiñcid ca ko 'haṃ nāhaṃ ca kiṃ bhavet //MU_3,79.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11499: labdhaṃ nakiñcid bhavati nanu sarvaṃ ca labhyate //MU_3,79.12//
GSP27moksop_u:11503: ko 'ṇur eva bhavan māti na yojanaśateṣv api //MU_3,79.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11511: kena santyajatā sarvam aṇunā sarvam āśritam //MU_3,79.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11516: aṇau jaganti tiṣṭhanti kasmin bīja iva drumāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11521: dṛśyaṃ paśyan svam ātmānaṃ ko na paśyati netravat //MU_3,79.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11523: dṛśyāsampattaye paśyan puro dṛśyaṃ na paśyati //MU_3,79.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11524: ātmānaṃ darśanaṃ dṛśyaṃ ko bhāsayati dṛśyavat /
GSP27moksop_u:11525: kaṭakādīni hemneva nigīrṇaṃ kena ca trayam //MU_3,79.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11526: kasmān na kiñcic ca pṛthag ūrmyādīva mahāmbhasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11529: dvaitam apy apṛthak kasmād dravateva mahāmbhasaḥ //MU_3,79.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11530: ātmānaṃ darśanaṃ dṛśyaṃ sad asac ca gatakramam /
GSP27moksop_u:11533: nityaṃ samasya kasyāntar bījasyāntar iva drumaḥ //MU_3,79.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11535: svayam ekam asadrūpam udety anudito 'pi kaḥ //MU_3,79.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11538: kenedam ātatam anekacid eva viśvaṃ kiṃsāra evam abhivalgasi haṃsi pāsi /
GSP27moksop_u:11539: kiṃdarśanena na bhavasy atha vā sad eva nūnaṃ bhavasy asamadṛg vada tatpraśāntyai //MU_3,79.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11541: yasyāgre na galati saṃśayas samūlo naivāsau kvacid api paṇḍitoktim eti //MU_3,79.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11542: enaṃ me yadi na nayiṣyathaḥ kramoktyā saṃśāntiṃ laghutarasaṃśayaṃ subuddhī /
GSP27moksop_u:11543: tad rakṣojaṭharahutāśanendhanatvaṃ nirvighnaṃ jhagiti gamiṣyathaḥ kṣaṇena //MU_3,79.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11544: paścāt tāṃ janapadamaṇḍalīṃ samantād bhāvatkīm urujaṭharā kṣaṇād grase 'ham /
GSP27moksop_u:11545: evaṃ te bhavati surājateva manye mūrkhānām atirasa eva saṅkṣayāya //MU_3,79.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11546: ity uktvā vipulagabhīrameghanāda prollāsaprakaṭagirā niśācarī sā /
GSP27moksop_u:11552: iti prokte mahāpraśne mahāmantrī giraṃ dadau //MU_3,80.1//
GSP27moksop_u:11554: śṛṇu toyadasaṅkāśe praśnam enaṃ bhinadmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:11559: cinmātram evam ātmāṇur ākāśād api sūkṣmakaḥ //MU_3,80.4//
GSP27moksop_u:11560: cidaṇoḥ paramasyāntas sad evāsad iva sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:11561: sattāpy evam asatteva sphuratīdaṃ jagat sthitam //MU_3,80.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11564: atīndriyatvān no kiñcit sa evāṇur anantakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11565: sarvātmakatvād bhuṅkte ca tena kiñcin na kiñcana //MU_3,80.7//
GSP27moksop_u:11568: eṣo 'ṇuḥ paramākāśas sūkṣmaḥ khād apy alakṣitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11570: sarvātmakas syān naivāsau śūnyo bhavati karhicit /
GSP27moksop_u:11571: yad asti na tad astīti vaktonmatta iti smṛtaḥ //MU_3,80.10//
GSP27moksop_u:11572: kayācid api yuktyeha sato 'sattvaṃ na yujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:11574: cinmātrāṇus sa eveha sarvaṃ kiñcid ghanaṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11577: sa evedaṃ jagad dhatte jagatkoṭīs tathaiva ca //MU_3,80.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11579: prajās tasmin kacanty apsu dravatvāc cakratā iva //MU_3,80.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11582: so 'haṃ bhavann eva bhavāt sampanno dvaitavedanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:11585: na tvaṃ nāhaṃ na sarvaṃ vāsarvaṃ vā bhavati svayam //MU_3,80.17//
GSP27moksop_u:11586: gacchan na gacchaty eṣo 'ṇur yojanaughagato 'pi san /
GSP27moksop_u:11588: na gacchaty eṣa yāto 'pi samprāpto 'pi na cāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11590: gamyaṃ yasya śarīrasthaṃ kva kilāsau prayāti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:11593: antassthas sarvakartuś ca sa kathaṃ kveva gacchati //MU_3,80.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11597: cetanaś ca jaḍaś caiva tadāsau dvayam eva hi //MU_3,80.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11599: tadā cetana evāsau pāṣāṇa iva rākṣasi //MU_3,80.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11601: vicitraṃ trijagac citraṃ tenedam akṛtaṃ kṛtam //MU_3,80.25//
GSP27moksop_u:11615: svāmī kartā pitā bhoktā khātmatvāc ca na kiñcana //MU_3,80.32//
GSP27moksop_u:11618: sa eva sarvajagati sarvatra kacati sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:11619: yadā jagat samudge 'smiṃs tadāsau paramo maṇiḥ //MU_3,80.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11623: sarvasaṃvedanāc chailā asāv evāṇur eva san //MU_3,80.36//
GSP27moksop_u:11624: tat saṃvedanamātraṃ yat tad idaṃ bhāsate jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:11625: na satyam asti śailādi tenāṇāv eva merutā //MU_3,80.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11633: yatrāṇāv eva vidyante tatra dvaitaikate kutaḥ //MU_3,80.41//
GSP27moksop_u:11634: kṛtavān prāg idam aham iti buddhāv udeti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:11636: duḥkhe kālas sudīrgho hi sukhe laghutaras sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:11638: niścayo ya udety antas satyo vāsatya eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:11640: na nimeṣo 'sti no kalpo nādūraṃ na ca dūratā /
GSP27moksop_u:11643: ekacitkośayor evaṃ na bhedo 'sti manāg api //MU_3,80.46//
GSP27moksop_u:11646: yāvat kaṭakasaṃvittis tāvan nāsty eva hematā /
GSP27moksop_u:11647: yāvac ca dṛśyatāpattis tāvan nāsty eva sā kalā //MU_3,80.48//
GSP27moksop_u:11655: ekaṃ pīvaram advaitaṃ tathā cidbhāsanaṃ jagat //MU_3,80.52//
GSP27moksop_u:11657: astitānāstite tatra kuḍyāder iva kaiva dhīḥ //MU_3,80.53//
GSP27moksop_u:11659: tathā jagad idaṃ bhāti ciccetyakalane kutaḥ //MU_3,80.54//
GSP27moksop_u:11661: na san nāsad yathā tadvad viddhi dīrghabhramaṃ jagat //MU_3,80.55//
GSP27moksop_u:11665: ā brahmajīvakalanād yad rūḍhaṃ rūḍham eva tat //MU_3,80.57//
GSP27moksop_u:11674: śāntaṃ samastam ajam ekam anādimadhyaṃ nehāsti kācana kalā kalanāḥ kathañcit /
GSP27moksop_u:11675: nirdvandvaśāntam atirekam anekam accham ābhāsarūpam alam ekavikāsam āssva //MU_3,80.62//
GSP27moksop_u:11679: aho nu paramārthoktiḥ pāvanī tava mantriṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11683: tato na kiñcid vāyvādi kevalaṃ śuddhacetanam //MU_3,81.2//
GSP27moksop_u:11686: so 'ṇus sarvaṃ nakiñcic ca so 'haṃ nāhaṃ sa eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11688: ātmā yatnaśataiḥ prāpyo labdhe 'smin na ca kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:11689: labdhaṃ bhavati tac caitat paramaṃ nāma kiñcana //MU_3,81.5//
GSP27moksop_u:11691: vikasaty udito yāvan na bodho mūlakāṣakṛt //MU_3,81.6//
GSP27moksop_u:11692: aṇunānena rūpaṃ svaṃ dṛśyatām iva gacchatā /
GSP27moksop_u:11694: anena saṃvidaṃ nānā merus tribhuvanaṃ tṛṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:11696: cidaṇor antare yad yad asti tad dṛśyate bahiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11701: tat tathā paśyatīvāsau dṛṣṭānto 'tra śiśor manaḥ //MU_3,81.11//
GSP27moksop_u:11704: aṇur eva na māty eṣa yojanānāṃ śateṣv api /
GSP27moksop_u:11706: yathā dhūrtena śiḍgena puṃsā bālaḥ pranāṭyate /
GSP27moksop_u:11711: saṃvidantar bhaved bāhye kṛtvā mervādi veṣṭitam //MU_3,81.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11715: śobhate na hi sāmyoktir merusarṣapayor iva //MU_3,81.18//
GSP27moksop_u:11719: svasattānāśapūrvo hi vinānena bhavet tu saḥ //MU_3,81.20//
GSP27moksop_u:11720: yadi sūryādikaṃ sarvaṃ jagad ekajaḍaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:11721: tataḥ kim ātmā kiṃ rūpaṃ prakāśas syāt kva vātha kim //MU_3,81.21//
GSP27moksop_u:11723: tad etad aṇunā tejo dṛṣṭaṃ bahir iva sthitam //MU_3,81.22//
GSP27moksop_u:11725: etāvān atra bhedo 'sti yad varṇe śauklyakṛṣṇate //MU_3,81.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11727: tādṛk prakāśatamasor bhedaś ceti tayos sthitaḥ //MU_3,81.24//
GSP27moksop_u:11735: tapyate bhāsayā bhāsā sarvam ābhāsyate tamaḥ //MU_3,81.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11738: arkaḥ kurvann ahorātraṃ darśayaty ākṛtiṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:11739: citis sadasatī kṛtvā darśayaty ākṛtiṃ tathā //MU_3,81.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11746: yo yo nāma rasaḥ kaścit svasattāyāṃ kṛtasthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11747: pratibimbam ivādarśe tāṃ vinā nāsty asau svataḥ //MU_3,81.34//
GSP27moksop_u:11749: tyaktaṃ jagad asaṃvittyā saṃvittyā sarvam āśritam //MU_3,81.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11753: manāg api kṣaṇam api gajo dūrvāvane yathā //MU_3,81.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11754: tathāpy ākrāntavān viśvaṃ jñatāṃ gopayati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:11760: satyaṃ cinmayam evedaṃ jagad ity eva viddhy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:11768: abhuktavaty eva yathā bhuktavān aham ity alam /
GSP27moksop_u:11773: pratibhāsāḥ pravartante tata eva hi jāgatāḥ //MU_3,81.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11774: yad asti yatra tat tasmāt samudeti tad eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:11779: valitau naiṣa caitābhyām aṇus svāṅgātmakaś citaḥ //MU_3,81.50//
GSP27moksop_u:11780: udāsīnavad āsīno na saṃspṛṣṭo manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:11781: eṣa bhoktṛtvakartṛtvaiḥ khātmā kurvañ jaganty api //MU_3,81.51//
GSP27moksop_u:11784: jagan na kiñcit kriyate sarvadaiva na kenacit /
GSP27moksop_u:11785: vilīyate ca no kiñcin mātrasyādy asya khaṇḍanam //MU_3,81.53//
GSP27moksop_u:11790: etad bahisstham antasstham asti śabde na vastuni /
GSP27moksop_u:11793: netraṃ dṛśyābhipātīva sad evāsad iva sthitam //MU_3,81.57//
GSP27moksop_u:11794: na ca gacchati dṛśyatvaṃ draṣṭā hy asad avāstavam /
GSP27moksop_u:11795: ātmany eva na yat kiñcit tattām eti kathaṃ puraḥ //MU_3,81.58//
GSP27moksop_u:11796: dṛg eva locane sā ca vāsanā tan nijaṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11798: na vinā draṣṭṛtām asti dṛśyasattā kathañcana /
GSP27moksop_u:11800: draṣṭaiva dṛśyatām eti na draṣṭṛtvaṃ vināsti tat /
GSP27moksop_u:11801: vinā pitreva tanayo vinā bhoktreva bhogyatā //MU_3,81.61//
GSP27moksop_u:11802: draṣṭur hi dṛśyanirmāṇe cittvād asty eva śaktatā /
GSP27moksop_u:11806: cetanād dṛśyanirmāṇaṃ cit kacaty asad eva yat /
GSP27moksop_u:11808: kaṭakatvāvabhāse hi yathā hemno na hematā /
GSP27moksop_u:11809: satyaiva prakacaty evaṃ draṣṭur dṛśyasthitau vapuḥ //MU_3,81.65//
GSP27moksop_u:11810: draṣṭā dṛśyatayā tiṣṭhan draṣṭṛtām ujjhatīva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:11814: dṛśyaṃ paśyan svam ātmānaṃ na draṣṭā svaṃ prapaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:11818: dṛśye 'saty asti na draṣṭā dṛśyaṃ draṣṭari nāsati /
GSP27moksop_u:11819: dvayena ca vinā naikyaṃ naikyam apy asti cānayoḥ //MU_3,81.70//
GSP27moksop_u:11826: yathā na jalam ūrmyādeḥ pṛthak kiñcin manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:11827: tathaitasmāt svabhāvāṇor na kiñcit pṛthag eva hi //MU_3,81.74//
GSP27moksop_u:11836: yadi kaścid dvitīyas syāt tad ekasyaikatā bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:11838: yatra nāsti dvitīyo hi tatraikasyaikatā katham /
GSP27moksop_u:11839: ekatāyām asiddhāyāṃ dvayam eva na vidyate //MU_3,81.80//
GSP27moksop_u:11840: evaṃ sthite tu yac chiṣṭaṃ tat syād riktam ihāsthiteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11841: tasmān na vyatiriktaṃ tadrūpaṃ drava ivāmbhasaḥ //MU_3,81.81//
GSP27moksop_u:11843: bījasyāntas tarur iva brahmaṇo 'ntas sthitaṃ jagat //MU_3,81.82//
GSP27moksop_u:11844: dvaitam apy apṛthak tasmād dhemnaḥ kaṭakatā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:11845: sāmyabuddhāvabodhe hi dvaitaṃ sac ca nasanmayam //MU_3,81.83//
GSP27moksop_u:11847: vyomnaś śūnyatvam evaṃ hi na pṛthag dvaitam īśvarāt //MU_3,81.84//
GSP27moksop_u:11849: nipuṇo 'nupalambho yas tv etayos tat paraṃ viduḥ //MU_3,81.85//
GSP27moksop_u:11851: etāvaj jagad etac ca paramāṇau citas sthitam //MU_3,81.86//
GSP27moksop_u:11853: spandanaṃ pavaneneva svāṅga eva dhṛtaḥ kutaḥ //MU_3,81.87//
GSP27moksop_u:11854: aho nu bhīmā māyeyam atha vā māyitā parā /
GSP27moksop_u:11861: parayā dṛśyate dṛṣṭyā jagac ca cidaṇūdare //MU_3,81.91//
GSP27moksop_u:11863: yathā tarus sthitas tadvad vikāsi cidaṇau jagat //MU_3,81.92//
GSP27moksop_u:11865: jagac citparamāṇvantar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_3,81.93//
GSP27moksop_u:11866: na dvaitaṃ na ca vādvaitaṃ na bījaṃ na ca vāṅkuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11867: na sthūlaṃ na ca vā sūkṣmaṃ nājātaṃ jātam eva no //MU_3,81.94//
GSP27moksop_u:11868: na cāsti na ca nāstīdaṃ na somyaṃ kṣubhitaṃ na ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11869: trijagaccidaṇor antas sattvaṃ vātha na kiñcana //MU_3,81.95//
GSP27moksop_u:11870: na jagan nājagad vāsti vidyate citparāṇutā /
GSP27moksop_u:11871: sarvātmikā yadā yatra yā yathodeti tat tathā //MU_3,81.96//
GSP27moksop_u:11879: dṛśyaḥ kila bise tantur adṛśyākṣṇā parātmatā //MU_3,81.100//
GSP27moksop_u:11882: etena tena mahatā paramāṇunā ca vyāptaṃ tataṃ viracitaṃ janitaṃ kṛtaṃ ca /
GSP27moksop_u:11883: viśvaprapañcaracanaṃ nabhaseva viṣvak śūnyatvam accham abhitaḥ parilabdham eva //MU_3,81.102//
GSP27moksop_u:11884: dvaitena sundarataraṃ svam anujjhateva rūpaṃ suṣuptasadṛśena parāvabodhāt /
GSP27moksop_u:11885: aikyaṃ gataṃ sthitagamāgamamuktam evam itthaṃ sthitaṃ nanu jagat paramārthapiṇḍaḥ //MU_3,81.103//
GSP27moksop_u:11893: tayā rājagirā tasyā ānanda udabhūd bhṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:11896: aho bata pavitreyaṃ bhavator bhāti śemuṣī /
GSP27moksop_u:11904: mahatām eva saṃsargāt punar duḥkhaṃ na bādhate /
GSP27moksop_u:11907: pūjanīyāv ataś śīghram īhitaṃ kathyatāṃ śubham //MU_3,82.9//
GSP27moksop_u:11913: śūlāni hṛdaye nṝṇāṃ na śāmyanti yadauṣadhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11916: nigrahārthaṃ pravṛttir me sā ca sampattim etv alam //MU_3,82.13//
GSP27moksop_u:11917: etāvad eva ca śubhe nanv aṅgīkriyatāṃ tvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11918: bhūyo bhavatyā yat prāṇā hiṃsanīyā na kasyacit //MU_3,82.14//
GSP27moksop_u:11920: bāḍham evaṃ karomy adyaprabhṛty avitathaṃ prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:11921: satyam evaṃ na kiñcid dhi hiṃsanīyaṃ mayādhunā //MU_3,82.15//
GSP27moksop_u:11924: kiṃ syāc charīravṛttyā te sthitāyā matsamīhite //MU_3,82.16//
GSP27moksop_u:11928: idānīṃ śikharaṃ gatvā tad eva dhyānaniścalā /
GSP27moksop_u:11931: yatheccham atha kālena tyakṣyāmīti matir mama //MU_3,82.19//
GSP27moksop_u:11939: viṣūcikā prāṇaharā syāṃ sūkṣmāsmīti vai mayā //MU_3,82.23//
GSP27moksop_u:11942: tvayā na guṇino hiṃsyā iti me brahmaṇā kṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11945: śamam eṣyati loke 'smin kā kathā matkṛte bhrame //MU_3,82.26//
GSP27moksop_u:11946: virataivāsmi hiṃsāto yat purā hiṃsitaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:11947: janasya hṛdayaṃ tena nāḍyo vaidhuryam āgatāḥ //MU_3,82.27//
GSP27moksop_u:11948: hiṃsitvā raktamāṃsāni santyaktā ye mayā janāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11949: tebhyo vidhuranāḍibhyo ye jātās te 'pi tādṛśāḥ //MU_3,82.28//
GSP27moksop_u:11950: rājan viṣūcikāmantras so 'yaṃ sampanna eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:11951: na hi sattvavatām asti dussādhyam iha kiñcana //MU_3,82.29//
GSP27moksop_u:11953: mantro yo brāhmaṇā prokto rājañ śīghraṃ gṛhāṇa tam //MU_3,82.30//
GSP27moksop_u:11954: āgaccha nikaṭaṃ nadyā gacchāmas tatra bhūpate /
GSP27moksop_u:11960: jñātvā sthitau tau svācāntāv ubhāv ante nivāsinau //MU_3,82.33//
GSP27moksop_u:11964: yadā gantuṃ pravṛttāsau tadā rājābravīd vacaḥ //MU_3,82.35//
GSP27moksop_u:11966: gurus tvaṃ nau mahādevi vayasyā ca sunirvṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:11969: sauhārdaṃ sujanānāṃ hi darśanād eva vardhate //MU_3,82.37//
GSP27moksop_u:11975: rakṣo'nnam eva me tuṣṭyai na sāmānyajanāśanam /
GSP27moksop_u:11983: ādāya vadhyāñ śataśaḥ puruṣāṃs tān svasañcitān //MU_3,82.43//
GSP27moksop_u:11986: suptā nidrāṃ parityajya bhava bhūyas samādhibhāk /
GSP27moksop_u:11988: neṣyasy anyān vadhyanarān hiṃsā naiṣā ca dharmataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:11991: asatām api saṃrūḍhaṃ sauhārdaṃ na nivartate //MU_3,82.47//
GSP27moksop_u:11993: yuktam uktaṃ tvayā rājan karomy evam ahaṃ sakhe /
GSP27moksop_u:11996: ity uktvā rākṣasī tatra sampannā sā vilāsinī /
GSP27moksop_u:11998: rājann āgaccha gacchāma ity uktvā nṛpamantriṇau /
GSP27moksop_u:11999: agre gantuṃ pravṛttau tau rātrāv anusasāra sā //MU_3,82.50//
GSP27moksop_u:12000: atha te pārthivagṛhaṃ prāpya tāṃ rajanīṃ mithaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12007: sā babhūva niśākāle saivogrā kṛṣṇā rākṣasī //MU_3,82.54//
GSP27moksop_u:12010: yayau rājānam āpṛcchya tad eva himavacchiraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12012: tatrā tṛpter bhṛśaṃ bhuktvā sukhaṃ suptvā dinadvayam /
GSP27moksop_u:12013: āsīt prabuddhā susvacchā sā samādhivatī punaḥ //MU_3,82.57//
GSP27moksop_u:12014: pañcabhir vā tribhir vāpi varṣais sā samprabudhyati /
GSP27moksop_u:12015: tat tato maṇḍalaṃ yāti tena rājñā ca pūjyate //MU_3,82.58//
GSP27moksop_u:12016: tatra viśrambhagarbhābhiḥ kathābhiḥ kañcid eva sā /
GSP27moksop_u:12017: sthitvā kālaṃ gṛhītvā tān vadhyān svāspadam ety atha //MU_3,82.59//
GSP27moksop_u:12025: kirātamaṇḍale tasmin ye ye santi mahībhṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12026: tais tais saha parā maitrī tasyās samabhijāyate //MU_3,83.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12028: rogāṃś ca yogasiddhā sā nivārayati rākṣasī //MU_3,83.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12031: adyāpi tatra ye vadhyās te tadarthaṃ mahībhujā /
GSP27moksop_u:12037: tataḥ prabhṛti tatrānyo yo yo bhavati bhūmipaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12039: yaḥ kandarāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ vā na karoti nṛpo 'dhamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12050: etat te kathitaṃ sarvam upākhyānam aninditam /
GSP27moksop_u:12054: kathaṃ ca karkaṭī nāmnā yathāvad vada me prabho //MU_3,84.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12057: tāni kṛṣṇāni śuklāni haritāny ujjvalāni ca //MU_3,84.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12059: babhūva tajjā sā kṛṣṇā karkaṭī karkaṭākṛtiḥ //MU_3,84.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12062: sampannam evam ekasmād asampannam api sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:12064: bhāvinyo vīcayo vāriṇy anyānanyās sthitā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12065: vartamānā api pare sṛṣṭayas saṃsthitās tathā //MU_3,84.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12066: ajvalann eva kāṣṭheṣu vahnir arthakriyāṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12069: tathā brahma karotīdaṃ nānākarteva saj jagat //MU_3,84.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12070: apy anāgata evāyam evaṃ sarga upāgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12072: bījād yathānanyad api phalādy anyad ivotthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:12073: cites tathānanyad api cetyam anyad ivotthitam //MU_3,84.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12075: ciccetyayoś ca vāryūrmyor iva vastuni kaścana //MU_3,84.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12077: yataḥ kutaścid uditas sa vicāreṇa naśyati //MU_3,84.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12078: bhrāntir eṣā yathāyātā tathā yātu raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:12079: jñāsyasy etat prabuddhas tvam enāṃ kevalam utsṛja //MU_3,84.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12082: cittād iyam anarthaśrīs tac ca sā cetaraś ca te /
GSP27moksop_u:12084: brahmaṇas sarvam utpannaṃ sarvaṃ brahmaiva ceti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:12085: madgīrbhis samprabuddhas sañ jñāsyasy alam anindita //MU_3,84.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12088: nanu kiṃ vakṣi deveśād abhinnaṃ sarvam ity api //MU_3,84.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12092: bhedo dṛśyata evāyaṃ vyavahārān na vāstavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12095: asti tasyām īdṛśas syāt kutas saṅkalpaviplavaḥ //MU_3,84.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12101: ajñānām avabodhārthaṃ na tu bhedo 'sti vastuni //MU_3,84.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12102: asambodhād ayaṃ bhedo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12107: upadeśād ayaṃ vādo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate //MU_3,84.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12109: na ca dvaitaṃ sambhavati maunaṃ vā vāca ity alam //MU_3,84.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12111: vacobhedam anādṛtya yad idaṃ vacmi tac chṛṇu //MU_3,84.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12116: yaṃ śrutvā sarvam evedaṃ bhrāntimātram iti svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:12117: rāma niścayavān bhūtvā dūre tyakṣyasi vāsanām //MU_3,84.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12119: sarvam utsṛjya śāntātmā svātmany eva nivatsyasi //MU_3,84.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12122: evaṃ sthite jagadrūpaṃ cittam eveha jṛmbhate /
GSP27moksop_u:12125: tad eva tair vinirmuktaṃ bhavānta iti kathyate //MU_3,84.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12126: cittaṃ sādhyaṃ pālanīyaṃ vicāryaṃ kāryam āryavat /
GSP27moksop_u:12127: āhāryaṃ vyavahāryaṃ ca sañcāryaṃ dhāryam ādarāt //MU_3,84.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12128: evam abhyantare citraṃ bibharti trijagan manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12129: aṇḍaṃ māyūram iva tad yathākālaṃ vijṛmbhate //MU_3,84.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12131: yaś cāsya jaḍabhāgas svas taj jagat so 'ṅga vibhramaḥ //MU_3,84.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12133: nirākṛtir ajas svapnaṃ paśyatīva na paśyati //MU_3,84.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12135: sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmavidā vetti dehaṃ śūnyaṃ na vāstavam //MU_3,84.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12139: bodhato 'sau paraṃ rūpaṃ svaṃ paśyati nirāmayam //MU_3,84.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12142: yat kathyate hi hṛdayaṅgamayopamānayuktyā girā madhuramugdhapadārthayā ca /
GSP27moksop_u:12143: śrotus tad aṅga hṛdayaṃ parito visāri vyāpnoti tailam iva vāriṇi vāry aśaṅkam //MU_3,84.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12144: tyaktopamānam amanojñapadaṃ durarthaṃ kṣubdhaṃ tvarāvidhuritaṃ vinigīrṇavarṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:12145: śrotur na yāti hṛdayaṃ pravināśam eva saṃyāti cājyam iva bhasmani hūyamānam //MU_3,84.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12146: ākhyānakāni bhuvi yāni kathāś ca yā yā yad yat prameyam uditaṃ paripeśalaṃ vā /
GSP27moksop_u:12147: dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭikathanena tad eti sādho prākāśyam āśu bhuvanaṃ sitaraśmineva //MU_3,84.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12152: yad idaṃ tat pravakṣyāmi tvayi pṛcchati rāghava //MU_3,85.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12153: purā mayā hi bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ kamalasambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12154: ime katham upāyānti brahman sargagaṇā iti //MU_3,85.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12156: evaṃ hi mana evedam itthaṃ sphurati bhūtavat /
GSP27moksop_u:12157: calair jalāśayas sphārair vicitraiś cakrakair iva //MU_3,85.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12159: purākalpe hi kasmiṃścic chṛṇu kiṃ vṛttam aṅga me //MU_3,85.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12161: eka evāham ekāgras svasthas svām anayaṃ niśām //MU_3,85.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12162: niśānte samprabuddhas san sāndhyāṃ kṛtvā tathā vidhim /
GSP27moksop_u:12163: prajā draṣṭuṃ dṛśas sphāre vyomni yojitavān aham //MU_3,85.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12164: yāvat paśyāmi gaganaṃ na tamobhir na tejasā /
GSP27moksop_u:12166: sargaṃ saṅkalpayāmīmam iti niścitya tan mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:12180: divi krīḍanti vibudhā bhuvi krīḍanti mānavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12181: dānavā bhoginaś caiva pātāleṣu sukhaṃ sthitāḥ //MU_3,85.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12188: saptalokās tathā dvīpās samudrā girayas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12190: kvacid rātritvam āyātaṃ kvacit sthiratayā sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:12206: itaś cetaś ca gacchanti śīryante prodbhavanti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:12214: evam ālokya śuddhena pareṇa svena tejasā /
GSP27moksop_u:12215: bhṛśaṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kim etat katham ity aham //MU_3,85.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12216: kathaṃ māṃsamayenākṣṇā yan na paśyāmi kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:12219: arkaṃ tasmāj jagajjālād ekam ānīya pṛṣṭavān //MU_3,85.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12221: svāgataṃ te 'stv iti proktaṃ mayāsau kathito 'py atha //MU_3,85.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12222: kas tvaṃ katham idaṃ jātaṃ jagad ekaṃ jaganti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:12223: yadi jānāsi bhagavaṃs tad etat kathayānagha //MU_3,85.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12224: ity ukto mām asāv arkas samparijñātavān atha /
GSP27moksop_u:12228: gataḥ kasmān na jānīṣe kiṃ mām īśvara pṛcchasi //MU_3,85.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12229: atha madvākyasandarbhe līlā cet tava sarvaga /
GSP27moksop_u:12230: acintitāt samutpannaṃ tac chṛṇu tvaṃ vadāmy aham //MU_3,85.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12231: sad asad iti kalābhir ātataṃ sad bhramabharabhedavimohadāyinībhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12232: pravitataracanābhir īśvarātma pravilasatīha mano mahan mahātman //MU_3,85.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12243: na babhūvātmajas tasya marubhūmes tṛṇaṃ yathā //MU_3,86.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12244: na vyarājata sā bhāryā tasya niṣphalapuṣpitā /
GSP27moksop_u:12245: ṛjvī gaurī suśuddhāpi śūnyā śaralatā yathā //MU_3,86.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12246: tau tato dampatī khinnau putrārthaṃ tapase gireḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12249: tepāte tau tapo ghoraṃ jalāhārau tarusthitau //MU_3,86.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12251: nispandam utthitau vārkṣīṃ vṛttim āśritya saṃsthitau //MU_3,86.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12252: tasthatus tau tadā tatra tāvad vanataruvratau /
GSP27moksop_u:12253: yāvat tretā dvāparaś ca yuge dve eva te gate //MU_3,86.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12256: ājagāma tam uddeśaṃ yatra tau vipradampatī /
GSP27moksop_u:12260: tau taṃ praṇematur devaṃ tuṣārāmalam īśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:12265: varaṃ vipra gṛhāṇāśu tuṣṭo 'smi tava vāñchitam /
GSP27moksop_u:12269: bhavyā bhavantu me bhūyaś śoko yena na bādhate //MU_3,86.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12271: athaivam astv iti procya jagāmāntardhim īśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12273: tatas tau dampatī tuṣṭau śivāt prāpya varaṃ gṛham /
GSP27moksop_u:12278: daśa bālān madhau mugdhā vasudheva navāṅkurān //MU_3,86.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12283: atha kalena mahatā teṣāṃ tau pitarau tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:12284: sañjagmatus tanuṃ tyaktvā svāṃ gatiṃ gatikovidau //MU_3,86.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12285: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ rahitā daśa te brāhmaṇās tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12287: tatra sañcintayām āsur udvignās te vibāndhavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12288: kiṃ syāt param iha śreya ūcuś cedaṃ parasparam //MU_3,86.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12289: kim iha syāt samucitaṃ bhrātaraḥ kim aduḥkhadam /
GSP27moksop_u:12290: kiṃ mahattvaṃ mahaiśvaryaṃ kiṃ mahāvibhavaṃ śubham //MU_3,86.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12291: kiyad etad anaiśvaryaṃ sāmantā hi cireśvarāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12292: sāmantasampat kiṃ nāma rājāno hi maheśvarāḥ //MU_3,86.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12293: kiṃ nāma sampad bhūpānāṃ samrāḍ iha maheśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12294: kiṃ nāma sampat sāmrājyam indro hīha maheśvaraḥ //MU_3,86.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12295: kiṃ nāma vastv athendratvaṃ yan muhūrtaṃ prajāpateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12296: vinaśyati na yat kalpe kiṃ syāt tad iha śobhanam //MU_3,86.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12300: rocate bhrātaras tan me brahmatvam iha netarat //MU_3,86.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12302: vacobhir aindavās tatra sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan //MU_3,86.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12305: bhrātrā tena punaḥ proktā bhrātaro bhūritejasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12306: maduktaṃ sarva evaite bhavantaḥ pālayantv alam //MU_3,86.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12308: sṛjāmi saṃharāmīti dhyānam astu cirāya vaḥ //MU_3,86.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12309: agrajeneti kathite bāḍhaṃ kṛtvā ta uttamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12314: brahmāhaṃ jagatas sraṣṭā kartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ //MU_3,86.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12330: taraṅgā iva toyānām imāḥ pratidiśaṃ prajāḥ //MU_3,86.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12333: ayaṃ saṃvatsaro yāta idaṃ pariṇataṃ yugam /
GSP27moksop_u:12334: sṛṣṭir iyam asau kālas tv ayaṃ saṃharaṇasya ca //MU_3,86.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12335: ayam adya gataḥ kalpo brāhmī rātrir iyaṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12337: iti bhāvitayā buddhyā te dvijā aindavā daśa /
GSP27moksop_u:12346: yāvat te dehakās teṣāṃ tāpena pavanais tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12347: yayuś śoṣaṃ yathā grīṣme chinnāḥ kamalapallavāḥ //MU_3,87.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12348: jakṣus tān dehakāṃs tatra kravyādā vanavāsinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12349: itaś cetaś ca luṭhitās satphalānīva markaṭāḥ //MU_3,87.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12351: tasthuś caturyugasyānte yāvat kalpaḥ kṣayaṃ gataḥ //MU_3,87.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12356: adya prabuddhe bhavati draṣṭum icchati saṃsṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:12358: ta ete bhagavan brahman brahmaṇo brāhmaṇā daśa /
GSP27moksop_u:12359: ta ete daśa saṃsārā manovyomani saṃsthitāḥ //MU_3,87.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12362: eṣa te kathitas sargo daśānām abjasambhava /
GSP27moksop_u:12363: brahmaṇāṃ sambhavo vyomni yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_3,87.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12364: vividhakalpanam āvalitāmbaraṃ yad idam uttamajāgatam utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:12369: brāhmaṇa brahmaṇo bhānur ity uktvā brahmaṇo mama /
GSP27moksop_u:12370: brahman brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭha tūṣṇīm eva babhūva saḥ //MU_3,88.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12371: tata uktaṃ mayā tasya ciram sañcintya cetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:12372: bhānor bhāno vadāśu tvaṃ kim anyat saṃsṛjāmy aham //MU_3,88.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12373: etāni daśa vidyante kila yatra jaganti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:12374: tatrānyo mama sargeṇa ko 'rthaḥ kathaya bhāskara //MU_3,88.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12376: nirīhasya niricchasya ko 'rthas sargeṇa te prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:12378: niṣkāmād eva bhavatas sargas sampadyate prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:12383: punas saṃhṛtya saṃhṛtya dinaṃ dinapatir yathā //MU_3,88.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12385: idaṃ kartavyam eveti jagan na tu ghanecchayā //MU_3,88.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12386: sṛṣṭiṃ na ca karoṣi tvam aharvyāpāram ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12388: yathāprāptaṃ hi kartavyam asaktena satā sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:12394: sargair athenduputrāṇāṃ toṣam eti jagat prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:12395: tadaite toṣayiṣyanti na tvāṃ sargās sureśvara //MU_3,88.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12396: cittanetrair bhavān etān sargān paśyati no dṛśā /
GSP27moksop_u:12397: apaśyaṃś cakṣuṣā sargaṃ sṛṣṭam ity eva vetti kaḥ //MU_3,88.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12399: sa eva māṃsanetreṇa taṃ paśyati hi netaraḥ //MU_3,88.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12401: kaścin nāśayituṃ śaktaś cito dārḍhyāc ciraṃ sthitān //MU_3,88.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12402: karmendriyair yat kriyate tad roddhuṃ kila yujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12404: yo baddhapadatāṃ yāto jantor manasi niścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12405: sa tenaiva vinā brahman nānyena vinivāryate //MU_3,88.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12407: śāpenāpi na tasyāsti kṣayo naṣṭe 'pi dehake //MU_3,88.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12408: yad baddhapīṭham abhito manasi prarūḍhaṃ tadrūpa eva puruṣo bhavatīha nānyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12409: tadbodhanād itaram atra kilābhyupāyaṃ śailaugham ekam iva niṣphalam eva manye //MU_3,88.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12413: śrūyate hi purā deva magadheṣu mahīpatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12417: tasminn eva pure śiḍgaḥ kilāsīd balavān iti /
GSP27moksop_u:12422: ahalyāṃ māṃ na kasmāt sa śakro 'bhyetīti sotsukā //MU_3,89.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12424: atapyata bhṛśaṃ bālā latālūnā vaneṣv iva //MU_3,89.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12427: ayam indro 'yam indraś cety evaṃ jātapralāpayā /
GSP27moksop_u:12428: lajjāpi hi tayā tyaktā vaivaśyam upayātayā //MU_3,89.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12429: ity ārtāyā ghanasneham atha tasyā vayasyayā /
GSP27moksop_u:12430: uktam āli tavāvighnam indram apy ānayāmy aham //MU_3,89.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12432: papāta pādayos sakhyā nalinyā nalinī yathā //MU_3,89.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12434: sā vayasyā tam indrākhyaṃ yayau viprakumārakam //MU_3,89.11//
GSP27moksop_u:12437: sā tatas tena śiḍgena mahendreṇa ratiṃ yayau /
GSP27moksop_u:12441: tatas tadanuraktā sā paśyantī tanmayaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:12443: kenacit tv atha kālena tasyā indrānurāgitā /
GSP27moksop_u:12445: indraṃ dhyāyati sā yāvat tāvat tasyā virājate /
GSP27moksop_u:12446: mukhaṃ pūrṇena candreṇa prabuddham iva kairavam //MU_3,89.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12448: cakāra bahubhir daṇḍais sa dvayor atha śāsanam //MU_3,89.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12449: tāv ubhāv api santyaktau hi santau salilāśaye /
GSP27moksop_u:12450: tuṣṭau jahasatus tatra na khedaṃ samupāgatau //MU_3,89.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12451: apṛcchat tau tato rājā khinnau sthaḥ kiṃ na durmatī /
GSP27moksop_u:12454: muhyāvo na mahīpāla svāṅgair api vikartitaiḥ //MU_3,89.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12455: vahnāv api parikṣiptāv akhinnāv evam eva tau /
GSP27moksop_u:12459: kaṣāhatāv akhinnau tāv evam eva kilocatuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12460: paṅkamagnāv akhinnau tāv evam eva kilocatuḥ //MU_3,89.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12461: anyasmāc chāsanājālāt kalpitāc ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12462: uddhṛtāv ūcatuḥ pṛṣṭau tam evārthaṃ punaḥ punaḥ //MU_3,89.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12464: na śāsanāni duḥkhāni bādhante kiñcid eva me //MU_3,89.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12465: asyāś caiva jagad rājan sarvaṃ manmayam eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:12466: tena nau śāsanāduḥkhaṃ kiñcid eva na bādhate //MU_3,89.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12467: mano nāma vayaṃ rājan mano hi puruṣas smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12468: prapañcamātram evāyaṃ deho dṛśyata eva hi //MU_3,89.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12470: dhīraṃ mano bhedhayituṃ na manāg api śakyate //MU_3,89.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12471: kā nāma tā mahārāja kīdṛśyaḥ kasya śaktayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12473: patatūdetu vā deho yātu vā viśarārutām /
GSP27moksop_u:12475: iṣṭe 'rthe ciram āviṣṭaṃ bhaṅktuṃ dhīraṃ sthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12476: bhāvā bhāvāś śarīrasthā mama śaktā na kecana //MU_3,89.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12478: tad eva paśyaty acalaṃ na śarīraviceṣṭitam //MU_3,89.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12479: na kāścana kriyā rājan varaśāpādikā api /
GSP27moksop_u:12482: manaś cālayituṃ śaktā na mahādriṃ mṛgā iva //MU_3,89.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12487: yatra yatra yathā rājaṃs tiṣṭhāmy abhipatāmi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:12490: saṃsaktam idam āyāti na svabhāvād ṛte param //MU_3,89.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12492: na cālyate merur iva varaśāpabalair api //MU_3,89.40//
GSP27moksop_u:12494: na tu dhīraṃ mano rājan vijigīṣutayotthitam //MU_3,89.41//
GSP27moksop_u:12495: etāni cātra manasāṃ na ca kāraṇāni rājañ śarīraśakalāny asamutthitāni /
GSP27moksop_u:12496: ceto hi kāraṇam amīṣu śarīrakeṣu vārīva sarvavanaṣaṇḍalatāraseṣu //MU_3,89.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12497: ādyaṃ śarīram iha viddhi mano mahātman saṅkalpitā jagati tena śarīrasaṅghāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12498: ādyaṃ śarīram abhitiṣṭhati yatra tatra tat tad bhṛśaṃ phalati netarad asya puṃsaḥ //MU_3,89.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12499: mukhyāṅkuraṃ subhaga viddhi mano hi puṃso dehās tataḥ pravisṛtās tarupallavābhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12500: naṣṭe 'ṅkure punar udeti na pallavaśrīr na tv aṅkuraḥ kṣayam upaiti dalakṣayeṣu //MU_3,89.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12501: dehakṣaye vividhadehagaṇaṃ karoti svapnāvanāv iva vanaṃ navam āśu cetaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12502: citte kṣate na tu karoti hi kiñcid eva dehas tatas samanupālaya cittaratnam //MU_3,89.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12503: diśi diśi hariṇākṣīm eva paśyāmi rājan priyayuvatimanastvān nityam ānandito 'smi /
GSP27moksop_u:12504: tava sukhavikṛtīnāṃ yat phalaṃ duḥkhadāyi kṣaṇam atha suciraṃ vā tan na paśyāmi kiñcit //MU_3,89.46//
GSP27moksop_u:12512: bhṛśam adya mukhe sphāraṃ dhārṣṭyaṃ maddārahāriṇaḥ //MU_3,90.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12513: pāpānurūpam apy asya śāpaṃ dehi mahāmune /
GSP27moksop_u:12514: yad avadhyavadhāt pāpaṃ vadhatyāgāt tad eva hi //MU_3,90.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12518: vināśaṃ vraja durbuddhe iti śāpaṃ visṛṣṭavān //MU_3,90.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12523: tato dvāv api saṃsaktau bhūyo jātau vihaṅgamau //MU_3,90.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12526: bhārato hi tayoś śāpas sa samartho babhūva ha /
GSP27moksop_u:12530: akṛtrimapremarasānuviddhaṃ snehaṃ tayos taṃ prasamīkṣya kāntam /
GSP27moksop_u:12534: tenaitad vacmi bhagavan yathājātaṃ mano mune /
GSP27moksop_u:12535: anigrāhyam abhedyaṃ ca śāpair api durāsadaiḥ //MU_3,91.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12537: yujyate na na ca brahman yuktam etan mahātmanaḥ //MU_3,91.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12538: kiṃ tad asti jagaty asmin vividheṣu jagatsu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:12539: tavāpi nātha nāthasya yad dainyāya mahātmanaḥ //MU_3,91.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12540: mano hi jagatāṃ kartṛ mano hi puruṣas smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12541: manaḥkṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ loke na śarīrakṛtaṃ kṛtam //MU_3,91.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12543: hantuṃ na śakyate jantoḥ pratibimbaṃ maṇer iva //MU_3,91.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12545: tvaṃ sṛṣṭveha prajās tiṣṭha buddhyākāśe 'py anantakaḥ //MU_3,91.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12548: ekaṃ dvau vā bahūn vāpi kuru sargān prajāpate /
GSP27moksop_u:12549: svecchayātmani tiṣṭha tvaṃ kiṃ gṛhītaṃ tavaindavaiḥ //MU_3,91.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12552: mayā sañcintya suciram idam uktaṃ mahāmune //MU_3,91.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12553: yuktam uktaṃ tvayā bhāno vitataṃ hi kilāmbaram /
GSP27moksop_u:12554: manaś ca vitataṃ cāpi cidākāśaś ca vistṛtaḥ //MU_3,91.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12555: tad yathābhimataṃ sargaṃ nityaṃ karma karomy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:12557: tat tvam evāśu bhagavan prathamo 'tra manur bhava /
GSP27moksop_u:12559: athaitat sa mahātejā mama vākyaṃ prabhākaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12561: ekena prāktane tasmin vapuṣā sūryatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12564: sasarja sakalāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ tatām abhimatāṃ mama //MU_3,91.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12565: pratibhāsam upāyāti yad yad asya hi cetasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12566: tat tat prakaṭatām eti sthairyaṃ saphalatām api //MU_3,91.16//
GSP27moksop_u:12568: aindavā brahmatāṃ yātā manasaḥ paśya śaktatām //MU_3,91.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12570: vayaṃ tathaiva cidbhāvāc cittatvād brahmatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_3,91.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12571: cittaṃ hi pratibhāsātma yac ca tatpratibhāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:12572: tad idaṃ bhāti dehādikhābhaṃ nāto 'sti dehadṛk //MU_3,91.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12576: tad evodāharanty etad dehanāmnā ghanaṃ bhrami //MU_3,91.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12578: śāntaṃ dehacamatkāraṃ jīvaṃ viddhi kramāt param //MU_3,91.22//
GSP27moksop_u:12579: nāhaṃ na cānyad astīha cittvaṃ cittam idaṃ sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:12586: jīvībhūya mano bhūtvā vettītthaṃ dehatāṃ mudhā //MU_3,91.26//
GSP27moksop_u:12590: aindavābjajavad rūḍhaṃ citaś cittvaṃ mano bhavet //MU_3,91.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12591: na san nāsad ahaṃrūpaṃ sattvāsattve tathaiva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:12596: kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemni tathā brahmaṇi saṃsthitam //MU_3,91.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12597: sarvatvād brahmaṇas sarvaṃ jaḍaṃ cinmayam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:12598: asmadādiśilāntātma na jaḍaṃ na ca cetanam //MU_3,91.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12601: upalabdher jaḍaṃ viddhi cetanaṃ sarvam eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:12602: upalambho hi sambandhāt sambandho hi samātmanoḥ //MU_3,91.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12605: citau yac cetyakalanaṃ tan manastvam udāhṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:12606: cidbhāgo 'trājaḍo bhāgo jāḍyam atra tu cetyatā //MU_3,91.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12608: iti jīvo jagadbhrāntiṃ paśyan gacchati lolatām //MU_3,91.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12609: citā sva eva bhāvo 'sau śuddhayaivaṃ dvayīkṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12610: atas sarvaṃ jagat saiva dvaitaṃ labdhāṃśam eva tat //MU_3,91.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12611: svam evānyatayā dṛṣṭvā citir dṛśyatayā vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12613: na bhrāntir asti bhramabhāṅ naivetīha hi niścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12615: sarvatvāj jāḍyam astv asyāṃ citi cittvaṃ ca vetsi tat /
GSP27moksop_u:12617: ahantvādi pare tattve manāg api na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12618: ūrmyādīva pṛthak toye saṃvitsāraṃ hi tad yataḥ //MU_3,91.42//
GSP27moksop_u:12620: mṛgatṛṣṇāsv ivātas tan nūnaṃ vidyata eva no //MU_3,91.43//
GSP27moksop_u:12622: vidaṃ vidur ahantādi śaityam eva yathā himam //MU_3,91.44//
GSP27moksop_u:12628: vicāryaṃ pratibhāsātma cittvaṃ cittvena vai sphuṭam //MU_3,91.47//
GSP27moksop_u:12631: yad vidyate śodhyate tad dhautaḥ kena khapādapaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12632: dehādyavidyā satyā ced yukta etāṃ prati grahaḥ //MU_3,91.49//
GSP27moksop_u:12634: ye nāmopadiśanty ajñāḥ kecit te puruṣaiḍakāḥ //MU_3,91.50//
GSP27moksop_u:12635: yathaitad bhāvayet svāntaṃ tathaitad bhavati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:12637: yad yad yathā sphurati svapratibhātma cittaṃ tat tat tathā bhavati dehatayoditātma /
GSP27moksop_u:12638: deho 'yam asti na na cāham iti svarūpaṃ vijñānam ekam avagamya niriccham āssva //MU_3,91.52//
GSP27moksop_u:12639: deho 'yam eṣa ca kilāham iti svabhāvād dehārtham eva yatate tata eti nāśam /
GSP27moksop_u:12640: yakṣādikalpanavaśād bhayam eti bālo niryakṣadeśagata eva kayāpi yuktyā //MU_3,91.53//
GSP27moksop_u:12644: ity uktavān sa bhagavān mayā kamalasambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12645: raghūdvaha punaḥ pṛṣṭo vākyam ākṣipya bhūtapaḥ //MU_3,92.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12647: amoghā iti tā eva kathaṃ moghīkṛtāḥ punaḥ //MU_3,92.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12649: sarvāṇy eva vimūḍhāni dṛṣṭāni kila jantuṣu //MU_3,92.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12651: abhinnau tadvad evaitau manodehau sadaiva hi //MU_3,92.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12652: atha nāsty eva vā dehaḥ kevalaṃ cetasohitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12656: manaś śāpādibhir doṣaiḥ kathaṃ nākramyate prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:12657: katham ākramyate vāpi brūhi me parameśvara //MU_3,92.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12660: yat pauruṣeṇa śuddhena na samāsādyate janaiḥ //MU_3,92.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12662: sarvā eva jagaty asmin dviśarīrāś śarīriṇām //MU_3,92.9//
GSP27moksop_u:12663: ekaṃ manaśśarīraṃ tu kṣiprakāri sthitaṃ calam /
GSP27moksop_u:12669: mano nāma dvitīyo yaḥ kāyaḥ kāyavatām iha /
GSP27moksop_u:12671: pauruṣaṃ svam avaṣṭabhya dhairyam ālambya śāśvatam /
GSP27moksop_u:12672: yadi tiṣṭhaty agamyo 'sau duḥkhānāṃ tad aninditaḥ //MU_3,92.14//
GSP27moksop_u:12673: yathā yathāsau yatate manodeho hi dehinām /
GSP27moksop_u:12677: pavitram anusandhānaṃ cetasā yas smaran sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12678: niṣphalās tatra śāpādyāś śilāyām iva sāyakāḥ //MU_3,92.17//
GSP27moksop_u:12679: patatv ambhasi vahnau vā kardame vā kalevaram /
GSP27moksop_u:12680: mano yad anusandhatte tad evāpnoti niścitam //MU_3,92.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12682: dadāty avighnena phalaṃ mano hi manaso mune //MU_3,92.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12684: kṛtrimendreṇa duḥkhārtir na dṛṣṭā śāsanāsv api //MU_3,92.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12690: dhyānena brahmatā prāptā yā mayāpi na khaṇḍyate //MU_3,92.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12692: cittāt svam anusandhānaṃ na tyajanti manāg api //MU_3,92.24//
GSP27moksop_u:12693: ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva śāpāḥ pāpadṛśas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12694: na khaṇḍayanti tān padmapattrāghātāś śilām iva //MU_3,92.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12695: ye vāpi khaṇḍitāḥ kecic chāpādyair ādhisāyakaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12698: svapne 'pi kaścid asty eva doṣajālaiḥ khalīkṛtaḥ //MU_3,92.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12699: manasaiva manas tasmāt pauruṣeṇa pumān iha /
GSP27moksop_u:12700: svakam eva svakenaiva yojayet pāvane pathi //MU_3,92.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12701: pratibhātaṃ yad evāsya tathārūpaṃ bhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:12702: kṣaṇād eva manaḥ pīnaṃ bālavetālavan mune //MU_3,92.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12705: pratibhātārthatām eti kṣaṇād eva mano mune /
GSP27moksop_u:12708: manaḥ paśyaty aśuddhākṣaś candrabimbe dvitām iva //MU_3,92.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12709: yat paśyati tad evāśu phalībhūtam idaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12710: saha harṣaviṣādābhyāṃ bhuṅkte tasmāt tad eva sat //MU_3,92.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12712: dṛṣṭvā dāham avāpnoti dagdhaṃ ca paritapyate //MU_3,92.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12714: dṛṣṭvā pītvā parāṃ tṛptiṃ yāti valgati dṛpyati //MU_3,92.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12716: dṛṣṭvā lunāti lūtvā ca punar āropayaty alam //MU_3,92.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12717: itthaṃ yad eva parikalpayatīndrajālaṃ kṣipraṃ tad eva paripaśyati tāta cetaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12718: nāsaj jagan na ca sad ity avagamya nūnam enāṃ dṛśaṃ vividhabhedavatīṃ jahīhi //MU_3,92.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12724: tasmād asmād anākhyād brahmaṇas sarvagatāt pūrvaṃ manāṅ mananam utpadyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12725: svayam eva tad ghanatāṃ prāpya manas sampadyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12729: tena nāma yo 'yaṃ parameṣṭhī tan manastattvaṃ viddhi /
GSP27moksop_u:12730: sa manastattvākāro bhagavān brahmā saṅkalpamayatvād yad eva saṅkalpayati tad eva paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:12732: tena brahmaṇā giritṛṇajaladhimayam idaṃ krameṇa jagat parikalpitam /
GSP27moksop_u:12733: itthaṃ krameṇa brahmatattvād iyam āgatā sṛṣṭir anyata ivāgateyam iti lakṣyate / (MU_3,93.1)
GSP27moksop_u:12736: evam utpanne jagati yā brahmaṇaś cin mananarūpiṇī sāhaṅkāraṃ parikalpya brahmatām eti /
GSP27moksop_u:12737: yās tv anyāś cicchaktayas sarvaśaktibhir abhinnā eva bhinnāḥ kalpyanta iva jagati sphāratāṃ nīte pitāmaharūpeṇa manasā samullasanti /
GSP27moksop_u:12738: ta ete sahasraśo viparivartamānā jīvā ucyante /
GSP27moksop_u:12739: te 'bhyutthitā eva cinnabhaso nabhasi tanmātrair āvalitā gaganapavanāntarvartinaś
GSP27moksop_u:12740: caturdaśavidhāyā bhūtajāter madhyād yasyā abhyāśe tiṣṭhati tasyā eva prāṇaśaktidvāreṇa
GSP27moksop_u:12741: praviśya śarīraṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ vā bījatāṃ gacchanti /
GSP27moksop_u:12742: tadanu yonito jagati jāyante tadanu kākatālīyotpannavāsanāpravāhānurūpakarmaphalabhāgino bhavanti /
GSP27moksop_u:12743: tataḥ karmaphalarajjubhir vāsanāvalitābhir baddha śarīrā bhramantaḥ patanti protpatanti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:12751: kāścid vijñātavijñānāḥ param eva padaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12753: utpattis sarvabījānām iti hi brahmaṇaḥ padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:12786: saiva ced itarair alpair janmabhir mokṣabhāginī /
GSP27moksop_u:12787: tat tādṛśī hi sā tajjñaiḥ proktā rājasarājasī //MU_3,94.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12790: saiva sandigdhamokṣā cet sahasrair api janmanām /
GSP27moksop_u:12793: ciramokṣā hi kathitā tāmasī sā maharṣibhiḥ //MU_3,94.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12794: tajjanmanaiva mokṣasya bhāginī cet tad ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12796: bhāvaiḥ katipayair mokṣabhāginī cet tad ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12800: pūrvaṃ tu janmalakṣyāḍhyā janmalakṣyaiḥ puro 'pi cet /
GSP27moksop_u:12822: sarvā dṛśyadṛśo draṣṭur vyatiriktā na rūpataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12823: śītaraśmer iva jyotsnā svālokā iva tejasaḥ //MU_3,94.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12824: evam etā hi lokānāṃ jātayo vividhāśrayāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12825: tasmād eva samāyānti tasminn eva viśanti ca //MU_3,94.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12828: itthaṃ jagatsu vividheṣu vicitrarūpās tasyecchayā bhagavato vyavahāravatyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12829: āyanti yānti nipatanti tathotpatanti bhūtaśriyaḥ kaṇaghaṭā iva pāvakotthāḥ //MU_3,94.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12830: brahmaṇas sarvaṃ samutpadyata iti pratipādanaṃ nāma sargaḥ
GSP27moksop_u:12833: abhinnau karmakartārau samam eva parāt padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:12834: svayaṃ prakaṭatāṃ yātau puṣpāmodau taror iva //MU_3,95.1//
GSP27moksop_u:12836: sphuranti vitate vyomni nīlimna iva candrakāḥ //MU_3,95.2//
GSP27moksop_u:12838: tatra brahmaṇa utpannā jīvā ity uktayas sthitāḥ //MU_3,95.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12840: yad brahmaṇa idaṃ jātaṃ na jātaṃ veti rāghava //MU_3,95.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12841: kācid vā kalanā yāvan na nītā rāghava prathām /
GSP27moksop_u:12844: brahmedam ete jīvāś ca veti vācām ayaṃ bhramaḥ //MU_3,95.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12845: iti dṛṣṭyā nirāsaṅgād brahmaṇo jāyate jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:12846: tajjaṃ tad eva tattvaṃ tu gataṃ duravabodhataḥ //MU_3,95.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12848: utpatyotpatya saṃlīnās tasminn eva pare pade //MU_3,95.8//
GSP27moksop_u:12852: tatraiva layam eṣyanti grīṣme madhulatā iva //MU_3,95.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12853: tiṣṭhanty ajasraṃ kāleṣu ta evānye ca bhūriśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12855: puṣpāmodāv ivābhinnau pumān karma ca rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:12863: vītarāgair vinirṇītaṃ tac chāstram iti kathyate //MU_3,95.15//
GSP27moksop_u:12866: iyaṃ tu dṛṣṭis sakalā siddhaye sarvakarmaṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:12869: bahiṣkurvanti taṃ sarve sa ca duḥkhe nimajjati //MU_3,95.18//
GSP27moksop_u:12870: iha loke ca vede ca śrutir itthaṃ sadā prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:12871: yathā karma ca kartā ca paryāyeṇeha saṅgate //MU_3,95.19//
GSP27moksop_u:12872: karmaṇā kriyate kartā kartrā karma pramīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12873: bījāṅkuravad āmnāyo loke vedokta eṣa saḥ //MU_3,95.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12874: karmaṇo jāyate jantur bījād iva navāṅkuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12875: jantoḥ prajāyate karma punar bījam ivāṅkurāt //MU_3,95.21//
GSP27moksop_u:12878: evaṃ sthite kathaṃ nāma janmabījena karmaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:12879: vinotpattis tvayā proktā bhūtānāṃ brahmaṇaḥ padāt //MU_3,95.23//
GSP27moksop_u:12882: karmaṇy akāraṇe brahmañ janmādiṣu phaleṣu tu /
GSP27moksop_u:12883: karmaṇāṃ phalam astīti tvayā loke pramārjitam //MU_3,95.25//
GSP27moksop_u:12886: kiṃ tat kṛtaṃ bhavaty evaṃ bhagavan brūhi tattvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12887: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sphāraṃ chinddhi vedavidāṃ vara //MU_3,95.27//
GSP27moksop_u:12889: sādhu rāghava pṛṣṭo 'smi tvayā praśnam imaṃ śubham /
GSP27moksop_u:12890: śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te yena bhṛśaṃ jñānodayo bhavet //MU_3,95.28//
GSP27moksop_u:12892: etat tat karmaṇāṃ bījaṃ phalam asyaiva vidyate //MU_3,95.29//
GSP27moksop_u:12893: yad eva hi manastattvam utthitaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:12894: tad eva karma jantūnāṃ jīvo dehatayā sthitaḥ //MU_3,95.30//
GSP27moksop_u:12895: kusumāmodayor bhedo na yathā bhinnayor iha /
GSP27moksop_u:12896: tathaiva karmamanasor bhedo nāsty api bhinnayoḥ //MU_3,95.31//
GSP27moksop_u:12897: kriyāspando jagaty asmin karmeti kathito budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12898: pūrvaṃ tasya manodehaḥ karmātaś cittam eva hi //MU_3,95.32//
GSP27moksop_u:12899: na sa śailo na tad vyoma na sā diṅ na triviṣṭapam /
GSP27moksop_u:12900: asti yatra phalaṃ nāsti kṛtānām ātmakarmaṇām //MU_3,95.33//
GSP27moksop_u:12901: aihikaṃ prāktanaṃ vāpi karma yad racitaṃ sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:12902: pauruṣo 'sau paro yatno na kadācana niṣphalaḥ //MU_3,95.34//
GSP27moksop_u:12903: brahmaṇaḥ protthitaṃ cittaṃ karma viddhīha netarat /
GSP27moksop_u:12904: tad eva janatābījaṃ viddhi rāghava netarat //MU_3,95.35//
GSP27moksop_u:12906: pūrvaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ cetaḥ karma cittam ato viduḥ //MU_3,95.36//
GSP27moksop_u:12908: yā cid āhur ataś cittaṃ janatājīvatāṃ gatam //MU_3,95.37//
GSP27moksop_u:12909: manaḥ karma mano jīvaḥ kāyas tenaiva tanyate /
GSP27moksop_u:12910: ataḥ karma ca kartā ca na bhinnau tilatailavat //MU_3,95.38//
GSP27moksop_u:12911: kartṛkarmātmakāv arthāv abhinnau nityam eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:12912: abodhād bhedam āyātau kalpyamānau mudhaiva hi //MU_3,95.39//
GSP27moksop_u:12913: dve karmamanasī rāma mūrkhāṇāṃ na tu dhīmatām /
GSP27moksop_u:12915: paryāyaśabdāv etau hi viddhi tvaṃ cittakarmaṇī /
GSP27moksop_u:12921: uddhṛtāny eva tasmiṃs tu jīvasañjñāni tāni tu /
GSP27moksop_u:12923: manasā kriyate karma yad yat tat saphalaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:12924: manasy eva na kāyotthaṃ kartā karma manas tataḥ //MU_3,95.45//
GSP27moksop_u:12927: guṇo guṇini śauklyādiḥ paṭādau saṃsthito yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12930: tathā karma vinā cittaṃ na kiñcid upalabhyate //MU_3,95.48//
GSP27moksop_u:12937: cittaṃ sadā spandavilāsam etat spandaikarūpaṃ nanu karma viddhi /
GSP27moksop_u:12938: karmātha cittaṃ kila dharmadharmi padaṃ gate rāma paraspareṇa //MU_3,95.52//
GSP27moksop_u:12949: saṅkalpaśaktisahitaṃ yad rūpaṃ tan mano viduḥ //MU_3,96.3//
GSP27moksop_u:12951: yat tattvaṃ dviparāmṛṣṭaṃ tad rūpaṃ manaso viduḥ //MU_3,96.4//
GSP27moksop_u:12953: yas sadākrāntakalanas tad rūpaṃ manaso viduḥ //MU_3,96.5//
GSP27moksop_u:12954: bhāvas sadasator madhye nṝṇāṃ sphurati niścalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:12955: kalanonmukhatāṃ yātas tad rūpaṃ manaso viduḥ //MU_3,96.6//
GSP27moksop_u:12957: na sambhavati loke 'smin guṇahīno guṇī yathā //MU_3,96.7//
GSP27moksop_u:12962: yā yena vāsanā yatra latevāropitā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:12963: sā tena phalabhūs tatra tad eva prāpyate tathā //MU_3,96.10//
GSP27moksop_u:12965: kriyās tu vividhās tasya śākhāś citraphalās taroḥ //MU_3,96.11//
