GSP27moksop_u:12967: sarvās sampādayanty etās tasmāt karma manas smṛtam //MU_3,96.12//
GSP27moksop_u:12968: mano buddhir ahaṅkāraś cetaḥ karmātha kalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:12969: saṃsṛtir vāsanāvidyā prayatnas smṛtir eva ca //MU_3,96.13//
GSP27moksop_u:12970: indriyaṃ prakṛtir māyā kriyā cetītarā api /
GSP27moksop_u:12984: idaṃ tyaktvedam āyāti bālavat pelavā yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:12985: vicāraṃ samparityajya tadā sā cittam ucyate //MU_3,96.20//
GSP27moksop_u:12990: pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā prāg sṛṣṭam iti niścayam /
GSP27moksop_u:12994: asty ātmatattvaṃ vimalaṃ dvitīyā dṛṣṭir aṅkitā /
GSP27moksop_u:12998: śrutvā sṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā vimṛśya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:12999: indram āmodayaty eṣā tenendriyam iti smṛtā //MU_3,96.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13002: sadasattāṃ nayaty āśu sattāṃ vāsattvam añjasā /
GSP27moksop_u:13003: sad vāsad vā vikalpaughaṃ tena māyeti kathyate //MU_3,96.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13009: svair eva saṅkalpaśatair bhṛśaṃ rūḍhim upāgatāḥ //MU_3,96.32//
GSP27moksop_u:13012: jīva ity ucyate loke mana ity api kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:13013: cittam ity ucyate caiva buddhir ity ucyate tathā //MU_3,96.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13017: manaḥ kiṃ syāj jaḍaṃ brahmann atha vāpi ca cetanam /
GSP27moksop_u:13018: ity eko mama tattvajña niścayo 'ntar na jāyate //MU_3,96.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13020: mano hi na jaḍaṃ rāma nāpi cetanatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:13021: mlānā jaḍājaḍā dṛṣṭir mana ity eva kathyate //MU_3,96.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13022: madhye sadasato rūpaṃ pratibhātaṃ yad ābilam /
GSP27moksop_u:13023: jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ rāma tad etac cittam ucyate //MU_3,96.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13025: yeha sā cittam ity uktā tasmāj jātam idaṃ jagat //MU_3,96.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13027: yac cito mlānarūpiṇyas tad etan mana ucyate //MU_3,96.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13029: mana ity ucyate rāma na jaḍaṃ na ca cinmayam //MU_3,96.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13032: yathā gacchati śailūṣo rūpāṇyatvaṃ tathaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:13033: mano nāmānyatām eti rāma karmāntaraṃ vrajan //MU_3,96.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13035: yathā yāti naraḥ karmavaśād yāti tathā manaḥ //MU_3,96.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13036: yā etāḥ kathitās sañjñā mayā rāghava cetasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13040: mano hi jaḍam anyasya bhinnam anyasya jīvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13045: anyathā kalpitās sāṅkhyaiś cārvākair api cānyathā //MU_3,96.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13046: jaiminīyair ārhataiś ca bauddhair vaiśeṣikais tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13048: sarvair eva hi gantavyaṃ tat padaṃ pāramātmikam /
GSP27moksop_u:13052: svaṃ mārgam abhiśaṃsanti vādinaś citrayā dṛśā /
GSP27moksop_u:13057: kurvāṇaḥ kartṛvaicitryam eti tadvad idaṃ manaḥ //MU_3,96.55//
GSP27moksop_u:13061: acitto hi naro loke paśyann api na paśyati //MU_3,96.57//
GSP27moksop_u:13062: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca ghrātvā bhuktvā śubhāśubham /
GSP27moksop_u:13063: antar harṣaṃ viṣādaṃ ca samanasko hi vindate //MU_3,96.58//
GSP27moksop_u:13064: āloka iva rūpāṇām arthānāṃ kāraṇaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13065: badhyate baddhacitto hi muktacitto hi mucyate //MU_3,96.59//
GSP27moksop_u:13066: taṃ jaḍānāṃ varaṃ viddhi jaḍaṃ yenocyate manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13067: taṃ cāvagacchata jaḍaṃ mano yasya hi cetanam //MU_3,96.60//
GSP27moksop_u:13068: na cetanaṃ na ca jaḍaṃ yad idaṃ protthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13071: ābilaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhrānter bhrāntyā jagad upasthitam //MU_3,96.62//
GSP27moksop_u:13072: ajaḍaṃ hi mano nāma saṃsārasya na kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:13074: manaḥ kāraṇam arthānāṃ rūpāṇām iva bhāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:13075: cittād ṛte 'nyad yad asti tad acittasya kiṃ jagat //MU_3,96.64//
GSP27moksop_u:13076: na cetanaṃ na ca jaḍaṃ tasmāj jagati rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:13079: ekaṃ vicitratām etya yāti kālo yathārtubhiḥ //MU_3,96.66//
GSP27moksop_u:13081: kṣobhayanti śarīraṃ tat santu jīvādayaḥ pare //MU_3,96.67//
GSP27moksop_u:13082: darśaneṣu tu ye proktā bhedā manasi tarkataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13084: te rāma na virudhyante viśiṣyante na ca kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:13085: sarvā hi śaktayo deve vidyante sarvage yataḥ //MU_3,96.69//
GSP27moksop_u:13086: yadaivaṃ khalu śuddhāyā manāg api hi saṃvidaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13087: jaḍeva śaktir uditā tadā vaicitryam āgatam //MU_3,96.70//
GSP27moksop_u:13088: ūrṇanābhād yathā tantur jāyate cetanāj jaḍaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13089: nityaṃ prabuddhāt paramād brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtis tathā //MU_3,96.71//
GSP27moksop_u:13092: jīvo manaś ca nanu buddhir ahaṅkṛtiś cety evaṃ prathām upagateyam anirmalā cit /
GSP27moksop_u:13093: saivocyate jagati cetanacittajīvasañjñāgaṇena kila nāsti vivāda eṣaḥ //MU_3,96.73//
GSP27moksop_u:13097: brahman manasa evedam ata āḍambaraṃ smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:13098: yatas tad eva karmeti vākyārthād upalabhyate //MU_3,97.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13101: brahman manye jagaty asmin mana evākṛtiṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:13104: kvacid gandharvatāṃ prāptaṃ kvacit kinnararūpi ca //MU_3,97.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13108: tadvicāraṇayā ko 'rtho vicāryaṃ mana eva naḥ //MU_3,97.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13109: tenedaṃ sarvam ābhogi jagad atyākulaṃ tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:13113: ato manye manaḥ karma tac charīreṣu kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:13114: jāyate mriyate tad dhi nātmanīdṛgvidho guṇaḥ //MU_3,97.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13115: mana evaṃ vicāreṇa manye vilayam eṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:13118: mukta ity ucyate jantuḥ punar nāma na jāyate //MU_3,97.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13119: bhagavān bhavatā proktā jātayas trividhā nṛṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:13124: ākāśā hi trayo nāma vidyante vitatāntarāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13131: yenedam ātataṃ sarvaṃ cittākāśas sa ucyate //MU_3,97.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13135: cit kāraṇaṃ hi sarvasya kāryaughasya dinaṃ yathā //MU_3,97.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13136: jaḍo 'smi na jaḍo 'smīti niścayo malinaś citaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13137: yas tad eva mano viddhi tenākāśādi bhāvyate //MU_3,97.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13139: kalpyate hy upadeśārthaṃ prabuddhaviṣayaṃ na tu //MU_3,97.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13140: ekam eva paraṃ brahma sarvaṃ sarvāvapūrakam /
GSP27moksop_u:13148: cito hi malinaṃ rūpaṃ cittatāṃ samupāgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:13150: cittatvam asya malinasya cidātmakasya tattvasya dṛśyata idaṃ nanu bodhahīnaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13151: śuktau yathā rajatatā na tu bodhavadbhir maurkhyeṇa bandha iha bodhabalena mokṣaḥ //MU_3,97.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13155: yataḥ kutaścid utpannaṃ cittaṃ yat kiñcid eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:13161: sahasreṇa sa bāhūnām ādāya parighān bahūn /
GSP27moksop_u:13165: krandan palāyamāno 'sau gatvā dūram itas tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13184: praviśya praharaṃś caiva svayam ātmani saṃsthitaḥ //MU_3,98.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13187: pṛṣṭaś ca kas tvaṃ kim idaṃ kenārthena karoṣi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:13188: kiṃ nāmābhimataṃ te syāt kiṃ mudhā parimuhyasi //MU_3,98.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13189: iti pṛṣṭena kathitaṃ tena me raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:13190: nāhaṃ kaścin na caivedaṃ mune kiñcit karomy aham //MU_3,98.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13191: tvayāyam avabhagno 'smi tvaṃ me śatrur arindama /
GSP27moksop_u:13192: tvayā dṛṣṭo 'smi naṣṭo 'smi duḥkhāya ca sukhāya ca //MU_3,98.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13193: iti uktvā mām asāv aṅgāny ālokya svāni tiṣṭhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:13198: krameṇa tāni tatyāja svāny aṅgāni samantataḥ //MU_3,98.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13200: tatas te bāhavaḥ paścād vakṣas tadanu codaram //MU_3,98.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13201: atha kṣaṇena sa pumāṃs tāny aṅgāni ca sambhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13202: sarvam antardhim āyātaṃ svapno bodhavato yathā //MU_3,98.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13203: vicārya niyateś śaktiṃ tato gantum upasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13204: dṛṣṭavān aham ekānte punar anyaṃ tathā naram //MU_3,98.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13205: so 'pi prahārān paritaḥ prayacchan svayam ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:13208: punaḥ patati kuñje 'ntaḥ punar ārtaḥ palāyate //MU_3,98.27//
GSP27moksop_u:13210: ruṣṭaḥ punaḥ punas tuṣṭaḥ punaḥ praharati svayam //MU_3,98.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13212: sa mayā samavaṣṭabhya paripṛṣṭas tathaiva hi //MU_3,98.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13214: aṅgair viśīrṇatām etya yayāv alam alakṣyatām //MU_3,98.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13215: vicārya niyateś śaktiṃ tato gantum upasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13216: dṛṣṭavān aham ekānte punar anyaṃ tathā naram //MU_3,98.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13217: praharaṃs tadvad evāsau svayam eva palāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:13220: yāvat sa sucireṇāpi kūpād abhyutthitaś śaṭhaḥ //MU_3,98.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13221: athāham udyato gantuṃ dṛṣṭavān puruṣaṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13223: avaṣṭabhya tathaivāśu tasya proktaṃ punar mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:13225: kevalaṃ mām asau mūḍho naiva jānāmi kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:13226: āḥ pāpa durdvijety uktvā svavyāpārapāro yayau //MU_3,98.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13227: atha tasmin mahāraṇye tathā viharatā mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:13234: na kvacit sthitim āyānti kecid bhramaparāyaṇāḥ //MU_3,98.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13236: adyāpi vidyate yasyām itthaṃ te puruṣās sthitāḥ //MU_3,98.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13237: sā ca dṛṣṭāṭavī rāma tvayeha vyavahāriṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:13238: bālyāt tu buddhitattvasya na tvaṃ smarasi rāghava //MU_3,98.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13239: sā bhīṣaṇā vividhasaṅkaṭasaṅkaṭāṅgī ghorāṭavī ghanatamogahanā ca lokaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13240: āgatya nirvṛtim abuddhihatair na tajjñair āsevyate kusumagulmakavāṭikeva //MU_3,98.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13244: kāsau mahāṭavī brahman kadā dṛṣṭā kathaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:13245: ke ca te puruṣās tatra kiṃ tat kartuṃ kṛtodyamāḥ //MU_3,99.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13248: na sā mahāṭavī nāma dūre naiva ca te narāḥ //MU_3,99.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13250: tāṃ tvaṃ śūnyāṃ vikārāḍhyāṃ viddhi rāma mahāṭavīm //MU_3,99.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13252: pūrṇā nānyena saṃyuktā kevalaiva tadaiva sā //MU_3,99.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13253: tatra ye te mahākārāḥ puruṣāḥ prasaranti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:13254: manāṃsi tāni viddhi tvaṃ duḥkhe nipatitāny alam //MU_3,99.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13255: draṣṭā yo 'yam ahaṃ teṣāṃ saviveko mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:13256: vivekena mayā tāni dṛṣṭāny anyāni rāghava //MU_3,99.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13257: mayā tāny eva budhyante vivekena manāṃsi hi /
GSP27moksop_u:13260: manāṃsi kānicit tāni gatāny upaśamāt param //MU_3,99.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13263: ye te 'ndhakūpā gahanā narakās te raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:13264: manāṃsi tāni teṣv antar nipatanty utpatanti ca //MU_3,99.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13265: yat tat karañjagahanaṃ tat kalatrarasaṃ viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13273: praviṣṭāny andhakūpāntar nirgatāni na yāni tu /
GSP27moksop_u:13278: kānicid bahurūpāṇi yoner yoniṃ viśanti hi //MU_3,99.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13281: yair ahaṃ pumbhir abudhair durdvijeti tiraskṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13283: tvayā dṛṣṭo vinaṣṭo 'smi śatrur me tvam iti drutam /
GSP27moksop_u:13284: yad uktaṃ tad dhi cittena galatā paridevitam //MU_3,99.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13285: ruditaṃ yan mahākrandaṃ puṃsā bahvasru rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:13286: tad bhogajālaṃ tyajatā manasā rodanaṃ kṛtam //MU_3,99.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13288: cetasas tyajato bhogān paritāpo bhṛśaṃ bhavet //MU_3,99.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13290: kaṣṭam etāni santyajya kiṃ prayāmīti cetasā //MU_3,99.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13293: hasitaṃ yat tad ānandi puṃsā madavabodhataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13296: cetasas tyajato rūpam ānando hi vivardhate //MU_3,99.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13300: ity aṅgāny upahāsena dṛṣṭāni svāni cetasā //MU_3,99.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13301: manaḥ prāptavivekaṃ hi viśrāntaṃ vitate pade /
GSP27moksop_u:13302: prāktanīṃ dīnatāṃ dhīraṃ hasat paśyati dūrataḥ //MU_3,99.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13304: tad viveko balāc cittam ādatta iti darśitam //MU_3,99.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13305: yad aṅgāni viśīrṇāni gatāny antardhim agrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13309: yad ātmani prahāraughaiḥ pumān praharati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:13311: palāyate yat puruṣas svātmanaḥ praharan svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:13313: svayaṃ praharati svāntaṃ svayam eva svayecchayā /
GSP27moksop_u:13316: svayam eva palāyante gantum utkāni tat padam //MU_3,99.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13317: yad idaṃ vitataṃ duḥkhaṃ tat tanoti svayaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13322: bhāvi duḥkham apaśyan svaṃ durlīlābhir ivārbhakaḥ //MU_3,99.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13324: kīlotpāṭī kapir duḥkham etīdaṃ hi manas tathā //MU_3,99.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13326: abhyāsāt svasthatām etya na bhūyaḥ pariśocati //MU_3,99.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13328: tadvaśād eva naśyanti sūryasyāgre himaṃ yathā //MU_3,99.42//
GSP27moksop_u:13329: yāvajjīvam anindyayā varamate śāstrārthasañjātayā pālyaṃ vāsanayā mano hi munivan maunena rāgādiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:13330: paścāt pāvanapāvanaṃ padam ajaṃ tat prāpyate śītalam yatsaṃsthena na śocyate punar alaṃ puṃsā mahāpatsv api //MU_3,99.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13334: cittam etad upāyātaṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramāt padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:13335: atanmayaṃ tanmayaṃ ca taraṅgas sāgarād iva //MU_3,100.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13336: prabuddhānāṃ mano rāma brahmaiveha na cetarat /
GSP27moksop_u:13342: sarvaśakti paraṃ brahma nityam āpūrṇam avyayam /
GSP27moksop_u:13343: na tad asti na tasmin yad vidyate vitatātmani //MU_3,100.5//
GSP27moksop_u:13344: sarvaśaktir hi bhagavān yaiva tasmai hi rocate /
GSP27moksop_u:13345: śaktis tām eva vitatāṃ prakāśayati sarvagaḥ //MU_3,100.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13355: vṛkṣabīje yathā vṛkṣas tathedaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam //MU_3,100.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13359: yathartau śaktayas tadvaj jīvehā brahmaṇi sthitāḥ //MU_3,100.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13361: yathā dadāti puṣpāṇi tathā cittāni lokakṛt //MU_3,100.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13362: kvacit kāścit kadācic ca tasmād āyānti śaktayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13363: deśakālāt tu vaicitryāt kṣmātalād iva śālayaḥ //MU_3,100.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13365: brahmaivedam ahaṃ tvaṃ ca jagadāśāś ca rāghava //MU_3,100.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13367: yan manāṅmananāṃ śaktiṃ dhatte tan mana ucyate //MU_3,100.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13368: piñchabhrāntir yathā vyomni payasy āvartadhīr yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13370: yad etan manaso rūpam uditaṃ mananātmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:13371: brāhmī śaktir asau tasmād brahmaiva tad arindama //MU_3,100.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13372: idaṃ tad aham ity eva vibhāgaḥ pratibhāsajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13375: śabditaṃ sarvaśaktes sā śaktir brahmaiva tāṃ viduḥ //MU_3,100.21//
GSP27moksop_u:13376: manassattātmakaṃ nāma yad etan manasi sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:13379: manaśśabdaiḥ prakalpyante brahmajān brahma viddhi tān //MU_3,100.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13388: jāyate naśyati tathā yad idaṃ yāti tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:13389: tad idaṃ brahmaṇi brahma brahmaṇaiva vivartate //MU_3,100.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13392: kāraṇaṃ karma kartā ca jananaṃ maraṇaṃ sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13393: sarvaṃ brahmaiva nānyo 'sti tad vinā kalanārthataḥ //MU_3,100.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13394: na lobho 'sti na moho 'sti na tṛṣṇāsti nirañjanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13395: ka ātmany ātmano lobhas tṛṣṇā moho 'thavā kutaḥ //MU_3,100.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13398: abuddhaṃ brahma yad rāma tac cittaṃ jīva ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:13403: dvīndutvam iva durdṛṣṭes sac cāsac ca samutthitam //MU_3,100.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13405: sarvatvād ātmanaś caiva kvātmā baddhaḥ kva mucyate //MU_3,100.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13407: yasya kālpanikas tasya mokṣo mithyā na satyataḥ //MU_3,100.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13409: mano yanniścayaṃ yāti tat tad bhavati nānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13410: tena kālpaniko nāsti bandhaḥ katham iva prabho //MU_3,100.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13415: vastutas tu na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti mahāmate //MU_3,100.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13417: rajjvaher iva he prājña na tv abuddhamatiṃ prati //MU_3,100.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13420: ādau manas tadanu bandhavimokṣadṛṣṭī paścāt prapañcaracanā bhuvanābhidhānā /
GSP27moksop_u:13421: ityādikā sthitir iyaṃ hi gatā pratiṣṭhām ākhyāyikā bhavati bālajanociteva //MU_3,100.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13430: sā bālasya vinodāya dhātrī tasya mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:13432: kvacit santi mahātmāno rājaputrās trayaś śubhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13434: dvau na jātau tathaikaś ca garbha eva hi na sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13441: mārge glāniṃ gatā grīṣmatāpārtyā pallavā iva //MU_3,101.8//
GSP27moksop_u:13443: hā tātāmbeti śocanto mṛgā yūthacyutā iva //MU_3,101.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13448: tasmin vṛkṣatraye vṛkṣau dvau na jātau manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:13449: bījam eva tṛtīyasya svārohasya na vidyate //MU_3,101.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13450: viśrāntās te pariśrāntās tatraikasya taror adhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13452: phalāny amṛtasṛṣṭāni bhuktvā pītvā ca tadrasam /
GSP27moksop_u:13453: kṛtvā gulucchakair mālāś ciraṃ viśramya te yayuḥ //MU_3,101.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13456: tatraikā pariśuṣkaiva manāg apy ambu na dvayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13458: pariśuṣkā bhṛśaṃ yāsau tasyāṃ te sasnur ādṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13466: dadṛśus tatra ramyāṇi trīṇi sadvibhavāni te /
GSP27moksop_u:13468: anirmite dve sadane ekaṃ nirbhitti tatra vai /
GSP27moksop_u:13469: abhittimandiraṃ cāru praviṣṭās te narās trayaḥ //MU_3,101.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13472: yatra karparatāṃ yāte dve ekā cūrṇatāṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13473: jagṛhuś cūrṇarūpāṃ tāṃ sthālīṃ te dīrghabuddhayaḥ //MU_3,101.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13474: droṇair navanavatyā tais tasyāṃ droṇena cāndhasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13476: tato bhuktaṃ janaśatair brāhmaṇānāṃ śatais tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13477: tribhis tai rājaputraiś ca parāṃ nirvṛtim āgataiḥ //MU_3,101.26//
GSP27moksop_u:13481: etāṃ hṛdi kuru prājña vidagdhas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi //MU_3,101.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13484: eṣā hi kathitā rāma cittākhyānakathāṃ prati /
GSP27moksop_u:13491: saṅkalpavaśataḥ kiñcin nakiñcit kiñcid eva vā //MU_3,101.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13492: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaḥ parvatās sarito diśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13499: tad idaṃ sphāratāṃ yātaṃ vyāpārair divasaṃ yathā //MU_3,101.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13500: saṅkalpajālakalanaiva jagat samagraṃ saṅkalpam eva nanu viddhi vilāsi cetyam /
GSP27moksop_u:13501: saṅkalpamātram alam utsṛja nirvikalpam āśritya niścayam avāpnuhi rāma śāntim //MU_3,101.38//
GSP27moksop_u:13505: svasaṅkalpavaśān mūḍho moham eti na paṇḍitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13508: ko 'sau saṅkalpitaḥ kena yakṣo brahmavidāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:13514: kutaḥ ko 'yam ahaṃ nāma kathaṃ nāma kiloditaḥ //MU_3,102.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13523: abaddho baddha ity uktvā kiṃ śocasi mudhaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:13526: sarvasmin brahmatattve 'smin kiṃ baddhaṃ kiṃ vimucyate //MU_3,102.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13527: anārto 'py ārtisadbhāvāc chinne 'ṅge kiṃ ca tāmyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:13529: dehe naṣṭe kṣate kṣīṇe kātmanaḥ kṣatir āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13530: bhastrāyāṃ paridagdhāyāṃ tatsthaṃ hema na naśyati //MU_3,102.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13531: dehaḥ patatu vodetu kā naḥ kṣatir upāgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13532: ko naṣṭaḥ prakṣate puṣpe āmodo vyomasaṃśrayaḥ //MU_3,102.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13535: dehaḥ patatu vodetu yātu vā gaganāntaram /
GSP27moksop_u:13539: mano nāma śarīraṃ hi jagatas sakalasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:13540: ātmaśaktiś cid asyātmā na naśyati kadācana //MU_3,102.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13542: na naśyati kadācid sa kiṃ mudhā paritapyase //MU_3,102.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13543: viśīrṇe 'bhre yathā vātaś śuṣke 'bje ṣaṭpado yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13545: saṃsāre 'smin viharato mano 'pi hi na naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:13546: jñānāgninā vinā jantor ātmanāśe tu kā kathā //MU_3,102.20//
GSP27moksop_u:13549: badaraṃ hastam āyāti yathā sphuṭati kuṇḍake /
GSP27moksop_u:13550: ātmā gaganam āyāti tathā calati dehake //MU_3,102.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13552: tiṣṭhaty evam ayaṃ dehī dehe kṣīṇe nirāmayaḥ //MU_3,102.23//
GSP27moksop_u:13556: kiṃ bibheti mahābāho neha naśyati kaścana //MU_3,102.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13557: atas tvaṃ vāsanāṃ rāma mithyaivāham iti sthitām /
GSP27moksop_u:13563: eṣā kuḍyavad ākāśaṃ tuṣāram analaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:13568: jagatām ākulaṃ cakṣur vyomni piñchakatām iva //MU_3,102.31//
GSP27moksop_u:13569: layam asyās svarūpaṃ tvaṃ naya rāma vicāraṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:13575: svavināśakriyāṃ caitāṃ mana eva karoty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:13576: mano hy ātmavadhaṃ nāma nāṭakaṃ parinṛtyati //MU_3,102.35//
GSP27moksop_u:13578: na hi jānāti durbuddhir vināśaṃ pratyupasthitam //MU_3,102.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13584: manonāśe prayatnaṃ tvaṃ kuru mā manaso jave //MU_3,102.39//
GSP27moksop_u:13586: prabhur idam akhile vivekahīnaṃ subhaga mano mahad āpadekahetuḥ //MU_3,102.40//
GSP27moksop_u:13588: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:13589: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_3,102.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13592: parasmād utthitaṃ cetaḥ kaṇo lola ivārṇavāt /
GSP27moksop_u:13593: sphāratām etya bhuvanaṃ tanotīdam itas tataḥ //MU_3,103.1//
GSP27moksop_u:13594: hrasvaṃ dīrghīkaroty āśu dīrghaṃ nayati kharvatām /
GSP27moksop_u:13595: svatāṃ nayaty anyad alaṃ svaṃ tathaivānyatām api //MU_3,103.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13596: prādeśamātram api yad vastu bhāvanayaiva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:13599: nimeṣeṇaiva saṃsārān karoti na karoti ca //MU_3,103.4//
GSP27moksop_u:13600: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāsnu cariṣṇu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:13603: bhāvād bhāvāntaraṃ yāti lolatvān naṭavan manaḥ //MU_3,103.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13604: sad asattāṃ nayaty āśu sattāṃ cāsan nayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:13608: tatas saiva kriyā cittasamīhitam alaṃ phalam /
GSP27moksop_u:13609: kṣaṇāt prayacchati latā kāle sikteva tādṛśam //MU_3,103.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13610: citrāṃ krīḍanakaśreṇīṃ yathā paṅkād gṛhe śiśuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13611: karoty evaṃ mano rāma vikalpāt kurute jagat //MU_3,103.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13613: kim ekaṃ tatpadārtheṣu rūpaṃ jagati kalpyate //MU_3,103.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13614: karoty ṛtukaraḥ kālo yathā rūpānyatāṃ taroḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13615: cittam evaṃ padārthānāṃ teṣām evānyatām iha //MU_3,103.12//
GSP27moksop_u:13618: kalpaṃ kṣaṇīkaroty etat kṣaṇaṃ nayati kalpatām /
GSP27moksop_u:13621: vilambate na ca ciraṃ na ca cittam aśaktitaḥ //MU_3,103.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13623: cetasaḥ prabhavanty ete pādapād iva pallavāḥ //MU_3,103.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13624: jalam eva yathāmbhodhir auṣṇyam eva yathānalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13625: tathā vividhasaṃrambhas saṃsāraś cittam eva hi //MU_3,103.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13627: draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyāḍhyaṃ tat sarvaṃ cittam eva vaḥ //MU_3,103.18//
GSP27moksop_u:13628: cittaṃ jaganti bhuvanāni vanāntarāṇi saṃlakṣyate svayam upāgatam ātmabhedaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13633: atra te śṛṇu vakṣyāmi vṛttāntam imam adbhutam /
GSP27moksop_u:13636: uttarāḥ pāṇḍavā nāma sphīto janapado mahān //MU_3,104.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13658: tatra śailā virājante harāḥ proddhūlitā iva //MU_3,104.13//
GSP27moksop_u:13662: caritaṃ saṃsmariṣyanti harer iva ciraṃ janāḥ //MU_3,104.15//
GSP27moksop_u:13669: jihmatāṃ yo na jānāti na dṛṣṭā yena gṛdhnutā /
GSP27moksop_u:13682: paṭhatsu ca stutīḥ puṇyāḥ puraḥprahveṣu vandiṣu //MU_3,104.25//
GSP27moksop_u:13683: sabhāṃ viveśa sāṭopaḥ kaścit tām aindrajālikaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13688: saṃviveśa puro rājñas taror agre kapir yathā //MU_3,104.28//
GSP27moksop_u:13690: uvācotkandharaṃ bhūpaṃ sa padmam iva ṣaṭpadaḥ //MU_3,104.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13691: vilokaya vibho tāvad ekām iha kharolikām /
GSP27moksop_u:13692: pīṭhastha eva sāścaryāṃ vyomnaś candra ivāvanim //MU_3,104.30//
GSP27moksop_u:13693: ity uktvā bhramitā tena piñchikā bhramadāyinī /
GSP27moksop_u:13700: devalokonmukhas tv abdheś śakram uccaiśśravā iva //MU_3,104.34//
GSP27moksop_u:13701: sa tam aśvam upādāya pārthivaṃ samuvāca ha /
GSP27moksop_u:13704: jave jayanaśīle tu mūrtimān iva mārutaḥ //MU_3,104.36//
GSP27moksop_u:13706: rājate hi padārthaśrīr mahatām arpaṇāc chubhā //MU_3,104.37//
GSP27moksop_u:13709: sadaśvam enam āruhya bhuvanaṃ vihara prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:13711: aśvam ālokayām āsa tenokta iti pārthivaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13715: kṣaṇam ālokya piñchāśvau tasthau sa sthagitekṣaṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13718: vītarāgo munir buddhaḥ parānanda iva sthitaḥ //MU_3,104.43//
GSP27moksop_u:13720: bhayāt kām apy ayaṃ bhūpaś cintāṃ cintayatīti ha //MU_3,104.44//
GSP27moksop_u:13730: stimitacakṣuṣi bhūmipatau sthite mukulitābjavanasya dhṛtā dyutiḥ //MU_3,104.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13740: patantaṃ dhārayām āsus taṃ purogā nṛpaṃ bhujaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13744: ko 'yaṃ pradeśaḥ kasyeyaṃ sabheti sa nṛpaś śanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13746: athovāca sabhā deva kim etad iti sādaram /
GSP27moksop_u:13750: tvayītthaṃ saṃsthite deva vayam atyantam ākulāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13753: bhogeṣv iva vikalpeṣu keṣu te luṭhitaṃ manaḥ //MU_3,105.10//
GSP27moksop_u:13755: manas te nirmalaṃ kasmāt sambhrameṣu nimajjati //MU_3,105.11//
GSP27moksop_u:13758: sātatyena hi yaivāsya manaso vṛttir utthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:13761: tavāpi hi manaś citram ālūnam iva lakṣyate //MU_3,105.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13766: iti jātāsu gīrṣv asya bhūpateḥ kāntir ānanam /
GSP27moksop_u:13767: bhūṣayām āsa śītāṃśuṃ māsānta iva pūrṇatā //MU_3,105.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13774: jālma jālaṃ jaṭālena kim etad bhavatā kṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:13777: suśaktam api me cittam ābhir mohe niveśitam //MU_3,105.22//
GSP27moksop_u:13781: kadācin moham ādatte kṣaṇaṃ matimatām api //MU_3,105.24//
GSP27moksop_u:13784: dṛṣṭavān aham etasmin bahvīḥ kāryadaśāś calāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13786: ity uktvonmukhanetreṣu sabhyeṣu sa hasann iva /
GSP27moksop_u:13797: indras svarga ivāsyāṃ tu sabhāyām adya saṃsthitaḥ //MU_3,106.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13798: yāvad abhyāgato dūrāt kaścic chāmbarikas tv ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:13799: rasātalād abhyutthito māyī maya iva svayam //MU_3,106.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13805: tathā calantaṃ calitas svaśvam ārūḍhavān aham //MU_3,106.6//
GSP27moksop_u:13806: gantuṃ pravṛtto mṛgayām eko 'ham atha raṃhasā /
GSP27moksop_u:13818: araṇyaṃ mahad āsādya matir me khedam āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13821: āsūryāntaṃ dinaṃ tatra prakrāntaṃ sīdatā mayā //MU_3,106.14//
GSP27moksop_u:13825: astādrisānuṃ khinnaḥ khaṃ śūnyaṃ bhrāntveva bhāskaraḥ //MU_3,106.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13827: yatra sphuranti ṣaṇḍeṣu pānthānām iva bandhavaḥ //MU_3,106.17//
GSP27moksop_u:13830: pūrvād araṇyād arasāt tad dhi kiñcit sukhāvaham /
GSP27moksop_u:13831: atyantaduḥkhān maraṇād varaṃ vyādhir hi jantuṣu //MU_3,106.19//
GSP27moksop_u:13848: tatra kalpasamā rātrir mohamagnasya me gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13850: na snātavān na sthitavān na tadā bhuktavān aham /
GSP27moksop_u:13851: kevalaṃ me gatā rātris sāpadāṃ dhuri tiṣṭhataḥ //MU_3,106.29//
GSP27moksop_u:13859: ahaṃ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ prātar madhupānāruṇām iva //MU_3,106.33//
GSP27moksop_u:13860: kṣaṇād ajña iva jñānaṃ daridra iva kāñcanam /
GSP27moksop_u:13862: utthāya vāravāṇaṃ ca tata āsphoṭitaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:13864: pravṛttas tām ahaṃ sphārāṃ vihartuṃ jaṅgalasthalīm /
GSP27moksop_u:13866: na kiñcid dṛśyate tatra bhūtaṃ jaraḍhajaṅgale /
GSP27moksop_u:13875: aham abhyāgatas tatra śarvarīm iva candramāḥ //MU_3,106.41//
GSP27moksop_u:13876: mahyam odanam āśv etad bāle balavadāpade /
GSP27moksop_u:13878: kṣud antar dahatīyaṃ māṃ bāle vṛddhim upeyuṣī /
GSP27moksop_u:13880: yācñayāpi tayā mahyam itthaṃ dattaṃ na kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:13884: tayokto hārakeyūriṃś caṇḍālīṃ viddhi mām iti /
GSP27moksop_u:13888: ity uktavatyā gacchantyā skhalantyeva pade pade /
GSP27moksop_u:13890: dadāni bhojanam idaṃ bhartā bhavasi cen mama /
GSP27moksop_u:13891: loko nopakaroty arthaṃ sāmānyas snigdhatāṃ vinā //MU_3,106.49//
GSP27moksop_u:13892: vāhayaty atra me dāntān uḍḍāre pukkasaḥ pitā /
GSP27moksop_u:13894: tasyedam annaṃ bhavati bhartṛtve dīyate sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:13895: prāṇair api hi sampūjyā vallabhāḥ puruṣā yataḥ //MU_3,106.51//
GSP27moksop_u:13896: athoktā sā mayā bhartā bhavāmi tava suvrate /
GSP27moksop_u:13898: tatas tayaudanād ardhaṃ mahyam ekaṃ samarpitam /
GSP27moksop_u:13902: māṃ taḍākam ivāpūrya sā prāvṛṭśyāmalā gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:13903: hastena samupādāya prāṇaṃ bahir iva sthitam //MU_3,106.55//
GSP27moksop_u:13908: sa tasyā bāḍham ity uktvā dinānte samupasthite /
GSP27moksop_u:13909: mumoca dāntāv ābaddhau kṛtāntaḥ kiṅkarāv iva //MU_3,106.58//
GSP27moksop_u:13911: vetālavad vanāt tasmād dinānte calitā vayam //MU_3,106.59//
GSP27moksop_u:13913: śmaśānād iva vetālāś śmaśānam itaran mahat //MU_3,106.60//
GSP27moksop_u:13927: jāmātāyam iti proktaṃ tayā tad abhinanditam //MU_3,106.67//
GSP27moksop_u:13934: dattātha tena sā mahyaṃ kumārī bhayadāyinī /
GSP27moksop_u:13936: sarabhasam abhito vinedur atra prasṛtamahāmadirāsavāś śvapākāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13937: hatapaṭupaṭahā vilāsavantas svayam iva duṣkṛtarāśayo mahāntaḥ //MU_3,106.72//
GSP27moksop_u:13944: puṣpitā sātha sampannā sthitā garbhavatī tataḥ //MU_3,107.2//
GSP27moksop_u:13945: prāsūta duḥkhadāṃ kanyāṃ vipad duḥkhakriyām iva /
GSP27moksop_u:13946: sā kanyā vavṛdhe śīghraṃ mūrkhacinteva pīvarī //MU_3,107.3//
GSP27moksop_u:13947: punaḥ prāsūta sā varṣais tribhiḥ putram aśobhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:13949: punaḥ prāsūta kanyāṃ ca punar apy arbhakaṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13951: tayā saha samās tatra mayā bahvyo 'tivāhitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:13958: kāṣṭhabhāro vane vyūḍho yo mūrtam iva duṣkṛtam //MU_3,107.9//
GSP27moksop_u:13967: kāle kṣayaṃ gate snehe kalatre 'ghanatāṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:13972: mukhaṃ jarjaratāṃ yātam indū rāhuradair iva //MU_3,107.16//
GSP27moksop_u:13979: śarāvakeṣv aṭavyāṃ ca palalaṃ pakvam ādarāt /
GSP27moksop_u:14010: jālair jarjaratāṃ nītā diśaś ca sukṛtāyuṣām //MU_3,107.35//
GSP27moksop_u:14013: karabhyā iva sarpeṇa vidrutaṃ dūrato hriyā /
GSP27moksop_u:14014: dūre tyaktā dayā dehād bhujaṅgeneva kañcukam //MU_3,107.37//
GSP27moksop_u:14027: kṛṣṇadehena yaukāḍhyā kanthā skandhe mayā ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:14031: lohaliṅgā yathā rogān anarthān iva durgrahāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14032: prasūtās tatra me dārā duḥkhāny api sutān api //MU_3,107.46//
GSP27moksop_u:14035: ākruṣṭam uddhataravaṃ ruditaṃ vipatsu bhuktaṃ kadannam uṣitaṃ hatapakkaṇeṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:14036: kālāntaraṃ bahu mayopahatena tatra durvāsanānigaḍabandhagatena sabhyāḥ //MU_3,107.48//
GSP27moksop_u:14045: kalaheṣv atha kāryeṣu āgacchatsu vrajatsu ca //MU_3,108.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14048: calaṃ cintācitaṃ cakram ārūḍhe bhrānta ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:14054: saṃsāram iva kalpānto dāvāgnir iva kānanam /
GSP27moksop_u:14058: na varṣati ghanavrāte dṛṣṭanaṣṭe kvacit sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:14096: tad akāṇḍaṃ sphuṭaṃ prāpya sa deśaś śuṣkakoṭaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14108: śīrṇāḥ kecana tatraiva cchinnā iva vane drumāḥ //MU_3,109.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14111: praviṣṭāḥ kecid analaṃ jvalitaṃ śalabhā iva /
GSP27moksop_u:14112: kecic chvabhreṣu patitāś śilāś śailacyutā iva //MU_3,109.5//
GSP27moksop_u:14113: ahaṃ tu tān parityajya śvaśurādīn svakāñ janān /
GSP27moksop_u:14115: analān anilāṃś caiva rakṣakān bhakṣakān api /
GSP27moksop_u:14118: avaropya sutān skandhāt tān anarthān ivolbaṇān //MU_3,109.8//
GSP27moksop_u:14123: thutthako nāma tanayo mamaikaḥ puratas sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14126: āpta dehy āśu me māṃsaṃ pānaṃ ca rudhiraṃ kṣaṇāt //MU_3,109.12//
GSP27moksop_u:14127: punaḥ punar vadann evaṃ sa bālas tanayo mama /
GSP27moksop_u:14128: prāṇāntikīṃ daśāṃ prāptas sākrando hi punaḥ kṣudhā //MU_3,109.13//
GSP27moksop_u:14129: tasyoktaṃ hi mayā putra māṃsaṃ nāstīti bhūriśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14130: tathāpi māṃsaṃ dehīti vadaty eva sudurmatiḥ //MU_3,109.14//
GSP27moksop_u:14132: tasyoktaṃ putra manmāṃsaṃ pakvaṃ sambhujyatām iti //MU_3,109.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14133: tad apy aṅgīkṛtaṃ tena dehīti vadatā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14141: mayoktaṃ tanayāsyāṃ tu citāyāṃ patitāt punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14142: utkṛtyotkṛtya bhoktavyaṃ matto māṃsaṃ kṣaṇāt tvayā //MU_3,109.20//
GSP27moksop_u:14143: ity uktvā yāvad ātmānaṃ svaṃ citāyāṃ kṣipāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:14144: luṭhito 'smi javāt tāvad asmāt siṃhāsanān nṛpaḥ //MU_3,109.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14146: bhṛśam eva prabuddho 'haṃ smṛtyā ca valitas sthitaḥ //MU_3,109.22//
GSP27moksop_u:14149: ātmodantaṃ bhavatsv ittham enaṃ kathitavān aham /
GSP27moksop_u:14156: aho nu khalu citreyaṃ māyā nanu vilakṣaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:14157: ko nu śāmbariko nāma kva cāsāv agrato gataḥ //MU_3,109.27//
GSP27moksop_u:14158: sarvaśakter vicitrā hi śaktayaś śataśo vidheḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14162: na ca śāmbarikottheyaṃ māyā manasi mohanī /
GSP27moksop_u:14163: arthasya gṛdhnavo hy ete nityaṃ śāmbarikāḥ kila //MU_3,109.30//
GSP27moksop_u:14166: sabhāyām avasaṃ tasyām ahaṃ rāma tadā kila /
GSP27moksop_u:14167: tena pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaṃ mayaitan nāptataś śrūtam //MU_3,109.32//
GSP27moksop_u:14168: atibahukalanāvivardhitāṅgaṃ naya nijacittam idaṃ śamaṃ mahātman /
GSP27moksop_u:14169: śamam upagamite paraṃ svabhāve paramam upaiṣyasi pāvanaṃ padaṃ tat //MU_3,109.33//
GSP27moksop_u:14177: asad eva manovṛttir mlānā vistārayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:14179: sad eva hi mahāduḥkham asattāṃ nayati kṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:14181: nayad abhyāśatāṃ dūram abhyāśaṃ dūratāṃ nayat /
GSP27moksop_u:14182: mano valgati bhūteṣu bālo bālakhageṣv iva //MU_3,110.5//
GSP27moksop_u:14190: vāsanāvalitaṃ cetas svapnavaj jāgrad eva hi //MU_3,110.9//
GSP27moksop_u:14197: atas tvaṃ mana evedaṃ naraṃ viddhi na dehakam /
GSP27moksop_u:14198: jaḍo deho manas tv atra na jaḍaṃ nājaḍaṃ viduḥ //MU_3,110.13//
GSP27moksop_u:14199: yat kṛtaṃ manasā rāma tat kṛtaṃ viddhi rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:14200: yat tyaktaṃ manasā rāma tat tyaktaṃ viddhi rāghava //MU_3,110.14//
GSP27moksop_u:14202: mano vyoma mano bhūmir mano vāyur mano mahān //MU_3,110.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14203: mano yadi padārthaṃ tu tadbhāvena na yojayet /
GSP27moksop_u:14204: tatas sūryādayo 'py ete na prakāśāḥ kadācana //MU_3,110.16//
GSP27moksop_u:14205: mano moham upādatte yasyāsau mūḍha ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14206: śarīre moham āpanne na śave mūḍha ucyate //MU_3,110.17//
GSP27moksop_u:14207: manaḥ paśyad bhavaty akṣi śṛṇvac śravaṇatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:14208: tvagbhāvaṃ sparśanād eti ghrāṇatām eti śiṅghanāt //MU_3,110.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14209: rasanād rasatām eti vicitrāsv atra vṛttiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:14211: laghu dīrghaṃ karoty etat sattāsattāṃ ca gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:14212: kaṭutāṃ nayati svādu ripuṃ nayati mitratām //MU_3,110.20//
GSP27moksop_u:14214: tat sad eva hi pratyakṣaṃ tanmātrānubhavād iha //MU_3,110.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14222: śīryate ca yathā tantau dagdhe sauktikamālikā //MU_3,110.25//
GSP27moksop_u:14230: anīhitaṃ ca viṣatāṃ nayaty amṛtam apy alam //MU_3,110.29//
GSP27moksop_u:14232: manas tv abhimatākāraṃ rūpaṃ sṛjati vastuṣu //MU_3,110.30//
GSP27moksop_u:14237: śuklaṃ kṛṣṇīkaroty etat kṛṣṇaṃ nayati śuklatām /
GSP27moksop_u:14241: yac cittadṛṣṭaṃ tad dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tadalokitam /
GSP27moksop_u:14242: andhakāre yathā rūpam indriyaṃ nirmanas tathā //MU_3,110.35//
GSP27moksop_u:14257: manasy ullasite svapne hṛdy eva puraparvatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14258: ākāśa iva vistīrṇe dṛśyante nirmitāḥ kṣaṇāt //MU_3,110.43//
GSP27moksop_u:14265: vyatiriktā yathā hemno na haimavanitā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:14273: yad yat saṃvedyate kiñcit tena tenāśu bhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14277: suratvād daityatām eti nāgatvān nagatām api /
GSP27moksop_u:14279: naratvād eti nārītvaṃ pitṛtvāt putratāṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14280: yathā kṣipraṃ prati naṭas svasaṅkalpāt tathā manaḥ //MU_3,110.54//
GSP27moksop_u:14284: saṅkalpād yonim āyāti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhayābhaye //MU_3,110.56//
GSP27moksop_u:14285: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca manasi tile tailam iva sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:14286: tad deśakālavaśato ghanaṃ vā tanu vā bhavet //MU_3,110.57//
GSP27moksop_u:14287: tailaṃ tilasya ca krāntyā sphuṭatām eti śāśvatīm /
GSP27moksop_u:14290: kathyate tadvaśād yasmād deśakālau sthitiṃ gatau //MU_3,110.59//
GSP27moksop_u:14291: praśāmyaty ullasaty eti yāti nandati valgati /
GSP27moksop_u:14295: cāpale prasaras tasmād antar yena na dīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14296: mano vinayam ādhatte tasyālāna iva dvipaḥ //MU_3,110.62//
GSP27moksop_u:14297: na spandate mano yasya śastrastambha ivottamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14305: cittaṃ calatkuvalayaṃ valayanta ete mūḍhā mahājaḍajave madamohamandāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14314: tyajann abhimataṃ vastu yas tiṣṭhati nirāmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14315: jitam eva manas tena kudānta iva dantinā //MU_3,111.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14317: avastuno vastuni ca yojyate bodhyate 'pi ca //MU_3,111.4//
GSP27moksop_u:14319: chinddhi tvam ayasevāyo manasaiva mano mune //MU_3,111.5//
GSP27moksop_u:14320: ayatnena yathā bāla itaś cetaś ca yujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14325: yasya duṣkaratāṃ yātaṃ dhik taṃ puruṣakīṭakam //MU_3,111.8//
GSP27moksop_u:14328: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena cittam āśv eva jīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14331: śaknuvanti na ye kartuṃ dhik tān puruṣajambukān //MU_3,111.11//
GSP27moksop_u:14338: sarvaṃ sarvagataṃ śāntaṃ brahma sampadyate tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:14344: tāṃ mahāpadavīm ekāṃ kām apy anusaraṃś ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:14345: cittaṃ cidbhakṣitaṃ kṛtvā cittvād api paraṃ bhava //MU_3,111.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14348: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya nītvā cittam acittatām /
GSP27moksop_u:14349: tāṃ mahāpadavīm ehi yatra nāsi na cetarat //MU_3,111.20//
GSP27moksop_u:14351: jetum āśu mano rāma pauruṣenaiva śakyate //MU_3,111.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14360: na kaścaneha mriyate jāyate neha kaścana /
GSP27moksop_u:14361: svayaṃ vetti mṛtiṃ dehe lokam anyaṃ gataṃ manaḥ //MU_3,111.26//
GSP27moksop_u:14362: ito yātaṃ pare loke sphuraty anyatayā manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14363: na naśyaty etad āmokṣam ato mṛtibhayaṃ kutaḥ //MU_3,111.27//
GSP27moksop_u:14365: cittam āmokṣam āste 'sya rūpam anyan na vidyate //MU_3,111.28//
GSP27moksop_u:14366: sute bhrātari bhṛtyādau kleśa ākramaṇaṃ nṛṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:14368: tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc ca bhūyo bhūyo vicāritam /
GSP27moksop_u:14370: ṛte pathye tate śuddhe bodhe hṛdy udite citi /
GSP27moksop_u:14373: mano māraya niśśaṅkaṃ tvāṃ pramathnanti nādhayaḥ //MU_3,111.32//
GSP27moksop_u:14374: yadi ramyam aramyatve tvayā saṃviditaṃ vidā /
GSP27moksop_u:14375: chinnāny eva tad aṅgāni cittasyeti matir mama //MU_3,111.33//
GSP27moksop_u:14376: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me etāvanmātrakaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14378: chinnābhram amale vyomni yathā śaradi dhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14379: nirvikalpe pare tattve tathā nirvāsanaṃ manaḥ //MU_3,111.35//
GSP27moksop_u:14380: vahanti yatra śastrāgnipavanās tatra bhīr bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:14381: svāyatte mṛduni svacche kim asaṅkalpane bhayam //MU_3,111.36//
GSP27moksop_u:14382: idaṃ śreya idaṃ neti siddham ābālam akṣatam /
GSP27moksop_u:14383: bālaṃ putram ivodāre manaś śreyasi yojayet //MU_3,111.37//
GSP27moksop_u:14397: tad aṇor antare vyaktaṃ vibhaktaṃ paridṛśyate //MU_3,111.44//
GSP27moksop_u:14399: santoṣamātravibhavena mano vijitya nityoditena jayam ehi nirīhitena //MU_3,111.45//
GSP27moksop_u:14401: śamitayā mitayāntar ahantayā yad avaśiṣṭam ajaṃ padam astu tat //MU_3,111.46//
GSP27moksop_u:14405: yasmin yasmin padārthe hi yena yena yathā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:14419: spandasparśād ṛte vāyor yathā sattaiva nohyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14421: yat tu cañcalatāhīnaṃ tan mano mṛtam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14422: sa eva ca tapaśśāstraprasiddho mokṣa ucyate //MU_3,112.8//
GSP27moksop_u:14427: tasya cañcalatā yaiṣā hy avidyā nāma socyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14431: yat tat sadasator madhyaṃ yan madhyaṃ cittvajāḍyayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14437: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena yasminn eva pade manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14438: pātyate tat padaṃ prāpya bhavaty abhyāsalohitam //MU_3,112.16//
GSP27moksop_u:14439: ataḥ pauruṣam āśritya cittam ākramya cetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:14440: viśokaṃ padam āśritya nirāśaṅkas sthiro bhava //MU_3,112.17//
GSP27moksop_u:14441: bhavabhāvanayā bhagnaṃ manasaiva na cen manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14442: balād uttāryate rāma tad upāyo 'sti netaraḥ //MU_3,112.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14443: mana eva samarthaṃ vai manaso dṛḍhanigrahe /
GSP27moksop_u:14444: arājā kas samarthas syād rājño rāghava nigrahe //MU_3,112.19//
GSP27moksop_u:14446: āvartair uhyamānānāṃ dūraṃ svamana eva nauḥ //MU_3,112.20//
GSP27moksop_u:14448: unmocito na yenātmā nāsāv anyena mokṣyate //MU_3,112.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14450: tāṃ tāṃ pariharet prājñas tato 'vidyākṣayo bhavet //MU_3,112.22//
GSP27moksop_u:14452: bhāvābhāvau tatas tyaktvā nirvikalpas sukhī bhava //MU_3,112.23//
GSP27moksop_u:14454: eṣa eva manonāśas tv avidyānāśa ucyate //MU_3,112.24//
GSP27moksop_u:14455: yad yat saṃvedyate kiñcit tatrāsaṃvedanaṃ varam /
GSP27moksop_u:14456: asaṃvittis tu nirvāṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃvedanād bhavet //MU_3,112.25//
GSP27moksop_u:14457: svenaiva tat prayatnena puṃsas sampadyate kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:14458: bhāvasyābhāvanaṃ bhūtyai tat tasmān nityam āharet //MU_3,112.26//
GSP27moksop_u:14459: rāgādayo ye manasepsitās te buddhvaiva tāṃs tāṃs tvam avastubhūtān /
GSP27moksop_u:14460: tyaktvā tadāsthāṅkuram astabījaṃ mā harṣaśokau samupaiṣi tṛptaḥ //MU_3,112.27//
GSP27moksop_u:14464: eṣā hi vāsanā nityam asaty eva yad utthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:14468: mā bhavājño bhava prājñas samyag rāma vicāraya /
GSP27moksop_u:14469: nāsty evendur dvitīyaḥ khe bhrāntyā saṃlakṣyate mudhā //MU_3,113.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14470: nātmatattvād ṛte kiñcid vidyate vastv avastu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:14473: nitye tate site śuddhe mā samāropayātmani //MU_3,113.5//
GSP27moksop_u:14474: nāsi kartā kim etāsu kriyāsu mamatā tava /
GSP27moksop_u:14475: ekasmin vidyamāne hi kiṃ kena kriyate katham //MU_3,113.6//
GSP27moksop_u:14476: mā cākartā bhava prājña kim akartṛtayeha te /
GSP27moksop_u:14477: sādhyaṃ sādhyam upādeyaṃ tasmāt svastho bhavānagha //MU_3,113.7//
GSP27moksop_u:14478: kartā saṃs tvam asaktatvād bhavākartā raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:14480: satyaṃ cet syād upādeyaṃ mithyā syād dheyam eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:14483: tatra kās tāḥ kathaṃ rāma heyopādeyadṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_3,113.10//
GSP27moksop_u:14485: eṣā hy avidyamānaiva satīva sphāratāṃ gatā //MU_3,113.11//
GSP27moksop_u:14494: kvacid vakrā kvacid ṛjvī dīrghā kharvā sthirā calā /
GSP27moksop_u:14505: lalanā cañcalā kṣuddhā tṛṣṇā jihveva bhoginaḥ //MU_3,113.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14510: yatnād gṛhītvā dahati bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14521: rātrir vatsaravad dīrghā bhavaty asyāḥ prasādataḥ //MU_3,113.29//
GSP27moksop_u:14526: sanitambastanā citre na strī strīdharmiṇī yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:14531: viḍambayati tān mugdhamṛgān eva na mānuṣān //MU_3,113.34//
GSP27moksop_u:14534: ananyā cetanasyāpi nūnam anyeva ca sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:14544: jvāleva dṛśyate vṛddhitatparā na ca vardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:14546: naṣṭā dīpaśikhevaiṣā na jāne kveha gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:14554: manojñam api satyaṃ ca dṛśyate sad asattayā /
GSP27moksop_u:14555: amanojñam asatyaṃ ca dṛśyate 'sac ca sattayā //MU_3,113.46//
GSP27moksop_u:14556: anayopahate tv asmiṃś citrāś cetasi vibhramāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14559: ākrāmati manaḥ kṣipraṃ vihagaṃ vāgurā yathā //MU_3,113.48//
GSP27moksop_u:14563: sudhā sārdram api kṣipraṃ pravṛddhā bimbam aindavam //MU_3,113.50//
GSP27moksop_u:14565: sthāṇavas samprayacchanti mūkam apy eti yad dhiyā //MU_3,113.51//
GSP27moksop_u:14567: asyāḥ prasādād dṛśyante sarpā jagati dṛṣṭibhiḥ //MU_3,113.52//
GSP27moksop_u:14570: ādīrghaḥ kṣaṇatām eti kālas seṣṭā yathā niśā /
GSP27moksop_u:14572: na tad asti na yan nāma na karotīyam uddhatā /
GSP27moksop_u:14573: asyās tv akiñcanāyās tu śaktatāṃ paśya rāghava //MU_3,113.55//
GSP27moksop_u:14583: deham apy avijānantyā citram andhīkṛtaṃ jagat //MU_3,113.60//
GSP27moksop_u:14594: puruṣasya na yā śaktā soḍhum īkṣitam apy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:14596: na yasyāś cetanaivāsti yāpy anaṣṭaiva naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:14599: iyaṃ prabho vigalati kena vāsanā manoguhānilayanibaddhabhāvanā //MU_3,113.68//
GSP27moksop_u:14604: mahad āndhyam idaṃ brahman kathaṃ nāma vinaśyati //MU_3,114.1//
GSP27moksop_u:14610: avidyā yāvad asyās tu notpannā kṣayakāriṇī /
GSP27moksop_u:14614: dṛṣṭe sarvagate deve svayam eva vilīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14625: yāvat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyaṃ sāvidyā kṣīyate ca sā /
GSP27moksop_u:14629: yac cittattvam anākhyeyaṃ sa ātmā parameśvaraḥ //MU_3,114.12//
GSP27moksop_u:14632: sarvaṃ ca khalv idaṃ brahma nityaṃ cidghanam akṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:14633: kalpanānyā manonāmnī vidyate na hi kācana //MU_3,114.14//
GSP27moksop_u:14634: na jāyate na mriyate kiñcid asmiñ jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:14635: na ca bhāvavikārāṇāṃ sattā kvacana vidyate //MU_3,114.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14638: asmin nitye tate śuddhe cinmātre nirupadrave /
GSP27moksop_u:14641: cic cetyaṃ svayam amlānā sā mlānā tan manas smṛtam //MU_3,114.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14644: ekasmin vitate śānte yā na kiñcana vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14650: nāhaṃ brahmeti saṅkalpāt sudṛḍhād badhyate manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14651: sarvaṃ brahmeti saṅkalpāt sudṛḍhān mucyate punaḥ //MU_3,114.23//
GSP27moksop_u:14652: saṅkalpaḥ paramo bandhas tv asaṅkalpo vimuktatā /
GSP27moksop_u:14664: nāhaṃ duḥkhī na me dehaḥ ko bandho 'syātmanaś citaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14666: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na cāsthīni dehād anyaḥ paro hy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:14670: kalpyate hi yathā vyomnaḥ kālimeti svabhāvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14676: tad idaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ brahman nīlatvaṃ nabhaso vada //MU_3,114.35//
GSP27moksop_u:14678: na rāma nīlatā vyomnaś śūnyasya guṇavat sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:14685: vastu svabhāvāt tad vyomnaḥ kārṣṇyam ity avalokyate //MU_3,114.39//
GSP27moksop_u:14687: na kālimeti bodhas syād avidyātimire tathā //MU_3,114.40//
GSP27moksop_u:14688: asaṅkalpo hy avidyāyā nigrahaḥ kathito budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14692: naṣṭo 'ham iti saṅkalpād yathā duḥkhena naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:14694: tathā sammūḍhasaṅkalpān mūḍhatām eti vai punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14701: kṣaṇāt sampādayanty etā rājājñām iva mantriṇaḥ //MU_3,114.47//
GSP27moksop_u:14702: tasmān mano'nusandhānaṃ bhāveṣu na karoti yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14704: yad ādāv eva nāstīdaṃ tad adyāpi na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14705: yad idaṃ bhāti tad brahma śāntam ekam aniṅganam //MU_3,114.49//
GSP27moksop_u:14708: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya yatnād paramayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:14712: mama putrā mama dhanam ahaṃ so 'yam idaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:14716: paramārthena tattvajña mamāham idam ity alam /
GSP27moksop_u:14717: ātmatattvād ṛte manye na kadācana kiñcana //MU_3,114.55//
GSP27moksop_u:14722: sādridyūrvīnadī seyaṃ yāvidyā jñasya rāma sā /
GSP27moksop_u:14723: nāvidyā tasya tad brahma sve mahimni vyavasthitam //MU_3,114.58//
GSP27moksop_u:14725: jñena tv ekaiva nirṇītā brahmadṛṣṭir akṛtrimā //MU_3,114.59//
GSP27moksop_u:14726: mā bhavājño bhava jñas tvaṃ jahi saṃsāravāsanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14727: anātmany ātmabhāvena kim anya iva rodiṣi //MU_3,114.60//
GSP27moksop_u:14728: kas tavāyaṃ jaḍo mūko deho bhavati rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:14744: saṃsāravāsanā ceto yadi nāma na pūrayet /
GSP27moksop_u:14748: anayā vedhitaṃ ceto bisatantāv api kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:14750: anayopahate citte rājya eva hi saṃsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14751: tās tā daśā jano yāti yā na yogyāś śvapākinaḥ //MU_3,114.72//
GSP27moksop_u:14756: vigatakautukasaṅgasamiddhayā yadi karoṣi sadaiva hi līlayā /
GSP27moksop_u:14757: varadhiyā jagati prakṛtikriyās tad asi kena mahān upamīyase //MU_3,114.75//
GSP27moksop_u:14768: aho nu citraṃ padmotthair baddhās tantubhir adrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14770: idaṃ tad vajratāṃ yātaṃ rūpam asmiñ jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:14771: avidyayāpi yan nāma sad evāsad iva sthitam //MU_3,115.5//
GSP27moksop_u:14774: anyac ca saṃśayo 'yaṃ me mahātman hṛdi vartate /
GSP27moksop_u:14775: lavaṇo 'sau mahābhāgaḥ kiṃ tām āpadam āptavān //MU_3,115.7//
GSP27moksop_u:14778: lavaṇasya tathā dattvā tām āpadam anuttamām /
GSP27moksop_u:14779: kiṃ gataś cañcalārambhaḥ kaś cāsāv aindrajālikaḥ //MU_3,115.9//
GSP27moksop_u:14785: ceto hi karmabhāg dehe nānākāraṃ śarīradhṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:14791: aprabuddham bhaved yāvan nidrāntaṃ tāvad eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:14792: sambhramaṃ paśyati svapne na prabuddhaḥ kadācana //MU_3,115.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14798: karmātmeti ca yaḥ proktas sa dehī duḥkhakovidaḥ //MU_3,115.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14799: jaḍo deho na duḥkhārho duḥkhī jīvo 'vicārataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14805: udeti rauti hanty atti yāti valgati nandati /
GSP27moksop_u:14806: mana eva śarīre 'smin na śarīraṃ kadācana //MU_3,115.22//
GSP27moksop_u:14807: yathā gṛhapatir gehe rathe vā sārathir yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:14808: yathā bhujaṅgo bhastrāyāṃ śarīre 'smiṃs tathā manaḥ //MU_3,115.23//
GSP27moksop_u:14810: sphuraty evaṃ mano dehe sthito deho na cetasi //MU_3,115.24//
GSP27moksop_u:14812: manaḥ kartṛ mano bhoktṛ mānasaṃ viddhi mānavam //MU_3,115.25//
GSP27moksop_u:14813: atra te śṛṇu vakṣyāmi vṛttāntam imam adbhutam /
GSP27moksop_u:14815: manaḥ karmaphalaṃ bhuṅkte śubhaṃ vāśubham eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:14820: ahaṃ tasya kule jātas taṃ yaje manasā makham //MU_3,115.29//
GSP27moksop_u:14821: iti sañcintya manasā kṛtvā sambhāram āditaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14823: ṛtvijaś cārcayām āsa pūjayām āsa sanmunīn /
GSP27moksop_u:14824: devatā vandayām āsa jvālayām āsa pāvakam //MU_3,115.31//
GSP27moksop_u:14829: evaṃ sa lavaṇo rājā rājasūyam avāptavān /
GSP27moksop_u:14830: manasaiva hi puṣṭena yuktas tasya phalena ca //MU_3,115.34//
GSP27moksop_u:14831: ataś cittaṃ naraṃ viddhi bhoktāraṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14832: tad anādāv anāyāse satye yojaya rāghava //MU_3,115.35//
GSP27moksop_u:14833: pūrṇe cetasi sampūrṇaḥ pumān naṣṭe vinaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:14834: deho 'ham iti yeṣāṃ tu niścayas tair alaṃ budhaiḥ //MU_3,115.36//
GSP27moksop_u:14835: pūrṇe vivekavati cetasi samprabuddhe duḥkhāny alaṃ vigalitāni viviktabuddheḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14836: bhāsvatkaraprakaṭite nanu padmaṣaṇḍe saṅkocajāḍyatimirāṇi ciraṃ kṛtāni //MU_3,115.37//
GSP27moksop_u:14843: yadā śāmbarikaḥ kāle samprāpto lāvaṇīṃ sabhām /
GSP27moksop_u:14844: tadāham avasaṃ tatra tat pratyakṣeṇa dṛṣṭavān //MU_3,116.2//
GSP27moksop_u:14845: ahaṃ sabhyais tatas tatra gate śambarakāriṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:14846: kim etad iti yatnena pṛṣṭaś ca lavaṇena ca //MU_3,116.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14847: cintayitvā mayā dṛṣṭvā tatra yat kathitaṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14848: śṛṇu tat te pravakṣyāmi rāma śāmbarikehitam //MU_3,116.4//
GSP27moksop_u:14849: rājasūyasya kartāro ye hi te dvādaśābdikam /
GSP27moksop_u:14851: ataś śakreṇa gaganād duḥkhāya lavaṇasya saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14855: tasmāt pratyakṣam evaitad rāma nātra sandeho 'sti /
GSP27moksop_u:14856: mano hi vilakṣaṇānāṃ kriyāṇāṃ kartṛ bhoktṛ ca /
GSP27moksop_u:14857: tad eva nighṛṣya saṃśodhya cittaratnam iha himakaṇam ivātapena vilīnatāṃ vivekena nītvā paraṃ śreyaḥ prāpsyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:14860: avidyācittajīvabuddhiśabdānāṃ bhedo nāsti vṛkṣataruśabdayor iveti jñātvā cittam eva vilīnaṃ kuru / (MU_3,116.8)
GSP27moksop_u:14861: abhyudite tu cittavimalārkabimbe sakalavikalpoddāmatimirahāriṇi na tad asti rāghava
GSP27moksop_u:14862: yan na dṛśyate yan nāsādyate yan nātmīkriyate yan na parityajyate yan na śrīyate
GSP27moksop_u:14865: bhāvarāśis tathā bodhe sarvo yāty ekapiṇḍatām /
GSP27moksop_u:14868: evaṃ manovṛttiparikṣaye sakalasukhaduḥkhānām antaḥ prāpyata iti bhagavatā proktam /
GSP27moksop_u:14869: tat kathaṃ mahātmann aticapalavṛttes svarūpasyāsya manasas sattā bhavati / (MU_3,116.11)
GSP27moksop_u:14872: jñātvā svaśvavāra iva duraśvaṃ manas saṃyamayiṣyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:14873: iha hi tāvad brahmaṇas sarvabhūtānāṃ trividhotpattir iti pūrvam uktam /
GSP27moksop_u:14876: brahmarūpiṇī saṅkalpamayī bhūtvā yad eva saṅkalpayati tad eva paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:14878: tatra jananamaraṇasukhaduḥkhamohādikaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ kalpayantī kalpān bahūn ārambhamantharaṃ sthitvā svayaṃ vilīyate himakaṇikevātapagatā / (MU_3,116.12)
GSP27moksop_u:14881: punar anyodeti saiva veti bhūyo bhūyo 'nusarantī saṃsāravṛttīs /
GSP27moksop_u:14883: ittham anantā brahmakoṭayo 'smin brahmāṇḍe 'nyeṣu ca samatītā bhaviṣyanti /
GSP27moksop_u:14884: santi cetarā anantā yāsāṃ saṅkhyā na vidyata eva / (MU_3,116.13)
GSP27moksop_u:14885: tatrāsyāṃ dṛṣṭau vartamānāyām īśvarād āgatya jīvo yathā jāyate yayā ca mucyate tac chṛṇu /
GSP27moksop_u:14886: brahmaṇo manaśśaktir utthitā purassthitām ākāśaśaktim avalambya tatrasthapavanānupātinī ghanasaṅkalpatvaṃ gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:14887: tataḥ punaḥprāptabhūtatanmātrapañcakatām etyāntaḥkaraṇanāmnī satī sūkṣmā prakṛtir bhūtvā gaganapavanasamparkāt prāleyarūpatām upetya śālyoṣadhiṣu viśati /
GSP27moksop_u:14891: tena tu puruṣeṇa jātamātreṇaiva bālyāt prabhṛti vidyāgrahaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:14893: tataḥ kramāt puṃsas taveva camatkṛtir jāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14895: tādṛgvivekavati saṅkalitābhimāne puṃsi sthite vimalasattvamayāgryajātau saptātmikāvatarati kramaśaś śivāya cetaḥprakāśanakarī nanu yogabhūmiḥ
GSP27moksop_u:14905: ete pratipadaṃ baddhamūle svaṃ phalataḥ phalam //MU_3,117.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14913: etasmād aparo moho na bhūto na bhaviṣyati //MU_3,117.7//
GSP27moksop_u:14914: arthād arthāntaraṃ citte yāte madhye hi yā sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14919: ajaḍā yat pratapati tat svarūpam iti smṛtam //MU_3,117.10//
GSP27moksop_u:14920: bījajāgrat tathā jāgran mahājāgrat tathaiva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:14922: iti saptavidho mohaḥ punar eṣa parasparam /
GSP27moksop_u:14923: śliṣṭo bhavaty anekākhyaṃ śṛṇu lakṣaṇam asya ca //MU_3,117.12//
GSP27moksop_u:14924: prathamaṃ cetanaṃ yat syād anākhyaṃ nirmalaṃ citaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14926: bījarūpaṃ sthitaṃ jāgrad bījajāgrat tad ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:14927: eṣā jñapter navāvasthā tvaṃ jāgratsaṃsthitiṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,117.14//
GSP27moksop_u:14928: evaṃ prasūtasya parād ayaṃ cāham idaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:14929: iti yaḥ pratyayas svacchas taj jāgrat prāgabhāvanā //MU_3,117.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14930: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti janmāntaroditaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14931: pīvaraḥ pratyayaḥ proktaṃ mahājāgrad iti sphurat //MU_3,117.16//
GSP27moksop_u:14933: yaj jāgrato manorājyaṃ jāgratsvapnas sa ucyate //MU_3,117.17//
GSP27moksop_u:14935: abhyāsaṃ prāpya jāgrattvaṃ tad anekavidhaṃ bhavet //MU_3,117.18//
GSP27moksop_u:14936: alpakālaṃ mayā dṛṣṭam etan no satyam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:14938: sa svapnaḥ kathitas tasya mahājāgrat sthitaṃ hṛdi /
GSP27moksop_u:14941: yat kṣate vākṣate dehe svapnajāgran mataṃ hi tat //MU_3,117.21//
GSP27moksop_u:14948: jāgratsvapnaś ciraṃ rūḍho jāgrattām eva gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:14951: tāsām apy antar anyāś ca santy evaṃ saṃsṛtir ghanā //MU_3,117.26//
GSP27moksop_u:14953: sthite tenāyam akhilas sthito mohaś śilāghanaḥ //MU_3,117.27//
GSP27moksop_u:14954: svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ loko mohān mohāntaraṃ vrajet /
GSP27moksop_u:14959: asyās samuttarasi cāruvicāraṇābhir dṛṣṭe prabodhavimale svayam ātmanīti //MU_3,117.30//
GSP27moksop_u:14964: na yayā jñātayā mohapaṅke bhūyo nimajjasi //MU_3,118.1//
GSP27moksop_u:14966: mama tv abhimatā nūnam imā eva śubhapradāḥ //MU_3,118.2//
GSP27moksop_u:14967: avabodhaṃ vidur jñānaṃ tad idaṃ sāptabhūmikam /
GSP27moksop_u:14968: muktis taj jñeyam ity uktā bhūmikā saptakāt param //MU_3,118.3//
GSP27moksop_u:14975: āsām ante sthitā muktis tasyāṃ bhūyo na śocate /
GSP27moksop_u:14976: etāsāṃ bhūmikānāṃ tvam idaṃ nirvacanaṃ śṛṇu //MU_3,118.7//
GSP27moksop_u:14977: sthitaḥ kiṃ mūḍha evāsmi prekṣe 'haṃ śāstrasajjanam /
GSP27moksop_u:14992: yat svabhāvaikaniṣṭhatvaṃ sā jñeyā turyagā gatiḥ //MU_3,118.15//
GSP27moksop_u:14995: ye hi nāma mahābhāgās saptamīṃ bhūmikām itāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:14996: ātmārāmā mahātmānas te mahat padam āgatāḥ //MU_3,118.17//
GSP27moksop_u:14998: prākṛtenāryakāryeṇa kiṃcit kurvanti vā na vā //MU_3,118.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15001: ātmārāmatayā tāṃs tās sukhayanti na kāścana /
GSP27moksop_u:15003: bhūmikāsaptakaṃ tv etad dhīmatām eva gocaram /
GSP27moksop_u:15006: sadehā vāpy adehā vā te muktā nātra saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,118.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15007: jñaptir hi granthivicchedas tasmin sati vimuktatā /
GSP27moksop_u:15009: ye tu mohād ghanāt tīrṇā na prāptāḥ pāvanaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:15017: vivekino narā loke caranta iti bhūmiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:15019: te hi dhīrās surājāno daśāsv āsu jayanti te /
GSP27moksop_u:15021: etāsu bhūmiṣu jayanti hi ye mahānto vandyās ta eva hi jitendriyaśātravās te /
GSP27moksop_u:15022: samrāḍ virāḍ api ca yatra tṛṇāyate tat sphāraṃ padaṃ jhagiti te samavāpnuvanti //MU_3,118.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15030: ahambhāvātmaka iti yathāvad brūhi me prabho //MU_3,119.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15033: ahantvam ūrmikātvaṃ ca satī tu na kadācana //MU_3,119.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15034: hema dehy ūrmikātvaṃ tvaṃ gṛhāṇety udite yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:15035: tad dīyate sormikeṇa tat tad asti na saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,119.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15037: evaṃ cet tat prabho 'tra syād ūrmikātvaṃ tu kīdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:15040: rūpaṃ rāghava nīrūpam asataś cen nirūpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:15043: rūpaṃ tad etad evāsyāḥ prekṣitā yan na dṛśyate //MU_3,119.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15045: etāvad eva rūpaṃ yat prekṣyamāṇaṃ na lakṣyate //MU_3,119.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15046: yaś śuktau rajatākāraṃ prekṣate rajatasya saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15047: na samprāpnoty aṇum api kaṇaṃ kṣīṇam api kvacit //MU_3,119.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15050: yan nāsti tasya nāstitvaṃ prekṣyamāṇaṃ prakāśate /
GSP27moksop_u:15052: asad eva ca tat kāryakaraṃ bhavati ca sthiram /
GSP27moksop_u:15056: nehāsti satyaṃ no mithyā yad yathā pratibhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:15058: sad vā bhavatv asad vāpi sudṛḍhaṃ hṛdaye tu yat /
GSP27moksop_u:15060: paramaiva hi sāvidyā māyaiṣā saṃsṛtir hy asau /
GSP27moksop_u:15062: hemny asti normikāditvam ahantādy asti nātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:15063: ahantvābhāvatas tv evaṃ svacche śānte same pare //MU_3,119.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15064: na sanātanatā kācin na ca kācid viriñcatā /
GSP27moksop_u:15065: na ca brahmāṇḍatā kācin na ca kācit surāditā //MU_3,119.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15066: na lokāntaratā kācin na ca sargāditā kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:15067: na merutā nāmbaratā na manastā na dehatā //MU_3,119.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15068: na mahābhūtatā kācin na ca kāraṇatā kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:15072: sarvaṃ śāntaṃ nirālambhaṃ jñam acchaṃ śāśvataṃ śivam /
GSP27moksop_u:15074: na san nāsan na madhyāntaṃ na sarvaṃ sarvam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15078: tathāpi bhūyaḥ kathaya sargaḥ kim avalokyate //MU_3,119.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15080: pare śāntaṃ paraṃ nāma sthitam ittham idantayā /
GSP27moksop_u:15081: neha sargo na sargākhyā kācanāsti kadācana //MU_3,119.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15083: jalaṃ dravatvāt spandīva nisspandaṃ paramaṃ padam //MU_3,119.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15084: bhāsvātmanīva kacati na kacac caiva tat padam /
GSP27moksop_u:15085: bhāsate kacanaṃ bhāsāṃ paraṃ tv akacanaṃ viduḥ //MU_3,119.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15086: adha ūrdhvaṃ varjayitvā yathābdher udare payaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15087: sphuraty evaṃ pare cittvād idaṃ nāneva tatparam //MU_3,119.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15088: īṣadvidan svayaṃ cittvād anyatām iva paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:15089: budhyate sarga ity eva śamāc chāmyati śāśvatam //MU_3,119.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15090: sargas tu paramārthasya sañjñety eva viniścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15091: na nāsti nāyam asty antar ambarasya yathāmbaram //MU_3,119.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15097: asaṃvedanam āśāntaṃ paraṃ viddhi na taj jaḍam //MU_3,119.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15102: yad ayaṃ lakṣyate sargas tad brahma brahmaṇi sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:15103: nabho nabhasi viśrāntaṃ śāntaṃ śānte śivaṃ śive //MU_3,119.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15105: yathā dūram adūraṃ ca tatheśe tadatatkramaḥ //MU_3,119.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15106: asad abhyutthitaṃ viśvaṃ sad apy abhyuditaṃ sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:15111: tathā saṃvidi saṃsāras sāro 'sāraś ca bhāsate //MU_3,119.40//
GSP27moksop_u:15112: yāvad vicāradahanena samūladāhaṃ dagdhā na jarjaralateva balād avidyā /
GSP27moksop_u:15113: śākhāpratānagahanā gahanāni tāvan nānāvidhāni sukhaduḥkhavanāni sūte //MU_3,119.41//
GSP27moksop_u:15118: tvam ahantvam avidyāyāś śṛṇu rāghava kīdṛśam //MU_3,120.1//
GSP27moksop_u:15119: lavaṇo 'sau mahīpālas tadā dṛṣṭvā tathā bhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:15120: dvitīye divase gantuṃ pravṛttas tāṃ mahāṭavīm //MU_3,120.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15121: yat tad dṛṣṭaṃ mayā duḥkham araṇyānīṃ smarāmi tām /
GSP27moksop_u:15122: cittādarśagatā cittvāt kadācil labhyate ca sā //MU_3,120.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15123: iti niścitya sacivais sa yayau dakṣiṇāpatham /
GSP27moksop_u:15127: athaikasmin pradeśe tāṃ bhittāv iva purogatām /
GSP27moksop_u:15129: sarvatra viharaṃs tāṃs tān vṛttāntān sakalān api /
GSP27moksop_u:15130: dṛṣṭavān dṛṣṭavāṃś caiva jñātavāṃś ca visismaye //MU_3,120.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15131: tān parijñātavāṃś cāsīd vyādhān pukkasajān puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15134: tam eva grāmakaṃ yasmin so 'bhavat puṣṭapukkasaḥ //MU_3,120.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15135: tatrāpaśyaj janāṃs tāṃs tāṃs striyas tās tāḥ kuṭīrikāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15136: tān ārāmāñ jalādhārāṃs tāṃs tāṃś ca vasudhātaṭān //MU_3,120.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15137: taṃ cākāṇḍaparibhraṃśaṃ tān vṛkṣāṃs tān vṛtivrajān /
GSP27moksop_u:15139: anyāsu vṛddhāsu sabāṣpanetrāsv ārtyābhiyuktāsu ca varṇayantī /
GSP27moksop_u:15144: kṛtteśunā carmaṇi jīrṇadehāt kathaṃ kva muktā bhavatāsavas te //MU_3,120.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15146: smarāmi guñjāphaladāmahetoḥ puras svavadhvā rasahāsinas te //MU_3,120.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15148: paśyāmi putrasya kadā nu bhūyo bhayaṅkarāṇy āplutivalgitāni //MU_3,120.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15149: na tāni tāmbūlavilāsinīnāṃ mukheṣu śobhalalitāni santi /
GSP27moksop_u:15151: sutāpi nītā saha tena bhartrā yamena yāsyā yamunā samānā /
GSP27moksop_u:15155: hā rājaputrendusamāna kānta santyajya śuddhāntavilāsinīs tāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15156: ratiṃ prayāto 'si mamātmajāyāṃ na sāpi te susthiratām upetā //MU_3,120.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15158: kiṃ nāma tucchaṃ na kṛtaṃ nṛpo 'sau yad yojitaḥ pukkasakanyakāyām //MU_3,120.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15160: ubhau gatāv ekapadena nāśam āśā sahārthena yathā ca hema //MU_3,120.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15164: śokasya vegād anivāryavṛtter nāryas sadaikāyatanaṃ vināthāḥ //MU_3,120.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15166: yat prāṇanaṃ tan maraṇaṃ mahāpad yā syān mṛtir jīvitam uttamaṃ tat //MU_3,120.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15167: janair vihīnasya videśavṛtter duḥkhāny anantāni samullasanti /
GSP27moksop_u:15169: evaṃ lapantīṃ svakalatravṛddhāṃ dāsibhir āśvāsya nṛpas striyaṃ tām /
GSP27moksop_u:15170: papraccha kiṃ vṛttam ihāsi kā ca kā te sutā kaś ca patis taveti //MU_3,120.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15171: uvāca sodbāṣpavilocanātha grāmas tv ayaṃ pukkasaghoṣanāmā /
GSP27moksop_u:15172: ihābhavat pukkasakaḥ patir me babhūva tasyendusamā sutaikā //MU_3,120.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15173: sā daivayogāt patim indutulyam ihāgataṃ daivavaśena bhūpam /
GSP27moksop_u:15174: śūnye viśīrṇaṃ madhukumbham āpa vane varākī karabhī yathaikā //MU_3,120.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15175: sā tena sārdhaṃ suciraṃ sukhāni bhuktvā prasūtā tanayāṃ sutāṃś ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15180: kenacit tv atha kālena grāmake 'smiñ janeśvara /
GSP27moksop_u:15182: mahatānena duḥkhena sarve te grāmakāj janāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15183: vinirgatya gatā dūraṃ tatra pañcatvam āgatāḥ //MU_3,121.2//
GSP27moksop_u:15184: tenemā duḥkhabhāginyaś śūnyā vayam iha prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:15188: bhūyo vicārayām āsa tad āścaryam anuttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:15189: bhūyo bhūyaś ca papraccha babhūvāścaryavān ati //MU_3,121.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15192: sthitvā tatra ciraṃ kālaṃ vimṛśya niyater gatīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15193: ājagāma puraṃ paurair vanditaḥ praviveśa ca //MU_3,121.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15194: prātas tatra sabhāsthāne mām apṛcchad asau nṛpaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15195: katham eṣa mune svapnaḥ pratyakṣa iti vismitaḥ //MU_3,121.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15196: yathāvastu mayā tasya tattadyuktyā sa tādṛśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15199: asat sattāṃ nayaty āśu sac cāsattāṃ nayaty alam //MU_3,121.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15201: katham evaṃ vada brahman svapnas satyatvam āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15202: bhramabhāra ivaiṣo 'rtho na me lagati cetasi //MU_3,121.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15204: sarvam etad avidyāyāṃ sambhavaty eva rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:15207: ciraṃ śīghratvam āyāti yūnas seṣṭeva yāminī //MU_3,121.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15209: asac ca sad ivodeti svapneṣv iva nabhogatiḥ //MU_3,121.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15212: vāsanāvalitaṃ ceto yad yathā bhāvayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:15213: tat tathānubhavaty āśu na sad asti na cāpy asat //MU_3,121.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15217: kṣaṇaḥ kalpatvam āyāti kalpaś ca bhavati kṣaṇaḥ //MU_3,121.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15218: viparyastamatir jantuḥ kām avasthāṃ na vāpatet /
GSP27moksop_u:15224: vṛttaṃ prāk pakkaṇe rājñaḥ kasyacil lavaṇasya yat /
GSP27moksop_u:15225: pratibhātaṃ tad etasya sad vāsad vā manogatam //MU_3,121.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15226: vismaraty api vistīrṇāṃ kriyāṃ cetaḥkṛtāṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:15227: tathā kṛtām apy akṛtām iti smarati niścitam //MU_3,121.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15228: tathāpy abhuktavān asmi bhuktavān iti vetti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:15232: atha vā lavaṇenāśu dṛṣṭo yas svapnavibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15235: yathā bahūnāṃ sadṛśaṃ vacanaṃ nāma cānanam //MU_3,121.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15236: tathā svapno 'pi bhavati kālo deśaḥ kriyāpi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15241: tasyās sattvam asattvaṃ ca na san nāsad iti sthitam //MU_3,121.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15242: sat sad eva hi saṃvitter asaṃvitter na sanmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:15243: nāvidyā vidyate kiñcit tailādi sikatāsv iva //MU_3,121.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15244: hemnaḥ kiṃ kaṭukatvaṃ tad anyat syād dhematāṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:15246: sambandhas sadṛśānāṃ yas sa sphuṭas so 'nubhūtidaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15247: jatukāṣṭhādisambandho yas sa no samayor ataḥ //MU_3,121.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15252: bhāvās tadā vibhānty ete mithas svānubhavasthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:15255: sadṛśe sadṛśaṃ vastu kṣaṇād gatvaikatām alam //MU_3,121.37//
GSP27moksop_u:15256: rūpam āsphārayaty ekam ekatvād eva nānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:15258: jaḍaṃ jaḍena militaṃ jaḍaṃ sampadyate ghanam /
GSP27moksop_u:15259: na ca cijjaḍayor aikyaṃ vailakṣaṇyāt kvacid bhavet //MU_3,121.39//
GSP27moksop_u:15260: cijjaḍau cet sta ekatra na tau sammilataḥ kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:15262: dārupāṣāṇabhedānāṃ na tu hy ete cidātmakāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15264: jihvayeva rasas sā ca sajātīyodayā calā /
GSP27moksop_u:15265: aikyaṃ ca viddhi sambandhaṃ nāsty asārasasārayoḥ //MU_3,121.42//
GSP27moksop_u:15271: sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyam anantam iva yat tatam //MU_3,121.45//
GSP27moksop_u:15272: viśvaṃ sanmātram evaitad viddhi tattvavidāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:15274: pūritaś ciccamatkāro na ca kiñcana pūritam /
GSP27moksop_u:15275: saṅkalpanagarā nṝṇāṃ mithaḥ paśyati no yathā //MU_3,121.47//
GSP27moksop_u:15276: na deśakālabodhāya tathā sargāś citi sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15282: bodhaikatvād ayaṃ sargas sattaivāsad bhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:15283: senā mṛtsaṃvidā citrā mṛṇmātram iva mṛṇmayī //MU_3,121.51//
GSP27moksop_u:15284: jalam ekaṃ taraṅgādi dārv ekaṃ sālabhañjikāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15286: sambandhe draṣṭṛdṛśyānāṃ madhye draṣṭur hi yad vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15288: deśād deśaṃ gate citte madhye yaś cetaso vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15291: acetanaṃ cājaḍaṃ ca tanmayo bhava sarvadā //MU_3,121.55//
GSP27moksop_u:15292: jaḍatāṃ varjayitvaikāṃ śilāyā hṛdayaṃ hi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:15293: akṣubdho vāthavā kṣubdhas tanmayo bhava rāghava //MU_3,121.56//
GSP27moksop_u:15295: akṣubdho vāthavā kṣubdhas svasthas tiṣṭha yathāsukham //MU_3,121.57//
GSP27moksop_u:15296: nābhivāñchati na dveṣṭi dehe kiñcit kvacit pumān /
GSP27moksop_u:15299: cittavṛttiṣu mā tiṣṭha tathā tathyātmatāṃ gataḥ //MU_3,121.59//
GSP27moksop_u:15301: tathaiva paśya cittaṃ tvam acittaiva yathātmatā //MU_3,121.60//
GSP27moksop_u:15302: yathā dṛṣadi nāsty ambu yathāmbhasy analas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:15303: svātmany evāsti no cittaṃ paramātmani tat kutaḥ //MU_3,121.61//
GSP27moksop_u:15304: prekṣyamāṇaṃ na yat kiñcit tena yat kriyate kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:15305: kṛtaṃ bhavati tan neti matvā cittātigo bhava //MU_3,121.62//
GSP27moksop_u:15309: svastham āssva nirāśaṅkaṃ paṅkeneva kṛto jaḍaḥ //MU_3,121.64//
GSP27moksop_u:15310: cittaṃ nāsty eva me bhūtaṃ mṛtam evādya veti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15312: prekṣāyām asti no cittaṃ tadvihīno 'si tattvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15316: cittaṃ dūre parityajya yo 'si so 'si sthiro bhava /
GSP27moksop_u:15321: suciram api vicāritaṃ na labdhamalam alam ātmani mānasātma kiñcit //MU_3,121.70//
GSP27moksop_u:15325: prathamaṃ jātamātreṇaiva puṃsā kiñcidvikacitabuddhinaiva satsaṅgamapareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP27moksop_u:15326: anavaratapravāhāpatito 'yam avidyānadīnivahaś śamaśāstrasajjanasamparkād ṛte tarituṃ na śakyate /
GSP27moksop_u:15329: tato vivekavaśato vicāraṇayā samyagjñānenāsamyagvāsanāṃ tyajatas saṃsāravāsanāto manas tanutām eti /
GSP27moksop_u:15330: tena tanumānasīṃ nāma vivekabhūmim avatīrṇo bhavati /
GSP27moksop_u:15332: tadvaśād vāsanā tanutāṃ gatā yadā tadaivāsāv asakta ity ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:15334: atha tāvad asāv asattve bhāvanātānavam abhyasyati /
GSP27moksop_u:15335: yāvat kurvann api vyavaharann api asatyeṣu saṃsāravastuṣu sthito 'pi /
GSP27moksop_u:15336: svātmany eva kṣīṇamanastvād abhyāsavaśād bāhyaṃ vastu kurvann api na karoti paśyann api na paśyati nālambate tam eva /
GSP27moksop_u:15338: tanuvāsanatvāc ca kevalam ardhasuptaprabuddha iva kartavyaṃ karoti na tu bhāvitamanaskaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15339: tena yogabhūmim abhāvanīm adhirūḍha ity antarlīnacittaḥ katicit saṃvatsarān abhyasya sarvathaiva kurvann api bāhyapadārthabhāvanāṃ tyajati /
GSP27moksop_u:15345: manye te sarvakāryebhyo vāsanās tanutāṃ gatāḥ //MU_3,122.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15347: mā gāś śokaṃ ca harṣaṃ ca tvam ātmā vigatāmayaḥ //MU_3,122.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15348: tvayy ātmani sthite svacche sarvage satatodite /
GSP27moksop_u:15350: abandhur api kasmāt tvaṃ bandhuduḥkhāni śocasi /
GSP27moksop_u:15351: advitīye sthite hy asmin bāndhavāḥ ka ivātmani //MU_3,122.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15356: ghaṭe kapālatāṃ yāte ghaṭākāśo na naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:15357: yathā tathā śarīre 'smin naṣṭe tvaṃ na vinaśyasi //MU_3,122.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15359: vinaśyati tathā dehe naṣṭe nātmā vinaśyati //MU_3,122.11//
GSP27moksop_u:15360: vāñchaivodeti te kasmād bhrāntir antar nirarthikā /
GSP27moksop_u:15361: advitīyo dvitīyaṃ tat kiṃ vastv ātmābhivāñchatu //MU_3,122.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15362: śravyaṃ spṛśyaṃ tathā dṛśyaṃ ramyaṃ ghreyaṃ ca rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:15363: na kiñcid asti jagati vyatiriktaṃ yad ātmanaḥ //MU_3,122.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15364: sarvaśaktāv imās tasminn ātmany evākhilās sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15365: śaktayo vitate vyakte ākāśa iva śūnyatāḥ //MU_3,122.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15371: rajjus tāṃ vāsanām etāṃ chinddhi rāghava yatnataḥ //MU_3,122.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15374: āgatā brahmaṇo bhuktvā saṃsāram iha līlayā /
GSP27moksop_u:15375: punar brahmaiva saṃsmṛtya brahmaṇy eva vilīyate //MU_3,122.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15378: rekhāvṛndaṃ yathā parṇe vīcijālaṃ yathā jale /
GSP27moksop_u:15381: tasminn eva sthitaṃ tajjaṃ tasmād eva tad eva ca //MU_3,122.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15382: sa eṣa sarvabhūtānām ātmā brahmeti kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:15383: tasmiñ jñāte jagaj jñātam ajñāte 'jñātam eva tat //MU_3,122.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15387: yaiṣā śuddhānubhūtir hi so 'yam ātmā cidavyayaḥ //MU_3,122.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15389: svābhoga eva hi jagat pṛthagvat pratibimbati //MU_3,122.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15391: yānty athāvyatirekeṇa buddhās tasmiṃs tadaiva te //MU_3,122.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15395: kiṃ mūrkha iva durbuddhe vikalpair abhibhūyase //MU_3,122.29//
GSP27moksop_u:15397: asamyagdarśino 'py asti na nāśaḥ kim u sanmateḥ //MU_3,122.30//
GSP27moksop_u:15399: cittvaṃ rāma sa vijñeyaḥ puruṣo na śarīrakam //MU_3,122.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15400: śarīre saty asati vā pumān eṣa jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:15401: jño 'py ajño 'pi sthito rāma naṣṭe dehe na naśyati //MU_3,122.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15404: manomargād atītatvād yāsau śūnyam iva sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:15405: cit kathaṃ nāma sā duḥkhais sukhair vā parigṛhyate //MU_3,122.34//
GSP27moksop_u:15406: saṃvidātmā tad asmāt tu viśiṣṭād dehapañjarāt /
GSP27moksop_u:15407: abhyastāṃ vāsanāṃ yāti ṣaṭpadaḥ kham ivāmbujāt //MU_3,122.35//
GSP27moksop_u:15408: asac ced ātmatattvaṃ tad asmiṃs te dehapañjare /
GSP27moksop_u:15409: naṣṭe kiṃ nāma naṣṭaṃ syād rāma yenānuśocasi //MU_3,122.36//
GSP27moksop_u:15410: satyaṃ bhāvaya tena tvaṃ mā moham anubhāvaya /
GSP27moksop_u:15413: svayaṃ jaganti dṛśyante sanmaṇāv iva raśmayaḥ //MU_3,122.38//
GSP27moksop_u:15421: ākāśam eṣā sampannā bhavatām api cetasi //MU_3,122.42//
GSP27moksop_u:15423: cittattvasya svabhāvāt tu tatheyaṃ jāgatī kriyā //MU_3,122.43//
GSP27moksop_u:15424: pūrvaṃ manas samuditaṃ paramātmatattvāt tenātataṃ jagad idaṃ svavikalpajālam /
GSP27moksop_u:15425: śūnyena śūnyam amalena yathāmbareṇa nīlatvam ullasati cārulatābhirāmam //MU_3,122.44//
GSP27moksop_u:15426: saṅkalpasaṅkṣayavaśād galite tu citte saṃsāramohamihikā galitā bhavanti /
GSP27moksop_u:15427: svacchaṃ vibhāti śaradīva kham āśritāyāṃ cinmātram ekam ajam ādyam anantam antaḥ //MU_3,122.45//
GSP27moksop_u:15428: karmātmakaṃ prathamam eva mano 'bhyudeti saṅkalpataḥ kamalajaprakṛtiṃ tad etya /
GSP27moksop_u:15429: nānāvidhaṃ jagad anantam idaṃ tanoti vetāladehakalanām iva mugdhabālaḥ //MU_3,122.46//
GSP27moksop_u:15430: asanmayaṃ sad iva puropalakṣyate punar bhavaty atha parilīyate punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15431: svayaṃ manaś citi vitataṃ sphuradvapur mahārṇave jalavalayāvalī yathā //MU_3,122.47//
GSP27moksop_u:15435: evaṃ tāvad idaṃ viddhi dṛśyaṃ jagad iti sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:15436: ahaṃ cetyādy anākāraṃ bhrāntimātram asanmayam //MU_3,123.1 (= MT_4,1.2)//
GSP27moksop_u:15437: akartṛkam anaṅgaṃ ca gagane citram utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:15441: sadrūpam api niśśūnyaṃ tejas sauram ivāmbare /
GSP27moksop_u:15444: kathārthapratibhānātma na kvacit sthitam asti ca //MU_3,123.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15459: vār budbuda ivābhogi śūnyam antas sphuradvapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15461: nīhāra iva vistāri gṛhītaṃ san na kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:15467: pare bhūya udety etat tata eveti kiṃ vada //MU_3,123.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15468: evambodhāḥ kim ajñās syur uta tajjñā iti sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:15471: idaṃ bīje 'ṅkura iva dṛśyam āste mahākṣaye /
GSP27moksop_u:15472: brūte yaḥ param ajñatvam etat tasyātiśaiśavāt //MU_3,123.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15473: sparśe kiṃ tad asambaddhaṃ katham etad avāstavam /
GSP27moksop_u:15474: viparīto bodha eṣa vaktuś śrotuś ca maurkhyakṛt //MU_3,123.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15475: bījakāle 'ṅkura iva jagad āsta itīha yā /
GSP27moksop_u:15476: buddhis sāsatpralāpārthā mūḍhā śṛṇu kathaṃ kila //MU_3,123.20//
GSP27moksop_u:15480: bījaṃ tad bhavituṃ śaktaṃ svayambhūr jagataḥ katham //MU_3,123.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15483: sat sūkṣmam asadābhāsam asad eva hy ataddṛśām /
GSP27moksop_u:15485: gaganāṅgād api svacche śūnye tatra pare pade /
GSP27moksop_u:15487: nakiñcid yat kathaṃ kiñcit tatrāste vastv avastuni /
GSP27moksop_u:15488: asti cet tat kathaṃ tatra vidyamānaṃ na dṛśyate //MU_3,123.26//
GSP27moksop_u:15489: nakiñcidātmanaḥ kiñcit katham eti kuto 'tha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:15490: śūnyarūpād ghaṭākāśāj jāto 'driḥ kva kutaḥ kadā //MU_3,123.27//
GSP27moksop_u:15491: pratipakṣe kathaṃ kiñcid āste chāyātape yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:15492: katham āste tamo bhānau katham āste hime 'nalaḥ //MU_3,123.28//
GSP27moksop_u:15493: merur āste katham aṇau kutaḥ kiñcid anākṛtau /
GSP27moksop_u:15497: deśāntare yac ca narāntare ca buddhyādisarvendriyaśaktyadṛśyam /
GSP27moksop_u:15498: nāsty eva tattadvidhabuddhibodhe nakiñcid ity eva tad ucyate ca //MU_3,123.31//
GSP27moksop_u:15499: kāryasya tat kāraṇatāṃ prayātaṃ vaktīti yas tasya vimūḍhabodhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15500: kair nāma tatkāryam udeti tasmāt svaiḥ kāraṇaughais sahakārirūpaiḥ //MU_3,123.32//
GSP27moksop_u:15502: yad eva tat satyam anādimadhyaṃ jagat tad eva sthitam ity avehi //MU_3,123.33//
GSP27moksop_u:15508: jagadādyaṅkuras tatra yady asti tad asau tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:15511: vandhyākanyā ca dṛṣṭeha na kadācana kenacit //MU_3,124.3//
GSP27moksop_u:15513: mūlakāraṇam evātmā tat svabhāve sthitaṃ tathā //MU_3,124.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15516: atha pṛthvyādayo 'nye vā kuto 'py āgatya kurvate /
GSP27moksop_u:15518: tasmāt pare jagac chāntam āste tat sahakāraṇaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15519: vinā prasaratīty uktir bālasya na vipaścitaḥ //MU_3,124.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15520: tasmād rāma jagan nāsīn na cāsti na bhaviṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:15523: tadā brahmedam akhilam iti sad rāma nānyathā //MU_3,124.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15525: aśāntam eva tac citte na śāmyaty eva tad yataḥ //MU_3,124.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15530: idam arkādi pṛthvyādi tathedaṃ vatsarādi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15531: ayaṃ kalpaḥ kṣaṇaś cāyam ime maraṇajanmanī //MU_3,124.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15533: ayaṃ sa sargaprārambho bhāvābhāvakramas tv asau //MU_3,124.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15536: ete ceme pariṇatā ime bhūya upāgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15539: yathā pūrvaṃ sthitaṃ śāntam ity evaṃ kacati svayam //MU_3,124.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15542: svayam antaś camatkāro yas samudgīryate citā /
GSP27moksop_u:15543: tat sargabhānaṃ bhātīdaṃ bhārūpaṃ na ca bhittimat //MU_3,124.19//
GSP27moksop_u:15544: nodyanti na ca naśyanti nāyānti na ca yānti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15546: ime sargāḥ prasphuranti svatas svātmani nirmale /
GSP27moksop_u:15549: āvartā iva vāmbhodher guṇino vāthavā guṇāḥ //MU_3,124.22//
GSP27moksop_u:15560: smṛtyātmā jāyate sarge smṛtyātmaiva tato jagat //MU_3,125.1 (= MT_4,3.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:15564: tatsaṅkalpātma ca jagat smṛtyātmaivam idaṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15566: iti sthite 'pi sā rāma tasya pūrvaprajāpateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15567: sthitir na sambhavaty eva nabhasīva mahādrumaḥ //MU_3,125.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15569: na sambhavati kiṃ brahman sargādau prāktanī smṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15573: kila nirvāṇam āyātās te 'vaśyaṃ brahmatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_3,125.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15574: prāktanyāḥ kas smṛtes smartā tasmāt kathaya suvrata /
GSP27moksop_u:15575: smṛtir nirmūlatāṃ yātā smartur muktatayā yataḥ //MU_3,125.7//
GSP27moksop_u:15576: atas smartur abhāve sā smṛtiḥ kodetu kiṃ katham /
GSP27moksop_u:15578: nānubhūte 'nubhūte ca svataś cidvyomni yā smṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15579: sā jagacchrīr iti prauḍhā dṛśyābhāve hi citprabhā //MU_3,125.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15581: yat tad etaj jagad iti svayambhūr iti ca sthitam //MU_3,125.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15586: paramāṇuṃ prati tatas tasyāntas tādṛg eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15588: tatrāpi tādṛgākāram evaṃ praty aṇum ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:15589: dṛśyam ābhāti bhārūpam etad aṅga na vāstavam //MU_3,125.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15590: ity asty anto na saddṛṣṭer asaddṛṣṭeś ca vā kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:15591: asyās tv abhyuditaṃ buddham abuddhaṃ prati vānagha //MU_3,125.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15592: buddhaṃ pratīdaṃ brahmaiva kevalaṃ śāntam avyayam /
GSP27moksop_u:15595: tathā koṭisahasrāṇi bhānty anyāny apy aṇāv aṇau //MU_3,125.17//
GSP27moksop_u:15596: yathā stambhe putrikāntas tasyāś cāṅgeṣu putrikā /
GSP27moksop_u:15597: tasyāś ca putrikāsty aṅge tathā trailokyaputrikā //MU_3,125.18//
GSP27moksop_u:15598: na bhinnā na ca saṅkhyeyā yathādrau paramāṇavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15602: yathāṇavo vahanty arkadīptiṣv apsu rajassu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15606: sargas tu sargaśabdārthatayā buddho nayaty adhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15607: sa brahmaśabdārthatayā buddhaś śreyo bhavaty alam //MU_3,125.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15608: vijñānātmā śāsitā viśvabījaṃ brahmaivādyaṃ svaṃ cidākāśamātram /
GSP27moksop_u:15609: tasmāj jātaṃ yat tad eveti vedyaṃ budhyasvāntar bodhasambodhamātram //MU_3,125.24//
GSP27moksop_u:15614: tīryate netareṇeha kenacin nāma karmaṇā //MU_3,126.1 (= MT_4,4.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:15617: etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ svarūpaṃ rūpiṇāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:15620: tasmiṃś chinne jagacchākhaś chinnaḥ karmatarur bhavet //MU_3,126.4//
GSP27moksop_u:15621: manas sarvam idaṃ rāma tasminn antaś cikitsite /
GSP27moksop_u:15623: tad etaj jāyate loke mano malalavākulam /
GSP27moksop_u:15624: manaso vyatirekeṇa dehaḥ kva kila dṛśyate //MU_3,126.6//
GSP27moksop_u:15629: mano moham upādatte mriyate jāyate manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15630: kasyacit tu prasādena badhyate mucyate punaḥ //MU_3,126.9//
GSP27moksop_u:15632: śūnya evāmbare sphāre gandharvāṇāṃ puraṃ yathā //MU_3,126.10//
GSP27moksop_u:15633: manasīdaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ sphāraṃ sphurati cāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:15635: yathā tilakaṇe tailaṃ guṇo guṇini vā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:15636: yathā dharmiṇi vā dharmas tathedaṃ manasi sthitam //MU_3,126.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15638: mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā tāpe saṃsāraś cittake tathā //MU_3,126.13//
GSP27moksop_u:15639: raśmijālaṃ yathā sūrye yathālokaś ca tejasi /
GSP27moksop_u:15640: yathauṣṇyaṃ citrabhānau vā manasīdaṃ tathā jagat //MU_3,126.14//
GSP27moksop_u:15641: śaityaṃ yathaiva tuhine yathā nabhasi śūnyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:15642: yathā cañcalatā vāyau manasīdaṃ tathā jagat //MU_3,126.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15643: mano jagaj jagad akhilaṃ tathā manaḥ parasparaṃ tv avirahitaṃ sadaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:15644: tayor dvayor manasi nirantaraṃ kṣate kṣataṃ jagan na tu jagati kṣate manaḥ //MU_3,126.16//
GSP27moksop_u:15649: ayaṃ manasi saṃsāras sphāraḥ katham iva sthitaḥ //MU_3,127.1 (= MT_4,5.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:15650: yathāyaṃ manasi sphāra ārambhas sphurati sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:15658: bhogeśvaratvaṃ ca yathā tathedaṃ manasi sthitam //MU_3,127.5//
GSP27moksop_u:15663: śṛṇu rāma purā vṛttaṃ saṃvādaṃ bhṛgukālayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15666: atapyata tapo ghoraṃ kasmiṃścid bhagavān bhṛguḥ //MU_3,127.8//
GSP27moksop_u:15667: tam upāste sma tejasvī bālaḥ putro mahāmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15669: bhṛgur varavane tasmin samādhāv eva saṃsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15674: triśaṅkur iva rodo'ntar avartata tadā kila //MU_3,127.12//
GSP27moksop_u:15685: manasijeṣuśatāhatam āśaye sa parirudhya manas tadanūśanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15691: ārabdhavān manorājyam idam ekaḥ kilośanāḥ //MU_3,128.1 (= MT_4,6.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:15719: latāṅganāgaṇair vyāptam idaṃ tan nandanaṃ vanam //MU_3,128.15//
GSP27moksop_u:15728: iha tāvad imaṃ śakram aham āsanasaṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:15731: tenābhivāditas tatra dvitīya iva vai bhṛguḥ //MU_3,128.21//
GSP27moksop_u:15732: atha sādaram utthāya śukraś śakreṇa pūjitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:15735: uṣyatāṃ ciram eveha śakra ittham uvāca tam //MU_3,128.23//
GSP27moksop_u:15739: cirataram atulām avāpa tuṣṭiṃ naramatim ujjhitavān alaṃ babhūva //MU_3,128.25//
GSP27moksop_u:15743: iti śukraḥ puraṃ prāpya vaibudhaṃ svena cetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:15744: visasmāra nijaṃ bhāvaṃ prāktanaṃ vyasanaṃ vinā //MU_3,129.1 (= MT_4,7.1)//
GSP27moksop_u:15745: muhūrtam atha viśramya tasya pārśve śacīpateḥ /
