GSP27moksop_u:21741: matir me karuṇākrāntā rāma mugdheva tapyate //MU_5,14.14//
GSP27moksop_u:21742: kaḥ kilātra kutaḥ khedo yan mūrkhaḥ paritapyate /
GSP27moksop_u:21743: duḥkhāyaiva hi jāyante karabhāḥ prākṛtās tathā //MU_5,14.15//
GSP27moksop_u:21750: diśaṃ prati girīndreṣu pulindaughā vane vane /
GSP27moksop_u:21757: tāṃ kośakāraḥ kṣudhito daṃśas tam api cañcalaḥ //MU_5,14.22//
GSP27moksop_u:21758: taṃ daṃśaṃ darduro bhuṅkte vyālas tam api darduram /
GSP27moksop_u:21759: sarpam ugrakharo hanti babhruś cainaṃ nikṛntati //MU_5,14.23//
GSP27moksop_u:21760: babhruṃ hinasti mārjāro mārjāraṃ śvā nikṛntati /
GSP27moksop_u:21761: ṛkṣaḥ kauleyakaṃ hanti ṛkṣaṃ vyāghro nikṛntati //MU_5,14.24//
GSP27moksop_u:21762: siṃho 'bhibhavati vyāghraṃ śarabhas siṃham atti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:21764: meghā vātair vidhūyante vāyavo giribhir jitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21766: viṣṇunā dhriyate śakro viṣṇur gacchati jantutām /
GSP27moksop_u:21771: parasparam alaṃ mohād bhakṣyate rakṣyate 'pi ca //MU_5,14.29//
GSP27moksop_u:21773: anārataṃ ca jāyante vicitrāḥ kakubhaṃ prati //MU_5,14.30//
GSP27moksop_u:21782: evam anyeṣv asaṅkhyeṣu janmasv apacayeṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:21785: saṃsārasambhrame yuktā na tuṣṭir na ca duḥkhitā //MU_5,14.36//
GSP27moksop_u:21786: paṅktayas tv evam evemā vṛkṣaparṇagaṇais saha /
GSP27moksop_u:21795: mūrkhāṇām āpadam dṛṣṭvā prarudanty upalā api //MU_5,14.41//
GSP27moksop_u:21800: mano nāsti mahābāho mā mudhaitat prakalpaya /
GSP27moksop_u:21805: saṅkalpād vardhate cittaṃ tad evāśu parityaja //MU_5,14.46//
GSP27moksop_u:21806: dṛśyam āśrayasīdaṃ cet tat sacitto 'si bandhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:21807: dṛśyaṃ santyajasīdaṃ cet tad acitto 'si mokṣavān //MU_5,14.47//
GSP27moksop_u:21809: santyakta eva mokṣāya yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_5,14.48//
GSP27moksop_u:21810: nāhaṃ nedam iti dhyāyaṃs tiṣṭha tvam acalācalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21813: rāma dvitvamayaṃ tyaktvā śeṣasthas susthiro bhava //MU_5,14.50//
GSP27moksop_u:21815: darśanākhye svam ātmānaṃ sarvadā bhāvayan bhava //MU_5,14.51//
GSP27moksop_u:21819: avalambya nirālambaṃ madhyam adya sthiro bhava //MU_5,14.53//
GSP27moksop_u:21822: ātmasattāṃ tyajann enāṃ cetyaṃ bhāvayasi svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:21823: yadā rāma tadā yāsi cittatām atiduḥkhadām //MU_5,14.55//
GSP27moksop_u:21827: yadā gacchasi saṅkalpaṃ cetyaṃ sampadyase tadā //MU_5,14.57//
GSP27moksop_u:21828: ātmano vyatiriktaṃ sac cetyam ity aṅgasaṃvidā /
GSP27moksop_u:21829: manas sampadyate duḥkhi kṣīyate tyaktayā tayā //MU_5,14.58//
GSP27moksop_u:21830: ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvam ity antas saṃvidodaye /
GSP27moksop_u:21831: kva cettā kva ca vā cittaṃ kiṃ cetyaṃ cintanaṃ ca kim //MU_5,14.59//
GSP27moksop_u:21832: aham ātmeti jīvo 'smīty etāvac cittakaṃ viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21834: aham ātmā na jīvākhyās sattās santītarāḥ kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:21835: ity eva cittopaśamaḥ paramaṃ sukham ucyate //MU_5,14.61//
GSP27moksop_u:21836: ātmaivedaṃ jagad iti jāte rāghava niścaye /
GSP27moksop_u:21837: asattā cetaso jātā bhavaty eva na saṃśayaḥ //MU_5,14.62//
GSP27moksop_u:21839: manas sugalitaṃ viddhi sūryabhāsā tamo yathā //MU_5,14.63//
GSP27moksop_u:21840: manassarpaś śarīrastho yāvat tāvan mahad bhayam /
GSP27moksop_u:21845: nirādhir vigatodvegaṃ tiṣṭha nāsti bhayaṃ tava //MU_5,14.66//
GSP27moksop_u:21846: nīrāga eva nirupāñjana eva cāsmīty etāvataiva galitā tava cittasattā /
GSP27moksop_u:21847: nirduḥkham uttamapadaṃ paramaṃ gato 'si tiṣṭhopaśāntasakalaiṣaṇa evam antaḥ //MU_5,14.67//
GSP27moksop_u:21861: tīkṣṇā kṛṣṇā sudīrghā ca vahaty aṅge sadā nije /
GSP27moksop_u:21863: yāny etāni durantāni durdharāṇy uddhatāni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:21867: kṣaṇam ullāsam āyāti kṣaṇam āyāti śūnyatām /
GSP27moksop_u:21883: nipataty avaṭe mūḍhas tṛṣṇām anusarañ janaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21885: nāpan nāpi jarā na kṣut tathā jarayati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:21888: rūḍhayā bhagavān eṣa viṣṇur vāmanatāṃ gataḥ //MU_5,15.19//
GSP27moksop_u:21892: tṛṣṇāṃ parihara krūrām uragīm iva dūrataḥ //MU_5,15.21//
GSP27moksop_u:21893: tṛṣṇayā pavanā vānti śailās tiṣṭhanti tṛṣṇayā /
GSP27moksop_u:21894: tṛṣṇayaiva dharā dhātrī trailokyaṃ tṛṣṇayā vṛtam //MU_5,15.22//
GSP27moksop_u:21897: tasmād rāghava tṛṣṇāṃ tvaṃ tyaja saṅkalpavarjanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:21898: manas saṅkalpakaṃ nāsti nirṇītam iti yuktitaḥ //MU_5,15.24//
GSP27moksop_u:21899: ayaṃ nāmāham ity eva prathamaṃ tāvad āśaye /
GSP27moksop_u:21902: na bhāvayasi ced rāma tad bahujñeṣu gaṇyase //MU_5,15.26//
GSP27moksop_u:21908: atigambhīram etat tu bhagavan vacanaṃ tava /
GSP27moksop_u:21909: yad ahaṅkāratṛṣṇe tvaṃ mā gṛhāṇeti vakṣi mām //MU_5,16.1//
GSP27moksop_u:21910: yady ahaṅkārasantyāgaṃ karomi tad imaṃ prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:21916: tat kathaṃ santyajāmy enaṃ jīvāmi ca kathaṃ mune /
GSP27moksop_u:21917: ekam arthaṃ viniścitya vada me vadatāṃ vara //MU_5,16.5//
GSP27moksop_u:21920: dvividhaḥ kathyate tajjñair dhyeyo neyaś ca nāmataḥ //MU_5,16.6//
GSP27moksop_u:21921: aham eṣāṃ padārthānām ete ca mama jīvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:21922: nāham ebhir vinā kaścin na mayaite vinā kila //MU_5,16.7//
GSP27moksop_u:21923: ity antar niścayaṃ tyaktvā vicārya manasā saha /
GSP27moksop_u:21924: nāhaṃ padārthasya na me padārtha iti bhāvite //MU_5,16.8//
GSP27moksop_u:21926: yo nūnaṃ vāsanātyāgo dhyeyo nāma sa kīrtitaḥ //MU_5,16.9//
GSP27moksop_u:21927: sarvaṃ sarvikayā buddhyā yaṃ kṛtvā vāsanākṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:21928: jahāti nirmanā dehaṃ sa neyo vāsanākṣayaḥ //MU_5,16.10//
GSP27moksop_u:21931: nirmūlakalanāṃ kṛtvā vāsanāṃ yaḥ kṣayaṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21933: dhyeyaṃ taṃ vāsanātyāgaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhanti līlayā /
GSP27moksop_u:21937: dvāv etau rāghava tyāgau samau muktapadasthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:21938: dvāv eva brahmatāṃ yātau dvāv eva vigatajvarau //MU_5,16.15//
GSP27moksop_u:21944: na hṛṣyati glāyati vā yas sa mukta ihocyate //MU_5,16.18//
GSP27moksop_u:21946: suṣuptavad yaś calati sa mukta iti kathyate //MU_5,16.19//
GSP27moksop_u:21950: na parāmṛśyate yo 'ntas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_5,16.21//
GSP27moksop_u:21951: suṣuptavat praśamitabhāvavṛttinā sthitaṃ sadā jāgrati yena cetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:21952: kalānvito vidhur iva yas sadā mudā niṣevyate mukta itīha sa smṛtaḥ //MU_5,16.22//
GSP27moksop_u:21954: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:21955: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_5,16.23//
GSP27moksop_u:21959: videhamuktā ye rāma te girām iha gocare /
GSP27moksop_u:21960: naiva tiṣṭhanti tasmāt tvaṃ jīvanmuktān imāñ śṛṇu //MU_5,17.1//
GSP27moksop_u:21963: yā sthitis tṛṣṇayā jantor bāhyārthe baddhabhāvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:21964: taṃ bandham āhur ācāryās saṃsāranigaḍaṃ dṛḍham //MU_5,17.3//
GSP27moksop_u:21969: pūrvaṃ yasyās tu tṛṣṇāyā vartamāne ca śāśvatī /
GSP27moksop_u:21970: nirduḥkhatā niṣkalatā sā muktaiva budhais smṛtā //MU_5,17.6//
GSP27moksop_u:21971: idam astu mamety antar yaiṣā rāghava bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:21972: tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ śṛṅkhalāṃ viddhi kalanāṃ ca mahāmate //MU_5,17.7//
GSP27moksop_u:21973: tām etāṃ sarvabhāveṣu satsv asatsu ca sarvadā /
GSP27moksop_u:21979: padārthajātaṃ nedaṃ te nāyam apy asi rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:21980: kiñcit tadanyad evedam anya evāsi śāśvataḥ //MU_5,17.11//
GSP27moksop_u:21981: asadabhyutthite viśve satye vā satataṃ sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:21982: tvayi tattām upagate tṛṣṇāyās saṅgamaḥ kutaḥ //MU_5,17.12//
GSP27moksop_u:21983: anyaś ca rāma manasi puruṣasya vicāriṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21987: atītas sarvabhāvebhyo vālāgrād apy ahaṃ tanuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21988: iti dvitīyo mokṣāya niścayo jāyate satām //MU_5,17.15//
GSP27moksop_u:21991: ahaṃ jagac cāsad idaṃ śūnyaṃ vyomasamaṃ sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:21993: niścayeṣu caturṣv evaṃ bandhāya prathamas smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:21997: sarvam ātmāham eveti niścayo yo mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:21998: tam ādāya viṣādāya na bhūyo yāti te matiḥ //MU_5,17.20//
GSP27moksop_u:21999: tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc ca vyāpako mahimātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22000: sarvam ātmeti tenāntar niścayena na badhyase //MU_5,17.21//
GSP27moksop_u:22001: śūnyaṃ prakṛtimāye ca brahma vijñānam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:22002: śivaḥ puruṣa īśeti nityam ātmaiva kathyate //MU_5,17.22//
GSP27moksop_u:22003: sadā sarvaṃ sad evedaṃ neha dvitvānyate kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:22007: ṛtaṃ sarvam idaṃ nityaṃ nānṛtaṃ vidyate kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:22008: vāry eva sakalo 'mbhodhir na taraṅgādayaḥ pṛthak //MU_5,17.25//
GSP27moksop_u:22013: ātmīye parakīye ca sarvasminn eva sarvadā /
GSP27moksop_u:22014: naṣṭe vopacite kārye sukhaduḥkhe gṛhāṇa mā //MU_5,17.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22018: mā patotpātapūrṇāsu nadīṣv andhaḥ karī yathā //MU_5,17.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22019: dvitvaṃ na sambhavati sarvagate mahātmany ātmany athaikyam api ca dvitayoditātma /
GSP27moksop_u:22020: advaitam aikyarahitaṃ satatoditaṃ ca sarvaṃ na kiñcid api cāhur atas svarūpam //MU_5,17.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22021: naivāham asmi na ca nāma jaganti santi sarvaṃ ca vidyata idaṃ nanu nirvikāram /
GSP27moksop_u:22022: vijñānamātram avabhāsata eva śāntaṃ nāsan na saj jagad ahaṃ ca sadeti viddhi //MU_5,17.32//
GSP27moksop_u:22023: paramam amṛtam ādyaṃ bhāsanaṃ sarvabhāsām ajam ajaram acintyaṃ niṣkramaṃ nirvikāram /
GSP27moksop_u:22024: vigatakaraṇajālam jīvanaṃ jīvaśaktes sakalakalanahīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānām //MU_5,17.33//
GSP27moksop_u:22025: satatam uditam īśaṃ vyātate citprakāśe sthitam anubhavabījaṃ svātmabhāvopadeśyam /
GSP27moksop_u:22026: svadanam anu cito 'ntar brahma sarvaṃ sadaitat tvam aham api jagac cety astu te niścayo 'ntaḥ //MU_5,17.34//
GSP27moksop_u:22039: nodvegī na ca tuṣṭātmā saṃsāre nāvasīdati //MU_5,18.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22042: nābhinandati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati /
GSP27moksop_u:22044: pṛṣṭas san prakṛtaṃ vaktā na pṛṣṭas sthāṇuvat sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22050: paraṃ padam upārūḍho bhaṅgurāṃ jāgatīṃ sthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:22053: svabhāva īdṛśas teṣāṃ kathitas tava rāghava //MU_5,18.12//
GSP27moksop_u:22068: pravicārya daśās sarvā yad atucchataraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:22069: tad eva bhāvenālambya loke vihara rāghava //MU_5,18.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22071: bahis tapto 'ntar āśīto loke vihara rāghava //MU_5,18.21//
GSP27moksop_u:22073: kartā bahir akartāntar loke vihara rāghava //MU_5,18.22//
GSP27moksop_u:22074: jñātavān asi sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ satyam āntaram /
GSP27moksop_u:22075: yathecchasi tayā dṛṣṭyā loke vihara rāghava //MU_5,18.23//
GSP27moksop_u:22082: na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti dehinaḥ paramārthataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22084: bhrāntimātram idaṃ mohāj jagad rāghava dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22087: bandhas syāt tadabhāve tu mokṣaḥ kasya vidhīyate //MU_5,18.29//
GSP27moksop_u:22089: tattvajñānāt kṣayaṃ yāti rajjvām iva bhujaṅgadhīḥ //MU_5,18.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22090: jñātavān asi tattvaṃ svam anayā sūkṣmayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:22092: nāsi cet tvaṃ tad akhilās suhṛdbāndhavabhāvanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22094: asi cet tvaṃ tad atyantasattvavān anumīyase /
GSP27moksop_u:22097: ātmano nāsti sambandhaḥ kim enam anuśocasi //MU_5,18.34//
GSP27moksop_u:22099: na te rāmāsti sambandhaḥ kiṃ bibheṣi jagadbhramāt //MU_5,18.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22101: kas te rāghava sambandho yad etān anuśocasi //MU_5,18.36//
GSP27moksop_u:22102: tvaṃ ced babhūvitha purā tathedānīṃ bhaviṣyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:22103: yady atheha sthito 'sīti jñātavān asi niścayam //MU_5,18.37//
GSP27moksop_u:22105: bandhūn atītān subahūn kasmāt tvaṃ nānuśocasi //MU_5,18.38//
GSP27moksop_u:22107: yadi rāma tathāpi tvaṃ sadrūpaḥ kiṃ vimuhyasi //MU_5,18.39//
GSP27moksop_u:22108: purā bhūtvādya bhūtvā ca bhūyaś cen na bhaviṣyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:22110: tasmān na duḥkhitā yuktā prakṛte jāgate krame /
GSP27moksop_u:22111: na caiva muditā yuktā yuktaṃ kāryānuvartanam //MU_5,18.41//
GSP27moksop_u:22112: mā gaccha duḥkhitāṃ rāma sukhitām api mā vraja /
GSP27moksop_u:22115: nityaśuddhaḥ prakāśas tvaṃ jvālāyā iva koṭaram //MU_5,18.43//
GSP27moksop_u:22118: saṃsārasthitir eveyaṃ yad bhūtvā bhūyate punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22119: ajñenaiva na tu jñena jño 'si rāma sthiro bhava //MU_5,18.45//
GSP27moksop_u:22120: svarūpam idam asyās tu saṃsṛtes santataṃ hi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:22121: ajñānāt sphāratām eti jñānavān asi sanmate //MU_5,18.46//
GSP27moksop_u:22122: rūpaṃ kim anyad bhavatu bhramamātrād ṛte bhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:22123: svapnamātrād ṛte svapne bhavaty anyo hi kaḥ kramaḥ //MU_5,18.47//
GSP27moksop_u:22128: na bandhuḥ kasyacit kaścid iha no kaścid apy ariḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22129: sadā sarvaṃ ca sarvasya sarvas sarveśvarecchayā //MU_5,18.50//
GSP27moksop_u:22132: adha ūrdhvatvam āyāti yāty ūrdhvatvam adhas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:22134: svargasthā narakaṃ yānti nārakā yānti viṣṭapam /
GSP27moksop_u:22135: yoner yonyantaraṃ yānti dvīpād dvīpāntaraṃ janāḥ //MU_5,18.53//
GSP27moksop_u:22136: dhīrāḥ kārpaṇyam āyānti kṛpaṇā yānti dhīratām /
GSP27moksop_u:22139: neha samprāpyate kiñcid agnau himakaṇo yathā //MU_5,18.55//
GSP27moksop_u:22140: ye ye rāma mahābhāgā bahavo 'bahavo 'tha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:22141: naṣṭā eveha dṛśyante te te katipayair dinaiḥ //MU_5,18.56//
GSP27moksop_u:22144: ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraś cāyam ayaṃ cāham ayaṃ bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:22147: āmūlam antaś chinnābhir bahir vihara helayā //MU_5,18.59//
GSP27moksop_u:22149: na yathaiṣi śramaṃ śrānto vāsanābhāravān yathā //MU_5,18.60//
GSP27moksop_u:22152: ayaṃ bandhur ayaṃ neti gaṇanā laghucetasām /
GSP27moksop_u:22154: na tad asti na yatrāhaṃ na tad asti na yan mama /
GSP27moksop_u:22156: nāstam eti na codeti yaś cidākāśavan mahān /
GSP27moksop_u:22157: sa sarvaṃ paśyati svasthaḥ khastho bhūmitalaṃ yathā //MU_5,18.64//
GSP27moksop_u:22158: sarvā eva hi te bhūtajātayo rāma bandhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22159: atyantāsaṃstutā etās tava nāma na kāścana //MU_5,18.65//
GSP27moksop_u:22160: vividhajanmaśatāhitasambhrame jagati bandhur abandhur iti kṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:22161: bhramadaśaiva vivalgati vastutas tribhuvanaṃ cirabandhur abandhv api //MU_5,18.66//
GSP27moksop_u:22167: ayaṃ bandhur ayaṃ neti kathāprastāvatas smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:22168: itihāsam imaṃ puṇyaṃ sāścaryaṃ śṛṇu rāghava //MU_5,19.2//
GSP27moksop_u:22172: śṛṅgair ātatam ākāśaṃ jitavān yas samunnataiḥ //MU_5,19.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22187: muner babhūvatus tasya dvau putrāv indusundarau /
GSP27moksop_u:22189: sa tābhyāṃ saha putrābhyāṃ bhāryayā saha caikayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22191: atha kāle tayos tasya putrayor jñānavān abhūt /
GSP27moksop_u:22194: maurkhyād atigato nāntaḥ padaṃ lolam ivāsthitaḥ //MU_5,19.15//
GSP27moksop_u:22206: tatyāja tanum amlānāṃ ṣaṭpadī padminīm iva //MU_5,19.21//
GSP27moksop_u:22210: puṇya eva sthite 'vyagre pāvano duḥkham āyayau //MU_5,19.23//
GSP27moksop_u:22216: kiṃ putra ghanatāṃ śokaṃ nayasy āndhyaikakāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:22218: pitā tava mahāprājña gatas sārdhaṃ tvadambayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22220: tat sthānaṃ sarvajantūnāṃ tad rūpaṃ viditātmanām /
GSP27moksop_u:22221: svaṃ bhāvam abhisampanne kiṃ pitary abhiśocasi //MU_5,19.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22222: kim īdṛśī tvayā baddhā bhāvaneha vimohajā /
GSP27moksop_u:22224: na saiva bhavato mātā nāsāv eva pitā tava /
GSP27moksop_u:22225: na bhavān eva tanayas tayor nissaṅkhyaputrayoḥ //MU_5,19.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22228: asaṅkhyaputrayor naiva bhavān eva sutas tayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22235: tad atītā na śocyante kim ajasraṃ sahasraśaḥ //MU_5,19.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22237: paramārthena tu prājña nāsti mitraṃ na bāndhavaḥ //MU_5,19.36//
GSP27moksop_u:22238: manāg apīha hi bhrātaḥ paramārthe na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22239: mahaty api cirāt tapte marāv iva payolavaḥ //MU_5,19.37//
GSP27moksop_u:22241: svapna eva mahābuddhe dināni trīṇi pañca vā //MU_5,19.38//
GSP27moksop_u:22242: dṛṣṭyā tu pāramārthikyā putra satyaṃ vicāraya /
GSP27moksop_u:22243: neha tvaṃ naiva cedaṃ te bhrāntim antaḥ parityaja //MU_5,19.39//
GSP27moksop_u:22244: ayaṃ mṛto gataś cāham itīmā dṛṣṭayaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22251: kaḥ pitā kiṃ ca vā mitraṃ kā mātā ke ca bandhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22255: bandhutve bhāvito bandhuḥ paratve bhāvitaḥ paraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22258: ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraś cāyam ity asatkalanā kutaḥ //MU_5,20.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22260: ko 'haṃ syām iti cittena svayaṃ putra vicāraya //MU_5,20.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22261: dṛṣṭyā tu pāramārthikyā na kaścit tvaṃ na cāpy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:22262: mithyājñānam idaṃ puṇyaḥ pāvanaś ceti valgati //MU_5,20.6//
GSP27moksop_u:22263: kas te pitā kaś ca suhṛt kā mātā kaś ca vā paraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22264: khasyānantavilāsasya kim asvaṃ kiṃ svam ucyatām //MU_5,20.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22265: asi cet tvaṃ tad anyeṣu yāteṣu bahujanmasu /
GSP27moksop_u:22266: ye bandhavo ye vibhavāḥ kiṃ tān api na śocasi //MU_5,20.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22268: bahavo bandhavo dhanyās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi //MU_5,20.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22270: haṃsasya bandhavo haṃsās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi //MU_5,20.10//
GSP27moksop_u:22272: bahavo bandhavo vṛkṣās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi //MU_5,20.11//
GSP27moksop_u:22274: bahavo bandhavas siṃhās tān kathaṃ nānuśocasi //MU_5,20.12//
GSP27moksop_u:22275: babhūvus te sravantīṣu sarassv ambhojinīṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22276: bahavo bandhavo matsyāḥ kiṃ tān api na śocasi //MU_5,20.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22279: hehayeṣu ca mātaṅgas trigarteṣu ca gardabhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22281: vindhyādrau pippalo bhūtvā ghuṇo bhūtvā mahāvaṭe /
GSP27moksop_u:22282: mandare markaṭo bhūtvā viprāj jāto 'si kandare //MU_5,20.16//
GSP27moksop_u:22283: kosaleṣu dvijo bhūtvā bhūtvā vaṅgeṣu tittiriḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22284: aśvo bhūtvā tukhāreṣu jātas tvaṃ brāhmaṇād vane //MU_5,20.17//
GSP27moksop_u:22285: yaḥ kīṭas tālakandāntar daṃśako ya udumbare /
GSP27moksop_u:22286: yaḥ prājiko vindhyavane sa tvaṃ putra mamānujaḥ //MU_5,20.18//
GSP27moksop_u:22288: pipīlako yaṣ ṣaṇ māsān so 'yaṃ tvam anujo mama //MU_5,20.19//
GSP27moksop_u:22290: sārdhaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ sādho so 'yaṃ tvam anujo mama //MU_5,20.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22292: ṣaṭpadeneva padmeṣu so 'yaṃ tvam anujo mama //MU_5,20.21//
GSP27moksop_u:22298: samatītās smarāmy adya tā jñānoditayā dṛśā //MU_5,20.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22299: trigarteṣu śuko bhūtvā haṃso bhūtvā sarittaṭe /
GSP27moksop_u:22300: pakkaṇe vāyaso bhūtvā jāto 'ham iha kānane //MU_5,20.25//
GSP27moksop_u:22301: bhuktvā pulindatāṃ vindhye kṛtvā vaṅgeṣu vṛkṣatām /
GSP27moksop_u:22303: yaś cātako himagirau yo rājā puṇḍramaṇḍale /
GSP27moksop_u:22304: vyāghro yas sahyakuñjeṣu sa eveha tavāgrajaḥ //MU_5,20.27//
GSP27moksop_u:22305: yo gṛdhro daśavarṣāṇi yo mṛgo māsapañcakam /
GSP27moksop_u:22306: yas samānāṃ śataṃ siṃhas sa eveha tavāgrajaḥ //MU_5,20.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22310: vilāsā janmanāṃ bhrātas smaryante prāktanā mayā //MU_5,20.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22311: evaṃ sthite jagajjātāv āvayoś śataśo gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22312: pitaro mātaraś caiva bhrātaras suhṛdas tathā //MU_5,20.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22313: kāṃs tān samanuśocāvo na śocāvaś ca kān api /
GSP27moksop_u:22314: bandhūn kiṃ vāpi śocāva īdṛśy eva jagatsthitiḥ //MU_5,20.32//
GSP27moksop_u:22315: anantāḥ pitaro yānti yānty anantāś ca mātaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22317: kiṃ pramāṇam ataḥ putra duḥkhasyātra sukhasya vā /
GSP27moksop_u:22318: tasmāt sarvaṃ parityajya tiṣṭhāvas svasthatāṃ gatau //MU_5,20.34//
GSP27moksop_u:22319: prapañcabhāvanāṃ tyaktvā manasy aham iti sthitām /
GSP27moksop_u:22320: tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha bhadraṃ te yāṃ yānti gatikovidāḥ //MU_5,20.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22325: na te duḥkhaṃ na te janma na te mātā na te pitā /
GSP27moksop_u:22326: ātmaivāsi na sadbuddhe tvam anyaḥ kaścid eva hi //MU_5,20.38//
GSP27moksop_u:22330: tajjñās tu prekṣakā eva sākṣidharme vyavasthitāḥ //MU_5,20.40//
GSP27moksop_u:22331: kartāro 'pi na kartāro yathā dīpā niśāgame /
GSP27moksop_u:22336: putrātmanātmani mahāmaṇināmunaiva santyajya sambhramam alaṃ paritoṣam ehi //MU_5,20.43//
GSP27moksop_u:22340: evaṃ prabodhitas tena tadā puṇyena pāvanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22341: prabodham āpa prākāśyaṃ prabhāta iva bhūtalam //MU_5,21.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22345: tau videhau gatasnehau dīpāv iva śamaṃ gatau //MU_5,21.3//
GSP27moksop_u:22347: āśāḥ kiṃ gṛhyate tābhyaḥ kiṃ vā santyajyate 'nagha //MU_5,21.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22349: upāyas tyāga evaiko na nāma paripālanam //MU_5,21.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22353: lokam ālokayan dīnaṃ mā tiṣṭhottiṣṭha rāghava //MU_5,21.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22354: eṣā brāhmī sthitis svacchā niṣkāmā vigatāmayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22355: enāṃ prāpya mahābāho vimūḍho 'pi na muhyati //MU_5,21.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22356: ekaṃ vivekaṃ suhṛdam ekāṃ prauḍhasakhīṃ dhiyam /
GSP27moksop_u:22357: ādāya viharann evaṃ saṅkaṭe 'pi na muhyasi //MU_5,21.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22359: na svadhairyād ṛte kaścid abhyuddharati saṅkaṭāt //MU_5,21.10//
GSP27moksop_u:22362: na tat tribhuvanaiśvaryān na kośād ratnadhāriṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22365: patanti puruṣā yāvan manas teṣāṃ na vijvaram //MU_5,21.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22366: pūrṇe manasi sampūrṇaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sudhādravaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22369: āśayā riktatām eti śaradīva saro manaḥ //MU_5,21.15//
GSP27moksop_u:22373: na valgati mahat tasya rājate hṛdvanāntaram //MU_5,21.17//
GSP27moksop_u:22376: śītatā sā na śītāṃśau na himācalakandare /
GSP27moksop_u:22378: na tathā bhāti pūrṇendur na pūrṇaḥ kṣīrasāgaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22379: na lakṣmīvadanaṃ kāntaṃ spṛhāhīnaṃ yathā manaḥ //MU_5,21.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22386: anuttamena dhairyeṇa tena citte kṣayaṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:22387: tat padaṃ prāpyate rāma yatra nāśo na vidyate //MU_5,21.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22389: na dadāsi prarohaṃ cet tad bhavān asti rāghava //MU_5,21.25//
GSP27moksop_u:22390: cittaṃ vṛttivihīnaṃ te yadā yātam acittatām /
GSP27moksop_u:22391: tadā mokṣamayīm antas sattām āpnoṣi tāṃ tatām //MU_5,21.26//
GSP27moksop_u:22394: vartanaṃ vṛttir ity uktaṃ vartate cittam āśayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22395: cittavṛttim ato hy āśāṃ tyaktvā niścittatāṃ vraja //MU_5,21.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22396: yo yayā vartate vṛttyā sa tayaiva vinā kṣayī /
GSP27moksop_u:22398: praśamitasakalaiṣaṇo mahātman bhava bhavabandham apāsya muktacittaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22399: manasi nigaḍarajjavaḥ kadāśāḥ parigalitāsu ca tāsu ko na muktaḥ //MU_5,21.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22407: prāptaṃ prāptavyam akhilaṃ viśrānto 'smy amale pade //MU_5,22.2//
GSP27moksop_u:22411: tiṣṭhāmy ānandavān antas sāyaṃ pūrṇa ivoḍurāṭ //MU_5,22.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22413: tṛptim eṣāṃ na gacchāmi vacasāṃ vadatas tava //MU_5,22.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22415: vibho kathaya khidyante santo nāvanataṃ prati //MU_5,22.6//
GSP27moksop_u:22417: śṛṇu rāghava te vakṣye baḍivṛttāntam uttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:22418: śrutena yena tena tvaṃ bodham āpsyasi śāśvatam //MU_5,22.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22419: asty asmiñ jagataḥ kośe kasmiṃścid diktaṭāntare /
GSP27moksop_u:22420: pātālam iti vikhyāto loko bhūmer adhas sthitaḥ //MU_5,22.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22426: kvacid danusutair vyāptaś caladbhir iva merubhiḥ //MU_5,22.11//
GSP27moksop_u:22432: kvacid ratnākarair vyāptaḥ pātālair itarair iva //MU_5,22.14//
GSP27moksop_u:22450: vinamanti diśas sarvā latāḥ phalanatā iva //MU_5,22.23//
GSP27moksop_u:22452: daśakoṭīs sa varṣāṇāṃ daityo rājyaṃ cakāra ha //MU_5,22.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22466: punas tāny eva karmāṇi lajjāyai na tu tuṣṭaye //MU_5,22.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22467: punar āliṅgyate kāntā punar eva ca bhujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22469: tam eva śuktavirasaṃ vyāpāraughaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22470: divase divase kurvan prājñaḥ kasmān na lajjate //MU_5,22.33//
GSP27moksop_u:22471: punar dinaṃ punā rātriḥ punaḥ kāryaparamparā /
GSP27moksop_u:22472: punaḥ punar ahaṃ manye prājñasyeyaṃ viḍambanā //MU_5,22.34//
GSP27moksop_u:22473: ūrmitāṃ punar āsādya punar eti nirūrmitām /
GSP27moksop_u:22474: yathā jalaṃ tathaivāyaṃ tāṃ tām eti kriyāṃ janaḥ //MU_5,22.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22478: ko 'rthas syāt tādṛśo yena punaḥ karma na gacchati //MU_5,22.37//
GSP27moksop_u:22479: kiyantam atha vā kālam idam āḍambaraṃ mahat /
GSP27moksop_u:22483: phalam ekaṃ mahodāraṃ neha paśyāmi kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:22484: kāryam astītarat prāpte yasmin nāma na kiñcana //MU_5,22.40//
GSP27moksop_u:22485: bhogād ṛte kim atyantaṃ syād ramyam avināśi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22486: etat sañcintayāmy āśu dadhyau matvety asau baḍiḥ //MU_5,22.41//
GSP27moksop_u:22488: ātmany eva manasy arthaṃ sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ vimarśayan //MU_5,22.42//
GSP27moksop_u:22489: purā kileha bhagavān pṛṣṭo 'bhūt sa virocanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22492: yatra sarve bhramāś śāntāḥ ko 'sau sīmānta ucyatām //MU_5,22.44//
GSP27moksop_u:22495: kiṃ prāpyeha samastebhyaḥ prāptebhyas tṛptimān pumān /
GSP27moksop_u:22496: kiṃ dṛṣṭvā darśanaṃ bhūyo na tātopakaroty alam //MU_5,22.46//
GSP27moksop_u:22497: atyantabahavo 'py ete bhogā hi na sukhāvahāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22498: kṣobhayanti mano mohe pātayanti satām api //MU_5,22.47//
GSP27moksop_u:22499: tat tāta vitatānandasundaraṃ kiñcid eva me /
GSP27moksop_u:22500: tādṛk kathaya yatrasthaś ciraṃ viśrāntim emy aham //MU_5,22.48//
GSP27moksop_u:22501: ity ākarṇya purā niśākarakaraspardhāparārdhyollasatpuṣpāpūrakṛtāvaguṇṭhanapaṭasyoktaṃ tale tena me /
GSP27moksop_u:22502: pitrā svargahṛtasya sāgarataros saṃropitasyājire sphārākārarasāyanāsavasamaṃ mohopaśāntyai vacaḥ //MU_5,22.49//
GSP27moksop_u:22507: trailokyānāṃ sahasrāṇi yatra mānti bahūny api //MU_5,23.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22508: yatra nāmbhodharā nāpi sāgarā vā na cādrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22509: na vanāni na tīrthāni na nadyo na sarāṃsi ca //MU_5,23.2//
GSP27moksop_u:22510: na mahī nāpi cākāśo na dyaur no pavanādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22511: na candrārkau na lokeśā na devā na ca dānavāḥ //MU_5,23.3//
GSP27moksop_u:22512: na bhūtayakṣarakṣāṃsi na gulmā na vanaśriyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22514: nāpo na jvalanaṃ nāśā nordhvaṃ nādho na viṣṭapam /
GSP27moksop_u:22515: nāloko na tamo nāhaṃ na harīndraharādayaḥ //MU_5,23.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22516: eka evāsti sumahāṃs tatra rājā mahādyutiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22517: sarvakṛt sarvagas sarvas sa ca tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitaḥ //MU_5,23.6//
GSP27moksop_u:22519: aghaṭaṃ ghaṭayaty āśu ghaṭaṃ vighaṭayaty alam //MU_5,23.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22520: bhoktuṃ kiñcin na śaknoti na ca jānāti kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:22521: rājārthaṃ kevalaṃ sarvaṃ karoty ajño 'pi san sadā //MU_5,23.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22525: katham āsādyate vāpi kena vādhigataḥ prabho //MU_5,23.10//
GSP27moksop_u:22526: kas sa tādṛgvidho mantrī rājā vāpi mahābalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22530: sa tatra mantrī bhagavān devāsuragaṇais suta /
GSP27moksop_u:22532: nāsau sahasranayano na yamo na dhaneśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22533: nāmaro nāsuro vāpi yadi putraka jīyate //MU_5,23.14//
GSP27moksop_u:22543: trailokyam idam ākramya samrāḍ iva vivalgati //MU_5,23.19//
GSP27moksop_u:22547: tad etat krīḍanaṃ tasya mantriṇo mantraśālinaḥ //MU_5,23.21//
GSP27moksop_u:22548: sa mantrī kevalaṃ putra tenaiva prabhuṇā yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:22549: jīyate tat sujeyo 'sāv anyathā tv acalācalaḥ //MU_5,23.22//
GSP27moksop_u:22550: tasyaiva tatprabhoḥ kāle jetuṃ taṃ mantriṇaṃ nijam /
GSP27moksop_u:22553: jetuṃ ced asti te śaktis tat parākramavān asi //MU_5,23.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22555: ime vikāsam āyānti vilīyante layaṃ gate //MU_5,23.25//
GSP27moksop_u:22557: yadi jetuṃ samartho 'si dhīras tad asi suvrata //MU_5,23.26//
GSP27moksop_u:22558: tasmiñ jite jitā lokā bhavanty avijitā api /
GSP27moksop_u:22559: ajite tv ajitā ete cirakālajitā api //MU_5,23.27//
GSP27moksop_u:22561: tajjaye yatnam ātiṣṭha kaṣṭayāpi hi ceṣṭayā //MU_5,23.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22563: trijagad api vaśīkṛtaṃ samantād atibalinā nanu helayaiva tena //MU_5,23.29//
GSP27moksop_u:22568: ko 'sau veti mahāvīrya sarvaṃ prakathayāśu me //MU_5,24.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22572: putra yuktyā gṛhīto 'sau kṣaṇād āyāti vaśyatām /
GSP27moksop_u:22573: yuktiṃ vinā dahaty eṣa āśīviṣa ivoddhataḥ //MU_5,24.3//
GSP27moksop_u:22575: rājānaṃ taṃ samālokya padam āsādayanti te //MU_5,24.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22576: dṛṣṭe tasmin mahīpāle sa mantrī vaśam eti vaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22577: tasmiṃś ca mantriṇy ākrānte sa rājā dṛśyate punaḥ //MU_5,24.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22578: yāvan na dṛṣṭo rājāsau tāvan mantrī na jīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22579: mantrī ca yāvan na jitas tāvad rājā na dṛśyate //MU_5,24.6//
GSP27moksop_u:22580: rājany adṛṣṭe durmantrī sa duḥkhāyotphalaty ati /
GSP27moksop_u:22581: mantriṇy anirjite rājā so 'tyantaṃ yāty adṛśyatām //MU_5,24.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22583: rājñas sandarśanaṃ tasya mantriṇaś ca parājayam //MU_5,24.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22585: dvayaṃ sampādayann etad deśam āpnoti śobhanam //MU_5,24.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22586: tvam abhyāse phalībhūte taṃ deśam adhigacchasi /
GSP27moksop_u:22587: yadi daityendra tad bhūyo manāg api na śocasi //MU_5,24.10//
GSP27moksop_u:22590: śṛṇu kaḥ putra deśo 'sau sarvaṃ prakaṭayāmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:22592: rājā tu tatra bhagavān ātmā sarvapadātigaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22593: tena mantrī kṛtaḥ prājño manonāmā mahāmate //MU_5,24.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22594: mano viśvatayā viṣvag idaṃ pariṇatiṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:22596: tasmiñ jite jitaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaṃ cāsāditaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:22599: yā yuktir bhagavaṃs tasya cittasyākramaṇe sphuṭā /
GSP27moksop_u:22600: tāṃ me kathaya tat tāta yayā jeṣyāmi dāruṇam //MU_5,24.16//
GSP27moksop_u:22602: viṣayān prati bhoḥ putra sarvān eva hi sarvathā /
GSP27moksop_u:22603: anāsthā paramā yaiṣā sā yuktir manaso jaye //MU_5,24.17//
GSP27moksop_u:22606: eṣā hy atyantaduṣprāpā suprāpā ca mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:22607: anabhyastā hi duṣprāpā svabhyastā prāpyate sukham //MU_5,24.19//
GSP27moksop_u:22609: sarvatas sphuṭatām eti sekasiktā latā yathā //MU_5,24.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22611: putra śālir ivāvyuptas tasmād enāṃ samāharet //MU_5,24.21//
GSP27moksop_u:22613: viratiṃ viṣayeṣv ete yāvan nāyānti dehinaḥ //MU_5,24.22//
GSP27moksop_u:22617: bhogeṣv aratir abhyāsād vṛddhiṃ neyā latā yathā //MU_5,24.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22618: puruṣārthād ṛte putra neha samprāpyate śubham /
GSP27moksop_u:22621: daivam ity ucyate loke na daivaṃ dehavat kvacit //MU_5,24.26//
GSP27moksop_u:22623: ucyate daivaśabdena sā narair eva netaraiḥ //MU_5,24.27//
GSP27moksop_u:22624: yad yatheha sadā yatra sampannaṃ phalatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:22628: yathā saṅkalpyate yad yat pauruṣeṇa tathaiva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:22630: kartr ato mana eveha yat kalpayati tat tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:22631: niyatiṃ yādṛśīm etat saṅkalpayati sā tathā //MU_5,24.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22632: niyatān niyatān kāṃścid bhāvān aniyatān api /
GSP27moksop_u:22635: sphuraty asmiñ jagatkośe jīvo vyomnīva mārutaḥ //MU_5,24.33//
GSP27moksop_u:22636: niyatyā rahitāṃ kurvan kadācin niyatiṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22638: tasmād yāvan manas tāvan na daivaṃ niyatir na ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22639: manasy astaṅgate sādho yad bhavaty astu tat tathā //MU_5,24.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22640: jīvo hi puruṣo jātaḥ pauruṣeṇa sa yad yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:22641: saṅkalpayati loke 'smiṃs tat tathā tasya nānyathā //MU_5,24.36//
GSP27moksop_u:22642: puruṣārthād ṛte putra na kiñcid iha vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22643: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya bhogeṣv aratim āharet //MU_5,24.37//
GSP27moksop_u:22644: na bhogeṣv aratir yāvaj jāteha jayadāyinī /
GSP27moksop_u:22645: na parā nirvṛtis tāvat prāpyate bhavanāśinī //MU_5,24.38//
GSP27moksop_u:22648: abhyāsena vinā putra na kadācana duḥkhadā /
GSP27moksop_u:22659: devam ālokayed bhogād ratiṃ cāpaharet samam //MU_5,24.44//
GSP27moksop_u:22660: cittasya bhogair dvau bhāgau śāstreṇaikaṃ prapūrayet /
GSP27moksop_u:22672: prajñayā parayā ṛjvyā bhogānām īśvarasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22673: samam evātha dehasya rūpam āśv avalokayet //MU_5,24.51//
GSP27moksop_u:22676: pare dṛṣṭe vitṛṣṇatvaṃ tṛṣṇānāśe ca dṛk parā /
GSP27moksop_u:22677: ete mitho dhṛte dṛṣṭī naunāvikadaśe yathā //MU_5,24.53//
GSP27moksop_u:22682: na tapobhir na dānena na tīrthair api jāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22684: kayācid api no yuktyā buddhir ātmāvalokane /
GSP27moksop_u:22689: tadvad āśvasyate sādho parame kāraṇe yathā //MU_5,24.59//
GSP27moksop_u:22690: pauruṣam yatnam āśritya daivaṃ kṛtvā sudūrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22696: bhogagarhā vicāraś ca svātmālokaś ca śāśvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22697: anyo'nyaṃ sādhayanty arthaṃ susnigdhās suhṛdo yathā //MU_5,24.63//
GSP27moksop_u:22698: pūrvaṃ daivam anādṛtya pauruṣaṃ prāpya yatnataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22699: dantair dantān prasampīḍya bhogeṣv aratim āharet //MU_5,24.64//
GSP27moksop_u:22710: deśakrameṇa dhanam alpavigarhaṇena tenāṅga sādhujanam arjaya mānapūrvam /
GSP27moksop_u:22715: etan me kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ pitrā cāruvicāriṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:22716: idānīṃ saṃsmṛtaṃ diṣṭyā samprabodham ahaṃ gataḥ //MU_5,25.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22717: adyeyaṃ mama sañjātā bhogān praty aratis sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:22719: punar āpūrayann āśāḥ punar abhyāharan dhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:22721: aho nu khalu ramyeyaṃ śamabhūś śītalāntarā /
GSP27moksop_u:22722: sarvā eva śamaṃ yānti sukhaduḥkhadṛśaś śame //MU_5,25.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22723: śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse śame sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22727: aṅgam aṅgena sampīḍya māṃsaṃ māṃsena ca striyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22728: purāham abhavaṃ prīto yat tan mohavijṛmbhitam //MU_5,25.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22730: ākrāntam akhilaṃ bhūtajātaṃ kim iva śobhanam //MU_5,25.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22731: punas tāny eva tāny eva tatrehānyatra cātra ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22732: itaś cetaś ca vastūni nāpūrvaṃ nāma kiñcana //MU_5,25.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22733: sarvam eva parityajya parihṛtya dhiyā svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:22736: sāraṃ tad api tucchena kālenāśu nigīryate //MU_5,25.11//
GSP27moksop_u:22737: etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ bhṛśaṃ bālo 'bhavaṃ purā /
GSP27moksop_u:22738: yaḥ kurvan dveṣam amarais tucchayā jagadicchayā //MU_5,25.12//
GSP27moksop_u:22740: tyaktenāttena vārthas syāt ka udāro mahātmanaḥ //MU_5,25.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22745: etayā tad alaṃ me 'stu tucchayā pūrvacintayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22749: ko 'yaṃ tāvad ahaṃ kiṃ syād ātmety ātmāvalokanam /
GSP27moksop_u:22751: sañcintayāmi parameśvaram āśu śukram udyatprasādam atha tena giropadiṣṭaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22752: tiṣṭhāmy anantavibhave svayam ātmanātmany akṣīṇam artham upadeśagiraḥ phalanti //MU_5,25.19//
GSP27moksop_u:22759: cetantaṃ jñātavāñ śiṣyaṃ baḍiṃ gurvarthinaṃ pure //MU_5,26.2//
GSP27moksop_u:22761: ānināya sa dehaṃ svaṃ ratnavātāyanaṃ baḍeḥ //MU_5,26.3//
GSP27moksop_u:22770: niyojayati māṃ vaktuṃ kāryaṃ kartum ivārkabhāḥ //MU_5,26.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22773: kim ihāsti kiyanmātram idaṃ kimmayam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:22774: ko 'haṃ kas tvaṃ kim ete vā lokā iti vadāśu me //MU_5,26.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22776: bahunātra kim uktena khaṃ gantuṃ yatnavān aham /
GSP27moksop_u:22778: cid ihāsti hi cinmātram idaṃ cinmayam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22779: cit tvaṃ cid aham ete ca lokāś cid iti saṅgrahaḥ //MU_5,26.11//
GSP27moksop_u:22782: bhavyo 'si cet tad etasmāt sarvam āpnoṣi niścayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:22783: no cet tad bahv api proktaṃ tvayi bhasmani hūyate //MU_5,26.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22788: khaṃ vrajāmy aham atraite munayas sapta saṅgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22789: kenāpi surakāryeṇa vartavyaṃ tatra khe mayā //MU_5,26.16//
GSP27moksop_u:22790: rājan yāvad ayaṃ dehas tāvan muktadhiyām api /
GSP27moksop_u:22793: plutam aliśabale nabho'ntarāle taralataraṅgavad ākule grahaughaiḥ //MU_5,26.18//
GSP27moksop_u:22798: manasā cintayām āsa baḍir balavatāṃ varaḥ //MU_5,27.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22799: yuktam uktaṃ bhagavatā cid evedaṃ jagattrayam /
GSP27moksop_u:22800: cid ahaṃ cid ime lokāś cid āśā cid iyaṃ kriyā //MU_5,27.2//
GSP27moksop_u:22803: ayam āditya ity arko na citā cetyate yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:22805: iyaṃ bhūr iti bhūr eṣā citā yadi na cetyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22806: bhūmeḥ kiṃ nāma bhūmitvaṃ tad bhaved bhavyatāṃ gatam //MU_5,27.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22807: imā diśo diśa iti cetyante na citā yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:22808: tat kiṃ nāma diśāṃ diktvaṃ śailānāṃ vāpi kādritā //MU_5,27.6//
GSP27moksop_u:22809: idaṃ jagad iti jagac citā yadi na cetyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22810: tat kiṃ jagattvaṃ jagato nabhastvaṃ nabhaso 'tha kim //MU_5,27.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22811: kāyo 'yaṃ parvatākāraś citā yadi na cetyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22812: tat kiṃ nāma śarīratvaṃ śarīrasya śarīriṇām //MU_5,27.8//
GSP27moksop_u:22813: cid indriyāṇi cit kāyaś cin manaś cit tadeṣaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:22814: cid antaś cid bahiś cit khaṃ cid bhāvaś cid bhavasthitiḥ //MU_5,27.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22819: ahaṃ cid ambare bhānāv ahaṃ cid bhūtapañjare /
GSP27moksop_u:22820: surāsureṣu cid ahaṃ sthāvareṣu careṣu ca //MU_5,27.12//
GSP27moksop_u:22821: cid astīha dvitīyā hi kalpanaiva na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:22822: dvitvasyāsambhavāl loke kaś śatruḥ kaś ca vā suhṛt //MU_5,27.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22824: citas tat kiṃ bhavec chinnaṃ sarvalokāvapūraṇāt //MU_5,27.14//
GSP27moksop_u:22825: citā sañcetito dveṣo dveṣo bhavati nānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:22829: na dveṣo 'sti na rāgo 'sti na mano nāsya vṛttayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22833: citaś cid iti yan nāma nirnāmāyā na nāma tat /
GSP27moksop_u:22837: na kartāsmi na bhoktāsmi draṣṭaivāsmi nirāmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22847: ākāśavad ananto 'ham apy aṇor aṇur ātataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22850: na śaktā māṃ paricchettum bhāvābhāvā jagadgatāḥ //MU_5,27.27//
GSP27moksop_u:22851: atha vaite jagadbhāvāḥ paricchindantu mām imam /
GSP27moksop_u:22852: yathābhimatam ete hi matto na vyatirekiṇaḥ //MU_5,27.28//
GSP27moksop_u:22854: hriyate dīyate vāpi tat kiṃ kasya kila kṣatam //MU_5,27.29//
GSP27moksop_u:22856: cetyam asty aham evaitan na kiñcid api coditam //MU_5,27.30//
GSP27moksop_u:22857: kiṃ saṅkalpavikalpābhyāṃ cid acic cāham ekabhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22858: saṅkṣobhayāmy ahaṃ tāvac chāmyāmy ātmani pāvane //MU_5,27.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22868: baḍir arājata nirmalasattayā vighanam acchatayeva śarannabhaḥ //MU_5,27.36//
GSP27moksop_u:22872: atha te dānavās tatra baḍer anucarās tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:22873: tadgṛhaṃ sphāṭikaṃ saudham uccair āruruhuḥ kṣaṇāt //MU_5,28.1//
GSP27moksop_u:22877: luḍaṅgādyāś ca suhṛdaḥ palmūlādyāś ca lālakāḥ //MU_5,28.3//
GSP27moksop_u:22881: saritas sāgarāś śailā diśaś ca vidiśas tathā //MU_5,28.5//
GSP27moksop_u:22882: sevārtham āyayus tasya taṃ pradeśaṃ tadā baḍeḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22886: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtakartavyāḥ praṇemus te mahāsurāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22888: mantriṇo 'tha vicāryātra kiṃ prāptam iti dānavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22889: bhārgavaṃ cintayām āsur guruṃ sarvavidāṃ varam //MU_5,28.9//
GSP27moksop_u:22894: viśramya sa kṣaṇam iva premavān avalokya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:22897: kṣipann iva sabhām āha hasan vākyam idaṃ guruḥ //MU_5,28.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22899: aho citram idaṃ daityās svavicāraṇayaiva yat /
GSP27moksop_u:22901: ayaṃ tad evam eveha tiṣṭhan dānavasattamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22902: svātmani sthitim āpnotu padaṃ paśyatv anāmayam //MU_5,28.15//
GSP27moksop_u:22907: svayam eva hi kālena prabodham ayam eṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:22912: daityāś cintāṃ jahuś śuṣkāṃ mañjarīm iva pādapāḥ //MU_5,28.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22915: narā mahīm ahipatayo rasātalaṃ grahā nabhas tridaśagaṇās triviṣṭapam /
GSP27moksop_u:22916: diśo 'drayo jalapatayaś ca kandarān vanecarā gaganacarāś ca khaṃ yayuḥ //MU_5,28.22//
GSP27moksop_u:22922: baḍau prabuddhe tad bāḍhaṃ vireje nagaraṃ tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:22924: baḍiḥ prabuddha evāsau yāvan nāyānti dānavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22926: aho nu ramyā padavī śītalā pāramārthikī /
GSP27moksop_u:22927: aham asyāṃ kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā parāṃ viśrāntim āgataḥ //MU_5,29.4//
GSP27moksop_u:22928: tad enām eva padavīm avalambya vasāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:22932: iti bhūyo 'pi viśrāntyai kurvāṇaṃ galitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22933: baḍim āvārayām āsur daityāś candram ivāmbudāḥ //MU_5,29.7//
GSP27moksop_u:22936: citaḥ kṣīṇavikalpasya kim upādeyam asti me /
GSP27moksop_u:22938: mokṣam icchāmy ahaṃ kasmād baddhaḥ kenāsmi vai purā /
GSP27moksop_u:22940: na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti maurkhyaṃ me kṣayam āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:22941: kiṃ me dhyānavilāsena kiṃ vādhyānena me bhavet //MU_5,29.11//
GSP27moksop_u:22942: na dhyānaṃ nāpi cādhyānaṃ na bhogān nāpy abhogitām /
GSP27moksop_u:22944: na me vāñchā pare tattve na me vāñchā jagatsthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:22945: na me dhyānadṛśā kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ vibhavena me //MU_5,29.13//
GSP27moksop_u:22946: nāhaṃ mṛto na jīvāmi na san nāsann ahaṃ samaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22947: nedaṃ me naiva nānyan me namo mahyam ahaṃ hy aham //MU_5,29.14//
GSP27moksop_u:22948: idam astu jagadrājyaṃ tiṣṭhāmy atra svasaṃsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22949: naiva vāstu jagadrājyaṃ tiṣṭhāmy ātmani śītalam //MU_5,29.15//
GSP27moksop_u:22950: kiṃ me dhyānadṛśā kāryaṃ kiṃ rājyavibhavaśriyā /
GSP27moksop_u:22951: yad āyāti tad āyātu nāhaṃ kiñcin na me kvacit //MU_5,29.16//
GSP27moksop_u:22952: na kiñcid api kartavyaṃ yadi nāma mayādhunā /
GSP27moksop_u:22953: tat kasmān na karomīha kiñcit prakṛtakarma vai //MU_5,29.17//
GSP27moksop_u:22954: iti nirṇīya pūrṇātmā baḍir balavatāṃ varaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22959: manasā sakalāny eva rājakāryāṇi sa vyadhāt //MU_5,29.20//
GSP27moksop_u:22960: devān dvijān gurūṃś caiva pūjayām āsa pūjayā /
GSP27moksop_u:22964: ity asāv avasat tasmin rājye sakalaśāsane /
GSP27moksop_u:22965: yajñaṃ prati babhūvātha matir asya kadācana //MU_5,29.23//
GSP27moksop_u:22967: saha śukrādibhir mukhyais sa cakāra mahāmakham //MU_5,29.24//
GSP27moksop_u:22977: āpadaṃ sampadaṃ dṛṣṭyā samayaiva sa paśyati //MU_5,29.29//
GSP27moksop_u:22978: nāstam eti na codeti tatprajñā sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:22981: tanmanaś ciram ālokya bhogeṣu viratiṃ gatam //MU_5,29.31//
GSP27moksop_u:22983: ante viraktatāṃ prāptam upaśāntaṃ baḍer manaḥ //MU_5,29.32//
GSP27moksop_u:22985: baḍinā paridṛṣṭāni kva samāśvāsam etv asau //MU_5,29.33//
GSP27moksop_u:22989: anuśāsyam idaṃ rāma bahūn varṣagaṇān iha //MU_5,29.35//
GSP27moksop_u:22993: samprāptam āharan svastha ākāśa iva tiṣṭhati //MU_5,29.37//
GSP27moksop_u:22995: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya tvam apy abhyudito bhava //MU_5,29.38//
GSP27moksop_u:22998: dve cāṣṭau caiva varṣāṇāṃ koṭīr bhuktvā jagattrayam /
GSP27moksop_u:22999: ante vairasyam āpanno baḍir apy asurottamaḥ //MU_5,29.40//
GSP27moksop_u:23003: na kāścana tavātmīyā dūrāc chailaśilā iva //MU_5,29.42//
GSP27moksop_u:23006: cidādityo bhavān eva sarvatra jagati sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23007: kaḥ paras te ka ātmīyaḥ pariskhalasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,29.44//
GSP27moksop_u:23008: tvam ananto mahābāhus tvam ādyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23010: tvayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:23011: bodhe nityodite śuddhe sūtre maṇigaṇo yathā //MU_5,29.46//
GSP27moksop_u:23012: na jāyase na mriyase tvam ajaḥ puruṣo virāṭ /
GSP27moksop_u:23013: cic chuddho janmamaraṇabhrāntayo mā bhavantu te //MU_5,29.47//
GSP27moksop_u:23015: tṛṣṇām utsṛjya bhogānāṃ bhoktaiva bhava kevalam //MU_5,29.48//
GSP27moksop_u:23018: mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā vyarthaṃ sukhaduḥkhaiṣaṇā na te /
GSP27moksop_u:23020: pūrvam iṣṭam aniṣṭaṃ tvam aniṣṭaṃ ceṣṭam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:23023: tayā hṛdayavartinyā punar jantur na jāyate //MU_5,29.52//
GSP27moksop_u:23024: yeṣu yeṣu pradeśeṣu mano majjati bālavat /
GSP27moksop_u:23025: tebhyas tebhyas samuddhṛtya tad dhi tattve niveśayet //MU_5,29.53//
GSP27moksop_u:23031: na maurkhyād adhiko loke kaścid astīha duḥkhadaḥ //MU_5,29.56//
GSP27moksop_u:23035: na kṛto 'nugrahas tāvan na vicārodayo bhavet //MU_5,29.58//
GSP27moksop_u:23037: nātmā prakaṭatām eti yāvan na svam avekṣaṇam //MU_5,29.59//
GSP27moksop_u:23038: tvam ātmany ātmanā rāma prasāde samavasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23044: yad upagacchasi pāsi nihaṃsi vā pibasi valgasi cinmaya vardhase /
GSP27moksop_u:23045: tad asi tena tavāstu mahāmune vigatabodhakalaṅkaviśaṅkitā //MU_5,29.63//
GSP27moksop_u:23050: śṛṇu daityeśvaras siddhaḥ prahlādas svātmanā yathā //MU_5,30.1//
GSP27moksop_u:23058: kālena suṣuve putrān aṅkurān iva mādhavaḥ //MU_5,30.5//
GSP27moksop_u:23061: prahlādo nāma bhagavān pradhānātmā babhūva ha /
GSP27moksop_u:23062: teṣāṃ madhye mahārhāṇāṃ maṇīnām iva kaustubhaḥ //MU_5,30.7//
GSP27moksop_u:23091: dudruvur dānavaughās te dikṣv alaṃ maṣakā iva /
GSP27moksop_u:23098: dagdhaṃ svaṃ deśam ājagmus saraś śuṣkam ivāṇḍajāḥ //MU_5,30.25//
GSP27moksop_u:23102: śanair āśvāsayām āsur mṛtaśiṣṭaṃ svakaṃ janam //MU_5,30.27//
GSP27moksop_u:23104: śokopataptamanaso 'suranāyakās te dagdhadrumā iva nirastavikāsam āsan //MU_5,30.28//
GSP27moksop_u:23110: ko 'nv asmākam upāyas syād ya evehāsurāṅkuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23111: tīkṣṇāgro jāyate taṃ taṃ bhuṅkte śākhāmṛgo hariḥ //MU_5,31.2//
GSP27moksop_u:23113: sthirā babhūvur udbhinnāḥ padmā iva himācale //MU_5,31.3//
GSP27moksop_u:23121: surair viṣaya ākrānto mṛgair iva mahāvanam //MU_5,31.7//
GSP27moksop_u:23123: bāndhavā na virājante padmāḥ pluṣṭadalā iva //MU_5,31.8//
GSP27moksop_u:23129: devavad dainyam āyātāḥ kim asādhyam aho vidheḥ //MU_5,31.11//
GSP27moksop_u:23131: vadhvas trasyanti vidhvastā mṛgyo grāmagatā iva //MU_5,31.12//
GSP27moksop_u:23137: adya tv asurabandīnāṃ surair ālokyate mukham //MU_5,31.15//
GSP27moksop_u:23145: punar merau sthitiṃ yātā mañjarya iva pādape //MU_5,31.19//
GSP27moksop_u:23148: pūrvaṃ yair eva mattātaś cāmarair upavījitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23149: sahasranayanas svarge kaṣṭaṃ tair eva vījyate //MU_5,31.21//
GSP27moksop_u:23153: na kadācana tapyante himādrer iva sānavaḥ //MU_5,31.23//
GSP27moksop_u:23167: dānavān bādhate śakro bālakān iva markaṭaḥ //MU_5,31.30//
GSP27moksop_u:23173: yo na bhīta idānīṃ sa bhayam eṣyati kā kathā //MU_5,31.33//
GSP27moksop_u:23174: upāyam ekam evemaṃ harer ākramaṇe sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:23177: sa eva śaraṇaṃ devo gatir astīha nānyathā //MU_5,31.35//
GSP27moksop_u:23178: na tasmād adhikaḥ kaścid asti lokatrayāntare /
GSP27moksop_u:23180: tasmān nimeṣād ārabhya nārāyaṇam ajaṃ sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:23183: nāpaiti mama hṛtkośād ākāśād iva mārutaḥ //MU_5,31.38//
GSP27moksop_u:23184: harir āśā harir vyoma harir urvī harir jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:23185: ayaṃ harir ameyātmā jāto harimayo hy aham //MU_5,31.39//
GSP27moksop_u:23186: aviṣṇuḥ pūjayan viṣṇuṃ na pūjāphalabhāg bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:23187: viṣṇur bhūtvā yajed viṣṇum ayaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,31.40//
GSP27moksop_u:23201: jayā sphurati me pārśve latā kalpataror iva //MU_5,31.47//
GSP27moksop_u:23206: ayaṃ mama kare śaṅkhaḥ pāñcajanyas sphuraddhvaniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23207: mūrtaṃ kham iva śabdātma kṣīroda iva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_5,31.50//
GSP27moksop_u:23218: imāny aham anantāni jaganti jaṭhare ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:23220: imau mahī me caraṇāv idaṃ me gaganaṃ śiraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23221: idaṃ vapur me trijagad imā me kukṣayo diśaḥ //MU_5,31.57//
GSP27moksop_u:23230: ime te taijasīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ mamāgrasthās surāsurāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23231: na śaknuvanti saṃsodḥuṃ cakṣurmandāḥ prabhām iva //MU_5,31.62//
GSP27moksop_u:23241: prahlāda iti sañcintya kṛtvā nārāyaṇīṃ tanum /
GSP27moksop_u:23251: tata enaṃ mahādevaṃ pūjayiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23273: bhakṣyair bhojyais tathā pānair lehyaiḥ peyaiś ca picchilaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23285: tatas tataḥ prabhṛty eva prahlādaḥ parameśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:23286: tathaiva pratyahaṃ bhaktyā pūjayām āsa pūrṇayā //MU_5,32.23//
GSP27moksop_u:23287: atha tasmin pure daityās tataḥ prabhṛti vaiṣṇavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23288: sarva evābhavan bhavyā rājā hy ācārakāraṇam //MU_5,32.24//
GSP27moksop_u:23289: jagāma vārttā gaganaṃ devalokam atho harim /
GSP27moksop_u:23290: viṣṇor dveṣaṃ parityajya bhaktā daityās sthitā iti //MU_5,32.25//
GSP27moksop_u:23292: gṛhītā vaiṣṇavī bhaktir daityaiḥ kim iti rāghava //MU_5,32.26//
GSP27moksop_u:23295: tatraitaṃ daityavṛttāntaṃ kathayām āsur asya te /
GSP27moksop_u:23298: kim etad bhagavan daityā viruddhā ye sadaiva te /
GSP27moksop_u:23299: te hi tvanmayatāṃ yātā māyeyam iti bhāvyate //MU_5,32.29//
GSP27moksop_u:23302: prākṛto guṇavāñ jāta ity eṣā bhagavan kathā /
GSP27moksop_u:23304: nopapannaṃ hi yad yatra tatra tan na virājate /
GSP27moksop_u:23306: yo yo yādṛgguṇo jantus sa tām evaiti saṃsthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:23307: sadṛśeṣv apy ajeṣu śvā na manye ramate kvacit //MU_5,32.33//
GSP27moksop_u:23308: na tathā duḥkhayanty aṅge majjantyo vajrasūcayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23311: tad eva rājate tatra jale 'mbhojaṃ na tu sthale //MU_5,32.35//
GSP27moksop_u:23313: varāko dānavas tucchajātir bhaktiḥ kva vaiṣṇavī //MU_5,32.36//
GSP27moksop_u:23314: kamalinī paruṣoṣarabhūgatā sukhayatīha yathā na durāśrayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23315: danusuto 'pi hi mādhavabhaktimān iti kathā na tatheśa sukhāya naḥ //MU_5,32.37//
GSP27moksop_u:23322: vibudhā mā viṣaṇṇās stha prahlādo bhaktimān iti /
GSP27moksop_u:23326: guṇavān nirguṇo jāta ity anarthakramaṃ viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23327: nirguṇo guṇavāñ jāta ity āhus siddhidaṃ kramam //MU_5,33.4//
GSP27moksop_u:23335: prahlādaṃ prati gīrvāṇās tatas snigdhatvam āyayuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23336: mahānto yatra nodvignās tatra viśvāsavan manaḥ //MU_5,33.8//
GSP27moksop_u:23338: manasā karmaṇā vācā prahlādo bhaktimān iti //MU_5,33.9//
GSP27moksop_u:23341: nābhyanandad asau bhogapūgaṃ śuṣkam iva drumam /
GSP27moksop_u:23342: na cāramata kāntāsu mṛgo marumahīṣv iva //MU_5,33.11//
GSP27moksop_u:23344: nājāyata ratis tasya dṛśye sthala ivābjinī //MU_5,33.12//
GSP27moksop_u:23348: cetaḥ kevalam asyāsīd dolāyām iva yojitam //MU_5,33.14//
GSP27moksop_u:23359: aśaraṇaśaraṇaṃ śaraṇyam īśaṃ harim ajam īśvaram acyutaṃ prapadye //MU_5,33.19//
GSP27moksop_u:23367: jaḍataram ajaḍaṃ cidātmatattvaṃ jagadakhilārtiharaṃ hariṃ prapadye //MU_5,33.23//
GSP27moksop_u:23375: iti guṇabahulābhir vāgbhir abhyarcito 'sau harir asuravināśaś śrīniṣaṇṇāṃsadeśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23376: jalada iva mayūraṃ prītimān prīyamāṇaṃ kuvalayadaladehaḥ pratyuvācāsurendram //MU_5,33.27//
GSP27moksop_u:23384: yad udāratamaṃ vetsi tad evādiśa deva me //MU_5,34.2//
GSP27moksop_u:23395: vicāravān eva bhavān bhavatv iti bhavāriṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:23397: kim ahaṃ nāma tāvat syāṃ yo 'smin bhuvanaḍambare /
GSP27moksop_u:23398: vacmi gacchāmi tiṣṭhāmi prayate cāharāmi ca //MU_5,34.8//
GSP27moksop_u:23400: yad bāhyaṃ jaḍam atyantaṃ tat syāṃ katham ahaṃ kila //MU_5,34.9//
GSP27moksop_u:23401: asann abhyutthito mūkaḥ pavanais sphurati kṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:23410: kevale draṣṭari kṣīṇaṃ rūpaṃ nāham acetanam //MU_5,34.14//
GSP27moksop_u:23417: ā idānīṃ smṛtaṃ satyam etat tad akhilaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23427: asāv eva hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva jāgratām /
GSP27moksop_u:23430: uṣṇo 'rkaś śiśiraś candro ghano 'drir vidrutaṃ payaḥ //MU_5,34.24//
GSP27moksop_u:23434: etat kāraṇam ādyaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ nāsya vidyate //MU_5,34.26//
GSP27moksop_u:23436: etasmāj jagad utpannam idaṃ śaityaṃ himād iva //MU_5,34.27//
GSP27moksop_u:23438: sate sakṛdvibhātāya mahyam asmai namo namaḥ //MU_5,34.28//
GSP27moksop_u:23440: guṇabhūtāni bhūteśe tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca //MU_5,34.29//
GSP27moksop_u:23442: tat tad bhavati sarvatra netarat sad api sthitam //MU_5,34.30//
GSP27moksop_u:23443: yac citā kalitaṃ kiñcit tad āpnoti nijaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:23444: yac citā kalitaṃ neha tat sad apy astam āgatam //MU_5,34.31//
GSP27moksop_u:23446: jāgatyo vipulādarśe hy asmin vyomani bimbitāḥ //MU_5,34.32//
GSP27moksop_u:23448: etat tad dṛśyate sadbhiḥ paraṃ vyometi tanmayaiḥ //MU_5,34.33//
GSP27moksop_u:23449: etad vṛddhaṃ vṛddhimati kṣayi kṣayiṇi jāgate /
GSP27moksop_u:23450: padārthe sad asac cāpi pratibimbārkavat sthitam //MU_5,34.34//
GSP27moksop_u:23453: asmād iyam udety uccais saṃsāraracanā calā /
GSP27moksop_u:23459: asya tasya mamemāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:23477: mayīdam arpyate sarvaṃ sattāṃ māṃ prāpya gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:23478: matparityaktam etac ca sad apy eva na kiñcana //MU_5,34.48//
GSP27moksop_u:23479: mayi sphāre cidādarśe pratibimbaṃ yad āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:23480: tad asti netarat tasmān matto 'nyan neha vidyate //MU_5,34.49//
GSP27moksop_u:23481: kusumeṣv aham āmodaḥ padmapattreṣv ahaṃ chaviḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23482: chaviṣv ahaṃ rūpakalā rūpeṣv anubhavo 'py aham //MU_5,34.50//
GSP27moksop_u:23483: yad yat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:23489: ghṛtaṃ yathāntaḥ payasi rasaśaktir yathā jale /
GSP27moksop_u:23491: idaṃ jagat trikālasthaṃ citi mayy eva saṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:23494: sarvasthas sarvadhartā ca virāṭ samrāḍ ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,34.56//
GSP27moksop_u:23496: aprārthitaṃ me samprāptaṃ jagadrājyam idaṃ tatam //MU_5,34.57//
GSP27moksop_u:23497: aho nu vitatātmāsmi na māmy ātmātmanātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:23499: nātmany antam avāpnomi svacche 'ntas svodite svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:23502: gajo bilva ivāsyāṃ me na māti vipulaṃ vapuḥ //MU_5,34.60//
GSP27moksop_u:23504: prasaraty eva me rūpam adyāpi na nivartate //MU_5,34.61//
GSP27moksop_u:23505: ayaṃ nāmāham ity antaḥ kuto niravalambanā /
GSP27moksop_u:23507: bhavān ayam ahaṃ cāyam iti mithyaiva vibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23508: ko dehaḥ ko 'py adeho vāpy apāravapuṣaś citaḥ //MU_5,34.63//
GSP27moksop_u:23518: prāptaḥ prāpto mayātmāyaṃ jīvāmi ca jayāmi ca //MU_5,34.68//
GSP27moksop_u:23524: ajñena santarpayatā kiṃ nāma guruṇā kṛtam //MU_5,34.71//
GSP27moksop_u:23526: kiṃ nāma prāpad ucitaṃ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ kila //MU_5,34.72//
GSP27moksop_u:23529: na kiñcid yena samprāptaṃ tenedaṃ paramāmṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:23531: tyaktāmitapado mūrkho mitam eti na paṇḍitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23532: uṣṭro hi tyaktasulataḥ kaṇṭakaṃ yāti netaraḥ //MU_5,34.75//
GSP27moksop_u:23533: parāṃ dṛṣṭim imāṃ tyaktvā dagdharājye rameta kaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23535: mūrkhā eva hi te sarve babhūvur me pitāmahāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23536: imāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ parityajya ye ratā rājyasaṅkaṭe //MU_5,34.77//
GSP27moksop_u:23537: kva phullā nandanasthalyaḥ kva dagdhā marubhūmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23538: kvemā bodhadṛśaś śāntāḥ kva bhogeṣv ātmabuddhayaḥ //MU_5,34.78//
GSP27moksop_u:23539: na kiñcid asti trailokye yad rājyam abhivāñchyate /
GSP27moksop_u:23540: sarvaṃ cāsty eva cittattve tat kasmān nānubhūyate //MU_5,34.79//
GSP27moksop_u:23542: sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvatas sādhu labhyate //MU_5,34.80//
GSP27moksop_u:23545: paramā pūrṇatā śārvī jayalakṣmīś ca vaiṣṇavī /
GSP27moksop_u:23575: bhāvena bhāvam āśritya bhāvas tyajati duḥkhitām /
GSP27moksop_u:23576: prekṣya bhāvam abhāvena bhāvas tyajati tuṣṭatām //MU_5,34.97//
GSP27moksop_u:23579: yāti vācām agamyatvād asattām iva śāśvatīm /
GSP27moksop_u:23581: bhavaty ātmā tathā brahma nakiñcic cākhilaṃ ca vā /
GSP27moksop_u:23584: na samyak paśyatīdaṃ cid dṛṣṭiḥ paṭalinī yathā //MU_5,34.101//
GSP27moksop_u:23585: īhānīhāmayair antar yā cid āvalitā malaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23586: sā hi notpatituṃ śaktā pāśabaddheva pakṣiṇī //MU_5,34.102//
GSP27moksop_u:23592: varākās tena te naṣṭā maṣakāḥ kuhareṣv iva //MU_5,34.105//
GSP27moksop_u:23593: ajñāsyan yadi te tattvaṃ bhogaduḥkhārthinas tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23604: uddhṛto 'si vikalpebhyo yo 'si so 'si namo 'stu te //MU_5,34.111//
GSP27moksop_u:23605: mahyaṃ tubhyam anantāya tubhyaṃ mahyaṃ śivātmane /
GSP27moksop_u:23607: gataghanam iva pūrṇam indubimbaṃ gatakalanāvaraṇaṃ svam eva rūpam /
GSP27moksop_u:23608: svavapuṣi muditaṃ svayaṃ svasaṃsthaṃ svayam uditaṃ svarasaṃ svayaṃ namāmi //MU_5,34.113//
GSP27moksop_u:23613: ātmaivāyaṃ idaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiñcij jagatīgatam //MU_5,35.1//
GSP27moksop_u:23618: tiṣṭhann api hi nāsīno gacchann api na gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:23619: śānto 'pi vyavahārasthaḥ kurvann api na lipyate //MU_5,35.4//
GSP27moksop_u:23625: sthāṇor apy akriyo nityam ākāśād apy alepakaḥ //MU_5,35.7//
GSP27moksop_u:23626: manāṃsi kṣobhayaty eṣa pallavān iva mārutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23627: vāhayaty akṣapaṅktiṃ vā svāśvālīm iva sārathiḥ //MU_5,35.8//
GSP27moksop_u:23630: eṣa eva sadānveṣyas stutyo dhyātavya eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:23637: dhanānām īśvarasyeva smayo garvo 'tha vā bhavet //MU_5,35.13//
GSP27moksop_u:23638: āmoda iva puṣpeṣu tailaṃ tilakaṇeṣv iva /
GSP27moksop_u:23641: na jñāyate cirād dṛṣṭa iṣṭabandhur ivāgragaḥ //MU_5,35.15//
GSP27moksop_u:23645: āyānti dṛṣṭayas tās tā yābhir bandho vilīyate //MU_5,35.17//
GSP27moksop_u:23647: na kṛntanti manāṃsy āśā gṛhāṇīva durākhavaḥ //MU_5,35.18//
GSP27moksop_u:23648: asmin dṛṣṭe jagad dṛṣṭaṃ śrute 'smin sakalaṃ śrutam /
GSP27moksop_u:23649: spṛṣṭe cāsmiñ jagat spṛṣṭaṃ sthite 'smin saṃsthitaṃ jagat //MU_5,35.19//
GSP27moksop_u:23652: vicaraty eṣa lokeṣu dīpa eva jagatsthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:23653: vilasaty eṣa bhogeṣu prasphuraty eṣa vastuṣu //MU_5,35.21//
GSP27moksop_u:23655: sthitas sarveṣu deheṣu tiktatvaṃ mariceṣv iva //MU_5,35.22//
GSP27moksop_u:23658: eṣa śūnyatvam ākāśe spanda eṣa sadāgatau /
GSP27moksop_u:23659: prakāśaś caiṣa tejassu payasy eṣa rasaḥ paraḥ //MU_5,35.24//
GSP27moksop_u:23660: kāṭhinyam avanāv eṣa auṣṇyam eṣa hutāśane /
GSP27moksop_u:23661: śaityam eṣa niśānāthe sattā caiṣa jagadgaṇe //MU_5,35.25//
GSP27moksop_u:23662: maṣīpiṇḍe yathā kārṣṇyaṃ śauklyaṃ himakaṇe yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:23663: yathā puṣpeṣu saugandhyaṃ dehe dehapatis tathā //MU_5,35.26//
GSP27moksop_u:23664: yathā sarvagatā sattā kālas sarvagato yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:23665: yathā sarvagataṃ vyoma vibhus sarvagatas tathā //MU_5,35.27//
GSP27moksop_u:23668: nityas so 'yam ahaṃ devo devānām avabodhakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23669: svayam ātmāsmi me nāsti kalanāvit kiletarā //MU_5,35.29//
GSP27moksop_u:23672: sukhaduḥkhaśriyo dehe mā patantu patantu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:23673: tumbakopari dhārāś ca kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā //MU_5,35.31//
GSP27moksop_u:23676: sambandhaḥ ko nu naḥ kāmair bhāvābhāvair athendriyaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23677: kena sambadhyate vyoma kena vā gṛhyate manaḥ //MU_5,35.33//
GSP27moksop_u:23678: śarīre śatadhā yāte khaṇḍanā kā śarīriṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23679: kumbhe rugṇe kṣate kṣīṇe kumbhākāśasya kā kṣatiḥ //MU_5,35.34//
GSP27moksop_u:23681: jaḍe tasmin kṣate bodhāt kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā //MU_5,35.35//
GSP27moksop_u:23682: sukhaduḥkhamayī yasya vāsanā tan mano mama /
GSP27moksop_u:23683: abhavat pūrvam adyaikā sampannā nanu nirvṛtiḥ //MU_5,35.36//
GSP27moksop_u:23685: anyaḥ paśyaty aho maurkhyaṃ kasyeyaṃ khalu cakrikā //MU_5,35.37//
GSP27moksop_u:23686: bhuṅkte prakṛtir ādatte mano dehasya saṅkaṭaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23687: draṣṭātmā maurkhyam astīha na kiñcit keva me kṣatiḥ //MU_5,35.38//
GSP27moksop_u:23688: na me bhogasthitau vāñchā na ca bhogavivarjane /
GSP27moksop_u:23689: yad āyāti tad āyātu yat prayāti prayātu tat //MU_5,35.39//
GSP27moksop_u:23691: sukhaduḥkhāny upāyāntu yāntu vāpy aham eṣu kaḥ //MU_5,35.40//
GSP27moksop_u:23692: vāsanā vividhā dehe tv astaṃ vodayam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:23693: prayāntu nāham etāsu na caitā mama kāścana //MU_5,35.41//
GSP27moksop_u:23701: puṇyatām alam āyātaḥ praphulta iva rājate //MU_5,35.45//
GSP27moksop_u:23705: tat prāptam adhunā yena na prāpyam iha śiṣyate //MU_5,35.47//
GSP27moksop_u:23710: stutyā praṇatyā vijñaptyā śamena niyamena ca /
GSP27moksop_u:23711: labdho 'yaṃ bhagavān ātmā dṛṣṭaś cādhigatas sphuṭam //MU_5,35.50//
GSP27moksop_u:23713: svabhāvo bhagavān ātmā viṣṇur brahma sanātanam //MU_5,35.51//
GSP27moksop_u:23722: svayam eva tvayedānīṃ kriyāśaktyā svayaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:23725: na paśyāmi vibho dīpe jvalite timiraṃ yathā //MU_5,35.57//
GSP27moksop_u:23727: dīpasyeva praśāntasya na vedmi gatim īśvara //MU_5,35.58//
GSP27moksop_u:23731: śānte tiṣṭhāmy atisvastho nirgonāsa iva drumaḥ //MU_5,35.60//
GSP27moksop_u:23736: pramārjite 'ham ity asmin pade sārthe vicārataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23737: ko mohaḥ kāni duḥkhāni kāḥ kadāśāḥ ka ātapaḥ //MU_5,35.63//
GSP27moksop_u:23739: bhittāv eva pravartante citrehā na nabhastale //MU_5,35.64//
GSP27moksop_u:23745: mahyam ānandasarase tubhyam ātman namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.67//
GSP27moksop_u:23749: ānandāmbudhaye tubhyaṃ mahyam ātman namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.69//
GSP27moksop_u:23751: mahyam unmānasāyātmaṃs tubhyam antar namo namaḥ //MU_5,35.70//
GSP27moksop_u:23761: chinnam antar mayā taptam ayaseva balād ayaḥ //MU_5,35.75//
GSP27moksop_u:23762: indriyair indriyaṃ chittvā chittvā ca manasā manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23763: ahaṅkṛtim ahaṅkṛtyā chittvā śeṣo jayāmy aham //MU_5,35.76//
GSP27moksop_u:23764: bhāvena bhāvam āmṛdya cchittvā tṛṣṇām atṛṣṇayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23767: bhāvena galite bhāve svasthas tiṣṭhāmi kevalaḥ //MU_5,35.78//
GSP27moksop_u:23780: etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ ko 'bhūvaṃ cittam īdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:23782: adyāham asmi jāto 'yam aham adya mahāmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23784: dṛṣṭo 'yam ātmā bhagavān antaś cādhigato mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23786: gatāspadaṃ gatamananaṃ gataiṣaṇaṃ tiraskṛtaṃ nipuṇam ahaṅkṛtibhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:23787: nirīhitaṃ vyapagatarāgarañjanaṃ vikautukaṃ praśamam idaṃ gataṃ manaḥ //MU_5,35.88//
GSP27moksop_u:23789: gatāḥ kṣayaṃ samadhigato maheśvaraś cidavyayo vyapagatacittam antare //MU_5,35.89//
GSP27moksop_u:23794: diṣṭyā labdho 'si bhagavan namas te 'stu cidātmane //MU_5,36.1//
GSP27moksop_u:23796: ko 'nyas syād bhagavan bandhus tvadṛte bhuvanatraye //MU_5,36.2//
GSP27moksop_u:23797: haṃsi pāsi dadāsi tvaṃ stauṣi yāsi vivalgasi /
GSP27moksop_u:23798: ayaṃ prāpto 'si dṛṣṭo 'si kiṃ karoṣi kva gacchasi //MU_5,36.3//
GSP27moksop_u:23800: sarvatra lakṣyase nityam adhunā kva palāyase //MU_5,36.4//
GSP27moksop_u:23802: adūram adya sampannaṃ diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si bāndhava //MU_5,36.5//
GSP27moksop_u:23803: namas te kṛtakṛtyāya kartre hartre namo 'stu te /
GSP27moksop_u:23816: na prāptas tvaṃ tvayā yena kiñcid āsāditaṃ bhavet //MU_5,36.12//
GSP27moksop_u:23819: devāyam adya labdho 'si dṛṣṭo 'sy adhigato 'si ca /
GSP27moksop_u:23820: samprāpto 'si gṛhīto 'si namas te 'stu na mucyase //MU_5,36.14//
GSP27moksop_u:23822: devo darśanarūpeṇa kathaṃ so 'ntar na dṛśyate //MU_5,36.15//
GSP27moksop_u:23823: yas tvakpuṣpe spṛśan sparśagandhaṃ tailaṃ tile yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:23824: sparśam antaḥ karoty eṣa sa kathaṃ nānubhūyate //MU_5,36.16//
GSP27moksop_u:23826: romāñcaṃ janayaty aṅge sa dūrasthaḥ kathaṃ bhavet //MU_5,36.17//
GSP27moksop_u:23828: svadante yasya vastūni svadate sa na kasya vā //MU_5,36.18//
GSP27moksop_u:23830: ya ālepayati prītyā kasyāsau na mukhe sthitaḥ //MU_5,36.19//
GSP27moksop_u:23832: yo gītas sa kathaṃ hy ātmā vijñāto yāti vismṛtim //MU_5,36.20//
GSP27moksop_u:23833: saiveha deva bhogālī subhagāpīyam adya me /
GSP27moksop_u:23834: antar na svadate svacche tvayi dṛṣṭe parāpare //MU_5,36.21//
GSP27moksop_u:23837: tvayaite guravaś śailās tvayaite dyucarā dhṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23839: diṣṭyā mattām asi prāpto diṣṭyā tvattām ahaṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23840: ahaṃ tvaṃ tvam ahaṃ deva diṣṭyā bhedo 'sti nāvayoḥ //MU_5,36.24//
GSP27moksop_u:23841: ahaṃ tvam iti śabdābhyāṃ paryāyābhyāṃ mahātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23842: tava vā mama vā sādho sampṛktābhyāṃ namo namaḥ //MU_5,36.25//
GSP27moksop_u:23845: mayy ātmani same svacche sākṣibhūte nirākṛtau /
GSP27moksop_u:23851: ayaṃ saṃvidvapur ahaṃ na kvacin na kṛtāspadaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23853: cirād aham ahaṃ jātas svātmalābhaś cirād ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:23854: cirād upaśamaṃ yāmi kalpasyānte jagad yathā //MU_5,36.31//
GSP27moksop_u:23857: sarvātītāya sarvāya tubhyaṃ mahyaṃ namo namaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23858: tebhyo 'pi ca namo 'stv eva ye tvāṃ māṃ pravadanti vā //MU_5,36.33//
GSP27moksop_u:23862: tile tailam ivāsmiṃs tvaṃ sarvatra vapuṣi sthitaḥ //MU_5,36.35//
GSP27moksop_u:23863: haṃsi pāsi dadāsi tvam avasphūrjasi valgasi /
GSP27moksop_u:23873: jahi mānaṃ madaṃ kopaṃ kāluṣyaṃ krūratāṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:23876: ko 'haṃ kiṃ tad babhūveti hasa muktācchaṭāsitam //MU_5,36.42//
GSP27moksop_u:23877: te prayātās samārambhā gatās te dagdhavāsarāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23880: na duḥkhair gṛhyase nāpi sukhair vyoma karair iva //MU_5,36.44//
GSP27moksop_u:23884: avabhāsakaro nityaṃ bahir antaś ca bhāskaraḥ //MU_5,36.46//
GSP27moksop_u:23891: dehapuṣpe tvam āmodo dehendau tv amṛtāmṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:23892: rasas tvaṃ dehaviṭape śaityaṃ dehahime bhavān //MU_5,36.50//
GSP27moksop_u:23894: tvam antar asya dehasya dāruṇy agnir iva sthitaḥ //MU_5,36.51//
GSP27moksop_u:23895: tvam apām uttamāsvādaḥ prākāśyaṃ tejasām api /
GSP27moksop_u:23896: avagantā tvam arthānāṃ tvaṃ bhāsām avabhāsakaḥ //MU_5,36.52//
GSP27moksop_u:23897: spandas tvaṃ sarvavāyūnāṃ tvaṃ manohastino madaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23898: prajñānalaśikhāyās tvaṃ prākāśyaṃ taikṣṇyam eva ca //MU_5,36.53//
GSP27moksop_u:23900: dīpavat punar anyatra samudeti kuto 'pi sā //MU_5,36.54//
GSP27moksop_u:23903: bhavān ayam ayaṃ cāhaṃ tvaṃ śabdair evamādibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:23904: svayam evātmanātmānaṃ līlayā stauṣi vakṣi ca //MU_5,36.56//
GSP27moksop_u:23906: yathā saṃlakṣyate vyomni tathā tvaṃ bhūtadṛṣṭibhiḥ //MU_5,36.57//
GSP27moksop_u:23912: tvayā tattvaṃ yathā paktrā māṃsānāṃ svādavedanam //MU_5,36.60//
GSP27moksop_u:23913: vidyamānāpi vastuśrīr na sthitā tvayi na sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:23915: sad apīha na sattāyai vastu nākalitaṃ tvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23917: luṭhati tvāṃ vinā dehaḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaḥ kṣitau /
GSP27moksop_u:23918: sann apy asattayaivātto yāmāsv iva raviṃ vinā //MU_5,36.63//
GSP27moksop_u:23920: prākāśyam āsādya yathā tamas tejo 'tha vā himam //MU_5,36.64//
GSP27moksop_u:23924: te tamāṃsīva dīpasya dṛṣṭāv eva vrajanty alam //MU_5,36.66//
GSP27moksop_u:23929: bhaṅguratvād iha sthātuṃ kālaṃ nāṇum api kṣamā /
GSP27moksop_u:23935: kṣaṇam apy asthiraṃ vastu kathaṃ kāryakaraṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:23940: sthitas san naiva gṛhṇāsi na jahāsi samasthite //MU_5,36.74//
GSP27moksop_u:23941: avivekini yo 'si tvaṃ sa bhavātman yadṛcchayā /
GSP27moksop_u:23947: jaya jāta jayājāta jaya kṣata jayākṣata /
GSP27moksop_u:23948: jaya bhāva jayābhāva jaya jeya jayājaya //MU_5,36.78//
GSP27moksop_u:23950: jayī jayāmi jīvāmi namo mahyaṃ namo 'stu te //MU_5,36.79//
GSP27moksop_u:23951: tvayi sthite mayi vigatāmayātmani svasaṃsthitau vyapagatarāgarañjane /
GSP27moksop_u:23952: kva bandhavaḥ kva ca vipadaḥ kva sampado bhavābhavau kva śamam upaimi śāśvatam //MU_5,36.80//
GSP27moksop_u:23959: śailād iva samutkīrṇo babhau svapadam āsthitaḥ //MU_5,37.2//
GSP27moksop_u:23960: tathātha tiṣṭhatas tasya kālo bahutaro yayau /
GSP27moksop_u:23961: sve gṛhe bhuvanasthasya meror iva suradviṣaḥ //MU_5,37.3//
GSP27moksop_u:23998: dhiyā vilokayām āsa kadācij jāgatīṃ sthitim //MU_5,38.2//
GSP27moksop_u:24008: kaṣṭaṃ sṛṣṭir iyaṃ prāyo nirdaityatvam upāgatā //MU_5,38.7//
GSP27moksop_u:24011: mokṣākhyaṃ vigatadvandvaṃ tato yāsyati tat padam /
GSP27moksop_u:24017: ākalpāntaṃ tribhuvanaṃ yad idaṃ nirmitaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:24018: layam eṣyaty akāle tat tāpe himakaṇo yathā //MU_5,38.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24019: kim evam asminn ābhāse vilīya kṣayam āgate /
GSP27moksop_u:24023: akāṇḍa evam evaṃ hi jagaty upaśamaṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:24027: tasmād rasātalaṃ gatvā yathāvat sthāpayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:24028: sve krame dānavādhīśam ṛtuḥ punar iva drumam //MU_5,38.17//
GSP27moksop_u:24029: vinā prahlādam atha ced itaraṃ dānaveśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:24030: karomi tad asau manye devān utsādayiṣyati //MU_5,38.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24031: prahlādasya tv ayaṃ dehaḥ paścimaḥ pāvano mahān /
GSP27moksop_u:24032: ākalpam iha vastavyaṃ dehenānena tena ca //MU_5,38.19//
GSP27moksop_u:24033: evaṃ hi niyatir daivī niścitā pārameśvarī /
GSP27moksop_u:24035: tasmāt tam eva gatvāśu daityendraṃ bodhayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:24039: na vinaśyati sargo 'yam evaṃ saha surāsuraiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24040: bhaviṣyati ca nādvandvaṃ tan me krīḍā bhaviṣyati //MU_5,38.23//
GSP27moksop_u:24041: sargakṣayodayāv etau susamau mama yady api /
GSP27moksop_u:24042: tathāpīdaṃ yathāsaṃsthaṃ bhavatv anyena kiṃ mama //MU_5,38.24//
GSP27moksop_u:24043: bhāvābhāveṣu yat tulyaṃ tannāśe tatsthitau ca vā /
GSP27moksop_u:24044: yaḥ prayatnaḥ kubuddhitvāt tad vyomahananaṃ bhavet //MU_5,38.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24046: sthairyaṃ nayāmi saṃsāraṃ līlāṃ sampādayāmy aham //MU_5,38.26//
GSP27moksop_u:24047: asurapuram avāpya proddhatācāraghoraṃ kamalam iva vivasvān daityam udbodhayāmi /
GSP27moksop_u:24048: jagad idam akhilāsthaṃ sthairyam abhyānayāmi ghanavidhir iva śaile cañcalaṃ meghajālam //MU_5,38.27//
GSP27moksop_u:24052: iti sañcintya sarvātmā kṣīrodād rāma tatpuram /
GSP27moksop_u:24075: śanair ākramayām āsa gaṅgā sarvam ivārṇavam //MU_5,39.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24078: prāṇeṣu randhranavake pravṛtteṣv atha tasya cit /
GSP27moksop_u:24083: śanair babhūvatus tasya prātar nīle yathotpale //MU_5,39.16//
GSP27moksop_u:24087: tasmin prāṇavaśāt pūrṇe taraṅga iva vāriṇi //MU_5,39.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24090: tasminn avasare yāvad budhyasvety avadat prabhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24091: prabuddhas tāvad eṣo 'bhūd barhī ghanaravād iva //MU_5,39.20//
GSP27moksop_u:24094: sādho smara mahālakṣmīm ātmīyāṃ smara cākṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:24095: akāṇḍa eva kiṃ dehavirāmaḥ kriyate tvayā //MU_5,39.22//
GSP27moksop_u:24098: sthātavyam iha dehena kalpaṃ yāvad anena te /
GSP27moksop_u:24099: vayaṃ hi niyatiṃ vidmo yathābhūtām anindita //MU_5,39.24//
GSP27moksop_u:24103: vastavyaṃ sphuṭite kumbhe kumbhākāśena khe yathā //MU_5,39.26//
GSP27moksop_u:24107: na jagaj jvalitaṃ sādho tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.28//
GSP27moksop_u:24111: na sphuranti jagatkośe tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.30//
GSP27moksop_u:24113: kakubho na viśīryante tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.31//
GSP27moksop_u:24115: sthitaṃ jaraḍhajīmūtaṃ tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.32//
GSP27moksop_u:24117: kalpābhrāṇi na garjanti tanuṃ tyajasi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,39.33//
GSP27moksop_u:24120: ime vayam ime śailā bhūtānīmāny ayaṃ bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:24121: idaṃ jagad idaṃ vyoma mā deham avadhīraya //MU_5,39.35//
GSP27moksop_u:24124: kṛśo 'tiduḥkhī mūḍho 'ham etāś cānyāś ca bhāvanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24129: kugeham iva gargaṭyo maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.39//
GSP27moksop_u:24133: anarthaugho haraty uccair maraṇaṃ tasya rājate //MU_5,39.41//
GSP27moksop_u:24138: yo 'yaṃ dehaparityāgas tal loke maraṇaṃ smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:24139: na satā nāsatā tena kāraṇaṃ vedyavedinām //MU_5,39.44//
GSP27moksop_u:24142: yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate /
GSP27moksop_u:24143: yas samas sarvabhāveṣu jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.46//
GSP27moksop_u:24145: sākṣivat paśyatīdaṃ hi jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.47//
GSP27moksop_u:24149: yenālīnaṃ kṛtaṃ ceto jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.49//
GSP27moksop_u:24152: nāntas tuṣyati nodvegam eti yo viharann api /
GSP27moksop_u:24154: śuddhapakṣaś ca śuddhaś ca haṃsaughas saraso yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24155: yasmād guṇaugho niryāti jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.52//
GSP27moksop_u:24156: yasmiñ śrutipathaṃ yāte dṛṣṭe smṛtim upāgate /
GSP27moksop_u:24157: ānandaṃ yānti bhūtāni jīvitaṃ tasya śobhate //MU_5,39.53//
GSP27moksop_u:24158: yasyodayena hṛdayeṣu janāmbujāni jīvālimanti sakalāni vikāsavanti /
GSP27moksop_u:24159: tasyāvabhāti cirajīvitam akṣayendor āpūrṇateva danujeśvara netarasya //MU_5,39.54//
GSP27moksop_u:24163: sthairyaṃ dehasya dṛṣṭasya jīvitaṃ procyate budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24165: dvābhyām evāsi pakṣābhyām ābhyāṃ mukto mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:24166: kiṃ te maraṇam astīha kiṃ vā jīvitam asti te //MU_5,40.2//
GSP27moksop_u:24168: na tvaṃ jīvasi sarvajña mriyase na kadācana //MU_5,40.3//
GSP27moksop_u:24173: prabuddho jñātavastutvād eva tvam asi nāsi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:24176: ko dehaḥ ko 'py adehas te yaṃ gṛhṇāsi jahāsi vā //MU_5,40.7//
GSP27moksop_u:24177: samudetu vasanto vā vātu vā pralayānilaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24179: praluṭhatsv api śaileṣu kalpāgniṣu dahatsv api /
GSP27moksop_u:24181: sarvabhūtāni tiṣṭhantu samam eva prayāntu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:24182: naśyantu vātha vardhantām ātmātmany eva tiṣṭhati //MU_5,40.10//
GSP27moksop_u:24183: kṣīyate na kṣayaṃ prāpte vardhamāne na vardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:24184: na spandate spandamāne dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ //MU_5,40.11//
GSP27moksop_u:24185: dehasyāham ahaṃ deha iti kṣīṇe 'pi te bhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:24186: tyajāmi na tyajāmīti kiṃ mṛṣā kalanoditā //MU_5,40.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24187: idaṃ kṛtvā karomīdam idaṃ tyaktvedam āhare /
GSP27moksop_u:24188: iti tattvavidāṃ tāta saṅkalpās saṅkṣayaṃ gatāḥ //MU_5,40.13//
GSP27moksop_u:24189: prabuddhās sarvakartāraḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti vai navam /
GSP27moksop_u:24193: śānte kartṛtvabhoktṛtve śāntir eva hi śiṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:24194: prauḍhim abhyāgatā saiva muktir ity ucyate budhaiḥ //MU_5,40.16//
GSP27moksop_u:24195: prabuddhāś cinmayāś śuddhās sarvam ākramya saṃsthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24196: kiṃ tyaktaṃ parigṛhṇantu kiṃ gṛhītaṃ tyajantu vā //MU_5,40.17//
GSP27moksop_u:24198: hīnaḥ prameyāvayavaiḥ kiṃ gṛhṇātu jahātu kim //MU_5,40.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24201: tatra sthitās sadā santas tvādṛśāḥ puruṣottamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24205: na ramanti hi ramyeṣu svātmany ekagatāśayāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24206: nodvijante ca duḥkheṣu svātmany ekarasā yataḥ //MU_5,40.22//
GSP27moksop_u:24211: tvam ajitapadavīm upāgato 'ntaḥ kamalajavāsaram ekam eva bhuktvā /
GSP27moksop_u:24212: guṇagaṇakalitām ihaiva lakṣmīṃ vraja paramāspadam acyutaṃ mahātman //MU_5,40.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24221: ciram antar mayā deva dṛṣṭo 'sy amalayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:24222: punar bahir ayaṃ dṛṣṭyā diṣṭyā deveśa dṛśyase //MU_5,41.3//
GSP27moksop_u:24223: aham āsam anantāyām asyāṃ dṛśi maheśvara /
GSP27moksop_u:24225: na śokena na mohena na ca vairāgyacintayā /
GSP27moksop_u:24227: ekasmin vidyamāne hi kutaś śokaḥ kutaḥ kṣatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24228: kuto dehaḥ kva saṃsāraḥ kva sthitiḥ kva bhayābhaye //MU_5,41.6//
GSP27moksop_u:24230: evaṃ devāham avasaṃ vitate pāvane pade //MU_5,41.7//
GSP27moksop_u:24233: dehābhāve na duḥkhāni dehe duḥkhāni me sati /
GSP27moksop_u:24235: idaṃ sukham idaṃ duḥkham idaṃ nāstīdam asti me /
GSP27moksop_u:24236: iti dolāyitaṃ ceto mūḍham eva na paṇḍitam //MU_5,41.10//
GSP27moksop_u:24239: idaṃ tyājyam idaṃ grāhyam iti mithyā manobhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24240: nonmattatāṃ nayaty antar jñam ajñam iva durdhiyam //MU_5,41.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24244: kiṃ heyaṃ kim upādeyam iti yat tyajyate na vā //MU_5,41.14//
GSP27moksop_u:24248: evam āsam ahaṃ pūrvam adhunettham avasthitaḥ //MU_5,41.16//
GSP27moksop_u:24249: śamam ātmīyam āpannas sarvagātman satāṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:24250: karomy ahaṃ mahādeva tubhyaṃ yat parirocate //MU_5,41.17//
GSP27moksop_u:24251: tvam ayaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa pūjyas tāvaj jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:24252: tan mattaḥ prakṛtaprāptāṃ pūjām ādātum arhasi //MU_5,41.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24261: yāvad āśv abhiṣekaṃ te svayam eva dadāmy aham //MU_5,41.22//
GSP27moksop_u:24263: siddhās sādhyās suraughās te kurvantu tava maṅgalam //MU_5,41.23//
GSP27moksop_u:24275: yāvan merur dharā yāvad yāvac candrārkamaṇḍale /
GSP27moksop_u:24280: na gantavyas tvayodvegas svarge vā narake 'tha vā //MU_5,41.31//
GSP27moksop_u:24282: prakṛtaṃ kāryam ātiṣṭhaṃs tyaktavāsanam āssva bhoḥ //MU_5,41.32//
GSP27moksop_u:24284: bhāvābhāve samaṃ kāryaṃ kurvann iha na badhyase //MU_5,41.33//
GSP27moksop_u:24286: sarvaṃ sarvatra jānāsi kim anyad upadiśyate //MU_5,41.34//
GSP27moksop_u:24294: sveṣv eva yāntu viśvāsam aparasparam āhṛtāḥ //MU_5,41.38//
GSP27moksop_u:24296: danusuta vanitāvilāsaramyāṃ ciram ajitām upabhuṅkṣva rājyalakṣmīm //MU_5,41.39//
GSP27moksop_u:24310: ya etāṃ mānavā loke bahuduṣkṛtino 'pi hi /
GSP27moksop_u:24311: dhiyā vicārayiṣyanti te prāpsyanty acirāt padam //MU_5,42.6//
GSP27moksop_u:24313: yogavākyavicāreṇa ko na yāti paraṃ padam //MU_5,42.7//
GSP27moksop_u:24314: ajñānam ucyate pāpaṃ tad vicāreṇa naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:24325: naiṣaṇā tatsthitiṃ viddhi tvaṃ jīvanmuktatām iha //MU_5,42.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24336: harir ātmā hi bhūtānāṃ tasya yat pratibhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:24337: tat tathaiva bhavaty āśu sarvatrātmaiva kāraṇam //MU_5,42.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24341: sṛṣṭyarthaṃ vapur āttaṃ tad vāsudevīyam ātmanā //MU_5,42.20//
GSP27moksop_u:24349: prabādhate na dhīrāṃs tu yakṣī mantravato yathā //MU_5,42.24//
GSP27moksop_u:24350: ātmecchayaiva ghanatāṃ samupāgatāntar ātmecchayaiva tanutām upayāti kāle /
GSP27moksop_u:24356: nirvṛtās smaś śaśāṅkasya karair oṣadhayo yathā //MU_5,43.1//
GSP27moksop_u:24360: prahlādas tat kathaṃ buddho na mādhavavaraṃ vinā //MU_5,43.3//
GSP27moksop_u:24362: yad yad rāghava samprāptaṃ prahlādena mahātmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:24363: tat tad āsāditaṃ tena pauruṣād eva nānyataḥ //MU_5,43.4//
GSP27moksop_u:24364: ātmā nārāyaṇaś caiva na bhinnau tilatailavat /
GSP27moksop_u:24366: yo hi viṣṇus sa evātmā yo hy ātmā sa janārdanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24370: prahlādo hy ātmanaivaitaṃ varam arjitavān svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:24371: svayaṃ vicāraṃ kṛtavān svayaṃ vijitavān manaḥ //MU_5,43.8//
GSP27moksop_u:24380: yad yad āsādyate kiñcit kenacit kvacid eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:24383: saṃsārajaladhiṃ tīrtvā pāraṃ gaccha paraṃ padam //MU_5,43.14//
GSP27moksop_u:24385: mṛgapakṣigaṇaṃ kasmāt tad asau noddharaty ajaḥ //MU_5,43.15//
GSP27moksop_u:24386: guruś ced uddharaty ajñam ātmīyāt pauruṣād ṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:24388: na harer na guror nārthāt kiñcid āsādyate mahat /
GSP27moksop_u:24391: ātmanaḥ prāpyate yat tat prāpyate na jagattrayāt //MU_5,43.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24397: tadabhāve tu gauṇas syāt pūjyapūjāmayaḥ kramaḥ //MU_5,43.21//
GSP27moksop_u:24403: tasmin siddhe bhavān siddho no cet tvaṃ vanagardabhaḥ //MU_5,43.24//
GSP27moksop_u:24405: sa caiva kasmāt kriyate na svakasyaiva cetasaḥ //MU_5,43.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24407: taṃ parityajya ye yānti bahir viṣṇuṃ na te budhāḥ //MU_5,43.26//
GSP27moksop_u:24410: yo hi mukhyaṃ parityajya gauṇaṃ samanudhāvati /
GSP27moksop_u:24411: tyaktvā rasāyanaṃ siddhaṃ sādhyaṃ saṃsādhayaty asau //MU_5,43.28//
GSP27moksop_u:24412: yas tu vā sthitim evāsyām ātmajñānacamatkṛtau /
GSP27moksop_u:24419: āmram eva daśām eti sāhakārīṃ śanaiś śanaiḥ //MU_5,43.32//
GSP27moksop_u:24420: etad apy ātmanaivātmā phalam āpnoti bhāvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:24422: varam āpnoti yo vāpi viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24423: tena svasyaiva tat prāptaṃ phalam abhyāsaśākhinaḥ //MU_5,43.34//
GSP27moksop_u:24432: ākārabhāsuraṃ tyaktvā bāhyam āntaram apy ajam /
GSP27moksop_u:24435: sanmātram āsvādaya sarvasāraṃ pāraṃ paraṃ prāpsyasi janmanadyāḥ //MU_5,43.40//
GSP27moksop_u:24443: asty asmin vasudhāpīṭhe kosalā nāma maṇḍalam /
GSP27moksop_u:24445: tatrāsīd brāhmaṇaḥ kaścid guṇī gādhir iti śrutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24447: ā bālyāt praviraktena cetasā sa vyarājata /
GSP27moksop_u:24449: kim apy abhimataṃ kāryaṃ vinidhāya sa cetasi /
GSP27moksop_u:24450: bandhuvargād viniṣkramya tapas taptuṃ vanaṃ yayau //MU_5,44.6//
GSP27moksop_u:24451: utphullakamalaṃ tatra saraḥ prāpa sa viprarāṭ /
GSP27moksop_u:24468: imāṃ drakṣyasi māyāṃ tvaṃ tatas tyakṣyasi cety ajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24469: uktvā yayāv adṛśyatvaṃ gāndharvam iva pattanam //MU_5,44.14//
GSP27moksop_u:24470: gate viṣṇau samuttasthau jalāt sa brāhmaṇeśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24474: athāsya katicit tasmin divasāni yayur vane /
GSP27moksop_u:24477: cintayan vaiṣṇavaṃ vākyaṃ maharṣir iva mānase //MU_5,44.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24478: atha snānavidhāv antarjalam eṣa cakāra ha /
GSP27moksop_u:24491: āvṛtaṃ bandhubhiḥ khinnaiḥ kurarair iva pādapam //MU_5,44.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24502: maunaṃ dhyānam ivāpannaṃ paṅkād iva vinirmitam /
GSP27moksop_u:24516: tatra te jvalane dīpte cakrus taṃ bhasmasāc chavam /
GSP27moksop_u:24518: citiś caṭacaṭāsphoṭaiś śavam āśu dadāha tam /
GSP27moksop_u:24521: dantī virandhram iva veṇuvanaṃ samantād udvāntamedurarasaṃ dalayāṃ cakāra //MU_5,44.40//
GSP27moksop_u:24528: śvapacānāṃ striyo garbhe sthitam ātmānam ākulam //MU_5,45.2//
GSP27moksop_u:24534: itaś cetaś ca gacchantam utpīḍam iva yāmunam //MU_5,45.5//
GSP27moksop_u:24556: śanair jarjaratāṃ yātaṃ vṛṣṭihīnam iva sthalam //MU_5,45.16//
GSP27moksop_u:24558: saṃsthitaṃ maṭhikāṃ parṇaiḥ kṛtvā dūre munīndravat //MU_5,45.17//
GSP27moksop_u:24563: athāpaśyad asau gādhir yāvat tasya kalatriṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24573: ekadā prāpa kīrāṇāṃ maṇḍale śrīmatīṃ purīm /
GSP27moksop_u:24577: sāmantair lalanābhiś ca nāgaraiś ca nirantaram /
GSP27moksop_u:24581: mṛte rājani rājārthaṃ viharantam itas tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24583: tam asau śvapaco nāgaṃ kautukodārayā dṛśā /
GSP27moksop_u:24585: ālokayantam ādāya taṃ kareṇa sa vāraṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24609: tā enam āsane saiṃhe prāpyābhiṣiṣicuḥ kramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:24610: tasminn eva gaje śakram airāvaṇa ivāmarāḥ //MU_5,45.43//
GSP27moksop_u:24611: evaṃ sa śvapaco rājyaṃ prāpa kīrapurāntare /
GSP27moksop_u:24612: araṇye hariṇaṃ puṣṭam aprāṇam iva vāyasaḥ //MU_5,45.44//
GSP27moksop_u:24618: aramata sa mahadbhis tatra bhogais sarasyāṃ ravikaramadatapto vāripūrair ivebhaḥ //MU_5,45.47//
GSP27moksop_u:24620: prakṛtibhir alam ūḍhāśeṣarājatvabhāras sa gavala iti nāmnā tatra rājā babhūva //MU_5,45.48//
GSP27moksop_u:24630: kīreṣu śvapaco rājyaṃ varṣāṇy aṣṭau cakāra ha /
GSP27moksop_u:24636: eka evājiraṃ bāhyaṃ tādṛgveṣas sa niryayau /
GSP27moksop_u:24639: gāyan mṛdu vasantotthaṃ kokilānām iva vrajam //MU_5,46.8//
GSP27moksop_u:24646: uvācedaṃ ca kīreśaṃ he bandho bhoḥ kaṭañjaka /
GSP27moksop_u:24647: kva nu sthito 'si diṣṭyādya dṛṣṭo 'si cirabāndhava //MU_5,46.12//
GSP27moksop_u:24650: iha rājā bhavantaṃ vā kaccid geyakalāvidam /
GSP27moksop_u:24658: śvapace pravadaty evaṃ rājā tāvat tayā tayā /
GSP27moksop_u:24661: śvapaco 'yam iti jñātvā mlānatām alam āyayuḥ //MU_5,46.19//
GSP27moksop_u:24672: mantriṇo nāgarā nāryas tatas te taṃ mahīpatim /
GSP27moksop_u:24673: nāsprākṣur api tiṣṭhantaṃ gṛha eva śavaṃ yathā //MU_5,46.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24674: bhṛtyāś cākṛtasatkāraṃ dūra eva tam atyajan /
GSP27moksop_u:24677: dagdhaṃ sthalam ivainaṃ te bahv amanyanta nākulāḥ //MU_5,46.27//
GSP27moksop_u:24683: tasmād viśeṣeṇa janā rākṣasād iva dudruvuḥ //MU_5,46.30//
GSP27moksop_u:24686: bhṛśam āraṭate 'py asmai nālāpaṃ nāgarā daduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24688: atha sarve vayaṃ dīrghaṃ kālaṃ śvapacadūṣitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24689: prāyaścittair na śuddhās smaḥ praviśāmo hutāśanam //MU_5,46.33//
GSP27moksop_u:24690: iti nirṇīya nagare nāgarā mantriṇas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24692: jvalitāsv abhitas tāsu tārakāsv iva khe tadā /
