GSP27moksop_u:24701: antrair vyomagataiś channaṃ bhāskaraṃ jaladair iva //MU_5,46.39//
GSP27moksop_u:24714: kiṃ me duḥkhitajīvena maraṇaṃ me mahotsavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24716: iti niścitya gavalo jvalite jvalane puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24718: tasmin balād gavalanāmni hutāśarāśau dehe pataty avayavākulatāṃ prayāte /
GSP27moksop_u:24719: svāṅgāvadāhadahanasphuraṇānurodhād antarjale jhagiti bodham avāpa gādhiḥ //MU_5,46.48//
GSP27moksop_u:24721: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:24722: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_5,46.49//
GSP27moksop_u:24730: bodham āpa śanaiś śāntas svam evonnidradhīradhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24732: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti dadarśa ha /
GSP27moksop_u:24737: anyām eva puraḥ paśyan paraṃ vismayam āyayau //MU_5,47.6//
GSP27moksop_u:24738: ko 'haṃ kim iva paśyāmi kim akārṣam ahaṃ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:24739: evaṃ vicārayaṃś citraṃ sabhrūbhaṅgam abhūt kṣaṇam //MU_5,47.7//
GSP27moksop_u:24742: cintayām āsa ca taṭe kva me mātā kva me priyā /
GSP27moksop_u:24743: yad ahaṃ mṛtim āyāto madhye mātṛmahelayoḥ //MU_5,47.9//
GSP27moksop_u:24746: avivāho 'smi jānāmi na svarūpam api striyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24748: tasmād etad asadbhūtam ahaṃ kiṃ nāma dṛṣṭavān /
GSP27moksop_u:24750: tad āstām etad eṣā hi bandhumadhyamṛtasthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24751: māyā mohe manāg asmin na satyam upalabhyate //MU_5,47.13//
GSP27moksop_u:24754: avadhīryeti taṃ cittamohaṃ gādhir nināya saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24755: dināni katicit tasmin svaka evāśrame tadā //MU_5,47.15//
GSP27moksop_u:24757: brahmāṇam iva durvāsās sa viśaśrāma saśramaḥ //MU_5,47.16//
GSP27moksop_u:24760: atha vanditasandhyau tau kṛtajapyāv ubhāv api /
GSP27moksop_u:24762: tataḥ pravavṛte śāntā tayos tāpasayoḥ kathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24765: kim brahman sukṛśāṅgas tvaṃ kim iti śramavān asi //MU_5,47.20//
GSP27moksop_u:24771: tatrāham avasaṃ māsaṃ pūjyamānaḥ pure janaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24774: ihābhūc chvapaco rājā varṣāṇy aṣṭau dvijeti me //MU_5,47.24//
GSP27moksop_u:24776: rājā babhūva śvapaco varṣāṇy aṣṭāv iheti taiḥ //MU_5,47.25//
GSP27moksop_u:24777: sa evānte parijñātaḥ praviṣṭo jvalanaṃ javāt /
GSP27moksop_u:24779: iti teṣāṃ mukhāc chrutvā tasmān nirgatya maṇḍalāt /
GSP27moksop_u:24782: ihāham āgatas tena śrānto 'smy atikṛśo 'smi ca //MU_5,47.28//
GSP27moksop_u:24784: iti śrutavatā tena gādhinā sa tadā dvijaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24785: bhūyaḥ pṛṣṭo 'py etad eva kathayām āsa nānyathā //MU_5,47.29//
GSP27moksop_u:24786: atha vismayavān gādhis tāṃ nītvā tatra śarvarīm /
GSP27moksop_u:24790: yan mayā sambhrame dṛṣṭaṃ satyaṃ bhūtaṃ dvijena tat /
GSP27moksop_u:24791: uktaṃ mameti kiṃ nāma syān māyāśambare kramaḥ //MU_5,47.32//
GSP27moksop_u:24792: yad bandhumadhye maraṇaṃ mayā tad dṛṣṭam ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24793: sā māyaiva na sandehaś śeṣe paśyāmi satyatām //MU_5,47.33//
GSP27moksop_u:24797: uttasthau bhāskaraḥ pārśvaṃ meror draṣṭum ivodyataḥ //MU_5,47.35//
GSP27moksop_u:24803: apaśyad grāmakaṃ kañcid gandharva iva pattanam //MU_5,47.38//
GSP27moksop_u:24804: dadarśa tasya paryante tam eva śvapacālayam /
GSP27moksop_u:24809: tasya kām api vairāgyapadavīm anayan manaḥ //MU_5,47.41//
GSP27moksop_u:24812: dāridryaṃ taṃ dṛḍham iva daurbhāgyam iva kuṭṭitam /
GSP27moksop_u:24813: bhraṣṭāṅgam iva daurātmyaṃ daussthityam iva khaṇḍitam //MU_5,47.43//
GSP27moksop_u:24815: dhavalair vyāptaparyantaṃ sākṣyaṃ kartum iva sthitaiḥ //MU_5,47.44//
GSP27moksop_u:24816: bhuktaṃ pītaṃ purā tena yeṣu karparakeṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:24820: ciram ālokayām āsa sa tad ātmagṛhaṃ smayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:24824: tatrāpṛcchaj janaṃ sādho kaccit smarati bho bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:24825: prāg vṛttam asya grāmasya paryante śvapacakramam //MU_5,47.49//
GSP27moksop_u:24826: sarva eva hi dhīmantaś ciravṛttam api sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:24827: karastham iva paśyanti mayeti sujanāc chrutam //MU_5,47.50//
GSP27moksop_u:24829: smarasy ekaṃ kila tamoduḥkhānām iva dehakam //MU_5,47.51//
GSP27moksop_u:24830: yadi jānāsi bhos sādho tan me kathaya taṃ janam /
GSP27moksop_u:24832: bhūyo bhūya iti grāmyāḥ pṛṣṭā gādhidvijanmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:24835: yathā kathayasi brahmaṃs tat tathā na tad anyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24839: tasya vṛddhasya tat sarvaṃ kalatraṃ mṛtyur ācchinat /
GSP27moksop_u:24841: yas tato deśam utsṛjya yayau kīrapurāntaram /
GSP27moksop_u:24842: varṣāṇy aṣṭāv anudvegaṃ tatra rājā babhūva yaḥ //MU_5,47.57//
GSP27moksop_u:24843: yas tatrātha parijñāya janair dūre tiraskṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24844: yathā rāśir amedhyasya yathā grāme viṣadrumaḥ //MU_5,47.58//
GSP27moksop_u:24845: tato jane 'gniṃ praviśaty ātmanā yo hutāśanam /
GSP27moksop_u:24847: kiṃ tvam ekaṃ prayatnena śvapacaṃ pṛcchasi prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:24848: kiṃ te bandhur asau kaścid abhavat saṃstuto 'tha vā //MU_5,47.60//
GSP27moksop_u:24849: evaṃ kathayato grāmyān gādhiḥ pṛcchan punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24850: sarveṣu tatra grāmeṣu māsam ekam uvāsa saḥ //MU_5,47.61//
GSP27moksop_u:24851: yathā tenānubhūtaṃ tac chvapacatvaṃ tathaiva taiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24853: avyāhataṃ sakalahūnamukhād athaitad ākarṇya samyag avalokya yathānubhūtam /
GSP27moksop_u:24854: gādhiś śaśāṅkamalavad dhṛdaye virūḍhaṃ gūḍhākṛtiḥ paramavismayam ājagāma //MU_5,47.63//
GSP27moksop_u:24859: gādhir mano hi nāyāti tṛptim āścaryadarśane //MU_5,48.1//
GSP27moksop_u:24865: adyāpi saṃsthitāḥ kalpaṃ prati meruśikhā iva //MU_5,48.4//
GSP27moksop_u:24866: iha tad vānarīmāṃsaṃ pakvaṃ vaṃśāṅkurais saha /
GSP27moksop_u:24869: suptam āpīya maireyaṃ tiktaṃ gajamadair navaiḥ //MU_5,48.6//
GSP27moksop_u:24874: sthalīṣv etāsu tāsv atra saha śvapacabālakaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24879: nṛttaṃ tat kṛtam unnādaṃ kallolair jaladhāv iva //MU_5,48.11//
GSP27moksop_u:24884: cacāla tasmād dīrgheṇa deśāt kālena kāryavit /
GSP27moksop_u:24891: sthānāni nagare paśyan papraccha janam ādṛtaḥ //MU_5,48.17//
GSP27moksop_u:24892: sādho smarasi kaccit tvam iha śvapacam īśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:24893: yadi jānāsi tat tan me kathayāśu yathāvidhi //MU_5,48.18//
GSP27moksop_u:24895: abhūd ihāṣṭau varṣāṇi śvapaco bhūmipo dvija /
GSP27moksop_u:24899: yaṃ yaṃ pṛcchaty asau gādhir janaṃ jātakutūhalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24900: tasya tasya mukhād evaṃ śṛṇoty anubhavaty api //MU_5,48.21//
GSP27moksop_u:24902: devaṃ cakradharaṃ draṣṭuṃ mandirān nirgataṃ bahiḥ //MU_5,48.22//
GSP27moksop_u:24917: idaṃ tat kīrajanatārājyaṃ prāg bhuktam adya me /
GSP27moksop_u:24919: satyasvapna ivedaṃ me jāgrato 'pi puras sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:24920: na jāne kiṃ kṛtotthānā māyeyaṃ pravijṛmbhate //MU_5,48.31//
GSP27moksop_u:24921: aho nu khalu dīrgheṇa manomohena jṛmbhatā /
GSP27moksop_u:24923: hā dhik kaṣṭam abuddhaṃ me mano vāsanayā hatam /
GSP27moksop_u:24925: eṣā hi māyā mahatī tena me cakrapāṇinā /
GSP27moksop_u:24926: darśitety adhunā sādhu mayā smṛtam akhaṇḍitam //MU_5,48.34//
GSP27moksop_u:24927: tad idānīṃ tathā yatnaṃ kariṣye girikandare /
GSP27moksop_u:24929: iti sañcintya nagarād gādhis taptuṃ jagāma ha /
GSP27moksop_u:24938: gādhe kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā māyā mama garīyasī /
GSP27moksop_u:24941: tapo giritaṭe kurvan kim anyad abhivāñchasi //MU_5,48.41//
GSP27moksop_u:24943: evaṃ vadantam ālokya hariṃ gādhir dvijottamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:24946: viṣṇum āha dvijo vākyam ambhodam iva cātakaḥ //MU_5,48.43//
GSP27moksop_u:24949: mahīṃ prātar ivādityas tāṃ me prakaṭatāṃ naya //MU_5,48.44//
GSP27moksop_u:24951: svapnavat sa kathaṃ deva jāgraty api hi dṛśyate //MU_5,48.45//
GSP27moksop_u:24959: bahir na kiñcid apy asti khādridyūrvīdigādikam /
GSP27moksop_u:24961: phalādi sphāratām eti yathaiva bahir aṅkurāt /
GSP27moksop_u:24962: bahiḥ prakaṭatāṃ yāti tathā pṛthvyādi cetasaḥ //MU_5,48.50//
GSP27moksop_u:24963: satyaṃ pṛthvyādi cittasthaṃ na bahissthaṃ kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:24964: aṅkurasthaṃ phalaṃ vastu tasmād yasmāt phalaśriyaḥ //MU_5,48.51//
GSP27moksop_u:24966: kumbhakāro ghaṭam iva ceto hanti karoti ca //MU_5,48.52//
GSP27moksop_u:24971: tyaktāvaner viṭapino bhūyaḥ pattrāṇi no yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24972: nirvāsanasya jīvasya punar janmādi no tathā //MU_5,48.55//
GSP27moksop_u:24974: śvapacatvaṃ prakaṭitaṃ yadi tad vismayo 'tra kim //MU_5,48.56//
GSP27moksop_u:24978: kathāṃ kathitavāṃś ceti dṛṣṭavān asi vibhramam //MU_5,48.58//
GSP27moksop_u:24980: ime hūnā ime grāmā dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam //MU_5,48.59//
GSP27moksop_u:24982: janair uktaḥ kaṭañjaś ca dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam //MU_5,48.60//
GSP27moksop_u:24983: tathaiva kīranagaraṃ prāpto 'smi kathitaṃ ca me /
GSP27moksop_u:24984: kīraiś śvapacarājatvaṃ dṛṣṭavān ity asi bhramam //MU_5,48.61//
GSP27moksop_u:24985: evaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ mohajālaṃ dvijottama /
GSP27moksop_u:24986: yat satyam iti jānāsi yac cāsatyam avaiṣi ca //MU_5,48.62//
GSP27moksop_u:24987: vāsanāvalitaṃ cetaḥ kiṃ nāma na na paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:24989: nātithir na ca hūnās te na kīrās te na tat puram /
GSP27moksop_u:24990: sarvam eva mahābuddhe vyāmohād dṛṣṭavān asi //MU_5,48.64//
GSP27moksop_u:24994: idaṃ tac chvapacāgāram iti dṛṣṭaṃ na satyataḥ //MU_5,48.66//
GSP27moksop_u:24995: tathaiva kīranagaraṃ dṛṣṭavān asi tat tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:24996: tathaiva nānyathā vāpi māyārthī hi bhavān dvija //MU_5,48.67//
GSP27moksop_u:24998: dikṣu pronmattaka iva vibhramaṃ manasā mune //MU_5,48.68//
GSP27moksop_u:24999: tad uttiṣṭha nijam karma kurvaṃs tiṣṭhopaśāntadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25000: na svakarma vinā śreyaḥ prāpnuvantīha mānavāḥ //MU_5,48.69//
GSP27moksop_u:25003: vibudhamunigaṇaiḥ pavitrahastair vṛta udadhiṃ nijam āspadaṃ jagāma //MU_5,48.70//
GSP27moksop_u:25007: atha gādhir gate viṣṇau punar hūnādikāñ janān /
GSP27moksop_u:25013: uvāca gādhiṃ bhagavān mayūram iva vāridaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25014: kiṃ tvaṃ prārthayase bhūyas tapaseti prasādavān //MU_5,49.4//
GSP27moksop_u:25017: tatra vyabhicaraty asmadvṛttānto na kathāsv api //MU_5,49.5//
GSP27moksop_u:25018: māyayā hūnabhūr dṛṣṭā tvayety ukto 'smi kiṃ prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:25023: tenāṅga tava vṛttāntaṃ satyaṃ yat kathayanti te /
GSP27moksop_u:25026: tat tathā yat tvayā dṛṣṭam iṣṭakākhaṇḍatāṃ gatam //MU_5,49.9//
GSP27moksop_u:25029: tathā hi bahavas svapnam ekaṃ paśyanti mānavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25035: vipra saṅkalpamātro 'sau kālo hy ātmani tiṣṭhati //MU_5,49.14//
GSP27moksop_u:25036: amūrto bhagavān kālo brahmaiva tam ajaṃ viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25037: na jahāti na cādatte kiñcit kasyacid eva saḥ //MU_5,49.15//
GSP27moksop_u:25038: laukiko yas tv ayaṃ kālo varṣakalpayugātmakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25039: saṅkalpyate padārthaughaiḥ padārthaughāś ca tena te //MU_5,49.16//
GSP27moksop_u:25044: ity uktvā bhagavān viṣṇur jagāmāntardhim īśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25046: tataḥ katipayeṣv adrau māseṣv api gateṣu saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25048: dadarśa caikadā nātham āgataṃ praṇanāma tam /
GSP27moksop_u:25054: etasminn eva vimale māṃ niyojaya karmaṇi //MU_5,49.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25058: hūnakīrapure mohād dṛṣṭavāṃs tat tathā bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:25059: ity etat sambhavaty eva dṛśyate hi janair bhramaḥ //MU_5,49.25//
GSP27moksop_u:25060: hūnās tvam iva kīrāś ca dṛṣṭavantas tathā bhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:25062: idaṃ tu śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathābhūtam anindita /
GSP27moksop_u:25071: kadācid apy adṛṣṭaṃ tu cetaḥ paśyati dṛṣṭavat //MU_5,49.31//
GSP27moksop_u:25073: jāgraty api tathaivāṅga dṛśyate manasā svayam //MU_5,49.32//
GSP27moksop_u:25075: pratibhām eti te gādhe kaṭañjacaritaṃ tathā //MU_5,49.33//
GSP27moksop_u:25076: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti majjati nātmavān /
GSP27moksop_u:25077: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti paśyaty anātmavān //MU_5,49.34//
GSP27moksop_u:25086: yad eva te manomātre sahasā pratibimbate /
GSP27moksop_u:25089: sthīyate cet tad ākramya tan na kiñcit prabādhate //MU_5,49.40//
GSP27moksop_u:25090: tvam uttiṣṭha gireḥ kuñje daśavarṣāṇy akhinnadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25091: tapaḥ kuru tato jñānam anantābhāvam āpsyasi //MU_5,49.41//
GSP27moksop_u:25102: aramata tadanu svāṃ prāpya sattāṃ mahātmā vyapagatabhayamoho bhogabhūmāv anicchaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25103: satatamuditajīvanmuktarūpaḥ praśāntas sakala iva śaśāṅko ghūrṇitāpūrṇacetāḥ //MU_5,49.47//
GSP27moksop_u:25113: ato vacmi mahābāho māyeyaṃ vitatety alam /
GSP27moksop_u:25116: evam asya kathaṃ brahman māyācakrasya rodhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:25126: cakraṃ nābhāv avaṣṭabdhaṃ vaśam āyāti nānyathā //MU_5,50.9//
GSP27moksop_u:25129: etāṃ yuktiṃ vinā duḥkham anantam idam ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25130: asyāṃ yuktau kṣaṇāt tv antaṃ gatam evāvalokaya //MU_5,50.11//
GSP27moksop_u:25135: cittāntar eva saṃsāraḥ kumbhāntaḥ kumbhakhaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:25136: cittanāśe na saṃsāraḥ kumbhanāśe na kumbhakham //MU_5,50.14//
GSP27moksop_u:25140: bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad abhajad yāti cittam acittatām //MU_5,50.16//
GSP27moksop_u:25142: karoṣi tad acittatvaṃ prāpta evāsi pāvanam //MU_5,50.17//
GSP27moksop_u:25147: cetanaś cittariktaś ced bhāvitas tat kusaṃsṛteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25148: āmūlam eva dagdhāni viddhi mūlāni siddhiman //MU_5,50.20//
GSP27moksop_u:25151: sā satyatā sā śivatā sā sattā pāramātmikī /
GSP27moksop_u:25152: sarvajñatā sā sā tṛptir nanu yatra manaḥ kṣatam //MU_5,50.22//
GSP27moksop_u:25153: mano yatra tu tatrāsthās tatra duḥkhasukhāni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:25154: sadā sannidhim āyānti śmaśāna iva vāyasāḥ //MU_5,50.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25165: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api /
GSP27moksop_u:25167: mamedaṃ tad ayaṃ so 'ham iti santyajya vāsanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25171: palāyaneṣu yuddheṣu duḥkheṣu ca sukheṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:25173: malaṃ saṃvedyam utsṛjya mano nirmathya mantharam /
GSP27moksop_u:25179: jāgraty eva hi sauṣuptīṃ bhāvayan susthirāṃ sthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:25188: viṣaṃ hālāhalam api yāsyaty amṛtatāṃ tava //MU_5,50.40//
GSP27moksop_u:25194: prasariṣyati te saṃvit sūryāṃśur iva sarvataḥ //MU_5,50.43//
GSP27moksop_u:25197: tair na lajjāmahe pumbhir ye svabhāvam upāgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25199: parvatāḥ kharvatāṃ yānti puro 'drer iva dantinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25203: avastutāṃ vrajanty ete madhyāhna iva dīpakāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25210: tiryagbhyaś cāpy atattvajñā rāma tucchatarās smṛtāḥ //MU_5,50.51//
GSP27moksop_u:25213: anātmajño hi durdehaḥ prasphurann api bhūtale /
GSP27moksop_u:25214: śava eva bhramaty uccair ātmajñas tu sacetanaḥ //MU_5,50.53//
GSP27moksop_u:25215: dūram ātmajñatā yāti citte pīvaratāṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:25222: idaṃ mameti bhāvena ceto gacchati pīnatām //MU_5,50.57//
GSP27moksop_u:25239: ratiṃ gataṃ nityam asatpradeśe śarīramālāgrasanena puṣṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:25241: dūre samutsāraya sārabhūtaṃ duśceṣṭitaṃ karkaśam āraṭantam /
GSP27moksop_u:25244: bhrāntaṃ ciraṃ dehaśateṣv aṭavyāṃ svasaṃsṛtau cetanavarjiteṣu //MU_5,50.68//
GSP27moksop_u:25246: notsāritaś cittapiśācako 'yaṃ yāvat kutas tāvad ihātmasiddhiḥ //MU_5,50.69//
GSP27moksop_u:25248: ajasram acchaśvasanāśanaṃ ca sarvasya rāmābhayanāśanaṃ ca //MU_5,50.70//
GSP27moksop_u:25250: nītvā śamaṃ rāma manomahāhiṃ bhayaṃ bhṛśaṃ projjhya bhavābhayātmā //MU_5,50.71//
GSP27moksop_u:25254: uḍḍīya ced gacchati cittagṛdhro dehadrumāt tan nipuṇaṃ jayas te //MU_5,50.73//
GSP27moksop_u:25255: bhrāntaṃ vanānteṣu digantareṣu phalārthinaṃ cañcalam ākulāṅgam /
GSP27moksop_u:25256: janmāvaner janmamahīṃ prayāntaṃ saṃsārapānthaṃ janam āhasantam //MU_5,50.74//
GSP27moksop_u:25262: sotsāham utsādaya cittameghaṃ mahat phalaṃ prāpya bhavālam āḍhyaḥ //MU_5,50.77//
GSP27moksop_u:25263: granthīkṛtaṃ karmabhir ātmasṛṣṭaiś śastrair abhedyaṃ jvalanair adagdham /
GSP27moksop_u:25266: chittvā svayaṃ rāghava cittapāśaṃ yathāsukhaṃ tvaṃ viharāstaśaṅkaḥ //MU_5,50.79//
GSP27moksop_u:25270: akāmanānāmamahānalena balena dagdhvā vibhayo bhava tvam //MU_5,50.81//
GSP27moksop_u:25271: cittena cetaś śamam āśu nītvā śuddhena ghorāstram ivāstrayuktyā /
GSP27moksop_u:25272: cirāya sādho tyaja cañcalatvaṃ vimarkaṭo vṛkṣa ivākṣataśrīḥ //MU_5,50.82//
GSP27moksop_u:25273: alam alam iti kṛtvā cetasā vītaśaṅkaṃ vyupaśamitamalo 'ntas sarvam ādeham eva /
GSP27moksop_u:25274: tṛṇalavalaghu paśyaṃl līlayāheyadṛṣṭyā piba vihara ramasva prāptasaṃsārapāraḥ //MU_5,50.83//
GSP27moksop_u:25283: bhūtale patitāṃ tāvad enām uddhṛtya dhāraya //MU_5,51.3//
GSP27moksop_u:25287: kṛtvā kṛtvā dhiyā dhīra dhīrayāntar vicāraya //MU_5,51.5//
GSP27moksop_u:25304: uddālako nāma munir maunī mānī mahāmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25312: kiṃ tat prāpyaṃ pradhānaṃ syād yad viśrāntau na śocyate /
GSP27moksop_u:25313: yat prāpya janmanā bhūyas sambandho nopajāyate //MU_5,51.17//
GSP27moksop_u:25318: idaṃ kṛtvedam apy anyat kartavyam iti kalpanām /
GSP27moksop_u:25320: kadā vikalpajālaṃ me na lagiṣyati cetasi /
GSP27moksop_u:25321: sthitam apy ujjhitāsaṅgaṃ payaḥ padmadale yathā //MU_5,51.21//
GSP27moksop_u:25335: paśyaṃś cinmātram akhilaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmy ahaṃ kadā //MU_5,51.28//
GSP27moksop_u:25343: kṣayam eṣyati kṛṣṇeyaṃ kadā me mohayāminī //MU_5,51.32//
GSP27moksop_u:25355: punaḥ punas tūpaviśya dhyānābhyāsaṃ cakāra saḥ //MU_5,51.38//
GSP27moksop_u:25366: bāhyān ābhyantarān sparśāṃs tyaktvā nidrāṃ ca tanmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25367: tamas tejaś ca no lebhe kadācic chāśvatīṃ sthitim //MU_5,51.44//
GSP27moksop_u:25369: darīṣv anvaham ugrāsu vātabhagna iva drumaḥ //MU_5,51.45//
GSP27moksop_u:25396: mṛdu meghavidhir vṛndam āmbhodam iva tatra saḥ //MU_5,52.3//
GSP27moksop_u:25397: tasya prasārayām āsa pṛṣṭhe cāru mṛgājinam /
GSP27moksop_u:25402: pārṣṇibhyāṃ vṛṣaṇau dhṛtvā cakāra brāhmam añjalim //MU_5,52.6//
GSP27moksop_u:25405: ayi mūrkha manaḥ ko 'rthas tava saṃsāravṛttibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25406: dhīmanto na niṣevante paryante duḥkhadāṃ kriyām //MU_5,52.8//
GSP27moksop_u:25409: yadi yāsi mahīrandhraṃ brahmalokam athāpi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:25410: tan na nirvṛtim āyāsi tvaṃ vinopaśamāmṛtam //MU_5,52.10//
GSP27moksop_u:25412: tyaja yāhi paraṃ śreyaḥ padam ekāntasundaram //MU_5,52.11//
GSP27moksop_u:25416: bhramasy avirataṃ vyartham eva maṇḍūkikā yathā //MU_5,52.13//
GSP27moksop_u:25418: bhramantyā bhuvanaṃ viṣvak kiṃ samāsāditaṃ tvayā //MU_5,52.14//
GSP27moksop_u:25419: yasmāt kiñcit tad āpnoṣi yasmin bhajasi nirvṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:25420: tasmiṃś citta śame mūrkha nānubadhnāsi kiṃ padam //MU_5,52.15//
GSP27moksop_u:25422: dhiyā śabdānusāriṇyā mṛgavan mā kṣayaṃ vraja //MU_5,52.16//
GSP27moksop_u:25432: sarvair etair anarthais tu vyāptasyājña kutas sukham //MU_5,52.21//
GSP27moksop_u:25434: svātmanas sahajaḥ phenas tāntavaḥ krimiṇā yathā //MU_5,52.22//
GSP27moksop_u:25436: yadi śāmyasi nirmūlaṃ tad anantā jayās tava //MU_5,52.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25438: jānann api jagaddṛṣṭīr na tyakṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi //MU_5,52.24//
GSP27moksop_u:25439: karomy atha kimarthaṃ vā tavaitad anuśāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:25440: vicāraṇavataḥ puṃsaś cittam asti hi nānagha //MU_5,52.25//
GSP27moksop_u:25445: yāvat tānavam āyātaṃ śuddhaṃ cittaṃ vicāravat /
GSP27moksop_u:25446: tāvat tat kṣīṇam evāhaṃ manye śāradameghavat //MU_5,52.28//
GSP27moksop_u:25447: anuśāsanam etad yad asato naśyato 'tha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:25449: tasmāt saṅkṣīyamāṇaṃ tvāṃ tyajāmy aham asanmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:25453: ayaṃ so 'ham iti vyarthaṃ durdṛṣṭir avalambitā /
GSP27moksop_u:25456: na sambhavati bilvāntar vāsitā dantino yathā //MU_5,52.33//
GSP27moksop_u:25458: tvayaiṣā tad asatpātir nainām anusarāmy aham //MU_5,52.34//
GSP27moksop_u:25462: na labdho 'sāv ahaṃ nāma kas syād ahaṃ iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.36//
GSP27moksop_u:25465: dṛśyate tasya neyattā na nāma parikalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:25466: naikatā nānyatā caiva na mahattā na cāṇutā //MU_5,52.38//
GSP27moksop_u:25467: vedanaṃ tvam asaṃvedyaṃ mayi ced duḥkhakāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:25468: vivekajena bhedena tad idaṃ hanyase mayā //MU_5,52.39//
GSP27moksop_u:25469: idaṃ māṃsaṃ idaṃ raktam imāny asthīni dehake /
GSP27moksop_u:25470: ime te śvāsamarutaḥ ko 'sāv aham iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.40//
GSP27moksop_u:25471: māṃsam anyad asṛk cānyad asthīny anyāni citta he /
GSP27moksop_u:25472: bodho 'nyas spandanaṃ cānyat ko 'sāv aham iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.41//
GSP27moksop_u:25473: idaṃ ghrāṇam iyaṃ jihvā tvag iyaṃ śravaṇe ime /
GSP27moksop_u:25474: idaṃ cakṣur ayaṃ spandaḥ ko 'sāv aham iti sthitaḥ //MU_5,52.42//
GSP27moksop_u:25475: yathābhūtatayā nāham asmi na tvaṃ na vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:25477: aham eveha sarvatra nāhaṃ kiñcid apīha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:25478: ity eva sanmayī dṛṣṭir netaro vidyate kramaḥ //MU_5,52.44//
GSP27moksop_u:25483: nirduḥkho duḥkhayogyasya nāham asya na caiṣa me /
GSP27moksop_u:25484: kaścid bhavati śailasya tatstha eva yathāmbudaḥ //MU_5,52.47//
GSP27moksop_u:25485: nāhaṃ bhūtvā tv ahaṃ hīdaṃ vacmi tiṣṭhāmi yāmi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:25488: yāntu tiṣṭhantu vā dehe mamaite tu na kecana //MU_5,52.49//
GSP27moksop_u:25489: kaṣṭaṃ ko 'yam ahaṃ nāma kathaṃ kenopakalpitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25494: tad ahaṃ nāma ko 'sau syād yo 'smi duḥkhena mohitaḥ //MU_5,52.52//
GSP27moksop_u:25495: sparśanāmni nije tattve yadi jātā tvag unmukhī /
GSP27moksop_u:25496: tat ko 'yaṃ syād ahaṃ nāma kupiśāca ivoditaḥ //MU_5,52.53//
GSP27moksop_u:25498: ahaṃ mṛṣṭabhug ity eṣa kutastyaḥ kutsito bhramaḥ //MU_5,52.54//
GSP27moksop_u:25502: ahaṃ ghrāteti yo mantā taṃ cauraṃ naiva vedmy aham //MU_5,52.56//
GSP27moksop_u:25504: bhāvas tasyām asatyāyāṃ yasyāsāv api sambhramaḥ //MU_5,52.57//
GSP27moksop_u:25506: pravartate bahis svārthe vāsanā nātra kāraṇam //MU_5,52.58//
GSP27moksop_u:25507: vāsanārahitaṃ karma kriyate nanu citta he /
GSP27moksop_u:25510: kurudhvaṃ karma he sarvaṃ na duḥkhaṃ samavāpsyatha //MU_5,52.60//
GSP27moksop_u:25511: bhavadbhir eva duḥkhāya vāsanā vāsitā mudhā /
GSP27moksop_u:25513: vāsanādyā dṛśas sarvā vyatiriktās tu nātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25523: eṣā hi bhavatām eva vimohāya kṣayāya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:25525: he citta sarvendriyakośa tasmāt sarvendriyair aikyam upetya nūnam /
GSP27moksop_u:25526: ālokya cātmānam asatsvarūpaṃ nirvāṇam ekāmalabodham āssva //MU_5,52.68//
GSP27moksop_u:25528: abhimataparihārakāryayuktyā bhava vibhayo bhagavān bhiyām abhūmiḥ //MU_5,52.69//
GSP27moksop_u:25533: cid acetyā tadākrāntau na śaktā vāsanādayaḥ //MU_5,53.1//
GSP27moksop_u:25536: tatkṛtebhyo vikārebhyo bhītiṃ tāny eva bhūriśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25537: bhūyo 'py anubhavantv antar ahaṃ hi cid alepikā //MU_5,53.3//
GSP27moksop_u:25538: cito na janmamaraṇe sarvagāyāś citaḥ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:25539: kiṃ nāma mriyate brūta māryate kena vāpi kim //MU_5,53.4//
GSP27moksop_u:25540: cito na jīvitenārthas sarvātmā saiva jīvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:25541: kiṃ prāpsyati kadātmaiṣa prāṅmṛto yadi jīvati //MU_5,53.5//
GSP27moksop_u:25544: yo hy ahambhāvatāṃ prāpto bhāvābhāvais sa gṛhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:25545: ātmano nāsty ahambhāvo bhāvābhāvāḥ kuto 'sya te //MU_5,53.7//
GSP27moksop_u:25546: ahambhāvo mudhā moho manaś ca mṛgatṛṣṇikā /
GSP27moksop_u:25552: guṇā guṇeṣu vartante prakṛtiḥ prakṛtau sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:25556: evaṃ kimākṛtiḥ ko vā kimādeyaś ca kiṅkṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25557: kiṃrūpaḥ kimmayaḥ ko 'haṃ kiṃ gṛhṇāmi tyajāmi kim //MU_5,53.13//
GSP27moksop_u:25560: asaty alam ahaṅkāre sambandhaḥ kena kasya kaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25562: evaṃ brahmātmakam idaṃ yat kiñcij jagati sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:25563: brahmaivāsti tad evāsmi pariśocāmi kiṃ mudhā //MU_5,53.16//
GSP27moksop_u:25564: ekasminn eva vimale pade sarvagate sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:25566: nāsty eva hi padārthaśrīr ātmaivāstīha sarvagaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25567: padārthalakṣmyāṃ satyāṃ ca sambandho 'sti na kasyacit //MU_5,53.18//
GSP27moksop_u:25568: indriyair indriyeṣv aṅgair mano manasi valgati /
GSP27moksop_u:25569: cid aluptavapuḥ kena sambaddhaṃ kasya kiṃ katham //MU_5,53.19//
GSP27moksop_u:25573: mamedam idam asyeti viparyastam idaṃ jagat //MU_5,53.21//
GSP27moksop_u:25576: ātmano vyatirekeṇa na kiñcid api vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:25577: śabdabrahmeti tat tattvam etat tad bhāvayāmy alam //MU_5,53.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25581: tiṣṭhāmy ātmani satyātmā śaratkhe śaradīva kham //MU_5,53.25//
GSP27moksop_u:25589: na śāmyaty arkaratnānāṃ grīṣme 'rcir iva durdhiyām //MU_5,53.29//
GSP27moksop_u:25590: nāstīdam idam astīti cintā dhāvaty ahaṅkṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:25593: bhūyaḥ prayacchaty araso na pāṣāṇavad aṅkuram //MU_5,53.31//
GSP27moksop_u:25597: asanmayaparispande tvam ahaṃ ceti kaḥ kramaḥ //MU_5,53.33//
GSP27moksop_u:25598: idaṃ jagad udety ādāv akāraṇam akāraṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:25599: yad akāraṇam ucchūnaṃ tat sad ity ucyate katham //MU_5,53.34//
GSP27moksop_u:25600: aparyantaṃ purā kālaṃ mṛdi kumbha ivākṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25602: madhye naravayomātraṃ kañcit kālaṃ tu cañcalam /
GSP27moksop_u:25605: taraṅge ca nibaddhāsthā ye hatās te kudṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_5,53.37//
GSP27moksop_u:25606: prāk purastāc ca sarvāṇi santi vastūni cābhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25608: citta pūrvaṃ purastāc ca videhaṃ śāntam ity asi /
GSP27moksop_u:25609: sad asad vā khasaṃlīnaṃ madhye 'smin kiṃ tavogratā //MU_5,53.39//
GSP27moksop_u:25614: dṛśyate kṣīyate caiva rūpaṃ sadasatoś calam /
GSP27moksop_u:25615: tathaivedam iyaṃ tv eṣā kāle nyūnātiriktatā //MU_5,53.42//
GSP27moksop_u:25616: sā ca tvayā kṛtā nityaṃ citta duḥkhasukhodayaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25618: tvam apy evāsadābhāsaṃ mithyā sad iva lakṣyase /
GSP27moksop_u:25619: mṛgatṛṣṇeva tenaitat tvatkṛtaṃ sat kathaṃ bhavet //MU_5,53.44//
GSP27moksop_u:25620: yad idaṃ kiñcid ābhogi tat sarvaṃ dṛśyamaṇḍalam /
GSP27moksop_u:25621: avastv iti vinirṇīya mano yāhy amanaḥpadam //MU_5,53.45//
GSP27moksop_u:25622: avastv idam iti sphāre rūḍhe manasi niścaye /
GSP27moksop_u:25627: dagdhātmakam alaṃ cittaṃ śuddhatām eti śāśvatīm //MU_5,53.48//
GSP27moksop_u:25630: manaś śatruś śarīrasya śarīraṃ manaso ripuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25634: etayor ekasaṃsthāne ratir ity eva yā kathā /
GSP27moksop_u:25635: sā vyomny ayasstriyā bhuktā dhareti kathayā samā //MU_5,53.52//
GSP27moksop_u:25638: mithoviruddhasaṃsarge ratim ety adhamo hi yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25642: tair duḥkhais tāpito deho mano hantum athecchati /
GSP27moksop_u:25644: nāsti śatruḥ prakṛtyaiva na ca mitraṃ kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:25645: sukhadaṃ mitram ity uktaṃ duḥkhadāś śatravas smṛtāḥ //MU_5,53.57//
GSP27moksop_u:25646: deho duḥkhāny anubhavan svamano hantum icchati /
GSP27moksop_u:25647: dehaṃ manas svaduḥkhānāṃ satkośaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt //MU_5,53.58//
GSP27moksop_u:25648: evaṃ mitho duḥkhadayoś śliṣṭayoḥ kas sukhāgamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25650: manasy eva parikṣīṇe na deho duḥkhabhājanam /
GSP27moksop_u:25652: naṣṭaṃ naṣṭam anarthāya śarīraṃ padam āpadām /
GSP27moksop_u:25654: ete manaśśarīre hi mithaḥ pīvaratāṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:25656: mitho duḥkhāya sampanne ekarūpe dvidhā sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:25658: citte kṣayiṇi saṅkṣīṇo deha ā mūlato bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:25661: mano na kṣīyate kṣīṇe dehe tat kṣapayen manaḥ //MU_5,53.65//
GSP27moksop_u:25664: prakṣīyamāṇam evedaṃ mama manye manas sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:25668: yadarthaṃ kila bhogaśrīr vāñchyate tat kalevaram /
GSP27moksop_u:25669: na me nāpi ca tasyāhaṃ ko 'rthas sukhalavena me //MU_5,53.69//
GSP27moksop_u:25670: nāhaṃ deha iti tv asmin yuktim ākarṇaya krame /
GSP27moksop_u:25671: sarvāṅgeṣv api satsv eva śavaḥ kasmān na valgati //MU_5,53.70//
GSP27moksop_u:25673: yas saṅgaṃ bhāsvatā prāpya vedmi vyomani bhāskaram //MU_5,53.71//
GSP27moksop_u:25674: jño 'haṃ me na sukhenārtho nānarthena ca duḥkhitā /
GSP27moksop_u:25675: śarīram astu vā māstu sthito 'smi vigatajvaraḥ //MU_5,53.72//
GSP27moksop_u:25676: yatrātmā tatra na mano nendriyāṇi na vāsanāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25678: padaṃ tad anuyāto 'smi kevalo 'smi jayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:25682: svasmāt padavarād asmāl līlayā calitasya me /
GSP27moksop_u:25683: adha ākramataḥ kiñcit parivāro hy ayaṃ śubhaḥ //MU_5,53.76//
GSP27moksop_u:25690: sarvathā sarvadā sarvaṃ sarvasmin sambhavaty ataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25691: sarvaṃ prati mama kṣīṇe vāñchāvāñche sukhāsukham //MU_5,53.80//
GSP27moksop_u:25693: uparamāmy aham ātmani śītale ghanalavaś śaradīva nabhastale //MU_5,53.81//
GSP27moksop_u:25697: iti nirṇīya tatayā dhiyā dhavalayā muniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25709: hṛdayāgnir jvalañ jvālī dadāha malinaṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25712: babhūva na haṭhād eva haṭhayogo hi duḥkhadaḥ //MU_5,54.8//
GSP27moksop_u:25715: na bahir nāntare nādho nordhve nāśāsu tatra te /
GSP27moksop_u:25721: tad bhasma pavanādhūtaṃ sāsthi vāyur ayojayat /
GSP27moksop_u:25726: babhūva na haṭhād eva haṭhayogo hi duḥkhadaḥ //MU_5,54.15//
GSP27moksop_u:25728: pūraṇāt pūrako nāma prāṇānām abhavat kramaḥ //MU_5,54.16//
GSP27moksop_u:25744: saridoghā iva saro vṛkṣaṃ madhurasā iva //MU_5,54.24//
GSP27moksop_u:25745: antaḥ kuṇḍalinīṃ prāṇāḥ pūrayām āsur ādṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25749: atha padmāsanagataḥ kṛtvā dehe sthitiṃ dṛḍhām /
GSP27moksop_u:25754: cintayā hṛdayaṃ ninye dūrād rajjveva kīlakam //MU_5,54.29//
GSP27moksop_u:25755: dhāvamānam adho mattaṃ cittam ābilam ākulam /
GSP27moksop_u:25756: balāt saṃrodhayām āsa setur jalam iva drutam //MU_5,54.30//
GSP27moksop_u:25760: śvasanaṃ śreyase deśe praśastas samayo yathā //MU_5,54.32//
GSP27moksop_u:25761: tilebhya iva tailāni pṛthak cakre prayatnataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25763: bāhyān sparśān aśeṣeṇa jahau dūre śanair arīn /
GSP27moksop_u:25764: sahasā kuṇḍakacchanno maṇir dūraṃ tviṣo yathā //MU_5,54.34//
GSP27moksop_u:25770: dadhāra kandharāṃ dhīrāṃ meruś śṛṅgaśikhām iva //MU_5,54.37//
GSP27moksop_u:25778: acchinan manasā śūraḥ khaḍgeneva raṇe śarān //MU_5,54.41//
GSP27moksop_u:25781: tad apy utsārayām āsa samyak svāntavivasvatā /
GSP27moksop_u:25783: tamasy uparate kāntaṃ tejaḥpuñjaṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25784: śārvare timire śānte prātas sāndhyam ivāmbudam //MU_5,54.44//
GSP27moksop_u:25785: taṃ lulāva sthalābjānāṃ vanaṃ bāla iva dvipaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25786: apibac cāpy asṛkpūraṃ vetāla iva vegataḥ //MU_5,54.45//
GSP27moksop_u:25787: tejasy uparate tasya ghūrṇamānaṃ mano muneḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25788: niśābjavad agān nidrāṃ lolaṃ kṣīvavad eva vā //MU_5,54.46//
GSP27moksop_u:25789: meghamālāṃ iva marud bālo nīlābjinīm iva /
GSP27moksop_u:25790: yāminīm iva tīkṣṇāṃśus tām apy āśu lulāva saḥ //MU_5,54.47//
GSP27moksop_u:25791: nidrāvyupaśame tasya bhāvayām āsa tan manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25793: payoda iva tāpiñchaṃ nīhāram iva mārutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25794: tamo dīpa ivācchātmā tad apy āśu mamārja saḥ //MU_5,54.49//
GSP27moksop_u:25797: moham apy eṣa manasas taṃ mamārja mahāśayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25800: kām apy avasthām āsādya viśaśrāma manaḥ kṣaṇam //MU_5,54.52//
GSP27moksop_u:25804: tataś cinmayatām āgād dhema nūpuratām iva //MU_5,54.54//
GSP27moksop_u:25805: cittatvam atha santyajya cittaṃ cittvaṃ tataṃ gataṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:25806: anyad eva babhūvāśu paṅkaḥ kumbhasthitāv iva //MU_5,54.55//
GSP27moksop_u:25807: cetyaṃ santyajya cic chuddhā citsāmānyam athāyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:25810: cidākāśaṃ tataṃ śuddhaṃ so 'bhavad bodhim āgataḥ //MU_5,54.57//
GSP27moksop_u:25813: śarīrāt samatīto 'sau kām apy avanim āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25820: apaśyad vyomagān siddhān amarān iva bhūriśaḥ //MU_5,54.62//
GSP27moksop_u:25823: tāni nādarayāṃ cakre siddhavṛndāni sa dvijaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25827: jīvanmuktapadaṃ tat tad yat sa samprāptavān dvijaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25828: tatra siddhās surās sādhyās sthitā brahmaharādayaḥ //MU_5,54.66//
GSP27moksop_u:25830: nānande na nirānande tatas tatsaṃvid ābabhau //MU_5,54.67//
GSP27moksop_u:25831: kṣaṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ vā tatra labdhvā sthitiṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25832: ratim eti na bhogaughe dṛṣṭasvarga ivāvanau //MU_5,54.68//
GSP27moksop_u:25833: tat padaṃ sā gatiś śāntā tac chreyaś śāśvataṃ śivam /
GSP27moksop_u:25834: tatra viśrāntim āptasya na bhūyo jāyate śramaḥ //MU_5,54.69//
GSP27moksop_u:25835: tat padaṃ sādhavaḥ prāpya dṛśyadṛṣṭim imāṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25838: dṛśyaṃ na bahu manyante rājāno dīnatām iva //MU_5,54.71//
GSP27moksop_u:25840: kadarthād bodham āyāti na yāty evātha vānagha //MU_5,54.72//
GSP27moksop_u:25849: te tam ūcur mahātmānam uddālakamuniṃ tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:25851: āruhyemaṃ vimānaṃ tvam ehi traiviṣṭapaṃ puraṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:25853: ākalpam ucitān bhuṅkṣva bhogān abhimatān vibho /
GSP27moksop_u:25856: paśyemās tvām upāsīnāḥ kariṇyaḥ kariṇaṃ yathā //MU_5,54.80//
GSP27moksop_u:25858: vasanta iva mañjaryas svarga eva bhavanti tāḥ //MU_5,54.81//
GSP27moksop_u:25859: evaṃ kathayatas siddhān atithīn ity asau muniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25861: nābhyanandan na tatyāja tāṃ vibhūtiṃ sa dhīradhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25864: tam upāsya yayus siddhā dinaiḥ katipayais svayam //MU_5,54.84//
GSP27moksop_u:25865: jīvanmuktas sa ca munir vijahāra yathāsukham /
GSP27moksop_u:25871: kadācid ahnā māsena kadācid vatsareṇa ca /
GSP27moksop_u:25876: dṛśye 'smiṃś citraravivan nāstam āyān na codayam //MU_5,54.90//
GSP27moksop_u:25878: śaradi kham iva kāntaṃ vyātataṃ corjitaṃ ca sphuṭam amalam alekhaṃ tat vapus svaṃ babhāra //MU_5,54.91//
GSP27moksop_u:25893: dṛṣṭir eṣā hi paramā sadehādehayos sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:25896: jñasya kevalam ajñasya na bhavaty eva bodhajā //MU_5,55.7//
GSP27moksop_u:25897: asyāṃ dṛśi sthitās sarve jīvanmuktā mahāśayāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25898: siddhā rasā iva bhuvi vyomavīthyām ivānilāḥ //MU_5,55.8//
GSP27moksop_u:25903: atha kālena mahatā buddhis tasya babhūva ha /
GSP27moksop_u:25911: na bahir nāntare nādho nordhve nārthe na śūnyake /
GSP27moksop_u:25925: upaśaśāma śanair divasair asau katipayais svapade vimalātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:25928: vigalitasukham ādyaṃ tat sukhaṃ prāpa yasmiṃs tṛṇam iva jalarāśāv uhyate śakralakṣmīḥ //MU_5,55.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25930: kathanaguṇam atītaṃ satyam ānandam ādyaṃ sukham asukham anantaṃ brāhmaṇo 'sau babhūva //MU_5,55.24//
GSP27moksop_u:25931: gatavati padam ādyaṃ cetasi svasvabhāvaṃ dvijatanur atha māsais sopaviṣṭā ca ṣaḍbhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25933: atha bahutarakālenainam adrer bhuvaṃ tām upayayur agakanyāsaṃyutā mātaraḥ khāt /
GSP27moksop_u:25934: abhimataphalasiddhyai saṃyutā eva sarvā analam iva śikhānāṃ paṅktayaḥ piṅgakeśyaḥ //MU_5,55.26//
GSP27moksop_u:25935: dinakarakaraśuṣkaṃ viprakaṅkālakaṃ taj jhagiti ca karakoṭau baddhakhaṭvāṅgasaṅgā /
GSP27moksop_u:25936: sakalavibudhavandyā khiṅkhinī devadevī niśi navaratanṛttā kācakāntiṃ cakāra //MU_5,55.27//
GSP27moksop_u:25937: ity uddālakadehako 'dya vilasanmāyūrabarhavrajavyālolābdalave nave vivalite mandāramālāgaṇaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25938: śete khiṅkhinikāmahābhagavatīlīlālalāme latājāle bhṛṅga ivāntapuṣpapaṭale paścād upāgacchati //MU_5,55.28//
GSP27moksop_u:25940: rūḍhā yasya kadācid eva vilasadramyeva sacchāyayā nāsāv eti viyogam eti ca phalenoccaistarāṃ saṅgamam //MU_5,55.29//
GSP27moksop_u:25956: tayos tu kataraś śreyān iti me bhagavan vada //MU_5,56.6//
GSP27moksop_u:25960: dṛśyair mama na sambandha iti niścitya śītalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25962: dvāv etau rāma susamāv antaś cet pariśītalau /
GSP27moksop_u:25963: antaśśītalatā yā syāt tad dhanaṃ tat tapaḥphalam //MU_5,56.9//
GSP27moksop_u:25965: tat tasya tat samādhānaṃ samam unmattatāṇḍavaiḥ //MU_5,56.10//
GSP27moksop_u:25968: vyavahārī prabuddho yaḥ prabuddho yo vane sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:25969: dvāv etau puruṣau nūnam asandehapadaṃ gatau //MU_5,56.12//
GSP27moksop_u:25970: akartṛ kurvad apy etac cetaḥ pratanuvāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:25972: akurvad api kartr eva cetaḥ praghanavāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:25974: cetaso yad akartṛtvaṃ tat samādhānam uttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:25975: taṃ viddhi kevalībhāvaṃ sā śubhā nirvṛtiḥ parā //MU_5,56.15//
GSP27moksop_u:25978: avāsanaṃ sthiraṃ proktaṃ mano dhyānaṃ tad eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:25979: sa eva kevalībhāvaś śāntaṃ tatraiva tat sadā //MU_5,56.17//
GSP27moksop_u:25985: svastho bhavati yenātmā sa samādhir iti smṛtaḥ //MU_5,56.20//
GSP27moksop_u:25987: yathā tiṣṭhasi tiṣṭha tvaṃ tathā śaile gṛhe 'tha vā //MU_5,56.21//
GSP27moksop_u:25991: mahatām iha bhūtānāṃ bhūtānāṃ mahatām iva //MU_5,56.23//
GSP27moksop_u:25996: vyutthitaṃ cittam abhyeti bhrame śānte suṣuptatām /
GSP27moksop_u:25997: nirvāṇam eti nirvāṇaṃ yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_5,56.26//
GSP27moksop_u:25999: yaḥ paśyati sadātmānaṃ sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.27//
GSP27moksop_u:26000: sahātmanā sadaivedaṃ jagat paśyati no manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26001: yathā svapne tathaivāsmiñ jāgraty api janeśvara //MU_5,56.28//
GSP27moksop_u:26004: antarmukhamanā nityaṃ supto buddho vrajan paṭhan /
GSP27moksop_u:26005: puraṃ janapadaṃ grāmam araṇyam iva paśyati //MU_5,56.30//
GSP27moksop_u:26009: vijvarāṇām iva nṛṇāṃ bhavaty ā jīvitasthiteḥ //MU_5,56.32//
GSP27moksop_u:26011: bhavaty akhilajantūnāṃ yad antas tad bahis sthitam //MU_5,56.33//
GSP27moksop_u:26012: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26014: vaṭadhānāvaṭa iva antar asya yad ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26016: na bahiṣṭvaṃ na cāntastvaṃ kvacit kiñcana vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26017: yad yathā kacitaṃ cittvāt tat tathā tathyam utthitam //MU_5,56.36//
GSP27moksop_u:26019: karpūram iva gandhena saṅkoci pravikāsi ca //MU_5,56.37//
GSP27moksop_u:26021: bāhyatvenāntaratvena sa ca nāsan na sadvibhuḥ //MU_5,56.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26025: ahantādau sthite dehe bhūribhaṅgaṃ bhayaṃ tu sat //MU_5,56.40//
GSP27moksop_u:26026: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26028: yas tv ātmaratir evāntaḥ kurvan karmendriyaiḥ kriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26029: na vaśo harṣaśokābhyāṃ sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.42//
GSP27moksop_u:26031: na śocati dhyāyati vā sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.43//
GSP27moksop_u:26033: dṛṣṭiṣv etāsu hasati sa samāhita ucyate //MU_5,56.44//
GSP27moksop_u:26034: same pare 'sti nāhantā na jagajjanmanī mayi /
GSP27moksop_u:26036: yasyāntar asti nāhantvaṃ na vibhāgādi no mama /
GSP27moksop_u:26038: vyomasvaccho bhavan svehāṃ samyag ācaratīha yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26041: svabhāvād eva na bhayād yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_5,56.48//
GSP27moksop_u:26045: tiṣṭhatūdetu vā yātu mṛtim etu nihantu vā //MU_5,56.50//
GSP27moksop_u:26052: pāpaṃ karotu sumahad bahalaṃ puṇyam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:26054: nāsau kiñcin na tat kiñcit kṛtaṃ tena mahātmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:26055: nāsau kalaṅkam āpnoti hema paṅkagataṃ yathā //MU_5,56.55//
GSP27moksop_u:26062: rajjvāṃ sarpabhrame śānte gehino nirvṛtir yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:26064: yat karoti yad aśnāti yad dadāti juhoti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:26065: na taj jñasya na tatra jño mā karotu karotu vā //MU_5,56.60//
GSP27moksop_u:26066: karmaṇāsti na tasyārtho nārthas tasyāsty akarmaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:26067: yathāsvabhāvaṃ bhagavān sa ātmany eva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_5,56.61//
GSP27moksop_u:26068: icchās tatas samudyanti na mañjarya ivopalāt /
GSP27moksop_u:26069: yāś codyanti ca tās sarvās sa evāmbv iva vīcayaḥ //MU_5,56.62//
GSP27moksop_u:26070: sakalam idam asāv asau ca sarvaṃ jagad akhilaṃ na vibhāgitātra kācit /
GSP27moksop_u:26071: paramapuruṣapāvanaikarūpī sa sad iti tat sad akiñcid eva vāsau //MU_5,56.63//
GSP27moksop_u:26076: tad ahantvādi bhedādi deśakālādi vetty adaḥ //MU_5,57.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26079: svato yad antar ātmekṣoś cittvān mādhuryavedanam /
GSP27moksop_u:26086: tad āvartādy ahantādi bhedādy ākāritādi ca //MU_5,57.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26087: svato ya ātmavṛkṣasya śākhādis tasya vedanam /
GSP27moksop_u:26094: tad ahantādibhedena cittvād bahir iva sthitam //MU_5,57.10//
GSP27moksop_u:26096: tad ahantvādi bhedādi cetanādīti vā sthitam //MU_5,57.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26098: tad ahantvādi vittvādi jīva ity eva vetty asau //MU_5,57.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26099: antar asti yad ātmendoś cidrūpaṃ cidrasāyanam /
GSP27moksop_u:26103: paramātmamaṇeś cittvād yad antaḥ kacanaṃ svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:26104: cetanātma tad evāntar aham ityādi vetty asau //MU_5,57.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26105: na ca kiñcana vetty antar vedyasyāsambhavād iha /
GSP27moksop_u:26107: na ca kiñcic cinoty antaś cetyasyāsambhave sati /
GSP27moksop_u:26108: vedyate na ca vā kiñcid vedyasyāsambhavād asau //MU_5,57.17//
GSP27moksop_u:26111: anayā tu vacobhaṅgyā mayā vo raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:26113: na cittam asti no cettā na jagattādivibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26116: tathāhantāditām eti jñatvāj jñaptau jña ātmani //MU_5,57.21//
GSP27moksop_u:26117: yathā dravatvaṃ payasi yathā spandas sadāgatau /
GSP27moksop_u:26119: jño jñatāyāṃ hi yaj jñānaṃ jānāti jñānabṛṃhayā /
GSP27moksop_u:26120: jñāyate tad ahantādi jīvādy apy abhijīvanaiḥ //MU_5,57.23//
GSP27moksop_u:26121: yathodeti yadā jñasya jñaptir jñānena yādṛśī /
GSP27moksop_u:26122: ananyaivānyatāṃ buddhvā sā tadā jṛmbhate tathā //MU_5,57.24//
GSP27moksop_u:26124: aṇur apy asti no bhedo virūpatve jñajīvayoḥ //MU_5,57.25//
GSP27moksop_u:26125: yathā jñajīvayor nāsti bhedo rāma tathaitayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26126: bhedo 'sti na jñajagator viddhi śāntam akhaṇḍitam //MU_5,57.26//
GSP27moksop_u:26127: sarvaṃ praśāntam ajam ekam anādimadhyam ābhāsanaṃ svadanamātram acetyacihnam /
GSP27moksop_u:26128: sarvaṃ praśāntam ati śabdamayī tu dṛṣṭir bodhārtham eva hi mudhaiva tad om itīdam //MU_5,57.27//
GSP27moksop_u:26135: sambhṛtaṃ hasanaṃ śārvaṃ śuklo vā cāndra ātapaḥ //MU_5,58.2//
GSP27moksop_u:26136: himādreś śṛṅgam astīha kailāso nāma parvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26138: viṣṇoḥ kṣīrodaka iva svargas surapater iva /
GSP27moksop_u:26148: tasya hemajaṭā nāma kirātās saṃsthitās tale /
GSP27moksop_u:26153: jayalakṣmyā bhuja iva yaḥ prajāyāś ca dakṣiṇaḥ //MU_5,58.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26155: mūrtaḥ parākrama iva mūrtimān iva mārutaḥ //MU_5,58.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26162: kim ārtaṃ pīḍayāmy enaṃ tilayantram ivaujasā /
GSP27moksop_u:26165: bhavaty aham ivāśeṣas tad alaṃ me vinigrahaiḥ //MU_5,58.17//
GSP27moksop_u:26166: atha vā nigrahaṃ prāptaṃ karomy etena vai vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:26167: vartate na prajaiveyaṃ vinā vāri sarid yathā //MU_5,58.18//
GSP27moksop_u:26168: hā kaṣṭam eṣa nigrāhyo diṣṭyānugrāhya eṣa me /
GSP27moksop_u:26169: diṣṭyādya sukhavān asmi kaṣṭam adyāsmi duḥkhavān //MU_5,58.19//
GSP27moksop_u:26170: iti dolāyitaṃ ceto na viśaśrāma bhūpateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26172: athaikadā gṛhaṃ tasya māṇḍavyo munir āyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:26174: tam asau pūjayām āsa papraccha ca mahāmunim /
GSP27moksop_u:26179: adya tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ nātha dhanyānāṃ dhuri dharmataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26182: tad imaṃ saṃśayaṃ chinddhi mamārkas timiraṃ yathā //MU_5,58.25//
GSP27moksop_u:26183: mahatāṃ saṅgamenārtiḥ kasya nāma na naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:26184: sandehaṃ tu parām ārtim āhur ārtivido janāḥ //MU_5,58.26//
GSP27moksop_u:26186: kaṣanti mām alaṃ cintā gajaṃ harinakhā iva //MU_5,58.27//
GSP27moksop_u:26187: tad yathā samatodeti sūryāṃśur iva sarvagā /
GSP27moksop_u:26188: matau mama mune mānya tathā karuṇayā kuru //MU_5,58.28//
GSP27moksop_u:26195: vicārayendriyāṇy antaḥ kīdṛśāny atha kāni vā //MU_5,58.31//
GSP27moksop_u:26196: ko 'haṃ katham idaṃ kiṃ vā kathaṃ maraṇajanmanī /
GSP27moksop_u:26197: vicārayāntar etat tvaṃ mahattām alam eṣyasi //MU_5,58.32//
GSP27moksop_u:26200: manas svaṃ rūpam utsṛjya śamam eṣyati vijvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:26202: tiṣṭhad eva mano rūpaṃ parityakṣyati te 'nagha /
GSP27moksop_u:26204: anukampyā bhaviṣyanti śrīmantas sarva eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:26209: na nimaṅkṣyati he sādho goṣpadeṣv iva vāraṇaḥ //MU_5,58.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26210: kṛpaṇaṃ tu mano rājan pelave 'pi nimajjati /
GSP27moksop_u:26216: tāvat prakṣālyate dhātur yāvad dhemaiva śiṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26217: tāvad ālokyate sarvaṃ yāvad ātmaiva lakṣyate //MU_5,58.42//
GSP27moksop_u:26218: sarvaṃ sarvikayā buddhyā svayaṃ sarvatra sarvadā /
GSP27moksop_u:26220: yāvat sarvaṃ na santyaktaṃ tāvad ātmā na labhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26222: yāvad anyan na santyaktaṃ tāvat sāmānyam eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:26223: vastu nāsādyate sādho svātmalābhe tu kā kathā //MU_5,58.45//
GSP27moksop_u:26225: tyaktānyakāryaḥ prāpnoti tan nāma nṛpa netarat //MU_5,58.46//
GSP27moksop_u:26227: sarvaṃ kiñcit parityajya yac chiṣṭaṃ tat paraṃ padam //MU_5,58.47//
GSP27moksop_u:26229: alam apāsya manas svavapus tataḥ parivilūya ca yac chubham asti tat //MU_5,58.48//
GSP27moksop_u:26233: ity uktvā bhagavān enaṃ suraghuṃ raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:26234: yayau svām eva kakubhaṃ māṇḍavyo maunamaṇḍanaḥ //MU_5,59.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26236: dhiyā sañcintayām āsa ko nāmāham iti svayam //MU_5,59.2//
GSP27moksop_u:26237: nāhaṃ merur na me merur jagan nāhaṃ na me jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:26238: nāhaṃ śailā na me śailā na dharāhaṃ na me dharā //MU_5,59.3//
GSP27moksop_u:26239: kirātamaṇḍalaṃ nedaṃ mama nāhaṃ ca maṇḍalam /
GSP27moksop_u:26241: tyakto mayaiṣa saṅketo nāhaṃ deśo na caiṣa me /
GSP27moksop_u:26242: idānīṃ nagaraṃ śiṣṭam eṣa evātra niścayaḥ //MU_5,59.5//
GSP27moksop_u:26244: gajāśvasāmantayutā purī nāhaṃ na me purī //MU_5,59.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26246: bhogavṛndaṃ kalatraṃ ca nāhaṃ naitan mamākhilam //MU_5,59.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26248: nāhaṃ rājyaṃ na me rājyaṃ saṅketo hy ayam ākulaḥ //MU_5,59.8//
GSP27moksop_u:26250: tad etat tāvad āśv antar aham ālokayāmy alam //MU_5,59.9//
GSP27moksop_u:26251: tad atra tāvan māṃsāsthi nāham etad acetanaṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:26252: na caitan mama saṃśleṣam ety abjasya yathā jalam //MU_5,59.10//
GSP27moksop_u:26253: māṃsaṃ jaḍaṃ na tad ahaṃ naivāhaṃ raktam apy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:26254: jaḍāny asthīni naivāhaṃ na caitāni mama kvacit //MU_5,59.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26255: karmendriyāṇi naivāhaṃ na ca karmendriyāṇi me /
GSP27moksop_u:26256: jaḍaṃ yat kila dehe 'smiṃs tad ahaṃ naiva cetanaḥ //MU_5,59.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26257: nāhaṃ bhogā na me bhogā na me buddhīndriyāṇi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:26258: jaḍāny asatsvarūpāṇi na ca buddhīndriyāṇy aham //MU_5,59.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26259: mūlaṃ saṃsṛtidoṣasya mano nāhaṃ jaḍaṃ hi tat /
GSP27moksop_u:26260: atha buddhir ahaṅkāra iti dṛṣṭir manomayī //MU_5,59.14//
GSP27moksop_u:26262: nāham evaṃ śarīrādi śiṣṭam ālokayāmy aham //MU_5,59.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26263: śeṣas tu cetanājīvas sa ca cetyena cetati /
GSP27moksop_u:26265: evaṃ tyajāmi saṃvedyaṃ cetyaṃ nāhaṃ hi tat kila /
GSP27moksop_u:26266: śeṣo vikalparahito viśuddhā cid ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,59.17//
GSP27moksop_u:26267: citram eṣo 'smi labdhātmā jātaḥ kālena kāryavit /
GSP27moksop_u:26270: sa eṣa bhagavān ātmā tantur muktāsv iva sthitaḥ //MU_5,59.19//
GSP27moksop_u:26283: seyam ātmā mama vyāpī seyaṃ madavabodhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:26287: idaṃ manaś śarīrādi na kiñcit api vastutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26288: naṣṭe na kiñcit apy asmin parinaśyati pelave //MU_5,59.28//
GSP27moksop_u:26292: babhūva dehaniṣṭhaiva na kiñcid api dehakaḥ //MU_5,59.30//
GSP27moksop_u:26293: nanv aho samprabuddho 'smi gataṃ durdarśanaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:26294: dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ akhilaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyam idaṃ mayā //MU_5,59.31//
GSP27moksop_u:26295: sarvaṃ kiñcit idaṃ dṛśyaṃ dṛśyate yaj jagadgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:26297: kva tau kīdṛgvidhau vāpi kiṃniṣṭhau vā kimātmakau /
GSP27moksop_u:26299: kiṃ sukhaṃ kiṃ ca vā duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ brahmedam ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:26300: aham āsaṃ mudhā mūḍho diṣṭyāmūḍho 'smy ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_5,59.34//
GSP27moksop_u:26301: kim asminn evam āloke śocyate kiṃ vimuhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26302: kiṃ prekṣyate kim kriyate sthīyate kva kva gamyate //MU_5,59.35//
GSP27moksop_u:26303: kiñcit ittham idaṃ nāma cidābhāsaṃ virājate /
GSP27moksop_u:26304: namo namas te nistattva dṛṣṭadṛśyo 'si sundara //MU_5,59.36//
GSP27moksop_u:26305: aho nu samprabuddho 'smi samyag jñātam alaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:26308: sthirasuṣuptakalātigatas tatas samasamaṃ nivasāmy aham ātmani //MU_5,59.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26322: na nirghṛṇo dayāvān no na dvandvī nāpy amatsaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26323: na sukhī nāsukhī nārthī nānarthī sa babhūva ha //MU_5,60.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26326: sarvaṃ cittattvakacanaṃ jagad ity avalokya sā /
GSP27moksop_u:26328: ullasan vilasan ghūrṇaṃs tiṣṭhan gacchañ śvasan svapan /
GSP27moksop_u:26329: abhūt sa svasamādhisthaḥ prabuddhaś cillayaṃ gataḥ //MU_5,60.9//
GSP27moksop_u:26333: sa jahau tejasākrānto rūpaṃ himakaṇo yathā //MU_5,60.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26334: viveśa param ādyaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ kāraṇeśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:26337: alam abhavad asau paraṃ svarūpaṃ ghaṭakham ivāmbarasaṃyutaṃ mahātmā //MU_5,60.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26341: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya na manaḥ paritapyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26342: ghore tamasi nirmagnaṃ labdhadīpaś śiśur yathā //MU_5,61.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26351: śṛṇu tasyaiva suraghoḥ prabuddhasya satas tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:26352: parṇādasya ca rājarṣes saṃvādam imam adbhutam //MU_5,61.5//
GSP27moksop_u:26356: parigho nāma vikhyātaḥ parighas syandane yathā //MU_5,61.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26357: sa babhūva paraṃ mitraṃ suragho raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:26363: tadduḥkhaṃ parigho dṛṣṭvā viṣādam atulaṃ yayau /
GSP27moksop_u:26364: tatyāja cākhilaṃ rājyaṃ dagdhaṃ grāmam ivādhvagaḥ //MU_5,61.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26370: svayaṃ śīrṇāni śuṣkāṇi tatra parṇāny abhakṣayat //MU_5,61.14//
GSP27moksop_u:26372: parṇāda iti nāmāsau prāpa madhye tapasvinām //MU_5,61.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26383: te tatra prāktane mitre pūjām akurutāṃ mithaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26385: aho nu mama kalyāṇaiḥ phalitaṃ bata pāvanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26386: samprāptavān ahaṃ yat tvām ity anyo'nyam athocatuḥ //MU_5,61.22//
GSP27moksop_u:26394: visrabdhāṃs tān kathālāpāṃs tā līlās tac ca ceṣṭitam /
GSP27moksop_u:26395: saṃsmṛtya prāktanaṃ sādho hṛṣyāmy eva punaḥ punaḥ //MU_5,61.26//
GSP27moksop_u:26396: jñānam etan mayā prāptaṃ tvayā jñānaṃ yathānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:26398: adya kaccid aduḥkhas tvaṃ kaccid viśrāntavān asi /
GSP27moksop_u:26403: dṛṣṭyā subhaga kāryāṇi kāryāṇy eva narādhipa //MU_5,61.30//
GSP27moksop_u:26407: dharā tava phalāpūrair bhṛśaṃ dhārayati prajāḥ //MU_5,61.32//
GSP27moksop_u:26411: tvayā saro'mbhasā bandho bisānām iva bhittayaḥ //MU_5,61.34//
GSP27moksop_u:26413: pratigrāmaṃ kumāryas te gāyanty ānandadaṃ yaśaḥ //MU_5,61.35//
GSP27moksop_u:26414: kuśalaṃ tava dhānyeṣu dhaneṣu vibhaveṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:26415: bhṛtyeṣv atha kalatreṣu putreṣu nagareṣu ca //MU_5,61.36//
GSP27moksop_u:26417: phalaṃ phalati puṇyākhyaṃ yad ihāmutra coditam //MU_5,61.37//
GSP27moksop_u:26420: aho bata ciraṃ kālam āvāṃ viśleṣam āgatau /
GSP27moksop_u:26422: na tā jagati vidyante sukhaduḥkhadaśās sakhe /
GSP27moksop_u:26425: bhūyo vayam api śliṣṭāś citrā hi niyatir vidheḥ //MU_5,61.41//
GSP27moksop_u:26427: bhagavan niyater asyā gatiṃ dīpagater iva /
GSP27moksop_u:26428: daivikyāḥ ko hi jānāti gambhīrāṃ vismayapradām //MU_5,61.42//
GSP27moksop_u:26429: tvam ahaṃ ca viyojyātidūre dūradaśāsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:26430: adya saṅghaṭitau bhūyaḥ kim asādhyam aho vidheḥ //MU_5,61.43//
GSP27moksop_u:26431: vayaṃ tv adya mahāsattva bhṛśaṃ kuśalinas sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26434: tathā phalitam asmākaṃ na yathā vayam ākulāḥ //MU_5,61.45//
GSP27moksop_u:26437: vikirati parito rasāyanānām iva nikaraṃ madhuraṃ mahānubhāva /
GSP27moksop_u:26438: tava vacanam avekṣaṇaṃ ca puṇyaṃ paramapadapratimo hi sādhusaṅgaḥ //MU_5,61.47//
GSP27moksop_u:26445: yad yat saṃsārajāle 'smin kriyate karma bhūmipa /
GSP27moksop_u:26453: yo jño mahātman satataṃ tūṣṇīṃ vyavaharaṃś ca vā /
GSP27moksop_u:26458: aviśrāntasvabhāvasya kas samādhiḥ kathaṃ ca vā //MU_5,62.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26461: proktas samādhibhedena na tu tūṣṇīm avasthitiḥ //MU_5,62.8//
GSP27moksop_u:26468: yataḥ prabhṛti bodhena yuktam ātyantikaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26470: na hi prabuddhamanaso bhūtvā vicchidyate punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26471: samādhir dūram ākṛṣṭo bisatantuś śiśor iva //MU_5,62.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26472: samagraṃ dinam ālokād viramaty akṣi no yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:26474: ajasram ambu vahanād yathā nadyā na rudhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26475: tathā vijñānadṛg bodhāt kṣaṇamātraṃ na rudhyate //MU_5,62.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26476: na vismaraty avirataṃ yathā kālakalā gatim /
GSP27moksop_u:26477: na vismaraty avirataṃ svātmānaṃ prājñadhīs tathā //MU_5,62.16//
GSP27moksop_u:26478: na vismarati sarvatra yathā satatago gatim /
GSP27moksop_u:26479: na vismarati niścetyaṃ cinmātraṃ prājñadhīs tathā //MU_5,62.17//
GSP27moksop_u:26481: cic ciraṃ cetyarahitaṃ cinvānāṅgaṃ tathā sthitā //MU_5,62.18//
GSP27moksop_u:26484: na sambhavati saṃsāre guṇahīno guṇī yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:26485: na sambhavaty ātmasaṃvidvarjito hy ātmavāṃs tathā //MU_5,62.20//
GSP27moksop_u:26488: bhedaḥ kena samādher me janyate katham eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:26490: tasmāt kadācid api me na samādhimayaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26492: sarvagas sarvadaivātmā sarvam eva ca sarvathā /
GSP27moksop_u:26493: asamādhir hi ko 'sau syāt samādhir api kas smṛtaḥ //MU_5,62.24//
GSP27moksop_u:26494: nityaṃ samāhitadhiyas suśamā mahāntas tiṣṭhanti kāryapariṇāmavibhāgamuktāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26499: rājan nūnaṃ prabuddho 'si prāptavān asi tat padam /
GSP27moksop_u:26516: na tad asti mune vastu yatropādeyatāsti naḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26517: yāvat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyaṃ tāvad eva na kiñcana //MU_5,63.9//
GSP27moksop_u:26518: upādeyasya cābhāvād dheyam apy asti kiṃ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:26523: atucchasya tu tucchatvaṃ varjye nindāstutī budhaiḥ //MU_5,63.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26524: rāgān nindāstutī loke rāgaś ca parivāñchanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:26526: trilokyāṃ ca striyaś śailās samudrā vanarājayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26527: bhūtāni ca suśūnyāni sāro nāsty uttamas tataḥ //MU_5,63.14//
GSP27moksop_u:26532: alam ativitatair vacaḥprapañcair iyam uciteha sukhāya dṛṣṭir ekā /
GSP27moksop_u:26533: samupaśamitavāsanaṃ mano 'ntar yadi muditaṃ hi tad uttamā pratiṣṭhā //MU_5,63.17//
GSP27moksop_u:26539: tad eva rāghava śrutvā paramaṃ bodhakāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:26547: yo nityam adhyātmamayo nityam antarmukhas sukhī /
GSP27moksop_u:26548: nityaṃ cidanusandhānas sa na śokena bādhyate //MU_5,64.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26550: nāntaḥ kalaṅkam ādatte padmo jalalavaṃ yathā //MU_5,64.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26552: na bādhyate sa manasā kariṇeva mṛgādhipaḥ //MU_5,64.8//
GSP27moksop_u:26553: bhogaikaśaraṇaṃ dīnaṃ na cittaṃ jñasya vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26561: avidyā samparijñātā yadaiva hi tadaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:26562: sā parikṣīyate bhūyas svadate ca na bhogabhūḥ //MU_5,64.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26568: taṃ prabodham avāpnoti punar yena na muhyati //MU_5,64.16//
GSP27moksop_u:26569: dināni jīvyate tāni sānandās te kriyākramāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26573: tāni mitrāṇi śāstrāṇi tāni tāni dināni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:26594: paramaṃ yatnam āsthāya ciram uttārayed balāt //MU_5,64.29//
GSP27moksop_u:26595: tattvāvalokanāt kṣīṇe citte no jāyate punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26598: yuktis samprāpyate rāma dṛḍhā naur iva nāvikāt //MU_5,64.31//
GSP27moksop_u:26600: saphalaś śītalacchāyo na tatra nivased budhaḥ //MU_5,64.32//
GSP27moksop_u:26605: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmanātmānam uddharet /
GSP27moksop_u:26607: kim idaṃ katham āyātaṃ kimmūlaṃ kimapakṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:26609: na dhanāni na mitrāṇi na śāstrāṇi na bandhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26612: saha kiñcit parāmṛśya bhavaty ātmā samuddhṛtaḥ //MU_5,64.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26630: sā parā bharitākārā sā sarvavyāpinī citiḥ //MU_5,64.47//
GSP27moksop_u:26634: turyā cet prāpyate dṛṣṭis tat tayā sopamīyate //MU_5,64.49//
GSP27moksop_u:26640: na gamyā vacasāṃ rāma hṛdy evehānubhūyate //MU_5,64.52//
GSP27moksop_u:26641: akhilam idam anantam ātmatattvaṃ dṛḍhapariṇāmini cetasi sthite 'ntaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26642: bahir upaśamite carācarātmā svayam anubhūyata eva devadevaḥ //MU_5,64.53//
GSP27moksop_u:26643: tadanu viṣayavāsanāvināśas tadanu śubhaḥ paramasphuṭaḥ prakāśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26644: tadanu ca samatāvaśāt svarūpe pariṇamanaṃ mahatām acintyarūpe //MU_5,64.54//
GSP27moksop_u:26648: manasaiva manaś chittvā yady ātmā nāvalokyate /
GSP27moksop_u:26649: mamety aham iti tyaktvā tat tāmarasalocana //MU_5,65.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26650: nāstam eti jagadduḥkhaṃ yathā citragato raviḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26670: skandheṣu devair valitaḥ pādeṣu valito naraiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26672: kandareṣu śritas siddhair nidhānair antar āśritaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26673: candaneṣu śrito nāgais siṃhaiś śṛṅgaśikhāsu ca //MU_5,65.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26677: sa dārujair iva surastrīgaṇair alam āśritaḥ //MU_5,65.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26687: atrer asty āśramaś śrīmān siddhaśramaharo mahān //MU_5,65.20//
GSP27moksop_u:26688: mahaty atryāśrame tasmiṃs tāpasau dvau babhūvatuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26693: tau pitroḥ pallavau śīghraṃ latāpādapayor iva //MU_5,65.23//
GSP27moksop_u:26696: nābhūtāṃ viprayuktau tau suraktāv iva dampatī /
GSP27moksop_u:26697: ekaṃ dvitvam ivāpannaṃ samam āsīt tayor manaḥ //MU_5,65.25//
GSP27moksop_u:26699: tasthatus svāśrame maune saroja iva ṣaṭpadau //MU_5,65.26//
GSP27moksop_u:26702: jagmatur deham utsṛjya tatas tau pitarau tayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26703: svargaṃ jarārtāv uḍḍīya nīḍād iva vihaṅgamau //MU_5,65.28//
GSP27moksop_u:26707: lokasthitir alaṅghyā hi mahatām api mānada //MU_5,65.30//
GSP27moksop_u:26708: kṛtvaurdhvadaihikam atho vyathayābhibhūtau śokotthayā karuṇam ārtagirā vilapya /
GSP27moksop_u:26709: citrārpitāv iva nirastasamastaceṣṭau tau saṃsthitau susamaśūnyahṛdādināntam //MU_5,65.31//
GSP27moksop_u:26715: viraktau vipine kālaṃ kṣapayām āsatur dvijau /
GSP27moksop_u:26716: viyūthāv iva sāraṅgāv anāsthām āgatau parām //MU_5,66.2//
GSP27moksop_u:26717: jagmur dināni māsāś ca varṣāṇy atha tayos tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:26718: kramāt tāv api saṃyātau jarāṃ śvabhradrumāv iva //MU_5,66.3//
GSP27moksop_u:26720: tāv ekadā saṅghaṭitāv idam anyo'nyam ūcatuḥ //MU_5,66.4//
GSP27moksop_u:26723: jagaty asmin mahābandho bhāsa svāgatam astu te //MU_5,66.5//
GSP27moksop_u:26725: vada kva kṣapitās sādho kaccit te vimalaṃ tapaḥ //MU_5,66.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26726: kaccit te vijvarā buddhiḥ kaccij jātas tvam ātmavān /
GSP27moksop_u:26727: kaccit phalitavidyas tvaṃ kaccit kuśalavān asi //MU_5,66.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26732: sādho svāgatam adyāṅga diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si mānada /
GSP27moksop_u:26733: kuśalaṃ tu kuto 'smākaṃ saṃsāre tiṣṭhatām iha //MU_5,66.9//
GSP27moksop_u:26734: yāvan nādhigataṃ jñeyaṃ yāvat kṣīṇā na cittabhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26735: yāvat tīrṇaṃ na saṃsārāt tāvan me kuśalaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,66.10//
GSP27moksop_u:26736: yāvan nādhigataṃ jñānaṃ yāvan na samatoditā /
GSP27moksop_u:26737: yāvan nābhyudito bodhas tāvan naḥ kuśalaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,66.11//
GSP27moksop_u:26738: āśā yāvad aśeṣeṇa na lūnāś cittasambhavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26739: vīrudho dātrakeṇeva tāvan naḥ kuśalaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,66.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26761: mukhaṃ dhūsaratām eti himaiḥ padmam ivāhatam //MU_5,66.23//
GSP27moksop_u:26779: na jñāyate kva magneti tāta janmani janmani //MU_5,66.32//
GSP27moksop_u:26781: ceto bhramati sāmudre gartāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā //MU_5,66.33//
GSP27moksop_u:26784: idaṃ kṛtaṃ karomīdaṃ kariṣyāmīdam ity alam /
GSP27moksop_u:26786: ayaṃ suhṛd ayaṃ śatrur iti dvandvamahāmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26789: kṣaṇād ucchūnatām eti mānamīnaḥ kṣaṇāt kṣatim //MU_5,66.37//
GSP27moksop_u:26793: jagadudaragirau luṭhañ jano 'yaṃ gatarasaparṇavad eti jarjaratvam //MU_5,66.39//
GSP27moksop_u:26798: kālenāsādya vimalaṃ jñānaṃ mokṣaṃ tato gatau //MU_5,67.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26799: ato vacmi mahābāho yathā jñānetarā gatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26801: idaṃ bhavyamater duḥkham anantam api pelavam /
GSP27moksop_u:26804: dūrad dehaṃ hasanti svaṃ prekṣyārko janatām iva //MU_5,67.4//
GSP27moksop_u:26805: dehe duḥkhini saṅkṣubdhe kā naḥ kṣatir upasthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:26806: rathe vidhurite bhagne sāratheḥ keva khaṇḍanā //MU_5,67.5//
GSP27moksop_u:26807: manasi kṣubdhatāṃ yāte cittvasyāṅga kim āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:26808: taraṅge rajasā mlāne vaiparītyaṃ kim ambudheḥ //MU_5,67.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26809: ke bhavanty ayasāṃ haṃsāḥ payasām upalāś ca ke /
GSP27moksop_u:26810: kāś śilāḥ kila dārūṇāṃ ke bhogāḥ paramātmanaḥ //MU_5,67.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26822: saṃyukteṣu viyukteṣu na tathā pañcasu kṣatiḥ //MU_5,67.13//
GSP27moksop_u:26826: etā hy ajñānamātrasya tasmin naṣṭe tad eva tāḥ //MU_5,67.15//
GSP27moksop_u:26829: ajñasyāyaṃ yathā dṛṣṭas saṃsāras satyatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26838: dvitvopalāñchitā tv anyā dussaṃvittir na vidyate //MU_5,67.21//
GSP27moksop_u:26848: tattyāgena tato mukto bhavatīti vidur budhāḥ //MU_5,67.26//
GSP27moksop_u:26853: antassaṅgo hi saṃsāre sarveṣāṃ nāma dehinām /
GSP27moksop_u:26861: asaktaṃ nirmalaṃ cittaṃ muktaṃ saṃsāry api sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:26862: saktaṃ tu dīrghatapasā yuktam apy atibandhavat //MU_5,67.33//
GSP27moksop_u:26869: akartari manasy antar akartṛtvaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:26870: śūnyacitto hi puruṣaḥ kurvann api na cetati //MU_5,67.37//
GSP27moksop_u:26871: cetasā kṛtam āpnoṣi cetasā na kṛtaṃ na tu /
GSP27moksop_u:26872: na kvacit kāraṇaṃ deho na cittam api kartṛ vai //MU_5,67.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26873: asaṃsaktam akartr eva kurvad eva mano viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26878: bahiḥ kurvann akurvan vā kartā bhoktā na hi kvacit //MU_5,67.41//
GSP27moksop_u:26879: antassaṃsaktimuktaṃ yan manas syāt tad akartṛkam /
GSP27moksop_u:26880: tad viyuktaṃ praśāntaṃ tat tad yuktaṃ tad alepakam //MU_5,67.42//
GSP27moksop_u:26881: tat syāt sarvapadārthānāṃ śliṣṭānāṃ niścitaṃ bahiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26883: virahitam alam antassaṅgadoṣeṇa cetaś śamam upagatam ādyaṃ vyomavan nirmalābham /
GSP27moksop_u:26884: sakalakalanamuktenātmanaikatvam eti sthiram alinibham ambho vāriṇīvālinīle //MU_5,67.44//
GSP27moksop_u:26888: kīdṛśo bhagavan saṅgaḥ kaś ca bandhāya vai nṛṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:26889: kaś ca mokṣāya kathitaḥ kathaṃ caiṣa cikitsyate //MU_5,68.1//
GSP27moksop_u:26892: dehamātre tu viśvāsas saṅgo bandhārha ucyate //MU_5,68.2//
GSP27moksop_u:26894: yat sukhārthitvam antas sa saṅgo bandhārha ucyate //MU_5,68.3//
GSP27moksop_u:26895: sarvam ātmedam akhilaṃ kiṃ vāñchāmi tyajāmi kim /
GSP27moksop_u:26897: nāham asmi na cānyo 'sti mā bhavantu bhavantu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:26898: sukhāny asakta ity antaḥ kathyate muktibhāṅ naraḥ //MU_5,68.5//
GSP27moksop_u:26900: susamo yaḥ phalatyāgī so 'saṃsakta iti smṛtaḥ //MU_5,68.6//
GSP27moksop_u:26902: yasya nāyāty asakto 'sau jīvanmuktaś ca kathyate //MU_5,68.7//
GSP27moksop_u:26904: nipuṇaṃ yaḥ parityāgas so 'saṃsaṅga iti smṛtaḥ //MU_5,68.8//
GSP27moksop_u:26906: cikitsitā bhavanty aṅga śreyas sampādayanti ca //MU_5,68.9//
GSP27moksop_u:26912: tarur vahati yat tanvā tat saṃsaṅgavijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.12//
GSP27moksop_u:26916: jahāti yan mṛgo dehaṃ tat saṃsaṅgavijṛmbhitam //MU_5,68.14//
GSP27moksop_u:26917: vīruttṛṇadaśāṃ yātā lūyante yat punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26925: saktir hi dvividhā proktā vandhyā vandyā ca rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:26926: vandhyā sarvatra mūḍhānāṃ vandyā tattvavidāṃ nijā //MU_5,68.19//
GSP27moksop_u:26943: manaḥ patati bhogeṣu gṛdhro māṃsalaveṣv iva /
GSP27moksop_u:26947: divi devā bhuvi narāḥ pātāle bhogino 'surāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:26949: jāyante ca mriyante ca nipatanty utpatanti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:26952: sambhrāntā prabhramaty aṅga śīrṇaṃ parṇam ivāmbare //MU_5,68.32//
GSP27moksop_u:26956: adyāpi na jahātīndur jaḍimnā malinaṃ vapuḥ //MU_5,68.34//
GSP27moksop_u:26960: idam āracitaṃ citraṃ vicitraṃ paśya rāghava //MU_5,68.36//
GSP27moksop_u:26962: yad idaṃ racitaṃ citraṃ na tat satyaṃ kadācana //MU_5,68.37//
GSP27moksop_u:26964: atti tṛṣṇā śarīrāṇi tṛṇāny agniśikhā yathā //MU_5,68.38//
GSP27moksop_u:26974: jvalatāṃ narakāgnīnāṃ viddhi tena jvalanti te //MU_5,68.43//
GSP27moksop_u:26975: duḥkhajālam idaṃ rāma yat kiñcij jagatīgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:26987: vidyādṛśi prodayam āgatena kṣayaṃ tv avidyāviṣayaṃ gatena /
GSP27moksop_u:26988: sarvatra saṃsaktivivarjitena svacetasā tiṣṭhati yas sa muktaḥ //MU_5,68.50//
GSP27moksop_u:26994: na saktam iha cintāsu na ceṣṭāsu na vastuṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:26995: nākāśe nāpy adhobhāge na dikṣu na latāsu ca //MU_5,69.2//
GSP27moksop_u:26997: nābhyantare na ca prāṇe na mūrdhani na tāluni //MU_5,69.3//
GSP27moksop_u:26998: na bhrūmadhye na nāsānte na mukhe na khatārake /
GSP27moksop_u:26999: nāndhakāre na cābhāse na cāsmin hṛdayāmbare //MU_5,69.4//
GSP27moksop_u:27000: na jāgrati na ca svapne na suṣupte na nirmale /
GSP27moksop_u:27001: nāsite na ca vā pīte raktādau śabale 'pi ca //MU_5,69.5//
GSP27moksop_u:27002: na sthire na cale nādau na madhye netaratra ca /
GSP27moksop_u:27003: na dūre nāntike nāṅge na padārthe na cātmani //MU_5,69.6//
GSP27moksop_u:27007: sarvatra nīrasam iva tiṣṭhatv ātmarasaṃ manaḥ //MU_5,69.8//
GSP27moksop_u:27009: vyavahāram imaṃ sarvaṃ mā karotu karotu vā //MU_5,69.9//
GSP27moksop_u:27010: akurvan vāpi kurvan vā jīvas svātmaratikriyām /
GSP27moksop_u:27011: kriyāphalair na sambandham āyāti kham ivāmbudaiḥ //MU_5,69.10//
GSP27moksop_u:27012: atha vā tam api tyaktvā cetyāṃśaṃ śāntacidghanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27013: jīvas tiṣṭhatu saṃśāntaṃ jvalan maṇir ivātmani //MU_5,69.11//
GSP27moksop_u:27014: nirvāṇam ātmani gatas satatoditātmā jīvo bhuvi vyavaharann api rāmabhadra /
GSP27moksop_u:27015: nāsaṅgam eti gatasaṅgatayā phalena karmodbhavena hasatīva ca deham ārāt //MU_5,69.12//
GSP27moksop_u:27022: antaḥpūrṇasya vadane śrīr indor iva lakṣyate //MU_5,70.2//
GSP27moksop_u:27025: nityam ātmadṛgālīno jñas svasthaś cañcalo 'pi san /
GSP27moksop_u:27037: jāgraty eva suṣuptastho jīvo bhavati rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:27039: atra prauḍhim upāyātas turyatām eti pāvanīm /
GSP27moksop_u:27043: tāṃ ca suptadaśām etya jīvan vyavaharan naraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27045: jāgraty eva suṣuptastho yaḥ karoti jagatkriyām /
GSP27moksop_u:27048: ātmatām āgate citte kasya kiṃ bādhate katham //MU_5,70.15//
GSP27moksop_u:27050: kurvan na badhyate jīvo jīvanmuktatayā sthitaḥ //MU_5,70.16//
GSP27moksop_u:27051: sauṣuptīṃ vṛttim āśritya kuru mā kuru vānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:27053: nādānaṃ na parityāgaḥ karmaṇo jñāya rocate /
GSP27moksop_u:27055: kurvann api na kartāsi suṣuptaikasthayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:27056: akartāpi ca kartāsi yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_5,70.19//
GSP27moksop_u:27057: yathā na kiñcit kalayan mañcake spandate śiśuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27058: tathā phalādy akalayan kuru karmāṇi rāghava //MU_5,70.20//
GSP27moksop_u:27060: yad yat karoti labdhātmā tasmiṃs tasya na kartṛtā //MU_5,70.21//
GSP27moksop_u:27062: antaśśītalatām eti jño rasena yathā śaśī //MU_5,70.22//
GSP27moksop_u:27064: samas sarvāsv avasthāsu bhavaty adrir yathartuṣu //MU_5,70.23//
GSP27moksop_u:27068: ghātayāśv atha vā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ dhāraya śailavat //MU_5,70.25//
GSP27moksop_u:27070: prauḍhā satī turyam iti kathitā tattvakovidaiḥ //MU_5,70.26//
GSP27moksop_u:27077: prāptuṃ svāṃ padavīṃ puṇyāṃ yatnavantam imaṃ janam /
GSP27moksop_u:27082: mukta ity ucyate yogī turyātītapadaṃ gataḥ //MU_5,70.32//
GSP27moksop_u:27090: ata ūrdhvaṃ sadehānāṃ muktānāṃ vacasāṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27096: turyātītāṃ daśāṃ tajjñā yathā yānty ātmakovidāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27099: citrendor iva te na staḥ kṣayodvegāv arindama //MU_5,71.6//
GSP27moksop_u:27101: mā gṛhāṇa bhramo hy eṣa śarīram iti jṛmbhate //MU_5,71.7//
GSP27moksop_u:27102: dehanāśena ko 'rthas te ko 'rthas te dehasaṃsthayā /
GSP27moksop_u:27103: bhava tvaṃ prakṛtārambhas tiṣṭhatv eṣa yathāsthitam //MU_5,71.8//
GSP27moksop_u:27104: jñātavān asi tat satyaṃ buddhavān asi tat padam /
GSP27moksop_u:27105: prāptavān asi rūpaṃ svaṃ viśoko bhava bhūtaye //MU_5,71.9//
GSP27moksop_u:27111: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me iti te māstu vibhramaḥ //MU_5,71.12//
GSP27moksop_u:27113: nāmarūpādibhedās tu dūram asmād alaṃ gatāḥ //MU_5,71.13//
GSP27moksop_u:27114: jalam eva yathāmbhodhir na taraṅgādikaṃ pṛthak /
GSP27moksop_u:27115: ātmaivedaṃ tathā sarvaṃ na bhūtaughādikaṃ pṛthak //MU_5,71.14//
GSP27moksop_u:27116: yathā samastāj jaladher jalād anyan na labhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27117: tathaiva jagatas sphārād ātmano 'nyan na labhyate //MU_5,71.15//
GSP27moksop_u:27118: ayaṃ so 'ham iti prājña kva karoṣi vyavasthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:27119: kiṃ tat tvaṃ kiṃ ca vā te syāt kiṃ na tvaṃ kiṃ ca vā na te //MU_5,71.16//
GSP27moksop_u:27120: na dvitvam asti no dehas sambandho na ca taiś citaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27123: dehādibhis sadbhir api na sambandho vibhor bhavet //MU_5,71.18//
GSP27moksop_u:27125: na sambhavati sambandhas tathā vai dehadehinoḥ //MU_5,71.19//
GSP27moksop_u:27127: na sambhavati sambandho rāma dehātmanos tathā //MU_5,71.20//
GSP27moksop_u:27130: cinmātreṇātmanā dehas sambaddha iti yā kathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27135: dehas tv anityo malavāṃs tena sambadhyate katham //MU_5,71.24//
GSP27moksop_u:27137: dehas tena na sambandho manāg eva mahātmanaḥ //MU_5,71.25//
GSP27moksop_u:27138: siddhe dvitve 'pi dehasya na sambandhasya sambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27140: ity etad eva tat satyam atraivāṅga sthitiṃ kuru /
GSP27moksop_u:27141: na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti kadācit kasyacit kvacit //MU_5,71.27//
GSP27moksop_u:27142: sarvam ātmamayaṃ śāntam ity eva pratyayaṃ sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:27144: sukhī duḥkhī ca mūḍho 'smīty etā durdṛṣṭayas smṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27145: āsu ced vastubuddhis te tac ciraṃ duḥkham eṣyasi //MU_5,71.29//
GSP27moksop_u:27148: yathā śītoṣṇayor aikyaṃ kathāsv api na dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27150: yathā tejastimirayor na sambandho na tulyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:27155: yathā prajāyate vaṃśād deharandhrāt tathaiva hi //MU_5,71.34//
GSP27moksop_u:27159: pratibimbam ivādarśe citta eva ca dṛśyate //MU_5,71.36//
GSP27moksop_u:27162: yatra puṣpaṃ tatra gandhasaṃvidas saṃsthitā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27163: yatra cittaṃ hi tatrātmasaṃvidas saṃsthitās tathā //MU_5,71.38//
GSP27moksop_u:27165: yathā tathātmā sarvatra sthitaś cetasi dṛśyate //MU_5,71.39//
GSP27moksop_u:27166: apām avanataṃ sthānam āspadaṃ bhūtale yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27171: ātmā sarvātigatvāt tu kāraṇaṃ sad akāraṇam //MU_5,71.42//
GSP27moksop_u:27177: asattām ety alaṃ ceto dīpeneva tamaḥ kṣaṇāt //MU_5,71.45//
GSP27moksop_u:27181: etās sañjñāḥ prabho bahvyaś cetaso rūḍhim āgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27182: katham ity eva kathaya mayi mānada siddhaye //MU_5,71.47//
GSP27moksop_u:27186: ātmā spandaikarūpātmā sthitas teṣu kvacit kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:27196: jīvanāj jīva ity ukto 'hambhāvaś cāpy ahantayā /
GSP27moksop_u:27201: tad etad eva nānātvaṃ nānāsañjñābhir āgatam //MU_5,71.56//
GSP27moksop_u:27205: mohāya kevalaṃ mūḍhair vyartham arthāḥ prakalpitāḥ //MU_5,71.58//
GSP27moksop_u:27210: ekaparṇarase kṣīṇe raso naiti yathā kṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:27212: śarīrasaṅkṣaye dehī na kṣayaṃ yāti kasyacit /
GSP27moksop_u:27213: nirvāsanaś cet tad vyomni tiṣṭhaty ātmapade tathā //MU_5,71.62//
GSP27moksop_u:27215: mātus stanataṭāt tasya manye vetāla utthitaḥ //MU_5,71.63//
GSP27moksop_u:27216: yasya hy ātyantiko nāśas syād asāv uditas smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27217: cittanāśo hi nāśas syāt sa mokṣa iti kathyate //MU_5,71.64//
GSP27moksop_u:27218: mṛto naṣṭa iti proktam anyais tac ca mṛṣā na sat /
GSP27moksop_u:27224: punas tad api santyajya prayāty anyad api kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:27225: anyasmin vitate deśe kāle 'nyasmiṃś ca rāghava //MU_5,71.68//
GSP27moksop_u:27226: itaś cetaś ca nīyante jīvā vāsanayā svayā /
GSP27moksop_u:27233: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:27234: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_5,71.72//
GSP27moksop_u:27238: dehe jāte na jāto 'si dehe naṣṭe na naśyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:27239: tvam ātmā niṣkalaṅkātmā dehas tava na kaścana //MU_5,72.1//
GSP27moksop_u:27241: tatraikasmin kṣate kṣīṇe dve iti vyarthakalpanā //MU_5,72.2//
GSP27moksop_u:27242: vināśini vinaṣṭe 'smin dehe svāṃ sthitim āgate /
GSP27moksop_u:27243: vinaśyāmīti yaḥ khedī taṃ dhig astv andhacetanam //MU_5,72.3//
GSP27moksop_u:27253: ekasmād eva viṭapād vicitrā iva putrikāḥ //MU_5,72.8//
GSP27moksop_u:27254: kāṣṭhetarat kāṣṭhanare kiñcid anyan na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27255: bhūtapiṇḍetarad dehe kiñcid anyan na vidyate //MU_5,72.9//
GSP27moksop_u:27258: ko nāmātiśayaḥ puṃsāṃ strīnāmny aparanāmni vā /
GSP27moksop_u:27263: śliṣṭayor api no rāgas tathā cittaśarīrayoḥ //MU_5,72.13//
GSP27moksop_u:27268: itaś cetaś ca yātāni yathā saṃśleṣayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:27274: prabodhāc cittatāṃ tyaktvā vrajaty ātmātmatāṃ svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:27288: na kūlakāṣair jaladhir na rajobhir nabhastalam /
GSP27moksop_u:27290: gatair abhyāgatais svacchair malinaiś capalair jaḍaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27291: na rāgo nāmbudher dveṣo bhogaiś cādhigatātmanaḥ //MU_5,72.27//
GSP27moksop_u:27292: yan manomananaṃ kiñcit samagre jagati sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:27294: yad ahaṃ yac ca bhūtādi kālatritayabhāvi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:27296: yad dṛśyaṃ tad asat sad vā dṛṣṭim ekām upāśritam /
GSP27moksop_u:27297: anyat tv alepakaṃ tasmād dharṣaśokadaśe kutaḥ //MU_5,72.30//
GSP27moksop_u:27298: asatyam evāsatyaṃ hi satyaṃ satyaṃ sadaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:27299: satyāsatyam asad viddhi tadarthaṃ kiṃ vimuhyasi //MU_5,72.31//
GSP27moksop_u:27301: na kvacin muhyati prauḍhas samyagdarśanavān iha //MU_5,72.32//
GSP27moksop_u:27305: dadāty ajñāya saṃsāraṃ jñāya mokṣaṃ sukhodayā //MU_5,72.34//
GSP27moksop_u:27307: tad dṛśyāvalitaṃ baddhaṃ tanmuktaṃ muktam ucyate //MU_5,72.35//
GSP27moksop_u:27309: kṣayātiśayamuktā cet tan muktis socyate budhaiḥ //MU_5,72.36//
GSP27moksop_u:27312: sauṣuptī dṛṣṭir eṣā hi yāty evaṃ samprakāśatām /
GSP27moksop_u:27313: evaṃ ca yāti turyatvam evaṃ muktir iti smṛtā //MU_5,72.38//
GSP27moksop_u:27316: nātmā sthūlo na caivāṇur na pratyakṣo na cetanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27317: nācetano na ca jaḍo na caivāsan na sanmayaḥ //MU_5,72.40//
GSP27moksop_u:27318: nāhaṃ nānyo na caivaiko nāneko nāpy anekavān /
GSP27moksop_u:27319: nābhyāśastho na dūrastho naivāsti na ca nāsti ca //MU_5,72.41//
GSP27moksop_u:27320: nāprāpyo nāpi ca prāpyo na cāsarvo na sarvagaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27321: na padārtho nāpadārtho nāpañcātmā na pañca ca //MU_5,72.42//
GSP27moksop_u:27323: tadatītaṃ padaṃ yat syāt tan na kiñcid ivehitam //MU_5,72.43//
GSP27moksop_u:27324: yathābhūtam idaṃ samyag jñasya sampaśyato jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:27325: sarvam ātmamayaṃ vidvan nāsty anātmamayaṃ kvacit //MU_5,72.44//
GSP27moksop_u:27328: sattaivāsti na vastūnāṃ yayā nāma vinā citā /
GSP27moksop_u:27331: ātmaiva netarakalākalanāsti kācid itthammatir bhava bhavātigato mahātman //MU_5,72.47//
GSP27moksop_u:27336: svo bhāvaḥ prāpyate tajjñais tajjñaiś cintāmaṇir yathā //MU_5,73.1//
GSP27moksop_u:27337: athemām aparāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śṛṇu rāmānayā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27338: drakṣyasy ātmānam acalaṃ bhaviṣyasi ca divyadṛk //MU_5,73.2//
GSP27moksop_u:27339: ahaṃ kham aham ādityo diśo 'ham aham apy adhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27340: ahaṃ daityā ahaṃ devāś śailāś cāham ahaṃ mahaḥ //MU_5,73.3//
GSP27moksop_u:27341: tamo 'ham aham abhrāṇi bhūsamudrādikaṃ tv aham /
GSP27moksop_u:27342: rajo vāyur athāgniś ca jagat sarvam idaṃ tv aham //MU_5,73.4//
GSP27moksop_u:27343: jagattraye 'haṃ sarvatra sa ātmaiva kila sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27344: ko 'haṃ kim anyad iha hi dvitvam ekasya kīdṛśam //MU_5,73.5//
GSP27moksop_u:27345: iti niścayavān antar nūnam ātmatayā jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:27348: kim ātmīyaṃ paraṃ kiṃ syāt kamalekṣaṇa kathyatām //MU_5,73.7//
GSP27moksop_u:27350: harṣam etu viṣādaṃ vā vināśe jño jaganmayaḥ //MU_5,73.8//
GSP27moksop_u:27354: prathamā sarvam evāham ity anyoktā raghūdvaha //MU_5,73.10//
GSP27moksop_u:27356: deho 'ham iti tāṃ viddhi duḥkhāyaiva na śāntaye //MU_5,73.11//
GSP27moksop_u:27357: atha vaitat trayam api tyaktvā sakalasiddhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:27365: yad idaṃ darśanaṃ spandaḥ kiñcid yat saṃvidādy api /
GSP27moksop_u:27367: na san nāsad asau devo nāṇur nāpi mahān asau /
GSP27moksop_u:27368: nāpy etayor dṛśor madhyaṃ sa evedaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ //MU_5,73.17//
GSP27moksop_u:27369: sa evedaṃ ca vadati sa ca vaktuṃ na yujyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27370: na tadanyad idaṃ naitat paśya māyām anāmayām //MU_5,73.18//
GSP27moksop_u:27371: nātmāyam ayam apy ātmā sañjñābheda iti svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:27373: saṃsthitas sa hi sarvatra triṣu kāleṣu bhāsuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27374: sūkṣmatvāt sumahattvāc ca kevalaṃ na vibhāvyate //MU_5,73.20//
GSP27moksop_u:27379: cidātmā sarvago vyāpī na kvacin nāma na sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27381: sati puryaṣṭake tasmiñ jīvas sphurati nopalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27382: sati vāyāv iva rajas sati dīpa ivekṣaṇam //MU_5,73.24//
GSP27moksop_u:27384: sati sphuraty abhyudite bhānāv iva janaiṣaṇā //MU_5,73.25//
GSP27moksop_u:27388: deho nāśam upāyāti tat kim unnaṣṭam ātmanaḥ //MU_5,73.27//
GSP27moksop_u:27389: na jāyate na mriyate nābhivāñchati nojjhati /
GSP27moksop_u:27390: na mukto na ca baddho 'yam ātmā sarvasya sarvadā //MU_5,73.28//
GSP27moksop_u:27393: anāditvān na jāto 'yam ajātatvān na naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:27396: bandhābhāve 'py amuktis syād amokṣas tena sa smṛtaḥ //MU_5,73.31//
GSP27moksop_u:27401: dve eva kalane tyaktvā mokṣabandhātmike sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:27403: na mokṣo nabhasaḥ pṛṣṭhe na pātāle na bhūtale /
GSP27moksop_u:27405: sakalāśāsv asaṃsaktyā yas svayaṃ cetasaḥ kṣayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27407: yāvat prabodho vimalo noditas tāvad eva saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27410: daśa mokṣā na vāñchyante kim utaiko hi mokṣakaḥ //MU_5,73.38//
GSP27moksop_u:27411: ayaṃ mokṣas tv ayaṃ bandhaḥ pelavāṃ kalanām imām /
GSP27moksop_u:27412: parityajya mahātyāgī tvaṃ tvam eva bhavābhavaḥ //MU_5,73.39//
GSP27moksop_u:27423: idaṃ sampannam akhilaṃ tāpād iva marau payaḥ //MU_5,74.3//
GSP27moksop_u:27424: mano buddhir ahaṅkāro vāsanāś cendriyāṇy api /
GSP27moksop_u:27426: cittāhaṅkārayor dvitvaṃ vacasy asti na vastutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27427: yac cittaṃ sa hy ahaṅkāro yo 'haṅkāro mano hi tat //MU_5,74.5//
GSP27moksop_u:27428: vyatiriktaṃ himāc chauklyam iti saṅkalpyate yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27431: kṣīṇe dve eva hi yathā paṭaśauklye paṭakṣaye //MU_5,74.7//
GSP27moksop_u:27434: mokṣo me 'stv iti cintā cej jātā tad vyutthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27435: mananotke manasy uccair vapur doṣāya kevalam //MU_5,74.9//
GSP27moksop_u:27436: ātmany atīte sarvasmāt sarvarūpe 'tha vā tate /
GSP27moksop_u:27437: ko bandhaḥ kaś ca vā mokṣo nirmūlaṃ mananaṃ kutaḥ //MU_5,74.10//
GSP27moksop_u:27442: cit sarvavyāpinī sūkṣmā na calā na ca cālyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27443: na svatas spandam āyāti devācala ivānilaiḥ //MU_5,74.13//
GSP27moksop_u:27446: tatra ko 'yaṃ mudhā moho bhavatām atiduḥkhadaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27447: ayaṃ so 'haṃ mamāṅgāni mamedaṃ ceti durdhiyām //MU_5,74.15//
GSP27moksop_u:27450: tatrāyam ātmā sammantā bhoktā karteti jāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27462: dehasyāsya jaḍasyārthe kiṃ bhogair iti niścayī /
GSP27moksop_u:27463: bhinatty āśāmayaṃ jñānī pañjaraṃ kesarī yathā //MU_5,74.23//
GSP27moksop_u:27469: ātmany eva na māty uccaiḥ kalpasyānta ivārṇavaḥ //MU_5,74.26//
GSP27moksop_u:27471: tiṣṭhaty ātmani saṃvettā praśānta iva vāridhiḥ //MU_5,74.27//
GSP27moksop_u:27472: paraṃ dhairyam upādatte sthairyaṃ merur ivācalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27474: bhavaty ātmani nirvāṇaḥ praśānta iva dīpakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27475: dṛṣṭim āyāti paramāṃ naraḥ pītāmṛto yathā //MU_5,74.29//
GSP27moksop_u:27477: sphuraddīptir maṇir iva prayāty antaḥ prakāśatām //MU_5,74.30//
GSP27moksop_u:27480: hasaty alam atītās tāḥ pelavā divasāvalīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27490: na dadāti na cādatte na stauti na ca nindati /
GSP27moksop_u:27491: nāstam eti na codeti na tuṣyati na śocati //MU_5,74.37//
GSP27moksop_u:27502: na himādrer na muktābhyo na rambhābhyo na candanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:27503: na tac candramasaś śaityaṃ nairāśyād yad avāpyate //MU_5,74.43//
GSP27moksop_u:27504: api rājyād api svargād apīndor api mādhavāt /
GSP27moksop_u:27507: sā parā nirvṛtis sādho nairāśyād upalabhyate //MU_5,74.45//
GSP27moksop_u:27510: goṣpadaṃ pṛthivī merus sthāṇur āśās samudgikāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27514: padaṃ yasya na badhnāti kadācit kalanā hṛdi /
GSP27moksop_u:27516: idam evāstv idaṃ māstu mameti hṛdi rañjanā /
GSP27moksop_u:27517: na yasyāsti tam ātmeśaṃ tolayanti kathaṃ janāḥ //MU_5,74.50//
GSP27moksop_u:27520: na śāsteha tvam āśānāṃ viddhi mithyābhramaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:27522: kiṃ muhyasi mahābāho mūrkhavat paṇḍito 'pi san /
GSP27moksop_u:27523: mamedaṃ tad ayaṃ so 'ham ity udbhrāntena cetasā //MU_5,74.53//
GSP27moksop_u:27524: ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ nānāteha na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27525: ekarūpaṃ jagaj jñātvā dhīrai rāma na khidyate //MU_5,74.54//
GSP27moksop_u:27529: yad rūpaṃ tat samālambya padārthānāṃ sthitiṃ kuru //MU_5,74.56//
GSP27moksop_u:27531: palāyya yāti saṃsārī mṛgī kesariṇo yathā //MU_5,74.57//
GSP27moksop_u:27534: bhogā nānandayanty antaḥ khedayanti na cāpadaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27535: dṛśyaśriyo haranty aṅga na jñam adrim ivānilāḥ //MU_5,74.59//
GSP27moksop_u:27539: sparśa evāsya naitābhyāṃ kim utākramaṇaṃ bhavet //MU_5,74.61//
GSP27moksop_u:27541: ramate naiṣa bhogeṣu pāntho marumahīṣv iva //MU_5,74.62//
GSP27moksop_u:27543: bhuṅkte bhogabharaṃ prājñas tv ālokam iva locanam //MU_5,74.63//
GSP27moksop_u:27545: sevitāpy aṅga dhīrasya na duḥkhāya na tuṣṭaye //MU_5,74.64//
GSP27moksop_u:27547: dve vīcyāv iva śailendraṃ kṣobhaṃ netuṃ na śaknutaḥ //MU_5,74.65//
GSP27moksop_u:27553: sukhaduḥkheṣu na kṣobham eti bhūbhṛd ṛtuṣv iva //MU_5,74.68//
GSP27moksop_u:27555: asaktamanaso nityaṃ na kiñcid api majjati //MU_5,74.69//
GSP27moksop_u:27557: bhāvāsaktyā samāsakta ukto jantur hi nānyathā //MU_5,74.70//
GSP27moksop_u:27560: sakṛtprabhātaṃ vimalaṃ yaj jñātaṃ jñātam eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:27561: na hi bandhuḥ parijñātaḥ punar ajñātatāṃ vrajet //MU_5,74.72//
GSP27moksop_u:27564: na hema tāpaśuddhāṅgaṃ svābhāsam alam āgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:27565: kardame magnam api sat samādatte malaṃ punaḥ //MU_5,74.74//
GSP27moksop_u:27566: kṣīṇe svahṛdayagranthau na bandho 'sti punar guṇaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27567: yatnenāpi punar baddhaṃ kena vṛnte cyutaṃ phalam //MU_5,74.75//
GSP27moksop_u:27569: pāṣāṇaṃ ca manaś caiva sandhātuṃ kasya śaktatā //MU_5,74.76//
GSP27moksop_u:27571: parijñāya śvapākānāṃ yātrāṃ kaḥ prekṣate dvijaḥ //MU_5,74.77//
GSP27moksop_u:27575: yāvat tan na parijñātaṃ parijñātaṃ vihīyate //MU_5,74.79//
GSP27moksop_u:27578: yathā maṣīkusumbhādi striyāś citre tathaiva hi /
