GSP27moksop_u:27579: jīvantyā api keśoṣṭhaṃ kas tāṃ prati kila grahaḥ //MU_5,74.81//
GSP27moksop_u:27584: evaṃ tattve pare śuddhe dhīro viśrāntim āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27585: na śakyate cālayituṃ devair api sahāsuraiḥ //MU_5,74.84//
GSP27moksop_u:27596: chidyate na nikṛttāṅgo galadasrur na roditi /
GSP27moksop_u:27597: dahyate na pradagdho 'pi naṣṭo 'pi na vinaśyati //MU_5,74.90//
GSP27moksop_u:27599: nivasatu sadane purottame vā vitatagirau vipine tapovane vā //MU_5,74.91//
GSP27moksop_u:27609: māndhātā suciraṃ tiṣṭhaṃs tyaktavān na paraṃ padam //MU_5,75.4//
GSP27moksop_u:27621: parāṃ saṃvidam āsādya musalas tyaktavāṃs tanum //MU_5,75.10//
GSP27moksop_u:27623: yajñalakṣmīṃ ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mukta eveha tiṣṭhati //MU_5,75.11//
GSP27moksop_u:27625: kvacid eti na saṃsaṅgam ākrānto 'py ambaraṃ yathā //MU_5,75.12//
GSP27moksop_u:27633: brahmā samamanā rāma kṣapayaty āyur āyatam //MU_5,75.16//
GSP27moksop_u:27635: caratīha ciraṃ kālaṃ mukto 'pi bhagavān hariḥ //MU_5,75.17//
GSP27moksop_u:27638: muktayāpi gale baddho gauryā gauras trilocanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27648: dhārayaty avaniṃ śeṣaḥ karoty arko dināvalīm /
GSP27moksop_u:27651: śataśo muktatāṃ yātās santas tiṣṭhanti saṃsṛtau //MU_5,75.25//
GSP27moksop_u:27654: paramaṃ bodham āsādya kecit kānanam āgatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27666: sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvatra sarvathā sarvadaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:27670: vidhir daivaṃ vibhur dhātā sarveśaś śiva īśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27672: asty avastuni vastv antaḥ kāñcanaṃ sikatāsv iva /
GSP27moksop_u:27673: asti vastuny avastv antar malaṃ hemakaṇeṣv iva //MU_5,75.36//
GSP27moksop_u:27675: pāpasya hi bhayāl loko dharme rāma pravartate //MU_5,75.37//
GSP27moksop_u:27678: yan nāsti tad udety āśu deśakālavilāsataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27680: ye vajrasārās sudṛḍhā dṛśyante te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27684: asat sad avabhātīha sad asac cāpi dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27686: muktau rāghava loke 'smin na prāptis sambhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:27688: muktau rāghava loke 'smin prāptir asti sadaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:27689: pravṛttyā hi vivekasya muktāś ca janakoṭayaḥ //MU_5,75.44//
GSP27moksop_u:27696: tasmāt tvam api vai rāma vivekoditadhīradhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27701: saty asaty api dehe sā sambhavaty anaghākṛte //MU_5,75.50//
GSP27moksop_u:27703: tat sambhavati dehasya bhāve cābhāva eva ca //MU_5,75.51//
GSP27moksop_u:27704: yo jīvati gatasnehaṃ sa jīvanmukta ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27709: ātmā paravaśaḥ kāryo moham āśritya kevalam //MU_5,75.54//
GSP27moksop_u:27714: yad upagatas sugataḥ paraṃ pradhānaṃ yad upagato dhruvatāṃ nṛpaś ca kaścit /
GSP27moksop_u:27715: yad upagatāḥ padam uttamaṃ mahāntaḥ prayatanakarmataror mahāphalaṃ tat //MU_5,75.57//
GSP27moksop_u:27720: sthairyaṃ yānty avivekena śāmyanty aṅga vivekataḥ //MU_5,76.1//
GSP27moksop_u:27722: saṅkhyātuṃ kena śakyante bhāsāṃ ca trasareṇavaḥ //MU_5,76.2//
GSP27moksop_u:27725: ayaṃ hi rāma duṣpāro ghoras saṃsārasāgaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27726: vinā yuktiprayatnābhyām asmān nāma na tīryate //MU_5,76.4//
GSP27moksop_u:27742: uttīryate cen magnena tat paraṃ pauruṣaṃ bhavet //MU_5,76.12//
GSP27moksop_u:27744: saṃsārasāgarād asmād yo na tīrṇo dhig astu tam //MU_5,76.13//
GSP27moksop_u:27746: saṃsārābdhiṃ gāhate yas sa eva puruṣas smṛtaḥ //MU_5,76.14//
GSP27moksop_u:27748: etasmiṃs tadanu krīḍā śobhate rāma nānyathā //MU_5,76.15//
GSP27moksop_u:27749: iha bhavyo bhavān sādho vicāraparayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:27752: matyā yo gāhate loke nehāsau parimajjati //MU_5,76.17//
GSP27moksop_u:27755: vicārya tattvam ālokya sevyante yā vibhūtayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27756: tā udarkodayā jantoś śeṣā duḥkhāya kevalam //MU_5,76.19//
GSP27moksop_u:27757: balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca dṛṣṭatattvasya vardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:27768: bhūyo 'pi ca mahābāho kathyamānam idaṃ śṛṇu //MU_5,77.2//
GSP27moksop_u:27773: na dattam apy upādatte gṛhītam api pāṇinā /
GSP27moksop_u:27777: nāpekṣate bhaviṣyac ca vartamāne na tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:27778: na saṃsmaraty atītaṃ ca sarvam eva karoti ca //MU_5,77.7//
GSP27moksop_u:27779: suptaḥ prabuddho bhavati prabuddho 'pi ca suptavat /
GSP27moksop_u:27782: kurvann api bahiḥ kāryaṃ sarvam evāvatiṣṭhate //MU_5,77.9//
GSP27moksop_u:27788: nābhivāñchati na dveṣṭi na śocati na hṛṣyati //MU_5,77.12//
GSP27moksop_u:27790: bhakte bhaktasamācāraś śaṭhe śaṭha iva sthitaḥ //MU_5,77.13//
GSP27moksop_u:27791: bālo bāleṣu vṛddheṣu vṛddho vīreṣu vīryavān /
GSP27moksop_u:27799: na tasya sukṛtenārtho na bhogair na ca karmabhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27800: na duṣkṛtair na bhogānāṃ santyāgena na bandhubhiḥ //MU_5,77.18//
GSP27moksop_u:27802: na bandhena na mokṣeṇa na pātālena no divā //MU_5,77.19//
GSP27moksop_u:27804: tadā bandhavimokṣārthaṃ na kvacit kṛpaṇaṃ manaḥ //MU_5,77.20//
GSP27moksop_u:27808: sa nāstam eti nodeti vyomavat sarvavṛttiṣu //MU_5,77.22//
GSP27moksop_u:27812: anupādeyabuddhyā tu na smaraty akṛtaṃ kṛtam //MU_5,77.24//
GSP27moksop_u:27813: sarvaṃ sarvaprakāreṇa gṛhṇāti ca jahāti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:27816: na kāryasukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ manāg api hi gṛhyate //MU_5,77.26//
GSP27moksop_u:27818: na sattāṃ yojayaty arthe na phalāny anudhāvati //MU_5,77.27//
GSP27moksop_u:27820: kāryodaye naiti mudaṃ kāryanāśe na khidyate //MU_5,77.28//
GSP27moksop_u:27822: apy adhaḥ prasaraty agnau vismayo 'sya na jāyate //MU_5,77.29//
GSP27moksop_u:27825: na dayādainyam ādatte na krauryam anudhāvati /
GSP27moksop_u:27826: na lajjām anusandhatte nālajjatvaṃ ca gacchati //MU_5,77.31//
GSP27moksop_u:27828: na pramatto na khinnātmā nodvigno na ca harṣavān //MU_5,77.32//
GSP27moksop_u:27832: kva kathaṃ kila kāsya syāt sukhitā duḥkhitātha vā //MU_5,77.34//
GSP27moksop_u:27834: kva kileha kutaḥ ko 'ntaḥ prasaṅgas sukhaduḥkhayoḥ //MU_5,77.35//
GSP27moksop_u:27842: kīdṛśyaḥ katham āyātāḥ kā vā tā duḥkhasaṃvidaḥ //MU_5,77.39//
GSP27moksop_u:27843: sukham ante tadantotthā svabījaṃ vitanoti yā /
GSP27moksop_u:27844: śāntaṃ duḥkhadaśā seyaṃ katham antarite sukhe //MU_5,77.40//
GSP27moksop_u:27849: ā mūlān manasi kṣīṇe saṅkalpasya kathaiva kā /
GSP27moksop_u:27851: bhāveṣv abhāvaghanabhāvanayā mahātmā nirmuktasaṅkalanam ambaravat sthiteṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:27852: cittaṃ prati svamudito viditaikarūpī jñas tiṣṭhati svapiti jīvati nityatṛptaḥ //MU_5,77.44//
GSP27moksop_u:27857: asad eva sadābhāsaṃ cittaspandāt tathā jagat //MU_5,78.1//
GSP27moksop_u:27861: dṛśyate sad ivāsatyaṃ cittaspandāt tathā jagat //MU_5,78.3//
GSP27moksop_u:27863: yena praspandate cittaṃ yena na spandate 'tha vā /
GSP27moksop_u:27864: tad brahman brūhi me yena cikitsyeta tad eva hi //MU_5,78.4//
GSP27moksop_u:27869: abhinnau kevalaṃ mithyā bhedaḥ kalpita etayoḥ //MU_5,78.6//
GSP27moksop_u:27871: svayaṃ guṇaguṇisthityā naśyato dvau na saṃśayaḥ //MU_5,78.7//
GSP27moksop_u:27872: dvau kramau cittanāśasya yogo jñānaṃ ca rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:27879: skhadāsv iva bhuvo vāri sa prāṇa iti kīrtitaḥ //MU_5,78.10//
GSP27moksop_u:27882: āmodasya yathā puṣpaṃ śauklyasya tuhinaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:27885: saṃvit sañjāyate yaiṣā tac cittaṃ viddhi rāghava //MU_5,78.13//
GSP27moksop_u:27886: prāṇaspandaṃ vidus spandaṃ tatspandād eva saṃvidaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:27889: tasmin saṃrodhite nūnam upaśāntaṃ bhaven manaḥ //MU_5,78.15//
GSP27moksop_u:27904: recake nūnam abhyaste prāṇe sphāraṃ kham āgate /
GSP27moksop_u:27921: brahmañ jagati bhūtānāṃ hṛdayaṃ tat kim ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27922: idaṃ sarvaṃ mahādarśe yasmiṃs tat pratibimbati //MU_5,78.30//
GSP27moksop_u:27924: sādho jagati bhūtānāṃ dvividhaṃ hṛdayaṃ sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:27925: upādeyaṃ ca heyaṃ ca vibhāgo 'yaṃ tayoś śṛṇu //MU_5,78.31//
GSP27moksop_u:27927: heyaṃ tad dhṛdayaṃ viddhi tanāv ekataṭe sthitam //MU_5,78.32//
GSP27moksop_u:27928: saṃvinmātraṃ tu hṛdayam upādeyaṃ nṛṇāṃ smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:27929: tad antare ca bāhye ca na ca bāhye na cāntare //MU_5,78.33//
GSP27moksop_u:27931: tad ādarśaḥ padārthānāṃ tat kośas sarvasampadām //MU_5,78.34//
GSP27moksop_u:27932: sarveṣām eva jantūnāṃ saṃvid dhṛdayam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:27943: abhyāsāc chāmyati prāṇo dūre girinadī yathā //MU_5,78.40//
GSP27moksop_u:27945: ghaṇṭikā spṛśyate prāṇā yenordhvena vahanty alam //MU_5,78.41//
GSP27moksop_u:27949: abhyāsād eva nānyasmāt tasmād abhyāsavān bhava //MU_5,78.43//
GSP27moksop_u:27953: prāṇaś ca rāma gṛhṇāti yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_5,78.45//
GSP27moksop_u:27955: tasminn eva śamaṃ yāte kṣīyate saṃsṛtijvaraḥ //MU_5,78.46//
GSP27moksop_u:27958: yatra sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yat sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yat /
GSP27moksop_u:27959: yatra nedaṃ yato nedaṃ yan nedaṃ nedṛśaṃ ca yat //MU_5,78.48//
GSP27moksop_u:27961: yasya no sadṛśo dṛśye dṛṣṭāntaḥ kaścid eva hi //MU_5,78.49//
GSP27moksop_u:27965: anārataṃ bahurasā jāyante ca patanti ca //MU_5,78.51//
GSP27moksop_u:27967: yas sthitas sthiradhīs tajjñas sa jīvanmukta ucyate //MU_5,78.52//
GSP27moksop_u:27977: ity ekaniścayas sphāras samyagjñānaṃ vidur budhāḥ //MU_5,79.2//
GSP27moksop_u:27983: saṃvid ādyābhir ākhyābhir muktāstīha hi netarat //MU_5,79.5//
GSP27moksop_u:27985: buddhā tv aśuddharūpāntar avidyety ucyate budhaiḥ //MU_5,79.6//
GSP27moksop_u:27987: cinoty ātmānam ātmaiva rāmaivaṃ nānyad asti hi //MU_5,79.7//
GSP27moksop_u:27989: yad ātmaiva jagat sarvam iti niścitya pūrṇatā //MU_5,79.8//
GSP27moksop_u:27990: sarvam ātmaiva kiṃniṣṭhau bhāvābhāvau kva vāsthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:27991: kva bandhamokṣakalane kim anyad rāma śocyate //MU_5,79.9//
GSP27moksop_u:27992: na cittam anyan no cetyaṃ brahmaivedaṃ vijṛmbhate /
GSP27moksop_u:27993: sarvaṃ ekaṃ paraṃ vyoma kva mokṣaḥ kasya baddhatā //MU_5,79.10//
GSP27moksop_u:27997: manāg api na bhedo 'sti kvāpi saṅkalpanonmukhaḥ //MU_5,79.12//
GSP27moksop_u:27998: ādāv ante ca saṃśāntaṃ svarūpam avināśi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:27999: vastūnām ātmanaś caiva tanmayo bhava rāghava //MU_5,79.13//
GSP27moksop_u:28001: sphuraty ātmabhir ātmaiva citrair ambv iva vīcibhiḥ //MU_5,79.14//
GSP27moksop_u:28002: śuddham ātmānam ālambya nityam antassthayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:28003: yas sthitas taṃ ka ātmeśaṃ bhogo vañcayituṃ kṣamaḥ //MU_5,79.15//
GSP27moksop_u:28005: manāg api na bhindanti śailaṃ mandānilā iva //MU_5,79.16//
GSP27moksop_u:28008: jagad ātmaiva sakalam avidyā nāsti kutracit /
GSP27moksop_u:28009: iti dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya samyagrūpāṃ sthiro bhava //MU_5,79.18//
GSP27moksop_u:28010: nānātvam asti kalanāsu na vastuto 'ntar nānāvidhāsu sarasīṣu jalād ivānyat /
GSP27moksop_u:28011: ity ekaniścayamayaḥ puruṣo vimukta ity ucyate samavalokitasamyagarthaḥ //MU_5,79.19//
GSP27moksop_u:28015: idam antaḥ kalayato bhogān prati vivekinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28016: purassthitān api sadā spṛhaivāṅga na jāyate //MU_5,80.1//
GSP27moksop_u:28019: nayane rūpanirmagne kṣobhaḥ ka iva dehinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28022: naśyaty etan nimeṣeṇa bhavantam api hiṃsati //MU_5,80.4//
GSP27moksop_u:28024: tadīyaiḥ karmabhiḥ kṣipraṃ prājñaś śūro 'pi badhyate //MU_5,80.5//
GSP27moksop_u:28027: sākṣivat tvaṃ sthitaṃ netra rūpaṃ ātmani tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:28028: ālokaḥ kālavaśatas tvam ekaḥ kiṃ pratapyase //MU_5,80.7//
GSP27moksop_u:28030: svajātibandhāt sphurati tava citta kim āgatam //MU_5,80.8//
GSP27moksop_u:28032: svayaṃ sphuraty ahaṅkāra tvam ayaṃ protthitaḥ kutaḥ //MU_5,80.9//
GSP27moksop_u:28037: ajñānajantunā hy ete śliṣṭā jātā nirantarāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28043: ajñānasaṅkṣayāt kṣīṇe manasy ete punar mithaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28046: tad eva tasmād ucchedyaṃ piśāca iva mandirāt //MU_5,80.16//
GSP27moksop_u:28047: citta valgasi mithyaiva dṛṣṭo 'nto bhavato mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:28048: ādyanteṣu sutucchas tvaṃ vartamāne 'pi na hy asi //MU_5,80.17//
GSP27moksop_u:28049: mudhā pañcabhir ākāraiḥ kim antaḥ parivalgasi /
GSP27moksop_u:28050: yas tvāṃ tv ām iti jānāti tasyaitat parivalgyate //MU_5,80.18//
GSP27moksop_u:28051: tvadvalganaṃ me kumano na manāg api tuṣṭaye /
GSP27moksop_u:28053: tiṣṭha vā gaccha vā citta nāsi me śaṭha jīvasi /
GSP27moksop_u:28054: prakṛtyāsi mṛtaṃ nityaṃ vicārāt sumṛtaṃ sthitam //MU_5,80.20//
GSP27moksop_u:28055: nistattvaṃ tvaṃ jaḍaṃ bhrātaś śaṭha nityamṛtākṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:28056: mūḍha eva tvayājñena vañcyate na vicāravān //MU_5,80.21//
GSP27moksop_u:28058: mṛtam asmākam adyāsi dīpānāṃ timiraṃ yathā //MU_5,80.22//
GSP27moksop_u:28059: śaṭhena bhavatā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ dehagṛhaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:28063: pūrvam evāsi nāsy eva sampraty api jaḍaṃ śaṭham /
GSP27moksop_u:28064: na bhaviṣyasi cedānīṃ kiṃ vetāla na lajjase //MU_5,80.25//
GSP27moksop_u:28069: aho nu citraṃ sumahaj jaḍena kṣaṇabhaṅginā /
GSP27moksop_u:28071: kas te parākramaḥ kiṃ te balaṃ kas te samāśrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28072: yadi valgasi mām eva janatāṃ bādhase tathā //MU_5,80.29//
GSP27moksop_u:28074: mṛtam ity avabuddhaṃ tvam adya kevalam ajña he //MU_5,80.30//
GSP27moksop_u:28075: etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ tvāṃ jñātvā jīvadāsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:28077: cittaṃ mṛtaṃ hi nāstīha tv ity adyāvagataṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:28078: tena tvadāśāṃ santyajya tiṣṭhāmy ātmani kevalaḥ //MU_5,80.32//
GSP27moksop_u:28079: diṣṭyā cittaṃ mṛtam iti jñātam adya mayā svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:28080: na śaṭhena samaṃ nītaṃ samagraṃ jīvitaṃ nijam //MU_5,80.33//
GSP27moksop_u:28084: kṛtā vikārā vividhās svayaṃ kṛtvā hasāmi yān //MU_5,80.35//
GSP27moksop_u:28091: kiṃ mano me mamāśāḥ kāḥ ko me 'haṅkārako bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:28092: diṣṭyā vyarthaṃ kalatraṃ me naṣṭam etad aśeṣataḥ //MU_5,80.39//
GSP27moksop_u:28095: na mamāśā na karmāṇi na saṃsāro na kartṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:28096: na bhoktṛtā na deho me mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.41//
GSP27moksop_u:28097: nāham ātmā na cākāśo na caivāyam ahaṃ svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:28098: mama nāsti vyavacchedo mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.42//
GSP27moksop_u:28100: svayam ātmaikasaṃsthāya mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.43//
GSP27moksop_u:28102: sarvasmai sarvakāryāya mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.44//
GSP27moksop_u:28104: sattām upāgato 'smy antar mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.45//
GSP27moksop_u:28106: jagat sarvapadārthāḍhyaṃ mahyam eva namo namaḥ //MU_5,80.46//
GSP27moksop_u:28107: vyapagatamananaṃ śamābhirāmaṃ prakaṭitaviśvam aviśvam apy anantam /
GSP27moksop_u:28108: svayam ajam ajaraṃ guṇād atītaṃ vapur aham acyutam aiśvaraṃ namāmi //MU_5,80.47//
GSP27moksop_u:28112: evaṃ vicārya buddhyāntaḥ punar itthaṃ vicāryate /
GSP27moksop_u:28114: ātmaivedaṃ jagad iti satyaṃ cittena mārjitam /
GSP27moksop_u:28115: utthitaṃ syāt kutaś cittam aho citram avastu yat //MU_5,81.2//
GSP27moksop_u:28116: avidyātvād acittvāc ca samāyātvāt sadaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:28117: mṛtaṃ nāsty eva vā cittaṃ bhramād anyat khapuṣpavat //MU_5,81.3//
GSP27moksop_u:28119: abuddhasya na buddhasya tathā cittam asanmayam //MU_5,81.4//
GSP27moksop_u:28122: evaṃ hi cittaṃ nāsty eva brahmaivāsti tatātmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:28128: mṛtaṃ cittaṃ gatās tṛṣṇāḥ prakṣīṇaṃ mohapañjaram /
GSP27moksop_u:28130: ekam eva jagac chāntaṃ nānātvaṃ na sad ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:28131: kim anyad vimṛśāmy antaḥ kathayaivālam etayā //MU_5,81.10//
GSP27moksop_u:28133: somyas sarvagatas sūkṣmas sthita ātmāsmi śāśvataḥ //MU_5,81.11//
GSP27moksop_u:28134: yad asti yac ca nāstīha cittādy ātmādy avastu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:28135: tat khād acchataraṃ śāntam anantāgrāhyam ātatam //MU_5,81.12//
GSP27moksop_u:28136: cittaṃ bhavatu vā māntar niyatāṃ smṛtim etu vā /
GSP27moksop_u:28138: vicārakārako maurkhyād aham āsam iti sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28142: tad imāṃ prajahāmy antar vikalpakalanām alam /
GSP27moksop_u:28143: nirṇīyom iti śāntātmā tiṣṭhāmy ātmani maunavān //MU_5,81.16//
GSP27moksop_u:28144: aśnan gacchan svapaṃs tiṣṭhann iti rāghava cetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:28149: prakṛtasaṃvyavahāravihāriṇas tv iha sukhaṃ viharanti mahādhiyaḥ //MU_5,81.19//
GSP27moksop_u:28153: vicāra evaṃ viduṣā saṃvartena kṛtaḥ purā /
GSP27moksop_u:28157: athemām aparāṃ rāma śṛṇu dṛṣṭiṃ padapradām /
GSP27moksop_u:28172: viśan merudarīṃ sāyaṃ bhānur bhāsām ivotkaram //MU_5,82.10//
GSP27moksop_u:28173: bāhyān ābhyantarāṃś caiva sparśān pariharan kramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:28175: aho nu cañcalam idaṃ pratyāhṛtam api kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:28180: yasmān nivāryate tasmin pronmatta iva dhāvati //MU_5,82.14//
GSP27moksop_u:28181: ghaṭāt paṭam upāyāti paṭāc chakaṭam utkaṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:28182: cittam artheṣu carati pādapeṣv iva markataḥ //MU_5,82.15//
GSP27moksop_u:28189: rūpāṇi manaso yūyaṃ jaḍā eva kilādhamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28192: andhānām uddhatir yeyaṃ sā hāsāyaiva jāyate //MU_5,82.20//
GSP27moksop_u:28193: cidātmā bhagavān sarvaṃ sākṣitvena karoty ajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28199: bhītaḥ pāntha ivāhibhyaḥ pukkasebhya iva dvijaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28200: dūre tiṣṭhati cinmātram indriyebhyas tv anāmayam //MU_5,82.24//
GSP27moksop_u:28204: śveva vyartham anarthāya medaṃ vihara he jagat //MU_5,82.26//
GSP27moksop_u:28205: ahaṃ cidvad iti vyartham asatyā tava vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:28208: mithyaiva jātā duḥkhāya na satyā satyavarjitā //MU_5,82.28//
GSP27moksop_u:28209: ahaṅkārād ahaṃ so 'smīty etāṃ saṃrabdhatāṃ tyaja /
GSP27moksop_u:28210: na kiñcid api mūrkha tvaṃ kiṃ vyarthaṃ taralāyase //MU_5,82.29//
GSP27moksop_u:28211: saṃvic cittam anādyantaṃ saṃvido 'nyan na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:28212: dehe 'smiṃs tan mahāmūrkha kiṃ tat syāc cittanāmakam //MU_5,82.30//
GSP27moksop_u:28216: na kartā tvaṃ na bhoktā tvaṃ jaḍo 'sy anyena bodhyase //MU_5,82.32//
GSP27moksop_u:28217: kas tvaṃ bhavasi bhogānāṃ ke vā bhogā bhavanti te /
GSP27moksop_u:28218: jaḍasyātmaiva te nāsti bandhumitrādi tat kutaḥ //MU_5,82.33//
GSP27moksop_u:28219: yaj jaḍaṃ tad dhi nāsty eva sad evāsattayānvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:28221: pratyakcetanarūpaṃ cet tvaṃ tad ātmaiva te vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28222: bhāvābhāvamayī citta sattā te keva duḥkhadā //MU_5,82.35//
GSP27moksop_u:28224: mayā te hi pramārjyete śṛṇu yuktyā kathaṃ śaṭha //MU_5,82.36//
GSP27moksop_u:28225: svayaṃ tāvad bhavān eṣa jaḍo nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28226: jaḍasya kīdṛk kartṛtvaṃ nṛtyanti hi kathaṃ śilāḥ //MU_5,82.37//
GSP27moksop_u:28227: upajīvya ciraṃ tasmāc chuddhaṃ tadbhāgam aiśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:28228: jīvasīcchasi haṃsi tvaṃ plavase yāsi valgasi //MU_5,82.38//
GSP27moksop_u:28229: kriyate yat tu yacchaktyā tat tenaiva kṛtaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:28230: lunāti dātraṃ puṃśaktyā hantaiva procyate pumān //MU_5,82.39//
GSP27moksop_u:28231: pīyate yat tu yacchaktyā pītaṃ tenaiva tad bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:28232: pātreṇa pīyate pānaṃ pānapas tūcyate naraḥ //MU_5,82.40//
GSP27moksop_u:28238: tayaiva citta śabdārthān aṅgīkṛtya laghu sthitam //MU_5,82.43//
GSP27moksop_u:28239: evaṃ citta tvam ajñānād ātmaśakter upāgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:28240: jñāne tv adyāvagalitaṃ tīvre himam ivātape //MU_5,82.44//
GSP27moksop_u:28241: tasmān mṛtaṃ tvaṃ mūḍhaṃ tvaṃ nāsi tvaṃ paramārthataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28242: tad evāham iti vyarthaṃ māno māstv asukhāya te //MU_5,82.45//
GSP27moksop_u:28247: cinmayaṃ cidbhavan mūḍha tat tasmāt paramāt padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:28248: nityam avyatiriktaṃ tvaṃ kim anyat pariśocasi //MU_5,82.48//
GSP27moksop_u:28249: sarvagaṃ sarvabhāvasthaṃ sarvarūpaṃ hi tat padaṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:28250: tatprāptau sarvam evāśu prāptaṃ bhavati sarvadā //MU_5,82.49//
GSP27moksop_u:28251: na tvam asti na deho 'sti brahmāstīha mahat sphurat /
GSP27moksop_u:28252: ahaṃ tvam iti niṣṣyandais sphuraty ārtir hi kasya kā //MU_5,82.50//
GSP27moksop_u:28253: ātmā cet tvaṃ tad ātmaiva sarvago 'stīha netaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28254: ātmano 'nyaj jaḍaṃ tvaṃ cet tat tvaṃ nāsty asy avidvapuḥ //MU_5,82.51//
GSP27moksop_u:28255: ātmaiva sarvaṃ trijagat tadanyat tu nakiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:28256: tan nakiñcit tvam ātmānyad yadi tat tvaṃ nakiñcana //MU_5,82.52//
GSP27moksop_u:28257: ahaṃ tv idam idaṃ tan me iti vyarthaṃ kim īhase /
GSP27moksop_u:28258: asadvapuḥ kiṃ sphurati śaśaśṛṅgeṇa ko hataḥ //MU_5,82.53//
GSP27moksop_u:28262: sampadyate yat tat tv ajña svasaṃvedanamātrakam //MU_5,82.55//
GSP27moksop_u:28263: tena mūḍha na kartṛ tvaṃ na bhoktṛ tvaṃ na cāpy asi /
GSP27moksop_u:28264: tad evāsi paraṃ brahma tyaja maurkhyaṃ bhavātmakam //MU_5,82.56//
GSP27moksop_u:28268: na spandate na plavate kartṛsambodhanaṃ vinā //MU_5,82.58//
GSP27moksop_u:28269: akartuḥ karaṇasyājña śaktiḥ kācin na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:28270: dātrasya lāvakābhāve kartuṃ kim iva śaktatā //MU_5,82.59//
GSP27moksop_u:28272: na khaḍge sujaḍe kṛttasarvāṅge 'py asti śaktatā //MU_5,82.60//
GSP27moksop_u:28273: tasmān nāsi sakhe kartṛ mā vyarthaṃ duḥkhabhāg bhava /
GSP27moksop_u:28274: parārthaṃ kleśitā mūrkha prākṛteṣu na śobhate //MU_5,82.61//
GSP27moksop_u:28275: īśvaro nedṛśaś śocyo yas tvayopakṛto bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:28277: sarvaṃ tūpakaromy enam iti kevalam alpadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28278: kliśyate ca satāṃ tv artho na kaścid upayujyate //MU_5,82.63//
GSP27moksop_u:28280: tad asya kācin neccheha tṛptatvāt sarvadaiva hi //MU_5,82.64//
GSP27moksop_u:28284: ātmany evātmanaivāntaḥ kriyate kiṃ kim iṣyate //MU_5,82.66//
GSP27moksop_u:28285: tvādṛśasya tu dṛṣṭyaiva kṣubdhatā jāyate mudhā /
GSP27moksop_u:28287: ātmanā tava sambandhaś cet tat kartr asi sundara /
GSP27moksop_u:28288: kiṃ tu nāsyāsi sambandhaḥ kusumasyopalo yathā //MU_5,82.68//
GSP27moksop_u:28297: itthaṃ yadi tu sambandho bhavataḥ paramātmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:28301: anyaś ca dṛśyate loke sambandhas samayos sphuṭaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28302: yathā jvalanayor aikye tejasoḥ payasor api //MU_5,82.75//
GSP27moksop_u:28305: anyaś ca caura sambandho dṛṣṭo 'rdhasamayor api /
GSP27moksop_u:28308: atha vā vārimadhunor madhunor iva citrayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28319: tavāhaṃ tvaṃ mamety antarniścayena kila dvayoḥ //MU_5,82.83//
GSP27moksop_u:28325: sambandhas syād vadāsmābhir yo na dṛṣṭo na dṛśyate //MU_5,82.86//
GSP27moksop_u:28329: kathaṃ saṃśliṣyate sādho nityaṃ sann asatā kila //MU_5,82.88//
GSP27moksop_u:28332: dvayor vāpy asator evaṃ saṅgas sambhavatīha kaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28334: śṛṇv imaṃ niścayaṃ citta satyam eva mayocyate /
GSP27moksop_u:28335: ātmanā tava sambandhas svapneṣv api na vidyate //MU_5,82.91//
GSP27moksop_u:28336: yad anātmamayaṃ tac ca na sambhavati kutracit /
GSP27moksop_u:28337: ātmanas sarvarūpatvāt tena tvaṃ nāsi cittaka //MU_5,82.92//
GSP27moksop_u:28340: sakalakalpanayā svasamutthayā parivṛto 'py abhitaś ca vivarjitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28341: tava na saṅgam upaiti śaṭhākṛte hatamanas sakalāmaladṛg vibhuḥ //MU_5,82.94//
GSP27moksop_u:28350: nūnam evābhyudety ātmā tamasīva kṣate raviḥ //MU_5,83.3//
GSP27moksop_u:28355: bandho hi vāsanāmātraṃ tatkṣayo mokṣa ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:28361: satataṃ śreyase tasmād dvayam eva samācaret /
GSP27moksop_u:28365: yasmin dṛṣṭe kṣayaṃ yāti yas sa tena satā kṣayī /
GSP27moksop_u:28374: yāvad ajñānam evāntar bālānām eva valgati //MU_5,83.15//
GSP27moksop_u:28375: tajjñānām ātmanā saṅgo nendriyāṇām iti sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:28377: yayāyuktyā mudhaiṣā te śaṅkā sphurati pīvarī /
GSP27moksop_u:28383: cittendriyātmanāṃ saṅga iti no sambhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:28385: nātaḥ kartā na bhoktāsmi na mokṣo 'sti na bandhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:28386: nāham asmi na cānyo 'sti saṃvidātmāsty alepakaḥ //MU_5,83.21//
GSP27moksop_u:28387: sa evāhaṃ sa eva tvaṃ sa jagat so 'mbaraṃ sa bhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28388: sarvaṃ nūnaṃ sa eveti nirṇīte kiṃ vimuhyasi //MU_5,83.22//
GSP27moksop_u:28389: saṃvidaś cyavanaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃvido mā cyuto bhava /
GSP27moksop_u:28394: kīdṛśī kartṛtā citta kathaṃ vyomni vanaṃ bhavet //MU_5,83.25//
GSP27moksop_u:28398: sphuraty abdhir ivāmbhobhir mudhā lokaḥ kadarthitaḥ //MU_5,83.27//
GSP27moksop_u:28401: kalanārahite deve dehe manasi vā jaḍe /
GSP27moksop_u:28403: idam anyad idaṃ cānyac chubhaṃ vāśubham eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:28404: iti saṅkalpanā nāsti yathā nabhasi kānanam //MU_5,83.30//
GSP27moksop_u:28406: tatrāyam aham anyo 'yam iti saṅkalpanā katham //MU_5,83.31//
GSP27moksop_u:28408: āropayet kaḥ kalanām ṛgvedaṃ vyomni ko likhet //MU_5,83.32//
GSP27moksop_u:28410: ātmany asat tvam iti sādhu gate 'malatvāt kṣīṇau sukhāsukhalavau mama vai samoham //MU_5,83.33//
GSP27moksop_u:28415: svam indriyagaṇaṃ guptaṃ bodhayām āsa sādhv idam //MU_5,84.1//
GSP27moksop_u:28417: śrutvā tadbhāvatām etya parāṃ nirduḥkhatāṃ vraja //MU_5,84.2//
GSP27moksop_u:28419: asatyām ātmanas sattāṃ tad bhavantas tyajantv iti //MU_5,84.3//
GSP27moksop_u:28421: gataiveti sphuṭaṃ matto yūyaṃ hy ajñānasambhavāḥ //MU_5,84.4//
GSP27moksop_u:28436: hṛdayāvakaraṃ kīrṇam itaś cetaś ca karkaśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28440: etāś cānyāś ca bahvyo 'pi tvayīndriyagaṇe sati /
GSP27moksop_u:28442: tvayi tv asati he sādho sarvā eva śubhaśriyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28443: prabhāta iva padminyas sālokaṃ vikasanty alam //MU_5,84.15//
GSP27moksop_u:28449: abhyudeti hṛdo hṛdyā sutaror iva mañjarī //MU_5,84.18//
GSP27moksop_u:28467: yenaiva paśyasi śreyas tam evāṅgīkuru kṣaṇāt //MU_5,84.27//
GSP27moksop_u:28468: svātmābhāvas tava sukhaṃ manye mānavatāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:28469: tam eva bhāvayābhāvaṃ sukhatyāgo hi mūḍhatā //MU_5,84.28//
GSP27moksop_u:28470: yadi tv asti bhavat satyam antarbhāvitacetanam /
GSP27moksop_u:28471: jīvatas tat tavātyantam abhāvaṃ ka ivecchati //MU_5,84.29//
GSP27moksop_u:28472: kiṃ tu nāsty asi satyena vadāmi tava sundara /
GSP27moksop_u:28473: tena mithyaiva jīvāmīty āsthayā mā bhavāsukhi //MU_5,84.30//
GSP27moksop_u:28474: prakrame vāsi nāsty eva yā vā bhrāntyā tvadastitā /
GSP27moksop_u:28476: etāvad eva te rūpaṃ sādho yad avicāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:28477: vicāre vihite samyak tvam arūpam asat sthitam //MU_5,84.32//
GSP27moksop_u:28478: avicārāt prajātaṃ tvam anālokāt tamo yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:28484: idānīm uditaṃ nityaṃ tvaṃ prāgrūpe kṣayaṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:28492: anicchato 'pi te sādho vicāre sthitim āgate /
GSP27moksop_u:28494: tasmān nāsty asi nirṇītam iti siddhāntayuktibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28495: mitrendriyeśvara svasti bhavatas tv astam āgatam //MU_5,84.41//
GSP27moksop_u:28497: bhaviṣyate ca nodarkas svamanas svasti te 'stv iti //MU_5,84.42//
GSP27moksop_u:28500: ato nāsty eva nāsty eva saṃsārī cittasaṃsthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28501: ātmā tv asty eva cāsty eva yasmād anyan na vidyate //MU_5,84.44//
GSP27moksop_u:28502: ayam ātmeti kalanā manye no nirmalāntarā /
GSP27moksop_u:28505: maunī svātmani nirvāmi taraṅga iva vāriṇi //MU_5,84.46//
GSP27moksop_u:28507: saṃvedyavarjitam upetya susaṃvidaṃśaṃ śāmyāmi maunam ayam eva nirīham antaḥ //MU_5,84.47//
GSP27moksop_u:28511: iti nirṇīya sa munir vītahavyo vivāsanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28522: āsīc chailād ivotkīrṇaś citrārpita ivātha vā //MU_5,85.6//
GSP27moksop_u:28526: jīvanmuktatayā dhyānī na ca tatyāja tāṃ tanum //MU_5,85.8//
GSP27moksop_u:28527: tāvatkālaṃ sa subhago na prābudhyata yogavit /
GSP27moksop_u:28543: śatatraye tu varṣāṇām atha yāte svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28546: na tu prāṇamayas spandaḥ prāṇasaṃsaraṇaṃ vinā //MU_5,85.18//
GSP27moksop_u:28554: munitvādiṣu teṣv asya pratibhāseṣu bho mune /
GSP27moksop_u:28559: yadā yatra yathā buddho niyamas sa tathā sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28565: kalpam ekaṃ gaṇatvaṃ sa candramauleś cakāra ha /
GSP27moksop_u:28575: evaṃ saṃvinnabho bhāti yatra yatra yathā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:28576: tatra tatra tathā tāvat tāvat tad vindate tatam //MU_5,85.31//
GSP27moksop_u:28586: sa eṣa hi sthito 'ndhrāṇāṃ grāme vipulapādapaḥ //MU_5,85.36//
GSP27moksop_u:28588: mānasaḥ kila sargo 'sau vītahavyasya tatra ye /
GSP27moksop_u:28592: tad idaṃ bhāsate nāma kimmayaṃ pratibhāsate //MU_5,85.38//
GSP27moksop_u:28594: vastutas tu na tan nāma jagan nedaṃ ca netarat /
GSP27moksop_u:28595: na cāpi na jagatsattā brahmedaṃ bhāti kevalam //MU_5,85.40//
GSP27moksop_u:28596: bhāvi bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca tac cedaṃ ca tathetarat /
GSP27moksop_u:28598: evaṃrūpam idaṃ yāvan na parijñātam īdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:28599: vajrasāraṃ dṛḍhaṃ tāvaj jātaṃ sat paramāmbaram //MU_5,85.42//
GSP27moksop_u:28603: sphārīkṛtaṃ tena jagac ca dṛśyam evaṃ tataṃ naiva tataṃ ca kiñcit //MU_5,85.44//
GSP27moksop_u:28607: atha kiṃ vītahavyasya sthitaṃ tasmin vanodare /
GSP27moksop_u:28608: katham uddhṛtavān dehaṃ sa sampannaś ca kiṃ katham //MU_5,86.1//
GSP27moksop_u:28614: aśeṣān sa dadarśātha naṣṭān naṣṭān svadehakān /
GSP27moksop_u:28623: mūkaś calitum ākrāntaś śaknoti na manāg api //MU_5,86.8//
GSP27moksop_u:28624: tad gatvā praviśāmy āśu deham etaṃ vivasvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28625: tadīyaḥ piṅgalo deham uddhariṣyati me tataḥ //MU_5,86.9//
GSP27moksop_u:28626: atha vā kiṃ mamaitena śāmyāmy aham avighnataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28627: nirvāmi svaṃ padaṃ yāmi ko 'rtho me dehalīlayā //MU_5,86.10//
GSP27moksop_u:28629: tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ bhūyaś cintayām āsa bhūtale //MU_5,86.11//
GSP27moksop_u:28630: upādeyo hi dehasya na me tyāgo na saṃśrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28632: tad yāvad asti deho 'yaṃ na yāvad aṇutāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28633: tāvad enam upāruhya kiñcit pravicarāmy aham //MU_5,86.13//
GSP27moksop_u:28634: piṅgalena śarīraṃ svam uddhartuṃ tāpanaṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28638: bhagavān ravir apy enaṃ hṛdgataṃ munināyakam /
GSP27moksop_u:28651: kalevaraṃ muneḥ paṅkān mṛṇālam iva sārasaḥ //MU_5,86.22//
GSP27moksop_u:28652: maunaṃ puryaṣṭakam atha svaṃ viveśa kalevaram /
GSP27moksop_u:28656: jagāma piṅgalo vyoma muniś ca vimalaṃ saraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28660: tatra snātvā japaṃ kṛtvā pūjayitvā divākaram /
GSP27moksop_u:28662: maitryā tayā samatayā parayā ca śāntyā satprajñayā muditayā kṛpayā śriyā ca /
GSP27moksop_u:28663: yukto munis sakalasaṅgavimuktacetā vindhye sarittaṭagato dinam eva reme //MU_5,86.28//
GSP27moksop_u:28667: dinānte sa samādhātuṃ punar eva mano muniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28672: idānīṃ cintayā nārthaḥ punar vitatayā mama //MU_5,87.3//
GSP27moksop_u:28673: asti nāstīti kalanāṃ bhaṅktvā mṛdvīṃ latām iva /
GSP27moksop_u:28679: sthiras sthāṇur ivaikānte svāntānte sarvatas sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:28681: iti sañcintya sa dhyāne punas tasthau dināni ṣaṭ /
GSP27moksop_u:28686: na jagāma tathodvegaṃ na ca harṣam avāpa ha //MU_5,87.10//
GSP27moksop_u:28687: gacchatas tiṣṭhataś caiva tasyeyam abhavad dhṛdi /
GSP27moksop_u:28693: bho bho indriyacaurā he hatāśā hatanāmakāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28694: yuṣmākaṃ nāyam ātmāsti na bhavantas tathātmani //MU_5,87.14//
GSP27moksop_u:28697: vayam ātmeti yaiṣā vo babhūva kila vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:28699: anātmany ātmatā saiṣā saiṣā vastuny avastutā /
GSP27moksop_u:28701: bhavanto 'nye vayaṃ cānye brahmānyat kartṛtā parā /
GSP27moksop_u:28702: anyo bhoktānya ādatte ko doṣaḥ kasya kīdṛśaḥ //MU_5,87.18//
GSP27moksop_u:28704: vāsī cāyaḥphalāny evaṃ takṣā grāsārtham udyataḥ //MU_5,87.19//
GSP27moksop_u:28708: tathaiva kila kāyo 'yaṃ keva kasyātra khaṇḍanā //MU_5,87.21//
GSP27moksop_u:28709: vismṛtir vismṛtā dūraṃ smṛtis sphuṭam anusmṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:28710: sat saj jātam asac cāsat kṣayi kṣīṇaṃ sthiraṃ sthitam //MU_5,87.22//
GSP27moksop_u:28714: mūḍhatā ca sudūrasthā tatrāsāv avasat sadā //MU_5,87.24//
GSP27moksop_u:28720: videhamuktatāṃ prāpto yathā kālena tac chṛṇu //MU_5,87.27//
GSP27moksop_u:28729: rāga nīrāgatāṃ gaccha dveṣa nirdveṣatāṃ vraja /
GSP27moksop_u:28730: bhavadbhyāṃ suciraṃ kālam iha prakrīḍitaṃ mayā //MU_5,87.32//
GSP27moksop_u:28732: bhavadbhir lālito loke lālakair iva bālakaḥ //MU_5,87.33//
GSP27moksop_u:28733: imām api parāṃ puṇyāṃ nirvāṇapadavīm aham /
GSP27moksop_u:28734: yena vismāritas tasmai sukhāyāstu namo namaḥ //MU_5,87.34//
GSP27moksop_u:28736: tasmāt tvadupadiṣṭo 'yaṃ mārgo mama namo 'stu te //MU_5,87.35//
GSP27moksop_u:28738: duḥkha nāmnaiva duḥkhaṃ tvaṃ sukhadātman namo 'stu te //MU_5,87.36//
GSP27moksop_u:28740: deha sthitir iyaṃ yāmo vayam ātmīyam āspadam //MU_5,87.37//
GSP27moksop_u:28741: prāyo jaḍānāṃ jantūnām aho nu viṣamā gatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28743: mitra kāya mayā na tvaṃ tyajyase cirabāndhava /
GSP27moksop_u:28748: tvayā duḥkhaṃ na kartavyaṃ mātas tṛṣṇe vrajāmy aham //MU_5,87.41//
GSP27moksop_u:28750: doṣā upaśamaikāntaṃ vrajāmy ādiśa mām alam //MU_5,87.42//
GSP27moksop_u:28751: cirāc cirāya cedānīm amba tṛṣṇe kilāvayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28753: namas sukṛta sevyāya bhavate 'stu tvayā purā /
GSP27moksop_u:28757: yena sārdhaṃ ciraṃ bahvyo bhuktā duṣkṛtayonayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28758: adya prabhṛty adṛśyāya tasmai mohāya te namaḥ //MU_5,87.46//
GSP27moksop_u:28764: tvam ekā śokanāśārtham āśritā paramā sakhī //MU_5,87.49//
GSP27moksop_u:28770: ete bhavantas sahajāḥ prāktanās suhṛdo mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:28771: krameṇa jyotkṛtāḥ prāṇās svasti vo 'stu vrajāmy aham //MU_5,87.53//
GSP27moksop_u:28772: bhavadbhis saha citrāsu mayā bahvīṣu yoniṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:28776: na tad asti jagatkośe bhavadbhis saha yan mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:28777: na kṛtaṃ na hṛtaṃ nāttaṃ na dattaṃ nāvalambitam //MU_5,87.56//
GSP27moksop_u:28778: idānīṃ svāṃ diśaṃ yāntu bhavanto yāmy ahaṃ priyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28782: prāṇānilās tathā sparśā viśantv adya prabhañjanam /
GSP27moksop_u:28784: galatv agnau ghṛtam iva candre kṣīṇavapur manaḥ //MU_5,87.60//
GSP27moksop_u:28786: tṛṣṇā śuṣyatu sārambhā hemanta iva padminī //MU_5,87.61//
GSP27moksop_u:28801: sampūrṇa iva śītāṃśur viśrānta iva mandaraḥ //MU_5,88.3//
GSP27moksop_u:28810: pratibhātaṃ tatas tejo nimeṣārdhaṃ vicārya saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28811: jahau babhūva ca tadā na tamo na prakāśakam //MU_5,88.8//
GSP27moksop_u:28812: tām avasthām athāsādya manasā tan manastṛṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:28813: sphuritaṃ na manāg eva nimeṣārdhād aśātayat //MU_5,88.9//
GSP27moksop_u:28822: nirānando 'pi sānandas sac cāsac cāpi tatra saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28823: āsīn nakiñcit kiñcic ca prakāśas timiraṃ tathā //MU_5,88.14//
GSP27moksop_u:28824: acinmayaṃ cinmayaṃ ca neti neti yad ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:28825: tat tatas sambabhūvāsau madgirām apy agocaraḥ //MU_5,88.15//
GSP27moksop_u:28826: tad asau suṣamaṃ sthānaṃ padaṃ paramapāvanam /
GSP27moksop_u:28828: yac chūnyavādināṃ śūnyaṃ brahma brahmavidāṃ varam /
GSP27moksop_u:28835: yat sarvaṃ sarvadā sārvaṃ yat sat tat sad asau sthitaḥ //MU_5,88.20//
GSP27moksop_u:28836: yad anuttamaniṣṣyando dīpaṃ yat tejasām api /
GSP27moksop_u:28837: svānubhūtyekamānaṃ yat tat tat tat tad asau sthitaḥ //MU_5,88.21//
GSP27moksop_u:28838: yad ekaṃ cāpy anekaṃ ca sāñjanaṃ ca nirañjanam /
GSP27moksop_u:28839: yat sarvaṃ cāpy asarvaṃ ca tat tat tat tad asau sthitaḥ //MU_5,88.22//
GSP27moksop_u:28840: ajam ajaram anādyam ādyam ekaṃ padam akalaṃ sakalaṃ ca niṣkalaṃ ca /
GSP27moksop_u:28841: sthita iti sa tadā nabhassvarūpād api vimalasthitir īśvaraḥ kṣaṇena //MU_5,88.23//
GSP27moksop_u:28847: tasmiṃs tathopaśānte hi parāṃ nirvṛtim āgate /
GSP27moksop_u:28849: tathaiva tiṣṭhan nisspandas sa kāyo mlānim āyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:28853: bhūteṣv eva praviṣṭāni bhūtāni sakalāny alam /
GSP27moksop_u:28855: cidarṇavaṃ praviṣṭā cid dhātavo dhātuṣu sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28856: sve svarūpe sthitaṃ sarvaṃ munāv upaśamaṃ gate //MU_5,89.6//
GSP27moksop_u:28861: yad etad akhilaṃ rāma bhavate varṇitaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:28862: yad idaṃ varṇayāmy anyad varṇayiṣyāmi yac ca vā //MU_5,89.9//
GSP27moksop_u:28863: trikāladarśinā nityaṃ ciraṃ ca kila jīvatā /
GSP27moksop_u:28864: vicāritaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ ca mayā tad akhilaṃ svayam //MU_5,89.10//
GSP27moksop_u:28865: tad etām amalāṃ dṛṣṭim avalambya mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:28866: jñānam āsādaya paraṃ jñānān muktir hi labhyate //MU_5,89.11//
GSP27moksop_u:28868: jñānād eva parā siddhir nānyasmād rāma vastutaḥ //MU_5,89.12//
GSP27moksop_u:28872: anubhūtavatī viśvam idam eva ca taj jagat //MU_5,89.14//
GSP27moksop_u:28874: mano jagad idaṃ kṛtsnam anyatānanyate 'tra ke //MU_5,89.15//
GSP27moksop_u:28876: ciram anusṛtam anyais svaṃ svabhāvaṃ vivekī padam amalam anantaṃ prāptavāñ śāntaśokaḥ //MU_5,89.16//
GSP27moksop_u:28889: na kecana vaśaṃ yātā duḥkhasyāṅga bhavān iva //MU_5,90.5//
GSP27moksop_u:28890: svastho bhava bhavodāras samo bhava sukhī bhava /
GSP27moksop_u:28891: sarvagas tvaṃ tvam ātmaiva tava nāsti punarbhavaḥ //MU_5,90.6//
GSP27moksop_u:28893: na kecana vaśaṃ yānti mṛgendrāś śākhinām iva //MU_5,90.7//
GSP27moksop_u:28896: śaratkāla ivāmbhodaṃ taṃ me tvaṃ tanutāṃ naya //MU_5,90.8//
GSP27moksop_u:28901: karmāṇi tāḥ padārthānāṃ sahajāḥ khalu śaktayaḥ //MU_5,90.10//
GSP27moksop_u:28902: yad vicitraṃ kriyājālaṃ darśyate gopyate punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28903: rāma vastusvabhāvo 'sau na tad ātmavidāṃ matam //MU_5,90.11//
GSP27moksop_u:28906: nātmajñasyaiṣa viṣaya ātmajño hy ātmavān svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:28908: ye kecana jagadbhāvās tān avidyākṛtān viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28910: avidyām api ye yuktyā sādhayanti sukhātmikām /
GSP27moksop_u:28911: te hy avidyākṛtā eva na tv ātmajñās tathākramāḥ //MU_5,90.15//
GSP27moksop_u:28914: ātmajñas tv iha sarvasmād atīto vigataiṣaṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28915: ātmany eva hi santuṣṭo na karoti na cehate //MU_5,90.17//
GSP27moksop_u:28916: na tasyārtho nabhogatyā na siddhyā na ca bhogakaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28926: yas tu vā bhāvitātmāpi siddhijālāni vāñchati /
GSP27moksop_u:28927: sa siddhisādhakair dravyais tāni sādhayati kramāt //MU_5,90.23//
GSP27moksop_u:28928: sidhyatīttham idaṃ yuktyaivety ayaṃ niyateḥ kramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28930: svabhāva eṣa vastūnāṃ svatas siddho hi nānyataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28931: niyatiṃ na jahāty eva śaśāṅka iva śītatām //MU_5,90.25//
GSP27moksop_u:28933: anyathā niyatiṃ kartuṃ na śaktaḥ kaścid eva hi //MU_5,90.26//
GSP27moksop_u:28935: etās tāś śaktayo rāma yad vyomagamanādikam //MU_5,90.27//
GSP27moksop_u:28936: yathā viṣāṇi nighnanti madayanti madhūni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:28937: vamayanti ca bhuktāni madanāni phalāni ca //MU_5,90.28//
GSP27moksop_u:28941: ātmajñānasya nāsty eva kartṛtā nāpy akartṛtā //MU_5,90.30//
GSP27moksop_u:28944: yasyecchā vidyate kācit sa siddhiṃ sādhayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:28948: yā yodeti ca yasyecchā sa tayā yatate tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:28949: yathā kālaṃ tad āpnoti jño vāpy ajñataro 'pi vā //MU_5,90.34//
GSP27moksop_u:28953: yatheṣṭam eva sidhyanti siddhayas svāḥ kramārjitāḥ //MU_5,90.36//
GSP27moksop_u:28959: ayaṃ me saṃśayo brahman vītahavyasya sā tanuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28960: kravyādair na kathaṃ bhuktā kathaṃ klinnā na bhūtale //MU_5,90.39//
GSP27moksop_u:28961: tadaiva vītahavyo 'sau kathaṃ ca na gataḥ prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:28962: videhamuktatāṃ śīghraṃ yathāvad iti me vada //MU_5,90.40//
GSP27moksop_u:28967: tanus tiṣṭhati tacchede śaktā neha hi kecana //MU_5,90.42//
GSP27moksop_u:28968: śṛṇu yuktyā yayā yogitanuś chedādibhir bhramaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28970: cetaḥ padārthe patati yasmin yasmin yadā yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:28971: tanmayaṃ tad bhavaty āśu tasmiṃs tasmiṃs tadā tadā //MU_5,90.44//
GSP27moksop_u:28972: tathā dṛṣṭāri hi mano vikāram upagacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:28976: mṛṣṭe laulyam upādatte durbhojye yāti naspṛhām /
GSP27moksop_u:28977: vairasyaṃ yāti kaṭuni svayam ity anubhūyate //MU_5,90.47//
GSP27moksop_u:28979: hiṃsraṃ cetaḥ pataty āśu samatām eti tat tadā //MU_5,90.48//
GSP27moksop_u:28981: pāntho vyarthaṃ pathi grāme yathā grāmīṇakarmaṇi //MU_5,90.49//
GSP27moksop_u:28983: yad yad bhavati tatrāśu tathārūpaṃ na saṃśayaḥ //MU_5,90.50//
GSP27moksop_u:28989: tanvī puryaṣṭakeṣv eva pratibimbaṃ jaleṣv iva //MU_5,90.53//
GSP27moksop_u:28991: na vikāraṃ tanur nītā vītahavyasya rāghava //MU_5,90.54//
GSP27moksop_u:28992: anyac ca śṛṇu he rāma spando nāśasya kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:28993: vikārasya ca cittottho vātajo vā jagatsthitau //MU_5,90.55//
GSP27moksop_u:28994: prāṇānāṃ prāṇatā spandāt tacchāntau te dṛṣatsamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:28995: yatas sthitā dhāraṇayā tenānaṣṭāsya sā tanuḥ //MU_5,90.56//
GSP27moksop_u:28997: na yasya vidyate tasya dūrasthau vikṛtikṣayau //MU_5,90.57//
GSP27moksop_u:28999: dhātavas saṃsthitiṃ dehe na tyajanti kadācana //MU_5,90.58//
GSP27moksop_u:29002: tathā ca dṛśyate loke spandaśāntau dṛḍhā sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29009: vicchinnagranthayas sarve te svatantrās tanau sthitāḥ //MU_5,90.63//
GSP27moksop_u:29010: evaṃ vāpi ca karmāṇi prāktanāny aihikāni vā /
GSP27moksop_u:29011: vāsanā vā na teṣāṃ tac ceto niyamayanty alam //MU_5,90.64//
GSP27moksop_u:29013: yad yad bhāvayati kṣipraṃ tat tad āśu karoty alam //MU_5,90.65//
GSP27moksop_u:29015: sāmprataṃ jīvitaṃ buddhaṃ tad evāśu sthirīkṛtam //MU_5,90.66//
GSP27moksop_u:29016: yadā tu tasya pratibhā videhonmukhatāṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:29018: vigatavāsanam āśu vipāśatām upagataṃ mana ātmatayoditam /
GSP27moksop_u:29019: yad abhivāñchati tad bhavati kṣaṇāt sakalaśaktimayo hi maheśvaraḥ //MU_5,90.68//
GSP27moksop_u:29023: yadā hy astaṅgataprāyaṃ jātaṃ cittaṃ vicārataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29027: maitryādayo guṇā jātā ity uktaṃ kiṃ tvayā prabho //MU_5,91.2//
GSP27moksop_u:29028: brahmann astaṅgate citte kasya maitryādayo guṇāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29029: kva vā parisphurantīti vada me vadatāṃ vara //MU_5,91.3//
GSP27moksop_u:29036: vidyamānaṃ mano viddhi tad duḥkhāyaiva kevalam //MU_5,91.6//
GSP27moksop_u:29038: yat tu cittam atattvajñaṃ duḥkhi taj jīva ucyate //MU_5,91.7//
GSP27moksop_u:29039: vidyamānaṃ mano yāvat tāvad duḥkham anantakam /
GSP27moksop_u:29041: duḥkhi mūḍham avaṣṭabdham asmīty eva viniścayam /
GSP27moksop_u:29044: naṣṭaṃ kasya mano brahman naṣṭaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:29045: kīdṛśaś cāsya nāśas syāt syāt sattā cāsya kīdṛśī //MU_5,91.10//
GSP27moksop_u:29048: asya nāśam idānīṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu praśnavidāṃ vara //MU_5,91.11//
GSP27moksop_u:29049: sukhaduḥkhadaśā dhīraṃ sāmyān na proddharanti yam /
GSP27moksop_u:29050: niśśvāsā iva śailendraṃ cittaṃ tasya mṛtaṃ viduḥ //MU_5,91.12//
GSP27moksop_u:29051: ayaṃ so 'ham ayaṃ nāham iti cintā narottamam /
GSP27moksop_u:29052: kharvīkaroti yaṃ nāntaś cittaṃ tasya mṛtaṃ viduḥ //MU_5,91.13//
GSP27moksop_u:29053: eṣa sādho manonāśo naṣṭaṃ cedṛṅ mano bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:29055: manastāṃ mūḍhatāṃ viddhi yadā naśyati sānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:29056: cittanāśābhidhānaṃ hi tadā sattvam udety alam //MU_5,91.15//
GSP27moksop_u:29065: maitrī dayātha muditā śaśāṅka iva dīptayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29069: arūpas tu manonāśo yo mayokto raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:29074: cittanāśe virūpākhye na kiñcid api vidyate //MU_5,91.24//
GSP27moksop_u:29075: na guṇā nāguṇās tatra na śrīr nāśrīr na lolatā /
GSP27moksop_u:29077: na tejo na tamaḥ kiñcin na sandhyādinarātrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29078: na diśo daśa nākāśaṃ nārtho nānartharūpatā //MU_5,91.26//
GSP27moksop_u:29079: na vāsanā na racanā nehānīhe na rañjanā /
GSP27moksop_u:29080: na sattā nāpi vāsattā na madhyaṃ vāpi tat padam //MU_5,91.27//
GSP27moksop_u:29083: ye hi pāraṃ gatā buddhes saṃsārāḍambarasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:29084: teṣāṃ tad āspadaṃ sphāraṃ pavanānām ivāmbaram //MU_5,91.29//
GSP27moksop_u:29086: ākāśakośatanavo 'tanavo mahāntas tasmin pade galitacittalavā vasanti //MU_5,91.30//
GSP27moksop_u:29100: kiṃ bījam atha bījasya tasya kiṃ bījam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:29101: atha tasyāpi kiṃ bījaṃ bījaṃ tasyāpi kiṃ bhavet //MU_5,92.6//
GSP27moksop_u:29103: siddhaye jñānasārasya vada me vadatāṃ vara //MU_5,92.7//
GSP27moksop_u:29111: cittād idam udety uccais sac cāsac cāṅgajālakam /
GSP27moksop_u:29113: yathā gandharvasaṅkalpāt puram evaṃ hi cetasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29115: yad idaṃ kiñcid ābhogi jāgataṃ dṛśyatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:29116: rūpaṃ tac cetasas sphāraṃ ghaṭāditvaṃ mṛdo yathā //MU_5,92.13//
GSP27moksop_u:29122: asaṃvittivaśāt tena cittam antar na jāyate //MU_5,92.16//
GSP27moksop_u:29132: kāraṇaṃ samatāyās tat kṣobhas tatra na vidyate //MU_5,92.21//
GSP27moksop_u:29135: suptā punar abodhāya saṃvit santiṣṭhate yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:29136: labdhaṃ bhavati labdhavyaṃ tadā tad amalaṃ padam //MU_5,92.23//
GSP27moksop_u:29138: no cet saṃvidam ucchūnāṃ karoṣi tad ajo bhavān //MU_5,92.24//
GSP27moksop_u:29148: yad ādānaṃ padārthasya vāsanā sā prakīrtitā //MU_5,92.29//
GSP27moksop_u:29149: bhāvitaṃ tīvrasaṃvegād ātmanā yat tad eva saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29152: yat paśyati tad etat tat sadvastv iti vimuhyati //MU_5,92.31//
GSP27moksop_u:29154: bhramaṃ paśyati durdṛṣṭis sarvaṃ madavaśād iva //MU_5,92.32//
GSP27moksop_u:29158: yad avastuni vastutvaṃ tac cittaṃ viddhi rāghava //MU_5,92.34//
GSP27moksop_u:29161: yadā na vāsyate kiñcid dheyopādeyarūpi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:29162: sthīyate sakalaṃ tyaktvā tadā cittaṃ na jāyate //MU_5,92.36//
GSP27moksop_u:29163: avāsanatvāt satataṃ yadā na manute manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29165: yadā kiñcin na saṃvittau sphuraty abhram ivāmbare /
GSP27moksop_u:29166: tadā padma ivākāśe cittam antar na jāyate //MU_5,92.38//
GSP27moksop_u:29167: yadā na bhāvyate bhāvaḥ kvacij jagati vastuni /
GSP27moksop_u:29168: tadā hṛdambare śūnye cittarakṣo na jāyate //MU_5,92.39//
GSP27moksop_u:29170: yad bhāvanaṃ vastuno 'ntā rāgeṇa ca rasena ca //MU_5,92.40//
GSP27moksop_u:29171: na kāñcit kalanāyogyāṃ dṛśaṃ bhāvayatas svataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29173: yad abhāvanam āsthāyā yad abhāvasya bhāvanam /
GSP27moksop_u:29176: vṛttistham api tac cittam asadrūpam udāhṛtam //MU_5,92.43//
GSP27moksop_u:29177: vāsanāyāṃ rasādānād rāgo yasya na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:29178: tasya cittam acittatvaṃ gataṃ sattvaṃ tad ucyate //MU_5,92.44//
GSP27moksop_u:29182: vāsanā rasanirhīnā jīvanmuktā hi te smṛtāḥ //MU_5,92.46//
GSP27moksop_u:29186: ekasmiṃś ca tayoḥ kṣīṇe kṣipraṃ dve api naśyataḥ //MU_5,92.48//
GSP27moksop_u:29187: mithaḥ kāraṇam ete hi bīje janmani cetasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29189: bījāṅkuravad ete hi sthite ca tilatailavat /
GSP27moksop_u:29193: cittasyotpādake sārdhaṃ tathaite vā same tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:29202: tayor ekakṣaye nāśo dvayoś cittasya cānagha //MU_5,92.56//
GSP27moksop_u:29216: saṃvedyaṃ bījam ity uktaṃ sphuratas tau yatas tataḥ //MU_5,92.63//
GSP27moksop_u:29218: udeti tasmāt saṃvedyaṃ kathitaṃ bījam etayoḥ //MU_5,92.64//
GSP27moksop_u:29220: samūlaṃ naśyataḥ kṣipraṃ mūlacchedād iva drumau //MU_5,92.65//
GSP27moksop_u:29221: saṃvidaṃ viddhi saṃvedyabījaṃ vīra tayā vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:29222: na sambhavati saṃvedyaṃ tailahīnas tilo yathā //MU_5,92.66//
GSP27moksop_u:29223: na bahir nāntare kiñcit saṃvedyaṃ vidyate pṛthak /
GSP27moksop_u:29224: saṃvit sphurantī saṅkalpya saṃvedyaṃ sphurati svataḥ //MU_5,92.67//
GSP27moksop_u:29230: puruṣatvaṃ yathā sthāṇos saṃvedyaṃ saṃvidas tathā //MU_5,92.70//
GSP27moksop_u:29231: etan mithyā vidur jñānaṃ samyagjñānād vilīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:29232: rajjvām iva bhujaṅgatvaṃ dvīndutvaṃ svīkṣitād iva //MU_5,92.71//
GSP27moksop_u:29233: śuddhaiva saṃvit trijagat saṃvedyaṃ nānyad asty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:29234: ity antar niścayo rūḍhas samyagjñānaṃ vidur budhāḥ //MU_5,92.72//
GSP27moksop_u:29235: pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā yad asyāḥ pratibhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:29242: asaṃvedyaḥ prabuddhātmā yas tvaṃ sa tvaṃ raghūdvaha //MU_5,92.76//
GSP27moksop_u:29244: ajaḍaś cāpy asaṃvittiḥ kīdṛśo bhavati prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:29245: asaṃvittau ca jāḍyaṃ tat kathaṃ vā vinivāryate //MU_5,92.77//
GSP27moksop_u:29248: jīvo na vindate kiñcid asaṃvid ajaḍo hi saḥ //MU_5,92.78//
GSP27moksop_u:29250: so 'saṃvid ajaḍaḥ proktaḥ kurvan kāryaśatāny api //MU_5,92.79//
GSP27moksop_u:29251: saṃvedyena hṛdākāśo manāg api na lipyate /
GSP27moksop_u:29256: āśritaṃ bhavati prājña yasmād bhūyo na lipyate //MU_5,92.82//
GSP27moksop_u:29258: nīlatvam iva khāt sphāra ānandas sampravartate //MU_5,92.83//
GSP27moksop_u:29260: tanmayatvād anādyantaṃ tad apy antar vilīyate //MU_5,92.84//
GSP27moksop_u:29261: gacchaṃs tiṣṭhan spṛśañ jighrann api tena sa ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:29265: yathā bījād bṛhadvṛkṣo vyoma vyāpnoti kālataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29267: yadā saṅkalpya saṅkalpaṃ saṃvit saṃvindate vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29270: svayaṃ mokṣaṃ nayaty ante saṃvit sarvatra rāghava //MU_5,92.89//
GSP27moksop_u:29271: yad eva bhāvayaty eṣā tad eva bhavati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:29272: naṭavad bhūmikāṃ tyaktvā svam āyāti cirād vapuḥ //MU_5,92.90//
GSP27moksop_u:29273: devo nāgo 'suro yakṣo rakṣaḥ puṅkinnaro gajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29275: baddhvātmānaṃ ruditvā ca kośakāraḥ krimir yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:29276: cirāt kevalatām eti svayaṃ saṃvit svabhāvataḥ //MU_5,92.92//
GSP27moksop_u:29279: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29281: saṃvinmātraṃ jagat sarvaṃ dvitīyā nāsti kalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:29282: ity eva samyagjñānena saṃvid gacchati nānyatām //MU_5,92.95//
GSP27moksop_u:29283: yadā na vindate kiñcit spandate na na copati /
GSP27moksop_u:29284: svātmany eva sthitiṃ yāti saṃvin nālipyate tadā //MU_5,92.96//
GSP27moksop_u:29285: athāsyās saṃvido rāma sanmātraṃ bījam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:29286: sattvamātrād udety eṣā prākāśyam iva tejasaḥ //MU_5,92.97//
GSP27moksop_u:29287: dve rūpe tatra sattāyā ekaṃ nānākṛti sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:29288: dvitīyam ekarūpaṃ tu vibhāgo 'yaṃ tayoś śṛṇu //MU_5,92.98//
GSP27moksop_u:29289: ghaṭatā paṭatā tattā tvattā matteti kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:29290: sattārūpaṃ vibhāgena yat tu nānākṛti sthitam //MU_5,92.99//
GSP27moksop_u:29294: ekarūpaṃ mahārūpaṃ sattāyās tat paraṃ viduḥ //MU_5,92.101//
GSP27moksop_u:29297: ekarūpaṃ tu yad rūpaṃ sattāyā vimalātmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:29298: na kadācana tad yāti nāśaṃ nāpi ca vismṛtim //MU_5,92.103//
GSP27moksop_u:29302: yady apy uttamasadrūpā tathāpy eṣā na vāstavī //MU_5,92.105//
GSP27moksop_u:29304: nānātākāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭā tat kathaṃ pāvanaṃ bhavet //MU_5,92.106//
GSP27moksop_u:29308: saivāsya bījatāṃ yātā tata eṣa pravartate //MU_5,92.108//
GSP27moksop_u:29310: padam ādyam anādyantaṃ tasya bījaṃ na vidyate //MU_5,92.109//
GSP27moksop_u:29311: saṃvil layaṃ yāti tatra nirvikāraṃ ca tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:29312: bhūyo nāvartate duḥkhe tatra labdhavatī padam //MU_5,92.110//
GSP27moksop_u:29313: tad dhetus sarvahetūnāṃ tasya hetur na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:29314: sa sāras sarvasārāṇāṃ tasmāt sāro na vidyate //MU_5,92.111//
GSP27moksop_u:29317: sarve bhāvā ime tatra svadante svādadhāriṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:29318: ṣaḍrasā iva jihvāyāṃ prakaṭatvaṃ prayānti ca //MU_5,92.113//
GSP27moksop_u:29319: tat khād acchatarasyāpi cidākāśasya vai padam /
GSP27moksop_u:29320: sarveṣāṃ svādajātānām alam āsvādanaṃ ca tat //MU_5,92.114//
GSP27moksop_u:29321: jāyate vartate caiva vardhate dṛśyate tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:29323: tat tad guru gariṣṭhānāṃ tat tal laghu laghīyasām /
GSP27moksop_u:29324: tat tat sthūlaṃ sthaviṣṭhānām aṇīyas tad aṇīyasām //MU_5,92.116//
GSP27moksop_u:29325: daviṣṭhānāṃ daviṣṭhaṃ tad antikānāṃ tad antikam /
GSP27moksop_u:29326: kaniṣṭhānāṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ taj jyeṣṭhaṃ taj jyāyasām api //MU_5,92.117//
GSP27moksop_u:29327: tejasām api tat tejas tamasām api tat tamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29328: vastūnām api tad vastu dṛśām apy aṅga dṛk parā //MU_5,92.118//
GSP27moksop_u:29329: tat tat kiñcin nakiñcic ca tat tad asti ca nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:29330: tat tad dṛśyaṃ adṛśyaṃ ca tat tad asmi na cāsmi ca //MU_5,92.119//
GSP27moksop_u:29332: pade sthitim upāyāsi yathā kuru tathānagha //MU_5,92.120//
GSP27moksop_u:29333: tad amalam ajaraṃ tad ātmatattvaṃ tadavagatāv upaśāntim eti cetaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29338: etāni tāni proktāni tvayā bījāni mānada /
GSP27moksop_u:29339: katamasya prayogeṇa śīghraṃ tat prāpyate padam //MU_5,93.1//
GSP27moksop_u:29341: eteṣāṃ duḥkhabījānāṃ proktaṃ yad yan mayottaram /
GSP27moksop_u:29342: tasya tasya prayogeṇa śīghram āsādyate padam //MU_5,93.2//
GSP27moksop_u:29345: sthitiṃ badhnāsi tattvajña kṣaṇam apy akṣayātmikām /
GSP27moksop_u:29346: kṣaṇe 'sminn eva tat sādhu padam āsādayasy alam //MU_5,93.4//
GSP27moksop_u:29347: sattāsāmānyarūpe vā karoṣi sthitim aṅga cet /
GSP27moksop_u:29351: saṃvedye kevale dhyānaṃ na sambhavati rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:29352: sarvatra sambhavād asyās saṃvitter eva sarvadā //MU_5,93.7//
GSP27moksop_u:29353: yac cintayasi yad yāsi yat tiṣṭhasi karoṣi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:29354: tatra tatra sthitā saṃvit saṃvid eva tad eva vā //MU_5,93.8//
GSP27moksop_u:29356: tat te śithilatāṃ yānti sarvādhivyādhayaḥ kṣaṇāt //MU_5,93.9//
GSP27moksop_u:29357: pūrvebhyas tu prayatnebhyo viṣamo 'yaṃ hi saṃsmṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29359: yāvad vilīnaṃ na mano na tāvad vāsanākṣayaḥ //MU_5,93.11//
GSP27moksop_u:29361: mithaḥ kāraṇatāṃ gatvā dussādhāni sthitāny ataḥ //MU_5,93.12//
GSP27moksop_u:29363: bhogecchāṃ dūratas tyaktvā trayam etat samāśrayet //MU_5,93.13//
GSP27moksop_u:29364: sarva ete samaṃ yāvan na svabhyastā muhur muhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29365: tāvan na padasamprāptir bhavaty api samāśataiḥ //MU_5,93.14//
GSP27moksop_u:29368: ekaikaśo niṣevyante yady ete ciram apy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:29369: tan na siddhiṃ prayacchanti mantrāś śakalitā iva //MU_5,93.16//
GSP27moksop_u:29371: ekaśaḥ param abhyetuṃ na śaktās sainikā iva //MU_5,93.17//
GSP27moksop_u:29372: samam udyogam ānītās santa ete hi dhīmatā /
GSP27moksop_u:29373: samsārāriṃ nikṛntanti mūlād api bhaṭā iva //MU_5,93.18//
GSP27moksop_u:29375: samaṃ sevyās tava ciraṃ tena tāta na tapyase //MU_5,93.19//
GSP27moksop_u:29377: niśśeṣam eva truṭyanti bisacchedād guṇā iva //MU_5,93.20//
GSP27moksop_u:29379: sā cirābhyāsayogena vinā na kṣīyate kvacit //MU_5,93.21//
GSP27moksop_u:29380: gacchañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighraṃs tiṣṭhañ jāgrat svapan sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:29383: vidus tattvavidas tasmāt tad apy evaṃ samāharet //MU_5,93.23//
GSP27moksop_u:29390: adāv ante ca vastūnām avisaṃvādi yat sthiram /
GSP27moksop_u:29391: rūpaṃ taddarśanaṃ jñānaṃ kṣīyate tena vāsanā //MU_5,93.27//
GSP27moksop_u:29396: yaḥ prāṇapavanaspandaś cittaspandas sa eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:29400: atha vainaṃ kramaṃ tyaktvā cittākramaṇam eva cet /
GSP27moksop_u:29401: rocate te tad āpnoṣi kālena bahunā padam //MU_5,93.32//
GSP27moksop_u:29402: na śakyate mano jetuṃ vinā yuktim anindita /
GSP27moksop_u:29406: etās tā yuktayaḥ puṣṭās santi cittajaye kila /
GSP27moksop_u:29407: yābhis taj jīyate kṣipraṃ dhārābhir iva bhūrajaḥ //MU_5,93.35//
GSP27moksop_u:29408: satīṣu yuktiṣv etāsu haṭhān niyamayanti ye /
GSP27moksop_u:29409: cetas te dīpam utsṛjya vinighnanti tamo 'ñjanaiḥ //MU_5,93.36//
GSP27moksop_u:29410: vimūḍhāḥ kartum udyuktā ye haṭhāc cetaso jayam /
GSP27moksop_u:29413: śodhayanti samutsṛjya yuktiṃ ye tān hatān viduḥ //MU_5,93.38//
GSP27moksop_u:29414: bhayād bhayam upāyānti kleśāt kleśaṃ vrajanti te /
GSP27moksop_u:29421: na kvacid yāti viśvāsaṃ mṛgī grāmagatā yathā //MU_5,93.42//
GSP27moksop_u:29423: prohyate prapatad dūraṃ tṛṇaṃ girinadīṣv iva //MU_5,93.43//
GSP27moksop_u:29424: ātmatattvaṃ vidhivaśāt kadācit kiñcid eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:29428: tato gacchanti narakaṃ tatas svargam ihaiva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:29431: śuddhāṃ saṃvidam āśritya vītarāgas sthiro bhava //MU_5,93.47//
GSP27moksop_u:29432: jñānavān eva sukhabhāg jñānavān eva jīvati /
GSP27moksop_u:29433: jñānavān eva balavāṃs tasmāj jñānamayo bhava //MU_5,93.48//
GSP27moksop_u:29434: saṃvedyavarjitam anuttamam ādyam ekaṃ saṃvitpadaṃ vikalanaṃ kalayan mahātman /
GSP27moksop_u:29435: hṛdy eva tiṣṭha kalanārahitaḥ kriyāṃ tu kurvann akartṛpadam eṣy asamoditaśrīḥ //MU_5,93.49//
GSP27moksop_u:29439: manāg api vicāreṇa cetasas svasya nigrahaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29440: manāg api kṛto yena tenāptaṃ janmanaḥ phalam //MU_5,94.1//
GSP27moksop_u:29444: saṃśrayanti guṇā gaurās saraḥ pūrṇam ivāṇḍajāḥ //MU_5,94.3//
GSP27moksop_u:29447: kiṃ kurvantīha viṣayā mānasyo vṛttayas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:29467: gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato 'pi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:29468: na vicāraparaṃ ceto yasyāsau mṛta ucyate //MU_5,94.15//
GSP27moksop_u:29469: kim idaṃ syāj jagat kiṃ syād aham ity aniśaṃ śanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29475: jñāne prakaṭatāṃ yāte jñeyaṃ svayam udety alam /
GSP27moksop_u:29476: ravāv abhyudite bhūmāv āloka iva nirmalaḥ //MU_5,94.19//
GSP27moksop_u:29478: taj jñānam ucyate jñeyād abhinnam iva saṃsthitam //MU_5,94.20//
GSP27moksop_u:29480: jñeyam asyāntar evāsti mādhuryaṃ payaso yathā //MU_5,94.21//
GSP27moksop_u:29483: sadasadrūpam amalaṃ jñeyaṃ brahma paraṃ viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29495: keṣucin na nibadhnāti rūkṣeṣu madhureṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:29496: raṇiteṣu ratiṃ rāma padmeṣv iva niśākaraḥ //MU_5,94.29//
GSP27moksop_u:29503: keṣucin na nibadhnāti svāyatteṣv apy asaktadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29504: rāma sparśaratiṃ dhīro haṃso marumahīṣv iva //MU_5,94.33//
GSP27moksop_u:29510: phaleṣv anneṣu mūleṣu śākeṣv apy āmiṣeṣu ca //MU_5,94.36//
GSP27moksop_u:29530: ninade ca mṛgendrāṇāṃ na kṣubhyati manāg api //MU_5,94.46//
GSP27moksop_u:29537: nānandam ety upavane na khedam adhigacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:29538: na khedam eti maruṣu nānandam adhigacchati //MU_5,94.50//
GSP27moksop_u:29546: antarmuktaṃ mano nityaṃ samaṃ kṛtvaiva tiṣṭhati //MU_5,94.54//
GSP27moksop_u:29549: na bibheti na cādatte vaivaśyaṃ na ca dīnatām /
GSP27moksop_u:29550: samas svasthamanā maunī dhīras tiṣṭhati śailavat //MU_5,94.56//
GSP27moksop_u:29551: apavitraṃ ca pathyaṃ ca viṣapaṅkagarādy api /
GSP27moksop_u:29552: bhuktvā jarayati kṣipraṃ klinnaṃ naṣṭaṃ ca mṛṣṭavat //MU_5,94.57//
GSP27moksop_u:29560: na hṛṣyati glāyati vā sadā samatayeddhayā //MU_5,94.61//
GSP27moksop_u:29563: na kasyacin na kasyāñcid akṣasya viṣayasthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:29570: na haranti vikalpaughā jalaughā iva parvatam //MU_5,94.66//
GSP27moksop_u:29573: jagaj jarattṛṇalavo viṣaṃ cāmṛtam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:29578: kiṃ heyaṃ kim upādeyam iha tattvavido muneḥ //MU_5,94.70//
GSP27moksop_u:29579: saṃvid evedam akhilaṃ bhrāntim anyāṃ tyajānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:29580: saṃvinmayavapus sphāraḥ kiṃ jahāsi kim īhase //MU_5,94.71//
GSP27moksop_u:29581: yad etaj jāyate bhūmer bhaviṣyat pelavāṅkuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29582: tat saṃvid eva prathate tathā na tv aṅkuro 'sti saḥ //MU_5,94.72//
GSP27moksop_u:29583: ādāv ante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tasya yā /
GSP27moksop_u:29584: kañcit kālalavaṃ dṛṣṭā sattāsau saṃvido bhramaḥ //MU_5,94.73//
GSP27moksop_u:29587: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api /
GSP27moksop_u:29588: karma kurvann akurvan vā nissaṅgas san na lipyase //MU_5,94.75//
GSP27moksop_u:29589: gatasaṅgena manasā kurvann api na lipyase /
GSP27moksop_u:29592: na lipyate sukhair duḥkhair manorathakalāsv iva //MU_5,94.77//
GSP27moksop_u:29593: gatasaṅgamanā dṛṣṭyā paśyann api na paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:29595: gatasaṅgaṃ mano jantoḥ paśyaṃś cāpi na paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:29596: na śṛṇoty api śṛṇvaṃś ca na spṛśaty api saṃspṛśan //MU_5,94.79//
GSP27moksop_u:29597: na jighraty api jighraṃś ca nonmiṣaṃś conmiṣaty api /
GSP27moksop_u:29598: padārthe na pataty eva balāt pātitam apy alam //MU_5,94.80//
GSP27moksop_u:29602: saṅgaḥ kāraṇam āśānāṃ saṅgaḥ kāraṇam āpadām //MU_5,94.82//
GSP27moksop_u:29607: saṅgaḥ kim ucyate brūhi samāsena mama prabho //MU_5,94.84//
GSP27moksop_u:29610: malinā vāsanā yaiṣā sa saṅga iti kathyate //MU_5,94.85//
GSP27moksop_u:29613: tām asaṅgābhidhāṃ viddhi yāvaddehaṃ ca bhāvinīm /
GSP27moksop_u:29614: tayā yat kriyate karma tad bandhāyaiva kevalam //MU_5,94.87//
GSP27moksop_u:29616: yadi tiṣṭhasi nirvyagraṃ kurvann api tad asy asi //MU_5,94.88//
GSP27moksop_u:29623: sadā samagre 'pi hi vastujāte samāśayo 'py antar adīnasattvaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29624: vyāpāramātrāt sahajāt kramasthān na kiñcid apy anyad asau karoti //MU_5,94.92//
GSP27moksop_u:29625: yad eva kiñcit prakṛtakramasthaṃ kartavyam ātmīyam asau tad eva /
GSP27moksop_u:29627: apy āpadaṃ prāpya susampadaṃ vā mahāmatis svaṃ prakṛtaṃ svabhāvam /
GSP27moksop_u:29628: jahāti no mandaravellito 'pi śauklyaṃ yathā kṣīramahāmburāśiḥ //MU_5,94.94//
GSP27moksop_u:29629: samprāpya sāmrājyam athāpadaṃ vā sarīsṛpatvaṃ suranāthatāṃ vā /
GSP27moksop_u:29630: tiṣṭhaty akhedodayam astaharṣaṃ kṣayodayeṣv indur ivaikarūpaḥ //MU_5,94.95//
GSP27moksop_u:29634: dhiyeddhayā punar iha janmabandhanair na badhyase samadhigatātmadṛg yathā //MU_5,94.97//
GSP27moksop_u:29671: tena tat tāram apy āśu vaco 'ntardhānam āyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:29679: evaṃ prakṣubhite tasmin gṛhe dāśarathe tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:29686: kaccid gṛhīto bhavatā madgirām artha īdṛśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29690: anayaiva dhiyā rāma viharan naiva badhyase /
GSP27moksop_u:29691: anyathādhaḥ patasy āśu vindhyakhāte yathā gajaḥ //MU_6,1.26//
GSP27moksop_u:29692: sugṛhītaṃ dhiyā rāma madvaco na karoṣi cet /
GSP27moksop_u:29693: tat patasy avaṭe tyaktadīpaḥ pāntho yathā niśi //MU_6,1.27//
GSP27moksop_u:29696: he sabhyā he mahārāja rāma lakṣmaṇa bhūmipāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29697: sarva eva bhavanto 'dya tāvad vyāpāram āhnikam //MU_6,1.29//
GSP27moksop_u:29698: kurvantv ayaṃ hi divasaḥ prāyaḥ pariṇatākṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29701: ity ukte muninā tena sā sarvaiva sabhā tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:29709: āpṛcchya kecid gaganaṃ yayuḥ kecid vanāntaram /
GSP27moksop_u:29710: kecid rājagṛhaṃ santo bhṛṅgāḥ padmotthitā iva //MU_6,1.35//
GSP27moksop_u:29715: sadanāni samāsādya śrotāras sarva eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:29716: sasnur ānarcur apy āśu devān viprān pitṝṃs tathā //MU_6,1.38//
GSP27moksop_u:29717: yathākramaṃ ca viprādyair bhṛtyāntaiś ca paricchadaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29728: vāsiṣṭham upadeśaṃ te cintayām āsur akṣatam //MU_6,1.44//
GSP27moksop_u:29732: abhajata viratiṃ tadā triyāmā malinaniśākaravaktratāṃ jagāma //MU_6,1.46//
GSP27moksop_u:29743: yayur vanditasandhyās te puṇyaṃ vāsiṣṭham āśramam //MU_6,2.4//
GSP27moksop_u:29751: dūram agre vinirgatya pūjayām āsa sādaram //MU_6,2.8//
GSP27moksop_u:29753: sabhāṃ praviśya te sarve viviśur viṣṭarādiṣu //MU_6,2.9//
GSP27moksop_u:29754: athaitasminn avasare hyastanās sarva eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:29767: prahlāda iva śukrasya suparṇa iva śārṅgiṇaḥ //MU_6,2.16//
GSP27moksop_u:29773: kaccit smarasi yat proktaṃ hyo mayā raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:29778: saṃsārāt tīryate tena teṣv evābhyāsam āhara //MU_6,2.21//
GSP27moksop_u:29782: ekaṃ brahmaiva hi jagat sthitaṃ dvitvam ivāgatam //MU_6,2.23//
GSP27moksop_u:29784: śāntaṃ samasamābhāsaṃ tatrānyat tat kathaṃ bhavet //MU_6,2.24//
GSP27moksop_u:29785: iti matvāham ity antar muktvā muktavapur mahān /
GSP27moksop_u:29787: nāsti cittaṃ na cāvidyā na mano na ca jīvakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29788: etāś ca kalanā rāma kṛtā brahmaṇa eva tāḥ //MU_6,2.26//
GSP27moksop_u:29789: yās sampado yāś ca dṛśo yāś cito yāś cideṣaṇāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29790: brahmaiva tad anādyantam abrahmeha na vidyate //MU_6,2.27//
GSP27moksop_u:29791: pātāle bhūtale svarge trinetrāntaṃ tṛṇādi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:29792: dṛśyate tat paraṃ brahma cidrūpaṃ nānyad asti hi //MU_6,2.28//
GSP27moksop_u:29793: upekṣyaṃ heyam ādeyaṃ bandhavo vibhavā vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29797: dehe yāvad ahambhāvo dṛśye 'smin yāvad ātmatā /
GSP27moksop_u:29798: yāvan mamedam ity āsthā tāvac cittādivibhramaḥ //MU_6,2.31//
GSP27moksop_u:29800: yāvan maurkhyaṃ na saṅkṣīṇaṃ tāvac cittādinimnatā //MU_6,2.32//
GSP27moksop_u:29812: dūrastham iva dehaṃ svam asantaṃ cittabhūḥ kutaḥ //MU_6,2.38//
GSP27moksop_u:29818: cittaṃ vigalitaṃ viddhi vahnau ghṛtalavaṃ yathā //MU_6,2.41//
GSP27moksop_u:29820: teṣāṃ yā cittapadavī sā sattvam iti kathyate //MU_6,2.42//
GSP27moksop_u:29822: na cittanāmnī bhavati sā hi sattvapadaṃ gatā //MU_6,2.43//
GSP27moksop_u:29823: niścetaso hi tattvajñā nityaṃ sattvapade sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29826: nityaṃ paśyanti cijjyotir na dvaitaikye na vāsanāḥ //MU_6,2.45//
GSP27moksop_u:29830: bhūyaḥ phalati no mohaṃ dagdhaṃ bījam ivāṅkuram //MU_6,2.47//
GSP27moksop_u:29834: cittaṃ jñānāgninā dagdhaṃ na te bhūyaḥ prarohati //MU_6,2.49//
GSP27moksop_u:29837: brahmabṛṃhaiva hi jagaj jagac ca brahmabṛṃhaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:29839: cidantar asti trijagan marice tiktatā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:29840: nātaś cijjagatī bhinne tasmāt sadasatī mudhā //MU_6,2.52//
GSP27moksop_u:29841: acinmayatvān nāsi tvaṃ khātmā kim iva rodiṣi /
GSP27moksop_u:29843: cinmayaś ced bhavān sarvaṃ tac cittvaṃ pravicāraya /
GSP27moksop_u:29846: rūpaṃ smara nijaṃ sphāraṃ māsmṛtyā sammito bhava //MU_6,2.55//
GSP27moksop_u:29847: tāṃ svasattāṃ gatas sarvam asarvaṃ vā bhavodayī /
GSP27moksop_u:29848: tādṛgrūpo 'si śānto 'si cid asi brahmarūpy asi //MU_6,2.56//
GSP27moksop_u:29849: cicchilodaram evāsi nāsi nānasy athom asi /
GSP27moksop_u:29850: yo 'si so 'si na so 'sīva sad asy asad asi svabhāḥ //MU_6,2.57//
GSP27moksop_u:29851: yaḥ padārthaviśeṣo 'ntar na tvaṃ nānyo na so 'sti te /
GSP27moksop_u:29852: tad asy atad asi svacchacidghanātman namo 'stu te //MU_6,2.58//
GSP27moksop_u:29859: yā cid vahaty anantāni jaganty anagha sā bhavān //MU_6,3.1//
GSP27moksop_u:29861: cidātman saṃsthitāḥ kveva vada te vāsanādayaḥ //MU_6,3.2//
GSP27moksop_u:29862: jīvo 'yaṃ vāsanādīdam iti cit kacati svataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29866: yathā na bhinnam analād auṣṇyaṃ saugandhyam ambujāt /
GSP27moksop_u:29867: kārṣṇyaṃ kajjalataś śauklyaṃ himān mādhuryam ikṣutaḥ //MU_6,3.5//
GSP27moksop_u:29868: ālokaś ca prakāśāṅgād anubhūtis tathā citeḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29869: jalād vīciś cidātman bhoś citsvabhāvāt tathā jagat //MU_6,3.6//
GSP27moksop_u:29870: cito na bhinno 'nubhavo bhinno nānubhavād aham /
GSP27moksop_u:29871: na matto bhidyate jīvo na jīvād bhidyate manaḥ //MU_6,3.7//
GSP27moksop_u:29872: manaso nendriyaṃ bhinnaṃ pṛthag dehaś ca nendriyāt /
GSP27moksop_u:29873: na śarīrāj jagad bhinnaṃ jagato nānyad asti hi //MU_6,3.8//
GSP27moksop_u:29874: evaṃ pravartitam iva mahācakram idaṃ ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:29875: na ca pravartitaṃ kiñcin na ca śīghraṃ ca no ciram //MU_6,3.9//
GSP27moksop_u:29878: śūnye śūnyaṃ samucchūnaṃ brahma brahmaṇi bṛṃhitam /
GSP27moksop_u:29879: satyaṃ vijṛmbhate satye pūrṇe pūrṇam avasthitam //MU_6,3.11//
GSP27moksop_u:29881: jñaḥ karoty anupādeyān upādeye hi kartṛtā //MU_6,3.12//
GSP27moksop_u:29882: yad upādeyabuddhyāttaṃ tad duḥkhāya sukhāya vā /
GSP27moksop_u:29884: yathā nānāpy anānaiva khaṃ khe vārīva vārgaṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29889: tam evākṛtrimaṃ mitraṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_6,3.16//
GSP27moksop_u:29891: yas sauhṛdaṃ matsaraṃ ca sa harṣāmarṣadoṣahā //MU_6,3.17//
GSP27moksop_u:29893: te tu santo 'py asadrūpās sevitā apy asevitāḥ //MU_6,3.18//
GSP27moksop_u:29894: yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo yasya buddhir na lipyate /
GSP27moksop_u:29895: hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate //MU_6,3.19//
GSP27moksop_u:29897: māyaiva sā parijñānād eva naśyaty asaṃśayam //MU_6,3.20//
GSP27moksop_u:29899: tena citraṃ kṛtaṃ naiva jitaṃ jñenāpi kāriṇā //MU_6,3.21//
GSP27moksop_u:29901: na duḥkhadāhāya sukhāya naiva sa mukta eveha sajīva eva //MU_6,3.22//
GSP27moksop_u:29906: acetyacinmayaṃ sarvaṃ kva te jīvādayas sthitāḥ //MU_6,4.1//
GSP27moksop_u:29908: viddhi tāṃ tvam anānātāṃ hemnaḥ kaṭakatām iva //MU_6,4.2//
GSP27moksop_u:29910: ajñānasaṅkṣaye jāte kva cetyaṃ cittakaṃ ca vā //MU_6,4.3//
GSP27moksop_u:29914: tadaiva naṣṭam ajñānam āndhyaṃ dhvāntakṣayād iva //MU_6,4.5//
GSP27moksop_u:29917: maurkhye kṣīṇe kṣataṃ viddhi cittaṃ rāma sabāndhavam /
GSP27moksop_u:29929: sāmānye 'pi laganty eva manye kulaguror giraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29930: atyudāramatau rāma na laganti kathaṃ tvayi //MU_6,4.13//
GSP27moksop_u:29932: tadvaco 'ntar viśaty uccais tapte kṣetre yathā payaḥ //MU_6,4.14//
GSP27moksop_u:29933: vayam iha hi mahānubhāva nityaṃ kulaguravo guravo raghūdvahānām /
GSP27moksop_u:29934: taduditam idam āśu kāryam ārya sphuṭavacanaṃ hṛdi hāravat tvayeti //MU_6,4.15//
GSP27moksop_u:29939: śāntaṃ jagajjālam idam agrastham api nātha me //MU_6,5.1//
GSP27moksop_u:29940: parām antaḥ prayāto 'smi svayam ātmani nirvṛtim /
GSP27moksop_u:29944: samyak prasannam akhilaṃ diṅmaṇḍalam idaṃ mune /
GSP27moksop_u:29951: lokārāmo 'smi rāmo 'smi namo mahyaṃ namo 'stu te //MU_6,5.7//
GSP27moksop_u:29952: te saṃśayās tāḥ kalanās sarvam astaṅgataṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:29955: matir nirvṛtim āyātā sārasī sarasīva me //MU_6,5.9//
GSP27moksop_u:29957: nūnaṃ nirmūlatāṃ yāto mamārkāgre yathā tamaḥ //MU_6,5.10//
GSP27moksop_u:29959: idam anyad idaṃ cānyad ity asatkalanāḥ kutaḥ //MU_6,5.11//
GSP27moksop_u:29962: ām idānīṃ smṛtaṃ samyaṅ mayaiṣa sa kilāsmy ajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29964: aho nu vitatāṃ bhūmim adhirūḍho 'smi pāvanīm /
GSP27moksop_u:29965: ihastha eva yatrārko naḥ pātālam ivāsthitaḥ //MU_6,5.14//
GSP27moksop_u:29968: anubhavavaśato hṛdabjakośe sphuṭam alitāṃ samupāgatena nātha /
GSP27moksop_u:29969: tava varavacaseha vītaśokāṃ ciram uditāṃ svadaśām upāgato 'smi //MU_6,5.16//
GSP27moksop_u:29973: bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29979: yasya jñātātmano jñasya satye svātmani saṃsthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29980: tuṣṭyeva cākṣasuhṛdo na ghnanti tam aninditam //MU_6,6.4//
GSP27moksop_u:29981: parārthaṃ sphurato yasya na stutir nindanād ṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:29982: sa dehī dehaduḥkhaugham ādatte kena hetunā //MU_6,6.5//
GSP27moksop_u:29986: nātmāstam eti bhagavān na codeti sadoditaḥ //MU_6,6.7//
GSP27moksop_u:29988: śarīrakopalasyāsya yad bhavaty astu tat tathā //MU_6,6.8//
GSP27moksop_u:29989: na cāsya kiñcid bhavati pṛthag ātmany avekṣite /
GSP27moksop_u:29991: nipuṇāyāvabodhāya yat proktaṃ tat punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:29994: nādatte tat kathaṃ tasmāj jaḍatāṃ śavarūpiṇaḥ //MU_6,6.11//
GSP27moksop_u:29996: nādatte tat kathaṃ caittaṃ cinmayatvaṃ sadoditam //MU_6,6.12//
GSP27moksop_u:29999: yau samau samakarmāṇau na kadācana tau katham /
GSP27moksop_u:30000: dvāv apy asantāv anyo'nyaṃ kathaṃ sambandham eṣyataḥ //MU_6,6.14//
GSP27moksop_u:30001: kathaṃ sthūlo 'ṇurūpas syād aṇus sthūlaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:30003: jñānaṃ nājñānatām eti cchāyā nāyāti tāpatām /
GSP27moksop_u:30004: sad brahma nāsad bhavati vicitrāsv api dṛṣṭiṣu //MU_6,6.16//
GSP27moksop_u:30005: manāg api na saṃśleṣas sarvagasyāpi dehinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30007: manāg api na saṃśleṣo brahmaṇo dehasattayā /
GSP27moksop_u:30009: bhavaty ātmani no kiñcin nāsato dehakasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30012: manāg api na santīha nirvāṇo nirvṛto bhava //MU_6,6.20//
GSP27moksop_u:30014: dṛśyate kevalaṃ brahmaṇy apsu vīcitayā yathā //MU_6,6.21//
GSP27moksop_u:30033: sarveṣām eva caiteṣāṃ sthitaivaiṣā cid avyayā /
GSP27moksop_u:30034: kiṃ tv abodhavaśād asyāḥ parāṃ kṛpaṇatāṃ gatāḥ //MU_6,6.31//
GSP27moksop_u:30039: phalalābho 'pi yo mūḍhāt tad araṇyataror iva /
GSP27moksop_u:30040: tasmin viśramaṇaṃ yat tac chilāphalahake yathā //MU_6,6.34//
GSP27moksop_u:30041: tena yas saṅgamas sa syāt sthāṇunāpi hi jaṅgale /
GSP27moksop_u:30042: tadarthaṃ yat kṛtaṃ kiñcit tad vyoma laguḍair hatam //MU_6,6.35//
GSP27moksop_u:30043: tasmin yad adhame dattaṃ tat tyaktaṃ klinnakardame /
GSP27moksop_u:30044: tena sārdhaṃ kathā yās tat kauleyāhvānam adhvare //MU_6,6.36//
GSP27moksop_u:30045: ajñatvam āpadāṃ niṣṭhā kā hi nāpad ajānataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30047: ajñasyogrāṇi duḥkhāni sukhāny api dṛḍhāni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30048: punaḥ punaḥ pravartante yugaṃ praty acalā iva //MU_6,6.38//
GSP27moksop_u:30050: idaṃ durduḥkham ajñasya na kadācana śāmyati //MU_6,6.39//
GSP27moksop_u:30054: avastuni sanetrasya luṭhataś ca pade pade //MU_6,6.41//
GSP27moksop_u:30055: viṣam utpadyate candrād āmodaḥ kusumād iva /
GSP27moksop_u:30056: kaṇṭakaś caiva payaso dūrvāṅkura iva sthalāt //MU_6,6.42//
GSP27moksop_u:30071: janmabālyaṃ dhruvaṃ yāti yauvanaṃ yuvatā jarām /
GSP27moksop_u:30072: jarā maraṇam abhyeti mūḍhasyaiva punaḥ punaḥ //MU_6,6.50//
GSP27moksop_u:30075: yad eva goṣpadādūraṃ jñadhiyaḥ pelavaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:30078: na prayānty aparaṃ pāraṃ vihaṅgyaḥ pañjarād iva //MU_6,6.53//
GSP27moksop_u:30087: yasmiṃs tiṣṭhanti rājante lasanti vilasanti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30089: yatra janmāni parvāṇi karmajālaṃ ca korakāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30102: ajñānaśākhina iti prasṛtāni rāma nānākṛtīni vipulāni phalāny amūni //MU_6,6.65//
GSP27moksop_u:30111: hṛdyās sumanaso bhānti hāsā iva manobhuvaḥ //MU_6,7.3//
GSP27moksop_u:30124: samupaiti matir duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca śataśākhatām /
GSP27moksop_u:30146: pūrvaṃ gṛhītvā karṇābhyāṃ sphurantam abhitaś ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:30191: jāyante ca mriyante ca ḍīyante ca jagatkhagāḥ //MU_6,7.43//
GSP27moksop_u:30224: kālāgādhasarasyāṃ tu sthitvā sthitvā punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30233: rudrāḥ kecana vidyante kasmiṃścit parame pure //MU_6,7.64//
GSP27moksop_u:30234: te 'pi yasya nimeṣeṇa bhavanti na bhavanti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:30235: tādṛśo 'py asti deveśo hy ananteyaṃ kriyāsthitiḥ //MU_6,7.65//
GSP27moksop_u:30237: na sambhavanti kā nāma śaktayaś citrayuktayaḥ //MU_6,7.66//
GSP27moksop_u:30240: yat sampado yad uta santatam āpadaś ca yad bālyayauvanajarāmaraṇopatāpāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30241: yan majjanaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhaparamparābhir ajñānatīvratimirasya vibhūtayas tāḥ //MU_6,7.68//
GSP27moksop_u:30246: kīdṛśī khalv avidyākhyā latā vikasitā tatā //MU_6,8.1//
GSP27moksop_u:30249: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo bhāvo jñānam ajñānam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30250: atraitāny uruvṛttāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca //MU_6,8.3//
GSP27moksop_u:30251: sukhād avidyodety uccais tad evānte prayacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:30252: duḥkhād avidyodety uccais tad evānte phalaty alam //MU_6,8.4//
GSP27moksop_u:30253: bhavād avidyodety eṣā tam eva phalati sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:30254: bhāvāt sattām avāpnoti tam eva phalati kṣaṇāt //MU_6,8.5//
GSP27moksop_u:30255: ajñānād vṛddhim āyāti tad evāsyāḥ phalaṃ smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:30256: jñānena yāti saṃvittiṃ tad evānte prayacchati //MU_6,8.6//
GSP27moksop_u:30268: vyomni vātavilolāni puṣpāṇy asyāḥ kilāṅga tāḥ //MU_6,8.12//
GSP27moksop_u:30272: aneneyaṃ hi gaurāṅgī strīvac cetāṃsi karṣati //MU_6,8.14//
GSP27moksop_u:30289: jātā ca jāyamānā ca mriyamāṇā tathā mṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:30290: anucchinnā tathā cchinnā nityam acchedinī tathā //MU_6,8.23//
GSP27moksop_u:30295: sphīteto galitetaś ca rūḍhetas saṃsthitānv itaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30296: ito jalam itaś śailā ito nāgās surā itaḥ //MU_6,8.26//
GSP27moksop_u:30297: itaḥ pṛthvītvam āyātā tatheto dyutayā sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:30299: itas tama itas teja itaḥ kham ita urvarā /
GSP27moksop_u:30300: itaś śāstram ito vedā ito dvayavivarjitā //MU_6,8.28//
GSP27moksop_u:30301: itaḥ puṇyam itaḥ pāpam itas sthāvaramūḍhatā /
GSP27moksop_u:30306: kvacit sthāṇutayā rūḍhā kvacit pavanatāṃ gatā //MU_6,8.31//
GSP27moksop_u:30308: kvacit surapadaṃ prāptā kvacit krimitayā sthitā //MU_6,8.32//
GSP27moksop_u:30309: kvacid viṣṇuḥ kvacid brahmā kvacid rudraḥ kvacid raviḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30310: kvacid agniḥ kvacid vāyuḥ kvacic candraḥ kvacid yamaḥ //MU_6,8.33//
GSP27moksop_u:30311: yat kiñcanāṅga bhuvaneṣu mahāmahimnā vyāptaṃ jarattṛṇalavatvam upāgataṃ vā /
GSP27moksop_u:30312: dṛśyaṃ sphurattanu harādy api tām avidyāṃ viddhi kṣayāya tadatītatayātmalābhaḥ //MU_6,8.34//
GSP27moksop_u:30317: avidyaivety ahaṃ śrutvā brahman bhramam ivāgataḥ //MU_6,9.1//
GSP27moksop_u:30320: tat sac cid api cābhāsam astīha kalanojjhitam //MU_6,9.2//
GSP27moksop_u:30323: sūkṣmā madhyā tathā sthūlā ceti sā kalpyate tridhā /
GSP27moksop_u:30324: paścān manastvaṃ yātena svenaiva vapuṣā punaḥ //MU_6,9.4//
GSP27moksop_u:30326: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti saiṣaiva prakṛtis sphuṭā //MU_6,9.5//
GSP27moksop_u:30328: eṣaiva saṃsṛtir jantor asyāḥ pāraṃ paraṃ padam //MU_6,9.6//
GSP27moksop_u:30329: atraite ye trayaḥ proktā guṇās te 'pi tridhā smṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30330: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti pratyekaṃ bhidyate guṇaḥ //MU_6,9.7//
GSP27moksop_u:30332: yāvat kiñcid idaṃ dṛśyam anayaiva tad āśritam //MU_6,9.8//
GSP27moksop_u:30333: ṛṣayo munayas siddhā nāgā vidyādharās surāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30334: iti bhāgam avidyāyās sāttvikaṃ viddhi rāghava //MU_6,9.9//
GSP27moksop_u:30336: rajas tu munayas sādhyās sattvaṃ devā harādayaḥ //MU_6,9.10//
GSP27moksop_u:30339: sāttvikaḥ prakṛter bhāgo rāma tajjño hi yo bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:30340: na pramuhyaty asau bhūyas tenāsau mukta ucyate //MU_6,9.12//
GSP27moksop_u:30341: tena rudrādayo hy ete sattvabhāgā mahāmate /
GSP27moksop_u:30345: bhāga eṣa tv avidyāyā eva vidyātvam āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30346: bījaṃ phalatvam āyāti phalam āyāti bījatām //MU_6,9.15//
GSP27moksop_u:30347: udety avidyā vidyāyās salilād iva budbudaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30353: nāvidyātvaṃ na vidyātvam iha kiñcana vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30354: vidyāvidyādṛśau tyaktvā yad astīha tad asti hi //MU_6,9.19//
GSP27moksop_u:30356: vidyāvidyādṛśau na staś śeṣe baddhapado bhava //MU_6,9.20//
GSP27moksop_u:30358: kiñcid asti nakiñcid yac citsaṃvid iti tat sthitam //MU_6,9.21//
GSP27moksop_u:30363: avidyāyāṃ tu līnāyāṃ kṣaṇād dve eva kalpane /
GSP27moksop_u:30366: yac chiṣṭaṃ tan nakiñcid vā kiñcid vāpīdam ātatam //MU_6,9.25//
GSP27moksop_u:30367: tatredaṃ dṛśyate sarvaṃ na ca kiñcana dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30370: nabhaso 'py adhikaṃ śūnyam avedyaṃ ca cidātmakam //MU_6,9.27//
GSP27moksop_u:30371: sūryakānte yathā vahnir yathā kṣīre ghṛtaṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:30373: yathā sphuliṅgā analād yathā bhāso divākarāt /
GSP27moksop_u:30374: tasmāt tathemā niryānti sphurantyas saṃvidas sthitāḥ //MU_6,9.29//
GSP27moksop_u:30376: kośo nityam anantānāṃ tathā tat saṃvidāṃ tviṣām //MU_6,9.30//
GSP27moksop_u:30380: akartur eva hi tathā kartṛtā tasya kalpyate //MU_6,9.32//
GSP27moksop_u:30383: tatra sthitaṃ jagad idaṃ jagadekabīje cinnāmni saṃvid iti kalpitakalpane ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30384: lolormijālam iva vāriṇi citsvarūpaṃ khād apy arūpavati yatra nakiñcid asti //MU_6,9.34//
GSP27moksop_u:30389: na kiñcid bhūtatāṃ yātaṃ yat kiñcid api viddhi he //MU_6,10.1//
GSP27moksop_u:30391: tad idaṃ rāma jīvādi sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ kim īhase //MU_6,10.2//
GSP27moksop_u:30392: subuddho 'yam asāv antar iti yo vyapadiśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30393: na taṃ labhāmahe sarpaṃ rajjusarpabhramād iva //MU_6,10.3//
GSP27moksop_u:30398: cittamātraṃ hi puruṣas tasmin naṣṭe na naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:30399: sthite tiṣṭhati nātmāyaṃ ghaṭe sati yathāmbaram //MU_6,10.6//
GSP27moksop_u:30400: gacchan paśyati gacchantaṃ sthitaṃ tiṣṭhañ śiśur yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:30401: bhānum evam idaṃ cetaḥ paśyaty ātmānam ākulam //MU_6,10.7//
GSP27moksop_u:30409: taṭasthaṃ rūpam āśritya sthitaiṣā sthāvareṣu cit //MU_6,10.10//
GSP27moksop_u:30417: sattāsāmānyabodho yas sa mokṣaś ced anantakaḥ //MU_6,10.13//
GSP27moksop_u:30421: sattāsāmānyaniṣṭhatvaṃ yat tad brahma paraṃ viduḥ //MU_6,10.15//
GSP27moksop_u:30422: antas suptā sthitā mandā yatra bīja ivāṅkuraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30423: vāsanā tat suṣuptatvaṃ viddhi janmapradaṃ punaḥ //MU_6,10.16//
GSP27moksop_u:30428: yathā bījeṣu puṣpāṇi mṛdo rāśau yathā ghaṭāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30430: yatrāsti vāsanābījaṃ tat suṣuptaṃ na siddhaye /
GSP27moksop_u:30431: nirbījā vāsanā yatra tat turyaṃ siddhidaṃ smṛtam //MU_6,10.20//
GSP27moksop_u:30435: sadeho vā videho vā na bhūyo duḥkhabhāg bhavet //MU_6,10.22//
GSP27moksop_u:30450: asyās tv adarśanaṃ yat tad avidyety ucyate budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30451: avidyā hi jagaddhetus tatas sarvaṃ pravartate //MU_6,10.30//
GSP27moksop_u:30453: tāvad eva galaty āśu tuhināṇur yathātape //MU_6,10.31//
GSP27moksop_u:30454: yathā naro galannidro yāvat kalanayā manāk /
GSP27moksop_u:30455: vimṛśaty āśayaṃ tāvan nidrā tasya vilīyate //MU_6,10.32//
GSP27moksop_u:30456: tathā kīdṛg avastv etad iti yāvad vikalpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30459: tadā galati tat sarvaṃ tamas tāpe ghṛtaṃ yathā //MU_6,10.34//
GSP27moksop_u:30460: na tu saṃlakṣyate dīpais tamaso rūpaniścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30464: āloka āgate yādṛg yad yat tad dṛśyate tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:30465: avastutve tv avidyāyās tv avastutvaṃ pratīyate //MU_6,10.37//
GSP27moksop_u:30466: yāvan nālokyate tāvan na kiñcid api dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30467: ālokyate yathā yad yat tat tathā pratipadyate //MU_6,10.38//
GSP27moksop_u:30468: raktamāṃsāsthiyantre 'smin kas syām aham iti svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:30469: yāvad vicāryate tāvat sarvam āśu pralīyate //MU_6,10.39//
GSP27moksop_u:30471: sarvasminn eva yaś śeṣas tam avidyākṣayaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,10.40//
GSP27moksop_u:30472: tan nakiñcic ca kiñcic ca yat sat tad brahma śāśvatam /
GSP27moksop_u:30473: tad vastu tad upādeyaṃ tad avidyānivartanam //MU_6,10.41//
GSP27moksop_u:30476: nāvidyā kvacid apy asti brahmaivedam akhaṇḍitam /
GSP27moksop_u:30478: etāvad evāvidyā yan nedaṃ brahmeti niścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30479: etad eva kṣayo yas syād idaṃ brahmeti niścayaḥ //MU_6,10.44//
GSP27moksop_u:30480: ghaṭapaṭaśakaṭāvabhāsajālaṃ na vibhur itīty uditeha sā tv avidyā /
GSP27moksop_u:30481: ghaṭapaṭaśakaṭāvabhāsajālaṃ vibhur iti ced galitaiva sā tv avidyā //MU_6,10.45//
GSP27moksop_u:30485: punaḥ punar idaṃ rāma prabodhārthaṃ mayocyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30493: prollaṅghyendriyajāś śaktīr yat sthitaṃ tat kathaṃ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:30496: na kadācana vijñānam iha vāmutra vānagha //MU_6,11.6//
GSP27moksop_u:30498: tāvad yāvan mithogharṣāt svayaṃ śāmyec chivaṃ bhavet //MU_6,11.7//
GSP27moksop_u:30499: na hy abhyāsaṃ vinā kiñcit phaladaṃ bhavati kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:30500: yad yad āsādyate yatra tad abhyāsataroḥ phalam //MU_6,11.8//
GSP27moksop_u:30508: jāgratas tiṣṭhato vāpi taj jñānaṃ tena satyatā //MU_6,11.12//
GSP27moksop_u:30510: yoniṣv avataraty urvyāṃ tat tajjñatvam udāhṛtam //MU_6,11.13//
GSP27moksop_u:30511: niścayo yas trinetrasya kāntayā saha tiṣṭhataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30512: brahmaṇo vāpy arāgasya sa te bhavatu rāghava //MU_6,11.14//
GSP27moksop_u:30513: yo niścayas suraguror vākpater bhārgavasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30516: pracetaso bhṛgoś caiva krator atreś śukasya ca //MU_6,11.16//
GSP27moksop_u:30518: yo niścayo 'ntarmuktānāṃ jīvatāṃ te bhavatv asau //MU_6,11.17//
GSP27moksop_u:30521: viśokās saṃsthitās taṃ me brahman prabrūhi tattvataḥ //MU_6,11.18//
GSP27moksop_u:30524: sphuṭaṃ śṛṇu yathāpṛṣṭam ayam eteṣu niścayaḥ //MU_6,11.19//
GSP27moksop_u:30525: yad idaṃ kiñcid ābhogi jagajjālaṃ pradṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30526: tat sarvam amalaṃ brahma bṛṃhayetthaṃ vyavasthitam //MU_6,11.20//
GSP27moksop_u:30527: brahma dig brahma bhuvanaṃ brahma bhūtaparamparā /
GSP27moksop_u:30529: brahma khānilatejāṃsi brahma bhūmir jalādi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:30530: brahma kālatrayaṃ tac ca brahmaṇy eva vyavasthitam //MU_6,11.22//
GSP27moksop_u:30533: gṛhyate brahmaṇā brahma bhujyate brahma brahmaṇā /
