GSP27moksop_u:30535: brahma macchatrurūpaṃ ced brahma me priyakṛd yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:30536: tad brahma brahmaṇi śliṣṭaṃ kim anyat kasya kiṃ kṛtaṃ //MU_6,11.25//
GSP27moksop_u:30541: brahma brahmaṇi saṃvettṛ brahma brahmaṇi saṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:30543: ghaṭo brahma paṭo brahma brahmāham idam ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:30548: sampannam etan ma iti mudhā syāt kalanā kutaḥ //MU_6,11.31//
GSP27moksop_u:30549: vīcyambhasos spandavator na stas tvanmanmatī yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:30550: tvattāmatte tathā na sto brahmaṇi spandarūpiṇi //MU_6,11.32//
GSP27moksop_u:30551: yathāvarte mṛte toye na kiñcin mriyate kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:30552: mṛte brahmatvam āyāte dehabrahmaṇi vai tathā //MU_6,11.33//
GSP27moksop_u:30553: yathā calācale toye tvattāmatte na tiṣṭhataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30554: tathā jaḍājaḍe rūpe na sthite paramātmani //MU_6,11.34//
GSP27moksop_u:30555: kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemno yathāvarto jalasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30557: idaṃ hi bhūtaṃ jīvātma jaḍarūpam idaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:30558: ity ajñātātmano moho na tu jñātātmanaḥ kvacit //MU_6,11.36//
GSP27moksop_u:30560: andhaṃ bhuvanam andhasya prakāśaṃ tu sacakṣuṣaḥ //MU_6,11.37//
GSP27moksop_u:30562: śiśor eva sphuradyakṣā niśā puṃsas tu kevalā //MU_6,11.38//
GSP27moksop_u:30563: asmin brahmaghane nityam ekasmin sarvatas sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:30564: na kiñcin mriyate rāma na ca kiñcana jīvati //MU_6,11.39//
GSP27moksop_u:30572: brahmaṇo vyatiriktaṃ hi na śarīrādi vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30574: yaḥ kaṇo yā ca kaṇikā yā vīcī yas taraṅgakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30575: yaḥ pheno yā ca laharī tad yathā vāri vāriṇi //MU_6,11.44//
GSP27moksop_u:30576: yo deho yā ca kalanā yad dṛśyaṃ yau kṣayāvyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:30577: yehā yā racanā yo 'rthas tat tathā brahma brahmaṇi //MU_6,11.45//
GSP27moksop_u:30582: ayaṃ so 'ham ayaṃ ca tvam ityādyarthotthayā girā /
GSP27moksop_u:30587: abhāvitaṃ hematayā yathā hemaiva mṛd bhavet //MU_6,11.50//
GSP27moksop_u:30588: jñātaṃ brahmatayā brahma brahmaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:30589: jñātaṃ hematayā hema hemaiva bhavati kṣaṇāt //MU_6,11.51//
GSP27moksop_u:30590: brahmātmā sarvaśaktir hi yad yathā bhāvayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:30591: nirhetukaṃ svayaṃ śaktyā tat tathāśu prapaśyati //MU_6,11.52//
GSP27moksop_u:30596: bandhur evāparijñāto hy abandhur iti kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30598: idaṃ tv ayuktam ity antar jñāte sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30599: tasmād ayuktād vairasyād yayā kila virajyate //MU_6,11.56//
GSP27moksop_u:30600: dvaitaṃ tv asatyam ity antar jñāte sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30601: tasmād dvaitāt suvairasyād yayā kila virajyate //MU_6,11.57//
GSP27moksop_u:30602: ayaṃ nāham iti jñāte sphuṭaṃ sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30604: brahmaivāham iti jñāte satyaṃ sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30605: tasmin satye nije rūpe yayāntaḥ parilīyate //MU_6,11.59//
GSP27moksop_u:30606: sarvam eveha brahmeti jñāte brahmaiva śiṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30607: pīte 'mṛte 'mṛtamayaḥ ko nāma na bhavet kila //MU_6,11.60//
GSP27moksop_u:30608: ceto yad evāharati tad evāśu bhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:30610: yan mithyā tan mudhaiveti jñāte sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30612: sarvaṃ sad eveti tate jñāte sodeti bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:30613: tasmin satye tate sphāre yayāntaḥ prāpyate sthitiḥ //MU_6,11.63//
GSP27moksop_u:30617: abandhuvat sthite 'py antas snihyaty eva balān manaḥ //MU_6,11.65//
GSP27moksop_u:30619: ātmātmany eva vimale nirvṛtiṃ vindate parāṃ //MU_6,11.66//
GSP27moksop_u:30621: bandhubhāvaṃ gate 'py antar mano yāti na nirvṛtim //MU_6,11.67//
GSP27moksop_u:30628: nitye satye tathābhūta ātmātmany eva hṛṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:30630: tāvad ātmātmanā yatnāt prakṣālyedaṃ malaṃ malaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30631: durbhāvanamalaś śāstraiś śodhyo yāvad bhavet sitaḥ //MU_6,11.72//
GSP27moksop_u:30634: sarvaṃ sakalanirmāṇaṃ kāleṣu triṣv api sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:30635: nityam ekaṃ samaṃ śuddhaṃ brahmaiveti suniścayaḥ //MU_6,11.74//
GSP27moksop_u:30638: na me duḥkhaṃ na karmāṇi na mamehā na vāñchitam /
GSP27moksop_u:30639: samas svastho viśoko 'smi brahmāham iti satyatā //MU_6,11.76//
GSP27moksop_u:30640: ahaṃ raktam ahaṃ māṃsam aham asthīny ahaṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30641: cid ahaṃ cetanaṃ cāhaṃ brahmāham iti satyatā //MU_6,11.77//
GSP27moksop_u:30642: ahaṃ tṛṇam ahaṃ vallī gulmo 'haṃ kānanāny aham /
GSP27moksop_u:30648: yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30649: so 'yaṃ cid aham ekātmā paraṃ brahmeti niścayaḥ //MU_6,11.81//
GSP27moksop_u:30650: cid ātmā brahma sat satyam ṛtaṃ jña iti nāmabhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30655: bhedaṃ tyaktvā svam ābhāsaṃ cidbrahmāham anāmayam //MU_6,11.84//
GSP27moksop_u:30657: tattvāvabhāsakaṃ svacchaṃ cidbrahmāsmi na me kṣayaḥ //MU_6,11.85//
GSP27moksop_u:30665: cittādiṣv apy abuddheṣu tac cidbrahmāham acyutaḥ //MU_6,11.89//
GSP27moksop_u:30669: yā khasthā tantuvac chaktis tac cidbrahmāsmi nirmalam //MU_6,11.91//
GSP27moksop_u:30673: yā pratītir anāgaskā tac cidbrahmāsmi sarvagaḥ //MU_6,11.93//
GSP27moksop_u:30675: śaktir udgamanī yāntas tac cidbrahmāham ātatam //MU_6,11.94//
GSP27moksop_u:30677: yāsvādasattā līnāntas tad brahma cid ahaṃ samam //MU_6,11.95//
GSP27moksop_u:30680: yāvad bhūmer dhruvas tāvad dṛṣṭisūtraṃ yad ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:30681: tanmadhyasadṛśaṃ śāntaṃ nirmalaṃ cid ahaṃ tatam //MU_6,11.97//
GSP27moksop_u:30686: sarvagā prakṛtau sūkṣmarūpā bhānor iva prabhā /
GSP27moksop_u:30690: protāṅgam api guptasthaṃ dehe tantur bise yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:30697: hemnīva saṃsthitā dehe cid brahmātmāsmi sarvagam //MU_6,11.105//
GSP27moksop_u:30698: padārthaughasya śailāder bahir antaś ca saṃsthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:30700: sarvāsām anubhūtīnām ādarśo yo hy akṛtrimaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30701: agamyo malalekhānāṃ tac cittattvam ahaṃ mahat //MU_6,11.107//
GSP27moksop_u:30706: ghaṭe paṭe taṭe kuḍye svadamānaṃ sadā tanau /
GSP27moksop_u:30708: uṣṇam agnau hime śītaṃ mṛṣṭam anne śitaṃ kṣure /
GSP27moksop_u:30709: kṛṣṇaṃ dhvānte sitaṃ candre cidātmānam upāsmahe //MU_6,11.111//
GSP27moksop_u:30716: niṣkautukaṃ nirālambaṃ nirīhaṃ sarvam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30722: līnam antar bahiś cograṃ kroḍīkṛtya jagatkhagam /
GSP27moksop_u:30724: sarvaṃ yatredam asty eva nāsty eva ca manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:30739: yuktaṃ muktaṃ ca ciddīpaṃ bahir antar upāsmahe //MU_6,11.126//
GSP27moksop_u:30748: akhilam idam ahaṃ mamaiva sarvaṃ tv aham api nāham athetarac ca nāham /
GSP27moksop_u:30749: iti viditavato jagat kṣataṃ me sthiram atha vāstu gatajvaro bhavāmi //MU_6,11.131//
GSP27moksop_u:30756: na nindanti na nandanti jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā //MU_6,12.2//
GSP27moksop_u:30777: manas teṣāṃ tu nīrāgam anupādhi gatabhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:30778: asaktam uttamaṃ śāntaṃ paraṃ sattvapadaṃ gatam //MU_6,12.13//
GSP27moksop_u:30779: na mamajja kvacid api saṅkaṭeṣu mahatsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:30780: muhur apy upayāteṣu kulaśailas sarassv iva //MU_6,12.14//
GSP27moksop_u:30784: jaharṣa ca na bhogaughair avaśyāyair ivauṣadhiḥ //MU_6,12.16//
GSP27moksop_u:30785: te hi kevalam avyagrāḥ kurvantaḥ kāryapañjaram /
GSP27moksop_u:30788: jahṛṣur na sukhaprāptau mamlur naiva ca saṅkaṭe //MU_6,12.18//
GSP27moksop_u:30789: mumuhur na vimoheṣu mamajjur na vipatkrame /
GSP27moksop_u:30790: śuśucur na śucā śoke rurudur na bhavān iva //MU_6,12.19//
GSP27moksop_u:30797: cinmātraṃ sarvam evedam ittham ābhāsatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:30798: neha satyam asatyaṃ vā kvacid apy asti kiñcana //MU_6,12.23//
GSP27moksop_u:30802: bhramasy udbhrāntacittaṃ ca somyāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā //MU_6,12.25//
GSP27moksop_u:30804: aho nu bhagavan nūnaṃ samyagrūpaṃ vilakṣaye /
GSP27moksop_u:30806: bhrāntir astaṅgatā nūnaṃ mihikā śaradīva me /
GSP27moksop_u:30808: vyapagatamadamoho mānamātsaryamuktaś cirataram uditātmā śāntaśokaś cireṇa /
GSP27moksop_u:30809: punar asukham agacchan svacchayaikāntabuddhyā vadasi yad asi sādho tat kariṣye viśaṅkam //MU_6,12.28//
GSP27moksop_u:30824: prakārau dvāv api proktau yogaśabdena yady api /
GSP27moksop_u:30825: tathāpi rūḍhim āyātaḥ prāṇayuktāv asau bhṛśam //MU_6,13.5//
GSP27moksop_u:30827: samāv upāyau dvāv eva proktāv ekaphalapradau //MU_6,13.6//
GSP27moksop_u:30829: mama tv abhimatas sādho susādho jñānajaḥ kramaḥ //MU_6,13.7//
GSP27moksop_u:30830: yaj jñātaṃ na tad ajñātaṃ svapneṣv api punar bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:30831: jñānaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu nityam eva pravartate //MU_6,13.8//
GSP27moksop_u:30833: nāyāti yogo hy atha vā vikalpo naiṣa śobhanaḥ //MU_6,13.9//
GSP27moksop_u:30834: dvāv eva kila yatnotthau jñānayogau raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:30838: mukhānilasphuraṇanirodhasambhave sthitiṃ gate nṛpasuta cetasaḥ kṣaye /
GSP27moksop_u:30839: samāhitasthitir iha yogayuktitaḥ pare pade vigalitabhīr nivatsyasi //MU_6,13.12//
GSP27moksop_u:30843: asti tāvad anantasya khasya kvacid ayaṃ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:30849: so 'haṃ kadācid āsthāne svarge tiṣṭhañ śatakratoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30852: śātātapo nāma munir maunī mānī mahāmatiḥ //MU_6,14.5//
GSP27moksop_u:30854: asti kalpataruś śrīmāñ śṛṅge cūḍa iti śrutaḥ //MU_6,14.6//
GSP27moksop_u:30857: tasmin nivasati śrīmān bhusuṇḍo nāma vāyasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30859: sa yathā jagataḥ kośe jīvatīha surāś ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:30860: cirajīvī tathā svarge na bhūto na bhaviṣyati //MU_6,14.9//
GSP27moksop_u:30861: sa dīrghāyus sa nīrogas sa śrīmān sa mahāmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30862: sa viśrāntamatiś śāntas sa kāntaḥ kālakovidaḥ //MU_6,14.10//
GSP27moksop_u:30863: sa yathā jīvati khagas tatheha yadi jīvyate /
GSP27moksop_u:30864: tad bhavej jīvitaṃ puṃsāṃ dīrghaṃ cādeyam eva ca //MU_6,14.11//
GSP27moksop_u:30869: bhusuṇḍas saṃsthito yatra meroś śṛṅgaṃ tad unnatam /
GSP27moksop_u:30875: sarveṣām eva rāgāṇāṃ rāśim adrāv iva sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:30880: līlayādātum induṃ khe nītaṃ hastaṃ śikhāṅgulim //MU_6,14.19//
GSP27moksop_u:30882: khaṃ gantum iva saspandaṃ śailastham iva vāḍavam //MU_6,14.20//
GSP27moksop_u:30898: vyomnaḥ pāram iva prāptaṃ piṅgalaṃ mairavaṃ śiraḥ //MU_6,14.28//
GSP27moksop_u:30905: kalpāgam aham adrākṣaṃ śikhācakram iva sthitam //MU_6,15.1//
GSP27moksop_u:30952: tatra paśyāmy ahaṃ yāvad ekatra skandhakoṭare /
GSP27moksop_u:30958: teṣāṃ madhye sthitaś śrīmān bhusuṇḍaḥ pronnatākṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30970: suhṛd dāntas tathā mitraṃ bhṛtyaḥ putro guruḥ prabhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30971: sarvadā sarvathā nityaṃ sarvaṃ sarvasya saṃstave //MU_6,15.34//
GSP27moksop_u:30972: somyaḥ prasannamadhuro rasavān mahātmā hṛdyas sarovara ivāntar akhaṇḍaśaityaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:30982: bhusuṇḍas tu vasiṣṭho 'yaṃ prāpta ity avabuddhavān //MU_6,16.3//
GSP27moksop_u:30984: he mune svāgatam iti provāca madhurākṣaram //MU_6,16.4//
GSP27moksop_u:30986: mahyam āśu dadau bālamegho haimam ivotkaram //MU_6,16.5//
GSP27moksop_u:30987: idam āsanam ity uktvā navaṃ kalpatarucchadam /
GSP27moksop_u:30993: atha pādyādi dattvā sa bhusuṇḍas tuṣṭamānasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31000: kaccid asmin mahāmohe ciraṃ viharatas tava /
GSP27moksop_u:31004: tvatpādadarśanād eva sarvaṃ jñātaṃ mayā mune /
GSP27moksop_u:31007: tenemaṃ pādapaṃ pādais tvaṃ pavitritavān ayam //MU_6,16.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31008: jñātatvadāgamo 'py evaṃ tvāṃ pṛcchāmīha yan mune /
GSP27moksop_u:31010: ity uktavān asau pakṣī bhusuṇḍaś cirajīvitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31014: draṣṭum abhyāgato 'smy adya tvām eva cirajīvitam //MU_6,16.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31017: tad etaṃ saṃśayaṃ chinddhi bhagavan mama tattvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31018: kasmin kule bhavāñ jāto jñātajñeyaḥ kathaṃ bhavān //MU_6,16.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31019: kiyad āyuś ca te sādho vṛttaṃ smarasi kiṃ ca vā /
GSP27moksop_u:31020: kena vāyaṃ nivāsas te nirdiṣṭo dīrghadarśinā //MU_6,16.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31022: yat pṛcchasi mune sarvaṃ tad idaṃ kathayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:31024: yuṣmadvidhās tribhuvanaprabhupūjyarūpā ākarṇayanti yad udāradhiyo mahāntaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31025: tenāśubhaṃ prakathitena vināśam eti meghasya dehavibhavena yathārkatāpaḥ //MU_6,16.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31029: atha rāma bhusuṇḍo 'sau na prahṛṣṭo na jihmadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31040: svayam iva navam āsthitaś śarīraṃ sakalabhayāpaharaḥ paraḥ prakarṣaḥ //MU_6,17.6//
GSP27moksop_u:31041: idam amalagirāha hāsaśuddhaṃ mṛdupadam ujjhitasambhramaṃ krameṇa /
GSP27moksop_u:31042: kathayitum akhilaṃ nijaṃ svarūpaṃ madhura iva stanitena mugdhameghaḥ //MU_6,17.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31059: yasyāsthīny eva ratnāni dehe kāntimayāni ca //MU_6,18.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31073: svajanā yasya te śailās sarasā api nīrasāḥ //MU_6,18.14//
GSP27moksop_u:31077: yathā gaṇās tathaivānyaḥ parivāro hi mātaraḥ //MU_6,18.16//
GSP27moksop_u:31084: jayā ca vijayā caiva jayantī cāparājitā /
GSP27moksop_u:31086: siddhā śuṣkā ca raktā ca utpalā ceti devatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31087: sroto dakṣiṇam āśritya bhairavaṃ rudram āśritāḥ //MU_6,18.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31088: sarvāsām eva mātṝṇām aṣṭāv etās tu nāyikāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31089: āsām anugatās tv anyā devyaś śatasahasraśaḥ //MU_6,18.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31090: raudrī ca vaiṣṇavī brāhmī vārāhī vāyavī tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:31091: kaumārī vāsavī saurī cetyādyās tās sahasraśaḥ //MU_6,18.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31092: āsām anugatās tv anyā devyaḥ khecarya uttamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31094: tāsām anugatās tv anyā bhūcaryaḥ koṭiśas sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31103: tasyās tu vāhanaṃ kāko vaiṣṇavyā garuḍo yathā //MU_6,18.29//
GSP27moksop_u:31105: vyomni melāpakaṃ cakrur ekadā samam āgatāḥ //MU_6,18.30//
GSP27moksop_u:31109: asmān umāpatir devaḥ kiṃ paśyaty avahelayā //MU_6,18.32//
GSP27moksop_u:31110: prabhāvaṃ darśayāmo 'sya punar nāsmān asau yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:31113: umām eva vaśīkṛtya prokṣayām āsur ādṛtāḥ //MU_6,18.34//
GSP27moksop_u:31115: tām ālolakacāṃ devyaś cakrur odanatāṃ gatām //MU_6,18.35//
GSP27moksop_u:31126: papur udagur athoccais terur ājagmur ūṣur jahasur apur ahauṣuḥ petur uccair vavalguḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31127: nanṛtur aniśam ādus svādumāṃsaṃ ca devyas tribhuvanam apavṛttaṃ cakrur unmattanṛttāḥ //MU_6,18.41//
GSP27moksop_u:31131: ity utsave vartamāne tāsāṃ vāhās ta uttamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31132: tathaiva mattā jahasur nanṛtuḥ papur apy asṛk //MU_6,19.1//
GSP27moksop_u:31137: sañjātaratayo mattās sarvā haṃsyaḥ krameṇa tāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31138: remire tena kākena caṇḍakākhyena vai tadā //MU_6,19.4//
GSP27moksop_u:31139: saptānāṃ bālahaṃsīnāṃ dayito vāyasas tv asau /
GSP27moksop_u:31142: devyaś ca kṛtanṛttās tāḥ praśāntamadatāṃ yayuḥ //MU_6,19.6//
GSP27moksop_u:31143: dadur odanatāṃ yātām īśvarāya priyām umām /
GSP27moksop_u:31145: priyā me bhojane dattety evaṃ ca śaśiśekharaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31146: buddhvā babhūva ruṣito yadā mātṛgaṇaṃ prati //MU_6,19.8//
GSP27moksop_u:31147: tadā tās tāṃ samutpādya svāṅgadānena vai punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31149: tato devyo haraś caiva parivāras tathaitayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31150: sarve santuṣṭamanasas svāṃ svām upayayur diśam //MU_6,19.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31151: antarvatnyo babhūvus tā brāhmyo haṃsyo munīśvara /
GSP27moksop_u:31152: vṛttāntaṃ kathayām āsur brāhmyā devyā yathāsthitam //MU_6,19.11//
GSP27moksop_u:31153: he vatsās sāmprataṃ garbhavatyo me rathakarmaṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:31154: na samarthā bhavatyo 'pi svairaṃ carata sāmpratam //MU_6,19.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31155: iti garbhālasā haṃsīr muktvā devī dayāparā /
GSP27moksop_u:31160: suvate sma mṛdūny aṇḍāny atha vallya ivāṅkurān //MU_6,19.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31163: aṇḍebhyas tebhya evaṃ hi jātā vayam ime mune /
GSP27moksop_u:31165: te sma jātā gatā vṛddhiṃ tasmin kamalapallave /
GSP27moksop_u:31167: mātṛbhis saha haṃsībhir brāhmī bhagavatī tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31170: tathāṅgānugṛhītās smo yathā muktā vayaṃ sthitāḥ //MU_6,19.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31172: tiṣṭhāma iti niścitya pituḥ pārśvaṃ vayaṃ gatāḥ //MU_6,19.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31174: tayā dṛṣṭāḥ prasādena saṃsthitās tatra saṃyatāḥ //MU_6,19.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31178: no ced vayaṃ bhagavatīṃ tad imāṃ bhṛtyavatsalām /
GSP27moksop_u:31181: tāta jñātam alaṃ jñeyaṃ brāhmyā devyāḥ prasādataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31182: kiṃ tv ekāntasthites sthānam abhivāñchāma uttamam //MU_6,19.25//
GSP27moksop_u:31184: śṛṇuta vigatadoṣaṃ pāvanaṃ sthānam agryaṃ sthirataram ayi putrā nīḍakāmāḥ pravakṣye /
GSP27moksop_u:31185: vyapagatabhayamohaṃ śāntasarvapracāraṃ nivasata ciratṛptā yatra niśśaṅkam uccaiḥ //MU_6,19.26//
GSP27moksop_u:31213: tatra nīḍaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ kṛtam āsīt sphuranmaṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:31214: devyāṃ dhyānaniṣaṇṇāyāṃ yasmin kila rame sutāḥ //MU_6,20.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31219: tad gacchata sutā nīḍaṃ durgaṃ nākasadām api /
GSP27moksop_u:31220: bhogaṃ mokṣaṃ ca tatrasthā nirvighnaṃ samavāpsyatha //MU_6,20.16//
GSP27moksop_u:31221: ity uktvāsmān pitā tatra cucumbābhyāliliṅga ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31222: dadau devyai yad ānītam asmabhyaṃ ca tad āmiṣam //MU_6,20.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31223: tad bhuktvā caraṇau devyāḥ pituś caivābhivandya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31224: vindhyakacchād vayaṃ tasmāt sthānād ālambusāt plutāḥ //MU_6,20.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31228: svargam ullaṅghya yātās smo brahmalokaṃ munīśvara //MU_6,20.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31230: mātre ca bhagavatyai ca brāhmyai cāśu nivedya ha //MU_6,20.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31235: imaṃ kalpataruṃ prāpya nijaṃ nīḍaṃ praviśya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31237: jātā yathā vayam ime sthitim āgatāś ca samprāptabodham upaśāntadhiyo yathā ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31238: etat tad uktam avikhaṇḍam alaṃ mayā te śeṣeṇa māṃ samanuśādhi mahānubhāva //MU_6,20.25//
GSP27moksop_u:31244: tad etad vṛttam abhyāsād vartamānena varṇitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31247: nirvighnam evaṃ paśyāmi yad bhavantaṃ mune tataḥ //MU_6,21.3//
GSP27moksop_u:31248: idaṃ nīḍam imāś śākhā ayaṃ cāham ayaṃ drumaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31249: adya pāvanatāṃ prāptāny etāni tava darśanāt //MU_6,21.4//
GSP27moksop_u:31250: idam arghyam idaṃ pādyaṃ gṛhītvā vibhavārpitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31251: nūnaṃ pāvanatāṃ nītvā śeṣeṇādiśa māṃ mune //MU_6,21.5//
GSP27moksop_u:31253: ity uktvārghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca bhūyo dattavati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:31256: iha kasmān na dṛśyante tvam evaiko hi dṛśyase //MU_6,21.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31258: tiṣṭhatām iha naḥ kālo mahān atigato mune /
GSP27moksop_u:31260: etāvatā ca kālena sarva eva mamānujāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31261: tanūs tṛṇam iva tyaktvā śive pariṇatāḥ pare //MU_6,21.9//
GSP27moksop_u:31268: ciram atyantam āsannaiḥ kathaṃ tāta na khidyase //MU_6,21.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31270: āsannataratāṃ yātaiḥ kaccit tāta na khidyase //MU_6,21.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31274: kathaṃ na kṣobham āyāti kalpavṛkṣo 'yam unnataḥ //MU_6,21.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31278: yad īdṛśeṣu dūreṣu nirjaneṣu vaneṣu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31279: kalpitāsyās sthitir dhātrā śūnye vā vyomadhanvani //MU_6,21.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31280: katham asyāṃ prabho jātau jātasya kila jīvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31283: na kadācana nīrūpair muhyāmo jāgatair bhramaiḥ //MU_6,21.19//
GSP27moksop_u:31285: kṣipāmaḥ kevalaṃ kālam asmin brahman nijālaye //MU_6,21.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31286: na jīvitān na maraṇāt kurmo dehasya rodhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:31289: nūnaṃ santyaktam asmākaṃ manasā cañcalaṃ vapuḥ //MU_6,21.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31297: nirastacāpalaṃ śāntaṃ jātam eva mune manaḥ //MU_6,21.26//
GSP27moksop_u:31299: udgālair iva bhūkāko na vaivaśyaṃ vrajāmy aham //MU_6,21.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31301: paśyanto jāgatīṃ māyāṃ dhiyā dhairyam upāgatāḥ //MU_6,21.28//
GSP27moksop_u:31305: bhūyo bhūyaḥ parāmṛṣṭā neha kiñcana sanmayam //MU_6,21.30//
GSP27moksop_u:31306: sarvāṇy eva prayānty eva samāyānti ca vā na vā /
GSP27moksop_u:31307: bhagavan bhūtajālāni bhayam asmākam atra kim //MU_6,21.31//
GSP27moksop_u:31310: nojjhāmo na ca gṛhṇīmas tiṣṭhāmo naiva ca sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31311: mṛdavo 'pi bhṛśaṃ krūrā vayam asmin drume sthitāḥ //MU_6,21.33//
GSP27moksop_u:31314: netaś cetaś ca paryastaṃ lulitaṃ na ca vṛttiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:31324: nātaḥ parataraṃ kiñcin manye kuśalam ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31331: mama saphalam ihādya janma sādho sakalabhayāpaharo hi sādhusaṅgaḥ //MU_6,21.43//
GSP27moksop_u:31338: bhūtānāṃ tena tiṣṭhāmas sukham asmin vanaspatau //MU_6,22.2//
GSP27moksop_u:31340: yadā jahāra tarasā nākampata tadā drumaḥ //MU_6,22.3//
GSP27moksop_u:31348: āsīj jagad atikṣubdhaṃ tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31354: yadā vavuḥ patatsiddhās tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31356: yayau garutmān amṛtaṃ tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.11//
GSP27moksop_u:31358: śeṣaḥ phaṇābhis tatyāja tadā nākampata drumaḥ //MU_6,22.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31366: kṛtaghna iva sanmitraṃ tadā nīḍaṃ tyajāmy aham //MU_6,22.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31370: vāruṇīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā tadā tiṣṭhāmi dhīradhīḥ //MU_6,22.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31372: pārvatīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā khe tiṣṭhāmy acalas tadā //MU_6,22.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31374: vāyavīṃ dhāraṇāṃ baddhvā khaṃ plave 'caladhīs tadā //MU_6,22.19//
GSP27moksop_u:31381: kalpānteṣu tathā kasmān nānye tiṣṭhanti yoginaḥ //MU_6,22.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31383: brahman niyatir eṣā hi durlaṅghyā pārameśvarī /
GSP27moksop_u:31384: mayedṛśena vai bhāvyaṃ bhāvyam anyais tu tādṛśaiḥ //MU_6,22.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31386: yad yathā tat tathaitad dhi svabhāvasyaiṣa niścayaḥ //MU_6,22.24//
GSP27moksop_u:31388: asminn eva gireś śṛṅge tarur itthaṃ bhavaty ayam //MU_6,22.25//
GSP27moksop_u:31393: kiṃ kiṃ smarasi kalyāṇiṃś citram asmiñ jagattraye //MU_6,22.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31411: evaṃ caturyugaṃ sāgraṃ nīrandhrair acalair yutām /
GSP27moksop_u:31421: etāṃś cānyāṃś ca vṛttāntān saṃsmarāmi bahūn api /
GSP27moksop_u:31422: kiṃ tena bahunoktena sāraṃ saṅkṣepataś śṛṇu //MU_6,22.41//
GSP27moksop_u:31423: asaṅkhyātān manūn brahman smarāmi śataśo gatān /
GSP27moksop_u:31428: bahunāthasatīkaṃ ca kañcit sargaṃ smarāmy aham //MU_6,22.44//
GSP27moksop_u:31442: kalpanaṃ pārthivānāṃ ca vedānayanam eva ca //MU_6,22.51//
GSP27moksop_u:31446: bālair api hi tās tāta smaryante tāsu kiṃ grahaḥ //MU_6,22.53//
GSP27moksop_u:31466: mune te brahmaputrasya janmāṣṭamam idaṃ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:31467: saṃsmarāmy aṣṭame sarge tv asmiṃs tvaṃ mama saṅgataḥ //MU_6,23.8//
GSP27moksop_u:31468: kadācij jāyase vyomnaḥ kadācij jāyase jalāt /
GSP27moksop_u:31471: sargo 'yaṃ tādṛśān eva trīn sargān saṃsmarāmy aham //MU_6,23.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31475: mune pañcasu sargeṣu kūrmā iva payonidheḥ //MU_6,23.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31480: reṇukātmajatāṃ gatvā ṣaṣṭhaṃ vāram imaṃ hariḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31485: daśa śukravighātāṃś ca candramaules smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31488: yugaṃ prati dhiyāṃ puṃsām ūnādhikatayā mune /
GSP27moksop_u:31492: punas tān eva tān evam anyān api yuge yuge /
GSP27moksop_u:31497: iti yatra dhiyā jñānaṃ haste phalam ivārpitam //MU_6,23.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31498: kṛtaṃ vālmīkinā caitad adhunā ca kariṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:31499: adya tv aprakaṭaṃ loke sthitaṃ jñāsyati kālataḥ //MU_6,23.24//
GSP27moksop_u:31501: etat tad dvādaśaṃ vāraṃ kriyate vismṛtiṃ gatam //MU_6,23.25//
GSP27moksop_u:31502: dvitīyam etasya samaṃ bhārataṃ nāma nāmataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31505: etat tu saptamaṃ vāraṃ kriyate vismṛtiṃ gatam //MU_6,23.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31508: punas tāny eva tāny eva tathānyāni yuge yuge /
GSP27moksop_u:31516: jagattrayībhrāntir iyaṃ na kadācin na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:31517: vidyate na kadācic ca jalabudbudavat sthitā //MU_6,23.33//
GSP27moksop_u:31519: jāyate līyate cāśu lolā vīcir ivāmbhasi //MU_6,23.34//
GSP27moksop_u:31526: mamānyāni ca mitrāṇi te 'nya eva ca bandhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31527: anya eva navā bhṛtyā anya eva samāśrayāḥ //MU_6,23.38//
GSP27moksop_u:31533: vanaṃ vṛkṣaṃ ca śākhāṃ ca prāpya nīḍaṃ karomy aham //MU_6,23.41//
GSP27moksop_u:31536: tāte jīvati yaivābhūc chobhāsya sutaros tayā /
GSP27moksop_u:31538: nehābhūd uttarā pūrvaṃ kakum nāyaṃ ca bhūdharaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31541: dhyānānte khastha evaitat sargam ālokya vedmy aham //MU_6,23.45//
GSP27moksop_u:31543: saṃsthānam anyathā tasmin sthite yānti diśo 'nyathā //MU_6,23.46//
GSP27moksop_u:31544: na san nāsaj jagan manye bhramo 'yaṃ kevalaṃ dhiyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31546: putraḥ pitṛtvam āyāto mitrāṇi tv aritāṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:31547: strītvaṃ ca śataśo yātān puṃsaś caiva smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.48//
GSP27moksop_u:31551: sargān nirargalācārān kvacit kāṃścit smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.50//
GSP27moksop_u:31553: caturyugasahasre dve jagac chūnyaṃ smarāmy aham //MU_6,23.51//
GSP27moksop_u:31562: kathaṃ vihagarājendra dehaṃ mṛtyur na bādhate //MU_6,24.2//
GSP27moksop_u:31564: jānann api hi sarvajña brahmañ jijñāsayaiva mām /
GSP27moksop_u:31565: pṛcchasi prabhavo nityaṃ bhṛtyaṃ vācālayanti hi //MU_6,24.3//
GSP27moksop_u:31566: tathāpi yat pṛcchasi māṃ tat te prakathayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:31569: hṛdi na grathitā yasya mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.5//
GSP27moksop_u:31571: ādhayo yaṃ na bhindanti mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.6//
GSP27moksop_u:31573: na cañcalaṃ mano yasya taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31575: āśā yaṃ na dahanty antas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.8//
GSP27moksop_u:31577: lobhavyālo na bhuṅkte yaṃ mṛtyus taṃ na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.9//
GSP27moksop_u:31579: na nirdahati yaṃ kopas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31580: yantraṃ tilānāṃ kaṭhinaṃ rāśim ugram ivākulam /
GSP27moksop_u:31581: yaṃ pīḍayati nānaṅgas taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.11//
GSP27moksop_u:31583: saṃśritā dṛḍhaviśrāntis taṃ mṛtyur na jighāṃsati //MU_6,24.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31585: manāg api na lumpanti cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31588: na dādati na cādatte na jahāti na yācate /
GSP27moksop_u:31589: kurvad eva ca kāryāṇi cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31590: nāstam eti na codeti nasaṃsmṛti navismṛti /
GSP27moksop_u:31591: na suptaṃ na ca jāgratsthaṃ cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.16//
GSP27moksop_u:31595: duṣkramās te na kṛntanti cittam ekasamāhitam //MU_6,24.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31602: ādau madhye tathānte ca cirāya pari coditam /
GSP27moksop_u:31603: yac cāru madhuraṃ pathyaṃ tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ //MU_6,24.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31605: guṇānubandhi lokyaṃ ca tatparaṃ kārayen manaḥ //MU_6,24.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31606: peśalaṃ madhuraṃ hṛdyaṃ svādu śītam apakṣayam /
GSP27moksop_u:31608: yad buddheḥ param ālokyam ādyaṃ yad amṛtaṃ param /
GSP27moksop_u:31611: sasurastrīgaṇe svarge na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham //MU_6,24.26//
GSP27moksop_u:31613: sāmbudhau bhūtale tāta na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31615: samasta eva pātāle na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.28//
GSP27moksop_u:31617: jagaty asmiṃs tu sarvasmin na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.29//
GSP27moksop_u:31619: saraktamāṃse dehe 'smin na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.30//
GSP27moksop_u:31621: kriyāsu nityatucchāsu na kiñcic chobhanaṃ sthiram //MU_6,24.31//
GSP27moksop_u:31623: cintāsu jīvakārāsu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham //MU_6,24.32//
GSP27moksop_u:31627: citrācārāsu ceṣṭāsu na kiñcit susthiraṃ śubham //MU_6,24.34//
GSP27moksop_u:31628: na varam ekamahītalarājatā na ca varaṃ vividhāmararūpatā /
GSP27moksop_u:31629: na ca varaṃ dharaṇītalanāgatā sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ //MU_6,24.35//
GSP27moksop_u:31630: na varam ākulaśāstravicāraṇaṃ na ca varaṃ varakāvyavivecanam /
GSP27moksop_u:31631: na varam agryakathākramacarvaṇaṃ sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ //MU_6,24.36//
GSP27moksop_u:31632: na varam ādhimayaṃ cirajīvitaṃ na ca varaṃ maraṇaṃ dṛḍhamūḍhatā /
GSP27moksop_u:31633: na ca varaṃ narako na ca viṣṭapaṃ sthitim upaiti hi yatra satāṃ manaḥ //MU_6,24.37//
GSP27moksop_u:31634: iti vividhajagatkramās samastāś calamatimūḍhatayā narasya rūḍhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31635: calatarakalanāhite padārthe katham upayānti ciraṃ sthitiṃ mahāntaḥ //MU_6,24.38//
GSP27moksop_u:31657: ity uktavantaṃ vihagaṃ bhusuṇḍaṃ punar apy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:31658: jānann apīdam avyagraḥ pṛṣṭavān krīḍayā punaḥ //MU_6,25.9//
GSP27moksop_u:31660: yathārthaṃ brūhi me sādho prāṇacintā kim ucyate //MU_6,25.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31663: mām etat parihāsārthaṃ mune pṛcchasi vāyasam //MU_6,25.11//
GSP27moksop_u:31664: atha vā bhavatām eva bhavadbhyaḥ pariśikṣitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31665: punaḥ pratyuccarāmīdaṃ kā me kṣatir upasthitā //MU_6,25.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31685: tasya yantrasya pattrāṇi mṛdūny āttāni vāyunā //MU_6,25.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31686: lasatsu teṣu pattreṣu sa marut parivardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:31689: ūrdhvādho dikṣu cānyāsu dehe 'smin prasaraty atha //MU_6,25.24//
GSP27moksop_u:31694: yānty āyānti vivalganti haranti viharanti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31695: utpatanti patanty āśu tā etāḥ prāṇaśaktayaḥ //MU_6,25.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31696: sa eṣa hṛtpadmagataḥ prāṇa ity ucyate budhaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31697: asya kācin mune śaktiḥ praspandayati locane //MU_6,25.28//
GSP27moksop_u:31698: kācit sparśam upādatte kācid vahati nāsayā /
GSP27moksop_u:31699: kācid annaṃ jarayati kācid vakti vacāṃsi ca //MU_6,25.29//
GSP27moksop_u:31700: bahunātra kim uktena sarvam eva śarīrake /
GSP27moksop_u:31701: karoti bhagavān vāyur yantrehām iva yāntrikaḥ //MU_6,25.30//
GSP27moksop_u:31703: prāṇāpānāv iti khyātau prakaṭau tau varānilau //MU_6,25.31//
GSP27moksop_u:31704: tayor anusaran nityaṃ mune gatim ahaṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31715: durlakṣyā vidyamānā ca gatis sūkṣmatarā tayoḥ //MU_6,25.37//
GSP27moksop_u:31716: aviratagatayor gatiṃ viditvā hṛdi marutor anusṛtya coditāṃ tām /
GSP27moksop_u:31717: na punar iha hi jāyate mahātman muditamanāḥ puruṣaḥ praṇaṣṭapāśaḥ //MU_6,25.38//
GSP27moksop_u:31721: jānann api mune sarvaṃ kiṃ māṃ pṛcchasi līlayā /
GSP27moksop_u:31722: yathāpṛṣṭam ahaṃ vacmi tatrāpi śṛṇu me vacaḥ //MU_6,26.1//
GSP27moksop_u:31726: sabāhyābhyantare dehe tv apāno 'yam avāk sthitaḥ //MU_6,26.3//
GSP27moksop_u:31728: pravartate yas tajjñasya taṃ tāvac chreyase śṛṇu //MU_6,26.4//
GSP27moksop_u:31730: svairam evāttayatnānāṃ taṃ dhīrā recakaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.5//
GSP27moksop_u:31732: prāṇānām aṅgasaṃsparśo yas sa pūraka ucyate //MU_6,26.6//
GSP27moksop_u:31734: yo 'ṅgaprapūraṇe sparśo vidus tam api pūrakam //MU_6,26.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31737: pūrakaḥ kumbhakaś caiva recakaś ca dvidhā sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31740: ye proktās sphāramatibhis tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇu mahāmate //MU_6,26.10//
GSP27moksop_u:31744: vyomni nityam apānasya taṃ viduḥ kumbhakaṃ budhāḥ //MU_6,26.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31746: taṃ bāhyapūrakaṃ tv ādyaṃ vidur yogavido janāḥ //MU_6,26.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31748: yā vāyos taṃ vidur dhīrā aparaṃ bāhyapūrakam //MU_6,26.14//
GSP27moksop_u:31750: tāvat pūrṇāṃ samāvasthāṃ bahissthaṃ kumbhakaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31754: apānasya bahis tat tam aparaṃ recakaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31756: prāṇāpānasvabhāvān svān buddhvā bhūyo na jāyate //MU_6,26.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31758: svabhāvād eva vāyūnāṃ kathitā muktidā mayā //MU_6,26.19//
GSP27moksop_u:31759: gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato 'pi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:31760: ete na rodham āyānti prakṛtyā hi calo 'nilaḥ //MU_6,26.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31761: yat karoti yad aśnāti buddhyaitān samanusmaran /
GSP27moksop_u:31762: kumbhakādīn naras so 'ntas tatra kartā na kiñcana //MU_6,26.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31763: suvyagram asmin vyāpāre bāhyaṃ parijahan manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31764: dinaiḥ katipayair eva padam āpnoti kevalam //MU_6,26.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31766: na badhnāti ratiṃ cetaś śvadṛtau brāhmaṇo yathā //MU_6,26.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31767: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya ye sthitāḥ kṛtabuddhayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31768: prāptaṃ prāptavyam akhilaṃ tair akhinnās ta eva hi //MU_6,26.24//
GSP27moksop_u:31769: tiṣṭhatā gacchatā nityaṃ jāgratā svapatā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:31770: eṣā cet prekṣyate dṛṣṭis tan na bandhanam āpyate //MU_6,26.25//
GSP27moksop_u:31773: sarvārambhāṃs tyajan svasthaḥ kurvaṃś cāpi budho janaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31784: prāṇas sūryo 'gnir atha vā pacaty antar idaṃ vapuḥ //MU_6,26.32//
GSP27moksop_u:31790: yatra grastās tad āsādya padaṃ bhūyo na śocyate //MU_6,26.35//
GSP27moksop_u:31792: grastā tat padam āsādya na bhūyo janmabhāṅ manaḥ //MU_6,26.36//
GSP27moksop_u:31797: arkatāṃ samparityajya na yāvac candratāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31798: prāṇas tāvad vicāryāntar deśakālau na śocyate //MU_6,26.39//
GSP27moksop_u:31800: ātmano nijam ādhāraṃ na bhūyo jāyate manaḥ //MU_6,26.40//
GSP27moksop_u:31802: hṛdaye bhāskaraṃ devaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_6,26.41//
GSP27moksop_u:31803: nākṣīṇaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bahissthaṃ siddhaye tamaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31804: hārdaṃ tu kṣapayed dhvāntaṃ yatkṣaye siddhir uttamā //MU_6,26.42//
GSP27moksop_u:31806: hārde tu tamasi kṣīṇe svāloko jāyate paraḥ //MU_6,26.43//
GSP27moksop_u:31810: padāt tasmād udety antaḥ prāṇārko bahirunmukhaḥ //MU_6,26.45//
GSP27moksop_u:31813: prāṇe tv astaṅgate bāhyād apānaḥ prodayet kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:31814: ātape parito naṣṭe chāyevāśu pade navā //MU_6,26.47//
GSP27moksop_u:31816: apānajanmabhūmau ca prāṇaṃ naṣṭam avaihi hi //MU_6,26.48//
GSP27moksop_u:31818: bahiḥkumbhakam ālambya ciraṃ bhūyo na śocyate //MU_6,26.49//
GSP27moksop_u:31820: antaḥkumbhakam ālambya ciraṃ bhūyo na śocyate //MU_6,26.50//
GSP27moksop_u:31822: svasthaṃ kumbhakam abhyasya na bhūyaḥ paritapyate //MU_6,26.51//
GSP27moksop_u:31824: svasaṃsthaṃ kumbhakaṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhūyaḥ paritapyate //MU_6,26.52//
GSP27moksop_u:31825: prāṇāpānāv ubhāv antar yatraitau vilayaṃ gatau /
GSP27moksop_u:31826: tad ālambya padaṃ śāntam ātmanā nānutapyate //MU_6,26.53//
GSP27moksop_u:31828: vicārya bahir antar vā na bhūyaḥ pariśocyate //MU_6,26.54//
GSP27moksop_u:31830: deśaṃ kālaṃ ca samprekṣya na bhūyo jāyate manaḥ //MU_6,26.55//
GSP27moksop_u:31831: yatra prāṇo hy apānena prāṇenāpāna eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:31832: nigīrṇo bahir antaś ca deśau kālau ca paśya tau //MU_6,26.56//
GSP27moksop_u:31834: ayatnasiddhaṃ bāhyasthaṃ kumbhakaṃ tat padaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,26.57//
GSP27moksop_u:31836: ayatnasiddho hy antassthaḥ kumbhakaḥ paramaṃ padam //MU_6,26.58//
GSP27moksop_u:31837: etat tad ātmano rūpaṃ śuddhaiṣā sā paraiva cit /
GSP27moksop_u:31838: etat sad asadābhāsam etat prāpya na śocyate //MU_6,26.59//
GSP27moksop_u:31840: na ca prāṇaṃ na cāpānaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.60//
GSP27moksop_u:31843: prāṇasya prāṇanaṃ proccaiḥ paraṃ jīvasya jīvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31845: yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31846: yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ cidātmānam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.63//
GSP27moksop_u:31856: ye dve yogipadādhāraṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.68//
GSP27moksop_u:31858: yac chaktirūpaṃ śaktīnāṃ tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.69//
GSP27moksop_u:31862: yat prāpyaṃ prāṇamananāt tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.71//
GSP27moksop_u:31864: kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānāṃ yat tac cittattvam upāsmahe //MU_6,26.72//
GSP27moksop_u:31865: yad akhilakalanākalaṅkahīnaṃ parivalitaṃ ca sadā kalāgaṇena /
GSP27moksop_u:31866: anubhavavibhavaṃ padaṃ tad agryaṃ sakalasurāvanataṃ paraṃ prapadye //MU_6,26.73//
GSP27moksop_u:31870: eṣā hi citi viśrāntir mayā prāṇasamādhinā /
GSP27moksop_u:31873: na calāmi nimeṣāṃśam api merur ivācalaḥ //MU_6,27.2//
GSP27moksop_u:31874: gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgratas svapato 'pi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:31875: svapne 'pi na calaty eṣa susamādhir mamātmani //MU_6,27.3//
GSP27moksop_u:31878: api saṃrudhyate vāyur api vā salilaṃ gateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31883: ayam adyāpi bhūtānāṃ paśyañ jīvāmi dhīradhīḥ //MU_6,27.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31884: na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyac ca cintayāmi kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:31892: idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ lapsyāmi sundaram /
GSP27moksop_u:31893: iti cintā na me tena ciraṃ jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.12//
GSP27moksop_u:31894: na staumi na ca nindāmi kvacit kiñcit kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:31895: ātmano 'nyasya vā sādho tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31896: na tuṣyati śubhaprāptau nāśubheṣv api khidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:31897: mano mama samaṃ nityaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.14//
GSP27moksop_u:31898: paramaṃ tyāgam ālambya sarvam eva sadaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:31899: jīvitādi mayā tyaktaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.15//
GSP27moksop_u:31901: mano mama mune śāntaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.16//
GSP27moksop_u:31902: kāṣṭhaṃ vilāsinīṃ śailaṃ tṛṇam agniṃ himaṃ nabhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31903: samaṃ sarvatra paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.17//
GSP27moksop_u:31904: kim adya mama samprāptaṃ prātar vā bhavitā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31905: iti cintājvaro nāsti tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.18//
GSP27moksop_u:31907: na bibhemi na hṛṣyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.19//
GSP27moksop_u:31908: ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraś cāyaṃ mamāyam ayam anyataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31909: iti brahman na jānāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.20//
GSP27moksop_u:31910: āharan viharaṃs tiṣṭhann uttiṣṭhann ucchvasan svapan /
GSP27moksop_u:31911: deho 'ham iti no vedmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.21//
GSP27moksop_u:31913: asantam iva paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.22//
GSP27moksop_u:31915: hastāv iva śarīrasthau tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31917: ṛju paśyāmi sarvatra tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.24//
GSP27moksop_u:31920: yat karomi yad aśnāmi tat tyaktvā tadvato 'pi me /
GSP27moksop_u:31921: mano naiṣkarmyam ādatte tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.26//
GSP27moksop_u:31922: yadā yadā mune kiñcid vijānāmi tadā tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:31923: natim āyāmi nauddhatyaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.27//
GSP27moksop_u:31925: daridro 'pi na vāñchāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.28//
GSP27moksop_u:31927: bhūtavṛndaṃ hasāmy ārāt tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.29//
GSP27moksop_u:31929: saṃsparśaṃ na dadāmy antas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.30//
GSP27moksop_u:31931: suptaḥ prabuddhaḥ paśyāmi tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.31//
GSP27moksop_u:31932: kṣīṇaṃ bhinnaṃ ślathaṃ jīrṇaṃ kṣubdhaṃ kṣuṇṇaṃ kṣayaṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:31933: paśyāmi navavat sarvaṃ tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.32//
GSP27moksop_u:31935: sarvasya priyamitraṃ ca tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.33//
GSP27moksop_u:31938: nāham asmi na cānyo me nāham anyasya kasyacit /
GSP27moksop_u:31939: iti me bhāvitaṃ cetas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.35//
GSP27moksop_u:31940: ahaṃ jagad ahaṃ vyoma deśakālakramāv aham /
GSP27moksop_u:31941: ahaṃ kriyeti me buddhis tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.36//
GSP27moksop_u:31942: ghaṭaś cic cit paṭaś cit khaṃ cid vaṭaś śakaṭaś ca cit /
GSP27moksop_u:31943: cit sarvam iti me bhāvas tena jīvāmy anāmayaḥ //MU_6,27.37//
GSP27moksop_u:31947: ālīnam unnamitam ākuladṛśyadṛśyam ālokayan prakalayaṃś ca ciraṃ sthito 'smi //MU_6,27.39//
GSP27moksop_u:31951: etat te kathitaṃ brahman yathāsmi yad ihāsmi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:31954: aho nu citraṃ bhagavan bhavatā bhūṣaṇaṃ śruteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31956: dhanyās te ye mahātmānam atyantaṃ cirajīvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31958: vayam adya bhṛśaṃ dhanyās svātmodantam akhaṇḍitam /
GSP27moksop_u:31959: yathāvat pāvanaṃ buddhes sarvaṃ kathitavān asi //MU_6,28.4//
GSP27moksop_u:31961: bhavān iva jagaty asmin na mahān avalokitaḥ //MU_6,28.5//
GSP27moksop_u:31962: kathañcit prāpyate kaccid bhrāntveha hi mahājanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:31963: na bhavān iva bhavyātmā sulabho jagati kvacit //MU_6,28.6//
GSP27moksop_u:31964: vaṃśakhaṇḍe hi kasmiṃścij jāyate mauktikaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:31965: jagatkhaṇḍe hi kasmiṃścij jāyate tvādṛśas tathā //MU_6,28.7//
GSP27moksop_u:31966: mayā tu sumahat kāryam adya sampāditaṃ śubham /
GSP27moksop_u:31968: tad astu tava kalyāṇaṃ praviśātmaguhāṃ śubhām /
GSP27moksop_u:31973: tat pātraṃ mauktikārgheṇa pūrayām āsa pūrṇadhīḥ //MU_6,28.11//
GSP27moksop_u:31977: viṣṭarād aham utthāya tataḥ khagavad āplutaḥ //MU_6,28.13//
GSP27moksop_u:31980: mayi yāte tato dīrghe gaganādhvany adṛśyatām /
GSP27moksop_u:31982: anyo'nyaṃ mayi tasmiṃś ca taraṅgaka ivāmbudhau /
GSP27moksop_u:31983: vyomany adṛśyatāṃ yāte gatas smṛtyā munīn aham //MU_6,28.16//
GSP27moksop_u:31988: jīvaty adyāpi matimāṃs tasminn eva latādale /
GSP27moksop_u:31992: adya rāma kṛte kṣīṇe tretā samparivartate /
GSP27moksop_u:31997: śrutvā vicārya caivāntar yad yuktaṃ tat samācara //MU_6,28.23//
GSP27moksop_u:31999: bhavabhayabahalāṃ kusaṃsṛtiṃ sa prasabham asatsaritaṃ tariṣyatīti //MU_6,28.24//
GSP27moksop_u:32008: bhusuṇḍo 'vāptavān prāpyaṃ tathā sādhaya tat padam //MU_6,29.3//
GSP27moksop_u:32012: idānīṃ dhiyam ālambya yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_6,29.5//
GSP27moksop_u:32016: prabuddhās smaḥ prahṛṣṭās smaḥ praviṣṭās smas svam āspadam /
GSP27moksop_u:32017: sthitās smo jñātavijñeyā bhavanto hy aparā iva //MU_6,29.7//
GSP27moksop_u:32020: bhusuṇḍacarite brahmann etasmin yat tvayā vibho /
GSP27moksop_u:32022: tat kena nāma racitaṃ kuto vā tat samutthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:32023: kathaṃ vā sthitim āyātaṃ ko vā tatrāvatiṣṭhate //MU_6,29.10//
GSP27moksop_u:32026: śṛṇu rāghava tattvena vakṣyamāṇam idaṃ mayā //MU_6,29.11//
GSP27moksop_u:32028: śarīrasadanaṃ rāma na kenacid idaṃ kṛtam //MU_6,29.12//
GSP27moksop_u:32032: vastutaś caika evendus sthitir dehe tathaiva hi //MU_6,29.14//
GSP27moksop_u:32034: asann eva vastutas sa proktas sadasadātmakaḥ //MU_6,29.15//
GSP27moksop_u:32035: svapnas svapnavidhau satyas tv anyadā sa mudhaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:32038: pratibhāsāvadhau tāpe jalaṃ sad asad anyadā //MU_6,29.17//
GSP27moksop_u:32039: pratibhāsāvadhau dehas sann asaṃs tv anyadā smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32041: ayaṃ nāmāham ity antar gṛhītamananaṃ sthitam //MU_6,29.19//
GSP27moksop_u:32045: paribhramasi he rāma sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.21//
GSP27moksop_u:32047: paribhramasi meruṃ vā sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.22//
GSP27moksop_u:32048: svapneṣv api ca yas svapnas tatra yena mahītaṭān /
GSP27moksop_u:32049: paribhramasi he rāma sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.23//
GSP27moksop_u:32051: paribhramasi yeneha sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.24//
GSP27moksop_u:32053: prakaroṣi mahābāho yair dehais te kva saṃsthitāḥ //MU_6,29.25//
GSP27moksop_u:32055: nirvṛtiṃ yāsi dehena sa dehas te kva saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.26//
GSP27moksop_u:32058: idaṃ dhanam ayaṃ deho deśo 'yam iti yo bhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32060: dīrghaṃ svapnam imaṃ viddhi dīrghaṃ vā cittavibhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:32062: prabodham eṣyasi yadā param ātmecchayā svayā /
GSP27moksop_u:32063: drakṣyasi tvaṃ tadā samyag idam ūrdhvād adho yathā //MU_6,29.30//
GSP27moksop_u:32065: tathaiveyaṃ hi saṅkalpakalanā kācid eva ha //MU_6,29.31//
GSP27moksop_u:32071: dehavac cintito dehas sthito 'nyas tadvad eva hi //MU_6,29.34//
GSP27moksop_u:32074: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena saṅkalpo hy ayam eva cet /
GSP27moksop_u:32075: anyathā bhāvyate rāma bhūyate tad ihānyathā //MU_6,29.36//
GSP27moksop_u:32076: ayaṃ so 'haṃ mamāyaṃ ca saṃsāra iti bhāvite /
GSP27moksop_u:32078: bhāvitaṃ tīvravegena yad evāśu tad eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32084: vyomany eva yathā tāpasantapte dṛśyate sarit /
GSP27moksop_u:32088: bhīrur apy eti na yathā svasaṅkalpeṣu sambhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:32089: svasaṅkalpe 'pi saṃsāre na tathaiti bhayaṃ sudhīḥ //MU_6,29.43//
GSP27moksop_u:32090: sva eva hi svabhāvo 'yam itthaṃ samprati bhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:32092: sa eva kiñcit saṃśodhyaś śuddhyā vimalatāṃ gate /
GSP27moksop_u:32093: tasmin na dṛśyate rāma moho 'yaṃ jāgataś calaḥ //MU_6,29.45//
GSP27moksop_u:32095: na gṛhṇāti malaṃ bhūyas tāmratām iva kāñcanam //MU_6,29.46//
GSP27moksop_u:32096: ābhāsamātram evaitan na san nāsaj jagattrayam /
GSP27moksop_u:32098: maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ svargo jñānam ajñānam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32103: nāstam eti na codeti samyagālokanān manaḥ //MU_6,29.50//
GSP27moksop_u:32104: nirṇīya sarvabhāvānām asattvaṃ sattvam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:32106: na nindati na ca stauti na hṛṣyati na śocati /
GSP27moksop_u:32108: avaśyam eva martavyaṃ sarvair eva hi bandhubhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32110: avaśyam eva ca mayā martavyam iti niścaye /
GSP27moksop_u:32115: anarthāya bhavaty āpac chokasyāvasaro hi kaḥ //MU_6,29.56//
GSP27moksop_u:32117: idaṃ hi janatājālaṃ kim atra paridevanā //MU_6,29.57//
GSP27moksop_u:32118: sat sad eva sadaivaitad asad evāsad eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:32120: nāham asmi na cābhūvaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi cādhunā /
GSP27moksop_u:32122: dehāc ced anya evāhaṃ cidābhāsas tad aṅga he /
GSP27moksop_u:32123: kau tau me sadasadbhāvau yanniṣṭhaṃ paritapyate //MU_6,29.60//
GSP27moksop_u:32124: iti niścayavat tv antas samyagjñānān mano muneḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32125: nāstam eti na codeti na cāntaḥ paritapyate //MU_6,29.61//
GSP27moksop_u:32128: etadartham asatye 'smin nāsthā kāryā manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:32130: asatsvapnaṃ dṛḍham idam iti nirṇīya buddhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32132: kartavyam eva kartavyaṃ yasya na pratibhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:32137: tatas tad api santyajya nirābhāso bhavottamaḥ //MU_6,29.67//
GSP27moksop_u:32140: nāham asmi na me bhogās satyā ity abhibhāvite /
GSP27moksop_u:32142: aham eva hi vā sarvaṃ cid ity evābhibhāvite /
GSP27moksop_u:32145: yad ekam etayor vetsi ramyaṃ tad rāma saṃśraya //MU_6,29.71//
GSP27moksop_u:32146: dvābhyām evātha vai tābhyāṃ darśanābhyām ihānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:32148: yat kiñcid ucitaṃ loke yan nabhasy atha yat pare /
GSP27moksop_u:32151: tat tad eva prayāty āśu mūḍhānāṃ viparītatām //MU_6,29.74//
GSP27moksop_u:32153: padaṃ kurvanti dagdhāsu sthalīṣu hariṇā iva //MU_6,29.75//
GSP27moksop_u:32154: rāgo dveṣaś ca sarpau dvau na nilīnau manobile /
GSP27moksop_u:32155: yasya kalpataros tasmāt kiṃ nāmāṅga na labhyate //MU_6,29.76//
GSP27moksop_u:32156: ye hi prājñās suniyatā vidagdhāś śāstraśālinaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32157: rāgadveṣamayās te cej jambukās tad dhig astu tān //MU_6,29.77//
GSP27moksop_u:32158: mad dhanaṃ bhuktam anyena dhanaṃ bhuktaṃ mayānyataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32160: dhanāni bandhavo mitraṃ punar āyānti yānti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32161: kim eteṣu naraḥ prājño rajyate vā virajyate //MU_6,29.79//
GSP27moksop_u:32164: na dhanaṃ na jano nāsmi satyaṃ rāghava vastutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32166: ādyantayos sarvam asan madhye 'py asthiram ādhimat /
GSP27moksop_u:32167: kva badhnātu dhṛtiṃ dhīro hy anyakalpitakhadrume //MU_6,29.82//
GSP27moksop_u:32168: ekena kalpitā khe strī bhuṅkte tāṃ dūrago 'paraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32174: nāsi nāyaṃ paṭo nārtho vidyate bhittibhāgavān /
GSP27moksop_u:32177: na kaścid eva parame bhavān ātmani saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,29.87//
GSP27moksop_u:32184: prabodham ehi paśyāccham ātmānam uditaṃ sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:32186: prabudhyasva prabudhyasva punaḥ punar ayaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:32190: bodham āsādaya paraṃ prabuddho 'sy eva rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:32192: na te janma na te duḥkhaṃ na doṣas te na te bhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32195: ativitatam idaṃ ca somyarūpaṃ samupaśamātmani tiṣṭha he mahātman //MU_6,29.96//
GSP27moksop_u:32204: sabhābhoge sthite somye rātrāv iva mahītale //MU_6,30.3//
GSP27moksop_u:32206: śṛṇvantīṣv iva śuddhāsu patākāsu vaco muneḥ //MU_6,30.4//
GSP27moksop_u:32208: svapatsv antaḥpurāṇāṃ ca pañjareṣv ālayeṣu ca //MU_6,30.5//
GSP27moksop_u:32214: virarāma munir vāri sasetv ātmarayād iva //MU_6,30.8//
GSP27moksop_u:32216: punar āha tam evārthaṃ vasiṣṭho vadatāṃ varaḥ //MU_6,30.9//
GSP27moksop_u:32219: etam evāvalambyāntas tiṣṭha meha madaṃ kṛthāḥ //MU_6,30.10//
GSP27moksop_u:32223: prayatnād rodhitam api pravahaty eva vegataḥ //MU_6,30.12//
GSP27moksop_u:32224: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya balaṃ prajñāṃ ca yuktitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32227: pauruṣeṇa na yat prāptaṃ na tat kvacana labhyate //MU_6,30.14//
GSP27moksop_u:32229: nijaṃ prayatnam āśritya cittam ādau nirodhayet //MU_6,30.15//
GSP27moksop_u:32239: na tathā sthiratā dehe citrapuṃsi yathā kila //MU_6,30.20//
GSP27moksop_u:32240: vināśito hi citrastho deho naśyati nānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:32243: dehas tu pālito 'py uccair naśyaty eva na vardhate //MU_6,30.22//
GSP27moksop_u:32245: ye guṇāś citradehe hi na te saṅkalpadehake //MU_6,30.23//
GSP27moksop_u:32246: citradehād api jaḍād yo 'yaṃ tucchataraḥ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:32249: svalpasaṅkalpajād dehād api tucchataro hy ayam //MU_6,30.25//
GSP27moksop_u:32252: deho hi saṅkalpamayo nāyam asti na nāsti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32253: kiṃ vyartham etadarthaṃ hi mūḍho 'yaṃ kleśabhāg janaḥ //MU_6,30.27//
GSP27moksop_u:32254: yathā citramaye puṃsi kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32255: yathā saṅkalpapuruṣe kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.28//
GSP27moksop_u:32256: yathā manorājyamaye kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32257: yathā dvitīye śaśini kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.29//
GSP27moksop_u:32258: yathā svapnasamārambhe kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32259: yathā ghanātapajale kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.30//
GSP27moksop_u:32261: tathā śarīrayantre 'smin kṣate kṣīṇe na vaḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,30.31//
GSP27moksop_u:32263: bhūṣite dūṣite dehe na hi kiñcic citaḥ kṣatam //MU_6,30.32//
GSP27moksop_u:32264: na cid astam upāyāti nātmā calati rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:32265: na brahma vikṛtiṃ yāti kiṃ vo dehakṣaye kṣatam //MU_6,30.33//
GSP27moksop_u:32270: bhramitaṃ ca bhramadrūpaṃ patadrūpaṃ ca pātitam /
GSP27moksop_u:32271: hataṃ ca hanyamānaṃ ca vapur durvāsanāvaśāt //MU_6,30.36//
GSP27moksop_u:32272: ajñānajaṃ bhramaṃ tyaktvā satyāṃ dṛṣṭim avekṣya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32273: dhīratām alam ālambya ghanaṃ bhramam idaṃ tyajet //MU_6,30.37//
GSP27moksop_u:32274: saṅkalpena kṛto deho mithyājñānena san na san /
GSP27moksop_u:32275: asatyena kṛtaṃ yat syān na tat satyaṃ kadācana //MU_6,30.38//
GSP27moksop_u:32277: asatyām eva cemāṃ ca karoti ca jagatkriyām //MU_6,30.39//
GSP27moksop_u:32278: jaḍena rāma kriyate yat tan na kṛtam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32279: kurvann api tato deho na kartā kvacid eva hi //MU_6,30.40//
GSP27moksop_u:32280: nirīho hi jaḍo deho nātmano 'sty abhivāñchitam /
GSP27moksop_u:32281: kartā na kaścid evāto draṣṭā kevalam asy ajaḥ //MU_6,30.41//
GSP27moksop_u:32282: yathā dīpo nivātasthas svātmany eva hi tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:32284: yathā divasakāryāṇi bhāskaras svastha eva san /
GSP27moksop_u:32285: karoty evam imāṃ rāma kuru pārthivasaṃsthitim //MU_6,30.43//
GSP27moksop_u:32286: asmin hy asanmaye dehagehe śūnye samutthite /
GSP27moksop_u:32290: bhṛtyatāṃ māsya gaccha tvam ahaṅkārasya durmateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32291: asya bhṛtyatayā rāma nirayaḥ prāpyate phalam //MU_6,30.46//
GSP27moksop_u:32299: citram adyāpi te kasmād ghaṭṭitā nāśmavat sthitāḥ //MU_6,30.50//
GSP27moksop_u:32303: viharānāsthayā sādho na tavaitat kila sthiram //MU_6,30.52//
GSP27moksop_u:32307: teṣāṃ mohāmayāndhānāṃ na mitrāṇi na bandhavaḥ //MU_6,30.54//
GSP27moksop_u:32309: viṣavallyā iva phalaṃ tasyās syān maraṇātmakam //MU_6,30.55//
GSP27moksop_u:32311: mūrkheṇālambitaṃ yena naṣṭam evāśu viddhi tam //MU_6,30.56//
GSP27moksop_u:32317: tvam enam ālokaya mā manasā mahatāṃ vara //MU_6,30.59//
GSP27moksop_u:32323: śakyante parisaṅkhyātuṃ na tā varṣaśatair api //MU_6,30.62//
GSP27moksop_u:32328: yat karoti yad ādatte dehayantram idaṃ calam /
GSP27moksop_u:32330: vṛkṣonnatau yathā hetur akartr api kilāmbaram /
GSP27moksop_u:32338: ātmā prakāśarūpo hi nityas sarvagato vibhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32339: cittaṃ śaṭham ahaṅkāraṃ viddhi hārdaṃ bṛhattamaḥ //MU_6,30.70//
GSP27moksop_u:32342: piśāco hi manonāmā śūnye dehagṛhe sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32343: bhāyayaty eṣa duṣṭātmā mainam uttama saṃspṛśa //MU_6,30.72//
GSP27moksop_u:32345: manaḥpiśācam utsārya yo 'si sa tvaṃ sthiro bhava //MU_6,30.73//
GSP27moksop_u:32347: śaknuvanti paritrātuṃ guravo na ca mānavam //MU_6,30.74//
GSP27moksop_u:32353: iyaṃ jagadaraṇyānī śūnyā kasya na bhītaye //MU_6,30.77//
GSP27moksop_u:32355: dehagehaṃ katipayais sevyate sadbhir eva ca //MU_6,30.78//
GSP27moksop_u:32356: iha saṃśrīyate yā yā dik saiva raghunandana /
GSP27moksop_u:32361: dhṛtiṃ tṛṇarasai rāma mā gaccha mṛgapotavat //MU_6,30.81//
GSP27moksop_u:32363: tvam ajñānagajaṃ bhaṅktvā saiṃhīṃ vṛttim upāśraya //MU_6,30.82//
GSP27moksop_u:32365: viharanti yathā rāma tathā mā viharānagha //MU_6,30.83//
GSP27moksop_u:32369: pravicārya mahāryais svam ekam ātmānam āśrayet //MU_6,30.85//
GSP27moksop_u:32380: pṛthak sambhavatīhāṅga na jāḍyaṃ na ca cetanam /
GSP27moksop_u:32383: ayaṃ guḍa idaṃ khaṇḍam iti māyā mudhoditā //MU_6,30.92//
GSP27moksop_u:32388: nāsato vidyate bhāvo yo nāsty eveha san na saḥ //MU_6,30.95//
GSP27moksop_u:32392: tathopalas svatāniṣṭho na jaḍo na ca cetanaḥ //MU_6,30.97//
GSP27moksop_u:32394: cetyasyāsambhavād ātmā na jaḍo na ca cetanaḥ //MU_6,30.98//
GSP27moksop_u:32396: samāyāte na cāyāte prekṣite na ca vīkṣite //MU_6,30.99//
GSP27moksop_u:32398: bhavatas tau kathaṃ satyam aprekṣāmātrakād ṛte //MU_6,30.100//
GSP27moksop_u:32399: yac ca cetanam ātmeti jaḍaś copala ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:32401: bodhyaḥ paratare bodhe yayā yuktyā prabodhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32402: sopadeśyā na gṛhṇāti mūḍhas tat sahasā padam //MU_6,30.102//
GSP27moksop_u:32403: cittaṃ pṛthak pṛthag imāni hatendriyāṇi kartā na dṛśyata idaṃ ca gṛhaṃ mudhaiva /
GSP27moksop_u:32404: ko 'py anya eva parivalgati nissvabhāva eṣo 'ham ity alam aho mahad indrajālam //MU_6,30.103//
GSP27moksop_u:32405: lolāsu saṃsṛtiṣu bhūtaparamparāṇāṃ krīḍāsu cānyapuruṣasya cidekavṛtteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32406: tattvaṃ vicārya ramate hi mahānubhāvo mantrī yatholbaṇaviṣāsu bhujaṅgamīṣu //MU_6,30.104//
GSP27moksop_u:32407: na tvaṃ śiro na nayane na ca raktamāṃse nāsthīni naiva ca mano na ca bhūtajālam /
GSP27moksop_u:32408: mā moham ehi na śarīram asi prasannā cit tvaṃ prapannasakalāmalasarvageti //MU_6,30.105//
GSP27moksop_u:32416: śṛṇu yā kathitā pūrvaṃ mama kailāsakandare /
GSP27moksop_u:32440: taṃ pūjayan mahādevaṃ tasminn eva girau purā /
GSP27moksop_u:32469: madartham iva tām eva diśam āpatatīva ca //MU_6,31.29//
GSP27moksop_u:32481: etasmin samaye tatra yāmārdhe prathame gate /
GSP27moksop_u:32483: apaśyaṃ kānane tejo jhagity eva samutthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:32493: prakaṭīkṛtadik tejas tad ālokya mayā smayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:32495: yāvat paśyāmi taṃ sānuṃ līlayaiva yadṛcchayā /
GSP27moksop_u:32503: manodṛṣṭas sa bhagavān manasaiva tato mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:32505: iti kṛtvā mayā dehaḥ paryaṅkaśayanād ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:32509: tatra puṣpāñjaliṃ dattvā dūrād eva trilocanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32516: ānayārghyaṃ tathā pādyaṃ brahman svāgatam astu te /
GSP27moksop_u:32523: arghaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā pādyaṃ samupetyārpitaṃ mayā //MU_6,32.21//
GSP27moksop_u:32524: pādayor hastayoś caiva tanvāṃ cāsya svayambhuvaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32528: gṛhītavantau tau tāṃ me saparyām ādarāt prabhū /
GSP27moksop_u:32534: kaccit kalyāṇakāriṇyas saṃvidas te sthitāḥ pade //MU_6,32.26//
GSP27moksop_u:32548: vasato 'smin gireḥ kukṣāv apy anudvegitāsti te //MU_6,32.33//
GSP27moksop_u:32552: na kiñcid api duṣprāpaṃ na ca kāścana bhītayaḥ //MU_6,32.35//
GSP27moksop_u:32554: na te santi jagatkośe praṇatiṃ ye na bibhrati //MU_6,32.36//
GSP27moksop_u:32555: te deśās te janapadās tā diśas te ca parvatāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32559: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca saphalaṃ yena nāma tat /
GSP27moksop_u:32574: sarvāsām āpadāṃ mūrdhni dattaṃ bhūtapate padam //MU_6,32.46//
GSP27moksop_u:32575: sakaladuḥkhabhayāpahara prabho kṣaṇam apīha mayāsi na cetasā /
GSP27moksop_u:32576: varada vīra maheśvara vismṛtas sukham ato nivasāmi bhavān iva //MU_6,32.47//
GSP27moksop_u:32578: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:32579: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_6,32.48//
GSP27moksop_u:32583: ity uktavantam atrāsau gaurī bhagavatī giram /
GSP27moksop_u:32584: mām uvāca jaganmātā māteva tanayaṃ priyam //MU_6,33.1//
GSP27moksop_u:32589: tayā saha kathāś citrāḥ karomy ekavayasyayā //MU_6,33.3//
GSP27moksop_u:32590: ity ukte tatra pārvatyā mayā sā gṛhiṇī svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:32594: aham asmin kṣaṇe buddhyā rāma cintitavān idam /
GSP27moksop_u:32595: avyagro matprasannaś ca labdho 'yaṃ bhagavān mayā //MU_6,33.6//
GSP27moksop_u:32598: iti sañcintya sa gurur idaṃ pṛṣṭo mayānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:32599: śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te sarvaṃ yad uktaṃ candramaulinā //MU_6,33.8//
GSP27moksop_u:32602: pṛcchāmi tvā mahādeva yad ahaṃ tat tvam āśu me /
GSP27moksop_u:32607: śṛṇu brahman varam idaṃ devārcanam anuttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:32608: vadāmi mucyase yena kṛtena sakṛd eva hi //MU_6,33.12//
GSP27moksop_u:32609: kaccit vetsi mahādevo devaḥ kas syād iti dvija /
GSP27moksop_u:32610: na devaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo na ca devas trilocanaḥ //MU_6,33.13//
GSP27moksop_u:32611: na devaḥ kamalodbhūto na devas tridaśeśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32612: na devaḥ pavano nārko nānalo na niśākaraḥ //MU_6,33.14//
GSP27moksop_u:32613: na brāhmaṇo nāvanipo nāhaṃ na tvaṃ dvijottama /
GSP27moksop_u:32614: na devo deharūpo 'sti na devaś citrarūpadhṛt //MU_6,33.15//
GSP27moksop_u:32615: na devaḥ kalanārūpī nāpi devo bhaven matiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32619: tad eva devaśabdena kathyate tat prapūjayet /
GSP27moksop_u:32627: bodhas sāmyaṃ śama iti puṣpāṇy agryāṇi tatra vai /
GSP27moksop_u:32628: śivaṃ cinmātram akalam ātmānam amalaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,33.22//
GSP27moksop_u:32629: śamabodhādibhiḥ puṣpair deva ātmā yad arcyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32632: kṛtrimārcāsu ye saktāś ciraṃ kleśaṃ bhajanti te //MU_6,33.24//
GSP27moksop_u:32633: jñātajñeyā hi ye santo bālakrīḍopamaṃ na te /
GSP27moksop_u:32637: tvam etac cetanākāśam ātmānaṃ jīvam avyayam /
GSP27moksop_u:32638: svabhāvaṃ viddhi na tv anyat pūjyapūjātmapūjanam //MU_6,33.27//
GSP27moksop_u:32640: yathā ca cetanasyaiva jīvāditvaṃ tad ucyatām //MU_6,33.28//
GSP27moksop_u:32643: tad yat svayaṃ prakacati tasya svakacanasya tu /
GSP27moksop_u:32644: svayaṃ saṃviditaṃ nāma tenedaṃ jagad ity alam //MU_6,33.30//
GSP27moksop_u:32645: ity evaṃ svapnapuravaj jagad bhāti cidātmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:32646: evaṃ cidvyomamātrātma jagad acchaṃ na bhittimat //MU_6,33.31//
GSP27moksop_u:32648: cittvāt kacati sargādau yat taj jagad iti smṛtam //MU_6,33.32//
GSP27moksop_u:32649: tasmāt svapnapurākāraṃ yad idaṃ bhāsate jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:32650: tatra cidvyomamātrātmany anyatā nāma kā kutaḥ //MU_6,33.33//
GSP27moksop_u:32652: cinmātram ātmā jīvaś ca cinmātraṃ bhūtasantatiḥ //MU_6,33.34//
GSP27moksop_u:32654: bhinnaṃ svapnapure cāṅga kiṃ sambhavati kathyatām //MU_6,33.35//
GSP27moksop_u:32658: tadā kila cidākāśam eva bhāti jagattayā //MU_6,33.37//
GSP27moksop_u:32660: tathedaṃ jāgradākhye 'pi svapne bhāti tad eva naḥ //MU_6,33.38//
GSP27moksop_u:32662: na kiñcit sambhavaty aṅga jagaty evam ihāditaḥ //MU_6,33.39//
GSP27moksop_u:32663: yato na sambhavaty anyac cedaṃ kiñcit tato 'khilam /
GSP27moksop_u:32664: cittvaṃ sacetyam apy etad acetyaṃ saj jagat sthitam //MU_6,33.40//
GSP27moksop_u:32668: yathā na vidyate kiñcit tathāsmin bhuvanatraye //MU_6,33.42//
GSP27moksop_u:32669: yāḥ kāścana dṛśo ye ye bhāvābhāvāḥ kilāgamāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32671: sa eṣa devaḥ kathito yaḥ paraḥ paramārthataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32672: yas tvaṃ yo 'ham aśeṣaṃ vā jagad eva ca yo 'khilam //MU_6,33.44//
GSP27moksop_u:32675: saṅkalpane svapnapure śarīraṃ cidvyomato 'nyan na yathāsti kiñcit /
GSP27moksop_u:32676: tatheha sarge prathamaikasargān mune prabhṛty asti na rūpam anyat //MU_6,33.46//
GSP27moksop_u:32680: evaṃ sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ paramātmaiva kevalam /
GSP27moksop_u:32681: brahmaiva paramākāśa eṣa devaḥ paras smṛtaḥ //MU_6,34.1//
GSP27moksop_u:32682: tad etatpūjanaṃ śreyas tasmāt sarvam avāpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32683: sa devas sarvagas sarvas sarvaṃ tasmin pratiṣṭhitam //MU_6,34.2//
GSP27moksop_u:32686: prabuddhas tvaṃ muniśreṣṭha tenedaṃ tava varṇyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32690: gandhākṣataiś ca dīpaiś ca puṣpādyaiḥ pūjayanti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:32695: yataḥ kutaścin mithyātma phalam atrārpayanti te //MU_6,34.8//
GSP27moksop_u:32697: yat syād bhavādṛśe 'yogyam arcanaṃ tad vadāmy aham //MU_6,34.9//
GSP27moksop_u:32698: asmadādis tu no kaścid devo matimatāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:32701: sarvasaṅkalpavalito na sarvī na ca sārvikaḥ //MU_6,34.11//
GSP27moksop_u:32703: cinmātramūrtir amalo deva ity ucyate mune //MU_6,34.12//
GSP27moksop_u:32706: brahma brahman sadasator madhyaṃ tad deva ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32707: paramātmāparābhikhyaṃ tat sad om ity udāhṛtam //MU_6,34.14//
GSP27moksop_u:32709: mahācid iti ca proktaṃ paramārtha iti śrutam //MU_6,34.15//
GSP27moksop_u:32710: sthitaṃ sarvatra sarvartu latāsv antar yathā rasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32712: yac cittattvam arundhatyā yac cittattvaṃ tavānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:32713: yac cittattvaṃ ca pārvatyā yac cittattvaṃ gaṇeṣu ca //MU_6,34.17//
GSP27moksop_u:32714: cittattvaṃ yan mamedaṃ ca cittattvaṃ yaj jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:32715: tad deva iti tattvajñā vidur uttamabuddhayaḥ //MU_6,34.18//
GSP27moksop_u:32716: pādapāṇyādimān anyo yo vā devaḥ prakalpyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32717: sa cinmātrād ṛte brahman kiṃsāraḥ kila kathyatām //MU_6,34.19//
GSP27moksop_u:32718: na sa dūre sthito brahman na duṣprāpas sa kasyacit /
GSP27moksop_u:32719: sa saṃsthitas sadā dehe sarvatraiva ca khe tathā //MU_6,34.20//
GSP27moksop_u:32720: sa karoti sa cāśnāti sa bibharti prayāti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:32721: sa niśśvasati saṃvettā so 'ṅgāny aṅgāni vetti te //MU_6,34.21//
GSP27moksop_u:32727: tasya saṃvyavahārārthaṃ sañjñā cid iti kalpitā //MU_6,34.24//
GSP27moksop_u:32728: sa eṣa cinmayas sūkṣmas sarvavyāpī nirañjanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32729: imaṃ bhāsuram ābhāsaṃ karoti na karoti ca //MU_6,34.25//
GSP27moksop_u:32731: imāṃ rañjayati prājña raseneva madhur latām //MU_6,34.26//
GSP27moksop_u:32732: cāravo ye camatkārāś citaś citi yathāsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:32733: camatkurvanti kila te ete kecin nabho'bhidhāḥ //MU_6,34.27//
GSP27moksop_u:32747: citi sthiraṃ pravahati jalāvarte tṛṇaṃ yathā //MU_6,34.34//
GSP27moksop_u:32779: manyate tanyate vastu gīyate kriyate 'pi ca //MU_6,34.50//
GSP27moksop_u:32784: cit sarvaṃ jagadārambham imaṃ prakaṭayaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:32789: rūpam eti phalaṃ caiva prāvṛṭsikteva sallatā //MU_6,34.55//
GSP27moksop_u:32790: cicchāyayaiva sarvasya jāḍyaṃ śāmyaty udeti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:32792: ciccamatkṛtayo dehe na bhaveyur imā yadi /
GSP27moksop_u:32793: trailokyadehās tat ke te kān spṛśeyuḥ kimākṛtīn //MU_6,34.57//
GSP27moksop_u:32796: cidālokaṃ vinā kasya rasanāgre sphurann api /
GSP27moksop_u:32797: kathaṃ kadā prakaṭatām eti kīdṛk ca vā rasaḥ //MU_6,34.59//
GSP27moksop_u:32799: cinmañjarīṃ vinā dehavṛkṣaḥ ka iva rājate //MU_6,34.60//
GSP27moksop_u:32801: cid evāstītaran nāsti cinmātram idam utthitam //MU_6,34.61//
GSP27moksop_u:32802: ity uktavān atha tryakṣas sudhāsyandācchayā girā /
GSP27moksop_u:32804: yadi sarvagatā deva cid asty ekā tatātmikā /
GSP27moksop_u:32805: tad ayaṃ cetati sphāram ayaṃ caiva na cetati //MU_6,34.63//
GSP27moksop_u:32806: ayaṃ cidvān purā bhūtvā ciddhīnas samprati sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32809: śṛṇv etad akhilaṃ brahman yathāpṛṣṭam vadāmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:32810: mahān ayaṃ kṛtaḥ praśnas tvayā brahmavidāṃ vara //MU_6,34.65//
GSP27moksop_u:32815: sa eva hi pumān kopād yathehānya iva kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:32816: bhavaty evaṃ vikalpāṅkā cit svarūpānyatāṃ gatā //MU_6,34.68//
GSP27moksop_u:32822: jīvo bhūtvā bhavaty āśu buddhiḥ paścād ahaṃ manaḥ //MU_6,34.71//
GSP27moksop_u:32826: śabalaṃ rūpam āsādya saṅkalpān yāty anāratam //MU_6,34.73//
GSP27moksop_u:32828: cij jāḍyād deham āyāti payaḥ pāṣāṇatām iva //MU_6,34.74//
GSP27moksop_u:32830: jāḍyaṃ nipuṇam āśritya saṃsāre jāyate mune //MU_6,34.75//
GSP27moksop_u:32845: uṣṭrīva madhuno binduṃ vāñchate bhāvitaṃ sukham /
GSP27moksop_u:32847: paraṃ vaivaśyam āyāti saṅkaṭāt saṅkaṭaṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:32848: duḥkhād duḥkhe nipatitā vipado vipadi sthitā //MU_6,34.84//
GSP27moksop_u:32866: latā tarau khagī nīḍe vīrut sānau vane mṛgī //MU_6,34.93//
GSP27moksop_u:32868: kāntāsakho haraś śaile svarge suravaro hariḥ //MU_6,34.94//
GSP27moksop_u:32869: dinaṃ karoti tīkṣṇāṃśur varṣaty ambudharo jalam /
GSP27moksop_u:32870: karoti rajanīm indur dhatte nīraṃ mahodadhiḥ //MU_6,34.95//
GSP27moksop_u:32876: kvacic chaityaṃ himendvādi kvacit khādi nakiñcana //MU_6,34.98//
GSP27moksop_u:32877: kvacid ujjvalitākārā kvacit kṛṣṇā kvacit sitā /
GSP27moksop_u:32878: kvacin nīlātha haritā kvacid agniḥ kvacin mahī //MU_6,34.99//
GSP27moksop_u:32880: sarvatvād ekarūpaiva khād apy acchaiva sā parā //MU_6,34.100//
GSP27moksop_u:32881: cic cinoti yathātmānaṃ yena yatra yathā yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:32882: tat tathāśu bhavaty amburayād vīcyāditā yathā //MU_6,34.101//
GSP27moksop_u:32883: haṃsī krauñcī bakī kākī sarasīsārasī vṛkī /
GSP27moksop_u:32884: pikī balākā hariṇī vānarī kariṇī śunī //MU_6,34.102//
GSP27moksop_u:32885: caṭikā vañjulī śārī makṣikā ṣaṭpadī śukī /
GSP27moksop_u:32886: dhīś śrīr hrīḥ prītir ārtiś ca śavarī śarvarī śaśī //MU_6,34.103//
GSP27moksop_u:32889: bibhety eṣā svasaṅkalpāt svaśabdād iva gardabhī /
GSP27moksop_u:32890: nānayā sadṛg anyāsti mugdhā bālābalā calā //MU_6,34.105//
GSP27moksop_u:32891: eṣā sā kathitā tubhyaṃ jīvaśaktir mayā mune /
GSP27moksop_u:32899: jaḍarater avalokaya śaktatāṃ nijapadasmaraṇena vineha yat /
GSP27moksop_u:32905: cid vadhūḥ kṣīvasuptaiva patitāsmīty alaṃ yathā //MU_6,35.1//
GSP27moksop_u:32907: yathā rodity anaṣṭaiva naṣṭāsmīti tathaiva cit //MU_6,35.2//
GSP27moksop_u:32910: cittvaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ tasyās saṃsārānubhave citeḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32913: nāsau cin na ca tac cetyaṃ na ca tac cetyate tayā //MU_6,35.5//
GSP27moksop_u:32920: nānānānā na cāpy antar aṇāv iva sumeravaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32922: neti neti na caivārkamaṇḍale rajanī yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:32924: na śūnyatāśūnyate ca śilākośa iva drumaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32927: na kaścit kasyacid doṣo jñatayaitad avāpyate //MU_6,35.12//
GSP27moksop_u:32931: na tṛṇaṃ na ca trailokyam iti svāyattatātra te //MU_6,35.14//
GSP27moksop_u:32932: svāyatta eva hy eṣo 'rtho dussādho 'bhāvanāt sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32933: yad yan na sādhyate puṃsā tat kathaṃ kila labhyate //MU_6,35.15//
GSP27moksop_u:32935: paramaikā parā sācchā dīpikā tejasām api //MU_6,35.16//
GSP27moksop_u:32938: ghaṭe paṭe vaṭe kuḍye śakaṭe vānare sure /
GSP27moksop_u:32939: asure sāgare bhūte nare nāge ca saṃsthitā //MU_6,35.18//
GSP27moksop_u:32940: sākṣivat tiṣṭhati satī spandate ca na kutracit /
GSP27moksop_u:32941: dīpaḥ prakāśanāyaiva karoti na punaḥ kriyām //MU_6,35.19//
GSP27moksop_u:32944: nirvikalpā parā sūkṣmā cic cinoti svasaṃvidam /
GSP27moksop_u:32947: bodhatas saiva bhavati naiṣā sadasatī yataḥ //MU_6,35.22//
GSP27moksop_u:32948: sā paraiva cid atyacchā cintām āyāti cetanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:32951: punaḥ kanakatām eti yathā cit paramā tathā //MU_6,35.24//
GSP27moksop_u:32953: tathā sargam ihāgatya bodhāt svaṃ yāti cit padam //MU_6,35.25//
GSP27moksop_u:32956: yadā cittvāc cinoty antar anyatām asatīṃ tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:32960: rūpādīnāṃ tu sattaiṣā cetyam evāmalaiva cit /
GSP27moksop_u:32961: dvitvaikatve tv abodhotthe bodhena vilayaṃ gate //MU_6,35.29//
GSP27moksop_u:32965: tadbāhyapātitā rūpaṃ rūpabodhas tu cit parā //MU_6,35.31//
GSP27moksop_u:32966: tvaṅmārutau jaḍau tucchau tatsaṅgas sparśa ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:32967: mananaṃ sparśasaṃvittis tatsaṃvittis tu cit parā //MU_6,35.32//
GSP27moksop_u:32969: āsāṃ tu manasā hīnaṃ vedanaṃ paramaiva cit //MU_6,35.33//
GSP27moksop_u:32973: mananaṃ citsvakāluṣyam ātmā cin nirmalā bhavet //MU_6,35.35//
GSP27moksop_u:32974: cit prakāśātmikā nityā svātmany eva ca saṃsthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:32975: idam antar jagad dhatte sanniveśaṃ yathā śilā //MU_6,35.36//
GSP27moksop_u:32977: nāstam eti na codeti spandate no na vardhate //MU_6,35.37//
GSP27moksop_u:32979: cij jaḍaṃ cājaḍaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvayantī svayaṃ sthitā //MU_6,35.38//
GSP27moksop_u:32980: rathas tv asyās smṛto jīvo jīvasyāhaṅkṛtī rathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32981: ahaṅkṛte ratho buddhis tathā buddher mano rathaḥ //MU_6,35.39//
GSP27moksop_u:32982: manasas tu rathaḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇasyākṣagaṇo rathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:32983: akṣaughasya ratho deho dehasya spandanaṃ rathaḥ //MU_6,35.40//
GSP27moksop_u:32987: manāg api na satyātma mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvat sthitam //MU_6,35.42//
GSP27moksop_u:32988: rathas tv asyās smṛtaḥ prāṇaḥ kalanāyā munīśvara /
GSP27moksop_u:32990: yatra sthitaiṣā kalanā tad eva paricopati /
GSP27moksop_u:32991: yat prayāti vanaṃ vātyā tad eva parighūrṇate //MU_6,35.44//
GSP27moksop_u:32993: tejasy asattām āyāte na rūpam iva rājate //MU_6,35.45//
GSP27moksop_u:32994: prāṇe praśānte manute na mano 'ntar manāg api /
GSP27moksop_u:32995: vātyāyām upaśāntāyāṃ na rajo hi vikampate //MU_6,35.46//
GSP27moksop_u:32996: yatra prāṇamarud yāti manas tatraiva tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:33000: yatra puṣpaṃ tatra gandho yatrāgnis tatra coṣṇatā /
GSP27moksop_u:33001: yatra prāṇo manas tatra yatrendus tatra tadruciḥ //MU_6,35.49//
GSP27moksop_u:33003: saṃvittes sphāratā cittam atas tat prāṇakoṭare //MU_6,35.50//
GSP27moksop_u:33005: kṣubhyatīva tu sā prāṇaspandād ity anubhūyate //MU_6,35.51//
GSP27moksop_u:33009: prāṇo 'tīte tu manane sa evāśu na copati //MU_6,35.53//
GSP27moksop_u:33010: puryaṣṭake cit paramā sve mune pratibimbati /
GSP27moksop_u:33013: tad eva bhedaiḥ kathitam anyais svāśayakalpitaiḥ //MU_6,35.55//
GSP27moksop_u:33014: yasmād udeti phalam ākuladṛśyajālaṃ tat tan na vastvitarad ity anubhūtam uccaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33015: tasmān mano viparivarti hi dehadṛṣṭyā sarvaṃ tu tatparam avastv iti viddhi tat tvam //MU_6,35.56//
GSP27moksop_u:33021: prāktanais tair ihānyaiś ca svair manomananehitaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33023: manastvaṃ yā gatā śaktis sujaḍeva mune citeḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33024: sā sphuraty anayā brahman svacitā sākṣibhūtayā //MU_6,36.3//
GSP27moksop_u:33025: asyāḥ prasādād iha sā cit kalaṅkavatī mune /
GSP27moksop_u:33030: tathā sphurati jīvo 'yaṃ sati sarvagate pare //MU_6,36.6//
GSP27moksop_u:33032: makuro bimbam ādatte dravyān nāntassthitād api //MU_6,36.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33043: cij jaḍaṃ tūrarīkṛtya rūpaṃ jīvatvam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33052: jīvo jīvati sālokaṃ dīpe sati gṛhaṃ yathā //MU_6,36.17//
GSP27moksop_u:33053: ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva prayānty asyāḥ prapīnatām /
GSP27moksop_u:33056: jīvo vaivaśyam āyāti taraṅgatvaṃ yathā payaḥ //MU_6,36.19//
GSP27moksop_u:33057: cicchaktis sarvaśaktitvān nāhaṃ cid iti bhāvanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:33064: na karoty anusandhānaṃ kuṣṭhī spandaiṣaṇaṃ yathā //MU_6,36.23//
GSP27moksop_u:33066: na sphuraty aparāmṛṣṭaṃ dārupattraṃ yathā bahiḥ //MU_6,36.24//
GSP27moksop_u:33067: nisspande padmapattre 'ntaḥ prāṇāś śāntiṃ prayānty amī /
GSP27moksop_u:33070: yāti śānte nabhovāyāv adṛśyatvaṃ yathā rajaḥ //MU_6,36.26//
GSP27moksop_u:33074: nāśaṃ puryaṣṭake yāte dehaḥ patati niścalaḥ //MU_6,36.28//
GSP27moksop_u:33076: udīritā smaraty anyad anyad vismarati svayam //MU_6,36.29//
GSP27moksop_u:33079: dehe puryaṣṭakaṃ yāvad asti tāvat sa jīvati /
GSP27moksop_u:33080: śānte puryaṣṭake deho mṛta ity ucyate dvija //MU_6,36.31//
GSP27moksop_u:33083: tadā puryaṣṭakaṃ śāntim upaiti gagane śanaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33089: saṃruddhe padmayantre hi prāṇe śāntim upāgate /
GSP27moksop_u:33092: tathaiva tatraiva tadā layam eti mano mune //MU_6,36.37//
GSP27moksop_u:33096: gate gṛhajane dūraṃ gṛhaṃ saṃśūnyatām iva //MU_6,36.39//
GSP27moksop_u:33104: nayaty asatyaṃ satyatvaṃ satyaṃ cāsatyatām api //MU_6,36.43//
GSP27moksop_u:33105: sarvagā hi cid aṃśena jīvībhūya bhaven manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33108: hṛtsthaṃ hi vetāla iva jīva ity ucyate tadā //MU_6,36.45//
GSP27moksop_u:33109: kṣīṇe puryaṣṭake cittaṃ yadā vyomani līyate /
GSP27moksop_u:33110: tadā sphurati no deho mṛta ity ucyate 'pi ca //MU_6,36.46//
GSP27moksop_u:33114: prāṇe saṃrodham āyāte mriyate mānavo mune //MU_6,36.48//
GSP27moksop_u:33115: yathā jātāni jātāni tāny athānyāni kālataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33116: vṛkṣāt parṇāni śīryante śarīrāṇi tathā nṛṇām //MU_6,36.49//
GSP27moksop_u:33117: jāyante ca mriyante ca śarīrāṇi śarīriṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:33118: pādapānāṃ ca parṇāni kā tatra paridevanā //MU_6,36.50//
GSP27moksop_u:33120: itaś cānyā itaś cānyā etāsv āsthā na dhīmataḥ //MU_6,36.51//
GSP27moksop_u:33122: padārtham antar ādatte nānyo hi makurād ṛte //MU_6,36.52//
GSP27moksop_u:33130: kathaṃ ca tan mahādeva rūḍhaṃ sat kālaparyayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:33133: sarvaśaktir hi cid brahma sad ekaṃ vidyate yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:33135: sati dvitve kilaikaṃ syāt saty ekatve dvirūpatā /
GSP27moksop_u:33136: kale dve eva cidrūpaṃ cidrūpatvāt tad apy asat //MU_6,37.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33138: ekaṃ vinā dvitīyaṃ na na dvitīyaṃ vinaikatā //MU_6,37.5//
GSP27moksop_u:33142: vikārādi tad evātas tatsāratvān na bhidyate //MU_6,37.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33145: taraṅgas salile 'toyam ato 'yaṃ yasya te sa naḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33146: śaśaśṛṅgasamas so 'pi yasya satyaṃ sa khāṅkuraḥ //MU_6,37.9//
GSP27moksop_u:33148: vyavacchedādi duśchedaṃ vaco vāktvāt kila dvija //MU_6,37.10//
GSP27moksop_u:33154: tac cid eveti te proktaṃ na praśno 'tra tavocitaḥ //MU_6,37.13//
GSP27moksop_u:33156: cidātmikā eva cites sattvāt sampatitās svataḥ //MU_6,37.14//
GSP27moksop_u:33157: cic ca carcitacetyeha cid brahmādyabhidhā smṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:33160: taraṅgitatvam iva yan na tāvac cetyatāṃ gatam //MU_6,37.16//
GSP27moksop_u:33164: tan na nāmārham amalaṃ viṣayo na girāṃ ca tat //MU_6,37.18//
GSP27moksop_u:33165: yad idaṃ dṛśyate tasyās tal latāyā mahāciteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33168: sā jīvatvaṃ sa bāhyatvaṃ tad advi dvīva paśyati //MU_6,37.20//
GSP27moksop_u:33173: cidvapus svayam evaitad ekato yāti jīvatām /
GSP27moksop_u:33176: bhāvanāt pañcakībhūtā dravyam asmīti vetty alam //MU_6,37.24//
GSP27moksop_u:33177: tad dravyaṃ prāṇinā bhuktam āśu gacchati vīryatām /
GSP27moksop_u:33180: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ yad yad vetti tat tad bhavaty alam //MU_6,37.26//
GSP27moksop_u:33192: saṅkalpayatno gandharvapuryās sṛṣṭau na tu kṣaye //MU_6,37.32//
GSP27moksop_u:33195: yat kiñcid api saṅkalpya naro duḥkhe nimajjati /
GSP27moksop_u:33196: na kiñcid api saṅkalpya sukham akṣayam aśnute //MU_6,37.34//
GSP27moksop_u:33218: bhūmipo 'smīti sañjātā yāvan nāsya hṛdi smṛtiḥ //MU_6,37.45//
GSP27moksop_u:33221: ghanapravāhā yaiva syāc cittehā saiva vardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:33222: ya evoccais svaras tantryās sa evākrāmati śrutim //MU_6,37.47//
GSP27moksop_u:33223: aham eko 'ham ātmā tv ity ekāṃ bhāvaya bhāvanām /
GSP27moksop_u:33224: tayā bhāvanayā yuktas sa eva tvaṃ bhavasy alam //MU_6,37.48//
GSP27moksop_u:33225: evaṃ hy asambhavad idaṃ tv avibhāgabhāsvad brahmatvam uttamapadaṃ param eva devaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33230: itthaṃ sthitam idaṃ viśvaṃ sadasad devarūpi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33232: citeḥ kalaṅkavad rūpam iti saṃsāritāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:33235: etām eva kalāṃ buddhvā svatvābhinnāṃ vimucyate //MU_6,38.3//
GSP27moksop_u:33237: sukhaduḥkhāditāṃ dhatte nasatyāṃ sad iti kṣaṇāt //MU_6,38.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33244: dvitīye 'tha tṛtīye vā pade kim avaśiṣyate //MU_6,38.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33246: samastāstamaye jāte sattā keva kutaś ca kā //MU_6,38.8//
GSP27moksop_u:33261: pāram āsādya viśrāntā ciraśrāntā tate pade //MU_6,38.15//
GSP27moksop_u:33262: etat te manasi kṣīṇe kathitaṃ prathamaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:33263: dvitīyaṃ śṛṇu viprendra śakter asyās supāvanam //MU_6,38.16//
GSP27moksop_u:33270: cetyāṃśonmukhatāṃ nūnaṃ tyajanty ambv iva cāpalam /
GSP27moksop_u:33273: na jaḍāṃ nājaḍāṃ sphārāṃ dhatte sattām anāmikām //MU_6,38.21//
GSP27moksop_u:33278: eṣā dvitīyā padatā kathitā tava suvrata /
GSP27moksop_u:33279: tṛtīyaṃ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi padaṃ padavidāṃ vara //MU_6,38.24//
GSP27moksop_u:33284: sā parāt paramā kāṣṭhā pradhānaṃ śivabhāvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33287: sā mamāpy aṅga vacasāṃ na samāyāti gocaram //MU_6,38.28//
GSP27moksop_u:33289: tiṣṭhaitasmin pade nityam iti devas sanātanaḥ //MU_6,38.29//
GSP27moksop_u:33291: satyasaṃvedanān nedaṃ na ca nedaṃ munīśvara //MU_6,38.30//
GSP27moksop_u:33292: nedaṃ pravartate kiñcin nedaṃ kiñcit nivartate /
GSP27moksop_u:33297: manāg api na bhedo 'sti satām apy asatām iva //MU_6,38.33//
GSP27moksop_u:33298: samastaṃ sac chivaṃ śāntam atītaṃ vāgvilāsataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33299: om ity asya ca tanmātrāt turyāṃśāt param om iti //MU_6,38.34//
GSP27moksop_u:33301: ity uktavān amaladṛk pariṇāmato 'smin sphāre pade samupaśāntaravābhirāmaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33302: tūṣṇīm atiṣṭhad amunā muninā ca sārdhaṃ saṃśāntavṛttir atha tatra muhūrtam īśaḥ //MU_6,38.35//
GSP27moksop_u:33311: niśām anāśayaṃś ceṣad īśo mām āha mānitam //MU_6,39.3//
GSP27moksop_u:33313: tvam artham āharāhāryaṃ pavanas spandatām iva //MU_6,39.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33314: draṣṭavyam iha yat kiñcit tad dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ śamabhramaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33315: na hi heyam upādeyaṃ veha paśyāmi tadvidaḥ //MU_6,39.5//
GSP27moksop_u:33317: vibuddhavān yathāsthityā tvaṃ tvam eva bhavātmadṛk //MU_6,39.6//
GSP27moksop_u:33318: imāṃ dṛśyadaśām āśu bālabodhāya vā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33319: samāśritya maduktaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu tūṣṇīṃsthitena kim //MU_6,39.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33320: ity uktvā bāhyabodhasthaṃ mām avekṣya triśūladhṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:33324: tadātmanām atattvānāṃ śūnyaṃ kham iva bhūruhām //MU_6,39.9//
GSP27moksop_u:33325: citā sañcetyate deho na tu sañcālyate kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:33326: prabhur draṣṭaiva bhavati kartā bhavati karmakṛt //MU_6,39.10//
GSP27moksop_u:33329: cālanī pāvanī śaktiś śaktis saṃvedanī citeḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33330: sāmūrtā khād api svacchā svasattaivātra kāraṇam //MU_6,39.12//
GSP27moksop_u:33332: cidātmā khād api svaccho na vinaśyati kiṃ bhramaiḥ //MU_6,39.13//
GSP27moksop_u:33335: sad apy agragataṃ vastu pratibimbakriyāṃ prati /
GSP27moksop_u:33339: bodhāt kalaṅkavikalā cid eva paramā śivam /
GSP27moksop_u:33341: sa haris sa śivas so 'jas sa brahmā sa sureśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33343: sa eva sarvagātmātmā cit saṃvic cetanas smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33346: ye nāma te jagaty ete brahmaviṣṇuharādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33347: kaṇās taptāyasa iva vāridher iva bindavaḥ //MU_6,39.20//
GSP27moksop_u:33348: teṣv īṣadbhramabhūteṣu jāteṣv iva parāt padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:33352: tatas tv asyā anantāyāḥ prasṛtāyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33361: nityāhūtas sa sarvastho labhyate sarvatas svacit //MU_6,39.27//
GSP27moksop_u:33362: yāṃ yāṃ vastudaśāṃ yāsi tata eva mune śivam /
GSP27moksop_u:33364: ādyaṃ pūjyaṃ namaskāryaṃ stutyam arghyaṃ sureśvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:33365: enaṃ taṃ viddhi vedyānāṃ sīmāntaṃ mahatām api //MU_6,39.29//
GSP27moksop_u:33368: sakalajantuṣu jantupadapradaṃ viditam ādyam upāsya yatavrata /
GSP27moksop_u:33369: tvam ajam ātmamayaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ bhavasi kiṃ parimajjasi dṛṣṭiṣu //MU_6,39.31//
GSP27moksop_u:33376: karmaṇāṃ paramaṃ karma ciddhātuṃ viddhi nirmalam //MU_6,40.2//
GSP27moksop_u:33385: svayaṃ bhavati rāgātmā rañjako rañjanaṃ rajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33386: svayam ākāśam apy āśu kuḍyaṃ bhavati maṇḍitam //MU_6,40.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33390: na kiñcid api sampannam anyad auṣṇyād ivānale //MU_6,40.9//
GSP27moksop_u:33397: kurvann eva mahākarma na karoty eva kiñcana //MU_6,40.13//
GSP27moksop_u:33398: dravyam apy eva nirdravyo nirdravyo 'pi hi dravyavat /
GSP27moksop_u:33400: adyāpy eṣa sadā prātaḥ prātar apy adyatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33401: na cāyam adya na prātas tv adya prātaś ca vā sadā //MU_6,40.15//
GSP27moksop_u:33404: ityādy anarthakaṃ vākyaṃ tathā satyaṃ sa eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33405: na tad asti na yat sa syān na tad asti na yat tv asau //MU_6,40.17//
GSP27moksop_u:33406: yasmai sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33407: yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ //MU_6,40.18//
GSP27moksop_u:33415: kā nāma vimalā bhāsas tasmin paramacinmaṇau /
GSP27moksop_u:33416: na kacanti vicinvanti vicitrāṇi jaganti yāḥ //MU_6,41.2//
GSP27moksop_u:33428: bhāvayitvā nakiñcittvam iva khatvaṃ karoty alam //MU_6,41.8//
GSP27moksop_u:33432: idam ittham idaṃ neti niyatir bhavati svayam //MU_6,41.10//
GSP27moksop_u:33433: sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpa iva kriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33438: śivasyāsya jagannātha śaktayas tāḥ kathaṃ sthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33439: sākṣitā kātha kiṃ tāsāṃ nṛttaṃ syāt kiyad eva vā //MU_6,41.13//
GSP27moksop_u:33444: tathā niyatisattā ca mahāsattā ca suvrata //MU_6,41.15//
GSP27moksop_u:33448: śaktayaḥ kuta etās tā bahutvaṃ katham āsu ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33449: udayaś ca kathaṃ deva bhedābhedaś ca kīdṛśaḥ //MU_6,41.17//
GSP27moksop_u:33452: eṣā hi śaktir ity uktā nāsmād bhinnā manāg api //MU_6,41.18//
GSP27moksop_u:33460: yā sā paramparaitāsām eṣā niyatir ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:33484: asmin vikāravalite niyater vilāse saṃsāranāmni ciranāṭakanāṭyasāre /
GSP27moksop_u:33485: sākṣī sadoditavapuḥ parameśvaro 'yam ekas sthito na ca tayā na ca tena bhinnaḥ //MU_6,41.34//
GSP27moksop_u:33489: eṣa devas sa paramaḥ pūjya eṣa sadā satām /
GSP27moksop_u:33491: ghaṭe paṭe vaṭe kuḍye śakaṭe vānare sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33492: śivo haro harir brahmā śakro vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ //MU_6,42.2//
GSP27moksop_u:33493: bahir antaś ca sarvātmā sadā svātmā subuddhibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33496: yena taṃ śṛṇu tattvajña śroṣyasy antaḥkramaṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33498: pūjanaṃ dhyānam evātra dhyānam evātra pūjanam /
GSP27moksop_u:33524: iti sañcintya deveśam arcayed vidhivat tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33527: na dīpena na dhūpena na puṣpavibhavārpaṇaiḥ //MU_6,42.19//
GSP27moksop_u:33529: na ca kuṅkumakarpūrair bhogaiś citrair na cetaraiḥ //MU_6,42.20//
GSP27moksop_u:33532: etad eva paraṃ dhyānaṃ pūjaiṣaiva parā smṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:33534: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan /
GSP27moksop_u:33539: dhyānam arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca śuddhasaṃvedanātmakam //MU_6,42.25//
GSP27moksop_u:33540: dhyānasaṃvedanaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ paraṃ viduḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33541: vinā tenetareṇāyam ātmā labhyata eva no //MU_6,42.26//
GSP27moksop_u:33543: ayam ātmā mune bhuṅkte dehe bhūpo gṛhe yathā //MU_6,42.27//
GSP27moksop_u:33545: pūrṇo 'pi pūjayatv īśaṃ gopradānaṃ labheta vai //MU_6,42.28//
GSP27moksop_u:33546: pūjayitvā nimeṣāṇāṃ śatam ekam iti prabhum /
GSP27moksop_u:33549: ghaṭikāṃ pūjayed yas tu rājasūyaṃ labheta saḥ //MU_6,42.30//
