GSP27moksop_u:33551: divasaṃ pūjayitvaivaṃ pare dhāmni vasen naraḥ //MU_6,42.31//
GSP27moksop_u:33552: eṣo 'sau paramo yoga eṣā sā paramā kriyā /
GSP27moksop_u:33554: etat pavitram akhilāghavināśahetuṃ yas tv ācariṣyati naraḥ kṣaṇam apy akhinnaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33555: taṃ vandayiṣyati surāsuralokapūgaḥ prāptāspadaṃ jagati mām iva lokasāram //MU_6,42.33//
GSP27moksop_u:33559: pāvanaṃ pāvanānāṃ yad yat sarvatamasāṃ kṣayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33561: gacchatas tiṣṭhataś caiva jāgratas svapato 'pi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:33563: nityam eva śarīrastham idaṃ dhyāyet paraṃ śivam /
GSP27moksop_u:33565: śayānam utthitaṃ caiva vrajantam atha vā sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:33566: spṛśantam abhitas sparśāṃs tyajantam atha vābhitaḥ //MU_6,43.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33589: vikalpiny avikalpe ca trividhe vākpathe sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:33590: tile tailam ivāṅgeṣu sarveṣv evāntar āśritam //MU_6,43.16//
GSP27moksop_u:33600: upāsate māṃ mānasyaḥ patnyo varam ivottamam //MU_6,43.21//
GSP27moksop_u:33604: jñānāni ca vicitrāṇi bhūṣaṇāny aṅgagāni me //MU_6,43.23//
GSP27moksop_u:33610: nāstam eti na codeti na tuṣyati na tapyate //MU_6,43.26//
GSP27moksop_u:33611: na tṛptiṃ na kṣudhaṃ yāti nābhivāñchati nojjhati /
GSP27moksop_u:33629: sīmāntais sampadāṃ caiva ceṣṭānāṃ jagatas sthiteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33638: tyāgena vātha rāgeṇa svātmānaṃ buddham arcayet //MU_6,43.40//
GSP27moksop_u:33641: naṣṭaṃ naṣṭam upekṣeta prāptaṃ prāptam upāharet /
GSP27moksop_u:33645: sarvaṃ vindeta suśubhaṃ sarvaṃ vindyāc ca vāśubham /
GSP27moksop_u:33648: tat sarvaṃ susamaṃ buddhvā nityātmārcāvrataṃ caret //MU_6,43.45//
GSP27moksop_u:33649: ayaṃ so 'ham ayaṃ nāhaṃ vibhāgam iti santyajet /
GSP27moksop_u:33653: na vāñchatā na tyajatā jñena prāptās svabhāvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33661: nāmblā na kaṭvyo no tiktā na kaṣāyāś ca kāścana /
GSP27moksop_u:33662: citrair api rasair digdhā madhurā eva tāś citaḥ //MU_6,43.52//
GSP27moksop_u:33664: tayā yad bhāvitaṃ cetyam amṛtaṃ tat kṣaṇād bhavet //MU_6,43.53//
GSP27moksop_u:33666: tat tad āyāti mādhuryaṃ param indor iva cyutam //MU_6,43.54//
GSP27moksop_u:33667: samam ākāśavad bhūtvā yad ahṛllekham āsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:33676: samyakpraśāntamaticetanacittajīvaṃ jīvañ jña uttamapadasthita eva tiṣṭha //MU_6,43.59//
GSP27moksop_u:33682: yathākāmaṃ yathārambhaṃ na karoṣi karoṣi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:33689: ātmīyaṃ parakīyaṃ ca tat tad arcanam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,44.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33690: viddhi saṃvittim evārcāṃ vetty ātmātmānam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33692: śivaṃ śāntam anābhāsam ekaṃ bhāsuram ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:33694: aho nu citram ātmaiva ghaṭādy anyad avasthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:33695: jīvādis svastha evāntar nūnaṃ vismṛtavān iva //MU_6,44.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33705: asmākam upadeśyās te na vipaścid vipaścitaḥ //MU_6,44.12//
GSP27moksop_u:33706: tadīyāṃ dṛṣṭim utsṛjya tathemām avalambya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33710: adhigatavati sādhāv evam evāśu nūnaṃ tvayi taralitajīvaṃ janmaduḥkhādi kiñcit /
GSP27moksop_u:33711: na lagati pariśuddhe sarvatas sphāṭikāṅge navasadana ivāntar niṣkalaṅke kalaṅkaḥ //MU_6,44.15//
GSP27moksop_u:33715: śivaḥ kim ucyate deva paraṃ brahma kim ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:33716: ātmā kim ucyate vāpi paramātmā kim ucyate //MU_6,45.1//
GSP27moksop_u:33717: tat sat kiñcin nakiñcic ca śūnyaṃ vijñānam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33720: anādyantam anābhāsaṃ sat kiñcid iha vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:33721: indriyāṇām anābhāsād yan nakiñcid iva sthitam //MU_6,45.3//
GSP27moksop_u:33724: gataṃ tat katham īśāna vada kenāvagamyate //MU_6,45.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33726: yo mumukṣur avidyāṃśaḥ kevalaṃ nāma sāttvikaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33732: yathā kathañcid aṅgāraṃ nighṛṣya kṣālayañ śiśuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33734: yathā kathañcic chāstrāḍhyair bhāgair bhāgaṃ vicārayan /
GSP27moksop_u:33735: sāttvikais tāmasaṃ nāśād dvayor ātmodayas tathā //MU_6,45.9//
GSP27moksop_u:33741: yad vastu yatkṣayaprāpyaṃ tat tasmin sati nāpyate //MU_6,45.12//
GSP27moksop_u:33742: akāraṇā api prāptā bhṛśaṃ kāraṇatāṃ dvija /
GSP27moksop_u:33746: śāstrārthair budhyate nātmā guror vācā na cānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:33753: śiva ātmeti kathitas tat sad ityādināmabhiḥ //MU_6,45.18//
GSP27moksop_u:33754: yatredam akhilaṃ nāsti tadrūpeṇaiva cāsti vā /
GSP27moksop_u:33755: tad ākāśād acchataram anantaṃ sad ihāsti hi //MU_6,45.19//
GSP27moksop_u:33763: ekasmin kalpitās sañjñā nissañjñe pṛthag īśvare //MU_6,45.23//
GSP27moksop_u:33764: evam etaj jagattattvaṃ svaṃ tattvaṃ śivanāmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:33765: sarvathā sarvadā sarveṇārcayan sukham āssva bhoḥ //MU_6,45.24//
GSP27moksop_u:33767: savāsanair viracitā jñasya bhedo na vastuni //MU_6,45.25//
GSP27moksop_u:33768: evaṃ devārcanaṃ kurvañ jño nityaṃ munināyaka /
GSP27moksop_u:33769: yatrāsmadādayo bhṛtyās tat prayāti paraṃ padam //MU_6,45.26//
GSP27moksop_u:33772: yathā tan me samāsena bhagavan vaktum arhasi //MU_6,45.27//
GSP27moksop_u:33775: svaccham ākāśam apy asyās sthūlaṃ merur aṇor iva //MU_6,45.28//
GSP27moksop_u:33781: sampadyante svayaṃ śūnyarūpiṇyas sakhya eva tāḥ //MU_6,45.31//
GSP27moksop_u:33793: paścād iva sahaivāsya prodyanty anuditā api //MU_6,45.37//
GSP27moksop_u:33795: tvaksattā taijasī sattā tathā sattā prakāśinī //MU_6,45.38//
GSP27moksop_u:33796: dṛksattā jalasattā ca svādasattā tathāpi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33797: tathaiva rasasattā ca gandhasattā tathaiva ca //MU_6,45.39//
GSP27moksop_u:33798: bhūsattā dehasattā ca piṇḍasattā ca pīvarī /
GSP27moksop_u:33804: etad yad aṅgasampannaṃ sampannaṃ tan na kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:33805: na jātaṃ na ca sadrūpaṃ na cidādi na cetarat //MU_6,45.43//
GSP27moksop_u:33806: pare paraṃ prasphurati kevalaṃ kevalātma sat /
GSP27moksop_u:33811: ajātam eva vā yat tat kathaṃ gacchati vastutām //MU_6,45.46//
GSP27moksop_u:33812: athaitad vindate svāntaṃ saṅkalpād aṇutāṃ svataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33817: kākatālīyavad dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭaṃ puṣṭaṃ bhavaty alam //MU_6,45.49//
GSP27moksop_u:33822: jagad duḥkhāya duḥkhasya kātra yuktiḥ parikṣaye //MU_6,45.51//
GSP27moksop_u:33824: vāsanāvaśato duḥkhaṃ vidyamāne ca sā bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:33826: ataḥ kiṃ vāsyate kena kasya vā vāsanā kutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33829: avidyamāne jagati yat sat tat pariśiṣyate //MU_6,45.54//
GSP27moksop_u:33830: yatra no vāsanā naiva vāsakaṃ na ca vāsyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:33832: yasya satyo 'py asatyo vā śūnya eva hi yakṣakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33833: vilīnas tasya kaivalyāt kim anyad avaśiṣyate //MU_6,45.56//
GSP27moksop_u:33834: śūnya eva hi vetāla ivetthaṃ cittavāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:33836: ahantāyāṃ jagati ca mṛgatṛṣṇājale ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33837: sāsthas taṃ cidghanataraṃ nopadeśyas tv asāv iti //MU_6,45.58//
GSP27moksop_u:33838: jīvaṃ vivekinam ihopadiśanti tajjñā no bālam udbhramam asanmayam āryamuktam /
GSP27moksop_u:33839: ajñān praśāsti kila yaḥ kanakāvadātāṃ sa svapnadṛṣṭapuruṣāya sutāṃ dadāti //MU_6,45.59//
GSP27moksop_u:33843: tatas sa jīvo bhagavan dṛṣṭavān dehasambhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:33844: ādisarge nabhassaṃsthaḥ kām avasthām upaiti hi //MU_6,46.1//
GSP27moksop_u:33849: yathā karoty āśu tathā jīvasyāpi śarīradṛk //MU_6,46.3//
GSP27moksop_u:33850: sanātano 'ham avyaktaḥ pumān ity abhidhās tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33851: karoty ātmani tenāsau prathamaḥ kathitaḥ pumān //MU_6,46.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33852: evaṃ sa sarge kasmiṃścit prathamo 'rthas sadāśivaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33854: pitāmahas sa kasmiṃścit kasmiṃścid api cetaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33855: sa ca saṅkalpapuruṣas saṅkalpān mūrtimān sthitaḥ //MU_6,46.6//
GSP27moksop_u:33857: yad yathā kalpayaty āśu tat tathānubhavaty alam //MU_6,46.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33858: tat tv asadrūpam akhilaṃ śūnye vetālako yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:33860: sraṣṭādipuruṣas tv evaṃ svayaṃ sampadyate hi yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33861: sa nimeṣaṃ prati vyomni samudety atha līyate //MU_6,46.9//
GSP27moksop_u:33864: paramāṇau paramāṇau vyomni vyomni kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
GSP27moksop_u:33867: mithaḥ kecin na dṛśyante kecit paśyanti netaram //MU_6,46.12//
GSP27moksop_u:33869: sargās sargeṇa sarvatra sambhavanti na te śive //MU_6,46.13//
GSP27moksop_u:33870: bhavanti parame vyomni vyomarūpā iti svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:33872: sargair na deśa ākrānto na ca kālo na kartṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:33873: na caite satsvarūpā vā na kalpaṃ naiva ca kṣaṇam //MU_6,46.15//
GSP27moksop_u:33874: na cedaṃ jāyate kiñcin na ca kiñcana naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:33882: tasthuṣām evam eveha jātayo hi caturvidhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33885: eṣa eva kramas teṣāṃ sati cāsati sargake //MU_6,46.21//
GSP27moksop_u:33889: svarūpataś cel luṭhitā tad eṣodety avasthitiḥ //MU_6,46.23//
GSP27moksop_u:33890: sā jñarūpā śilākośa iva cet svātmani sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:33892: asmin prauḍhiṃ gate sarge mahācic cetanaṃ navam /
GSP27moksop_u:33896: yasmin nitye tate tantau dṛḍhe srag iva tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:33898: na tad dūre na nikaṭe nordhve nādho na te na me /
GSP27moksop_u:33899: na pūrvaṃ nādya na prātar na san nāsan na madhyagam //MU_6,46.28//
GSP27moksop_u:33900: anubhavakalanād ṛte 'sya mātā bhavati na sarvavikalpaneṣu satsu /
GSP27moksop_u:33901: phaladuruvibhavā pramāṇamālā sthitim upayāti na vāriṇīva vahniḥ //MU_6,46.29//
GSP27moksop_u:33902: yathāpṛṣṭaṃ mune proktaṃ tvayi kalyāṇam astu te /
GSP27moksop_u:33906: tasmin gate tribhuvanādhipatāv umeśe sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ tadanu saṃsmṛtipūrvam eva /
GSP27moksop_u:33907: aṅgīkṛtaṃ navapavitratayā mayātmadarbhāsanaṃ śramavateva mahāśrutaṃ tat //MU_6,46.32//
GSP27moksop_u:33912: etad uktaṃ pareśena svayam eva ca vedmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:33913: rāma tvam api jānīṣe yathedaṃ samavasthitam //MU_6,47.1//
GSP27moksop_u:33915: tasyāṃ saṃsāramāyāyāṃ kiṃ satyaṃ kim asanmayam //MU_6,47.2//
GSP27moksop_u:33918: yathā dravatvaṃ payasi yathā spando nabhasvati /
GSP27moksop_u:33919: yathā nabhasi śūnyatvaṃ tathā sargatvam ātmani //MU_6,47.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33921: adya yāvad gatavyagraḥ kurvann aham avasthitaḥ //MU_6,47.5//
GSP27moksop_u:33925: vyucchinnam apy ucchinnaṃ me na kadācid aharniśam //MU_6,47.7//
GSP27moksop_u:33927: yoginas sāvadhānatvaṃ yat tad arcanam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,47.8//
GSP27moksop_u:33931: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya vicāraṃ kuru suvrata //MU_6,47.10//
GSP27moksop_u:33935: yathā yānti yathāyānti yathā paribhavanti ca //MU_6,47.12//
GSP27moksop_u:33936: evam eva pravartante premāṇi ca dhanāni ca /
GSP27moksop_u:33938: na tās tava na tāsāṃ tvaṃ nirmalas tvaṃ jagatkriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33939: idam itthaṃ jagat kiñcit kiṃ mudhā paritapyase //MU_6,47.14//
GSP27moksop_u:33946: etat tvaṃ śrutavān sarvaṃ sthitas tvaṃ paripūrṇadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33949: yat pṛṣṭaṃ prathame kalpe tad adya paricodaya //MU_6,47.19//
GSP27moksop_u:33952: jñātaṃ jñātavyam akhilaṃ jātā tṛptir akṛtrimā //MU_6,47.20//
GSP27moksop_u:33953: nātmano 'sti malaṃ dvitvaṃ na caikyaṃ na ca kalpanā /
GSP27moksop_u:33954: tadā mamābhūd ajñānaṃ praśāntam adhunā tu tat //MU_6,47.21//
GSP27moksop_u:33956: āsīd bhrāntir idānīṃ sā nivṛttā tvatprasādataḥ //MU_6,47.22//
GSP27moksop_u:33957: na jāyate na mriyate na caivātmā kalaṅkitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33958: sarvaṃ ca brahmamayam ity uditaḥ khalu cāsmy aham //MU_6,47.23//
GSP27moksop_u:33959: praśnebhyas saṃśayebhyaś ca vāñchitebhyaś ca sarvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:33960: śuddhaṃ me nirgataṃ cetas tvaṣṭā yantrabhramād iva //MU_6,47.24//
GSP27moksop_u:33962: nirākāṅkṣas sthito 'smy antas sumeruḥ kanakeṣv iva //MU_6,47.25//
GSP27moksop_u:33963: na tad asty asti yatrāśā na tad asti yad īpsitam /
GSP27moksop_u:33964: na tad asti yad ādeyaṃ heyaṃ madhyaṃ ca vā mama //MU_6,47.26//
GSP27moksop_u:33965: idaṃ heyam upādeyam idaṃ sad idam apy asat /
GSP27moksop_u:33966: iti cintābhramaś śānto nipuṇaṃ paramo mune //MU_6,47.27//
GSP27moksop_u:33967: na svargam abhivāñchāmi dveṣmi vā na ca rauravam /
GSP27moksop_u:33968: ātmany eva hi tiṣṭhāmi mandarādrir ivābhramaḥ //MU_6,47.28//
GSP27moksop_u:33971: avastv idam idaṃ vastu yasyeti kalanāmalam /
GSP27moksop_u:33973: idam itthaṃ jagad iti jñātaṃ yena munīśvara /
GSP27moksop_u:33974: sa yatra yāti kārpaṇyaṃ jagatas tan na labhyate //MU_6,47.31//
GSP27moksop_u:33977: sampadām avadhir jñāto dṛṣṭas sīmānta āpadām /
GSP27moksop_u:33978: sarvasāreṣv adīnās smaḥ pūrṇās smaḥ parameśvarāḥ //MU_6,47.33//
GSP27moksop_u:33982: trijagati jayati prasiddharūpaṃ pramuditam antar anuttaraṃ mano me //MU_6,47.35//
GSP27moksop_u:33987: asaṅgamena manasā yat karoṣi na tat kṛtam //MU_6,48.1//
GSP27moksop_u:33988: yathā prāptikṣaṇe vastu prathamaṃ tuṣṭaye tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:33989: na prāptyekakṣaṇād ūrdhvam iti ko nānubhūtavān //MU_6,48.2//
GSP27moksop_u:33990: vāñchākāle yathā vastu tuṣṭaye nānyadā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:33991: tasmāt kṣaṇasukhe tuṣṭiṃ bālo badhnāti netaraḥ //MU_6,48.3//
GSP27moksop_u:33992: vāñchākṣaṇe tuṣṭaye yat tatra vāñchaiva kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:33993: tuṣṭis tv atuṣṭiparyantā tasmād vāñchāṃ parityaja //MU_6,48.4//
GSP27moksop_u:33994: yadi tat padam āpnoṣi kadācit kālaparyayāt /
GSP27moksop_u:33995: tad ahambhāvanārūpe na maṅktavyaṃ tvayā punaḥ //MU_6,48.5//
GSP27moksop_u:34002: svabhāvo 'yaṃ sthiro rāma ity āvedayatīva me /
GSP27moksop_u:34004: āśā yātu nirāśatvam abhāvaṃ yātu bhāvanā /
GSP27moksop_u:34006: yāṃ yāṃ vastudṛśaṃ yāsi tasyāṃ tasyām avasthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:34009: rāma tvaṃ svātmanātmānaṃ bodhayasva balād ataḥ //MU_6,48.12//
GSP27moksop_u:34010: yatra na svadate vastu svadate ca yathāgatam /
GSP27moksop_u:34013: na vikriyām avāpnoṣi khavat kṣobhaśatair api //MU_6,48.14//
GSP27moksop_u:34014: jñātā jñānaṃ tathā jñeyaṃ trayam ekatayātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:34023: tathā citā cetyatayā spandād idam upasthitam //MU_6,48.19//
GSP27moksop_u:34031: citte nisspandatāṃ yāte kutas spandasya sambhavaḥ //MU_6,48.23//
GSP27moksop_u:34033: prāṇānāṃ vā nirodhena tad eva ca paraṃ padam //MU_6,48.24//
GSP27moksop_u:34036: yatra nābhyuditaṃ cittaṃ tat tat sukham akṛtrimam /
GSP27moksop_u:34037: na svargādau sambhavati marau himagṛhaṃ yathā //MU_6,48.26//
GSP27moksop_u:34042: vidyamānam api hy etac cittaṃ bodhād vilīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34043: sad apy asad ivābhāti tāmraṃ hemīkṛtaṃ yathā //MU_6,48.29//
GSP27moksop_u:34044: jñasya cittaṃ na cittākhyaṃ jñacittaṃ sattvam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34046: na sambhavati cittatvaṃ tena tat pravilīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34047: bhramaś śāmyati bodhena nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ //MU_6,48.31//
GSP27moksop_u:34049: sarvatvād ātmanas tasmāt tad vibodhād vilīyate //MU_6,48.32//
GSP27moksop_u:34050: cittaṃ sattvaṃ samāyātaṃ kañcit kālaṃ jagatsthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:34052: brahmaiva bhūribhuvanabhramavibhramaughair itthaṃ sthitaṃ samam anekatayaikam eva /
GSP27moksop_u:34053: sarvātma sambhavati netarad aṅga kiñcic caittādi kāñcanahṛdīva hi sanniveśaḥ //MU_6,48.34//
GSP27moksop_u:34058: apūrvām eva saṅkṣepād rāma ramyāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu //MU_6,49.1//
GSP27moksop_u:34060: yugair apy ajaradrūpam asti bilvaphalaṃ mahat //MU_6,49.2//
GSP27moksop_u:34070: yasyātiśete no kaścid api rāghava ṣaḍrasaḥ //MU_6,49.7//
GSP27moksop_u:34071: na kadācana pākena pātāntena sameti yat /
GSP27moksop_u:34072: sadaiva pakvam apy aṅga jarasā yan na bādhyate //MU_6,49.8//
GSP27moksop_u:34074: yasyotpattiṃ vijānanti mūlaṃ vā vṛkṣam eva vā //MU_6,49.9//
GSP27moksop_u:34085: tasmāt paramamajjā tu yāsau svādvī camatkṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34090: bhedādy asambhavad idaṃ svayam utpādya bhāvitam //MU_6,49.17//
GSP27moksop_u:34094: majjā prāksanniveśaṃ svaṃ tam evāpy asamujjhatī //MU_6,49.19//
GSP27moksop_u:34096: nija eva pare rūpe dṛg itthaṃ samprasāritā //MU_6,49.20//
GSP27moksop_u:34101: iyaṃ tvattā tv iyaṃ mattā tatteyaṃ saṃsthitis tv iyam /
GSP27moksop_u:34102: brahmāṇḍaugho 'yam ūrdhvasthas tv ayam agre 'yam apy adhaḥ //MU_6,49.23//
GSP27moksop_u:34103: ayaṃ puraḥ pārśvato 'yaṃ paścād ārād davīyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:34104: idaṃ bhūtaṃ vartamānaṃ bhaviṣyat tv idam ity api //MU_6,49.24//
GSP27moksop_u:34123: iti sā tasya bilvasya nijā majjācamatkṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34126: kartṛtvam apy akartṛtvaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvaiva saṃsthitā //MU_6,49.35//
GSP27moksop_u:34127: ekaikikaiva vividheva vibhāvyamānā naikātmikā na vividhā nanu saiva saiva /
GSP27moksop_u:34128: satyāsthitā sakalaśāntisamaikarūpā sarvātmikātimahatī citir eva śaktiḥ //MU_6,49.36//
GSP27moksop_u:34142: varṇyamānāṃ mayā ramyām anyām ākhyāyikāṃ śṛṇu //MU_6,50.5//
GSP27moksop_u:34145: tasyām antaḥ praphultāni padmāni subahūny api /
GSP27moksop_u:34148: teṣāṃ ca nikaṭe santi śaṅkhāś śatasahasraśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34151: satyam etan mayā dṛṣṭā tādṛśī sā mahāśilā /
GSP27moksop_u:34154: evam etad vijānāsi dṛṣṭavān asi tāś śilāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34155: yo yaś ca tatra pāṣāṇas sa sarvas tādṛgantaraḥ //MU_6,50.10//
GSP27moksop_u:34156: mayā tv iyam apūrvaiva śileyaṃ varṇyate tava /
GSP27moksop_u:34157: yasyām antar mahākukṣau sarvam asti ca nāsti ca //MU_6,50.11//
GSP27moksop_u:34158: cicchilaiṣā mayoktā te yasyām antar jaganti khe /
GSP27moksop_u:34162: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ākāśaṃ parvatās sarito diśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34163: santi tasyāṃ śilā sā ca suṣirā na manāg api //MU_6,50.14//
GSP27moksop_u:34165: etasmād vastuno nānyad anyac ca dvyātmakaṃ ca vā //MU_6,50.15//
GSP27moksop_u:34167: tathāsti tatra tat sarvaṃ saṃsthānaṃ vastuno yathā //MU_6,50.16//
GSP27moksop_u:34169: yathā dhatte tathaiṣā cit piṇḍākāraikikā ghanā //MU_6,50.17//
GSP27moksop_u:34171: tathā sargaś cito rūpād abhinno 'pi vapurmayaḥ //MU_6,50.18//
GSP27moksop_u:34173: yathā sthitāś citer antas tatheyaṃ jagadāvalī //MU_6,50.19//
GSP27moksop_u:34175: nodeti nāstam āyāti yathā sargas tathā citau //MU_6,50.20//
GSP27moksop_u:34180: anantatvāc citer etad vikārādi citer iti /
GSP27moksop_u:34181: uktyā sampadyate tac ca tallayena vilīyate //MU_6,50.23//
GSP27moksop_u:34187: tādṛśī bījasattā sā bhavitrī yā tathottaram //MU_6,50.26//
GSP27moksop_u:34188: cidghane cidghanatvaṃ yat sa eva trijagatkramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34189: ekatvam anayor dvitvam ekābhāve dvayoḥ kṣatiḥ //MU_6,50.27//
GSP27moksop_u:34191: cid acin na kadācin na dvayam etan mitho dvayam //MU_6,50.28//
GSP27moksop_u:34194: yathā śilāntar lekhādi bhidyate na śilāṅgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34197: viṣayatvaṃ na gacchanti kartāro jagatas tathā //MU_6,50.31//
GSP27moksop_u:34198: nedaṃ kadācit kriyate na kadācana naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:34200: yathā yatra yadākāraṃ tathā tatra tad eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:34203: suṣuptam eva tad viddhi śilāntaḥ paṅkajādivat //MU_6,50.34//
GSP27moksop_u:34204: nityaṃ suṣuptapadam eva jagadvilāsas somya praśāntasamacidghanakhātmakatvāt /
GSP27moksop_u:34205: padmāś śilāta iva sargadaśās svasārād dṛṣṭyā na bhedam upayānti kayācid eva //MU_6,50.35//
GSP27moksop_u:34210: svasattāsanniveśo 'ntar yas sa sarga iti sthitaḥ //MU_6,51.1//
GSP27moksop_u:34212: idam anyad idaṃ cānyad iti nātropapadyate //MU_6,51.2//
GSP27moksop_u:34217: yathā phalāntas svā sattā cidantaś ciccayas tathā //MU_6,51.5//
GSP27moksop_u:34227: na vyaktaṃ nānabhivyaktaṃ trijagad vartate citi //MU_6,51.10//
GSP27moksop_u:34231: anānaiva ca nānā cic chilāntas sanniveśavat //MU_6,51.12//
GSP27moksop_u:34232: yad asti tac citi śilāśarīre sālabhañjikā /
GSP27moksop_u:34233: yan nāsti tac citi śilāśarīre sālabhañjikā //MU_6,51.13//
GSP27moksop_u:34234: bhāvābhāveṣu yat satyaṃ cinmajjaujjvalyam eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:34235: majjasārā padārthaśrīs tanmayaṃ syāt tad eva hi //MU_6,51.14//
GSP27moksop_u:34237: nānā tadvad idaṃ nānā tadatanmayam advayam //MU_6,51.15//
GSP27moksop_u:34241: sann evāsann ivaivaṃ cinnaibiḍyaṃ sad asat tv iva //MU_6,51.17//
GSP27moksop_u:34248: patatīdaṃ jagadbrahma somyam ambha iva druteḥ //MU_6,51.21//
GSP27moksop_u:34250: majjabilvam iva brahma jagad brahmaiva vāmalam //MU_6,51.22//
GSP27moksop_u:34251: yathā śūnyatvam ākāśe dravatvaṃ cāmbhasi sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:34252: spandatvaṃ ca yathā vāyau brahmaṇīdaṃ tathā jagat //MU_6,51.23//
GSP27moksop_u:34253: brahmatvaṃ brahmaṇi yathā tathaivedaṃ jagat sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:34255: yāny etāni jagantīha tāny antrāṇi cidākṛteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34256: bhāvābhāvādi nāsty eṣāṃ tasyā iva kadācana //MU_6,51.25//
GSP27moksop_u:34260: paramāṇuvibhāgena yad rūpaṃ tat paraṃ viduḥ //MU_6,51.27//
GSP27moksop_u:34262: yat saukṣmye 'pi hi sārātma sthaulye sārataraṃ hi tat //MU_6,51.28//
GSP27moksop_u:34277: yatas sadasatos sattā sattvatāyā yatas sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34278: yatas tadatado rūpaṃ bhāvaṃ svaṃ viddhi tat param //MU_6,51.36//
GSP27moksop_u:34281: yathā jagati cittattvaṃ cittattve ca jagat tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:34284: mayūrarūpaṃ tv amayūram atra sattāpadaṃ viddhi kuto 'sti bhedaḥ //MU_6,51.39//
GSP27moksop_u:34289: mayūra iva bījāntas tad ahantvam agādi ca //MU_6,52.1//
GSP27moksop_u:34290: tatra nābhyuditaṃ kiñcit tatra sarvaṃ ca vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34291: tad avācyaṃ girāṃ svargasukhasāre na vidyate //MU_6,52.2//
GSP27moksop_u:34292: tathā ca munayo devā gaṇās siddhā maharṣayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34293: āsvādayantas svaṃ rūpaṃ sadā tūryapade sthitāḥ //MU_6,52.3//
GSP27moksop_u:34296: na sthitā bhāvanā yeṣāṃ sthitānām api karmasu /
GSP27moksop_u:34298: prāṇo na spandate teṣāṃ citrasthavapuṣām iva /
GSP27moksop_u:34300: spandāt saṃsādhayanty arthaṃ senās seneśvaraṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:34304: bimbād dūraṃ prayātasya bhittāv apatitasya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:34305: yad indos tejaso rūpaṃ tad rūpaṃ śuddhasaṃvidaḥ //MU_6,52.9//
GSP27moksop_u:34306: na dṛśyaṃ nopadeśārhaṃ nābhyāśe na ca dūrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34308: na deho nendriyagaṇo na cittaṃ na ca vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:34309: na jīvo nāpi ca spando na saṃvittir na caiva kham //MU_6,52.11//
GSP27moksop_u:34310: na san nāsan na madhyasthaṃ śūnyāśūnye na caiva ha /
GSP27moksop_u:34311: na deśakālavastvādi sa evāsti na cetarat //MU_6,52.12//
GSP27moksop_u:34312: etais sarvair vinirmuktaṃ hṛdi kośagate 'pi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:34313: yatraitat spandate 'dṛśyaṃ tat tad ātmapadaṃ bhavet //MU_6,52.13//
GSP27moksop_u:34314: tac ca nādya na kalpānte na śastrāgnyanilādibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34315: neha nāmutra sadrūpād anyathā bhavati kvacit //MU_6,52.14//
GSP27moksop_u:34316: jāyante ca mriyante ca dehakumbhās sahasraśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34318: tac ca dehādi sakalam ātmaivātmavidāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:34320: viṣvag ātmamayaṃ śuddhaṃ buddhvā buddhyā svasiddhayā /
GSP27moksop_u:34321: prajvalann api kāryeṣu nirvāṇo nirmamo bhava //MU_6,52.17//
GSP27moksop_u:34322: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:34323: tat sarvaṃ brahma nirdharma nirguṇaṃ nirmamātmakam //MU_6,52.18//
GSP27moksop_u:34327: brahmeti dṛṣṭavata eva tavātmadṛṣṭyā bhūyo 'pi kiṃ bhramaṇam aṅga sasaṅgam eva //MU_6,52.20//
GSP27moksop_u:34331: yadi nāsti vikārādi brahman brahmaṇi bṛṃhite /
GSP27moksop_u:34332: tad idaṃ katham ābhāti bhāvābhāvamayaṃ jagat //MU_6,53.1//
GSP27moksop_u:34335: tad vikārādi kathitaṃ yat kṣīrādiṣu vidyate //MU_6,53.2//
GSP27moksop_u:34336: payastāṃ punar abhyeti dadhitvān na punaḥ payaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34338: kṣīrāder iva tenāsti brahmaṇo na vikāritā /
GSP27moksop_u:34341: saṃvidas taṃ bhramaṃ viddhi nāvikāre 'sti vikriyā //MU_6,53.5//
GSP27moksop_u:34342: saṃvedye sati saṃvittis tan na brahmaṇi vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34344: yādṛg ādyantayor vastu tādṛg eva tad ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34345: madhye tasya yad anyatvaṃ tad abodhavijṛmbhitam //MU_6,53.7//
GSP27moksop_u:34346: ātmā tv ādyantamadhyeṣu samas sarvatra sarvadā /
GSP27moksop_u:34347: kham apy anyatvam āyāti nātmatattvaṃ kadācana //MU_6,53.8//
GSP27moksop_u:34354: brahmatattvam idaṃ sarvam āsīd asti bhaviṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:34356: yas tu brahmeti śabdena vācyavācakayoḥ kramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34357: tatrāpi nānyatābhāva upadeṣṭuṃ kṛto hy asau //MU_6,53.12//
GSP27moksop_u:34358: tvam ahaṃ jagad āśāś ca bhūḥ kham agnyanilādi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:34361: na vidyate yā tasyā hi kīdṛṅ nāma bhaviṣyati //MU_6,53.14//
GSP27moksop_u:34364: avidyeyaṃ tathetthaṃ ca nirdhāryata iti prabho //MU_6,53.15//
GSP27moksop_u:34366: etāvantam abuddhas tvam abhūḥ kālaṃ raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:34370: aprabuddhaṃ mano yāvat tāvad eva bhramaṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:34371: na prabodham upāyāti tāvad varṣaśatair api //MU_6,53.18//
GSP27moksop_u:34373: yad yuktyā sādhyate kāryaṃ na tad yatnaśatair api //MU_6,53.19//
GSP27moksop_u:34374: sarvaṃ brahmeti yo brūyād aprabuddhasya durmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34376: yuktyā prabodhyate mūḍhaḥ prājñas tattvena bodhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34377: mūḍhaḥ prājñatvam āyāti na yuktyā bodhanaṃ vinā //MU_6,53.21//
GSP27moksop_u:34378: etāvantam abuddhas tvaṃ kālaṃ yuktyā prabodhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34380: brahmāhaṃ trijagad brahma brahma tvaṃ brahma dṛśyabhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34381: dvitīyā kalpanā nāsti yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_6,53.23//
GSP27moksop_u:34383: evaṃ pratyayavān antaḥ kurvann api na lipyase //MU_6,53.24//
GSP27moksop_u:34384: bhārūpaś cetano vyāpī paramātmāham ity alam /
GSP27moksop_u:34385: rāghavānubhavāntas tvaṃ tiṣṭhan gacchan svapañ śvasan //MU_6,53.25//
GSP27moksop_u:34386: nirmamo nirahaṅkāro buddhimān asi rāma cet /
GSP27moksop_u:34388: tad anādyantam ābhāsi sattvam eva paraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:34390: yad brahmātmā vibhur yaś ca yāvidyā prakṛtiś ca yā /
GSP27moksop_u:34391: tad abhinnaṃ sadaikātma yathā kumbhaśateṣu mṛt //MU_6,53.28//
GSP27moksop_u:34392: nātmanaḥ prakṛtir bhinnā ghaṭān mṛṇmayatā yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:34393: spandamātraṃ yathā vāyur ātmaiva prakṛtis tathā //MU_6,53.29//
GSP27moksop_u:34394: āvartas salilasyeva yas spandas svayam ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34395: proktaḥ prakṛtiśabdena tenaiveha sa eva hi //MU_6,53.30//
GSP27moksop_u:34396: yathaikaṃ spandapavanau nāmnā bhinnau na sattayā /
GSP27moksop_u:34397: tathaikam ātmaprakṛtī nāmnā bhinne na sattayā //MU_6,53.31//
GSP27moksop_u:34400: cidbhūmau kalanābījaṃ yad etat patati sphurat /
GSP27moksop_u:34403: saṃsiktam api yatnena na bhavaty aṅkurakṣamam //MU_6,53.34//
GSP27moksop_u:34404: no cet patati citkṣetre kalanābījakaṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34406: dvitvaṃ jagaty asadupāttam abodhajātaṃ bodhakṣayaṃ jahihi bodham upāgato 'si /
GSP27moksop_u:34407: ātmaikabhāvavibhavena bhavābhayātmā nāsty eva duḥkham iti naḥ paramārthasāraḥ //MU_6,53.36//
GSP27moksop_u:34411: jñātaṃ jñātavyam akhilaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam akṣatam /
GSP27moksop_u:34412: pareṇa paripūrṇās smo brahmañ jñānāmṛtena te //MU_6,54.1//
GSP27moksop_u:34413: pūrṇātmakam idaṃ pūrṇaṃ pūrṇāt pūrṇaṃ prapūryate /
GSP27moksop_u:34414: pūrṇena pūritaṃ pūrṇaṃ sthitā pūrṇaiva pūrṇatā //MU_6,54.2//
GSP27moksop_u:34416: bālasyeva pitā brahman na roṣaṃ kartum arhasi //MU_6,54.3//
GSP27moksop_u:34417: śrotraṃ cakṣus sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:34418: vidyamānam api brahman dṛśyamānam api sphuṭam //MU_6,54.4//
GSP27moksop_u:34419: kathaṃ mṛtasyaiva jantor viṣayaṃ svaṃ na paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:34420: jīvataś ca kathaṃ sarvaṃ viṣayaṃ svaṃ prapaśyati //MU_6,54.5//
GSP27moksop_u:34421: kathaṃ ghaṭādi bāhyastham indriyāṇi jaḍāny api /
GSP27moksop_u:34425: jānann api yad etat tvāṃ viśeṣāśaṅkayā punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34428: indriyāṇy api cittādi ghaṭādy api na kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:34430: gaganād api yācchā cit tayā rūpaṃ svam ātmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:34432: tad evedaṃ prakṛtitāṃ gataṃ jagad avasthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:34442: kalanonmukhatāṃ yātaṃ sat taj jīva iti smṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34443: sa jīvaḥ khalu dehe 'smiṃś cinoti spandate sphuṭam //MU_6,54.15//
GSP27moksop_u:34449: yā saṃvij jīva ity uktā tad dhi puryaṣṭakaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,54.18//
GSP27moksop_u:34450: kāle kāle svato jīvas tv anyo 'nyo bhavati svataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34456: bhramaty evaṃ jagaj jīvo vāsanāvellitaś ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:34462: evambhūtas sa sumate jīvo yātaś śarīratām /
GSP27moksop_u:34463: netrādinā ghaṭādy antar yathā vetti tathā śṛṇu //MU_6,54.25//
GSP27moksop_u:34470: yad yad acchatare tasminn agrasthaṃ pratibimbati /
GSP27moksop_u:34471: jīvena bhavati śliṣṭaṃ bahir jīvo 'tha jīvati //MU_6,54.29//
GSP27moksop_u:34475: jīvajñeyatvam āyāti bāhyaṃ vastv iti rāghava //MU_6,54.31//
GSP27moksop_u:34476: yat saṃśleṣam upāyāti tad bālo 'pi hi vindate /
GSP27moksop_u:34477: paśur vā sthāvaro vāpi jīvaḥ kasmān na vetsyati //MU_6,54.32//
GSP27moksop_u:34478: anyac ca nāyanās sādho raśmayo jīvaveṣṭitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34479: kroḍīkurvanty alaṃ dṛśyaṃ jīvas tat tena vindate //MU_6,54.33//
GSP27moksop_u:34486: pratibimbanam etan me brūhi brahman kimātmakam //MU_6,54.36//
GSP27moksop_u:34488: kākatālīyavad bhātaṃ tad brahmavyomni yac ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:34489: kiñcid āste kṣaṇaṃ kiñcit tad evedaṃ jaganti vaḥ //MU_6,54.37//
GSP27moksop_u:34493: sa ca sā ceti sat sarvaṃ yathāsaṃvedanaṃ sthiteḥ //MU_6,54.39//
GSP27moksop_u:34494: prathamaṃ paramāṇutve buddhe 'ṇutve tataś ca khe /
GSP27moksop_u:34495: tā vido vetti vidvyoma karākṣādikam adya yāḥ //MU_6,54.40//
GSP27moksop_u:34498: cidvyomnā kacatā tad yad ayam artha iti sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:34499: sargādau cetitā saṃsthā yāsau sthitim upāgatā //MU_6,54.42//
GSP27moksop_u:34502: atyantajaḍayor eva jīvayor iva yan mithaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34506: pratibimbaṃ dṛśor bhrāntiṃ viddhi vedyavidāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:34507: tāvanmātraṃ jagat tena viśvāso mā tavāstv iha //MU_6,54.46//
GSP27moksop_u:34516: yathā kamalajasyaitat sarvam eva tvayā śrutam //MU_6,55.1//
GSP27moksop_u:34520: yad yathā bhāvayaty āśu tat tathā paripaśyati //MU_6,55.3//
GSP27moksop_u:34522: sampannaṃ ca yathā tat te proktam ādyamanassthitau //MU_6,55.4//
GSP27moksop_u:34524: ato 'haṃvedanād antar jīvaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ tv itā //MU_6,55.5//
GSP27moksop_u:34525: na tv ekatvād anantatvād avedyatvād anāmayā /
GSP27moksop_u:34527: cetyādi budhyate kiñcin na manastāṃ ca gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:34528: na ca jīvatvam āyāti na ca puryaṣṭakātmikā //MU_6,55.7//
GSP27moksop_u:34532: bhramaḥ kevalam ity ādya upadeśāya gīyate //MU_6,55.9//
GSP27moksop_u:34533: yataḥ kutaścit sampanne tv avidyāmaya āmaye /
GSP27moksop_u:34536: yatrākāśam api sthūlam aṇāv iva surācalaḥ //MU_6,55.11//
GSP27moksop_u:34537: yatrodyadācāram api sad apy asad avasthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:34538: jagaj jñaviṣayaṃ paṅkād iva tiṣṭhati nirmitam //MU_6,55.12//
GSP27moksop_u:34539: asanmayam avidyāyā rūpam etāvad eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:34540: yad vīkṣitā satī nūnaṃ naśyaty eva na dṛśyate //MU_6,55.13//
GSP27moksop_u:34541: ālokitaṃ nāma katham avastu kila labhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34543: asad eva sadaivāsad ajñānād asya satyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:34544: jñānād yathāsthitaṃ vastu dṛśyate naśyati bhramaḥ //MU_6,55.15//
GSP27moksop_u:34548: kṛtā śāstraiḥ prabodhāya tāṃ tvam ekamanāś śṛṇu //MU_6,55.17//
GSP27moksop_u:34551: yad yathā bhāvayaty āśu tat tathānubhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:34552: satyaṃ bhavatv asatyaṃ vā bāleva niśi yakṣakam //MU_6,55.19//
GSP27moksop_u:34557: idam antar idaṃ bāhyam iti niścayavāṃs tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34558: jīvo yathā yad ādatte tat tathā draḍhayaty alam //MU_6,55.22//
GSP27moksop_u:34561: maricasyeva yat taikṣṇyaṃ śūnyatvam iva khasya yat /
GSP27moksop_u:34562: ātmano vedanaṃ tena tad evānyad ivāśritam //MU_6,55.24//
GSP27moksop_u:34570: sambhavaty atra na tv īśe deśakālādyasambhavāt //MU_6,55.28//
GSP27moksop_u:34571: itaḥ puṣpam itaḥ pattram aham ity udito yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:34572: ṣaṇḍe svātmani vāsanto raso 'dvitve dvitāṃ haran //MU_6,55.29//
GSP27moksop_u:34573: itaḥ paṭam itaḥ kuḍyam aham ity uditas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:34574: sargātmany ātmani brahma nirdvandve dvitvam āharat //MU_6,55.30//
GSP27moksop_u:34575: adyāṅkuro 'ham adyārkarug ahaṃ tv adya vāridaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34578: kramaṃ khaṇḍayituṃ loke kasya nāmāsti śaktatā //MU_6,55.32//
GSP27moksop_u:34579: ādarśe svaccha ākāro naiva svaḥ pratibimbati /
GSP27moksop_u:34581: brahmaṇi tv ātmanātmaiva sthitaḥ kacati bimbati /
GSP27moksop_u:34584: asatyam api tan neha vyabhicāri kadācana //MU_6,55.35//
GSP27moksop_u:34587: sarvagatvāc citeś cittvaṃ nityaṃ manasi vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34590: yadā yathaiva yadbhāvaṃ tadā bhavati tat tathā //MU_6,55.38//
GSP27moksop_u:34591: kāle kāle citā jīvas tv anyo 'nyo bhavati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:34593: svapne dṛṣṭo yathā grāmo yāti satyātmatāṃ kṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:34594: dehād dehaṃ tathā yāti jīvo 'yaṃ pratibhātmakam //MU_6,55.40//
GSP27moksop_u:34595: pratibhāso yathā svapne naraḥ kuḍyaṃ paṭaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:34596: bhavaty asatyam evaivaṃ dehād dehāntaraṃ sa naḥ //MU_6,55.41//
GSP27moksop_u:34597: asatyam eva mriyate tv asatyaṃ jāyate punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34599: kālenaitāvatā rūpam idaṃ tyājyaṃ mayety asau /
GSP27moksop_u:34600: prākṛtaṃ niścayaṃ rūḍhaṃ bhavaty anubhavat svataḥ //MU_6,55.43//
GSP27moksop_u:34601: vastu dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ ca svapne samanubhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34604: na svapno bhidyate svasmād acchāt saṃvittimātrakāt //MU_6,55.45//
GSP27moksop_u:34606: aprāgdṛṣṭaṃ tathaiṣā svaṃ cetanaṃ cit prapaśyati //MU_6,55.46//
GSP27moksop_u:34609: mokṣād ṛte na śāmyanti jīvānāṃ cakṣurādayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34611: cittvasya kalanāt tasya deho 'gra iva tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:34628: yaḥ prabodho 'sya sā muktis taj jāgrat sā ca turyatā //MU_6,55.57//
GSP27moksop_u:34629: jīvaprabodho muktir hi sā ceha dvividhocyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34631: jīvanmuktir hi turyatvaṃ turyātītaṃ paraṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34632: muktir jīvaprabodho hi sa ca buddhiprayatnataḥ //MU_6,55.59//
GSP27moksop_u:34633: jñānapramāṇo jīvo 'ntar yaj jānāti hi tanmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34634: jānātu jñaptim evāto bhavaty āśu sa tanmayaḥ //MU_6,55.60//
GSP27moksop_u:34637: jīvāṇor antar asty asya na kiñcic citkalāṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:34639: jīvāṇor antar asty asya na kiñcit paramād ṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:34640: yatra tatra jagad dṛṣṭam aho māyāvijṛmbhitam //MU_6,55.63//
GSP27moksop_u:34644: vāsanāto 'sya sauṣuptī svāpnī ca sphurati sthitiḥ //MU_6,55.65//
GSP27moksop_u:34649: vāsanoktā dṛśyaratir dṛśyatvaṃ ca na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34651: abodhād etad abhavad vilīnaṃ cet prabodhataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34652: tad vāsyavāsanāyās tu kṣayād udaya eva vaḥ //MU_6,55.69//
GSP27moksop_u:34659: ātmanātmā samālīḍho bahir antar yadā citā /
GSP27moksop_u:34661: neha santyajyate kiñcin neha kiñcana gṛhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34664: cetitās smaś citi citā bāhyādy anyan na vidmahe //MU_6,55.75//
GSP27moksop_u:34665: abdher yathāmalam apāstasamastabhedaṃ svādv accham eva sakalaṃ dravam ekaśuddham /
GSP27moksop_u:34666: sarvaṃ tathedam apahastitabhedajātam ādyaṃ paraṃ padam anāmayam eva buddham //MU_6,55.76//
GSP27moksop_u:34671: tam imaṃ viddhi saṃsāraṃ na satyaṃ nāpy asanmayam //MU_6,56.1//
GSP27moksop_u:34672: na puṃsa iva jīvasya svapnas sambhavati kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:34674: jīvasvapnam idaṃ dīrghaṃ kṣipraṃ ca pratibhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:34675: asatyam apy avastutvād viddhi vedyavidāṃ vara //MU_6,56.3//
GSP27moksop_u:34680: sthāṇor apy antar akhilaṃ paśyantas trijagadbhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:34682: sarvagatvād anantasya svasya jīvasya vai citeḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34683: yad bhāvayanti cetanti tad evāśv eti satyatām //MU_6,56.7//
GSP27moksop_u:34686: pāṇḍoḥ putro 'rjuno nāma sukhaṃ jīvitam ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34690: kīdṛśīṃ ca haris tasya kathayiṣyaty asaktatām //MU_6,56.10//
GSP27moksop_u:34700: idaṃ puṇyam upādeyaṃ heyaṃ pāpam idaṃ tv iti /
GSP27moksop_u:34702: evaṃ prauḍhiṃ prayātāyāṃ vahantyāṃ ca ciraṃ ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:34708: bhagavān sa yamaḥ kiñcid vrataṃ praticaturyugam /
GSP27moksop_u:34710: kadācid aṣṭau varṣāṇi daśa dvādaśa vāpi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:34711: kadācit pañca saptāpi kadācit ṣoḍaśāpi vā //MU_6,56.20//
GSP27moksop_u:34713: na hinasti jagajjāle mṛtyur bhūtāni kānicit //MU_6,56.21//
GSP27moksop_u:34715: bhavati prāvṛṣi svedī kuñjako maṣakair iva //MU_6,56.22//
GSP27moksop_u:34719: samatītāny anantāni bhūtāni ca jaganti ca //MU_6,56.24//
GSP27moksop_u:34720: vaivasvato 'dya tu yamo ya eva pitṛnāyakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34721: anena tv adhunā sādho parikṣīṇeṣu keṣucit //MU_6,56.25//
GSP27moksop_u:34724: teneyam urvī nīrandhrā bhūtair martair amṛtyubhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34727: kāntā dasyuparābhūtā dīnā patim iva priyam //MU_6,56.28//
GSP27moksop_u:34730: vasudevasutas tv eko vāsudeva iti śrutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34734: duryodhana iti khyātas tasya bhrātā pitṛvyajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34735: bhaviṣyati dṛḍhadvandvo bhīmo babhrur aher iva //MU_6,56.32//
GSP27moksop_u:34743: viṣādam eṣyaty udyogaṃ yuddhāya na kariṣyati //MU_6,56.36//
GSP27moksop_u:34748: naṣṭas svam utsṛjya paraṃ prakāśaṃ tadātmatattvaṃ nanu rājasiṃha //MU_6,56.38//
GSP27moksop_u:34749: anantam avyaktam anādimadhyam ātmānam ālokaya saṃvidātman /
GSP27moksop_u:34750: saṃvidvapus sphāram alagnadoṣam ajo 'si nityo 'si nirāmayo 'si //MU_6,56.39//
GSP27moksop_u:34751: na jāyate mriyate vā kadācin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34752: ajo nityaś śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre //MU_6,56.40//
GSP27moksop_u:34756: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam /
GSP27moksop_u:34757: ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate //MU_6,57.1//
GSP27moksop_u:34759: ātmanaḥ parameśasya kiṃ kathaṃ kena hanyate //MU_6,57.2//
GSP27moksop_u:34760: nārjunas tvaṃ na hantā tvam abhimānam alaṃ tyaja /
GSP27moksop_u:34762: yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo yasya buddhir na lipyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34763: hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate //MU_6,57.4//
GSP27moksop_u:34765: ayaṃ so 'ham idaṃ tan me ity atas saṃvidaṃ tyaja //MU_6,57.5//
GSP27moksop_u:34766: anayaiva ca yukto 'smi naṣṭo 'smīti ca bhārata /
GSP27moksop_u:34770: cakṣuḥ paśyatu karṇaś ca śṛṇotu tvak spṛśatv iyam /
GSP27moksop_u:34771: rasanā ca rasaṃ yātu ko 'traiko 'ham iti sthitaḥ //MU_6,57.8//
GSP27moksop_u:34773: na kaścid atrāham iti kleśabhāgī ka eva te //MU_6,57.9//
GSP27moksop_u:34774: bahubhis samavāyena yat kṛtaṃ tatra bhārata /
GSP27moksop_u:34776: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api /
GSP27moksop_u:34783: yas sa kāryam akāryaṃ vā kurvann api na lipyate //MU_6,57.14//
GSP27moksop_u:34784: idaṃ ca te pāṇḍusuta svakarma kṣātram uttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:34786: api kutsitam apy antyam apy adharmamayaṃ kṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:34787: śreyase svaṃ yathā karma na tathehāmṛtāsavaḥ //MU_6,57.16//
GSP27moksop_u:34788: mūrkhasyāpi svakarmaiva śreyase kim u sanmateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34790: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanañjaya /
GSP27moksop_u:34791: nissaṅgas tvaṃ yathāprāptakarmāsi cen na badhyase //MU_6,57.18//
GSP27moksop_u:34801: tathā jñānasya yogasya vibhāgaḥ kīdṛśaḥ prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:34805: nakiñcidbhāvanākāraṃ yat tad brahma paraṃ viduḥ //MU_6,57.24//
GSP27moksop_u:34806: tadudyogaṃ vidur jñānaṃ yogaṃ ca kṛtabuddhayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34807: brahma sarvaṃ jagad ahaṃ ceti brahmārpaṇaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,57.25//
GSP27moksop_u:34809: śāntam ākāśakośācchaṃ na śūnyaṃ na dṛṣat param //MU_6,57.26//
GSP27moksop_u:34810: tata īṣad yad utthānam īṣad anyatayodaye /
GSP27moksop_u:34812: bhāgo 'ham iti ko 'py eṣa pratyekam uditaś citeḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34817: pṛthag abdhir aparyanto nāham ity avagacchati //MU_6,57.30//
GSP27moksop_u:34819: kham ihaivaṃ tathāmbvādi kim ahantāṃ prati grahaḥ //MU_6,57.31//
GSP27moksop_u:34820: iti jñānād vibhāgasya yo dvaitasya parikṣayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34826: aham āśā jagad ahaṃ kham ahaṃ karma cāpy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:34827: kālo 'ham aham advaitaṃ dvaitaṃ cāham ahaṃ jagat //MU_6,57.35//
GSP27moksop_u:34828: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru /
GSP27moksop_u:34831: dve rūpe tava deveśa paraṃ cāparam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:34832: kīdṛśaṃ tat kadā rūpaṃ tiṣṭhāmy āśritya siddhaye //MU_6,57.37//
GSP27moksop_u:34834: sāmānyaṃ paramaṃ caiva dve rūpe viddhi me 'nagha /
GSP27moksop_u:34836: paraṃ rūpam anādyantaṃ yan mamaikam anāmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:34840: tatkramāt samprabuddhas tvaṃ tato jñāsyasi tat param /
GSP27moksop_u:34841: mama rūpam anādyantaṃ yena bhūyo na jāyase //MU_6,57.41//
GSP27moksop_u:34842: yadi vā vedyavijñāto bhavāṃs tad arimardana /
GSP27moksop_u:34843: taṃ mamātmānam ātmānam ātmanaś cāśu saṃśraya //MU_6,57.42//
GSP27moksop_u:34844: idaṃ cāham idaṃ cāham iti yat pravadāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:34845: tad etad ātmatattvaṃ tan muhur vyapadiśāmy alam //MU_6,57.43//
GSP27moksop_u:34846: manye sādho prabuddho 'si pade viśrāntavān asi /
GSP27moksop_u:34850: sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ yo bhajaty aikyam āsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34853: ātmāpi ca na san nāsad gato yasyāśu tat sa sat //MU_6,57.47//
GSP27moksop_u:34857: gavyānām abdhijānāṃ ca so 'yam ātmāsmi bhārata //MU_6,57.49//
GSP27moksop_u:34858: antas sarvaśarīrāṇāṃ yas sūkṣmo 'nubhavas sa ca /
GSP27moksop_u:34861: tathā sarvapadārthānāṃ dehānāṃ ca sthitaḥ paraḥ //MU_6,57.51//
GSP27moksop_u:34863: tejas tathāsmi dehānām asaṃsthita iva sthitaḥ //MU_6,57.52//
GSP27moksop_u:34869: sattāsāmānyam etad yat tam ātmānam ajaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,57.55//
GSP27moksop_u:34872: ātmaivedaṃ jagadrūpaṃ hanyate hanti cātra kim /
GSP27moksop_u:34875: naśyatsu na vinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //MU_6,57.58//
GSP27moksop_u:34876: idaṃ cāham idaṃ cāham itīdaṃ kathyate mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:34877: evam ātmāsi sarvātmā mām evaṃ viddhi pāṇḍava //MU_6,57.59//
GSP27moksop_u:34883: yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati //MU_6,57.62//
GSP27moksop_u:34885: kaṭakādiṣu vā hema bhūteṣv ātmā tathārjuna //MU_6,57.63//
GSP27moksop_u:34887: kaṭakādīni vā hemni tathā bhūtāni cātmani //MU_6,57.64//
GSP27moksop_u:34888: padārthajātaṃ bhūtādi bṛhad brahma ca bhārata /
GSP27moksop_u:34889: ekam evākhilaṃ viddhi pṛthaksthaṃ na manāg api //MU_6,57.65//
GSP27moksop_u:34891: kva te vāpi jagat kiṃ vā kiṃ mudhā parimuhyasi //MU_6,57.66//
GSP27moksop_u:34895: dvandvair vimuktās sukhaduḥkhasañjñair gacchanty amūḍhāḥ padam avyayaṃ tat //MU_6,57.68//
GSP27moksop_u:34899: bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34903: te tu naikātmanaś cānye kvāto duḥkhaṃ kva vā sukham /
GSP27moksop_u:34907: yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete mātrāsparśā bhramātmakāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34909: sarvatvād ātmanas tv ete ābhāsās saṃsthitā iva /
GSP27moksop_u:34910: asadrūpās tv asadrūpaṃ kathaṃ soḍhuṃ na śakyate //MU_6,58.6//
GSP27moksop_u:34911: manāg api na vidyete sukhaduḥkhe asarvage /
GSP27moksop_u:34913: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34916: tyaktvā nakiñcin madhyaṃ ca śeṣe baddhapado bhava //MU_6,58.9//
GSP27moksop_u:34917: na hṛṣyati sukhenātmā duḥkhair glāyati nārjuna /
GSP27moksop_u:34919: jaḍaṃ cittādi duḥkhasya bhājanaṃ dehatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:34920: na caitasmin kṣate kṣīṇe kiñcid evātmanaḥ kṣatam //MU_6,58.11//
GSP27moksop_u:34921: jaḍaṃ dehādi duḥkhāder yad idaṃ bhoktr iti sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:34923: na kiñcid eva dehādi na ca duḥkhādi vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34925: yad idaṃ kathayāmy atra tenaiṣā te vinaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:34927: yathā rajjvām ahibhayaṃ bodhān naśyaty abodhajam /
GSP27moksop_u:34928: tathā dehādi duḥkhādi bodhān naśyaty abodhajam //MU_6,58.15//
GSP27moksop_u:34929: viṣvag viśvam ajaṃ brahma na naśyati na jāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:34930: iti satyaṃ paraṃ viddhi bodhaḥ parama eṣa saḥ //MU_6,58.16//
GSP27moksop_u:34933: jagat kālaḥ kriyā deśas tvam ahaṃ sainikā iti /
GSP27moksop_u:34934: brahmaṇy evaṃ parispando nātra stas sadasatkramau //MU_6,58.18//
GSP27moksop_u:34935: jahi mānaṃ madaṃ śokaṃ bhayam īrṣyāṃ sukhāsukhe /
GSP27moksop_u:34936: dvaitam etad asadrūpam ekas sadrūpavān bhava //MU_6,58.19//
GSP27moksop_u:34938: brahmaṇā bṛṃhitaṃ yuddhaṃ brahma brahmamayaṃ kuru //MU_6,58.20//
GSP27moksop_u:34942: jaḍo vāta iva spandī prasṛtaṃ kāryam ācara //MU_6,58.22//
GSP27moksop_u:34943: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:34944: yat kariṣyasi kaunteya tad ātmeti sthiro bhava //MU_6,58.23//
GSP27moksop_u:34945: yanmayo yo bhavaty antas sa tad āpnoty asaṃśayam /
GSP27moksop_u:34947: anapekṣya phalaṃ brahma bhūtvā brahmeti bhāvitam /
GSP27moksop_u:34949: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyaty akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34950: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa coktas sarvakarmakṛt //MU_6,58.26//
GSP27moksop_u:34951: mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:34952: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanañjaya //MU_6,58.27//
GSP27moksop_u:34954: naiṣkarmyam apy anāśritya samas tiṣṭha yathāsthitam //MU_6,58.28//
GSP27moksop_u:34956: karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiñcit karoti saḥ //MU_6,58.29//
GSP27moksop_u:34957: āsaktim āhuḥ kartṛtvam akartur api tad bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:34958: maurkhye sthite hi manasi tasmān maurkhyaṃ parityajet //MU_6,58.30//
GSP27moksop_u:34964: kurvan kāryam akāryaṃ ca naiva kartā tvam arjuna //MU_6,58.33//
GSP27moksop_u:34967: samas somyas sthiras svasthaś śāntas sarvārthanisspṛhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34968: yas tiṣṭhati sa suvyagro 'py alam avyagratāṃ gataḥ //MU_6,58.35//
GSP27moksop_u:34971: karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran /
GSP27moksop_u:34975: āpūryamāṇaṃ tv acalapratiṣṭhaṃ samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat /
GSP27moksop_u:34976: tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī //MU_6,58.39//
GSP27moksop_u:34980: na kuryād bhogasantyāgaṃ na kuryād bhogabhāvanam /
GSP27moksop_u:34982: anātmany ātmatāṃ dehe mā bhāvaya bhavātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:34984: dehanāśe mahābāho na kiñcid api naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:34985: ātmanāśe hi nāśas syān na cātmā naśyati kvacit //MU_6,59.3//
GSP27moksop_u:34987: naśyaty ātmeti durbodho mā tavāstv atiduḥkhadaḥ //MU_6,59.4//
GSP27moksop_u:34991: evaṃ cet taj jagannātha mūḍhānām api mānada /
GSP27moksop_u:34992: dehanāśe samutpanne manye naṣṭaṃ na kiñcana //MU_6,59.6//
GSP27moksop_u:34994: evam eva mahābāho na kiñcin naśyati kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:34995: ātmaivāsty avināśātmā kiṃ tasya kva vinaśyati //MU_6,59.7//
GSP27moksop_u:34996: idaṃ naṣṭam idaṃ yuktam iti mohād bhramād ṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:34997: anyat tathā na paśyāmi vandhyāstrītanayaṃ yathā //MU_6,59.8//
GSP27moksop_u:34998: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:34999: ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ //MU_6,59.9//
GSP27moksop_u:35000: avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:35001: vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaścit kartum arhati //MU_6,59.10//
GSP27moksop_u:35004: ātmaivaiko 'sti na dvitvam asatas sambhavaḥ kutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35005: avināśas tv ananto 'sau sato nāśo na vidyate //MU_6,59.12//
GSP27moksop_u:35007: śāntaṃ sadasator madhyaṃ tad astīha paraṃ padam //MU_6,59.13//
GSP27moksop_u:35009: tan mṛto 'smīti bhagavan kiṃrūḍheha nṛṇāṃ sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35010: kathaṃ sthitau vā lokānāṃ tau svarganarakau prabho //MU_6,59.14//
GSP27moksop_u:35012: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35015: sa tiṣṭhati śarīrāntaḥ pañjare vihago yathā //MU_6,59.16//
GSP27moksop_u:35018: śrotraṃ cakṣus sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35021: kṣīyate vāsanātyāge kṣīṇe bhavati tat padam //MU_6,59.19//
GSP27moksop_u:35022: vāsanāvān purā puṣṭo bhūtvā bhrāmyati yoniṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:35025: jīvo gṛhītvā saṃyāti puṣpād gandhān ivānilaḥ //MU_6,59.21//
GSP27moksop_u:35026: deho nisspandatām eti jīve kaunteya nirgate /
GSP27moksop_u:35029: mṛta ity ucyate loke deho vigatajīvitaḥ //MU_6,59.23//
GSP27moksop_u:35030: sa jīvaḥ prāṇamūrtiḥ khe yatra yatrāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP27moksop_u:35032: ayaṃ deho hi jīvena tv asann evāvalokitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35033: asya nāśe 'nyam apy evaṃ paśyaty evāśu svapnavat //MU_6,59.25//
GSP27moksop_u:35034: yathaiva paśyaty ākārāṃs teṣāṃ nāśāṃs tathaiva saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35036: jhagity udbhavakāle tu yad yathā dṛśyate puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35040: ya eva puruṣārthena dṛṣṭo balavatā kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:35042: api sphuṭati vidhyaṇḍe vāti vā pralayānile /
GSP27moksop_u:35043: pauruṣaṃ hi yathāśāstram atas tyājyaṃ na dhīmatā //MU_6,59.30//
GSP27moksop_u:35048: kim asya kāraṇaṃ brūhi jīvasya janitasthiteḥ //MU_6,59.32//
GSP27moksop_u:35050: vāsanātmānam enaṃ tvaṃ jīvaṃ viddhi śarīrakam /
GSP27moksop_u:35052: dhriyate saṃsṛtis tāvad yāvat sphurati vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:35059: ajñānād ātmanas sādho sattām āyāti vāsanā //MU_6,59.36//
GSP27moksop_u:35061: ayaṃ so 'haṃ janā ete mameti tyaja vāsanāḥ //MU_6,59.37//
GSP27moksop_u:35063: yo hi yatsattayocchūnas tannāśāt sa vilīyate //MU_6,59.38//
GSP27moksop_u:35065: ko 'sau bhājanatām eti janmano maraṇasya ca //MU_6,59.39//
GSP27moksop_u:35067: tad eva vāsanākāraṃ jīvaṃ viddhi mahāmate //MU_6,59.40//
GSP27moksop_u:35069: prabodhād vāsanāmuktaṃ taṃ mokṣaṃ viddhi bhārata //MU_6,59.41//
GSP27moksop_u:35070: jīvann eva mahābāho tattvaṃ prekṣya yathāsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:35072: yo na nirvāsano nūnaṃ sarvadharmaparo 'pi saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35073: sarvajño 'py abhito baddhaḥ pañjarastho yathā khagaḥ //MU_6,59.43//
GSP27moksop_u:35074: durdarśanasya gagane śikhipiñchikeva sūkṣmāpi visphurati yasya na vāsanāntaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35075: muktas sa eva bhavatīha hi vāsanaiva bandho 'naghasya nanu tatkṣaya eva mokṣaḥ //MU_6,59.44//
GSP27moksop_u:35084: kuru kāryam akārpaṇyaṃ na kiñcid iha naśyati //MU_6,60.3//
GSP27moksop_u:35085: pravāhāpatitaṃ karma svam eva kriyate hi yat /
GSP27moksop_u:35088: mūḍhasya manaso rūpaṃ jñamanas tu samasthiti //MU_6,60.5//
GSP27moksop_u:35093: cinmātre vitate tantau dṛḍhe srag iva saṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:35095: prasārite prasarati tv antardhiṃ yāti saṃvṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:35097: ananyad apy anyad iva svāṅgarūpam anaṅgavat /
GSP27moksop_u:35098: citraṃ vitānaka iva sthitaṃ jagad idaṃ citi //MU_6,60.10//
GSP27moksop_u:35100: tathā jātam ajātaṃ ca viśvaṃ saṃsthitam ātmani //MU_6,60.11//
GSP27moksop_u:35101: yathā sphurati kartavyaṃ citraṃ citrakṛtaś citi /
GSP27moksop_u:35106: paścād bhittiḥ kṛtā vyomarūpā cāsāv aho bhramaḥ //MU_6,60.14//
GSP27moksop_u:35108: na manāg api bhedo 'sti sphuṭam apy upalabdhayoḥ //MU_6,60.15//
GSP27moksop_u:35114: katham ālokite 'pi syāt satyaṃ nāsty eva vibhrame //MU_6,60.18//
GSP27moksop_u:35119: naitās santi na cāsi tvaṃ kiṃ kena parirudhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:35121: pravṛttir eva kā vyomnaḥ pravṛttiś caiva khātmikā /
GSP27moksop_u:35123: cittasaṃsthaṃ yathā citraṃ sadrūpam api khātmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:35124: vyomnaś śūnyatamaṃ viddhi tathedam akhilaṃ jagat //MU_6,60.23//
GSP27moksop_u:35125: cittabhittau kṛtaṃ citraṃ yac ciccitrakareṇa tat /
GSP27moksop_u:35126: sarvaṃ śūnyatayā vyomno manāg api na bhidyate //MU_6,60.24//
GSP27moksop_u:35128: kṣaṇenaiva tathaivemau bahissthāv iti viddhi he //MU_6,60.25//
GSP27moksop_u:35131: asad eva manorājyaṃ kartuṃ śaktaṃ yathā manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35133: kṣaṇaṃ kalpīkaroty etat tathālpaṃ kurute bahu /
GSP27moksop_u:35134: asat sat kurute kṣipram itīyaṃ bhrāntir utthitā //MU_6,60.28//
GSP27moksop_u:35136: yad vicitrātma tad idaṃ jagajjālam iti sthitam //MU_6,60.29//
GSP27moksop_u:35140: akuḍyam apy araṅgāḍhyam idaṃ sphāram ivāgrataḥ //MU_6,60.31//
GSP27moksop_u:35141: aho nu citraṃ nirbhitti citram ujjvalam utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:35151: ākāśa eva racitā pratibhaikaraṅgā mugdhā jagattrayamanoharaputrikeyam /
GSP27moksop_u:35159: jīvānvitā gagana eva kṛtā vicitrā vyomātmikāciravilakṣaṇacitrakartrā /
GSP27moksop_u:35164: idaṃ viddhi mahāścaryam arjuneha hi yat kila /
GSP27moksop_u:35165: pūrvaṃ sañjāyate citraṃ paścād bhittir udeti hi //MU_6,61.1//
GSP27moksop_u:35166: abhittāv utthite citre dṛśyate bhittir ātatā /
GSP27moksop_u:35167: aho nu citrā māyeyaṃ magnaṃ tumbu śilā plutā //MU_6,61.2//
GSP27moksop_u:35169: vyomātmanas te kim iyam ahantā vyomatoditā //MU_6,61.3//
GSP27moksop_u:35170: sargavyoma kṛtaṃ vyomnā vyomni vyoma vilīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:35171: bhujyate vyomani vyoma vyoma vyomani cātatam //MU_6,61.4//
GSP27moksop_u:35177: kiṃ kathaṃ kasya kenaitac chidyate vā kva bhidyate //MU_6,61.7//
GSP27moksop_u:35178: brahmatā brahmatāpūre jale jalam iva sphurat /
GSP27moksop_u:35179: sthitā samasamā vyoma nirmalā śāntam ātmani //MU_6,61.8//
GSP27moksop_u:35182: yo na nirvāsano nūnaṃ sarvadharmaparo 'pi saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35183: sarvajño 'py atibaddhātmā tapasvy api sa rāgavān //MU_6,61.10//
GSP27moksop_u:35188: dagdhaṃ tu vāsanābījaṃ na nimajjati vastuṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:35191: samyagjñaś śrutam avagamya pāvanaṃ tat tiṣṭhātmavyavahṛtir ekaśāntarūpaḥ //MU_6,61.14//
GSP27moksop_u:35195: naṣṭo mohas smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta /
GSP27moksop_u:35198: vṛttayo yadi bodhena saṃśāntā hṛdaye sphuṭam /
GSP27moksop_u:35199: tac cittaṃ śāntam evāśu viddhi sattvam upāgatam //MU_6,62.2//
GSP27moksop_u:35201: vastu śiṣṭaṃ vinirmuktaṃ yat sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yat //MU_6,62.3//
GSP27moksop_u:35202: na kecana prabādhante tat padaṃ jagadādhayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35205: agamyam enam ātmānaṃ viddhi duṣṭadṛśām iha //MU_6,62.5//
GSP27moksop_u:35207: na śaknoti padaṃ draṣṭuṃ janadṛṣṭir aher iva //MU_6,62.6//
GSP27moksop_u:35209: varākī vāsanā tatra kiṃ karoti pare pade //MU_6,62.7//
GSP27moksop_u:35211: śuddham āsādya cittattvam avidyā līyate tathā //MU_6,62.8//
GSP27moksop_u:35215: yāvan na samparijñātaś śuddhas svātmāyam ātmanā //MU_6,62.10//
GSP27moksop_u:35220: viṣayaviṣaviṣūcikām atas tvaṃ nipuṇam ahaṃsthitivāsanām apāsya /
GSP27moksop_u:35223: iti gaditavati trilokanāthe kṣaṇam iva maunam avasthite purastāt /
GSP27moksop_u:35224: atha madhupa ivāsitābjaṣaṇḍe vacanam upaiṣyati tatra pāṇḍuputraḥ //MU_6,62.14//
GSP27moksop_u:35226: parigalitasamastaśokabhāvā param udayaṃ bhagavan matir gateyam /
GSP27moksop_u:35227: mama tava vacanena lokabhartur dinapatinā paribodhitābjinīva //MU_6,62.15//
GSP27moksop_u:35239: yasmin sarvaṃ yatas sarvaṃ yas sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35240: yaś ca sarvamayo nitya ātmānaṃ viddhi taṃ param //MU_6,63.2//
GSP27moksop_u:35241: dūrastham apy adūrasthaṃ sarvagaṃ tvaṃ svam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35242: tatsthas tattām avāpnoṣi tad evāsy astasaṃśayam //MU_6,63.3//
GSP27moksop_u:35245: sā parāt paramā kāṣṭhā sā dṛśāṃ dṛg anuttamā /
GSP27moksop_u:35246: sa mahimnāṃ ca mahimā gurūṇāṃ sa gurur guruḥ //MU_6,63.5//
GSP27moksop_u:35247: sa ātmā tac ca vijñānaṃ tac chūnyaṃ brahma tat param /
GSP27moksop_u:35248: tac chreyas sa śivaś śāntas sā vidyāparamā sthitiḥ //MU_6,63.6//
GSP27moksop_u:35255: sa padārthe padārthatvaṃ sa tucchatvam avastunaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35256: sa sato vastunas sattvam asattvam asataś ca saḥ //MU_6,63.10//
GSP27moksop_u:35264: ko bhūtvā kvānubadhnāmi dhṛtiṃ katham avāstavīm //MU_6,63.14//
GSP27moksop_u:35269: nāstam eti na codeti sāmyaṃ samam avasthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:35270: yasya khasyeva śūnyatvaṃ sa mahātmeha sadvapuḥ //MU_6,63.17//
GSP27moksop_u:35272: vyavahāry api hṛtkṣobhaṃ naity ādarśanaro yathā //MU_6,63.18//
GSP27moksop_u:35274: na yasya hṛdayollekho manāg api sa muktibhāk //MU_6,63.19//
GSP27moksop_u:35278: nehāsty aikyaṃ na ca dvitvam upadeśo 'pi tanmayaḥ //MU_6,63.21//
GSP27moksop_u:35281: citpraspando hi saṃsāras tadaspandaḥ paraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:35284: asann iva svabhāvena sa citspanda udāhṛtaḥ //MU_6,63.24//
GSP27moksop_u:35285: śūnyatvam ajaḍaṃ yat tat param āhuś citer vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35291: pṛthag asti na ca spandaś citer yas saṃsṛtir bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:35292: cittvam eva cites spandas tadabodho hi saṃsṛtiḥ //MU_6,63.28//
GSP27moksop_u:35298: bhavanti ko 'titṛpto hi durannaṃ kila vāñchati //MU_6,63.31//
GSP27moksop_u:35299: etad eva paraṃ viddhi jñatvasya paralakṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:35302: yo 'ntaḥ prarūḍhas svābhyāsāj jñatvaśabdena sa smṛtaḥ //MU_6,63.33//
GSP27moksop_u:35303: yo na bhuṅkte bhujyamānān api bhogān abuddhimān /
GSP27moksop_u:35306: kvacid ātmani loke vā svāṅgāvadalanair api //MU_6,63.35//
GSP27moksop_u:35313: yad aspandasya maruto na san nāsan na madhyagam /
GSP27moksop_u:35316: na bandhāya na mokṣāya sthita ātmani kevalam //MU_6,63.40//
GSP27moksop_u:35317: cic cen nañarthasaṃvittiṃ nirvāṇeva na vindate /
GSP27moksop_u:35318: tad bandhamokṣapakṣāder nāmāpi hi na vidyate //MU_6,63.41//
GSP27moksop_u:35320: māstv itīty api bandhas te śreyase 'vedanaṃ param //MU_6,63.42//
GSP27moksop_u:35321: yad anābhāsam ajaḍaṃ tad viddhi paramaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:35325: prekṣaṇād eva saṃśānte tv ahambhāve nirāspade /
GSP27moksop_u:35326: na vidmaḥ kena kiṃ kasya badhyate vātha mucyate //MU_6,63.45//
GSP27moksop_u:35327: saṅkalpa eva ca citer buddhaś ced avibhāgavān /
GSP27moksop_u:35328: tad asaṅkalpam aspandaṃ sarvaṃ jātam avāritam //MU_6,63.46//
GSP27moksop_u:35330: saṅkṣīṇa eva saṃsāro nisspande cidghane sthite //MU_6,63.47//
GSP27moksop_u:35331: citteja eva citspanda iti buddhe nirantaram /
GSP27moksop_u:35332: vyatiriktaś citas spando na kaścid avaśiṣyate //MU_6,63.48//
GSP27moksop_u:35334: na jño moham upādatte sarvagatvāt svasaṃvidaḥ //MU_6,63.49//
GSP27moksop_u:35335: yatrodeti prasabham aniśaṃ sarvasaṃvittisattā yasminn ete sakalakalanākāraṭaṅkā laganti /
GSP27moksop_u:35336: utpadyante svadanasubhagaṃ yatra sarvopalambhā dhyānenainaṃ tam avagamaya pratyagātmānam antaḥ //MU_6,63.50//
GSP27moksop_u:35340: enam āhuḥ paraṃ tattvaṃ viddhy enaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:35341: vedmy enam ekam evāham eṣa evāsti netaraḥ //MU_6,64.1//
GSP27moksop_u:35343: etasmād idam utpannaṃ jagad bījād iva drumaḥ //MU_6,64.2//
GSP27moksop_u:35345: yatrānubhavitāntas te tad viddhi paramaṃ padam //MU_6,64.3//
GSP27moksop_u:35347: mahācidabhidhaṃ puṇyaṃ tad etat paramaṃ padam //MU_6,64.4//
GSP27moksop_u:35349: vibhūtibhis sphuranty uccair janās tuṣṭanṛpā iva //MU_6,64.5//
GSP27moksop_u:35352: tat prāpya nāṅga mriyate tat prāpyāṅga na śocyate /
GSP27moksop_u:35353: tat prāpya kṣīyate nāṅga tat prāpyāṅga na badhyate //MU_6,64.7//
GSP27moksop_u:35359: mano buddhir ahaṅkāra iti yatra kṣayaṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:35360: sattāsāmānyam ābhānaṃ kiṃ tat kīdṛśam ucyate //MU_6,64.10//
GSP27moksop_u:35362: yad brahma sarvadehasthaṃ bhuṅkte pibati valgati /
GSP27moksop_u:35366: tat sthitaṃ khatayā vyomni śabde śabdatayā sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:35367: sparśe sthitaṃ sparśatayā tvaci tat tvaktayā sthitam //MU_6,64.13//
GSP27moksop_u:35368: rase līnaṃ rasatayā rasanāyāṃ ca tattayā /
GSP27moksop_u:35369: rūpe rūpatayā dṛṣṭaṃ netre līnaṃ ca dṛktayā //MU_6,64.14//
GSP27moksop_u:35371: puṣṭaṃ kāyatayā kāye bhūmāv api ca bhūtayā //MU_6,64.15//
GSP27moksop_u:35372: payastayā ca payasi vāyau vāyutayā sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:35373: tejastayā tejasi ca buddhau buddhitayā gatam //MU_6,64.16//
GSP27moksop_u:35375: rūḍhaṃ saṃvidi saṃvittyā citi cittvena cotthitam //MU_6,64.17//
GSP27moksop_u:35376: vṛkṣe vṛkṣatayā lagnaṃ paṭe paṭatayā sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:35377: ghaṭe ghaṭatayā rūḍhaṃ vaṭe vaṭatayā sthitam //MU_6,64.18//
GSP27moksop_u:35384: śukle śuklatayā jātaṃ kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇatayā sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:35386: saṃsthitas saṃsthitau sthityā nāśe nāśatayā sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35388: bālye bālyena viśrānto yauvane yauvanena ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35389: jarasā ca jarārūpe maraṇe maraṇena ca //MU_6,64.24//
GSP27moksop_u:35392: nānātaiṣā tv asatyaiṣā satyenānena caiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:35394: sarvatra saṃsthitimatā vigatāmayena vyāptaṃ mayedam akhilaṃ vividhair vilāsaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35395: cidrūpiṇaiva kalitākalitātmaneti sarvopaśāntamatir āssva sukhaṃ mahātman //MU_6,64.27//
GSP27moksop_u:35397: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:35398: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_6,64.28//
GSP27moksop_u:35404: tathaivedaṃ ca sañjātaṃ yadi sarvam asanmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:35405: tad asmākaṃ dṛḍhataraḥ pratyayaḥ katham utthitaḥ //MU_6,65.2//
GSP27moksop_u:35409: sarvagatvāc cites sarvaṃ jīvas sarvatra saṃsṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35411: svapnābhaḥ pratibhāso 'sya ya eṣa svayam utthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35413: svapne kṣaṇavināśitvaṃ yathā puṃsā na dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:35418: bhavatīty anubhūtaṃ hi yad bījaṃ tat phalaṃ yathā //MU_6,65.8//
GSP27moksop_u:35419: asatyam eva tad viddhi yad asatyena sādhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:35420: asaty arthe samarthe 'pi na yuktaṃ bhāvabandhanam //MU_6,65.9//
GSP27moksop_u:35424: bhavaty ātmani sargādi dṛḍhapratyayam eva tat //MU_6,65.11//
GSP27moksop_u:35432: idaṃ sambhavatīdaṃ no vety ataḥ pralayaṃ gatam //MU_6,65.15//
GSP27moksop_u:35433: yad yathā yādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tat tādṛg vidyate tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:35435: na tad asti jagaty asmin yan na sambhavati bhrame /
GSP27moksop_u:35439: śilāsv abjāni jāyante hemādrāv iva pādapāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35442: śilāntaḥ prāṇinas santi bhekā iva śilāntare //MU_6,65.20//
GSP27moksop_u:35444: nimeṣeṇa ghaṭo yāti paṭatāṃ śāpavān iva //MU_6,65.21//
GSP27moksop_u:35445: svāsattām api budhyante svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:35447: vitānam iva khe vāri tiṣṭhati svarnadī yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:35449: śilātaḥ prāpyate sarvaṃ nanu cintāmaṇer iva /
GSP27moksop_u:35451: tāny eva na phalanty āśu mokṣādīnīva rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:35459: na tad asti na yat satyaṃ na tad asti na yan mṛṣā /
GSP27moksop_u:35461: svapne nimagnadhīr jantuḥ paśyati sthiratāṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:35463: bhramād bhramāntaraṃ gacchan svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ vrajan /
GSP27moksop_u:35466: mohaṃ yathā pātamayaikarūpaṃ jīvas tathā saṃsṛtipātamūḍhaḥ //MU_6,65.32//
GSP27moksop_u:35470: atra rāghava vakṣye 'ham itihāsam imaṃ śṛṇu /
GSP27moksop_u:35471: yad vṛttaṃ kasyacid bhikṣoḥ kvacin mananaśālinaḥ //MU_6,66.1//
GSP27moksop_u:35474: samādhyabhyāsaśuddhaṃ tat tasya cittaṃ kṣaṇena yat /
GSP27moksop_u:35475: cintayaty āśu tadbhāvaṃ gacchaty ambv iva vīcitām //MU_6,66.3//
GSP27moksop_u:35478: tasya cintayato jātā pratibheyam atha svataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35480: iti sañcintya ceto 'sya sthitaṃ kiñcin narāntaram /
GSP27moksop_u:35486: tatra pānaṃ papau matto bhṛṅgaḥ padmarasaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:35491: ājagāma ghanāṃ nidrāṃ bījatām iva pādapaḥ //MU_6,66.11//
GSP27moksop_u:35492: so 'py apaśyat svayaṃ svapne sāmantatvam athātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:35509: svapne dadarśa vallītvaṃ svābhyāsād rūḍham ātmani //MU_6,66.20//
GSP27moksop_u:35519: padminīṣu ca phullāsu taruṇīṣv iva vallabhaḥ //MU_6,66.25//
GSP27moksop_u:35523: kvacid eva ratiṃ yāti ceto jaḍamater api //MU_6,66.27//
GSP27moksop_u:35537: utkrāman sa gajāj jīvo bhūyo drāgity abhūd aliḥ //MU_6,66.34//
GSP27moksop_u:35538: sevamāno vanalatāḥ punar āyāt sa padminīm /
GSP27moksop_u:35542: sa haṃsaḥ phullapadmāsu sarasīṣu ciraṃ caran /
GSP27moksop_u:35543: kadācid bahubhir haṃsais saṅgato virarāja ha //MU_6,66.37//
GSP27moksop_u:35546: sa tāṃ vibhāvayan dūrād dṛḍhaṃ dāśeṣuṇā hataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35549: muktas sthito nanu yugāntavidhau videhamuktena tena kila bhāvyam avaśyam eva //MU_6,66.40//
GSP27moksop_u:35553: sa kadācid dadarśātha rudraṃ rudrapure khagaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35555: tatra buddhir abhūt tasya rudro 'ham iti niścitā /
GSP27moksop_u:35556: pratibimbaṃ varādarśe jhagity eva hi bimbati //MU_6,67.2//
GSP27moksop_u:35557: rudrībhūtavapus tatra tanuṃ tatyāja tām asau /
GSP27moksop_u:35562: svam aśeṣam udantaṃ tam apaśyat prāktanaṃ dhiyā //MU_6,67.5//
GSP27moksop_u:35565: aho nu citrā māyeyaṃ bata viśvavimohinī /
GSP27moksop_u:35574: tām eva so 'nvabhūd bhikṣus tyaktvānyaṃ mananodayam //MU_6,67.11//
GSP27moksop_u:35575: camatkṛtiś cetasi yā rūḍhā saiva vijṛmbhate /
GSP27moksop_u:35576: vallī tyajati naidāghī pītam apy ambu mādhavam //MU_6,67.12//
GSP27moksop_u:35577: sa bhikṣur jīvaṭo bhūtvā jantur jaraḍhavāsanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35578: teṣu deśeṣu babhrāma randhreṣv iva pipīlakaḥ //MU_6,67.13//
GSP27moksop_u:35582: sātatyena rasaḥ pītaḥ phalatām eti pādape //MU_6,67.15//
GSP27moksop_u:35584: sa kāmukatayā rājā surastrītvam avāpa ha //MU_6,67.16//
GSP27moksop_u:35586: babhūva vāsanāmohas tv aho duḥkhāya jantuṣu //MU_6,67.17//
GSP27moksop_u:35596: bahvīṣv aham abhibhrāntas tv aśūnyāsv iva bhūriśaḥ //MU_6,67.22//
GSP27moksop_u:35597: kasmiṃścid abhavaṃ sarge tv ahaṃ jīvaṭanāmakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35599: haṃsaḥ padmavane bhūtvā vindhyakacche ca vāraṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35600: hariṇo hehayādrau ca daśām aham imāṃ gataḥ //MU_6,67.24//
GSP27moksop_u:35603: mama prathamam eva prāksphuritasya parāt padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:35614: jāgratsvapneṣv asad api tat sad ity anubhūyate //MU_6,67.31//
GSP27moksop_u:35615: tat tad arthakriyākāri duḥkhāya ca sukhāya ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35617: bhāvanaiva svam ātmānaṃ deho 'yam iti paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:35619: bhāvanā prekṣyamāṇaiṣā na kiñcid api śiṣyate /
GSP27moksop_u:35620: naiva vidyata eveti tadbhrameṇālam astu naḥ //MU_6,67.34//
GSP27moksop_u:35624: pravartatāṃ vinodāya kim asan naḥ kariṣyati //MU_6,67.36//
GSP27moksop_u:35625: tat tān sarvān svasaṃsārān utthāyālokayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:35627: iti sañcintya rudro 'sau taṃ sargaṃ prajagāma ha /
GSP27moksop_u:35628: yatra bhikṣur vihārasthas suptaś śava iva sthitaḥ //MU_6,67.38//
GSP27moksop_u:35629: bodhayitvātha taṃ bhikṣuṃ cetasā cetanena ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35630: yojayām āsa sasmāra bhikṣur apy ātmano bhramam //MU_6,67.39//
GSP27moksop_u:35633: atha rudras tathā bhikṣur dvāv evotthāya jagmatuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35635: tatra tadbhavanaṃ gatvā tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam /
GSP27moksop_u:35636: viṣayaṃ taṃ puraṃ tac ca tac ca pānavaṇiggṛham //MU_6,67.42//
GSP27moksop_u:35639: taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35642: babhus tūṣṇīṃ sthitāś citre kṛtākārā iva kṣaṇam //MU_6,67.45//
GSP27moksop_u:35643: atha jagmuś ca te sarve kvacic cidvyomani sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:35645: tatra tadbhavanaṃ gatvā tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam /
GSP27moksop_u:35646: viṣayaṃ taṃ ca taṃ grāmaṃ prāpus te brāhmaṇālayam //MU_6,67.47//
GSP27moksop_u:35647: vipraṃ te dadṛśus suptaṃ kalatravalitaṃ gṛhe /
GSP27moksop_u:35648: kaṇṭhe gṛhītaṃ brāhmaṇyā bahirjīvam iva sthitam //MU_6,67.48//
GSP27moksop_u:35649: taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35650: tasthus te bahavo 'py eke savismayam avismayāḥ //MU_6,67.49//
GSP27moksop_u:35651: atha jagmuś cidākāśakacitaṃ cetitaṃ ca taiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35653: tatra tadbhavanaṃ prāpus tad dvīpaṃ tac ca maṇḍalam /
GSP27moksop_u:35659: taṃ prabodhya niyojyāśu cetasā cetanena ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35660: tasthus te bahavo 'py evaṃ savismayam avismayam //MU_6,67.54//
GSP27moksop_u:35661: atha te rājasaṃsāraṃ jagmus tatra prabodhya tam /
GSP27moksop_u:35663: prāpya tāṃ brahmahaṃsehāṃ rudratāṃ sarva eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:35664: samājagmur virejuś ca rudrāṇām uttamaṃ śatam //MU_6,67.56//
GSP27moksop_u:35669: daśa rudraśatānīha santi rāma mahānti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35670: etad ekādaśaṃ viddhi saṃsāraṃ prati saṃsthitam //MU_6,67.59//
GSP27moksop_u:35671: yo yo hi yasya jīvasya saṃsāras samudeti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:35673: milanti hi mitho buddhās taraṅgāmbv iva vāridhau /
GSP27moksop_u:35675: yathā dravatvād vīcyambūny anyo'nyaṃ sammilanty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:35676: tathā prabuddhā jīvaughā mithaś cittvān milanty alam //MU_6,67.62//
GSP27moksop_u:35678: ciddhātos sarvagatvena tv asatyās satyavat sthitāḥ //MU_6,67.63//
GSP27moksop_u:35679: yad yad ākhanyate bhūmes tat tan nāma yathāṅga mṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:35680: sarvagāyāś citer yad yad ūhyate tat tatheha cit //MU_6,67.64//
GSP27moksop_u:35684: prekṣyate tat tad evāśma tathā citi jagac citaḥ //MU_6,67.66//
GSP27moksop_u:35685: avedane pare śuddhe vedanaṃ yaj jaganti tat /
GSP27moksop_u:35687: cidghane vedanaṃ dṛśyaṃ bandho mokṣas tv avedanaṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:35688: yad eva rucitaṃ te syāt tad evāśu dṛḍhīkuru //MU_6,67.68//
GSP27moksop_u:35690: abhinnau bodhataś caitau yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_6,67.69//
GSP27moksop_u:35691: asaṃvittyaiva yan nāsti tannāśe kā kadarthanā /
GSP27moksop_u:35692: tūṣṇīmbhāvena yat prāpyaṃ prāptam evāśu viddhi tat //MU_6,67.70//
GSP27moksop_u:35694: tad vedanāvedanayor yad iṣṭaṃ tat samācara //MU_6,67.71//
GSP27moksop_u:35695: vīcir yathāmbhasi spando jagac citraṃ tathā citau /
GSP27moksop_u:35698: jagadādau tu deśādyā asanto nirmitāś citā //MU_6,67.73//
GSP27moksop_u:35699: ābhāsuraṃ trijagad ity avabhāti bhāsvat saṃvedanaṃ cayanam ekacites svarūpam /
GSP27moksop_u:35700: vāci sthitaṃ bhavati caitad upoḍhabhedaṃ kliṣṭaṃ praśāntavacanas tu śivaḥ parātmā //MU_6,67.74//
GSP27moksop_u:35701: saṃvedanaṃ sarga itīha śabdāv arthena bhinnau na kadācid etau /
GSP27moksop_u:35702: vīcyambhasī dve iti nocitoktir jñasyājñatāyāṃ tv idam eva yuktam //MU_6,67.75//
GSP27moksop_u:35709: rudreṇa saha sambhūya prabuddhās sarva eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:35710: mithaś ca dṛṣṭasaṃsārā rudrāṃśās sukhinas sthitāḥ //MU_6,68.2//
GSP27moksop_u:35711: tena rudreṇa tāṃ māyām avalokya tathoditām /
GSP27moksop_u:35712: svāṃśās tām eva saṃsārasthitiṃ te preṣitāḥ punaḥ //MU_6,68.3//
GSP27moksop_u:35714: gacchatāśu nijaṃ sthānaṃ tatra bhuktvā kalatrakaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35715: kañcit kālaṃ samaṃ bhogān matsakāśam upaiṣyatha //MU_6,68.4//
GSP27moksop_u:35717: tato mahāpralayato yāsyāmas tat padaṃ saha //MU_6,68.5//
GSP27moksop_u:35718: ity uktvā bhagavān rudras teṣāṃ so 'ntaradhīyata /
GSP27moksop_u:35729: yatra yan nāsti tan nāsti yatas sarvātma tat padam //MU_6,68.10//
GSP27moksop_u:35730: yat svapne dṛśyate yac ca saṅkalpair avalokyate /
GSP27moksop_u:35731: tat tathā vidyate tatra sarvakālaṃ tadātmakam //MU_6,68.11//
GSP27moksop_u:35735: na labhyate tathā svapno vinā tattāṃ na labhyate //MU_6,68.13//
GSP27moksop_u:35736: sarvam asti citaḥ kośe yad yathālokayaty asau /
GSP27moksop_u:35737: cit tat tathā tadāpnoti sarvātmatvād avikṣatam //MU_6,68.14//
GSP27moksop_u:35741: sarvaṃ sarvatra paśyanti ta ete śaṅkarādayaḥ //MU_6,68.16//
GSP27moksop_u:35742: idam agragataṃ vastu tathāsaṅkalpitaṃ ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35744: sarvaṃ hy abhimataṃ kāryam ekaniṣṭhasya sidhyati /
GSP27moksop_u:35745: dakṣiṇāṃ kakubhaṃ gacchan kaḥ prāpnoty uttarāṃ diśam //MU_6,68.18//
GSP27moksop_u:35749: yas sa nā naikaniṣṭhatvāt tadā tan nāśayed dvayam //MU_6,68.20//
GSP27moksop_u:35751: prāpya sarvātmano labdhaṃ padāt sarvaṃ tathāsthiteḥ //MU_6,68.21//
GSP27moksop_u:35753: paśyanti te ca nānyo'nyaṃ rudrajñānād ṛte tataḥ //MU_6,68.22//
GSP27moksop_u:35755: tadicchayāśu viduṣa iva mūrkhās sutā iva //MU_6,68.23//
GSP27moksop_u:35756: iha vidyādharo 'haṃ syām iha syām aham eḍikā /
GSP27moksop_u:35758: ekatvaṃ ca śatatvaṃ ca maurkhyaṃ pāṇḍityam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35764: yad icchati tad asty aṅga nanu sampadyate svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:35766: yoginyo yoginaś ceha tiṣṭhanty anyatra yānti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35767: iha cāmutra cehante dṛṣṭam etad anekaśaḥ //MU_6,68.29//
GSP27moksop_u:35769: viṣṇuḥ kṣīrodadhau tiṣṭhañ jāyate puruṣo bhuvi //MU_6,68.30//
GSP27moksop_u:35771: śakras svargāsane tiṣṭhan yāti yajñārtham urvarām //MU_6,68.31//
GSP27moksop_u:35773: nṛṇāṃ śatāni bhaktānāṃ yānti sāyujyatāṃ tanau //MU_6,68.32//
GSP27moksop_u:35774: ekas sahasraṃ bhavati tathā caiṣa janārdanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35778: tatra bhuktvā ciraṃ bhogān prāpya rudrapuraṃ tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35781: nānājagatsu ca tadā purapattaneṣu vidyādharīṣv amalamaulidharā ramante //MU_6,68.36//
GSP27moksop_u:35786: bhūtaṃ pratyekam evaivaṃ pṛthaṅ mṛtvā tu paśyati //MU_6,69.1//
GSP27moksop_u:35791: sarva eva mṛto jantuḥ pṛthak svapratibhātmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:35792: paśyaty evaṃ kharūpo 'pi dehī cāmokṣam ākulaḥ //MU_6,69.4//
GSP27moksop_u:35793: jīva eṣa mayā tubhyaṃ kathitaḥ kathayānayā /
GSP27moksop_u:35794: parāt praspanditātmeti na bhikṣū rāma kevalaḥ //MU_6,69.5//
GSP27moksop_u:35798: paśyaty asmād api svapnād yāti svapnāntaraṃ punaḥ //MU_6,69.7//
GSP27moksop_u:35801: kvacit kenacid evaiṣa kadācid vā na vā svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:35807: aho nu khalu vaiṣamyaṃ bhīmaṃ nijapadacyuteḥ //MU_6,69.11//
GSP27moksop_u:35809: tvayā sambhavatīty uktaṃ mayā tac cānubhūyate //MU_6,69.12//
GSP27moksop_u:35811: kvacid asti na vety antar ālokya kathayāśu me //MU_6,69.13//
GSP27moksop_u:35814: bhikṣur eṣo 'sti nāstīti prekṣya prātar vadāmy aham //MU_6,69.14//
GSP27moksop_u:35819: nṛpāḥ paurā viṭapinaḥ puṣpaṃ vātayutā iva //MU_6,69.16//
GSP27moksop_u:35827: jñānaṃ kṣapāṃ kṣaṇam iva ninyuḥ kalpam ivāpi ca //MU_6,69.20//
GSP27moksop_u:35828: prātaḥ punaḥ prasṛtakāryaparampare 'smiñ jāte jane khacarabhūcarasiddhasaṅghaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35838: bodhayanti balād eva sānukampā hi sādhavaḥ //MU_6,70.3//
GSP27moksop_u:35841: hyo mayā dhyānanetreṇa sa bhikṣuḥ prekṣitaś ciram //MU_6,70.4//
GSP27moksop_u:35844: yāvat kutaścid apy eva bhikṣur labdho na tādṛśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35845: kathaṃ kila manorājyaṃ bahir apy upalabhyate //MU_6,70.6//
GSP27moksop_u:35846: tatas tribhāgaśeṣāyāṃ rātrau punar ahaṃ dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:35854: bhṛtyāḥ prāyaḥ kila tathā sa tiṣṭhati subhikṣukaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35855: adyaivaṃ tasya sampannaṃ niyater īdṛśī sthitiḥ //MU_6,70.11//
GSP27moksop_u:35858: kasmiṃścit prāktane kalpe bhikṣur evaṃ purābhavat /
GSP27moksop_u:35859: adya tv iha dvitīyo 'sti tṛtīyo nopalabhyate //MU_6,70.13//
GSP27moksop_u:35860: mayā tu punar anviṣṭaś cetasā caturātmanā /
GSP27moksop_u:35862: asmāt sargāt tu no labdhas tṛtīyas tādṛgāśayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35863: athānye līlayā sargā mayā samprekṣitās tataḥ //MU_6,70.15//
GSP27moksop_u:35868: asyāṃ sabhāyām api ye munayo brāhmaṇā nṛpāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35869: bhāvyam evaṃsamācārais tair anyair apy anekaśaḥ //MU_6,70.18//
GSP27moksop_u:35871: evam evātriṇā bhāvyaṃ punar anyena cādhunā //MU_6,70.19//
GSP27moksop_u:35873: evaṃjanmādinā bhāvyaṃ vyāsena ca śukena ca //MU_6,70.20//
GSP27moksop_u:35874: janakena punar bhāvyaṃ kratunā pulahena ca /
GSP27moksop_u:35877: cirāc cirād bhaviṣyanti māyeyaṃ vitatā yataḥ //MU_6,70.22//
GSP27moksop_u:35879: bhūyo bhūyo vivartante sargeṣv apsv iva vīcayaḥ //MU_6,70.23//
GSP27moksop_u:35881: kecid īṣatsamāḥ kecin na kadācit punas tathā //MU_6,70.24//
GSP27moksop_u:35883: kṣaṇo nehāsti no kalpaḥ pratipattir hi jṛmbhate //MU_6,70.25//
GSP27moksop_u:35885: kva tāsām upalambho 'lam aho bhīmā manogatiḥ //MU_6,70.26//
GSP27moksop_u:35888: jātaṃ saṃvedanād eva śuddhād idam aśuddhavat /
GSP27moksop_u:35890: pratyekam evam uditaḥ pratibhāsaṣaṇḍaṣ ṣaṇḍāntareṣv api ca tatra vicitraṣaṇḍāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35891: sarve svayaṃ nanu ca te ca mitho na mithyā sarvātmani sphurati kāraṇakāraṇe 'smin //MU_6,70.29//
GSP27moksop_u:35894: munināyaka taṃ bhikṣuṃ gatvā sambodhayantv amī /
GSP27moksop_u:35897: rājaṃs tasya mahābhikṣos sa dehaḥ prāṇavarjitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35899: tasya bhikṣoś ca jīvo 'sau bhūtvā padmajasārasaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35903: anyenaiva sa dehena bhikṣur mukto vyavasthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35913: yo yo 'sya pratibhāsas syād ātmaiva sa sa bodhataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35916: bhikṣos svapnāntaram iva parād vīcir ivāmbhasaḥ //MU_6,71.11//
GSP27moksop_u:35921: sphuran parasmin pratyekaṃ jīvaḥ paśyati vibhramam /
GSP27moksop_u:35931: brahmaṇy eva paraṃ brahma jagaddṛṣṭyaiva sat sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:35936: sāpy alaṃ pariṇāmena līyate 'gnau ghṛtaṃ yathā //MU_6,71.21//
GSP27moksop_u:35939: na spando 'stīha nāspando naikatā nāpi ca dvitā /
GSP27moksop_u:35942: cinmātram api nāsty eva nāstīty api na vidyate //MU_6,71.24//
GSP27moksop_u:35946: prekṣakaś caiva nāsty eva tasmān niśśaṅkatā parā //MU_6,71.26//
GSP27moksop_u:35947: nātas svapno na jāgracchrīr na suṣuptaṃ na turyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:35948: na bandho 'sti na mokṣo 'sti nānyad vā kalanātmakam //MU_6,71.27//
GSP27moksop_u:35949: śāntir ekā jagannāmnī śāntāv iyam avasthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:35956: nāsau kalaṅkas tad viddhi cidghanasya ghanaṃ vapuḥ //MU_6,71.31//
GSP27moksop_u:35957: cidghanaś ca na san nāsat sthīyatāṃ tat tate pade /
GSP27moksop_u:35963: spandāspandau kalpanākalpanāṃśau cittvān nānyau cit tv anāmā niraṃśā /
GSP27moksop_u:35969: kalanāṃ kānta cidrūpas tiṣṭhāvaṣṭabhya tat padam //MU_6,72.1//
GSP27moksop_u:35971: vāṅmaunam akṣamaunaṃ ca kāṣṭhamaunaṃ ca vedmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:35972: suṣuptamaunaṃ mauneśaṃ brahman brūhi kim ucyate //MU_6,72.2//
GSP27moksop_u:35974: dvividhaḥ procyate rāma munir munivarair iha /
GSP27moksop_u:35979: lokopamo 'pi tṛpto 'ntar yas sa muktamunis smṛtaḥ //MU_6,72.5//
GSP27moksop_u:35980: etayor yo bhaved bhāvaś śāntayor munināthayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35982: catuṣprakāram āhus tan maunaṃ maunavido janāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35983: vāṅmaunam akṣamaunaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ sauṣuptam eva ca //MU_6,72.7//
GSP27moksop_u:35986: manomaunaṃ pañcamaṃ yat tan mṛte kāṣṭhatāpase /
GSP27moksop_u:35990: vāṅmaunaṃ maunam ity eva siddhaṃ tac ca manaḥkalā- /
GSP27moksop_u:35992: haṭhād vā yogayuktyaiva yas svākṣāṇāṃ vinigrahaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:35993: tad akṣamaunam ity āhus tatrasthāḥ kāṣṭhatāpasāḥ //MU_6,72.12//
GSP27moksop_u:35994: asmaran saṃsmaran vāpi dṛśyaṃ vāgdvayam aspṛśan /
GSP27moksop_u:35995: apaśyann eva paśyantīṃ kāṣṭhamaunī hi tiṣṭhati //MU_6,72.13//
GSP27moksop_u:35997: sambhavaty ajñamuniṣu na tu tajjñeṣu līlayā //MU_6,72.14//
GSP27moksop_u:35999: līlayā helayā vāpi tajjñāḥ kurvanti vā na vā //MU_6,72.15//
GSP27moksop_u:36002: nātra saṃyamyate vāṇī trividhā nāpi cojjhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:36004: nānātākalaneyaṃ hi na valgati na śāmyati /
GSP27moksop_u:36005: ceto na ceto nāceto na san nāsan na khaṃ na gauḥ //MU_6,72.18//
GSP27moksop_u:36007: dhyāyato dhāvataś caiva sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat //MU_6,72.19//
GSP27moksop_u:36009: yad āsitam asaṅgehaṃ sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat //MU_6,72.20//
GSP27moksop_u:36011: ity āsitam anantaṃ yat sauṣuptaṃ maunam aṅga tat //MU_6,72.21//
GSP27moksop_u:36012: ākāśaṃ naiva cākāśaṃ sarvam asmi na cāsmi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:36013: iti sthitaṃ samaṃ śāntaṃ yat tan maunaṃ suṣuptavat //MU_6,72.22//
GSP27moksop_u:36015: na san nāsad iti svastham āsitaṃ maunam uttamam //MU_6,72.23//
GSP27moksop_u:36017: saṃvido yad anāmarśas tan maunaṃ paramaṃ viduḥ //MU_6,72.24//
GSP27moksop_u:36019: yad anāvartanaṃ saṃvidvṛttes tan maunam akṣayam //MU_6,72.25//
GSP27moksop_u:36020: nāham asmi na cānyo 'sti na mano na ca mānasam /
GSP27moksop_u:36022: aham asmi jagac cāsti tv astiśabdārthamātrakam /
GSP27moksop_u:36025: anantam eva sauṣuptaṃ sarvaṃ maunam atas tatam //MU_6,72.28//
GSP27moksop_u:36027: turyam evāmalaṃ viddhi turyātītam athāpi vā //MU_6,72.29//
GSP27moksop_u:36029: turyātītasamādhir vā jāgraty api bhaveta vai //MU_6,72.30//
GSP27moksop_u:36030: turyastha eva sakalāmalaśāntavṛttir jāgraty api vyavaharan nipuṇaṃ svapitvā /
GSP27moksop_u:36031: nityaṃ sadeha uta vāpi videha eva brāhmaṃ nabho bhava tad eva kilāsi sādho //MU_6,72.31//
GSP27moksop_u:36032: om ity apāstabhavavāsanam ekam āssva na tvaṃ na cāham iti kiñcid ihāsti satyam /
GSP27moksop_u:36033: sarvaṃ ca vidyata itīha śilāntarābhaṃ jñas tiṣṭha cidgaganakośakalaikaniṣṭhaḥ //MU_6,72.32//
GSP27moksop_u:36038: ye gaṇās te ca kiṃ rudrā uta neti vadasva me //MU_6,73.1//
GSP27moksop_u:36041: sarvam uddeśato jñātam ata uktaṃ na tan mayā //MU_6,73.2//
GSP27moksop_u:36042: yad ākārāś śataṃ svapne tat tad gaṇaśataṃ smṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:36043: tad eva tad rudraśataṃ rudrā api gaṇābhidhāḥ //MU_6,73.3//
GSP27moksop_u:36045: ekasmād bhagavaṃś cittāt kathaṃ cittaśataṃ kṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:36049: tat tathāśu bhavaty eva na sāvaraṇasaṃvidaḥ //MU_6,73.5//
GSP27moksop_u:36050: sarvātmanas sarvagatvād yad yathā yatra bhāvyate /
GSP27moksop_u:36051: tathānubhūyate tatra tat tat tajjñena nādhiyā //MU_6,73.6//
GSP27moksop_u:36057: na kriyāniyamo 'stīha sa hy ajñeṣv eva kalpitaḥ //MU_6,73.8//
GSP27moksop_u:36059: gardhān mātsyena nyāyena paraṃ duḥkhaṃ prayānti hi //MU_6,73.9//
GSP27moksop_u:36060: tajjñās tv iṣṭeṣv aniṣṭeṣu na nimajjanti vastuṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:36062: kākatālīyavad rūḍhāṃ kriyāṃ kurvanti te sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:36063: na kurvanty api vā kecin naiṣāṃ kvacid api grahaḥ //MU_6,73.11//
GSP27moksop_u:36066: na nindyam asti nānindyaṃ nopādeyaṃ na heyakam /
GSP27moksop_u:36067: na cātmīyaṃ na ca paraṃ karma jñaviṣayaṃ kvacit //MU_6,73.13//
GSP27moksop_u:36069: harādīnāṃ tathā karma dvijātīnāṃ ca jātayaḥ //MU_6,73.14//
GSP27moksop_u:36073: noktaṃ te pañcamaṃ maunaṃ videhasya raghūdvaha //MU_6,73.16//
GSP27moksop_u:36074: khād apy atitarām accham ātmākāśaṃ cidātmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:36075: tatra prāptiḥ paraṃ śreyas sā kathaṃ prāpyate śṛṇu //MU_6,73.17//
GSP27moksop_u:36077: saṅkhyayaivāvabuddhā ye te sāṅkhyā yoginas smṛtāḥ //MU_6,73.18//
GSP27moksop_u:36080: upādeyaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ śāntaṃ padam akṛtrimam /
GSP27moksop_u:36081: tat kaiścit saṅkhyayā prāptaṃ kaiścid yogena dehataḥ //MU_6,73.20//
GSP27moksop_u:36082: ekaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:36083: yat sāṅkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ paraṃ yogais tad eva hi //MU_6,73.21//
GSP27moksop_u:36086: vāsanāṃ cittam evāhuḥ kāraṇaṃ tad dhi saṃsṛteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36088: manaḥ paśyati vai dehaṃ bālo vetālakaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:36089: ātmānaṃ vilayaṃ nītvā na bhūyas taṃ prapaśyati //MU_6,73.24//
GSP27moksop_u:36092: mano'bhāvān na saṃsāraḥ kvāmodaḥ kusumaṃ vinā /
GSP27moksop_u:36097: yadi hi prāṇavilayo mune mokṣasya kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:36098: mṛtā eva hi mucyante tan manye sarvajantavaḥ //MU_6,73.28//
GSP27moksop_u:36101: sādhyaṃ viddhi tad evāśu yathā bhavati tac chivam //MU_6,73.29//
GSP27moksop_u:36103: tadā na bhūyas tanmātrair yānti vyomani saṅgamam //MU_6,73.30//
GSP27moksop_u:36106: savāsanās tu yady ete prāṇā muñcanti dehakam /
GSP27moksop_u:36108: manas sāmbur ivāmbhodo na śāmyati savāsanam /
GSP27moksop_u:36110: na jahāti manaḥ prāṇān vinā jñānena karhicit /
GSP27moksop_u:36112: jñānād avāsanībhāvaṃ svanāśaṃ prāpya vai manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36113: prāṇaspandaṃ ca nādatte tataś śāntir hi śiṣyate //MU_6,73.35//
GSP27moksop_u:36116: tato na paśyati manaḥ praśāntaṃ dehatāṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36117: svanāśena padaṃ prāptaṃ vāsanaiva mano viduḥ //MU_6,73.37//
GSP27moksop_u:36118: ceto hi vāsanāmātraṃ tadabhāvaḥ paraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:36119: tac ca sampadyate jñānāj jñānam āhur vicāraṇam //MU_6,73.38//
GSP27moksop_u:36120: ity asyās saṃsṛte rāma paryantas sampravartate /
