GSP27moksop_u:36127: yathāvāsitam evedaṃ manaḥ paśyanti tatra ca //MU_6,73.42//
GSP27moksop_u:36128: yathā videhāḥ paśyanti prāṇā vyomani dehakam /
GSP27moksop_u:36134: manasas spandanaṃ prāṇaḥ prāṇasya spandanaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36137: kurutaś ca svanāśena kāryaṃ mokṣākhyam uttamam //MU_6,73.47//
GSP27moksop_u:36141: manas tatas tallayatas tad eva bhavati sthiram //MU_6,73.49//
GSP27moksop_u:36143: dvayor apy asatos tatra śeṣe vāpi sthiro bhava //MU_6,73.50//
GSP27moksop_u:36144: ekasmin sudṛḍhe tattve tāvad bhāvaṃ vibhāvayet /
GSP27moksop_u:36148: yadekatānaṃ bhavati cetas tad bhavati kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:36150: avidyeyaṃ tu nāstīti buddhvā yuktiyutaṃ dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:36151: jñānād eva parāvāptis tadabhyāsas tato varam //MU_6,73.54//
GSP27moksop_u:36153: jarām upagate meghe mihikā mahatī yathā //MU_6,73.55//
GSP27moksop_u:36156: muhūrtam eva nirvāṇaṃ yadi cetaḥ pare pade /
GSP27moksop_u:36158: yadi sāṅkhyena viśrāntaṃ ceto yogena vā pade /
GSP27moksop_u:36159: kṣaṇaṃ tat sattvatāṃ yātaṃ na bhūyaḥ parijāyate //MU_6,73.58//
GSP27moksop_u:36161: dagdhaṃ saṃsārabījaṃ tan na dadyād aṅkuraṃ punaḥ //MU_6,73.59//
GSP27moksop_u:36163: samaṃ śūnyopamaṃ śāntaṃ jyotiḥ paśyati śāmyati //MU_6,73.60//
GSP27moksop_u:36164: vigalitājñapadaṃ vimalaṃ manas subhaga sattvam itīha hi kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:36165: na punar eti kalāmalinaṃ padaṃ kanakatām iva tāmram upāgatam //MU_6,73.61//
GSP27moksop_u:36170: vicārād ity avidyānto mokṣa ity abhidhīyate //MU_6,74.1//
GSP27moksop_u:36172: asad eva manāg eva tad vicārāt pralīyate //MU_6,74.2//
GSP27moksop_u:36174: praśnān ākarṇaya śubhān prasaṅgāt smṛtim āgatān //MU_6,74.3//
GSP27moksop_u:36176: sa kiñcin maṇḍalaṃ gardhād ājagāma jighatsayā //MU_6,74.4//
GSP27moksop_u:36180: kṣudhito 'pi naraṃ hanti saṅgo hi nyāyadaiśikaḥ //MU_6,74.6//
GSP27moksop_u:36187: kva gacchasi vinaṣṭo 'si bhavān bhojanam adya me //MU_6,74.9//
GSP27moksop_u:36189: bho rātricara nirnyāyaṃ māṃ ced atsi balād iha /
GSP27moksop_u:36190: tat te sahasradhā mūrdhā sphuṭiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ //MU_6,74.10//
GSP27moksop_u:36192: na tvām admy aham anyāyaṃ nyāyo 'yaṃ tu mayocyate /
GSP27moksop_u:36195: praśnān imān mayoktāṃs tvaṃ samyag vyākhyātum arhasi //MU_6,74.12//
GSP27moksop_u:36196: kasya sūryasya raśmīnāṃ brahmāṇḍāny aṇavaḥ kṛśāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36199: tyajan na tyajati svacchaṃ kas svarūpaṃ prabhāsuram //MU_6,74.14//
GSP27moksop_u:36200: rambhāstambho yathā pattramātram eva punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36201: antar antas tathāntaś ca tathā ko 'ṇus sa eva hi //MU_6,74.15//
GSP27moksop_u:36206: iti kathayasi cen na me durātmaṃs tad iha nigīrya bhavantam ātmaghātin /
GSP27moksop_u:36207: phalam iva tava maṇḍalaṃ graseyaṃ prasabham upetya jagad yathā kṛtāntaḥ //MU_6,74.18//
GSP27moksop_u:36211: ity uktavati vetāle vaktuṃ praśnān vihasya saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36216: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi phalānāṃ yatra santi hi /
GSP27moksop_u:36217: asty uccais tādṛśī śākhā vipulā calapallavā //MU_6,75.3//
GSP27moksop_u:36218: tādṛśīnāṃ sahasrāṇi śākhānāṃ yatra santy atha /
GSP27moksop_u:36222: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi vanānāṃ yatra santy atha /
GSP27moksop_u:36223: tādṛg asti bṛhac chṛṅgam atyuccair bharitākṛti //MU_6,75.6//
GSP27moksop_u:36224: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi śṛṅgāṇāṃ yatra santy atha /
GSP27moksop_u:36226: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi śailānāṃ yatra santy atha /
GSP27moksop_u:36228: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi deśānāṃ yatra santy atha /
GSP27moksop_u:36230: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi dvīpānāṃ yatra santy atha /
GSP27moksop_u:36232: tādṛśīnāṃ sahasrāṇi pṛthvīnāṃ yatra santy atha /
GSP27moksop_u:36234: tādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi jagatāṃ yatra santy atha /
GSP27moksop_u:36242: tādṛśānāṃ nṛṇāṃ lakṣair yasya mālorasi sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:36246: tādṛśo 'sti mahādityas sa tapaty āsu dṛṣṭiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:36247: yā etāḥ kalanās sarvās tā etās tasya dīptayaḥ //MU_6,75.18//
GSP27moksop_u:36249: eṣa citsūrya ity uktas sarvam etat tapaty asau //MU_6,75.19//
GSP27moksop_u:36253: imā jagadaharlakṣmyas tv aharlakṣmyo raver iva //MU_6,75.21//
GSP27moksop_u:36255: nirmajjanodbhavanasambhramabhāvalekhās santīva neha hi manāg api śāntam āssva //MU_6,75.22//
GSP27moksop_u:36264: rūpaṃ tyajati no śāntaṃ brahma śāntatvabṛṃhitam //MU_6,76.3//
GSP27moksop_u:36267: saṅkalpaś ca parād asmān manāg api na bhidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:36268: cinmayatvāt tataḥ kiñcin na bṛṃhāsti na bṛṃhaṇam //MU_6,76.5//
GSP27moksop_u:36270: antar antas tathedaṃ hi viśvaṃ brahma vivarty atha //MU_6,76.6//
GSP27moksop_u:36272: śūnyam avyapadeśyaṃ tan na nakiñcin na kiñcana //MU_6,76.7//
GSP27moksop_u:36273: yā yā vibhāvyate sattā sā sānubhavanirmitā /
GSP27moksop_u:36277: aṇor apy atyanantasya puro 'sya jagadādy api /
GSP27moksop_u:36283: vijñānamātram akalākalitaṃ jaganti śāntaṃ svabhāvasukumāram anantarūpam /
GSP27moksop_u:36284: vetālabālaka padaṃ tad alaṅghanīyam evaṃsmayas samanubhāvaya śāntam āssva //MU_6,76.13//
GSP27moksop_u:36288: iti rājamukhāc chrutvā vetālaś śāntim āyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:36295: kopo vetālakasyeva śiṣyate yat paraṃ tu tat //MU_6,77.4//
GSP27moksop_u:36302: sampūrṇaśāntamanasaḥ paritṛptavṛtter nityaṃ same susamam ātmani tiṣṭhato 'ntaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36303: sidhyanti durlabhatarā api vāñchitārthā gaṅgāvatāra iva sāgarakhātṛnaptuḥ //MU_6,77.8//
GSP27moksop_u:36309: bhagīrathasya sampannaṃ tan me kathaya bhoḥ prabho //MU_6,78.1//
GSP27moksop_u:36315: sādhūnāṃ yo vyavasthārthaṃ dhanāny avirataṃ dadau /
GSP27moksop_u:36317: vajrasāram api protam ajvalann eva yo 'bhinat /
GSP27moksop_u:36319: adhūmo hy adahañ śīto vitaikṣṇyo hārdam apy alam /
GSP27moksop_u:36320: tamo 'haran nṛṇāṃ naiśaṃ yo maṇir veśmanām iva //MU_6,78.6//
GSP27moksop_u:36324: sve jane dravati snigdhas sendur indumaṇir yathā //MU_6,78.8//
GSP27moksop_u:36331: brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ jahnuṃ tapasārādhayaṃś ca yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36332: bhūyo bhūyo yayau khedaṃ na mūrtavyavasāyavat //MU_6,78.12//
GSP27moksop_u:36336: cetasy api sutāruṇye daivād vallī marāv iva //MU_6,78.14//
GSP27moksop_u:36337: ekānte cintayām āsa mahīpatir asāv atha /
GSP27moksop_u:36339: punar dinaṃ punaś śyāmā dānādānāśanaṃ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36340: tad eva śuktavirasaṃ lajjyate karma kurvatā //MU_6,78.16//
GSP27moksop_u:36342: tat kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ manye śeṣaṃ karmaviṣūcikā //MU_6,78.17//
GSP27moksop_u:36343: punaḥ punaḥ paryuṣitaṃ karma kurvan na lajjate /
GSP27moksop_u:36344: mūḍhabuddhir amūḍhas tu kaḥ kuryāt kila bālavat //MU_6,78.18//
GSP27moksop_u:36349: araṇyānīṣv ivaitāsu bhṛśaṃ khinnā vayaṃ vibho //MU_6,78.20//
GSP27moksop_u:36358: sa ca sarvagato nityaṃ nāstam eti na codayam //MU_6,78.24//
GSP27moksop_u:36360: cinmātraṃ sarvagaṃ śāntam asti nirmalam acyutam /
GSP27moksop_u:36361: dehādi netarat kiñcid iti vedmi munīśvara //MU_6,78.25//
GSP27moksop_u:36362: kiṃ tv atra pratipattir me sphuṭatām eti notarām /
GSP27moksop_u:36366: tatas sarvavapur bhūtvā bhūyo jīvo na jāyate //MU_6,78.27//
GSP27moksop_u:36372: etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā //MU_6,78.30//
GSP27moksop_u:36376: śarīre 'smiṃś ciraṃ rūḍho girau tarur ivoccakaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36377: ahambhāvo mahābhogo vada me tyajyate katham //MU_6,78.32//
GSP27moksop_u:36381: yantrāṇāṃ pañjaraṃ yāvad bhagnaṃ lajjādi nākhilam /
GSP27moksop_u:36383: sarvam eva dhiyas tyaktvā yadi tiṣṭhasi niścalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36384: tad ahaṅkāravilayī tvam eva paramaṃ padam //MU_6,78.35//
GSP27moksop_u:36385: śāntāśeṣaviśeṣaṇo vigatabhīs santyaktasarvaiṣaṇo gatvā nūnam akiñcanatvam ariṣu tyaktvā samagrāṃ śriyam /
GSP27moksop_u:36386: śāntāhaṅkṛtir astadehakalanas teṣv eva bhikṣām aṭan mām apy ujjhitavān alaṃ yadi bhavasy uccais tad uccair asi //MU_6,78.36//
GSP27moksop_u:36390: atha tasya guror vaktrād ity ākarṇya bhagīrathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36392: tataḥ katipayeṣv eva vāsareṣu gateṣv asau /
GSP27moksop_u:36399: sīmāntine tṛṇam iva rājyaṃ svam araye dadau //MU_6,79.5//
GSP27moksop_u:36400: ākrānte dviṣatā rājye pure sadmani maṇḍale /
GSP27moksop_u:36402: yatra na jñāyate nāmnā yatra na jñāyate mukhāt /
GSP27moksop_u:36407: bhūpena śatruṇā prāptaṃ svam eva prāpa tat puram //MU_6,79.9//
GSP27moksop_u:36409: paurāṃś ca mantriṇaś caiva śamī bhikṣām ayācata //MU_6,79.10//
GSP27moksop_u:36410: vividus te 'rayaḥ paurā mantriṇaś ca bhagīratham /
GSP27moksop_u:36411: pūjayām āsur atha taṃ saviṣādās saparyayā //MU_6,79.11//
GSP27moksop_u:36412: prabho rājyaṃ gṛhāṇeti prārthito 'py ariṇā muniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36414: katicid divasāṃs tatra nītvānyatra jagāma saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36415: bhagīratho 'yaṃ hā kaṣṭam iti lokena śocitaḥ //MU_6,79.13//
GSP27moksop_u:36417: ātmārāmaḥ kadācit tu sa prāpa tryuttulaṃ gurum //MU_6,79.14//
GSP27moksop_u:36418: svam eva svāgataṃ kṛtvā tena sārdhaṃ bhagīrathaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36419: kañcit kālam uvāsādrau vane grāme pure jane //MU_6,79.15//
GSP27moksop_u:36420: samatām upayātau tau guruśiṣyau samau sthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:36422: kim ayaṃ dhāryate dehaḥ kim anenojjhitena naḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36424: iti niścitya tiṣṭhantau tau vanād vanagāminau /
GSP27moksop_u:36425: nanandatur anānandaṃ na sukhaṃ na ca madhyamam //MU_6,79.18//
GSP27moksop_u:36427: siddhair apy arpitaṃ tuṣṭair menāte jarjaraṃ tṛṇam //MU_6,79.19//
GSP27moksop_u:36431: sukham asaukhyam apīpsitavarjitau samasamau khasamau śaminau svataḥ //MU_6,79.21//
GSP27moksop_u:36436: anapatyaṃ nṛpaṃ mṛtyur aharat svam ivāmiṣam //MU_6,80.1//
GSP27moksop_u:36439: tā bhagīratham āsādya sthitaṃ bhikṣāśanaṃ pure /
GSP27moksop_u:36442: dhūlitas senayā gurvyā jhagity āropito gaje //MU_6,80.4//
GSP27moksop_u:36445: tatra tat pālayantaṃ taṃ rājyaṃ rājānam ādṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36448: rājann asmākam adhipo yas tvayā sa purā kṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36450: tat tat pālayituṃ rājyaṃ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi /
GSP27moksop_u:36453: iti samprārthito rājā tad aṅgīkṛtya tadvacaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36459: tadā kila svarganadī vahati sma na bhūtale /
GSP27moksop_u:36462: gaṅgāṃ gṛhīto niyamas tadā prabhṛti bhūbhṛtā //MU_6,80.13//
GSP27moksop_u:36463: tato rājyaṃ parityajya mantriṇāṃ bhūpatiś śamī /
GSP27moksop_u:36465: tatra varṣasahasrais sa samārādhya punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36466: brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ jahnuṃ bhuvi gaṅgām ayojayat //MU_6,80.15//
GSP27moksop_u:36468: nabhastalān nipatati gāṃ trimārgagā mahātmanām iva bahupuṇyasantatiḥ //MU_6,80.16//
GSP27moksop_u:36470: bhagīrathe mahīpatau yaśaḥpracāravīthikā tadādi sā trimārgagā mahītale babhūva ha //MU_6,80.17//
GSP27moksop_u:36475: samas svastho yathāprāptaṃ kāryam āhara śāntadhīḥ //MU_6,81.1//
GSP27moksop_u:36476: idaṃ pūrvaṃ parityajya kroḍīkṛtya tatas svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:36477: śāntam ātmani tiṣṭha tvaṃ śikhidhvaja ivācalaḥ //MU_6,81.2//
GSP27moksop_u:36479: ko 'sau śikhidhvajo nāma kathaṃ vā labdhavān padam /
GSP27moksop_u:36480: etat kathaya me brahman bhūyo bodhābhivṛddhaye //MU_6,81.3//
GSP27moksop_u:36485: yat pūrvam āsīd bhagavaṃs tad idānīṃ tathaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:36486: bhaviṣyati kimarthaṃ vai vada me vadatāṃ vara //MU_6,81.5//
GSP27moksop_u:36489: īdṛśy eva sthitir nityam anivāryā svabhāvajā //MU_6,81.6//
GSP27moksop_u:36490: yad anyad bahuśo bhūtvā punar bhavati bhūriśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36491: abhūtvaiva bhavaty anyat punaś ca na bhavaty alam //MU_6,81.7//
GSP27moksop_u:36494: sadṛśyo viṣamāś caiva yathā sarasi vīcayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36495: tā evānyāś ca dṛśyante vyavasthās saṃsṛtau tathā //MU_6,81.9//
GSP27moksop_u:36498: dvāpare pūrvam abhavad atīte saptame manau /
GSP27moksop_u:36510: sa bhogaughān anādṛtya straiṇaṃ tṛṇavad utsṛjan /
GSP27moksop_u:36515: dhīmān sa mantribhis sārdhaṃ yaśasā śuklayan diśaḥ //MU_6,81.19//
GSP27moksop_u:36516: atha gacchatsu varṣeṣu vasante prollasaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:36524: kāntāṃ prati babhūvāsya navaṃ cetas samutsukam /
GSP27moksop_u:36542: evam asya vidur bhavyā mantriṇo navaniścayam /
GSP27moksop_u:36547: upayeme sa tām ātmasadṛśīṃ pratimām iva //MU_6,81.35//
GSP27moksop_u:36549: sā taṃ bhartāram āsādya reje phulleva padminī //MU_6,81.36//
GSP27moksop_u:36564: svarūpam ekam evaitau dadhatur miśratāṃ gatau /
GSP27moksop_u:36571: mitho hṛdayasaṃsthau tau dvāv apy aikyam ivāsthitau //MU_6,81.47//
GSP27moksop_u:36580: reje lasannṛpatibhogavilāsakāntam antaḥpureṣu mithunaṃ tad anuttamaśri /
GSP27moksop_u:36592: mithunaṃ taj jagadyātrām imām ittham aśāśvatīm //MU_6,82.4//
GSP27moksop_u:36597: āyur galaty avirataṃ jalaṃ karatalād iva /
GSP27moksop_u:36599: śailanadyā raya iva samprayāty eva yauvanam /
GSP27moksop_u:36602: patanti ceto duḥkhāni dhṛṣṭā gṛdhrā ivāmiṣam //MU_6,82.9//
GSP27moksop_u:36606: balād aratir āyātā vairasyam iva pādapam //MU_6,82.11//
GSP27moksop_u:36607: tad iha syāt kusaṃsāre kiṃ nāma bata śobhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:36608: yad āsādya punaś ceto daśāsu na vidūyate //MU_6,82.12//
GSP27moksop_u:36610: ciraṃ vicārayām āsa śāstram adhyātma sammatam //MU_6,82.13//
GSP27moksop_u:36619: itthaṃ vicārayām āsa svam ātmānam aharniśam /
GSP27moksop_u:36621: prekṣe tāvat svam ātmānaṃ kim idaṃ syām iti svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:36622: kasyāyaṃ jāgato mohaḥ katham abhyutthitaḥ kva vā //MU_6,82.19//
GSP27moksop_u:36623: dehas tāvaj jaḍo mūko nāham ity eva niścayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36628: preryate manasā yasmād yaṣṭyeva bhuvi loṣṭakaḥ //MU_6,82.22//
GSP27moksop_u:36635: jīvaś ca kalanākāro vātātmā hṛdaye sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36642: mahājaḍagato hy agnir api rūpaṃ svam ujjhati //MU_6,82.29//
GSP27moksop_u:36643: sad vāsad vā yad ābhāsi cit samācāmati svataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36644: svaṃ rūpam alam utsṛjya tad eva bhavati kṣaṇāt //MU_6,82.30//
GSP27moksop_u:36645: evaṃ cidrūpam apy etac cetyonmukhatayā svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:36647: iti sañcintya cūḍālā kenaiṣā cit pracetate /
GSP27moksop_u:36648: iti sañcintayām āsa cirāc cetthaṃ vyabudhyata //MU_6,82.32//
GSP27moksop_u:36649: aho nu cirakālena jñātaṃ jñeyam anāmayam /
GSP27moksop_u:36650: yad vai ciccamitaṃ kṛtvā na kiñcid dūyate punaḥ //MU_6,82.33//
GSP27moksop_u:36658: cetyacetanacittādi nāsyā bhinnaṃ na sā tataḥ //MU_6,82.37//
GSP27moksop_u:36659: tayaiṣā cetyate cicchrīs saiṣādyā cid iti smṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:36660: acetyaṃ yad idaṃ cittvaṃ tat tasyā rūpam akṣatam //MU_6,82.38//
GSP27moksop_u:36664: yad idaṃ tat paraṃ rūpaṃ tasyāḥ khalu mahāciteḥ //MU_6,82.40//
GSP27moksop_u:36669: sā yathodeti tadrūpam ātmānaṃ cetati svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:36674: na tasya janmamaraṇe na ca stas sadasadgatī //MU_6,82.45//
GSP27moksop_u:36675: na nāśas sambhavaty asya cinmātranabhasaḥ kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:36685: idam aikyam idaṃ dvitvam ahaṃ nāham itīti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:36686: ka iha bhramasammohaḥ kathaṃ kasya kutaḥ kva vā //MU_6,82.51//
GSP27moksop_u:36687: tad anantam anāyāsam upaśāntāsmi khaṃ sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:36689: acetanaṃ cetanaṃ vā yo yo nāmābhicetati /
GSP27moksop_u:36691: teneha nāham nānyaś ca na bhāvābhāvasambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36692: śāntaṃ sarvaṃ nirālambaṃ kevalaṃ saṃsthitaṃ param //MU_6,82.54//
GSP27moksop_u:36693: itthaṃ vicāraṇaparā paramāvabodhād buddhvā yathāsthitam idaṃ paramātmatattvam /
GSP27moksop_u:36706: iti sā mahiṣī tasya cūḍālā varavarṇinī /
GSP27moksop_u:36709: yathā ca līyate sarvaṃ tat taj jñātavatī babhau //MU_6,83.6//
GSP27moksop_u:36713: jaradgur iva śailāgraṃ satṛṇaṃ prāpya saṃsthitā //MU_6,83.8//
GSP27moksop_u:36716: atha tām anavadyāṅgīṃ kadācit sa śikhidhvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36722: upaśāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca dadhānā sundaraṃ vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36723: abhibhūyendum āyāsi śriyaṃ kām api kāmini //MU_6,83.13//
GSP27moksop_u:36725: gambhīraṃ ca prasannaṃ ca cetaḥ paśyāmi te priye //MU_6,83.14//
GSP27moksop_u:36727: anantodbhāsuraṃ saumyaṃ manaḥ paśyāmi te priye //MU_6,83.15//
GSP27moksop_u:36731: aṅgais sthitim anujjhadbhir vṛddhiṃ yāteva lakṣyase //MU_6,83.17//
GSP27moksop_u:36734: kiṃ tvayā pītam amṛtaṃ prāptaṃ sāmrājyam eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:36736: rājyāc cintāmaṇer vāpi trailokyād vā tvayādhikam /
GSP27moksop_u:36741: yat kiñcid yan nakiñcic ca taj jānāmi yathāsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:36743: bhogair abhuktais tuṣyāmi bhuktair iva sudūragaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36744: na hṛṣyāmi na kupyāmi tenāsmi śrīmatī sthitā //MU_6,83.23//
GSP27moksop_u:36746: na rame rājalīlāsu tenāsmi śrīmatī sthitā //MU_6,83.24//
GSP27moksop_u:36747: ātmany eva hi tiṣṭhāmi na vanodyānasadmasu /
GSP27moksop_u:36748: na bhogaugheṣu śayyāsu tenāsmi śrīmatī sthitā //MU_6,83.25//
GSP27moksop_u:36750: ity ātmany eva tiṣṭhāmi tenāhaṃ śrīmatī sthitā //MU_6,83.26//
GSP27moksop_u:36751: anyaivāham iyaṃ nāham anyā ceyaṃ ca vāpy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:36752: sarvam asmi nakiñcid vā tenāhaṃ śrīmatī sthitā //MU_6,83.27//
GSP27moksop_u:36753: yat paśyāmi na paśyāmi tat paśyāmy anyad eva yat /
GSP27moksop_u:36754: iti samyak prapaśyāmi tenāhaṃ śrīmatī sthitā //MU_6,83.28//
GSP27moksop_u:36755: na sukhaṃ prārthaye nārthaṃ nānarthaṃ cetarāṃ sthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:36758: rame saha vayasyābhis tenāsmi śrīmatī sthitā //MU_6,83.30//
GSP27moksop_u:36759: paśyāmi yan nayanaraśmibhir indriyair vā cittena ceha hi tad aṅga na kiñcid eva /
GSP27moksop_u:36760: paśyāmi tadvirahitaṃ tu nakiñcidābhaṃ paśyāmi samyag iti nātha cirodayāsmi //MU_6,83.31//
GSP27moksop_u:36764: evam ātmani viśrāntāṃ vadantīṃ tāṃ varānanām /
GSP27moksop_u:36766: bhogalampaṭayā buddhyā mugdhām āśaṅkya tāṃ priyām /
GSP27moksop_u:36771: kiñcit tyaktvā nakiñcid yo gataḥ pratyakṣasaṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:36773: bhogair abhuktais tuṣṭo 'ham iti bhogāñ jahāti yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36776: yas tiṣṭhaty ātmanaivaikas sa kathaṃ kila śobhate //MU_6,84.6//
GSP27moksop_u:36777: svayaṃ nakiñcid evāhaṃ jagadīśo 'smi ceti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:36778: niścayo yasya durbuddhes sa kathaṃ kila śobhate //MU_6,84.7//
GSP27moksop_u:36780: yas sthitaś śvabhrataruvat sa kathaṃ kila śobhate //MU_6,84.8//
GSP27moksop_u:36781: nāhaṃ deho 'nyad evāhaṃ nakiñcit sarvam eva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:36782: evaṃ pralāpo yasyāsti sa kathaṃ kila śobhate //MU_6,84.9//
GSP27moksop_u:36783: yat paśyāmi na paśyāmi tat paśyāmy anyad eva yat /
GSP27moksop_u:36784: pralāpa ity asan yasya sa kathaṃ kila śobhate //MU_6,84.10//
GSP27moksop_u:36789: kaṣṭaṃ nātmani viśrānto madvacāṃsi na buddhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:36792: tābhiḥ pārthivalīlābhir divasas sa jagāma ha //MU_6,84.14//
GSP27moksop_u:36793: krameṇa māsā ṛtavo rāma saṃvatsarās tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:36794: atītā bahavas tatra dampatyos snigdhayos tayoḥ //MU_6,84.15//
GSP27moksop_u:36802: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sasthāsnujaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:36803: spandasya tat kriyānāmnaḥ phalam ity anubhūyate //MU_6,84.19//
GSP27moksop_u:36806: ātmajño vāpy anātmajñas siddhyarthaṃ līlayā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:36807: kathaṃ saṃsādhayaty etad yathāvad vada me vibho //MU_6,84.21//
GSP27moksop_u:36809: trividhaṃ sambhavaty aṅga sādhyaṃ vastv iha sarvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36810: upādeyaṃ ca heyaṃ ca tathopekṣyaṃ ca rāghava //MU_6,84.22//
GSP27moksop_u:36811: ātmabhūtaṃ prayatnena hy upādeyaṃ tu sādhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:36812: heyaṃ santyajyate jñātvā hy upekṣyaṃ madhyam etayoḥ //MU_6,84.23//
GSP27moksop_u:36813: yad yad āhlādanakaram ādeyaṃ tad asanmateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36815: sanmater viduṣo jñasya sarvam ātmamayaṃ yadā /
GSP27moksop_u:36816: traya eva tadā pakṣās sambhavanti na kecana //MU_6,84.25//
GSP27moksop_u:36817: kevalaṃ sarvam evedaṃ kadācil līlayā na vā /
GSP27moksop_u:36818: upekṣyam akṣinikṣiptam ālokayati vā na vā //MU_6,84.26//
GSP27moksop_u:36824: siddhyādisādhane sādhos tanmayās te yataḥ kramāḥ //MU_6,84.29//
GSP27moksop_u:36829: śrīśaile siddhadeśe ca mervādau vā nivāsataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36830: siddhir ity api vistāraḥ kriyotthā prakṛtārthahā //MU_6,84.32//
GSP27moksop_u:36854: yā vātaśaktis sphurati veṇāv iva lasadgatiḥ //MU_6,84.44//
GSP27moksop_u:36861: yadā kuṇḍalinī dehe sphuraty abja ivālinī /
GSP27moksop_u:36864: yathā saṃvid udety uccais tathā kuṇḍalinī javāt //MU_6,84.49//
GSP27moksop_u:36868: sā sarvasaṃvidāṃ bījam ekam ādyam udāhṛtam //MU_6,84.51//
GSP27moksop_u:36874: kiṃ tv asyā bhūtatanmātravaśād abhyudayaḥ kvacit //MU_6,84.53//
GSP27moksop_u:36877: kvacin naṣṭaṃ kvacit suptaṃ kvacid ucchūnatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:36878: vastu vastuni yad dṛṣṭaṃ tat svabhāvavijṛmbhitam //MU_6,84.55//
GSP27moksop_u:36879: etad bhūyaḥ krameṇāhaṃ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te 'nagha /
GSP27moksop_u:36880: deheṣv eva yathodeti bhṛśaṃ saṃvinmayaḥ kramaḥ //MU_6,84.56//
GSP27moksop_u:36885: tat pañcakaṃ gataṃ dvitvaṃ likṣādyantaṃ svasaṃvidā /
GSP27moksop_u:36891: evaṃ hi pañcakaṃ spandamātraṃ jagad iti sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:36895: yathābdhiṣv ambv ito vīcir itas talam iti sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:36896: pañcakeṣu tathetaś cil lolarūpā jaḍā tv itaḥ //MU_6,84.64//
GSP27moksop_u:36897: itas somya ito lolaḥ kim abdhir iti no yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:36905: vāsanāṃśaviparyastā ito netum itaś ca tāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36907: aśubhe vā śubhe vāpi tena paryanuyojyate /
GSP27moksop_u:36910: tatra taṃ samprayuñjīta nākāśaṃ muṣṭibhiḥ kṣipet //MU_6,84.71//
GSP27moksop_u:36919: tiryagādibhir apy anyair anyās sañjñāḥ prakalpitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36920: sthāvarādibhir apy anyair anyathā saṃvidaḥ kṛtāḥ //MU_6,84.76//
GSP27moksop_u:36924: bījam ākāśavṛkṣāṇāṃ sargāṇāṃ teṣv imāni tu //MU_6,84.78//
GSP27moksop_u:36929: vartamānāni bhūtāni bhaviṣyanti ca yāni tu /
GSP27moksop_u:36931: evaṃbījās ta ete hi rāma pañcakapādapāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36932: svayaṃ svabhāvāj jāyante svayaṃ naśyanti kālataḥ //MU_6,84.82//
GSP27moksop_u:36933: svayaṃ nānātvam āyānti ciraṃ jāḍyāt sphuranti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:36934: suviviktāś śamaṃ yānti taraṅgā iva toyadheḥ //MU_6,84.83//
GSP27moksop_u:36935: yato yānti samutsedhaṃ yato yānti śamaṃ svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:36937: ye vivekavaśato layaṃ gatā rāma pañcakavilāsarāśayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36938: te na bhūya iha yānti saṃsthitiṃ prabhramanti jagatītare muhuḥ //MU_6,84.85//
GSP27moksop_u:36942: etat pañcakabījaṃ yat kuṇḍalinyāṃ tad antare /
GSP27moksop_u:36946: jīvanāj jīvatāṃ yātā mananāc ca manas sthitā /
GSP27moksop_u:36947: saṅkalpāt saiva saṅkalpo bodhād buddhir iti smṛtā //MU_6,85.3//
GSP27moksop_u:36952: adhas tv apānarūpaiva madhye somyaiva sarvadā /
GSP27moksop_u:36954: sarvayatnam adho yātā yadi yatnān na dhāryate /
GSP27moksop_u:36955: tat pumān mṛtim āyāti tayā nirgatayā balāt //MU_6,85.7//
GSP27moksop_u:36956: samastaivordhvam āyātā yadi yuktyā na dhāryate /
GSP27moksop_u:36957: tat pumān mṛtyum āyāti tayā nirgatayā balāt //MU_6,85.8//
GSP27moksop_u:36964: ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva yathāvat kathayāśu me //MU_6,85.11//
GSP27moksop_u:36966: ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva dvayaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:36967: tannivṛttiṃ sukhaṃ vidyāt tatkṣayo mokṣa ucyate //MU_6,85.12//
GSP27moksop_u:36968: mithaḥ kadācij jāyete kadācit samam eva tu /
GSP27moksop_u:36976: bhṛśaṃ sphurantīṣv icchāsu maurkhyāc cetasy anirjite /
GSP27moksop_u:36984: prāktanī vaihikī vāpi śubhā vāpy aśubhā matiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:36985: yaivādhikā saiva tathā tasmin yojayati krame //MU_6,85.21//
GSP27moksop_u:36988: dvividho hy ādhir astīha sāmānyas sāra eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:36989: vyavahāras tu sāmānyas sāro janmamayas smṛtaḥ //MU_6,85.23//
GSP27moksop_u:36992: ātmajñānaṃ vinā sāro nādhir naśyati rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:37001: ādheḥ kathaṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ kathaṃ ca sa vinaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:37004: citte vidhurite dehas samyaṅ nānubhavaty ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:37005: yathā hi ruṣito jantur agram eva na paśyati //MU_6,85.30//
GSP27moksop_u:37007: prakṛtaṃ mārgam utsṛjya śarārto hariṇo yathā //MU_6,85.31//
GSP27moksop_u:37010: asamaṃ vahati prāṇe nāḍyo yānti visaṃsthitim /
GSP27moksop_u:37012: kāścin nāḍyaḥ prapūrṇatvaṃ yānti kāścic ca riktatām /
GSP27moksop_u:37013: prāṇe vidhurite deśe sarvartau sarito yathā //MU_6,85.34//
GSP27moksop_u:37016: yathā kāṣṭhāni nayati prāptaṃ deśaṃ saridrayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37017: tathānnāni nayaty antaḥ prāṇavātas svam āśrayam //MU_6,85.36//
GSP27moksop_u:37018: yāny annāni virodhena tiṣṭhanty antaś śarīrake /
GSP27moksop_u:37020: evam ādher bhaved vyādhir ādhyabhāvāc ca naśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:37021: yathā mantraiś ca naśyanti vyādhayas tatkramaṃ śṛṇu //MU_6,85.38//
GSP27moksop_u:37026: ānando vardhate dehe śuddhe cetasi rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:37027: pūrṇendāv udite vyabhre nairmalyaṃ bhuvane yathā //MU_6,85.41//
GSP27moksop_u:37034: tāṃ yadā pūrakābhyāsād āpūrya sthīyate ciram /
GSP27moksop_u:37039: nāḍīs sarvās samādāya dehe baddhā latopamā //MU_6,85.47//
GSP27moksop_u:37040: tadā samastam evemaṃ khaṃ plāvayati dehakam /
GSP27moksop_u:37043: yoginaḥ prāpnuvanty uccair dīnās te sudaśām iva //MU_6,85.49//
GSP27moksop_u:37050: anyeṣām indriyāṇāṃ ca tattvam evaṃ kathaṃ bhavet //MU_6,85.52//
GSP27moksop_u:37055: dṛśyante vyomagās siddhās svapnavat svārthadā api //MU_6,85.54//
GSP27moksop_u:37059: prāṇe ciraṃ sthitiṃ nīte praviśanty aparāṃ purīm //MU_6,85.56//
GSP27moksop_u:37061: vada svabhāvasya kathaṃ brahman na calati sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37062: vaktāras sānukampā hi duṣpraśne 'pi na khedinaḥ //MU_6,85.57//
GSP27moksop_u:37067: bhidyate dṛśyate hy aṅga vasante śāradaṃ phalam //MU_6,85.59//
GSP27moksop_u:37072: aṇutāṃ sthūlatāṃ vāpi kāyo 'yaṃ nīyate katham //MU_6,85.61//
GSP27moksop_u:37075: tayos saṅgharṣaṇād agnis svabhāvāj jāyate tathā //MU_6,85.62//
GSP27moksop_u:37084: tat sarvaṃ śaktipadmādi bāhyair ābhyantarais sadā /
GSP27moksop_u:37086: yad yad vyoma sphuraty aṅga svabhāvāt tatra vāyavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37087: pelavaṃ mṛdu yat kiñcit tat tat pracalayanty alam //MU_6,85.68//
GSP27moksop_u:37093: uditena sa sarvāṅgaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhānunā yathā //MU_6,85.71//
GSP27moksop_u:37096: tat prakāśamayaṃ jñānaṃ cintitaṃ sat prayacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:37097: yena yojanalakṣasthaṃ vastu niśy api dṛśyate //MU_6,85.73//
GSP27moksop_u:37101: itīndor utthitas so 'gnir agnīṣomau hi dehakaḥ //MU_6,85.75//
GSP27moksop_u:37103: śītātmakaṃ ca somākhyam ābhyām eva kṛtaṃ jagat //MU_6,85.76//
GSP27moksop_u:37105: jagad dvayena nirvṛttaṃ tad evaivaṃ vibhajyate //MU_6,85.77//
GSP27moksop_u:37106: sac cit prakāśaṃ vidyādi sūryam agniṃ vidur budhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37107: asaj jāḍyaṃ tamo 'vidyādy āhus somaṃ maṇīṣiṇaḥ //MU_6,85.78//
GSP27moksop_u:37109: vahnir vāryātmanas somād udetīti mune śrutam /
GSP27moksop_u:37110: somasyotpattim adhunā vada me vadatāṃ vara //MU_6,85.79//
GSP27moksop_u:37112: agnīṣomau mithaḥ kārye kāraṇe ca svasaṃsthiteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37132: agner dhūmatayā bhāgo yaḥ prayāti payodatām /
GSP27moksop_u:37134: agnir nāśātmakatayā śaityād aptāṃ prayāti yat /
GSP27moksop_u:37137: payodatāṃ prayātena tad eva janayaty alam //MU_6,85.92//
GSP27moksop_u:37138: arkaḥ pītvā niśānātham amāvasyāṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37139: udgiraty amale pakṣe mṛṇālam iva sārasaḥ //MU_6,85.93//
GSP27moksop_u:37142: jalād aṇutayā bhāgo yaḥ prayāty arkaraśmitām /
GSP27moksop_u:37144: nāśātmakatayā toyam auṣṇyād yāti yad agnitām /
GSP27moksop_u:37148: hutāśo nāśam āgatya somo bhavati vai tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:37149: divaso nāśam āgatya rātrir bhavati vai yathā //MU_6,85.98//
GSP27moksop_u:37151: madhye vilakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ prājñair api na labhyate //MU_6,85.99//
GSP27moksop_u:37152: sandhir apy ābilo yas syād etayor eva tad vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37153: bhāvābhāvau yathaikasya śliṣṭāv etau tathaiva hi //MU_6,85.100//
GSP27moksop_u:37158: prakāśam analaṃ sūryaṃ cidrūpaṃ viddhi rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:37160: citsūrye nirmale dṛṣṭe tamo naśyed bhavāmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37164: somaṃ prakaṭayaty agniś cid dehaṃ suciraprabhā /
GSP27moksop_u:37165: agniṃ bhāsayatīnduś ca dehaṃ svaṃ rūpam arpayan //MU_6,85.106//
GSP27moksop_u:37166: cin niṣkriyā tv anābhāsā kevalā nopalabhyate /
GSP27moksop_u:37168: citaś cetyonmukhatvena lābhas saiva ca saṃsṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37169: niścetyāyās tu no lābho nirvāṇaṃ ca tad eva hi //MU_6,85.108//
GSP27moksop_u:37173: agnes somasya caivāṅga sthitir bhavati kevalā //MU_6,85.110//
GSP27moksop_u:37176: apāne śītale sattām ety uṣṇaḥ prāṇapāvakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37177: pratibimbam ivādarśe sa ca tasmiṃs tathaiva hi //MU_6,85.112//
GSP27moksop_u:37180: saṃsṛtyādau hi yā kācit saṃvic chītoṣṇarūpiṇī /
GSP27moksop_u:37181: agnīṣomābhidhāṃ prāptā saiva sargo nṛṇām iha //MU_6,85.114//
GSP27moksop_u:37182: yatra somakalā grastā kṣaṇaṃ sūryeṇa ṣoḍaśī /
GSP27moksop_u:37184: nūnaṃ sūryapadaṃ prāptas somo yatra hṛdambare /
GSP27moksop_u:37185: nūnaṃ kevalayā sthityā tatra baddhapado bhava //MU_6,85.116//
GSP27moksop_u:37186: auṣṇyam agniś cid ādityaś śaityaṃ soma udāhṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37189: atra yojanalakṣasthaṃ vastu paśyasi niśy api /
GSP27moksop_u:37190: atra saṅkrāntikālā hi bāhyās tṛṇasamās smṛtāḥ //MU_6,85.118//
GSP27moksop_u:37191: saṅkrāntim uttaram athāyanam aṅga samyakkālaṃ tathā viṣuvatī yadi dehavātaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37192: antar bahisstham iva vetsi yathānubhūtaṃ tac chocasīha na punaḥ param abhyupetaḥ //MU_6,85.119//
GSP27moksop_u:37196: aṇutāṃ sthūlatāṃ cāyaṃ yathā gacchati yoginām /
GSP27moksop_u:37197: deho rāma tathā samyag vakṣyamāṇam idaṃ śṛṇu //MU_6,86.1//
GSP27moksop_u:37203: gālayaty akhilaṃ sāṅgaṃ dehaṃ hema yathānalaḥ //MU_6,86.4//
GSP27moksop_u:37206: sa śarīradravaḥ paścād vidhūya kvāpi nīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:37213: sā yathā yojyate yatra tena niryāty alaṃ tathā //MU_6,86.9//
GSP27moksop_u:37214: saṃvittis saiva yady aṅga rasādānād yathākramam /
GSP27moksop_u:37216: rasapūrṇā yam ākāraṃ bhāvayaty āśu tat tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:37217: dhatte citrakṛto buddhau rekhā rāma yathākṛtim //MU_6,86.11//
GSP27moksop_u:37218: dṛḍhabhāvavaśād antar asthīny āpnoti sā tataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37224: ekaṃ cinmātram astīha śuddhaṃ somyam alakṣitam /
GSP27moksop_u:37225: sūkṣmāt sūkṣmataraṃ śāntaṃ nājagan na jagatkriyāḥ //MU_6,86.15//
GSP27moksop_u:37227: yadā tadā jīva iti proktam ābilatāṃ gatam //MU_6,86.16//
GSP27moksop_u:37229: jīvaḥ paśyati mūḍhātmā bālo yakṣam ivoddhatam //MU_6,86.17//
GSP27moksop_u:37233: tadā rāghava niśśeṣaṃ dīpas tailakṣaye yathā //MU_6,86.19//
GSP27moksop_u:37234: nidrāvyapagame jantur yathā svapnaṃ na paśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:37235: jīvo hi bhāvite satye tathā dehaṃ na paśyati //MU_6,86.20//
GSP27moksop_u:37243: kalau harir ameyātmā kiñcid āśritya kāraṇam //MU_6,86.24//
GSP27moksop_u:37246: śūnyaṃ vijñānamātraṃ vā madhyaṃ vā kiñcid etayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37248: teṣāṃ madhye hi vijñānavido dvitve kṣayīkṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:37251: na śūnyaṃ na ca vijñānam idaṃ kiñcid iti sthitāḥ //MU_6,86.28//
GSP27moksop_u:37253: vyomnaś śūnyataraṃ sarvaṃ jagad ity āsthayojjhitāḥ //MU_6,86.29//
GSP27moksop_u:37255: paśyanti rāma nātmānaṃ jagadādi ca vā pṛthak //MU_6,86.30//
GSP27moksop_u:37261: śūnyā iva nabhobhāgāś śūnye tiṣṭhanti vijvaram //MU_6,86.33//
GSP27moksop_u:37262: śūnye ca viditātmāno bhāvayanti yathaiva yat /
GSP27moksop_u:37265: viṣaṃ nayanty amṛtatām amṛtaṃ viṣatām api //MU_6,86.35//
GSP27moksop_u:37267: bhūyate hi tathaivāśu tad ety ālokitaṃ punaḥ //MU_6,86.36//
GSP27moksop_u:37268: satyabhāvena dṛṣṭo 'yaṃ deho deho bhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:37269: dṛṣṭas tv asatyabhāvena vyomatāṃ yāti dehakaḥ //MU_6,86.37//
GSP27moksop_u:37271: bhavataiṣādhunā rāma yuktim anyām imāṃ śṛṇu //MU_6,86.38//
GSP27moksop_u:37273: uddhṛtya yojyate vāyāv āmodaḥ kusumād iva //MU_6,86.39//
GSP27moksop_u:37275: dehe vijīve vimaṇau vaṃśe ca ka ivādaraḥ //MU_6,86.40//
GSP27moksop_u:37278: iti siddhiśriyaṃ bhuktvā sthitaṃ cet tad vapuḥ punaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37279: praviśyate svam anyad vā yad yathātrābhirocate //MU_6,86.42//
GSP27moksop_u:37280: dehād ayātayā viṣvag vyāptavatyā ca khānilam /
GSP27moksop_u:37281: saṃvidā jagad āpūrya sampūrṇaṃ sthīyate 'tha vā //MU_6,86.43//
GSP27moksop_u:37282: jñātvā sadābhyuditam ujjhitadoṣam īśaṃ yad yad yathā samabhivāñchati citprakāśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37283: prāpnoti tat tad acireṇa tathaiva rāma sampatpadaṃ vidur anāvaraṇatvam eva //MU_6,86.44//
GSP27moksop_u:37291: kṣaṇam apy agatā bhartur vakṣasaś cetasas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:37292: sarveṣūvāsa rājyeṣu lakṣmīr iva jagatsu ca //MU_6,87.3//
GSP27moksop_u:37295: kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇopalaṃ bhūmiṃ khaṃ vātam analaṃ jalam /
GSP27moksop_u:37296: nirvighnam aviśat sarvaṃ tantur muktāphalaṃ yathā //MU_6,87.5//
GSP27moksop_u:37301: yatnena taṃ ca bhartāram ātmajñānāmṛtaṃ prati /
GSP27moksop_u:37302: bahuśo bodhayām āsa mātā bālam ivātmajam //MU_6,87.8//
GSP27moksop_u:37303: na cāsāv āpa tadbhartā rājā viśrāntim ātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:37306: bālo vidyām iva nṛpaś cūḍālāṃ na viveda saḥ //MU_6,87.10//
GSP27moksop_u:37307: kalāvidagdhā mugdhā ca bāleyaṃ gṛhiṇī mama /
GSP27moksop_u:37308: ity eva kevalaṃ rājā sa cūḍālāṃ viveda tām //MU_6,87.11//
GSP27moksop_u:37310: darśayām āsa no rājñaś śūdrasyeva makhakriyām //MU_6,87.12//
GSP27moksop_u:37313: yatnena prāpa no bodhaṃ budhyate 'nyaḥ kathaṃ prabho //MU_6,87.13//
GSP27moksop_u:37316: jñaptes tu kāraṇaṃ śuddhā śiṣyaprajñaiva rāghava //MU_6,87.14//
GSP27moksop_u:37317: na śrutena na puṇyena jñāyate jñeyam ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37318: jānāty ātmānam ātmaiva sarpas sarpapadāni va //MU_6,87.15//
GSP27moksop_u:37320: evaṃ sthite varamune katham etaj janaśrutau /
GSP27moksop_u:37329: kapardakād dvau bhavataś catvāro 'ṣṭau ca kālataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37330: tataś śataṃ sahasraṃ ca sahasraṃ ceti cetasā //MU_6,87.20//
GSP27moksop_u:37332: janahāsaṃ sahaṃs trīṇi dināni dhutavān busam //MU_6,87.21//
GSP27moksop_u:37335: taṃ prāpya tuṣṭahṛdayas samāgatya gṛhaṃ sukhī /
GSP27moksop_u:37340: anyad anviṣyate cānyal labhyate hi gurukramāt //MU_6,87.25//
GSP27moksop_u:37347: paśya rāghava māyeyaṃ mohanī mahatām api /
GSP27moksop_u:37348: anyad anviṣyate yatnād anyad āsādyate phalam //MU_6,87.29//
GSP27moksop_u:37349: anyat karoti puruṣaḥ phalam anyad eva prāpnoti vastuniyatiś ca vilokyate ca /
GSP27moksop_u:37350: tasmād anantavibhavasya jagatkramasya śreyo 'tivāhanam asaṅgam avajñayaiva //MU_6,87.30//
GSP27moksop_u:37355: ājagāma paraṃ mohaṃ yāmāndhyam iva bhūtalam //MU_6,88.1//
GSP27moksop_u:37363: nindann eva mahābhogān abhoktaiva śriyāṃ sthitaḥ //MU_6,88.5//
GSP27moksop_u:37365: devebhyo brāhmaṇebhyaś ca svajanebhyaś ca mānadaḥ //MU_6,88.6//
GSP27moksop_u:37368: sa tathāpi viśokatvaṃ manāg api na labdhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:37369: anidhānāṃ khanan bhūmiṃ nidhānārthī nidhiṃ yathā //MU_6,88.8//
GSP27moksop_u:37373: mahāvibhavam apy agre nāpaśyat khinnayā dhiyā //MU_6,88.10//
GSP27moksop_u:37377: bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktā vibhavabhūmayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37379: na sukhāni na duḥkhāni nāpado na ca sampadaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37382: rājyād apy adhikaṃ manye sukhaṃ vananivāsinaḥ //MU_6,88.14//
GSP27moksop_u:37392: ramayanti tvam iva māṃ vanavīthyo varānane //MU_6,88.19//
GSP27moksop_u:37393: yathā viviktam ekānte mano bhavati nirvṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:37394: na tathā śaśibimbeṣu na ca brahmendrasadmasu //MU_6,88.20//
GSP27moksop_u:37395: asmin matpraṇaye tanvi na vighnaṃ kartum arhasi /
GSP27moksop_u:37398: prāptakālaṃ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ rājate nātha netarat /
GSP27moksop_u:37399: vasante rājate puṣpaṃ phalaṃ śaradi rājate //MU_6,88.22//
GSP27moksop_u:37401: na yūnāṃ tvādṛśām eva tenaitan me na rocate //MU_6,88.23//
GSP27moksop_u:37402: yauvanena mahārāja na yāvad vayam ujjhitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37405: samaṃ gṛhād gamiṣyāmo haṃsā iva taros saraḥ //MU_6,88.25//
GSP27moksop_u:37407: rājayakṣmeva candrasya mahad eno na naśyati //MU_6,88.26//
GSP27moksop_u:37408: aprāptakāriṇaṃ bhūpaṃ rodhayanti ca vai prajāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37412: viddhi māṃ gatam eveto dūram ekāntakānanam //MU_6,88.28//
GSP27moksop_u:37413: bālā tvam anavadyāṅgī nāgantavyaṃ vanaṃ tvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:37414: puṃsām api hi mṛdvaṅgi durviṣahyo vanāśrayaḥ //MU_6,88.29//
GSP27moksop_u:37415: na samarthā vanāvāse yoṣitaḥ kaṭhinā api /
GSP27moksop_u:37416: kā nāma puṣpamañjaryas soḍhum arkātapaṃ kṣamāḥ //MU_6,88.30//
GSP27moksop_u:37419: ity uktvā dayitāṃ rājā tām induvadanāṃ vaśī /
GSP27moksop_u:37420: uttasthau snātum akhilaṃ dinakāryaṃ cakāra ha //MU_6,88.32//
GSP27moksop_u:37423: saṃhṛtya vitataṃ rūpaṃ tam evānuyayau prabhā /
GSP27moksop_u:37429: gacchator aparaṃ pāraṃ dampatyor mairavaṃ vanam /
GSP27moksop_u:37438: suṣvāpa śayane bhūpo maināka iva sāgare //MU_6,88.41//
GSP27moksop_u:37443: tatyāja dayitāṃ suptām aṅkād rājā śikhidhvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37444: svairaṃ svairaṃ mukhaṃ rāho ravicandraprabhām iva //MU_6,88.44//
GSP27moksop_u:37453: rājyalakṣmyai namas tubhyam ity uktvā maṇḍalād gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37457: prātaś śūnyam araṇyānīkhaṃ tīrtvā vitataṃ dinam /
GSP27moksop_u:37460: kiñcit phalādikaṃ bhuktvā tāṃ nināya tamasvatīm //MU_6,88.52//
GSP27moksop_u:37461: punaḥ prātaḥ purāṇy uccair maṇḍalāni girīn nadīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37477: yat kiñcid anyad vā vastu yogyaṃ tāpasakarmaṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:37478: tat tatra sthāpayām āsa jagatīva kramaṃ vidhiḥ //MU_6,88.61//
GSP27moksop_u:37480: puṣpoccayaṃ dvitīyaṃ tu snānaṃ devārcanaṃ tataḥ //MU_6,88.62//
GSP27moksop_u:37482: bhuktvā japyaparo bhūtvā nināyaiko niśāṃ vaśī //MU_6,88.63//
GSP27moksop_u:37483: iti divasam akhedaṃ mandaropāntakacche viracita uṭaje 'ntar mālaveśo nināya /
GSP27moksop_u:37484: na ca nṛpativilāsaṃ taṃ sa sasmāra kaṃ vā sphurati hṛdi viveke rājyalakṣmyo haranti //MU_6,88.64//
GSP27moksop_u:37489: idānīṃ śṛṇu cūḍālā sā kiṃ kṛtavatī gṛhe //MU_6,89.1//
GSP27moksop_u:37496: na prasannā na vimalā babhūvākulatāṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:37499: kaṣṭaṃ rājyaṃ prabhus tyaktvā vanaṃ yāto gṛhād iti //MU_6,89.6//
GSP27moksop_u:37500: tan mayehādya kiṃ kāryaṃ tatsamīpaṃ vrajāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:37501: bhartaiva gatir uddiṣṭā vidhinā prakṛtā striyaḥ //MU_6,89.7//
GSP27moksop_u:37506: dadarśātha pathā yāntaṃ rātrau khaḍgakaraṃ patim /
GSP27moksop_u:37509: bhaviṣyac cintayām āsa sarvaṃ bhartur akhaṇḍitam //MU_6,89.11//
GSP27moksop_u:37510: yathā tena yadā yatra yāvat kāryaṃ yathodayam /
GSP27moksop_u:37511: yathā ca nirvṛtis sphārā gantavyā tena rāghava //MU_6,89.12//
GSP27moksop_u:37513: tad eva sampādayituṃ gamanāt sā nyavartata //MU_6,89.13//
GSP27moksop_u:37515: mayāsya pārśvaṃ gantavyaṃ niyater eṣa niścayaḥ //MU_6,89.14//
GSP27moksop_u:37520: rājyaṃ rarakṣa bhartus tat krameṇa samadarśanā /
GSP27moksop_u:37522: tayos tadāvahat kālo dampatyos sthitayos tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:37524: jagāmātha dinaṃ pakṣo māso 'thartuś ca vatsaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37528: atha yāteṣu bahuṣu varṣeṣu jarasā vṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:37530: bhartuḥ kaṣāyapākaṃ tad ālakṣya phalitaṃ cirāt /
GSP27moksop_u:37532: bhartus samīpagamane mama kālo 'yam ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:37533: sañcintya mandaropāntaṃ gantuṃ buddhiṃ cakāra sā //MU_6,89.23//
GSP27moksop_u:37535: jagāma vātaskandhena gacchantī khe dadarśa ca //MU_6,89.24//
GSP27moksop_u:37543: abhiyuktā svabhartrā sā bhūyo bhūyo vyalokayat //MU_6,89.28//
GSP27moksop_u:37545: na svabhāvaś śamaṃ yāti mamāpy utkaṇṭhate manaḥ //MU_6,89.29//
GSP27moksop_u:37547: paśyāmi kāntam ity antar mamāpy utkaṇṭhitaṃ manaḥ //MU_6,89.30//
GSP27moksop_u:37548: mañjarītvaṃ latātvaṃ vā varam etās taruṃ patim /
GSP27moksop_u:37549: na muñcanti kṣaṇam api mamāpy utkaṇṭhitaṃ manaḥ //MU_6,89.31//
GSP27moksop_u:37551: tathā kadāham eṣyāmi mamāpīti manas sthitam //MU_6,89.32//
GSP27moksop_u:37552: ime mandāramaruta ete ca śaśinaḥ karāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37553: vanarājaya etāś ca mām apy utkaṇṭhayanty aho //MU_6,89.33//
GSP27moksop_u:37554: he cittājñavad evāntaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ tāṇḍavitaṃ sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:37555: sā vyomanirmalā sādho kva te yātā vivekitā //MU_6,89.34//
GSP27moksop_u:37556: atha vā citta bhartāraṃ svaṃ praty utkaṇṭhase sakhe /
GSP27moksop_u:37558: kiṃ kilotkaṇṭhase vāpi bhartā yāto jarāṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:37559: tapasvī kṛśagātraś ca bhaven nirvāsanas tathā //MU_6,89.36//
GSP27moksop_u:37560: matto rājyāc ca bhogebhyo manye 'syāmūlatāṃ gatā /
GSP27moksop_u:37565: patim udbodhya yogena śleṣayiṣyāmy ahaṃ gale //MU_6,89.39//
GSP27moksop_u:37567: rājya eva niyokṣyāmi nivatsyāvas sukhaṃ ciram //MU_6,89.40//
GSP27moksop_u:37568: aho nu cirakālena manoratham imaṃ śubham /
GSP27moksop_u:37573: deśān abdān digantāṃś ca prāpa mandarakandaram //MU_6,89.43//
GSP27moksop_u:37579: abhavan merukāntir yas tam evātra dadarśa sā //MU_6,89.46//
GSP27moksop_u:37580: kṛśāṅgaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ ca jīrṇaparṇam iva sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:37583: sthale niṣaṇṇaṃ puṣpāṇi grathayantaṃ jarāṃ gatam //MU_6,89.48//
GSP27moksop_u:37586: aho nu viṣamaṃ maurkhyaṃ yad anātmajñatātmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:37588: ayaṃ sa rājā lakṣmīvān yo mamāpi priyaḥ patiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37591: nayāmy enaṃ na sandeho bhogamokṣaśriyaṃ tathā //MU_6,89.52//
GSP27moksop_u:37593: sakāśam asya gacchāmi bodhaṃ dātum anuttamam //MU_6,89.53//
GSP27moksop_u:37594: bāleyaṃ mama kānteti maduktaṃ na karoty ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:37597: cetasy asyādya vimale svaṃ tattvaṃ pratibimbati //MU_6,89.55//
GSP27moksop_u:37602: dadarśa dvijaputraṃ taṃ puro yātaṃ śikhidhvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37619: ity asya darśayām āsa pāṇinā pattraviṣṭaram //MU_6,89.66//
GSP27moksop_u:37622: he rājarṣe namas tubhyam iti dvijasuto vadan /
GSP27moksop_u:37626: divasas saphalo 'yaṃ me yat tvām adyāsmi dṛṣṭavān //MU_6,89.69//
GSP27moksop_u:37627: idam arghyam idaṃ pādyaṃ puṣpānīmāni mānada /
GSP27moksop_u:37628: imāḥ pragrathitā mālā gṛhyantāṃ bhadram astu te //MU_6,89.70//
GSP27moksop_u:37629: ity uktvā pādyam arghyaṃ ca mālāḥ puṣpāṇi cānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:37633: tvattaḥ pūjā yathā prāptā mayeyaṃ na tathānyataḥ //MU_6,89.72//
GSP27moksop_u:37637: nirvāṇārhaṃ tapas sādho kaccit sambhṛtavān asi //MU_6,89.74//
GSP27moksop_u:37638: asidhārāsamaṃ somya śāntaṃ vratam idaṃ tava /
GSP27moksop_u:37641: jānāsi bhagavan sarvaṃ devas tvaṃ ko 'tra vismayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37643: etāny aṅgāni te candrād ghaṭitānīti me matiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37645: asti me dayitā kāntā pāti me rājyam adya tat /
GSP27moksop_u:37646: taveva tasyā dṛṣṭāni tāny aṅgāny adya sundara //MU_6,89.78//
GSP27moksop_u:37647: upaśāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca vapur āpādamastakam /
GSP27moksop_u:37654: devād apy adhikaṃ pūjyas satām abhyāgato janaḥ //MU_6,89.82//
GSP27moksop_u:37655: tat kas tvaṃ kasya putras tvaṃ kim āyāto 'sy anugrahāt /
GSP27moksop_u:37659: avarṇanaṃ hi jihmatvaṃ tat satām atininditam //MU_6,89.84//
GSP27moksop_u:37660: asty asmiñ jagataḥ kośe śuddhātmā nārado muniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37662: sa kadācin munir meror guhāyāṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37694: straiṇam ālokya tat kāntaṃ sahasaiva mano muneḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37698: phalaṃ rasāpūrṇam iva grīṣmānta iva toyadaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37710: ajñam astv atha vā tajjñaṃ yāvan mattaṃ śarīrakam /
GSP27moksop_u:37711: sarvam eva jagaty aṅga sukhaduḥkhamayaṃ smṛtam //MU_6,89.109//
GSP27moksop_u:37714: tucchādinā padārthena duḥkhaṃ kenacid eti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:37715: tamo meghapaṭeneva svabhāvo hy atra kāraṇam //MU_6,89.111//
GSP27moksop_u:37716: svarūpe nirmale satye nimeṣam api vismṛte /
GSP27moksop_u:37724: tajjñasya tv aṅga lagato manāg api citer vaśāt /
GSP27moksop_u:37727: tajjñas tyajati he sādho jīvanmuktamatir muniḥ //MU_6,89.117//
GSP27moksop_u:37731: na jahāti yathā mūḍhas tathā viṣayarañjanam //MU_6,89.119//
GSP27moksop_u:37735: svotpattikāraṇaprāptau kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ ca vā /
GSP27moksop_u:37736: abhyudetīti vada me dūrasthāyām api prabho //MU_6,89.121//
GSP27moksop_u:37738: śrotuṃ tṛptiṃ na gacchāmi mayūro 'bhraraveṣv iva //MU_6,89.122//
GSP27moksop_u:37741: sukhasaṃvid iyaṃ bālā nūnam ullasati svataḥ //MU_6,89.123//
GSP27moksop_u:37743: somyam udbodhayaty antas siṃham abhraravo yathā //MU_6,89.124//
GSP27moksop_u:37747: jīvasya niyatā nāḍyaḥ pṛthag dehe sthitiṃ gatāḥ //MU_6,89.126//
GSP27moksop_u:37748: sukhitaḥ prasphuraty eṣa yāsu tāsu na duḥkhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37749: ye hi mārgās suveṣasya kuveṣasya na te śubhāḥ //MU_6,89.127//
GSP27moksop_u:37751: jīvas sadaiva sarvatra dehe tiṣṭhati vai kila /
GSP27moksop_u:37752: tasya duḥkhe sukhe vāpi niyataṃ sphuritaṃ kutaḥ //MU_6,89.128//
GSP27moksop_u:37755: tāvatpramāṇam evainaṃ muktaṃ muktam avaihi vai //MU_6,89.129//
GSP27moksop_u:37757: tāvatpramāṇam evainaṃ baddhaṃ baddham avaihi me //MU_6,89.130//
GSP27moksop_u:37759: tadabhāvo hi mokṣas syād bodhāt sampadyate ca saḥ //MU_6,89.131//
GSP27moksop_u:37761: tāvat suptasamas somyo jīvas tiṣṭhati śāntavat //MU_6,89.132//
GSP27moksop_u:37762: sukham ālokya vā duḥkham akṣānītaṃ caladvapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37768: na sat sukhādi naitan me mudhā cāyam ahaṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37769: iti jīvaḥ prabuddho 'ntar nirvāṇaṃ yāti śāmyati //MU_6,89.136//
GSP27moksop_u:37771: na tadunmukhatāṃ yāti jīvaś śāmyati kevalam //MU_6,89.137//
GSP27moksop_u:37773: sthitiṃ yāte śamaṃ yāti jīvo nissnehadīpavat //MU_6,89.138//
GSP27moksop_u:37775: sarvam ekam iti jñātvā jīvo dvitvāvibhāvanāt //MU_6,89.139//
GSP27moksop_u:37776: sarvam ākāśam eveti buddhvā ksobhaṃ na gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:37777: jīvaś śūnyena śūnyasya kaḥ kila kṣobhavibhramaḥ //MU_6,89.140//
GSP27moksop_u:37788: calitaṃ vastv adho yāti vāryādi dahanādi kham /
GSP27moksop_u:37792: jñāyase vacanād eva svabhāvo hi kim ucyate //MU_6,89.146//
GSP27moksop_u:37794: ādisarge yathā yad yat sphuritaṃ brahma brahmaṇi /
GSP27moksop_u:37797: ghuṇākṣaravad ucchūnaṃ taṃ svabhāvaṃ vidur budhāḥ //MU_6,89.148//
GSP27moksop_u:37798: asmin svabhāvavaśato jagati prarūḍhe dehās sphuranti vividhā vividhāvikārāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37799: prakṣīṇavāsanatayā na bhavanti kecid bhūyo bhavanti ca punas tv itare ghanāsthāḥ //MU_6,89.149//
GSP27moksop_u:37806: tato na jāyate mukta iti no darśanaṃ mune //MU_6,90.2//
GSP27moksop_u:37808: atyudāraṃ mahārthaṃ ca vakṣi tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara /
GSP27moksop_u:37812: tat samāsena tāṃ tāvad ātmotpattiṃ vadāśu me /
GSP27moksop_u:37813: tataś śroṣyāmi yatnena jñānagarbhāṃ giraṃ tava //MU_6,90.5//
GSP27moksop_u:37815: kva kṛtaṃ vīryam āryeṇa kathayārya yathāsthitam //MU_6,90.6//
GSP27moksop_u:37823: ratnaśailair vṛtaḥ kāntais tale pārśveṣu cābhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37825: saṅkalpitena kṣīreṇa sa kumbhas tena pūritaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37828: amṛtātmā śubho garbha indor indur ivānujaḥ //MU_6,90.12//
GSP27moksop_u:37829: induṃ māsa ivāpūrṇaṃ māsena suṣuve ghaṭaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37833: dinaiḥ katipayair eva vṛddhim abhyājagāma saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37841: athainaṃ putram ādāya brahmalokaṃ sa nāradaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37843: kṛtābhivādanaṃ brahmā pautram ādāya taṃ tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:37847: sādho so 'yam ahaṃ pautraḥ kumbho 'haṃ padmajanmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37850: catvāras suhṛdo vedā mama līlā vilāsinī //MU_6,90.23//
GSP27moksop_u:37851: mātṛṣvasā me gāyatrī mātā mama sarasvatī /
GSP27moksop_u:37852: brahmaloke mama gṛhaṃ pautras tatrāsmi susthitaḥ //MU_6,90.24//
GSP27moksop_u:37854: līlayā paripūrṇatvān na tu kāryeṇa kenacit //MU_6,90.25//
GSP27moksop_u:37855: rājarṣe tena me pādau patato me na bhūtale /
GSP27moksop_u:37856: rajas spṛśati nāṅgāni glāniṃ nāyāti me vapuḥ //MU_6,90.26//
GSP27moksop_u:37857: adyākāśapathā gacchan dṛṣṭavāṃs tvām ahaṃ puraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37858: iha tenāgato 'smy aṅga sarvaṃ kathitavān iti //MU_6,90.27//
GSP27moksop_u:37859: eṣo 'ham ity akhilam eva yathānubhūtaṃ te varṇitaṃ nanu mayā vanavāsatajjña /
GSP27moksop_u:37860: santo hy asaṅkathanam āryasamāgameṣu nindanty alaṃ subhaga saṃvyavahāradakṣāḥ //MU_6,90.28//
GSP27moksop_u:37862: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
GSP27moksop_u:37863: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_6,90.29//
GSP27moksop_u:37867: sarge sphuradbhir matpuṇyair manye sampreṣito bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:37869: adya tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ sādho dhanyānāṃ dhuri dharmataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37871: na kecana tathā bhāvāś cetaś śītalayanti me /
GSP27moksop_u:37879: āstām eṣā kathā tāvat sarvaṃ te varṇitaṃ mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:37880: tvaṃ me kathaya he sādho kas tvam adrau karoṣi kim //MU_6,91.6//
GSP27moksop_u:37882: satyaṃ kathaya nāsatyaṃ vaktuṃ jānāti tāpasaḥ //MU_6,91.7//
GSP27moksop_u:37887: jānato 'pi hi hāsāya kathayāmy eva te manāk //MU_6,91.9//
GSP27moksop_u:37888: śikhidhvajo 'haṃ bhūpālas tyaktvā rājyam iha sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37889: bhṛśaṃ bhīto 'smi tattvajña saṃsṛtau janmanaḥ punaḥ //MU_6,91.10//
GSP27moksop_u:37890: punas sukhaṃ punar duḥkhaṃ punar maraṇajanmanī /
GSP27moksop_u:37892: bhramann api digantāṃś ca carann api paraṃ tapaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37895: śuṣyāmy eva vane sādho ghuṇakṣuṇṇa iva drumaḥ //MU_6,91.13//
GSP27moksop_u:37896: imām akhaṇḍitāṃ samyak kriyāṃ sampādayann api /
GSP27moksop_u:37897: duḥkhād gacchāmi duḥkhaugham amṛtaṃ me viṣaṃ sthitam //MU_6,91.14//
GSP27moksop_u:37899: pitāmaham ahaṃ pūrvaṃ kadācit pṛṣṭavān idam /
GSP27moksop_u:37900: yat kriyājñānayor ekaṃ śreyas tad brūhi me vibho //MU_6,91.15//
GSP27moksop_u:37902: jñānaṃ hi paramaṃ śreyaḥ ka ivaitan na vetty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:37905: yasya nāsty ambaraṃ paṭṭaṃ kambalaṃ kiṃ tyajaty asau //MU_6,91.17//
GSP27moksop_u:37908: sarvā hi vāsanābhāve prayānty aphalatāṃ kriyāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37910: ṛtvantare yathā yāti vilayaṃ pūrvam ārtavam /
GSP27moksop_u:37912: na svabhāvena phalati yathā śaralatā phalam /
GSP27moksop_u:37913: kriyā nirvāsanāmutra phalaṃ phalati no tathā //MU_6,91.21//
GSP27moksop_u:37916: ākārabhāsurāpy uccair na dadāti phalaṃ kriyā /
GSP27moksop_u:37917: śubhāśubhā ca tajjñasya phullā śaralatā yathā //MU_6,91.23//
GSP27moksop_u:37920: yasya maurkhyaṃ kṣayaṃ yātaṃ sarvaṃ brahmeti bhāvanāt /
GSP27moksop_u:37924: savāsanaṃ mano jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ nirvāsanaṃ manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37925: jñānena jñeyatām etya punar jīvo na jāyate //MU_6,91.27//
GSP27moksop_u:37927: jñānam eva paraṃ śreya iti brahmādayo 'pi te /
GSP27moksop_u:37928: prāhur mahānto rājarṣe tvaṃ kim ajñānavān sthitaḥ //MU_6,91.28//
GSP27moksop_u:37929: itaḥ kamaṇḍalur ito daṇḍakāṣṭham ito bṛsī /
GSP27moksop_u:37931: ko 'haṃ katham idaṃ jātaṃ kathaṃ śāmyati ceti bhoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37932: rājan nāvekṣase kasmāt kim ajña iva tiṣṭhasi //MU_6,91.30//
GSP27moksop_u:37933: kathaṃ bandhaḥ kathaṃ mokṣa iti praśnān udāharan /
GSP27moksop_u:37934: parāvaravidāṃ pādān kasmād aṅga na sevase //MU_6,91.31//
GSP27moksop_u:37936: jīvitaṃ kṣapayan kiṃ tvaṃ śilākīṭavad āsthitaḥ //MU_6,91.32//
GSP27moksop_u:37938: saṅgamena ca sā yuktir labhyate mucyate yayā //MU_6,91.33//
GSP27moksop_u:37947: aho nu me kṣayaṃ yātaṃ mohadhvāntam aśeṣataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37948: yat tvam evaṃ samāgatya samprabodhayasīha mām //MU_6,91.37//
GSP27moksop_u:37949: gurus tvaṃ me pitā tvaṃ me mitraṃ tvaṃ me varānana /
GSP27moksop_u:37950: śiṣyo namaskaromy agre pādau tava kṛpāṃ kuru //MU_6,91.38//
GSP27moksop_u:37951: yad udāratamaṃ vetsi yasmiñ jñāte na śocyate /
GSP27moksop_u:37952: bhavāmi nirvṛto yena tad brahmopadiśāśu me //MU_6,91.39//
GSP27moksop_u:37954: jñānānāṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ katarat tārakaṃ bhavet //MU_6,91.40//
GSP27moksop_u:37956: yady upādeyavākyo 'haṃ rājarṣe tad vadāmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:37957: yathājñānam idaṃ kiñcin na vakṣye sthāṇukākavat //MU_6,91.41//
GSP27moksop_u:37961: yad vakṣi tad anuṣṭheyaṃ mayā vidhir iva śruteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37962: avikāritam evāśu satyam etad vrataṃ mama //MU_6,91.43//
GSP27moksop_u:37965: ādatte hi tathaivedaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ vaco mama //MU_6,91.44//
GSP27moksop_u:37966: śravaṇānantaraṃ buddhyā śubham ity eva bhāvayan /
GSP27moksop_u:37967: śṛṇu gītam iva tyaktvā hetvarthitvaṃ vaco mama //MU_6,91.45//
GSP27moksop_u:37968: svacaritasadṛśaṃ tavodayantyāś cirasamayena vibodhanaṃ ca buddheḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37969: bhavabhayabhiduraṃ mahākavīnāṃ śṛṇu kathayāmi yathākramaṃ manojñam //MU_6,91.46//
GSP27moksop_u:37973: asti kaścit pumāñ śrīmān sthānaṃ nityaviruddhayoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37976: sarvasaṅkalpasīmāntaṃ na tu jānāty ajaṃ padam //MU_6,92.2//
GSP27moksop_u:37980: siddhaś cintāmaṇiḥ kiṃ vā na sidhyaty unnatātmanām //MU_6,92.4//
GSP27moksop_u:37981: pravṛttim udyamaṃ prajñāṃ prayuṅkte ced akhedavān /
GSP27moksop_u:37983: maṇim agre sthitaṃ prāptaṃ hastaprāpyaṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37985: babhūva maṇirājendre na tu niścayavān asau /
GSP27moksop_u:37986: rājye jhagiti samprāpte sudīna iva pāmaraḥ //MU_6,92.7//
GSP27moksop_u:37989: ayaṃ maṇir maṇir nāyaṃ maṇiś cet tad bhaven na saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:37990: spṛśāmi na spṛśāmy enaṃ kadācit sparśato vrajet //MU_6,92.9//
GSP27moksop_u:37997: kecid eva mahāntas te mahābhāgyā bhavanti hi /
GSP27moksop_u:37998: yeṣām alpena kālena prayānty abhimukhaṃ śriyaḥ //MU_6,92.13//
GSP27moksop_u:37999: aham alpatapās sādhur varāko mānuṣaḥ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:38003: na yadā yena labdhavyaṃ na tat prāpnoty asau tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:38005: iti tasmin sthite yāto maṇir uḍḍīya siddhayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38006: tyajanti hy avamantāraṃ śarā guṇam ivojjhitāḥ //MU_6,92.17//
GSP27moksop_u:38007: hṛtvā prāksampadaḥ puṃsas sa yātas siddhayaḥ kila /
GSP27moksop_u:38008: āgatās samprayacchanti sarvaṃ yātā haranty alam //MU_6,92.18//
GSP27moksop_u:38012: hasadbhir vañcakais siddhaiḥ puras tyaktam alakṣitaiḥ //MU_6,92.20//
GSP27moksop_u:38013: ayaṃ cintāmaṇir iti mūḍhas tasmin sa vastutām /
GSP27moksop_u:38014: bubudhe mohito hy ajño mṛdaṃ hemeti paśyati //MU_6,92.21//
GSP27moksop_u:38015: aṣṭau ṣaṣṭiṃ dviṣan mitraṃ rajjuṃ sarpaṃ sthalaṃ jalam /
GSP27moksop_u:38016: candrau dvau kurute citte śiśor moho 'mṛtaṃ viṣam //MU_6,92.22//
GSP27moksop_u:38017: taṃ dagdhamaṇim ādāya prāktanīṃ sa śriyaṃ jahau /
GSP27moksop_u:38018: sarvaṃ cintāmaṇer asmāt prāpyate kiṃ dhanair iti //MU_6,92.23//
GSP27moksop_u:38019: deśo 'yam asukho rūkṣo janaiḥ pāpibhir āvṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38020: kiṃ tad gehaṃ hataprāyaṃ ke nāma mama bandhavaḥ //MU_6,92.24//
GSP27moksop_u:38021: dūraṃ gatvā yathākāmaṃ sukhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi sampadā /
GSP27moksop_u:38022: ity ādāya maṇiṃ mūḍhaś śūnyaṃ kānanam āyayau //MU_6,92.25//
GSP27moksop_u:38023: tatra kācadalenāsau tena tām āpadaṃ yayau /
GSP27moksop_u:38024: kajjalādrer iva niśā maurkhyasyaivāṅga yā samā //MU_6,92.26//
GSP27moksop_u:38025: duḥkhāni maurkhyavibhavena bhavanti yāni naivāpadā na ca jarāmaraṇena tāni /
GSP27moksop_u:38026: sarvāpadāṃ śirasi tiṣṭhati maurkhyam ekaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ janasya vapuṣām iva keśajālam //MU_6,92.27//
GSP27moksop_u:38030: athemam aparaṃ ramyaṃ vṛttāntaṃ śṛṇu bhūpate /
GSP27moksop_u:38031: paraṃ prabodhanaṃ buddhes sādho sadṛśam ātmanaḥ //MU_6,93.1//
GSP27moksop_u:38034: vajrāśriviṣamau dīrghau stas tasya daśanau śitau /
GSP27moksop_u:38039: tāṃ jagāma vyathāṃ vīro na vāggocaram eti yā //MU_6,93.5//
GSP27moksop_u:38040: ripau hastipake dūrād guptaṃ paśyati vāraṇaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38046: taṃ tasya nigaḍacchedam apaśyad dūrato ripuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38049: papātākramatas svargaṃ harir meror baḍer iva //MU_6,93.10//
GSP27moksop_u:38050: sa patan pādapān mohād aprāpya kariṇaś śiraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38052: taṃ puraḥ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahebhaḥ karuṇāṃ yayau /
GSP27moksop_u:38054: patitaṃ dalayāmīti kiṃ nāma mama pauruṣam /
GSP27moksop_u:38055: vāraṇo 'pīti kalayan na jaghāna ca taṃ ripum //MU_6,93.13//
GSP27moksop_u:38058: tam anādṛtya mātaṅgo bhaṅktvā jālaṃ javād yayau /
GSP27moksop_u:38061: gajenaiva samaṃ tasya vyathā dūrataraṃ gatā //MU_6,93.16//
GSP27moksop_u:38063: na bhedam āpa durbhedā manye dehā durātmanām //MU_6,93.17//
GSP27moksop_u:38072: atha yatra sthito nāgas tatra tadbandhanakṣamam /
GSP27moksop_u:38074: sa khātavalayaṃ cakre hastipaḥ kānane navam /
GSP27moksop_u:38076: upary asthagayaj jīrṇalataughena sa taṃ śaṭhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38078: dinaiḥ katipayair eva vāraṇo viharan vane /
GSP27moksop_u:38079: tasmin nipatitaḥ khāte śuṣkābdhāv iva parvataḥ //MU_6,93.25//
GSP27moksop_u:38082: iti bhūyo dṛḍhaṃ baddhas tena hastipakena saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38083: tiṣṭhaty adyāpi duḥkhena bhūsadmani yathā baḍiḥ //MU_6,93.27//
GSP27moksop_u:38085: tan nālapsyata tad duḥkhaṃ gajaḥ khātanibandhanam //MU_6,93.28//
GSP27moksop_u:38087: aśodhayan naro duḥkhaṃ yāti vindhyagajo yathā //MU_6,93.29//
GSP27moksop_u:38089: dūrastho 'pi punar baddho maurkhyaṃ kveva na bādhate //MU_6,93.30//
GSP27moksop_u:38090: maurkhyaṃ nibandhanam avaihi paraṃ mahātman bandho na bandha iha cetasi tadviyukte /
GSP27moksop_u:38091: ātmodaye trijagad ātmamayaṃ samastam aśve sthitasya sahayā nanu sarvabhūmiḥ //MU_6,93.31//
GSP27moksop_u:38101: ratnasaṃsādhane proktas sa tvam eva mahīpate //MU_6,94.3//
GSP27moksop_u:38102: tajjño bhavasi śāstreṣu ravir merutaṭeṣv iva /
GSP27moksop_u:38103: tattvajñāne tu viśrānto na tvaṃ dṛṣad ivāmbare //MU_6,94.4//
GSP27moksop_u:38107: sarvatyāgo hi sāmrājyaṃ kiṃ cintāmaṇinā bhavet //MU_6,94.6//
GSP27moksop_u:38108: siddhas sa sarvasantyāgas sādho saṃsādhitas tava /
GSP27moksop_u:38116: manomātre hṛdas tyakte yāvat te yāti pūrṇatām /
GSP27moksop_u:38117: tyāgas tāvad vikalpas tvāṃ kham ambuda ivāvṛṇot //MU_6,94.11//
GSP27moksop_u:38119: ko 'py uccair anya evāsau cirasādhyo mahān iti //MU_6,94.12//
GSP27moksop_u:38121: vātyayeva vanaspande tyāgaḥ proḍḍīya te gataḥ //MU_6,94.13//
GSP27moksop_u:38122: tyāgitā syāt kutas tasya cintām apy āvṛṇoti yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38125: tasyām eva sphurantyāṃ tu cittaṃ tyaktaṃ kathaṃ bhavet //MU_6,94.15//
GSP27moksop_u:38130: niścintatvadhanaṃ sarvaṃ tyāga ādāya te gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38131: āmantryāpūjito yāti yas sa duḥkhaṃ karoti hi //MU_6,94.18//
GSP27moksop_u:38134: tvayā tasmiṃs tapasy eva duḥkhe dṛṣṭibhramodite /
GSP27moksop_u:38139: mite vastuni dussādhe svātmahā sa śaṭhas smṛtaḥ //MU_6,94.22//
GSP27moksop_u:38146: cintāmaṇir mayā prāpta ity alaṃ buddhavān asi /
GSP27moksop_u:38147: na labdhavān bhavān sādho sphaṭikasyāpi khaṇḍikām //MU_6,94.26//
GSP27moksop_u:38148: ity etad aṅga maṇiyatnakathāsamānaṃ samyaṅ mayā prakaṭitaṃ tava padmanetra /
GSP27moksop_u:38149: udbodhya bodham amalaṃ svayam eva buddhyā yad vacmi tat pariṇatiṃ kuru cittakośe //MU_6,94.27//
GSP27moksop_u:38155: yo 'sau vindhyavane hastī so 'smin bhūmitale bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:38156: yau vairāgyavivekau te tau tasya daśanau śitau //MU_6,95.2//
GSP27moksop_u:38159: atiśakto 'py aśaktena duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam /
GSP27moksop_u:38163: āśā hi loharajjubhyo viṣamā vipulā dṛḍhā /
GSP27moksop_u:38164: kālena kṣīyate lohaṃ tṛṣṇā tu parivardhate //MU_6,95.6//
GSP27moksop_u:38165: yad baddhaṃ prekṣate vairī gajam ārād alakṣitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38166: prekṣate tvāṃ tad ajñānaṃ krīḍārthaṃ baddham ekakam //MU_6,95.7//
GSP27moksop_u:38168: tat tatyāja bhavān bhogabhūmiṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam //MU_6,95.8//
GSP27moksop_u:38170: na tv asya manasas sādho bhogāśāvinivāraṇam //MU_6,95.9//
GSP27moksop_u:38171: yad ibhe pāṭayaty uccair bandhaṃ hastipako 'patat /
GSP27moksop_u:38172: tvayi tyajati tad rājyam ajñānaṃ patitaṃ kṣatam //MU_6,95.10//
GSP27moksop_u:38173: yadā viraktaḥ puruṣo bhogāśāṃ tyaktum icchati /
GSP27moksop_u:38175: yadā vivekī puruṣo bhogān santyajya tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:38177: bhogaughe nūnam unmukte pataty ajñānam asthiti /
GSP27moksop_u:38179: yadā vanaṃ prayātas tvaṃ tadājñānaṃ kṣataṃ tvayā /
GSP27moksop_u:38181: tena bhūyas samutthāya smṛtvā paribhavaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38183: tadaivāghātayiṣyas tvaṃ yady ajñānaṃ yadā patat /
GSP27moksop_u:38184: rājyatyāgavidhau tat tvāṃ nāhaniṣyat kṣayaṃ gatam //MU_6,95.16//
GSP27moksop_u:38185: yat khātavalayas tena vairiṇā hastinaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38187: yāṃ tasya rājasāmagrīṃ gajārer āharan nṛpaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38189: tvaṃ gajendras tapaḥkhāte dīrghe vanagato 'pi san /
GSP27moksop_u:38193: ity adyāpi tapaḥkhāte duḥkhe hy asmin sudāruṇe /
GSP27moksop_u:38194: sthito 'si pātālatale nṛpa baddho yathā baḍiḥ //MU_6,95.21//
GSP27moksop_u:38195: gajas tvam āśā nigaḍāni vairī moho nikhātaḥ punar ugrabandhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38196: mahītalaṃ vindhya udanta itthaṃ tvadīya uktaḥ kuru yat karoṣi //MU_6,95.22//
GSP27moksop_u:38200: tadā cūḍālayā jñānaṃ tat kasmān norarīkṛtam //MU_6,96.1//
GSP27moksop_u:38201: sā hi tattvavidāṃ mukhyā yad yad vakti karoti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:38202: tat sarvaṃ satyam evāṅga tad anuṣṭheyam ādarāt //MU_6,96.2//
GSP27moksop_u:38203: atha ced vacanaṃ tasyās tvayā nānuṣṭhitaṃ nṛpa /
GSP27moksop_u:38204: tat sa sarvaparityāgaḥ kasmān na nipuṇīkṛtaḥ //MU_6,96.3//
GSP27moksop_u:38206: rājyaṃ tyaktaṃ gṛhaṃ tyaktaṃ deśas tyaktas tathāvidhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38207: dārās tyaktās tathāpy aṅga sarvatyāgo na kiṃ kṛtaḥ //MU_6,96.4//
GSP27moksop_u:38209: dhanaṃ dārā gṛhaṃ rājyaṃ bhūmiś chattraṃ ca bāndhavāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38210: iti sarvaṃ na te rājan sarvatyāgo 'tra kas tava //MU_6,96.5//
GSP27moksop_u:38212: taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām //MU_6,96.6//
GSP27moksop_u:38214: rājyaṃ cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vanam eva me /
GSP27moksop_u:38215: sālavṛkṣādigulmāḍhyaṃ tad apy etat tyajāmy aham //MU_6,96.7//
GSP27moksop_u:38223: parityaktā mayā nūnaṃ sarvatyāgas sthito mama //MU_6,96.10//
GSP27moksop_u:38225: adres taṭavanaṃ śvabhraṃ salilaṃ pādapās sthalam /
GSP27moksop_u:38226: ityādi tava no sarvaṃ sarvatyāgaḥ kathaṃ tava //MU_6,96.11//
GSP27moksop_u:38228: taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām //MU_6,96.12//
GSP27moksop_u:38230: etac cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ svāśramo mune /
GSP27moksop_u:38239: parityaktā mayā nūnaṃ sarvatyāgas sthito mama //MU_6,96.16//
GSP27moksop_u:38241: vṛkṣo vāpī sthalaṃ gulma uṭajaṃ vratatīvṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38242: iti kiñcin na te sarvaṃ sarvatyāgaḥ kutas tava //MU_6,96.17//
GSP27moksop_u:38244: taṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām //MU_6,96.18//
GSP27moksop_u:38246: etac cen mama no sarvaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhājanādi me /
GSP27moksop_u:38249: ity uktvā sa samuttasthāv avikṣubdhamanāś śamī /
GSP27moksop_u:38251: kumbhas tv ālokayann eva tatkriyāṃ saṃsthitas samām /
GSP27moksop_u:38253: yat karoti karotv etad asyaitat pāvanaṃ param /
GSP27moksop_u:38254: iti tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ kumbhaś śikhidhvajam avaikṣata //MU_6,96.22//
GSP27moksop_u:38255: śikhidhvajas tu tat sarvaṃ bhāṇḍopaskaram āśramāt /
GSP27moksop_u:38256: ekatraivānayām āsa bhuvo vāry abdhibhūr iva //MU_6,96.23//
GSP27moksop_u:38257: tat saṃsthāpyendhanaiś śuṣkair jvalayām āsa pāvakam /
GSP27moksop_u:38259: bhāṇḍopaskarajātaṃ tad agnau tyaktuṃ viveśa saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38260: bṛsikāyāṃ jagad dagdhuṃ meruśṛṅge yathā raviḥ //MU_6,96.25//
GSP27moksop_u:38261: etāvantaṃ mayā kālaṃ vṛto yat tvaṃ vratipriya /
GSP27moksop_u:38265: ity uktvā vaiṇavaṃ daṇḍaṃ cikṣepāgnau śikhidhvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38268: sakhi mantrapadāny adya yāhi nopakaroṣi me //MU_6,96.29//
GSP27moksop_u:38275: idānīṃ gaccha sacchāya panthānas santu te śivāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38276: vahninā vyomatāṃ gaccha satāraṃ vyoma te samam //MU_6,96.33//
GSP27moksop_u:38277: unmocyāṅgāt karābhyāṃ ca dhṛtvā carma jahāv iti /
GSP27moksop_u:38279: mayā dhṛtena bhavatā tvayā vāri dhṛtaṃ mama /
GSP27moksop_u:38282: sādhutvasya ca sarvasya tvam ekaḥ paramāspadam //MU_6,96.36//
GSP27moksop_u:38284: tenaiva gaccha he mitra panthānas santu te śivāḥ //MU_6,96.37//
GSP27moksop_u:38285: ity uktvā śrotriyāyaiṣa kamaṇḍalum adāt tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:38286: agnaye mahate vāpi dātavyaṃ sādhu yad bhavet //MU_6,96.38//
GSP27moksop_u:38287: mūrkhasyeva matir gupte nityam eva vasasy adhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38288: ucitā te gatiḥ keva bṛsike bhasmatāṃ vraja //MU_6,96.39//
GSP27moksop_u:38290: śuddhyartham āsanārthaṃ cety agnau tatyāja bhāsure //MU_6,96.40//
GSP27moksop_u:38291: yat tyājyam acireṇaiva tyaktavyaṃ kila tat satā /
GSP27moksop_u:38292: upāyaḥ kriyate sadbhir upādeye mate sati //MU_6,96.41//
GSP27moksop_u:38293: śīghram agnāv idaṃ sarvaṃ bhāṇḍajālaṃ tyajāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:38294: ekavāraṃ dahann agnir dāhyaṃ bhavati tuṣṭaye //MU_6,96.42//
GSP27moksop_u:38295: sādho kriyopakaraṇa niṣkriyas tvāṃ tyajāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:38296: na khedas tv atra kartavyo 'nupayogyaṃ bibharti kaḥ //MU_6,96.43//
GSP27moksop_u:38297: ity uktavāñ jhagiti bhojanabhājanādyaṃ sarvaṃ juhāva vanavāsavilāsayogyam /
GSP27moksop_u:38298: tad bhāṇḍajālam anale samam eva rājā kalpāntatejasi jagaj jvalatīva kālaḥ //MU_6,96.44//
GSP27moksop_u:38304: śiṣṭaṃ yat kiñcid abhavat tatra tat sa śikhidhvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38306: dadāha dūre cikṣepa tatyāja ca babhañja ca /
GSP27moksop_u:38312: bhāṇḍajātaṃ dahaty agnau saha śuṣkendhanena tat /
GSP27moksop_u:38316: sampannaḥ kevalaś śuddhas sukhito bodhavān aham //MU_6,97.7//
GSP27moksop_u:38317: kiṃ nāma kila vastv etad bhavet sāṅkalpikakramam /
GSP27moksop_u:38320: tāvat tāvat samāyāti paramāṃ nirvṛtiṃ manaḥ //MU_6,97.9//
GSP27moksop_u:38322: vibandhāḥ prakṣayaṃ yātās sarvatyāgo mayā kṛtaḥ //MU_6,97.10//
GSP27moksop_u:38326: sarvam eva na santyaktaṃ tvayā rājañ śikhidhvaja /
GSP27moksop_u:38329: yaṃ parityajya niśśeṣaṃ parām āyāsy aśokatām //MU_6,97.13//
GSP27moksop_u:38331: iti śrutavatā tena kiñcit sañcintya bhūbhṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:38339: ity uktvā deham agrasthe śvabhre tyaktum asau javāt /
GSP27moksop_u:38340: karoti yāvad utthānaṃ tāvat kumbho 'bhyuvāca ha //MU_6,97.17//
GSP27moksop_u:38342: rājan kim iti dehaṃ tvaṃ nirāgaskaṃ mahāvaṭe /
GSP27moksop_u:38343: tyajasy ajño hi vṛṣabhaḥ kupito hanti tarṇakam //MU_6,97.18//
GSP27moksop_u:38344: jaḍo varāko mūkātmā tapasvī dehako hy ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:38345: na kaścana tavaitasmai mā mudhaiva ruṣaṃ kuru //MU_6,97.19//
GSP27moksop_u:38346: ātmany evaiṣa mūḍhātmā dhyānavān iva tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:38348: kṣobhayaty anya evainaṃ nigrahārho muhur balāt /
GSP27moksop_u:38353: taruṇā sādhunā sādhor aparāddhaṃ kim ātmanaḥ //MU_6,97.23//
GSP27moksop_u:38355: sarvatyāgo na te yāti niṣpattiṃ viṣamo hi saḥ //MU_6,97.24//
GSP27moksop_u:38356: bhṛgoḥ kevalam etat tvaṃ nirāgaskaṃ śarīrakam /
GSP27moksop_u:38357: mudhā kṣipasi no dehatyāgena tyāgitā bhavet //MU_6,97.25//
GSP27moksop_u:38359: tat santyajasi cet pāpaṃ tan mahātyāgavān bhavān //MU_6,97.26//
GSP27moksop_u:38360: tasmiṃs tyakte bhavet tyaktaṃ sarvaṃ dehādi bhūpate /
GSP27moksop_u:38361: no cen nirdagdham apy etad bhūyo bhūyaḥ prarohati //MU_6,97.27//
GSP27moksop_u:38363: kenāyaṃ cālyate dehaḥ kiṃ bījaṃ janmakarmaṇām /
GSP27moksop_u:38364: kasmiṃs tyakte parityaktaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati sundara //MU_6,97.28//
GSP27moksop_u:38366: sādho na dehatyāgena na rājyatyajanena ca /
GSP27moksop_u:38368: yat sarvaṃ sarvato yac ca tasmin sarvaikakāraṇe /
GSP27moksop_u:38371: sarvaṃ sarvagataṃ sārvaṃ heyaṃ tyājyaṃ ca sarvathā /
GSP27moksop_u:38372: sarvaṃ kim ucyate brūhi sarvatattvavidāṃ vara //MU_6,97.31//
GSP27moksop_u:38375: na jaḍaṃ nājaḍaṃ bhrāntaṃ cittaṃ sarvam iti smṛtam //MU_6,97.32//
GSP27moksop_u:38377: sarvasyaiva mano bījaṃ tarubījaṃ taror iva //MU_6,97.33//
GSP27moksop_u:38378: sarvasya bīje santyakte sarvaṃ tyaktaṃ bhavaty alam /
GSP27moksop_u:38380: sarvaṃ dharmādy adharmādi rājyādi vipinādi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:38381: sacittasya paraṃ duḥkhaṃ niścittasya paraṃ sukham //MU_6,97.35//
GSP27moksop_u:38382: idaṃ vivartate sarvaṃ cittam eva jagattayā /
GSP27moksop_u:38388: cittaṃ jīvo mano māyā prāṇaś cetyādibhir mune /
GSP27moksop_u:38390: cittaṃ sarvam iti prāhus tasmiṃs tyakte mahīpate /
GSP27moksop_u:38393: tasmin siddhe mahābāho satyaṃ kenāpi bhūyate //MU_6,97.41//
GSP27moksop_u:38394: citte tyakte layaṃ yāti dvaitam aikyaṃ ca sarvataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38395: kenacid bhūyate śāntaṃ svaccham ekam anāmayam //MU_6,97.42//
GSP27moksop_u:38396: asyāḥ kṣetraṃ viduś cittaṃ saṃsṛtes sasyasantateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38397: kṣetre tv akṣetratāṃ yāte śāleḥ ka iva sambhavaḥ //MU_6,97.43//
GSP27moksop_u:38403: tvam apy anyasya bhavasi tyāgin gṛhṇāsi cen nṛpa //MU_6,97.46//
GSP27moksop_u:38405: sarvam antaḥkṛtaṃ tena yena sarvaṃ samujjhitam //MU_6,97.47//
GSP27moksop_u:38406: yena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ tasmiñ śūnye 'pi saṃsthitaṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:38407: jagat sarvaṃ trikālasthaṃ tantur muktāphale yathā //MU_6,97.48//
GSP27moksop_u:38414: samastavastūdāso hi yathā khaṃ netaran nṛpa /
GSP27moksop_u:38421: sarvaṃ tyajati khaṃ yasmāt tasmāc chuddhaṃ sthiraṃ bṛhat //MU_6,97.55//
GSP27moksop_u:38423: ity om ity urarīkṛtya yad icchasi tad ācara //MU_6,97.56//
GSP27moksop_u:38424: sarvaṃ tyajati yas tasya sarvam evopatiṣṭhate /
GSP27moksop_u:38427: yac chūnyaṃ kila bhāṇḍasya tatra ratnādi tiṣṭhati //MU_6,97.58//
GSP27moksop_u:38431: na gṛhṇāti hi yaḥ kaścit sarvaṃ tasmai pradīyate //MU_6,97.60//
GSP27moksop_u:38433: somyo bhavasi yadrūpas tadrūpo bhava bhūpate //MU_6,97.61//
GSP27moksop_u:38434: sarvaṃ parityajya mahānubhāva tyajasy alaṃ yena ca tad vihāya /
GSP27moksop_u:38435: tyāgaṃ ca sādānam alaṃ vimucya vimuktarūpo bhava bhūmipāla //MU_6,97.62//
GSP27moksop_u:38439: evaṃ vadati vai kumbhe cittatyāgaṃ muhur muhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38440: antar vicārayan somyo rājā vacanam abravīt //MU_6,98.1//
GSP27moksop_u:38443: bhūyo bhūyo nirastaṃ hi samāyāty eva māṃ manaḥ //MU_6,98.2//
GSP27moksop_u:38444: jānāmi naitad ādātuṃ matsyaṃ bāla ivākulam /
GSP27moksop_u:38445: tyāgam asya na jānāmi citram andha ivottamam //MU_6,98.3//
GSP27moksop_u:38446: cittasyādau svarūpaṃ me yathāvad bhagavan vada /
GSP27moksop_u:38451: tyāgas tv asyātisukaras susādhas spandanād api /
GSP27moksop_u:38452: ratād apy adhikānandaḥ kusumād api sundaraḥ //MU_6,98.6//
GSP27moksop_u:38453: mūrkhasya tu manastyāgo nūnaṃ dussādhatāṃ gataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38461: ayatnāc cetasas tyāgo yathā bhavati tad vada //MU_6,98.10//
GSP27moksop_u:38464: sa eva cittasantyāga ity uktaṃ dīrghadarśibhiḥ //MU_6,98.11//
GSP27moksop_u:38472: cetasaḥ kiṃ mune mūlaṃ ko 'ṅkuraḥ kaś ca sambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38473: kāś śākhāḥ ke ca vā skandhāḥ katham unmūlyate ca tat //MU_6,98.14//
GSP27moksop_u:38480: niścayātmā nirākāro buddhir ity eva socyate //MU_6,98.17//
GSP27moksop_u:38486: śākhās tāś cittavṛkṣasya dīrghā dūratarās tatāḥ //MU_6,98.20//
GSP27moksop_u:38493: kathaṃ karomi mūlasya niśśeṣaṃ kaṣaṇaṃ mune //MU_6,98.23//
GSP27moksop_u:38496: abhāvitā bhavanty antar lūnās saṃvidbalena te //MU_6,98.24//
GSP27moksop_u:38500: yas tiṣṭhati sa mūlasya yogyo nikaṣaṇe bhavet //MU_6,98.26//
GSP27moksop_u:38509: rājan svātmavicāro 'yaṃ ko 'haṃ syām iti rūpadhṛt /
GSP27moksop_u:38513: yāvan nāhaṃ jagan norvī na ca maṇḍalamaṇḍalam //MU_6,98.31//
GSP27moksop_u:38514: nādres taṭaṃ na vipinaṃ na parṇasadanādi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:38515: jaḍatvān na ca dehādi na māṃsāsthyasṛgādi ca //MU_6,98.32//
GSP27moksop_u:38516: karmendriyāṇy api na ca na ca buddhīndriyāṇi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:38517: na mano nāpi ca matir nāhambhāvaś ca jāḍyataḥ //MU_6,98.33//
GSP27moksop_u:38519: jaḍaṃ tv asadrūpatayā tena tan nāsmi he mune //MU_6,98.34//
GSP27moksop_u:38523: antar yadā na jānāmi tena tapye mahāmune //MU_6,98.36//
GSP27moksop_u:38525: etāvanmātrakaṃ vṛndaṃ yadi na tvaṃ mahīpate /
GSP27moksop_u:38526: jaḍatvāt tan mahābuddhe yo 'si taṃ vada me navam //MU_6,98.37//
GSP27moksop_u:38529: yatra bhāvās svadanty ete nirmīyante ca yena vā //MU_6,98.38//
GSP27moksop_u:38530: evaṃrūpasya me lagnaṃ nūnaṃ malam akāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:38531: sakāraṇaṃ cāham iti yat tat tyaktuṃ na vedmy aham //MU_6,98.39//
GSP27moksop_u:38532: asad etad anātmīyaṃ pramārṣṭuṃ malam ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38533: mune yadā na śakto 'smi tena tapye sudāruṇam //MU_6,98.40//
GSP27moksop_u:38535: brūhi kiṃ tan mahābāho lagnaṃ tava malaṃ mahat /
GSP27moksop_u:38536: sthito 'si yena saṃsārī satā vāpy asatātha vā //MU_6,98.41//
GSP27moksop_u:38538: cittadrumasya yad bījam ahambhāvas sa me malam /
GSP27moksop_u:38539: tac ca tyaktuṃ na jānāmi tyaktaṃ tyaktam upaiti mām //MU_6,98.42//
GSP27moksop_u:38541: kāraṇāj jāyate kāryaṃ yat tat sarvatra sad bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:38542: anyat tv asad dvicandrābhaṃ dṛṣṭam eva na vidyate //MU_6,98.43//
GSP27moksop_u:38546: mune 'ham iti doṣasya vedanaṃ vedmi kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:38547: tad yathopaśamaṃ yāti tan me vada munīśvara //MU_6,98.45//
GSP27moksop_u:38554: akāraṇaṃ kāraṇatāṃ yad gataṃ tava tad vada //MU_6,98.48//
GSP27moksop_u:38563: vidyate yadi dehādivastusattā tad asti te /
GSP27moksop_u:38567: asadrūpaṃ kathaṃ tat syāt prakāśas syāt kathaṃ tamaḥ //MU_6,98.53//
GSP27moksop_u:38571: kāraṇaṃ yasya kāryasya bhūmipāla na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38572: vidyate neha tat kāryaṃ tatsaṃvittis tu vibhramaḥ //MU_6,98.55//
GSP27moksop_u:38573: kāraṇena vinā kāryaṃ vidyate na kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:38574: vidyate yasya no bījaṃ tad dravyaṃ kveva jāyate //MU_6,98.56//
GSP27moksop_u:38575: akāranaṃ tu yat kāryaṃ sad ivāgre 'nubhūyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38585: nityam ālakṣyamāṇasya pitā kasmān na kāraṇam //MU_6,98.61//
GSP27moksop_u:38587: kāraṇābhāvato rājan pitā nāma na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38588: asato yat tu sañjātam asad eva tad ucyate //MU_6,98.62//
GSP27moksop_u:38589: padārthānāṃ ca kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ bījam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38590: sambhavaty aṅga jagati na bījena vināṅkuraḥ //MU_6,98.63//
GSP27moksop_u:38592: bījābhāve hi tan nāsti tatsaṃvittis tu vibhramaḥ //MU_6,98.64//
GSP27moksop_u:38593: avaśyam eva yan nāsti nirbījaṃ tan matibhramaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38597: ādyaḥ pitāmahaḥ kasmāt pūrvotpanno na kāraṇam //MU_6,98.66//
GSP27moksop_u:38599: ādyaḥ pitāmaho yas syāt so 'pi nāsty eva bhūpate /
GSP27moksop_u:38600: kāraṇābhāvato nityaṃ yadā kāryaṃ na kasyacit //MU_6,98.67//
GSP27moksop_u:38602: ādyas san dṛśyamāno 'pi bhramād anyo na vidyate //MU_6,98.68//
GSP27moksop_u:38607: tasmāc cidātmakatayātmani cinnabho yan nityaṃ svayaṃ kacati cāru tad eṣa devaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38608: tenaiva padmaja iti svayam ātmanātmā proktaḥ kharūpa iti śāntam idaṃ samastam //MU_6,98.71//
GSP27moksop_u:38617: ajñānaṃ śithilībhūtam eva naṣṭaṃ vidur budhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38619: tanutvaṃ sargabodhasya yat tad eva hi kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:38626: na kadācana tat siddhaṃ yad asiddhena sādhyate //MU_6,99.7//
GSP27moksop_u:38628: vicārād vilayaṃ yāti śuktau rajatadhīr iva //MU_6,99.8//
GSP27moksop_u:38630: mithyājñānād ṛte tasya na rūpam upapadyate //MU_6,99.9//
GSP27moksop_u:38631: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ prekṣitā ca na kadācana vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38634: sraṣṭur ādyasya paramaṃ brahma kasmān na kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:38635: anantam ajam avyaktam īśvaraṃ śāntam acyutam //MU_6,99.11//
GSP27moksop_u:38638: advaitaikyāvikārātma na kāryaṃ na ca kāraṇam //MU_6,99.12//
GSP27moksop_u:38640: apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ brahma kartṛ kathaṃ bhavet //MU_6,99.13//
GSP27moksop_u:38643: apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ yac chivaṃ śāntam avyayam /
GSP27moksop_u:38644: tat kathaṃ kasya keneva kartṛ bhoktṛ kadā bhavet //MU_6,99.15//
GSP27moksop_u:38645: ato nedaṃ kṛtaṃ kiñcij jagadādi na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38646: na kartāsti na bhoktāsti sarvaṃ śāntam ajaṃ śivam //MU_6,99.16//
GSP27moksop_u:38647: kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryaṃ na kasyacid idaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:38648: akāryatvāc ca nāsty etat sarga itthaṃ na vidyate //MU_6,99.17//
GSP27moksop_u:38649: yadā na kasyacit kāryaṃ kāraṇasya jagat tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:38651: evaṃ tu vedanābhāve nāsty ahantvasya kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:38654: āṃ prabuddho 'smi bhagavan yuktam uktaṃ tvayottamam /
GSP27moksop_u:38655: kāraṇābhāvataḥ kartṛ neha brahmeti vedmy aham //MU_6,99.20//
GSP27moksop_u:38656: kartrabhāvāj jagan nāsti tena nāsti padārthadṛk /
GSP27moksop_u:38658: evaṃ sthite viśuddho 'smi vibuddho 'smi na cāsmi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:38659: namo mahyaṃ paraṃ naumi nakiñcid api bodhataḥ //MU_6,99.22//
GSP27moksop_u:38661: ahamādy alam etena śāntam āse khakośavat //MU_6,99.23//
GSP27moksop_u:38663: aho nu kālena cireṇa śāntā brahmaiva vā nūnam avasthiteti //MU_6,99.24//
GSP27moksop_u:38664: śāmyāmi nirvāmi paraṃ sthito 'smi na yāmi nodemi na cāstam emi /
GSP27moksop_u:38665: tiṣṭhāmy aniṣṭhaṃ ca yathāsthitātmā śivaṃ śubhaṃ pāvanamaunam asmi //MU_6,99.25//
GSP27moksop_u:38669: iti brahmaṇi viśrāntim avāpya sa śikhidhvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38672: svalīlayeti kumbhena sa jhagity eva bodhitaḥ //MU_6,100.2//
GSP27moksop_u:38679: kumbhena bodhitas tv evaṃ sa babhūva prabodhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:38682: asattām eva muktātmā līlayā samuvāca ha //MU_6,100.6//
GSP27moksop_u:38684: jñātaprāyam apīdaṃ tu yat pṛcchāmi tad ucyatām /
GSP27moksop_u:38690: etad eva hi te śiṣṭaṃ jñatāyās tad idaṃ śṛṇu //MU_6,100.9//
GSP27moksop_u:38691: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam /
GSP27moksop_u:38693: tatas stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:38695: cinmātram amalaṃ kāntam ābhātam amalaṃ nabhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38697: yad ekoditam atyacchaṃ śāntam ātatam ujjvalaṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:38700: brahma nirvāṇam āpūrṇam āghūrṇad iva sampadā //MU_6,100.14//
GSP27moksop_u:38701: aṇīyasām aṇīyas tat sthaviṣṭhaṃ ca sthavīyasām /
GSP27moksop_u:38702: garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasām api //MU_6,100.15//
GSP27moksop_u:38703: īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ sūkṣmaṃ tasyāgre yad idaṃ nabhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38704: aṇoḥ pārśve mahāmerur iva sthūlātma lakṣyate //MU_6,100.16//
GSP27moksop_u:38705: īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ sthūlaṃ tasyāgre yad idaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:38706: paramāṇuvad ābhāti kvacid eva na bhāti vā //MU_6,100.17//
GSP27moksop_u:38707: īdṛśaṃ tad gariṣṭhaṃ ca jagadrājyaṃ yad akṣatam /
GSP27moksop_u:38709: īdṛśaṃ tat paraṃ śreyas tasmin sati yad īśvare /
GSP27moksop_u:38711: tat sāram ekam eveha vidyate bhūpate tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:38713: tasmād dvitīyā kalanā kācin nāma na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38714: ātmatattvam alaṃ bhātaṃ tad evāpūrṇam akṣatam //MU_6,100.21//
GSP27moksop_u:38716: avācyatvād alabhyatvāt tan na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam //MU_6,100.22//
GSP27moksop_u:38717: pratyakṣāder agamyatvāt kim apy ekam tad uttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:38720: sato vāpy asato vāpi kathaṃ kāraṇatā bhavet //MU_6,100.24//
GSP27moksop_u:38721: yad vai na kasyacid bījam anākhyatvān na kāraṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:38725: tasmān na jāyate kiñcit parasmād brahmaṇo mune /
GSP27moksop_u:38727: na kiñcij jāyate śānte na ca kiñcit pralīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38728: svasattayā sthitaṃ brahma na bījaṃ na ca kāraṇam //MU_6,100.28//
GSP27moksop_u:38729: śuddhānubhavamātraṃ tat tasmād anyan na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38730: kiñcij jagadahantādi tad evānantam asti hi //MU_6,100.29//
GSP27moksop_u:38732: śive jagadahantādi mune nāstīti vedmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:38733: sargavedanam ābhāti katham etad vadāśu me //MU_6,100.30//
GSP27moksop_u:38735: citsāraṃ tad anādyantaṃ tat svasaṃvidi tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:38736: tat tadbhavanam atyacchaṃ tattāmātraṃ jagad viduḥ //MU_6,100.31//
GSP27moksop_u:38738: tad ahaṃvedanaṃ viddhi virāḍātma jagat sthitam //MU_6,100.32//
GSP27moksop_u:38739: vātasya vātaspandasya yathā bhedo na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38744: jalādau yat taraṅgādi tat sakāraṇam astv iha /
GSP27moksop_u:38747: idānīṃ bhavatā jñātam etat satyaṃ mahīpate /
GSP27moksop_u:38750: vyomny eva nirmitaṃ śāntaṃ vyomnas sūkṣmatareṇa vā //MU_6,100.37//
GSP27moksop_u:38751: yathā nabhasi śūnyatvaṃ tathedaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:38753: evaṃrūpaṃ jagad idaṃ samyagjñānāc chivaṃ bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:38757: īśvaratvād yathā vetti yad yad eṣa cidīśvaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38761: yat paraṃ citsvarūpeṇa sthitam ātmani mantharam /
GSP27moksop_u:38762: tat tenedam ahantādi jagadādy eva lakṣyate //MU_6,100.43//
GSP27moksop_u:38763: kevalaṃ param evetthaṃ paramaṃ bhāsate śivam /
GSP27moksop_u:38765: yad vastu vidyamānaṃ sat praśnas tatra virājate /
GSP27moksop_u:38766: prekṣitaṃ yat tu nāsty eva prekṣāpraśnena tatra kim //MU_6,100.45//
GSP27moksop_u:38767: sanniveśaṃ vinā sattā yathā hemno na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38775: pūrṇāt pūrṇam uddharanti pūrṇāt pūrṇāni cakrire /
GSP27moksop_u:38778: akacat tv eva tan nāma kacitaṃ sargavedanam //MU_6,100.51//
GSP27moksop_u:38779: ahaṃ citā cid evāsau bhavatīva svayaṃ svataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38780: abhavanty eva rūpaṃ svam atyajantī nirāmayam //MU_6,100.52//
GSP27moksop_u:38783: paśyaty athāsad evedaṃ svarūpatvāt sad eva vā /
GSP27moksop_u:38784: bhāvanād ghanatām eti dṛśyaṃ bhavati ca kramāt //MU_6,100.54//
GSP27moksop_u:38785: śāntaṃ jagatprasararūpatayā svabhāvaśabdārthamuktam idam avyapadeśyam ekam /
GSP27moksop_u:38790: na vijñānamayo 'rtho 'sti na bāhyo nāpi śūnyatā /
GSP27moksop_u:38793: khātma nityam anantaṃ tad yathāsthitam avasthitam //MU_6,101.2//
GSP27moksop_u:38798: ato na kāraṇaṃ naiva bījaṃ brahma kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:38799: kāryasya kasyacin nāma tena sargo na vidyate //MU_6,101.5//
GSP27moksop_u:38801: cinmātrakād ṛte tasmāj jaḍas sargo na vidyate //MU_6,101.6//
GSP27moksop_u:38802: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcit tac cidghanam avedhitam /
GSP27moksop_u:38807: upalambhe dhruvo nāśo janma naṣṭasya ca dhruvam //MU_6,101.9//
GSP27moksop_u:38808: atha vainaṃ sadā santaṃ nityaṃ naṣṭaṃ ca vetsi vā /
GSP27moksop_u:38809: padārthaughaṃ tad eṣo 'rtha ekarūpo 'tra kiṃ vyathā //MU_6,101.10//
GSP27moksop_u:38810: upalambhas tu yaś cāyaṃ sā cittattvacamatkṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38811: cittattvamātrasattāsti dvitvam aikyaṃ ca nāsty alam //MU_6,101.11//
GSP27moksop_u:38815: iti cittam ahaṃrūpaṃ nāsty ato bhava vinnabhaḥ //MU_6,101.13//
GSP27moksop_u:38817: sadeho vā videho vā bhava sthāyī calo 'tha vā //MU_6,101.14//
GSP27moksop_u:38819: bhāvanābhāvataś citte nāsty evāham ataś śivam //MU_6,101.15//
GSP27moksop_u:38822: tenāsi nirmalam akāraṇam ādimuktaṃ tad brahma śāśvatam aśeṣam anekam ekam /
GSP27moksop_u:38823: śūnyaṃ vināmayam asat sad anādimadhyaṃ sarvaṃ na kiñcid api cāssva yathāsthitaṃ sat //MU_6,101.17//
GSP27moksop_u:38827: cittaṃ nāstīti me bodho yathā yuktyā sphuṭo bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:38828: tām anyām anyathā brūhi buddhaṃ na nipuṇaṃ mayā //MU_6,102.1//
GSP27moksop_u:38830: cittaṃ nāsty eva rājarṣe kadācit kiñcana kvacit /
GSP27moksop_u:38831: yac cedaṃ cittavad bhāti tad brahmābhidham avyayam //MU_6,102.2//
GSP27moksop_u:38832: ajñajñātātmakaṃ yatra jagad eva na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38834: nāsty eva jagad evedaṃ yat tv idaṃ kiñcanoditam /
GSP27moksop_u:38835: brahmaivātmani tad bhāti śṛṇv etad budhyate katham //MU_6,102.4//
