GSP27moksop_u:38837: nirdeśas tv ayam anyatra tvadbodhāya mayā kṛtaḥ //MU_6,102.5//
GSP27moksop_u:38840: evam ajñāvabuddhātma jagad yasmān na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38841: tasmād yad idam ābhāti bhāsanaṃ brāhmam eva tat //MU_6,102.7//
GSP27moksop_u:38842: anākhyo 'nākṛtir devaḥ karotīdam iti tv asat /
GSP27moksop_u:38846: anenaiva prayogeṇa rājaṃś ceto na vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38847: jagad eva na sat sādho kutaś cittādi tadgatam //MU_6,102.10//
GSP27moksop_u:38848: ceto hi vāsanāmātraṃ vāsye tu sati vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:38849: vāsyaṃ jagat tad evāsad ataś cittāstitā kutaḥ //MU_6,102.11//
GSP27moksop_u:38850: yad idaṃ kacati brahma svayam ātmātmanātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:38852: jagad dṛśyam idaṃ vāsyaṃ tad evotpannam eva no /
GSP27moksop_u:38855: sphāraṃ vedanam evedaṃ kacaty astīha no jagat //MU_6,102.14//
GSP27moksop_u:38857: cidādarśe nijācchatvāt tac cittaṃ taj jagat kṛtam //MU_6,102.15//
GSP27moksop_u:38858: ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad ity eṣā pratipattir na vāstavī /
GSP27moksop_u:38859: mithyā svapna ivābhātā nūnam apy arthakāriṇī //MU_6,102.16//
GSP27moksop_u:38860: vāsyasya jagato 'bhāvād yato nāsty eva vāsanā /
GSP27moksop_u:38861: atas tadātmakaṃ cittaṃ kīdṛśaṃ kva kutaḥ katham //MU_6,102.17//
GSP27moksop_u:38862: aprabuddhair avagataṃ caittaṃ dṛśyam idaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:38863: asad eva nirākāraṃ pūrvam utpannam eva no //MU_6,102.18//
GSP27moksop_u:38866: anāditvam ajatvaṃ vā sthairyaṃ vāpy upapadyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38871: pralayādīn na santīti vakty unmattaka eva saḥ //MU_6,102.22//
GSP27moksop_u:38872: lokāś śāstrāṇi vedāś ca pramāṇaṃ yasya nāmateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:38873: asatyoktes sumūḍhasya sa paśus taṃ na saṃśrayet //MU_6,102.23//
GSP27moksop_u:38876: ittham ālakṣyamāṇaṃ san na cedaṃ nāvabhāsate /
GSP27moksop_u:38877: na ca nārthakriyākāri na caivettham idaṃ jagat //MU_6,102.25//
GSP27moksop_u:38880: brahmaṇas sarvarūpasya śāntaṃ śāntasya yat samam /
GSP27moksop_u:38882: svakaṃ vapus tat tenaiva jñātaṃ jagad idaṃ kṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:38883: kṣaṇāntare tu buddhaṃ sad brahmaivāste nijātmani //MU_6,102.28//
GSP27moksop_u:38885: kva cittādi kva dehādi kva dvaitaikyādikalpanāḥ //MU_6,102.29//
GSP27moksop_u:38886: sarvaṃ nirālambam ajaṃ praśāntam anādimadhyātma yathāsthitaṃ sat /
GSP27moksop_u:38887: idaṃ ca nānaiva na cāpi nānā yathāsthitaṃ tiṣṭha sukāṣṭhamaunaḥ //MU_6,102.30//
GSP27moksop_u:38891: naṣṭo mohas smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayā mune /
GSP27moksop_u:38895: aho nu suciraṃ kālaṃ prabhrānto 'ham avāntare /
GSP27moksop_u:38896: sthānam avyayam akṣubdham adhunā prāptavān aham //MU_6,103.3//
GSP27moksop_u:38898: mūrkhabuddham idaṃ bhāti yat tad brahmeti vedmy aham //MU_6,103.4//
GSP27moksop_u:38905: ahaṃ jagad idaṃ ceti śabdārthātma nabho 'malam //MU_6,103.7//
GSP27moksop_u:38908: sanniveśadṛśaś śāntau yad asti kanakaṃ yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:38910: yathā svayambhūs saṅkalpas svayaṃnāśas tathaiva hi /
GSP27moksop_u:38913: nāham ity eva saṅkalpo mokṣāya vimalātmane //MU_6,103.11//
GSP27moksop_u:38915: svarūpavedanaṃ tat sat kevalatvaṃ ca kathyate //MU_6,103.12//
GSP27moksop_u:38926: yac cedaṃ bhāsate tat sat param evātmani sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:38927: paraṃ pare parāpūrṇaṃ samam eva vijṛmbhate //MU_6,103.18//
GSP27moksop_u:38929: viddhi raśmimayākāram iva brahma jagat sthitam //MU_6,103.19//
GSP27moksop_u:38931: rūpaṃ tad viddhi jagataḥ khād acchaṃ sadasanmayam //MU_6,103.20//
GSP27moksop_u:38935: samyagjñānavato yasya nirvāṇaṃ taṃ vidur budhāḥ //MU_6,103.22//
GSP27moksop_u:38936: yathāsti vāto nisspando yathāsti kham anīlima /
GSP27moksop_u:38942: sarga eva paraṃ brahma paraṃ brahmaiva sargadṛk /
GSP27moksop_u:38947: śuddhaṃ kim api cidvyoma brahmaśabdena kathyate //MU_6,103.28//
GSP27moksop_u:38949: yac chiṣṭam ajaraṃ śāntaṃ tato vāg vinivartate //MU_6,103.29//
GSP27moksop_u:38951: yathāsthitaṃ sarvajagat kharūpaṃ pāṣāṇarūpaṃ ca paraṃ jñarūpam //MU_6,103.30//
GSP27moksop_u:38955: evaṃ caitan mahābuddhe yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ param /
GSP27moksop_u:38956: tādṛśaṃ kāryam evedaṃ jagad ity eva vedmy aham //MU_6,104.1//
GSP27moksop_u:38959: yan na kāraṇam evādau tasmāt kāryaṃ kuto bhavet //MU_6,104.2//
GSP27moksop_u:38960: nehāsti kāraṇaṃ kiñcin na ca kāryaṃ kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:38961: vidyamānam idaṃ sarvaṃ śivaṃ śāntam ajaṃ jagat //MU_6,104.3//
GSP27moksop_u:38962: jāyate kāraṇāt kāryaṃ yat tat kāraṇavad bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:38963: yan na jāyata eveha tasmin sadṛśatā kutaḥ //MU_6,104.4//
GSP27moksop_u:38964: bījam eva na yasyāsti tat kathaṃ vada jāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38965: apratarkyam anākhyaṃ ca yan na tasyeha bījatā //MU_6,104.5//
GSP27moksop_u:38970: brahmaiva svaṃ svarūpaṃ sad yat sthitaṃ dhārayat tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:38972: cinmātram ajaraṃ śāntaṃ yad ekaṃ tat pragīyate /
GSP27moksop_u:38973: tenaivājaṃ jagadbrahma sac chāntaṃ budhyate vapuḥ //MU_6,104.9//
GSP27moksop_u:38974: asya sva eva yo bhāvaś cetasaḥ pṛthivīpate /
GSP27moksop_u:38975: sa eva nāśaḥ kathitaś cānubhūtaś ca paṇḍitaiḥ //MU_6,104.10//
GSP27moksop_u:38976: cittaṃ nāśasvabhāvaṃ tvaṃ viddhi nāśātmakaṃ nṛpa /
GSP27moksop_u:38981: vidyamānaṃ kathaṃ tat syāc cittaṃ tāmarasekṣaṇa //MU_6,104.13//
GSP27moksop_u:38982: hastāv utkṣipya yo brūte śūdro 'smīti bhṛśaṃ girā /
GSP27moksop_u:38983: kathaṃ sa vipro bhavati vipratvaṃ tasya kīdṛśam //MU_6,104.14//
GSP27moksop_u:38985: mṛtam evāṅga taṃ viddhi jīvitaṃ tasya tu bhramaḥ //MU_6,104.15//
GSP27moksop_u:38988: tat kathaṃ kila nāma syāt satyaṃ bhramabharātmakam /
GSP27moksop_u:38989: ajñānabhrāntir evātaś cittam ity eva kathyate //MU_6,104.17//
GSP27moksop_u:38990: ajñānam ucyate cittam asat sad iva saṃsthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:38993: tannāśaś cetaso nāśaś cittatyāgas sa eva ca //MU_6,104.19//
GSP27moksop_u:38995: ajñānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ deva kathaṃ caitad vinaśyati /
GSP27moksop_u:38996: samāseneti bhagavan vada me vadatāṃ vara //MU_6,104.20//
GSP27moksop_u:38999: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭasya kumbhādes tad ajñānam iti smṛtam //MU_6,104.21//
GSP27moksop_u:39001: ajñānasya tv asaṃvitter jñānāt saṃvedanāt kṣayaḥ //MU_6,104.22//
GSP27moksop_u:39003: naitaj jalam iti jñānāt saṃvittiḥ pravilīyate //MU_6,104.23//
GSP27moksop_u:39004: idaṃ cittam iti prauḍhaṃ yad ajñānam alaṃ hṛdi /
GSP27moksop_u:39005: nāsti cittam iti jñānāt tat samūlaṃ vinaśyati //MU_6,104.24//
GSP27moksop_u:39007: na sarpo 'yam iti jñānād dhṛdi rūḍhāt praṇaśyati //MU_6,104.25//
GSP27moksop_u:39008: cittaṃ mano 'ham ity antar yāvad ajñānasambhavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39009: tāvac cittaṃ mano māyā bhavaty eva na saṃśayaḥ //MU_6,104.26//
GSP27moksop_u:39010: cittaṃ nāsty aham ity antar yāvaj jñānodayo bhavet /
GSP27moksop_u:39011: tāvac cittaṃ mano māyā nāsty evātra na saṃśayaḥ //MU_6,104.27//
GSP27moksop_u:39012: mithyāyakṣabhramo yāvat tāvad yakṣo hi dṛśyate /
GSP27moksop_u:39014: na cittam asti no caittam ahaṅkārādisaṃyutam /
GSP27moksop_u:39015: kiñcid eva jagaty asmin saṃvid ekāsti nirmalā //MU_6,104.29//
GSP27moksop_u:39017: yad yat saṅkalpya tat sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ prabuddhayā //MU_6,104.30//
GSP27moksop_u:39018: saṅkalpena yad āyāti tat saṅkalpena gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:39021: jagat sarvam abhivyāptaṃ samudra iva vāriṇā //MU_6,104.32//
GSP27moksop_u:39022: nāham asmi na cānyo 'sti na tvaṃ naite na cittakam /
GSP27moksop_u:39025: idaṃ cittam ayaṃ cāham iti keva kukalpanā //MU_6,104.34//
GSP27moksop_u:39026: na jāyate na mriyate kiñcid asmiñ jagattraye /
GSP27moksop_u:39028: sarvam ātmā paraṃ brahma sakṛt prakaṭam ātatam /
GSP27moksop_u:39029: dvitvaikatve na vidyete nirbhrāntir bhava satyataḥ //MU_6,104.36//
GSP27moksop_u:39031: na dahyase mahābuddhe na ca kvacana lipyase //MU_6,104.37//
GSP27moksop_u:39032: na te vinaśyati sakhe na ca kiñcid vivardhate /
GSP27moksop_u:39034: icchānicchātmike śaktī ye tavāpi tvam eva te /
GSP27moksop_u:39036: tvam ajaram aparaṃ parasvabhāvaṃ sakṛd amalaṃ satataṃ sad ekarūpam /
GSP27moksop_u:39037: vigalitakalanaṃ kalākhyalīlaṃ samuditam ādyam ajaṃ tad ātmatattvam //MU_6,104.40//
GSP27moksop_u:39041: iti kumbhavaco rājā bhāvayaṃs tad akṛtrimam /
GSP27moksop_u:39048: kaccid asmin pade sphāre śuddhe mṛduni nirmale /
GSP27moksop_u:39050: kaccid antaḥ prabuddho 'si kaccid bhrāntis tvayojjhitā /
GSP27moksop_u:39051: kaccij jñeyaṃ parijñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam eva vā //MU_6,105.5//
GSP27moksop_u:39054: mahatī padavī dṛṣṭā sarvasyordhve sthitā mayā //MU_6,105.6//
GSP27moksop_u:39057: janmanāpi mayā labdhaṃ yan nāma na mahāmṛtam /
GSP27moksop_u:39060: kathaṃ nāsāditam abhūd etad ātmapadaṃ mayā //MU_6,105.9//
GSP27moksop_u:39069: sādho vṛkṣāt phalānīva pākena vigalanty adhaḥ //MU_6,105.13//
GSP27moksop_u:39071: yad vakti gurur antas tad viśatīṣur yathā bile //MU_6,105.14//
GSP27moksop_u:39078: yāvad asya dinasyaiṣa pūrvo bhāgo mahīpate /
GSP27moksop_u:39079: tāvac ceto hy aham iti tavājñānaṃ babhūva ha //MU_6,105.18//
GSP27moksop_u:39085: etayor yo layo dṛṣṭyos taj jñānaṃ sā parā gatiḥ //MU_6,105.21//
GSP27moksop_u:39086: prabuddho 'si vimukto 'si tyaktaṃ cittaṃ tvayā nṛpa /
GSP27moksop_u:39087: sad eva sattayāttaṃ hi tvayā tyaktam asat padam //MU_6,105.22//
GSP27moksop_u:39089: mahodayo munir maunī kharūpas tiṣṭha nirmalaḥ //MU_6,105.23//
GSP27moksop_u:39091: evaṃ hi bhagavañ jantor mūrkhasyaivāsti cittabhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39092: na prabuddhasya tajjñasya cittam asti kila prabho //MU_6,105.24//
GSP27moksop_u:39093: jīvanmuktās ta ete hi viharanti kathaṃ vada /
GSP27moksop_u:39095: iti me kathayāśeṣam anyaiś ca vacanāṃśubhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39096: hārdaṃ tamo me nipuṇam evamprāyaiḥ pramārjaya //MU_6,105.26//
GSP27moksop_u:39098: yathā vadasi dharmajña tat tathaiva hi nānyathā /
GSP27moksop_u:39099: cittaṃ hi jīvanmuktānāṃ nāsty aṅkura ivāśmanām //MU_6,105.27//
GSP27moksop_u:39101: sā proktā cittaśabdena na sā tajjñasya vidyate //MU_6,105.28//
GSP27moksop_u:39106: mūḍhaṃ cittaṃ cittam āhuḥ prabuddhaṃ sattvam ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:39107: aprabuddhā hi cittasthās sattvasthā hi mahādhiyaḥ //MU_6,105.31//
GSP27moksop_u:39108: bhūyaḥ prajāyate cittaṃ sattvaṃ bhūyo na jāyate /
GSP27moksop_u:39110: sattvavān asi sañjāto mahātyāgī sthito bhavān /
GSP27moksop_u:39111: aśeṣeṇa tvayā tyaktaṃ cittam adyeti vedmy aham //MU_6,105.33//
GSP27moksop_u:39113: ākāśasāmyam āyātaṃ manye tava mune manaḥ //MU_6,105.34//
GSP27moksop_u:39116: parityaktā tvayā rājyād vāsanā tapasas tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:39117: kānanāc ca śarīrāc ca śubhāśubhaphalād api //MU_6,105.36//
GSP27moksop_u:39120: ayaṃ sa hi mahātyāgas sarvaṃ yatra samujjhitam /
GSP27moksop_u:39125: tat sat tad vastu tat kiñcin na tu svargādi bhaṅguram //MU_6,105.40//
GSP27moksop_u:39127: svargo nāma kimānandas so 'pi sandeham āsthitaḥ //MU_6,105.41//
GSP27moksop_u:39129: yena nāsāditaṃ hema rītiṃ kiṃ sa parityajet //MU_6,105.42//
GSP27moksop_u:39131: tat kimartham anarthe 'smin nimagnas tvaṃ tapomaye //MU_6,105.43//
GSP27moksop_u:39133: ādyantau paśya sumate madhya eva ramasva mā //MU_6,105.44//
GSP27moksop_u:39134: yata ete samāyātā yasmin pariṇamanti ca /
GSP27moksop_u:39136: cidvyomno nabhaso 'py acchāt sarve bhāvās samutthitāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39137: tatraiva ca layaṃ yānti tatraivāssva ramasva ca //MU_6,105.46//
GSP27moksop_u:39138: idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti saṅkalpā brahmabindavaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39140: iṣṭaṃ me prārthayasveti yathaiva prārthyate sakhī /
GSP27moksop_u:39141: striyā tathaiva na kathaṃ dayitaḥ prārthyate svayam //MU_6,105.48//
GSP27moksop_u:39143: na gṛhṇanti mahātmānaḥ prājñā jalaravīn iva //MU_6,105.49//
GSP27moksop_u:39144: svargamokṣādiphaladaṃ yat kiñcit samam eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:39145: tyaktvā samasamābhāso yo 'sy asāv eva vai bhava //MU_6,105.50//
GSP27moksop_u:39152: sthiraṃ śāntaṃ gataspandaṃ yasya cittam acāpalam /
GSP27moksop_u:39153: sa vibhus sa mahānandī sāmrājyasya sa bhājanam //MU_6,105.54//
GSP27moksop_u:39154: atha cetasi tattvajña spandāspandau tad ekatām /
GSP27moksop_u:39155: nītvā tiṣṭha yathākāmam aikyam āgatya śāśvatam //MU_6,105.55//
GSP27moksop_u:39157: katham aikyavidhiṃ yātas spandāspandāv imau vibho /
GSP27moksop_u:39160: ekaṃ vastu jagat sarvaṃ cinmātraṃ vār ivāmbudhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39161: tad eva spandate no vā śuddhaṃ vārīva vīcibhiḥ //MU_6,105.57//
GSP27moksop_u:39163: yad gītaṃ tad idaṃ mūḍhaḥ paśyaty aṅga jagattayā //MU_6,105.58//
GSP27moksop_u:39164: nisspanda eva sarvasmin sarge tasmād dhi saṃsṛtiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39165: parispando hi vīcyādis tad aspandaṃ samaṃ param //MU_6,105.59//
GSP27moksop_u:39166: citas sa eva cet spandas tathāspandaś ca bhāvitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39167: ekarūpatayā nāma tat tad apy acalaṃ śivam //MU_6,105.60//
GSP27moksop_u:39170: saspandā cic cidabhidhā nisspandā tv iyam ātatā /
GSP27moksop_u:39175: kathyate svānubhūtes tu svayaṃ svaṃ rūpam ātmanā //MU_6,105.64//
GSP27moksop_u:39176: prāpto 'si bhāvaṃ svam anādimadhyam atraiva tiṣṭheṣṭapade niviṣṭaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39181: iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ śikhidhvaja mahīpate /
GSP27moksop_u:39182: yathedam utthitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā ca pravilīyate //MU_6,106.1//
GSP27moksop_u:39183: etac chrutvā ca buddhvā ca matvā ca munināyaka /
GSP27moksop_u:39185: svargaṃ gacchāmy ahaṃ tatra kāle 'smin nārado muniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39187: na māṃ paśyati cet tatra tat kopam upagacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:39190: tvayātmany eva vastavyaṃ dṛṣṭir eṣaiva pāvanī //MU_6,106.5//
GSP27moksop_u:39193: praṇāmāya dadāty eṣa tāvad antardhim āyayau //MU_6,106.6//
GSP27moksop_u:39195: na dṛṣṭavāṃs tathā kumbham agre rājā śikhidhvajaḥ //MU_6,106.7//
GSP27moksop_u:39196: gate kumbhe mahīpālaḥ paraṃ vismayam āyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:39197: tad eva cintayaṃś citraṃ citrārpita ivābhavat //MU_6,106.8//
GSP27moksop_u:39198: iti sañcintayām āsa citraṃ vilasitaṃ vidheḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39200: kva nāradasutaḥ kumbhaḥ kvāhaṃ nāma śikhidhvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39202: aho nu samyak kathitaṃ devaputreṇa yuktimat /
GSP27moksop_u:39205: idaṃ kāryam idaṃ neti mithyāvibhramam ācaran //MU_6,106.12//
GSP27moksop_u:39206: aho nu śītalā śuddhā śānteyaṃ padavī nijā /
GSP27moksop_u:39208: śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam /
GSP27moksop_u:39211: śailād iva samutkīrṇo maunam evātha tasthivān //MU_6,106.15//
GSP27moksop_u:39212: tasminn eva tato maunī nissaṅkalpe nirāmaye /
GSP27moksop_u:39213: pratiṣṭhāṃ niścalāṃ prāpya sa tasthau giriśṛṅgavat //MU_6,106.16//
GSP27moksop_u:39214: sa tatra saṃśāntabhayo mahātmā cireṇa viśrāntim itas samātmā /
GSP27moksop_u:39215: cireṇa samprāptanijāmalātmā yogena suṣvāpa tadā cidātmā //MU_6,106.17//
GSP27moksop_u:39220: evaṃ śikhidhvajo rāma cūḍālām adhunā śṛṇu //MU_6,107.1//
GSP27moksop_u:39221: śikhidhvajaṃ taṃ bhartāraṃ kumbhaveṣena tena sā /
GSP27moksop_u:39226: dṛśyā babhūva lokasya nṛpakarma cakāra sā //MU_6,107.4//
GSP27moksop_u:39229: tathā tatraiva taṃ bhūpam apaśyad vanabhūmigā /
GSP27moksop_u:39231: aho nu khalu bho diṣṭyā viśrānto 'yam ihātmani /
GSP27moksop_u:39232: sthitas svasthas samaś śānta ity uvāca puraḥ prabhoḥ //MU_6,107.7//
GSP27moksop_u:39233: tad enaṃ tāvad etasmād bodhayāmi parāt padāt /
GSP27moksop_u:39234: idānīm eva kiṃ dehatyāgam eṣa karoti vai //MU_6,107.8//
GSP27moksop_u:39235: kañcit kālaṃ sphuritveha rājyena vipinena vā /
GSP27moksop_u:39236: samam eva gamiṣyāvas tyaktadehāv imau śamam //MU_6,107.9//
GSP27moksop_u:39237: tad yāvad eṣo vicalaṃ pariṇāmaṃ na gacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:39239: iti sañcintya cūḍālā siṃhanādaṃ cakāra sā /
GSP27moksop_u:39241: na cacāla śilevādrau yadā nādena tena saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39242: bhūyo bhūyaḥ kṛtenāpi tadā sā taṃ vyacālayat //MU_6,107.12//
GSP27moksop_u:39243: cālitaḥ pātito 'py eṣa yadā na bubudhe nṛpaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39245: aho pariṇatas sādhus svapade bhagavān ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:39246: tad enaṃ hi kayā yuktyā sāmprataṃ bodhayāmy aham //MU_6,107.14//
GSP27moksop_u:39247: atha vainaṃ mahātmānaṃ kimarthaṃ bodhayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:39248: videhaṃ bodham āsādya tiṣṭhatv eṣa yathāsukham //MU_6,107.15//
GSP27moksop_u:39249: aham apy aṅganādeham imaṃ tyaktvā paraṃ padam /
GSP27moksop_u:39251: iti sañcintya dehaṃ svaṃ tyaktum abhyudyatā satī /
GSP27moksop_u:39252: punas sañcintayām āsa cūḍālā sā mahāsatī //MU_6,107.17//
GSP27moksop_u:39253: ālokayāmi vai tāvad enaṃ dehaṃ mahīpateḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39257: tadeha viharañ jīvanmukta eko bhavaty ayam /
GSP27moksop_u:39258: maiko bhavatv eṣa iti manye gacchāmi no śamam //MU_6,107.20//
GSP27moksop_u:39259: iti sañcintya cūḍālā sparśena nayanena ca /
GSP27moksop_u:39262: kāyo 'yam agaladrūpo nemaṃ dehaṃ tyajāmy aham //MU_6,107.22//
GSP27moksop_u:39271: kāyas samasamābhogo na glāyati na hṛṣyati /
GSP27moksop_u:39272: nāstam eti na codeti samam evāvatiṣṭhate //MU_6,107.26//
GSP27moksop_u:39275: cittaspando hi sarveṣāṃ kāraṇaṃ jagatas sthiteḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39277: yasmin praspandate dehe cittaṃ sa hi muhur muhuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39279: citte praśamam āyāte kāyo yas sattvavān sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39282: tathā na dṛśyate doṣas samāyās sattvasaṃsthiteḥ //MU_6,107.31//
GSP27moksop_u:39284: yāvad bhāvi samaṃ sattvaṃ kālāc chāmyati kevalam //MU_6,107.32//
GSP27moksop_u:39285: dehe yasmiṃs tu no cittaṃ nāpi sattvaṃ ca vidyate /
GSP27moksop_u:39288: sattvāṃśena ca saṃyuktas tena na mlānibhājanam //MU_6,107.34//
GSP27moksop_u:39289: taṃ tathābhūtam ālokya bhartur dehaṃ varāṅganā /
GSP27moksop_u:39292: bhaviṣyadbodhanaṃ kāntam eṣa tatra hi saṃsthitaḥ //MU_6,107.36//
GSP27moksop_u:39293: na bodhayāmi yady enaṃ cirāt tad budhyate svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:39294: kim ihaikāvatiṣṭhe 'ham ity enaṃ bodhayāmy aham //MU_6,107.37//
GSP27moksop_u:39297: tatra sā cetanaspandaṃ kṛtvā sattvavataḥ prabhoḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39298: svaṃ viveśa punar dehaṃ khān nīḍam iva pakṣiṇī //MU_6,107.39//
GSP27moksop_u:39302: bubudhe bhūpater dehe vasanta iva padminī //MU_6,107.41//
GSP27moksop_u:39303: dṛśaṃ vikāsayām āsa tāṃ tadārka ivābjinīm /
GSP27moksop_u:39307: aho bata vayaṃ dhanyāḥ punaḥ prāpto munes sutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39308: ity evodāharan rājā kumbhāya kusumaṃ dadau //MU_6,107.44//
GSP27moksop_u:39309: diṣṭyā sthitās smo bhagavaṃs tava cetasi pāvane /
GSP27moksop_u:39310: ke nāma na mahāsattvāḥ prasādeṣv aṅga hi sthirāḥ //MU_6,107.45//
GSP27moksop_u:39312: tava pāpāpahaṃ brūhi dvitīyaṃ katarad bhavet //MU_6,107.46//
GSP27moksop_u:39315: tataḥ prabhṛti ceto me tvayaiveha samaṃ sthitam //MU_6,107.47//
GSP27moksop_u:39320: tasmād eveha tiṣṭhāmi samīpe tava sāmpratam /
GSP27moksop_u:39321: abhīṣṭaṃ yad yad evāṅga ramyāṇāṃ dhuri tat sthitam //MU_6,107.50//
GSP27moksop_u:39322: tvādṛśo bandhur āptaś ca suhṛn mitraṃ sakhā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:39323: viśvāsyaś caiva śiṣyaś ca manye jagati nāsti me //MU_6,107.51//
GSP27moksop_u:39325: aho nu phalitaṃ puṇyapādapair naḥ kulācale /
GSP27moksop_u:39326: yad bhavān apy asaṅgo 'pi vāñchaty asmatsamāgamam //MU_6,107.52//
GSP27moksop_u:39327: idaṃ vanam ime vṛkṣā bhṛtyo 'yam aham ādṛtaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39328: rocate cen na te svargas tad iha sthīyatāṃ prabho //MU_6,107.53//
GSP27moksop_u:39330: yathā sādho tathā manye svarge viśramaṇaṃ kutaḥ //MU_6,107.54//
GSP27moksop_u:39331: tām eva svasthitiṃ svacchām avalambya prakāśinīm /
GSP27moksop_u:39334: pare pade mahānande kaccid viśrāntavān asi /
GSP27moksop_u:39335: idaṃ bhedamayaṃ duḥkhaṃ kaccit santyaktavān asi //MU_6,107.56//
GSP27moksop_u:39339: yathāprāpteṣv anudvegi kaccit tava manas sthitam //MU_6,107.58//
GSP27moksop_u:39344: labdhaṃ labdhavyam akhilaṃ tṛptās smaś ciram akṣatāḥ //MU_6,107.60//
GSP27moksop_u:39347: jñātam ajñātam aprāptaṃ samprāptaṃ tyaktam āśritam /
GSP27moksop_u:39348: tvattvaṃ paratvaṃ mattvaṃ me khasyevāsti na kiñcana //MU_6,107.62//
GSP27moksop_u:39358: tenācāreṇa tābhiś ca kathābhis tau vanecarau /
GSP27moksop_u:39360: atha kumbha uvācānyad vanaṃ yāvo girāv iti /
GSP27moksop_u:39361: tad om iti nṛpo matvā tāv ubhau praviceratuḥ //MU_6,108.4//
GSP27moksop_u:39364: nadīr deśāṃs tathā grāmān nagarāṇi purāṇi ca /
GSP27moksop_u:39365: marūn ghorān girīn kuñjāṃs tīrthāny āyatanāni ca //MU_6,108.6//
GSP27moksop_u:39366: samam eva samasnehau samaveṣau sthitāv ubhau /
GSP27moksop_u:39368: ānarcatuḥ pitṝn devān bubhujāte ca rāghava /
GSP27moksop_u:39369: samaṃ talpe ca śiśyāte samabuddhī babhūvatuḥ //MU_6,108.8//
GSP27moksop_u:39372: idaṃ grāhyam idaṃ neti vikalpakalanā manaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39373: na jahāra tayo rāma vātyeva vibudhācalam //MU_6,108.10//
GSP27moksop_u:39380: atha taṃ suragarbhābhaṃ cūḍālā sā śikhidhvajam /
GSP27moksop_u:39381: dṛṣṭvā śobhām upagataṃ cintayām āsa māninī //MU_6,108.14//
GSP27moksop_u:39383: iyaṃ sthitir anāyāsā yo na kāmī sa vañcitaḥ //MU_6,108.15//
GSP27moksop_u:39386: nijaḥ patir anindyātmā nirādhitvaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39387: gṛhāṇi puṣpajālāni sā hatā yā na kāminī //MU_6,108.17//
GSP27moksop_u:39389: ramate yā na nirduḥkhā sā hataiva duraṅganā //MU_6,108.18//
GSP27moksop_u:39390: vaśyaṃ vivāhitaṃ kāntaṃ patim āsādya nirjane /
GSP27moksop_u:39391: strī satī yā na ramate tāṃ dhig astu duraṅganām //MU_6,108.19//
GSP27moksop_u:39393: anindyaṃ svam udārārthaṃ kiṃ tajjñena kṛtaṃ bhavet //MU_6,108.20//
GSP27moksop_u:39394: tat kañcid racayāmy āśu prapañcaṃ prajñayā navam /
GSP27moksop_u:39395: yenāyaṃ bhūpatir bhartā ramate mayi mānadaḥ //MU_6,108.21//
GSP27moksop_u:39400: adyāsthānaṃ mahārambhaṃ svarge bhavati vai hareḥ //MU_6,108.23//
GSP27moksop_u:39401: sannidhānaṃ mayā tatra kartavyaṃ pitur agrataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39402: yathāsthitā hi niyatir na santyājyā kadācana //MU_6,108.24//
GSP27moksop_u:39406: svargād atitarām eva tvatsaṅgo mama tuṣṭaye //MU_6,108.26//
GSP27moksop_u:39407: ity uktvā mañjarīṃ kumbho dadau mitrāya kausumīm /
GSP27moksop_u:39408: prītaye svām iva prītiṃ kāntāṃ nandanavṛkṣajām //MU_6,108.27//
GSP27moksop_u:39409: āgantavyaṃ tvayā śīghram evaṃ vadati bhūpatau /
GSP27moksop_u:39414: unnidro 'bdaṃ yathā barhī satprītir hi sudustyajā //MU_6,108.30//
GSP27moksop_u:39416: sānāvarteva vāriśrīr mugdhā svaṃ rūpam āyayau //MU_6,108.31//
GSP27moksop_u:39425: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kumbharūpaṃ tat punar jagrāha satvaram /
GSP27moksop_u:39428: induṃ sanīhāram iva yāmā khinnam ivāmbujam //MU_6,108.37//
GSP27moksop_u:39431: devaputra namas te 'stu vimanā iva lakṣyase /
GSP27moksop_u:39432: kumbhas tvaṃ tyaja saṃrambham idam āsanam āsyatām //MU_6,108.39//
GSP27moksop_u:39433: santo viditavedyā ye te hi harṣaviṣādajām /
GSP27moksop_u:39434: nāśrayanti sthitiṃ svasthāḥ padmā iva jalārdratām //MU_6,108.40//
GSP27moksop_u:39435: tena smopaviśety ukte kumbha āhāsane viśan /
GSP27moksop_u:39438: karmendriyair na tiṣṭhanti na te tattvadhiyaś śaṭhāḥ //MU_6,108.42//
GSP27moksop_u:39439: ye hy atattvavido mūḍhā rājan bālatayaiva te /
GSP27moksop_u:39441: yāvattilaṃ yathā tailaṃ yāvaddehaṃ daśā tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:39442: yo na dehadaśām eti sa cchinatty asināmbaram //MU_6,108.44//
GSP27moksop_u:39444: yat sāmyaṃ cetaso yogān na tu karmendriyasthiteḥ //MU_6,108.45//
GSP27moksop_u:39446: karmendriyair hi sthātavyaṃ na tu buddhīndriyaiḥ kvacit //MU_6,108.46//
GSP27moksop_u:39450: tat sarvam eva niyatiṃ dhāvaty ambu yathāmbudhim //MU_6,108.48//
GSP27moksop_u:39455: itthaṃ sukheṣu nanu duḥkhadaśāsu cetthaṃ sthātavyam ity adhigataṃ yad ihāṅga jīvaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39456: tajjñājñabhūtanicayas sphuritas tad eva durlaṅghya eṣa niyato niyater vilāsaḥ //MU_6,108.51//
GSP27moksop_u:39460: evaṃ sthite mahābhāga katham udvegam īdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:39461: labdhavān asi devo 'pi svargād api sukhāspadāt //MU_6,109.1//
GSP27moksop_u:39463: śṛṇu kāryam idaṃ citraṃ madīyaṃ vasudhādhipa /
GSP27moksop_u:39464: kathayāmi tavāśeṣaṃ svarge yad vṛttam adya me //MU_6,109.2//
GSP27moksop_u:39465: suhṛdy āveditaṃ duḥkhaṃ param āyāti tānavam /
GSP27moksop_u:39466: ghanaṃ jaḍaṃ kṛṣṇam api muktavṛṣṭir ivāmbudaḥ //MU_6,109.3//
GSP27moksop_u:39467: suhṛdā pṛcchatā sādhu ceto yāti prasannatām /
GSP27moksop_u:39469: ahaṃ tāvad ito yāto bhavate puṣpamañjarīm /
GSP27moksop_u:39470: dattvā gaganam ullaṅghya samprāptaś ca triviṣṭapam //MU_6,109.5//
GSP27moksop_u:39473: ihāgantum ahaṃ svargaṃ tyaktvā samprāptavān nabhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39478: apaśyaṃ munim āyāntam ahaṃ durvāsasaṃ javāt //MU_6,109.9//
GSP27moksop_u:39483: tasya kṛtvā namaskāram uktaṃ ca vahatā mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:39485: ity ākarṇya cukopāsau mayi mānada mānahā /
GSP27moksop_u:39487: pautro 'smi padmajasyeti garvitas tvaṃ kim īdṛśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39488: bhavyā hi natim āyānti guṇair vṛkṣāḥ phalair iva //MU_6,109.14//
GSP27moksop_u:39494: vimṛṣyāmi manāg yāvat tāvad antarhito muniḥ //MU_6,109.17//
GSP27moksop_u:39496: etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ sampanno 'smi niśāṅganā //MU_6,109.18//
GSP27moksop_u:39497: ativāhyaṃ dinānteṣu strītvam etan mayā katham /
GSP27moksop_u:39498: yonistanavatā rātrau vaktavyaṃ kiṃ mayā pituḥ //MU_6,109.19//
GSP27moksop_u:39499: saṃsṛtau bhavitavyānām aho nu viṣamā gatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39500: aham apy anyavad daivād yūnām āmiṣatāṃ gataḥ //MU_6,109.20//
GSP27moksop_u:39504: katham agre mayā samyak sthātavyaṃ yāminīstriyā //MU_6,109.22//
GSP27moksop_u:39506: ity uktvā kṣaṇam ekaṃ sa tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā munes sutaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39507: dhairyam ālambya kumbho 'tra punar āha raghūdvaha //MU_6,109.23//
GSP27moksop_u:39508: kim ajña iva śocāmi kiṃ mama kṣatam ātmanaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39512: yad āyāti tad āyātu dehasyātmā na lipyate //MU_6,109.25//
GSP27moksop_u:39513: kānicid yāni duḥkhāni sukhāni vihitāni vā /
GSP27moksop_u:39514: tāni sarvāṇi dehasya dehino na tu kānicit //MU_6,109.26//
GSP27moksop_u:39515: yadi tvam api kāryāṇām akhedārho 'pi khidyasi /
GSP27moksop_u:39516: tad anyeṣām upāyas syāt ka ivāgamabhūṣaṇa //MU_6,109.27//
GSP27moksop_u:39517: khede 'khedocitaṃ vācyam iti kiṃ ca tvam uktavān /
GSP27moksop_u:39521: kṛtvā sthitau vane snigdhau suhṛdau khedinau mithaḥ //MU_6,109.29//
GSP27moksop_u:39522: athārkas tasya kumbhasya strītvam utpādayann iva /
GSP27moksop_u:39525: mārgāś ca pathikais sārdhaṃ pānthastrīhṛdayāni ca //MU_6,109.31//
GSP27moksop_u:39526: dāśavad vihagān sarvān kurvad ekatra puñjitān /
GSP27moksop_u:39528: khaṃ hasann iva tārāḍhyaṃ vikāsaṃ kumudākaraḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39531: vandayitvā tathā kṛtvā japyaṃ gulmāntare sthitau //MU_6,109.34//
GSP27moksop_u:39532: tataḥ kumbhaś śanais tatra straiṇam abhyāharan vapuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39535: lajjayeva ca he rājan manye strītvaṃ vrajāmy aham //MU_6,109.36//
GSP27moksop_u:39538: paśyemau mama jāyete pronmukhāv urasi stanau /
GSP27moksop_u:39541: dehād eva sakhe paśya striyā iva śanaiś śanaiḥ //MU_6,109.39//
GSP27moksop_u:39545: mūrdhni paṭṭāṃśuko jāto nīhāro 'drāv ivāṅga me //MU_6,109.41//
GSP27moksop_u:39547: hā dhik kaṣṭaṃ viṣādo me kiṃ karomy aṅganāsmy aham //MU_6,109.42//
GSP27moksop_u:39548: hā dhik kaṣṭam aho sādho sthita evāham aṅganā /
GSP27moksop_u:39550: vipine kumbha ity uktvā tūṣṇīṃ khinno babhūva ha /
GSP27moksop_u:39551: rājāpi ca tam ālokya tathaivāsīd viṣaṇṇadhīḥ //MU_6,109.44//
GSP27moksop_u:39554: sādho viditavedyas tvaṃ jānāsi niyater gatim /
GSP27moksop_u:39557: na cetasy adhiyāṃ tv etāś cittaṃ yānti sadehakam //MU_6,109.47//
GSP27moksop_u:39560: na khedam anugacchāmi niyatiḥ kena laṅghyate //MU_6,109.48//
GSP27moksop_u:39561: iti nirṇīya tau khedaṃ taṃ nītvā tanutāṃ mithaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39562: ekatalpe niśāṃ tūṣṇīṃ nītavantau cireṇa tām //MU_6,109.49//
GSP27moksop_u:39563: atha prabhāte tat svairaṃ vapur utsṛjya yauvatam /
GSP27moksop_u:39566: kumbhatvam āsthitā bhartuḥ paścāt strītvam upāgatā //MU_6,109.51//
GSP27moksop_u:39570: sārdhaṃ priyeṇa suhṛdā vibhunā yathecchaṃ sragdāmahāravalitā vijahāra nārī //MU_6,109.53//
GSP27moksop_u:39574: tataḥ katipayeṣv eva divaseṣu gateṣu sā /
GSP27moksop_u:39577: niśāyāṃ pratyahaṃ tāvat sthita evāham aṅganā //MU_6,110.2//
GSP27moksop_u:39579: bhartre kasmaicid ātmānaṃ vivāhena dadāmy aham //MU_6,110.3//
GSP27moksop_u:39580: tad bhavān eva me bhartā rocate bhuvanatraye /
GSP27moksop_u:39581: gṛhāṇa māṃ vivāhena bhāryātve niśi sarvadā //MU_6,110.4//
GSP27moksop_u:39583: strīsukhaṃ bhoktum icchāmi mā me vighnakaro bhava //MU_6,110.5//
GSP27moksop_u:39585: prakṛtaṃ kurvataḥ kāryaṃ doṣaḥ ka iva jāyate //MU_6,110.6//
GSP27moksop_u:39587: vayaṃ na secchā nānicchāḥ kurvas tenaitad īpsitam //MU_6,110.7//
GSP27moksop_u:39589: kṛtenānena kāryeṇa na śubhaṃ nāśubhaṃ sakhe /
GSP27moksop_u:39590: paśyāmi tan mahābuddhe yathecchasi tathā kuru //MU_6,110.8//
GSP27moksop_u:39594: yady evaṃ tan mahīpāla lagnam adyaiva śobhanam /
GSP27moksop_u:39595: rākeyaṃ śrāvaṇasyāsya hyas sarvaṃ gaṇitaṃ mayā //MU_6,110.10//
GSP27moksop_u:39597: janyatraṃ nau mahābāho dvayor eva bhaviṣyati //MU_6,110.11//
GSP27moksop_u:39602: niśi vyomagatās tārā bhartrā pūrṇendunā saha /
GSP27moksop_u:39606: ity uktvā kumbha utthāya saha tena mahībhṛtā /
GSP27moksop_u:39613: yayatus tau mahāmitre snātuṃ mandākinīṃ nadīm //MU_6,110.19//
GSP27moksop_u:39618: pūjayām āsatus snātau tatra devān pitṝn munīn /
GSP27moksop_u:39625: priyaṃ kartum ivāstādrau jhagity evāviśad raviḥ //MU_6,110.25//
GSP27moksop_u:39630: ratnadīpān bahūn samyak kumbhas sānāv ayojayat /
GSP27moksop_u:39632: bhūṣayām āsa rājānaṃ strītvaṃ gacchan niśāmukhe /
GSP27moksop_u:39635: sragdāmair avataṃsaiś ca mālyaiś ca vividhombhitaiḥ //MU_6,110.30//
GSP27moksop_u:39640: idaṃ sañcintayām āsa sampanno 'yam ahaṃ vadhūḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39642: iyam asmi vadhūḥ kāntā bhartāyaṃ me puras sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39643: gṛhāṇa kāma mām ehi kālo 'yaṃ tava hṛcchaya //MU_6,110.34//
GSP27moksop_u:39645: udayantam ivādityaṃ ratiḥ kāmam ivāha sā //MU_6,110.35//
GSP27moksop_u:39646: ahaṃ madanikā nāma bhāryāsmi tava mānada /
GSP27moksop_u:39647: pataye te praṇāmo 'yaṃ sasnehaṃ kriyate mayā //MU_6,110.36//
GSP27moksop_u:39650: uvācedaṃ ca he nātha tvaṃ māṃ bhūṣaya bhūṣaṇaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39654: indor ivāṃśujālāni rājan mālyāni bhānti te /
GSP27moksop_u:39666: sā babhau bhūṣitā tanvī madanī madadāyinī /
GSP27moksop_u:39670: śakreṇa saha yac chacyā yal lakṣmyā hariṇā saha /
GSP27moksop_u:39671: yad gauryāś śambhunā sārdhaṃ tat te bhavatu maṅgalam //MU_6,110.48//
GSP27moksop_u:39675: tvam eva phaladā manye kāmakalpataror latā //MU_6,110.50//
GSP27moksop_u:39678: tad uttiṣṭha varārohe vedīṃ vaivāhikīṃ svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:39680: ity uktvā dampatī kāntau racayām āsatus tadā /
GSP27moksop_u:39693: niyojya dampatī kāntau tayor viviśatus svayam //MU_6,110.59//
GSP27moksop_u:39695: utthāyotthāpya kāntāṃ ca pāṇibhyāṃ svayam ādade //MU_6,110.60//
GSP27moksop_u:39696: anyo'nyaṃ śobhamānau tāv anyāv iva navau śivau /
GSP27moksop_u:39701: madbhāryām ambarād dṛṣṭvā karau tatyajatuḥ kramāt //MU_6,110.63//
GSP27moksop_u:39705: śanair ākramayām āsa śobhāṃ draṣṭum ivaitayoḥ //MU_6,110.65//
GSP27moksop_u:39706: tasmin sānau latācchidrair draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭīr ivābhitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39707: lolais sañcārayām āsa karān indur varāṅgane //MU_6,110.66//
GSP27moksop_u:39708: tais tais tatra kathālāpair indāv abhyudite tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:39709: tāv āsāṃ cakratuḥ kāntau dampatī tu muhūrtakam //MU_6,110.67//
GSP27moksop_u:39722: tais tais tataḥ praṇatipeśalavāgvilāsais tatkālakāryasubhagaiḥ praṇayopacāraiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39723: satkāntayor navanavena tayos sukhena dīrghā muhūrta iva sā rajanī jagāma //MU_6,110.74//
GSP27moksop_u:39734: prabhādīpāv iva śliṣṭau na viyuktau babhūvatuḥ //MU_6,111.4//
GSP27moksop_u:39739: dinais tribhis tribhir gatvā nidrāṃ gatavati priye /
GSP27moksop_u:39740: cūḍālā rājakāryāṇi kṛtvā svāny āyayau punaḥ //MU_6,111.7//
GSP27moksop_u:39741: tau divā suhṛdau rātrau dampatī kumbhabhūmipau /
GSP27moksop_u:39746: evaṃ śuktimataḥ pṛṣṭhe pakṣaṃ pakṣaṃ latāgṛhe //MU_6,111.10//
GSP27moksop_u:39755: tato yāteṣu māseṣu śanaiḥ katipayeṣu sā /
GSP27moksop_u:39758: mā kadācana ceto 'sya bhogeṣu ratim eṣyati //MU_6,111.16//
GSP27moksop_u:39759: iti sañcintya cūḍālā māyayā svāmino vane /
GSP27moksop_u:39765: devarāja prasādān me yathāvad vaktum arhasi //MU_6,111.19//
GSP27moksop_u:39768: hṛdi lagnena sūtreṇa khagā dūragatā iva //MU_6,111.20//
GSP27moksop_u:39769: uttiṣṭha svargam āgaccha tatra sarve tvadunmukhāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39771: ime rathā idaṃ yānam ayam uccaiśśravā hayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39776: jīvanmuktena bhoktavyās tena tvām aham āgataḥ //MU_6,111.24//
GSP27moksop_u:39783: kiṃ tu sarvatra me svargo niyato na tu kutracit //MU_6,111.27//
GSP27moksop_u:39784: sarvatraiva hi tuṣyāmi sarvatraiva rame prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:39786: niyataṃ kiñcid ekatra sthitaṃ svargakam īdṛśam /
GSP27moksop_u:39787: śakra gantuṃ na jānāmi nājñātaṃ ca karomy aham //MU_6,111.29//
GSP27moksop_u:39791: deveśe proktavaty evaṃ tūṣṇīm eva sthite nṛpe /
GSP27moksop_u:39792: kim evaṃ nopayāmy eva tvām iti proktavān hariḥ //MU_6,111.31//
GSP27moksop_u:39793: bāḍham ity eva kālena vadatīṣac chikhidhvaje /
GSP27moksop_u:39794: kalyāṇaṃ te 'stu kumbheti vadann antardhim āyayau //MU_6,111.32//
GSP27moksop_u:39795: tad devavṛndam akhilaṃ tridaśeśayuktaṃ tatra kṣaṇād alam adṛśyam abhūd vilīnam /
GSP27moksop_u:39800: tāṃ māyāṃ śamam ānīya cūḍālā samacintayat /
GSP27moksop_u:39804: bhūya eva prapañcena vimṛśāmy enam ādarāt /
GSP27moksop_u:39806: iti sañcintya sā rātrāv indāv abhyudite vane /
GSP27moksop_u:39813: kaṇṭhe saṅkalpitaṃ kāntaṃ śiḍgam ādāya saṃsthitā //MU_6,112.7//
GSP27moksop_u:39826: tad ālokyāvikāreṇa cetasā sa tutoṣa ca /
GSP27moksop_u:39827: aho sukhaṃ sthitau śiḍgāv ity āha sa śikhidhvajaḥ //MU_6,112.14//
GSP27moksop_u:39829: vighnaṃ mā kuruthaḥ prītāv ity uktvā nirjagāma saḥ //MU_6,112.15//
GSP27moksop_u:39830: tato muhūrtamātreṇa prapañcaṃ svam upekṣya sā /
GSP27moksop_u:39835: tūṣṇīm āsit kṣaṇaṃ khinnā mlānā madanikāṅganā //MU_6,112.18//
GSP27moksop_u:39836: kṣaṇāc chikhidhvajo dhyānād viratas tām uvāca ha /
GSP27moksop_u:39838: tanvi kiṃ śīghram eva tvaṃ vighnitānandam āgatā /
GSP27moksop_u:39840: bhūyas toṣaya taṃ gaccha kāntaṃ praṇayavṛttibhiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39842: aham etena cārthena nodvegaṃ yāmi mānini /
GSP27moksop_u:39843: yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke tad tad deyaṃ vijānatā //MU_6,112.22//
GSP27moksop_u:39844: ahaṃ kumbhaś ca tanvaṅgi vītarāgāv iha sthitau /
GSP27moksop_u:39845: durvāsaśśāpajā bālā tvaṃ yad icchasi tat kuru //MU_6,112.23//
GSP27moksop_u:39847: evam eṣa mahābhāga strīpumbhāvo hi cañcalaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39848: kāmo hy aṣṭaguṇas strīṇāṃ na kopaṃ kartum arhasi //MU_6,112.24//
GSP27moksop_u:39852: karoti yāvac chiḍgena nāṅge sve viniveśitā //MU_6,112.26//
GSP27moksop_u:39854: manyur niṣedha ākrandas satītvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyati //MU_6,112.27//
GSP27moksop_u:39855: abalā strī tathā bālā mūḍhāham aparādhinī /
GSP27moksop_u:39856: kṣantum arhasi māṃ nātha kṣamāvanto hi sādhavaḥ //MU_6,112.28//
GSP27moksop_u:39858: manyur mama na bāle 'ntar vidyate kha iva drumaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39859: kevalaṃ sādhunindyatvān necchāmi tvām aham vadhūm //MU_6,112.29//
GSP27moksop_u:39863: evaṃ samatayā tatra sthite tasmiñ śikhidhvaje /
GSP27moksop_u:39865: aho bata paraṃ sāmyaṃ bhagavān ayam āgataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39867: nainaṃ haranti bhogāśā na mahatyo 'pi siddhayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39868: na sukhāni na duḥkhāni nāpado na ca sampadaḥ //MU_6,112.33//
GSP27moksop_u:39869: cintitās sakalā eva prayānty enam aninditāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39871: ātmavṛttāntam akhilaṃ tad enaṃ smārayāmy aham /
GSP27moksop_u:39872: kumbharūpam idaṃ tyaktvā cūḍālaiva bhavāmy aham //MU_6,112.35//
GSP27moksop_u:39878: kānto madanikām eva cūḍālāṃ dayitāṃ sthitām //MU_6,112.38//
GSP27moksop_u:39879: samuditām iva mādhavapadminīm upagatām iva bhūmitalāc chriyam /
GSP27moksop_u:39880: prakaṭitām iva ratnasamudgakāt paridadarśa nijāṃ dayitāṃ nṛpaḥ //MU_6,112.39//
GSP27moksop_u:39886: kā tvam utpalapattrākṣi kutaḥ prāptāsi sundari /
GSP27moksop_u:39891: evam eva prabho viddhi cūḍālāsmi na saṃśayaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39892: akṛtrimena dehena labdho 'sy adya mayā svayam //MU_6,113.4//
GSP27moksop_u:39895: yadā rājyaṃ parityajya mohena tapase vanam /
GSP27moksop_u:39896: tvam agās tatprabhṛty eva tvadbodhāyāham udyatā //MU_6,113.6//
GSP27moksop_u:39898: māyayā na tu kumbhādi kiñcit satyaṃ mahīpate //MU_6,113.7//
GSP27moksop_u:39901: atha cūḍālayety ukte baddhvā parikaraṃ nṛpaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39910: āliliṅga ciraṃ kāntāṃ nakulo nakulīm iva //MU_6,113.13//
GSP27moksop_u:39911: tayor āliṅgane tasmiṃs tatra bhāvo babhūva yaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39912: na sa vāsukijihvābhir vaktuṃ varṣair hi śakyate //MU_6,113.14//
GSP27moksop_u:39913: citrasthāv iva paṅkena kṛtāv iva galattanū /
GSP27moksop_u:39914: śailād iva samutkīrṇau śliṣṭāv āstāṃ ciraṃ priyau //MU_6,113.15//
GSP27moksop_u:39916: bāhū viślathatām īṣan ninyatus tau śanaiḥ priyau //MU_6,113.16//
GSP27moksop_u:39921: aho nu madhuras snigdhaḥ kāntaś ca kulayoṣitām /
GSP27moksop_u:39924: anubhūtaś ciraṃ kleśo bhartur arthena dāruṇaḥ //MU_6,113.20//
GSP27moksop_u:39926: uttārito yayā buddhyā sā hi kenopamīyate //MU_6,113.21//
GSP27moksop_u:39927: arundhatī śacī gaurī gāyatrī śrīs sarasvatī /
GSP27moksop_u:39932: kena pratyupakāreṇa tulām eṣyanti me guṇāḥ //MU_6,113.24//
GSP27moksop_u:39937: sakhā bhrātā suhṛd bhṛtyo gurur mantro dhanaṃ sukham /
GSP27moksop_u:39938: śāstram āyatanaṃ dāsyas sarvaṃ bhartuḥ kulastriyaḥ //MU_6,113.27//
GSP27moksop_u:39948: ehi me tvadguṇotkasya punar āliṅganaṃ kuru //MU_6,113.32//
GSP27moksop_u:39949: ity uktvā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ cūḍālāṃ sa śikhidhvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39950: āliliṅga punar gāḍhaṃ nakulo nakulīm iva //MU_6,113.33//
GSP27moksop_u:39953: tathābhūvaṃ bhṛśam ahaṃ tvadarthaṃ duḥkhitā kila //MU_6,113.34//
GSP27moksop_u:39955: mayā tad atra kiṃ devaḥ karoti mayi śaṃsanam //MU_6,113.35//
GSP27moksop_u:39957: tvayā yathā varārohe svārthas sampāditaś śubhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39961: adya taṃ prāktanaṃ kaccin mohaṃ samanupaśyasi //MU_6,113.37//
GSP27moksop_u:39962: idaṃ karomi nedaṃ tu prāpnomīdam itas tv iti /
GSP27moksop_u:39963: antar hasasi tāṃ kaccid āśāpelavatāṃ dhiyaḥ //MU_6,113.38//
GSP27moksop_u:39966: kas tvam adyāṅgasampannaḥ kiṃniṣṭho 'si kim īhase /
GSP27moksop_u:39970: yasya tvam eva tajjñāsi tad evāham upasthitaḥ //MU_6,113.41//
GSP27moksop_u:39977: na tuṣṭo 'smi na khinno 'smi nāyam asmi na cetarat /
GSP27moksop_u:39978: na sthūlo 'smi na sūkṣmo 'smi sarvam asmi ca sundari //MU_6,113.45//
GSP27moksop_u:39983: yat tad asti tad evāsmi vaktuṃ śaknomi netarat /
GSP27moksop_u:39984: taraṅgataralāpāṅge gurus tvaṃ me namo 'stu te //MU_6,113.48//
GSP27moksop_u:39987: svasthaś śānto mṛdur dānto vītarāgo niraṃśadhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:39988: sarvātītas sarvagaś ca kham ivāyam ahaṃ sthitaḥ //MU_6,113.50//
GSP27moksop_u:39990: kim idānīṃ prabho brūhi rocate te mahāmate //MU_6,113.51//
GSP27moksop_u:39992: pratiṣedhaṃ na jānāmi na jānāmy abhivāñchanam /
GSP27moksop_u:39993: yad ācarasi tanvi tvaṃ kadācid vedmi tan na vā //MU_6,113.52//
GSP27moksop_u:39996: yad eva kiñcij jānāsi tad eva kuru sundari /
GSP27moksop_u:39997: tad eva dhārayiṣyāmi pratibimbaṃ yathā maṇiḥ //MU_6,113.54//
GSP27moksop_u:39999: na staumi na ca nindāmi yad icchasi tad ācara //MU_6,113.55//
GSP27moksop_u:40001: yady evaṃ tan mahābhāga samākarṇaya manmatam /
GSP27moksop_u:40005: yādṛg eṣaṇam asmākam tādṛg etad aneṣaṇam /
GSP27moksop_u:40008: maurkhyam eva parityajya ta eveme sthitā iha //MU_6,113.59//
GSP27moksop_u:40009: sāmprataṃ prakṛtenemaṃ kālaṃ nītvā krameṇa vai /
GSP27moksop_u:40013: moham ekaṃ parityajya tiṣṭhāmaḥ katham eva vā //MU_6,113.61//
GSP27moksop_u:40016: moham ekaṃ parityajya tiṣṭhāmaḥ punar eva te //MU_6,113.62//
GSP27moksop_u:40017: sva eva nagare rājā bhava tvaṃ svāsane sthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40018: lalāmabhūtā kāntānāṃ mahiṣī te bhavāmy aham //MU_6,113.63//
GSP27moksop_u:40024: iti cūḍālayā prokte vihasya sa śikhidhvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40027: evaṃ cet tad viśālākṣi svāyattā nas triviṣṭape /
GSP27moksop_u:40028: siddhabhogabhuvas tāsu nivasāmo na kiṃ priye //MU_6,113.67//
GSP27moksop_u:40030: na rājan mama bhogeṣu vāñchā na ca vibhūtiṣu /
GSP27moksop_u:40031: svabhāvasya vaśād eva yathāprāpte rame nṛpa //MU_6,113.68//
GSP27moksop_u:40032: na sukhāya mama svargo na rājyaṃ nāpi nākitā /
GSP27moksop_u:40034: idaṃ sukham idaṃ neti manane kṣayam āgate /
GSP27moksop_u:40035: samam eva pade śānte tiṣṭhāmīha yathāsukham //MU_6,113.70//
GSP27moksop_u:40037: yuktam uktaṃ viśālākṣi tvayaitat samayā dhiyā /
GSP27moksop_u:40038: ko vārthaḥ kila rājyasya grahe tyāge 'pi vā bhavet //MU_6,113.71//
GSP27moksop_u:40046: ekasminn eva śayane tais taiḥ praṇayaceṣṭitaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40048: tad bhogamokṣasukham uttamayos tayos svam ācetatoḥ praṇayavākyavilāsagarbham /
GSP27moksop_u:40049: utkaṇṭhitaṃ praṇayinor ghanatāṃ nayantī dīrghā muhūrtavad asau rajanī jagāma //MU_6,113.76//
GSP27moksop_u:40053: tatas samudite sūrye vitamasy ambare sthite /
GSP27moksop_u:40062: sthitaṃ provāca tanvī sā cūḍālā devarūpiṇī //MU_6,114.6//
GSP27moksop_u:40063: kevalaṃ maunam utsṛjya tejaś śāntam idaṃ prabho /
GSP27moksop_u:40065: cūḍālayeti sa prokto vane rājā śikhidhvajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40070: abhiṣiktāṃ nṛpaḥ kṛtvā meghavāg āha tāṃ priyām //MU_6,114.10//
GSP27moksop_u:40085: tataś śikhidhvajo rājā mahiṣyā samam iṣṭayā /
GSP27moksop_u:40090: pathi paśyan girīn deśān nadīr grāmān sajaṅgalān //MU_6,114.20//
GSP27moksop_u:40093: tatra te tasya sāmantās tadāgamanam ādṛtāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40101: praviśyātha gṛhaṃ tais tais saṃyutaṃ nṛpamaṅgalaiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40107: deham utsṛjya nirvāṇam asneha iva dīpakaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40112: iti sa susamadṛṣṭir mṛtyum āryo 'tha jitvā daśaśiśirasahasrāṇy ekarājyaṃ cakāra //MU_6,114.31//
GSP27moksop_u:40113: bhuktvā bhogān anantān bhuvi sakalamahī pālacūḍāmaṇitve sthitvā vai dīrghakālaṃ param amṛtapadaṃ prāptavāṃs tad yathaiṣaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40114: evaṃ rāmāgataṃ tvaṃ prakṛtam anusaran kāryajātaṃ viśokas tiṣṭhottiṣṭha svayatnāt prasabham anubhavan bhogamokṣāgryalakṣmīm //MU_6,114.32//
GSP27moksop_u:40119: anena gaccha mārgeṇa na kadācana khidyase //MU_6,115.1//
GSP27moksop_u:40122: yathā śikhidhvajo rājyaṃ kṛtavān evam īdṛśaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40125: kaco bṛhaspateḥ putras tathā budhyasva rāghava //MU_6,115.4//
GSP27moksop_u:40128: yathā prabuddho bhagavan samāsena tathā vada //MU_6,115.5//
GSP27moksop_u:40130: śṛṇu rājan kathaṃ śrīmāñ śikhidhvajavad eva saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40141: ity ākarṇya kaco vākyaṃ pituḥ paramapāvanam /
GSP27moksop_u:40144: saṃyoge ca viyoge ca mahānto hi samāśayāḥ //MU_6,115.11//
GSP27moksop_u:40145: atha varṣeṣu yāteṣu triṣu pañcasu cānagha /
GSP27moksop_u:40146: punaḥ prāpa mahāraṇye kasmiṃścit pitaraṃ kacaḥ //MU_6,115.12//
GSP27moksop_u:40148: apṛcchad vākpatiṃ bhūyas sa kacaḥ klāntayā girā //MU_6,115.13//
GSP27moksop_u:40150: adyedam aṣṭamaṃ varṣaṃ sarvatyāgaḥ kṛto mayā /
GSP27moksop_u:40153: evam ārtamanasy asmin kace vadati kānane /
GSP27moksop_u:40154: sarvam eva tyajety uktvā vākpatir divam udyayau //MU_6,115.15//
GSP27moksop_u:40155: gate tasmin kaco dehād valkalādy apy aśeṣataḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40160: dūyamānamanāḥ prāpa tam eva pitaraṃ gurum //MU_6,115.18//
GSP27moksop_u:40162: apṛcchat tam asau bhūyaḥ khedagadgadayā girā //MU_6,115.19//
GSP27moksop_u:40165: tathāpi nāsti viśrāntis svapade kiṃ karomy aham //MU_6,115.20//
GSP27moksop_u:40167: cittaṃ sarvam iti prāhus tat tyaktvā putra rājase /
GSP27moksop_u:40170: ity uktvā vākpatiḥ putraṃ pupluve tarasā nabhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40172: cintayann apy asau cittaṃ yadā veda na kānane /
GSP27moksop_u:40175: padārthavṛndaṃ dehādi na sarvam iti kathyate /
GSP27moksop_u:40176: tad etat kiṃ kva vā vyarthaṃ nirāgaskaṃ tyajāmy aham //MU_6,115.24//
GSP27moksop_u:40178: jñātvā ca tat tyajāmy āśu tatas tiṣṭhāmi vijvaram //MU_6,115.25//
GSP27moksop_u:40180: iti sañcintya sa kaca uttatāra triviṣṭapam /
GSP27moksop_u:40181: vākpatiṃ prāpya sasnehaṃ vavande praṇanāma ca //MU_6,115.26//
GSP27moksop_u:40182: papraccha cainam ekānte kiṃ cittaṃ bhagavan mama /
GSP27moksop_u:40183: svarūpaṃ brūhi cittasya yenaitat santyajāmy aham //MU_6,115.27//
GSP27moksop_u:40185: cittaṃ nijam ahaṅkāraṃ viduś cittavido janāḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40186: antar yo 'yam ahambhāvo jantos tac cittam ucyate //MU_6,115.28//
GSP27moksop_u:40188: manye 'sya duṣkaras tyāgo na siddhim upagacchati /
GSP27moksop_u:40189: katham eṣa kila tyaktuṃ yujyate yogināṃ vara //MU_6,115.29//
GSP27moksop_u:40195: guro gīrvāṇavṛndasya katham etad vadāśu me //MU_6,115.31//
GSP27moksop_u:40197: yathaitad eva tanaya tathā śṛṇu vadāmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:40199: vastuto nāsty ahaṅkāraḥ putra mithyābhramo hy asau /
GSP27moksop_u:40200: asan sann iva sampanno bālavetālavac chaṭhaḥ //MU_6,115.33//
GSP27moksop_u:40201: yathā rajjvāṃ bhujaṅgatvaṃ marāv ambumatir yathā /
GSP27moksop_u:40203: asad eva yathā dvitvaṃ mohād indor vilokyate /
GSP27moksop_u:40204: tathā sphuraty ahaṅkāro nasatyo nāma satyavat //MU_6,115.35//
GSP27moksop_u:40206: khād apy atitarām acchaṃ vidyate sarvavedanam //MU_6,115.36//
GSP27moksop_u:40208: tad evaikaṃ kacaty ambu vilolāsv iva vīciṣu //MU_6,115.37//
GSP27moksop_u:40209: atra ko 'yam ahambhāvaḥ kuto vā katham utthitaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40210: kvābdher jāto rajorāśiḥ kvānalād utthitam jalam //MU_6,115.38//
GSP27moksop_u:40211: ayaṃ so 'ham iti vyarthaṃ pratyayaṃ tyaja putraka /
GSP27moksop_u:40215: phalakusumadalānāṃ sarvadiksaṃsthitānāṃ rasa iva jagatāṃ tvaṃ saṃsthitas sarvadaiva /
GSP27moksop_u:40216: vimalataracidātmā nityam evātyanantaḥ ka iva kila tavāhaṃniścayo bhāvamūrte //MU_6,115.41//
GSP27moksop_u:40220: iti prāpya paraṃ yogam upadeśam anuttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:40223: kaco yathā sthito rāma tathā tiṣṭhāvikāravān //MU_6,116.2//
GSP27moksop_u:40224: ahaṅkāram asad viddhi mainam āśraya mā tyaja /
GSP27moksop_u:40229: paramād apy aṇos sūkṣmaṃ cinmātraṃ tvaṃ nirāmayam //MU_6,116.5//
GSP27moksop_u:40232: abodhena jagat sarvaṃ māyāmayam iva sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:40235: mā duḥkhito bhava vyarthaṃ tvaṃ mithyāpuruṣo yathā //MU_6,116.8//
GSP27moksop_u:40239: paramām āgato 'smy antas tṛptiṃ jñānāmṛtena te /
GSP27moksop_u:40243: na tṛptim adhigacchāmi vacasāṃ vadatas tava /
GSP27moksop_u:40245: tṛpto 'pi bhūyaḥ pṛcchāmi tvāṃ praśnam imam īśvara /
GSP27moksop_u:40246: ko nāma tṛpto 'py agrasthaṃ na pibaty amṛtāsavam //MU_6,116.13//
GSP27moksop_u:40254: sa ekānte kvacij jātaś śūnye tatraiva tiṣṭhati /
GSP27moksop_u:40255: keśoṇḍukam iva vyomni mṛgatṛṣṇeva vā marau //MU_6,116.17//
GSP27moksop_u:40256: tasmād anyan na tatrāsti yad asti ca sa eva tat /
GSP27moksop_u:40257: yac cānyat tat sadābhāsaṃ na sa paśyati durmatiḥ //MU_6,116.18//
GSP27moksop_u:40258: saṅkalpas tasya sañjātas tatra vṛddhim upeyuṣaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40259: khasyāhaṃ kham ahaṃ khaṃ me khaṃ rakṣāmīti niścalaḥ //MU_6,116.19//
GSP27moksop_u:40260: khaṃ sthāpayitvā rakṣāmi vastv iṣṭaṃ rakṣyam ādarāt /
GSP27moksop_u:40262: tasya kośe babandhāsthāṃ rakṣitaṃ khaṃ mayety asau /
GSP27moksop_u:40264: atha kālena tat tasya gṛhaṃ nāśam upāyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:40266: hā gṛhākāśa naṣṭaṃ tvaṃ hā kva yātam asi kṣaṇāt /
GSP27moksop_u:40267: hā hā bhagnam asi svaccham ity athaitac chuśoca saḥ //MU_6,116.23//
GSP27moksop_u:40268: iti śokaṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā punas tatraiva durmatiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40270: tato nāśaṃ sa kālena nītaḥ kūpo 'pi tasya vai /
GSP27moksop_u:40274: kumbho 'pi tasya kālena nāśaṃ nīto raghūdvaha /
GSP27moksop_u:40275: yām eva diśam ādatte durbhagas sāpi naśyati //MU_6,116.27//
GSP27moksop_u:40278: kuṇḍam apy asya kālena kānane nāśam āyayau /
GSP27moksop_u:40279: tejaseva tamas tena kuṇḍākaśāṃ śuśoca saḥ //MU_6,116.29//
GSP27moksop_u:40282: tad apy asya jahārāśu kālaḥ kavalitaprajaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40283: jīrṇaṃ parṇaṃ yathā vātas sa tacchokaparo 'bhavat //MU_6,116.31//
GSP27moksop_u:40286: tad apy asya jahārāśu kālo vāta ivāmbudam /
GSP27moksop_u:40290: evaṃ sthitas sa śaṭhadhīr gaganaṃ guhāyāṃ gṛhṇan gṛhe na gaganena kilātmabuddhyā /
GSP27moksop_u:40291: duḥkhāntaraṃ ghanataraṃ ghanaduḥkhajālād āyāti yāti ca gater gatim aṅga mūḍhaḥ //MU_6,116.35//
GSP27moksop_u:40296: kathito 'yaṃ tvayā vyomarakṣaṇaṃ ca kim ucyate //MU_6,117.1//
GSP27moksop_u:40298: śṛṇu rāma yathābhūtam etat prakaṭayāmi te /
GSP27moksop_u:40301: enaṃ taṃ tvam ahaṅkāraṃ viddhi śūnyāmbarotthitam //MU_6,117.3//
GSP27moksop_u:40302: yasminn ākāśakoṇe 'smin sādho jagad idaṃ sthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:40303: tad anantam asac chūnyaṃ sargādau bhavati svayam //MU_6,117.4//
GSP27moksop_u:40305: tasmād udety ahaṅkāraḥ pūrvaṃ spanda ivānilāt //MU_6,117.5//
GSP27moksop_u:40306: vṛddhiṃ yātas sa gagane kalpayaty ātmatāṃ śaṭhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40309: bhūyo bhūyo 'pi nirnaṣṭān dṛṣṭvedaṃ kurute jagat //MU_6,117.7//
GSP27moksop_u:40310: sa eva māyāpuruṣo mithyāpuruṣa eva saḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40313: kṛtvā rakṣita ātmeti yāti tadvyomni bhāvanām //MU_6,117.9//
GSP27moksop_u:40315: śṛṇu yair jagadārambhavibhramair moham ety asau //MU_6,117.10//
GSP27moksop_u:40316: jīvo buddhir manaś cittaṃ māyā prakṛtir ity api /
GSP27moksop_u:40317: saṅkalpaḥ kalanā kālaḥ kalā cety api viśrutaiḥ //MU_6,117.11//
GSP27moksop_u:40318: evamādyais tathānyaiś ca nāmabhir bahutāṃ gataiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40323: ghaṭākāśādiṣu śliṣṭam evaṃ mā kleśavān bhava //MU_6,117.14//
GSP27moksop_u:40324: ākāśād api vistīrṇaś śuddhas sūkṣmaś śivaś śubhaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40325: ya ātmā sa kathaṃ kena rakṣyate gṛhyate tathā //MU_6,117.15//
GSP27moksop_u:40327: vyarthaṃ bhūtāni śocanti naṣṭa ātmeti saṅkṣaye //MU_6,117.16//
GSP27moksop_u:40329: tathā deheṣu naṣṭeṣu dehī nityam alopakaḥ //MU_6,117.17//
GSP27moksop_u:40330: śuddhacinmātra ātmāyam ākāśād apy aṇor aṇuḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40331: svānubhūtyaṃśamātraṃ hi khavad rāma na naśyati //MU_6,117.18//
GSP27moksop_u:40332: na jāyate na mriyate kvacit kiñcit kadācana /
GSP27moksop_u:40336: sarvāpadāṃ nilayam adhruvam asvatantram āsannapātam avivekam asāram ajñam /
GSP27moksop_u:40337: bodhād ahaṅkṛtipadaṃ sakalaṃ vimucya śeṣe subaddhapada uttamatāṃ prayāsi //MU_6,117.21//
GSP27moksop_u:40341: parasmād brahmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ manaḥ prathamam utthitam /
GSP27moksop_u:40342: mananātmakam ābhogi tatstham eva sthitiṃ gatam //MU_6,118.1//
GSP27moksop_u:40348: raśmijālam idaṃ hy etat tasyānyad iva bhāsvataḥ //MU_6,118.4//
GSP27moksop_u:40350: keyūram eva tat tasya na tasya kanakaṃ hi tat //MU_6,118.5//
GSP27moksop_u:40352: taraṅgabuddhir evaikā sthitā tasya na vāridhīḥ //MU_6,118.6//
GSP27moksop_u:40359: jvālājālena lolena rañjitā sā tathā sthitiḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40360: tām evāsthāṃ samādhatte tadgatā vyākulā matiḥ //MU_6,118.10//
GSP27moksop_u:40363: yo nirvikalpas sa mahān sa saṅkṣīṇamanā muniḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40364: prāptavyaṃ tena samprāptaṃ nāsau majjati vastuṣu //MU_6,118.12//
GSP27moksop_u:40370: mano bhavati viśvātma bhāvayaty ākṛtiṃ svayam //MU_6,118.15//
GSP27moksop_u:40371: tat saṅkalpātmakaṃ ceto yathedam akhilaṃ jagat /
GSP27moksop_u:40373: kīṭatvam abjajatvaṃ ca merutvam aṇutāṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:40376: tanoti tasyāṃ tadanu nānātāṃ gacchati svayam //MU_6,118.18//
GSP27moksop_u:40378: na satyaṃ na ca mithyaiva svapnajālam ivotthitam //MU_6,118.19//
GSP27moksop_u:40381: yathā na vitathas svapnaḥ pratibhāsān na cāpi san /
GSP27moksop_u:40382: tathā brāhmaṃ manorājyaṃ jagan nāsan na san mune //MU_6,118.21//
GSP27moksop_u:40383: mithyāvabhāsamātraṃ hi yad idaṃ ghanatāṃ gatam /
GSP27moksop_u:40385: paramārthena dṛṣṭaṃ cet tad idaṃ naiva kiñcana /
GSP27moksop_u:40388: yathāmbudhir vapur dhatte svabhāvena tathā vibhuḥ //MU_6,118.24//
GSP27moksop_u:40390: nāpūrvaṃ kurute kiñcit kaścid bhedam atas tyaja //MU_6,118.25//
GSP27moksop_u:40391: paśyañ chṛṇvan spṛśañ jighran vadan vyavaharan svapan /
GSP27moksop_u:40392: nāpūrvaṃ kurute kiñcit satyam ity eva bhāvaya //MU_6,118.26//
GSP27moksop_u:40393: yad yat karoṣi tat tattvaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ tatam /
GSP27moksop_u:40394: brahma prabṛṃhitākāraṃ tasmād anyan na vidyate //MU_6,118.27//
GSP27moksop_u:40396: saṃvid evedam akhilaṃ jagan nānyāsti kalpanā //MU_6,118.28//
GSP27moksop_u:40398: idam anyad idaṃ cānyad iti mithyāgrahaḥ kutaḥ //MU_6,118.29//
GSP27moksop_u:40400: saṃvedyam api nāsty eva bandhamokṣāv ataḥ kutaḥ //MU_6,118.30//
GSP27moksop_u:40401: mokṣo 'yam eṣa khalu bandha iti prasahya cintā nirasya sakalā vikalābhimānaḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40402: maunī vaśī vigatamānamado mahātmā kurvan svakāryam anahaṅkṛtir eva tiṣṭha //MU_6,118.31//
GSP27moksop_u:40407: sarvāś śaṅkāḥ parityajya dhairyam ālambya śāśvatam //MU_6,119.1//
GSP27moksop_u:40409: kim ucyate mahākartā mahātyāgī kim ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:40410: kim ucyate mahābhoktā samyak kathaya me prabho //MU_6,119.2//
GSP27moksop_u:40420: yad ahaṃ paripṛcchāmi kṛpayā tad vadāśu me //MU_6,119.6//
GSP27moksop_u:40426: sarvāś śaṅkāḥ parityajya dhairyam ālambya śāśvatam /
GSP27moksop_u:40429: kim ucyate mahātyāgī mahābhoktā kim ucyate /
GSP27moksop_u:40430: kim ucyate mahākartā samyak kathaya me prabho //MU_6,119.10//
GSP27moksop_u:40433: yaḥ karoti yathāprāptaṃ mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.11//
GSP27moksop_u:40435: yaḥ karoty anapekṣyaiva mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.12//
GSP27moksop_u:40437: yaḥ karoti gatodvegaṃ mahākartā sa ucate //MU_6,119.13//
GSP27moksop_u:40439: matir na lipyate yasya mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.14//
GSP27moksop_u:40441: niricchaṃ vartate kārye mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.15//
GSP27moksop_u:40443: na śocate yo nodeti mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.16//
GSP27moksop_u:40446: svabhāvenaiva yasyāntas samatāṃ na jahāti dhīḥ /
GSP27moksop_u:40447: śubhāśubhaṃ hy ācarato mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.18//
GSP27moksop_u:40449: samam eva mano yasya mahākartā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.19//
GSP27moksop_u:40450: na kiñcana dveṣṭi ca yo na kiṃ ca stauti yas svayam /
GSP27moksop_u:40451: bhuṅkte ca prakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.20//
GSP27moksop_u:40452: nādatte 'py ādadānas san nācaraty ācarann api /
GSP27moksop_u:40453: bhuñjāno 'pi na yo bhuṅkte mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.21//
GSP27moksop_u:40455: yaḥ paśyaty apayātecchaṃ mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.22//
GSP27moksop_u:40457: yasya notkrāmati matir mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.23//
GSP27moksop_u:40458: jarāmaraṇam āpac ca rājyaṃ dāridryam eva ca /
GSP27moksop_u:40459: ramyam eveti yo vetti mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.24//
GSP27moksop_u:40463: nāpayānty aniśaṃ yasmān mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.26//
GSP27moksop_u:40464: kaṭv amblaṃ lavaṇaṃ tiktam amṛṣṭaṃ mṛṣṭam uttamam /
GSP27moksop_u:40465: adhamaṃ yo 'tti sāmyena mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.27//
GSP27moksop_u:40466: sarasaṃ nīrasaṃ caiva surataṃ virataṃ tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:40467: yaḥ paśyati samas somyo mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.28//
GSP27moksop_u:40468: kṣāre khaṇḍaprakāre ca śubhe vāpy aśubhe tathā /
GSP27moksop_u:40469: samatā susthitā yasya mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.29//
GSP27moksop_u:40470: idaṃ bhojyam abhojyaṃ cety evaṃ tyaktvā vikalpitam /
GSP27moksop_u:40471: gatābhilāṣaṃ yo bhuṅkte mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.30//
GSP27moksop_u:40472: āpadaṃ sampadaṃ moham ānandam avaraṃ varam /
GSP27moksop_u:40473: yo bhuṅkte samayā buddhyā mahābhoktā sa ucyate //MU_6,119.31//
GSP27moksop_u:40475: dhiyā yeneti santyaktaṃ mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.32//
GSP27moksop_u:40477: dhiyā yena parityaktā mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.33//
GSP27moksop_u:40479: nūnaṃ yenojjhitā sattā mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.34//
GSP27moksop_u:40480: na me deho na janmāpi yuktāyukte na karmaṇā /
GSP27moksop_u:40481: iti niścayavān yo 'ntar mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.35//
GSP27moksop_u:40482: yena dharmam adharmaṃ ca manomananam īhitaṃ /
GSP27moksop_u:40483: sarvam antaḥ parityaktaṃ mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.36//
GSP27moksop_u:40485: tyaktvā yo 'vasthitas svastho mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.37//
GSP27moksop_u:40487: yo 'vāsanas sarvam idaṃ mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.38//
GSP27moksop_u:40489: sā yena suṣṭhu santyaktā mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.39//
GSP27moksop_u:40491: dhīras svastho mṛdur dānto mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.40//
GSP27moksop_u:40493: na santyajati yaḥ pūrṇo mahātyāgī sa ucyate //MU_6,119.41//
GSP27moksop_u:40495: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya tiṣṭha rāma yathāsthitaḥ //MU_6,119.42//
GSP27moksop_u:40497: ity uktam ujjvalamaṇīndraśilaikaśṛṅge merau jvalajjvalanarūpiṇi rāmabhadra //MU_6,119.43//
GSP27moksop_u:40498: etāṃ dṛśaṃ samavalambya vilāsakāntakāryaṃ kuru kramagataṃ samayaiva buddhyā /
GSP27moksop_u:40499: nityodito 'si vimalo 'si nirāmayo 'si śaṅkāṃ parityaja sukhī bhava yo 'si so 'si //MU_6,119.44//
